column2: Coronavirus: Afrika y’Epfo yatezuye ingingo za guma mu rugo
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Afrika y'Epfo avuga ko ibitigiri vy'abandura coronavirus mu gihugu bisa n'ivyageze kw'isonga, aca atangaza ingingo yo gutezura ingingo za guma mu rugo. Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa amenyesha ko hafi ingingo zose zafashwe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira ry'uwu mugera zizotangura gutezurwa kuva ejo ku wa mbere. Eka n'ingingo yateye impari cane yo kubuza urudandaza rw'inzoga n'itabi izovaho. Ingendo zo hagati mu gihugu, amakoraniro mato mato y'imiryango hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'ubutunzi bizosubira kwemererwa. Hagati aho, avuga ko hariho zimwe zimwe zizogumaho, harimwo izijanye n'abinjira mu gihugu bavuye hanze, amakoraniro y'abantu barenga 50  hamwe n'amakoraniro y'inkino. Mw'ijambo ryiwe rya nijoro ku wa gatandatu kuri televiziyo, Bwana Ramaphosa avuga ko iryo tezurwa rizotuma ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu busubirana itoto inyuma y'igihe kirekire igihugu kiri mu bihe bigoye. Hagati aho, asaba abanya Afrika y'epfo ko batokwijajara imbere ya Covid-19 n'aho hari ibimenyetso "vy'agahengwe", akanagabisha ko ibintu bishobora kuba nabi mu minsi iri imbere. Gushika ubu, iki gihugu gifise abarenga igice c'abanduye coronavirus ku mugabane wose wa Afrika, aho abarenga 570.000 ari bo bamaze kwandura, nayo 11,500 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Afrika y'Epfo kandi nico gihugu kigira gatanu kw'isi mu bitigiri vy'abanduye uwu mugera, inyuma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Brezili, Uburusiya n'Ubuhindi, ariko abandura bakaba batanguye kugabanuka mu minsi iheze. Bwana Ramaphosa avuga ko ibitigiri biherutse gutangazwa vyamanutse biva ku 12.000 bishika ku 5000 mu ndwi iheze. Ibiharuro vy'abakirwaye vyaragabanutse gushika ku 105.000 kandi ibitigiri vy'abakira bikaba vyaraduze gushika ku bice 80%, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'umukuru w'ico gihugu. Mu kwa gatatu, leta ya Afrika y'Epfo yarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo zikomeye cane, aho imbibe z'igihugu zugawe, amashure arugarwa, urudandazwa rw'inzoga rurahagarikwa, maze abanyagihugu bategekwa kuguma muhira. Izo ngingo zizwi ko zatumye umugera wa coronavirus udakwirakwira n'umurindi munini, bituma ibisata bijejwe amagara y'abantu vyoroherwa mu kwakira abarwaye. Agahengwe kamaze kuboneka, leta yaciye itangura gutezura buke buke mu kwa gatandatu, ariko ingingo ruhasha zikaba zasubiriye gufatwa mu kwezi guheze inyuma y'aho ibitigiri vy'abanduye bisubiriye kuduga. Igihugu caciye gishirwa mu mategeko adasanzwe gushika ku wa 15 z'ukwa munani. Ingingo zafashwe zariyamirijwe n'abanyagihugu, mbere n'abafise amazu y'uburiro n'inyobwa bakaba bariyamirije cane iyo ngingo yo kubuza urudandaza rw'inzoga. Intara ya Gauteng, umushinge w'ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu, niyo yasinzikaye cane gusumba izindi.

column2: Burkina Faso: Abacangero b’Abarusiya biteguye gufasha abatembagaje ubutegetsi
column3: Umurwi w'abacangero b'Abarusiya bandikiye abategetsi ba gisirikare ba Burkina Faso baherutse gutembagaza ubutegetsi ko biteguye kuja gufasha mu kwigisha igisirikare c'iki gihugu co muri Afrika y'Uburengero mu rugamba rwaco rwo kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam. Uyu murwi wiyita "Community of Officers for International Security" (mu Kirundi twovuga tuti "Umurwi w'abasirikare bitaho umutekano mpuzamakungu), usanzwe uri muri Centrafrique ni wo watangaje ibi wandikiye aba bategetsi  ryahawe BBC. Ntibiramenyekana nimba Burkina Faso yaremeye ubu bufasha canke nimba izobwemera. Burkina Faso ubu irongowe n'akarwi k'abasirikare katembagaje reta ya Perezida Roch Kaboré ku wa mbere. Ibiri muri iryo kete biratomoye neza: "Mu gihe mwotumira abigisha b'Abarusiya kugira ngo bigishe igisirikare ca Burkina Faso, barashobora kubikora neza cane". Iri kete ryemejwe n'umuhanuzi w'Umurusiya mu vyo umutekano mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu wa Centrafrique ni ingorane ku rugamba rurongowe n'Ubufaransa mu karere ka Sahel. N'aho uru rugamba rumaze imyaka irenga cumi, iri kete rivuga ko "ataco rwashitseko", rikongerako y'uko uyu murwi ushobora gufasha abasirikae ba Burkina Faso "gufata ibintu mu minwe mu kanya gato cane mu ijanye n'umutekano". Ibihugu vyo mu Burengero vyaraneguye irungikwa ry'abacangero b'abarusiya mu gihugu kibanyi ca Mali mu kw'icumi na kabiri bikaba vyavuga ko rishobora gutuma ibintu vyunyuka gusumba mu bijanye n'umutekano.

column2: Covid: Ico kiza cagabanije umunezero w'umwaka mushasha hirya no hino kw'isi
column3: Amategeko yo kwikingira mu misi mikuru y'umwaka mushasha ariko arashirwaho hirya no hino kw'isi mu gihe ibihugu vyinshi bihanganye n'iyongerekana ry'abagwayi ba coronavirus. Ukurasa ibintu biturika kandi vyakaka mu kirere hamwe n'ayandi makoraniro ntibirekuwe kuva i Sydney gushika i New York. Ibirori ntibizoba na cane cane i Buraya, mu gihe hari ubwoba ko hari ubundi bwoko bwa coronavirus bwadutse. Ubufaransa bwategekanije abapolisi 1000.000 bo kugenzura imisi mikuru y'umwaka mushasha no kwubahiriza amasaha y'umukwabu. Abantu barenga umuliyoni 1.8 baramaze gupfa bahitanywe na coronavirus hirya no hino kw'isi kuva ico kiza giteye haraciye umwaka. Abantu barenga imiliyoni 81 baramaze gufatwa n'iyo ngwara. Ingene ibihugu vya Aziya na Pacifique vyabangamiwe? Kimwe mu bihugu vya mbere vyashikiriye umwaka mushasha ni Australia. Ibintu biturika kandi vyakaka birabandanya kuraswa mu kirere, ariko nta bantu baza kwemererwa gukoranira ku kivuko co muri ico gisagara mu kuwigina. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa New South Wales, Gladys Berejiklian avuga ati:"Ntidushaka gutuma haba imisi mikuru ikwiragira hose ku mugoroba w'umwaka mushasha." Benshi mubaba i Sydney baza kuguma imbere y'imboneshakure, aho abantu bazoba barekuriwe kuja hamwe batarenga batanu, nk'uko umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC ari muri ico gisagara, Phil Mercer abivuga. Mu Bushinwa, ibirori vy'umuco w'amatara vy'umwaka mushasha mu gisagara ca Pekin vyahagaritswe. Imisi mikuru yagabanuwe cane mu bisagara vyo muri ico gihugu. Ubuyapani bwahagaritse umusi mukuru usanzwe uhimbazwa buri mwaka mushasha aho igikomangoma Naruhito n'abandi bo mu muryango wiwe baramutsa isinzi ry'abantu. Mu Buhinde, i Delhi no mu bindi bisagara vyinshi hashizweho umukwabu hamwe n'izindi ngingo zibuza amakoraniro y'abantu benshi ku mwaka mushasha. I Buraya ho gute? Mu Bufaransa, reta yategetse ko haba abajejwe umutekano bagaragara mu bisagara hose kuva isaha zibiri z'ijoro ku musi wa kane, isaha umukwabu utangurirako. I Paris, igice c'itereni zica mu kuzimu kizoba cugaye ku mugoroba. Ubufaransa bumaze kwiyugarana incuro zibiri, ububare, inzu z'uburiro hamwe n'ibibanza vy'akahise bizoguma vyugawe ku musi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha. Mu Bwongereza - aho coronavirus nshasha iriko irakwiragira vyihuta kandi abantu imiliyoni 20 bamerewe nabi cane  mu turere dusinzikaye cane,  bategetswe kuguma mu mihana yabo - Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yahamagariye abantu gukurikiza amategeko yo kwikingira Covid. Ku musi wa gatatu yavuze ati:"Ibi ntibisigura ko mubonana n'imiryango hamwe n'incuti mu mazu yanyu, kiretse igihe musanzwe mubana, kandi mukwiye kwirinda amakoraniro y'abantu benshi ayo ari yo yose." Igipolisi co mu bisagara cateye akamo abakunda kugira imisi mikuru i Londres "ko bohimbariza umwaka mushasha mu mazu yabo." Irlande irongereza ingingo zo kwikingira kuri uyu wa kane, ibuze imigenderanire hagati y'amazu, yugare ubuguriro budakenewe cane ihagarike no kuja ku birometero bigera kuri bitanu mu kiringo c'amezi atatu. Ubudagi buri mu mategeko yo kugaranwa gushika itariki 10. Reta yahagaritse ibintu biturika birwaswa mu kirere, ishiraho n'ingingo zindi zikomeye ku gitigiri c'abantu bashobora guhurira hamwe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu Jens Spahn yavuze ko igihugu gishobora "kugira umusi mukuru w'umwaka mushasha w'agacerere" utazopfa wibagiwe. Holande na yo nyene iri mu ngingo zo kutava ku muhana, zitegekanijwe kurangira itariki 19 z'ukwezi kwa mbere. Uguharura umwanya usigaye ngo umwaka mushasha ushike, kuza kubera ku kibuga ca Amsterdam, ata mu ntu n'umwe ahari. Turkia kiratangura imisi ine yo kwiyugarana kuva ku mugoroba w'umwaka mushasha. Muri Amerika, abategetsi bashizeho ingingo zo guhagarika imisi mikuru mu ntara no mu bisagara vyinshi. I new York, umupira wakaka uri mu kibanza ca Times Squares uraza kururutswa mu mihango y'umugenzo wo guharura umwanya usigaye ngo isaha zitandatu z'ijoro zishike, ariko nta bantu bazoba barekuriwe kuza muri ico kibanza. Ibintu biturika kandi bica ibibatsi biraswa mu kirere vyahagaritswe mu bisagara harimwo San Francisco na Las Vegas.

column2: Uganda: Dominic Ongwen wa LRA yahamijwe ivyaha 61 na ICC
column3: Sentare mpuzamakungu y'i La Haye mu Buholandi yahamije ivyaha vyo mu ntambara n'ivyaha vyakorewe zina muntu uwahoze ari umukomanda mukuru w'umuhari Lord's Resistance Army, LRA, wo muri Uganda. Abacamanza bavuze ko basanze ahamwa n'ivyaha 61, harimwo ivyo kwica, kwica urubozo, gufata ku nguvu n'ubuja bufatiye ku gitsina. Abaye umunywanyi wa mbere wa LRA aciriwe urubanza na sentare. Ongwen yari akiri umwana igihe yanyuruzwa n'abagwanyi b'uwo muhari hanyuma aza kuba umwe mu bawurongoye. Abacamanza bavuze ko ivyo yakoze atawamuhase kandi ata kinya yagira, akaba rero ashobora gucibwa umunyororo wo guherayo. Umuhari wa LRA, urongowe na Joseph Kony, warateye intambara mu bihugu bitanu vyo mu karere ko mu buseruko no hagati ku mugabane wa Afrika. Dominic Ongwen yafatiwe muri Republique Centre Africaine mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa mbere mu 2015, haciye imyaka cumi ICC imusohoreye umutahe wo kumufata. Umukuru wa LRA, Joseph Kony, we gushika ubu ntarafatwa. Dominic Ongwen yabariye umucamanza ko nawe nyene yanyurujwe na LRA akiri umwana muri Uganda. Mu kwumvirizwa kugufi imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura i La Haye, Ongwen yavuze ko yari afise imyaka cumi n'ine igihe yaba umusirikare. Yagirizwa ivyaha vyo mu ntambara hamwe n'ivyo guhohotera ikiremwa muntu, bijanye n'igitero cagabwe mu nkambi y'impunzi muri Uganda.

column2: Haiti: umupfakazi Martine Moïse asizwe n'umukuru w'igihugu yashoboye kuvuga ubwa mbere
column3: Uyu mupfakazi asizwe n'umukuru w'igihugu ca Haiti arasigura ingene vyagenze igihe abicanyi "batabagura" umugabo wiwe n'amasasu bamaze kwinjira mu nzu yabo mw'ijoro. Martine Moïse avuga ko ico gitero cabaye mu kanya gato, ku buryo umugabo wiwe Jovenel atashoboye no "kuvuga ijambo rimwe rudende". Perezida Moïse yishwe ku wa 07 z'uku kw'indwi n'abacangero b'abanyamahanga 28. Umupfasoni Martine Moïse na we nyene yarakomeretse muri ico gitero, aca asimbanwa i Miami muri Florida kuvurwa. Ejo ku wa gatandatu, yashoboye kwifata ijwi yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, aho yaniyemeje kubandanya igikorwa ciwe. Abantu batari bake bemeje ko koko ari umupfasoni w'umukuru w'igihugu. Asigura ingene ibintu vyagenze igihe abo bicanyi bagandagura umugabo wiwe, Martine Moïse muri iryo jwi avuga ati: "Mu kanya isase, abo bacangero biteye inzu yanje baca bamijagira amasasu umugabo wanje". Abandanya ati: "Iri shano nta zina rifise kuko utegerezwa kuba umwicanyi ruhebwa kugira wice umukuru w'igihugu nka Jovenel Moïse, utanamuhaye n'akaryo na gato ngo avuge n'ijambo na rimwe gusa". Avuga ko umugabo wiwe yishwe ku mvo za poritike - cane cane, akavuga amatora ya kamarampaka ku mpinduka z'ibwirizwashingiro ryari guha  umukuru w'igihugu ububasha busumbirije. Abo bantu atavuze, yavuze ko "bashaka kuzimanganya indoto z'umukuru w'igihugu". Yongerako ati: "Nishwe n'amarira, ni vyo, ariko ntidushobora kureka ngo igihugu cacu kibure iyo kiva n'iyo kija". "Ntidushobora kureka amaraso ya Perezida Jovenel Moïse, umugabo wanje, umukuru w'igihugu cacu dukunda cane kandi na we yadukunda, ngo asesekere ubusa". Perezida Moïse w'imyaka  53 yari umukuru w'iki gihugu ca mbere gikenye ku mugabane wa Amerika kuva mu 2017.  Ubutegetsi bwiwe ntibwari bworohewe kuko yahanganye n'ibirego vyo kurya ruswa kandi mu ntango z'uwu mwaka igihugu caranzwe n'imyiyerekano ikomeye ku mugwa mukuru no mu bindi bisagara. Amatora y'abashingamateka yari ategekanijwe mu kw'icumi 2019 ariko impari zatumye yunguruzwa, vyumvikana ko ubutegetsi bwa Moïse bwari bushingiye ku mategeko wenyene yasohora (décrets). Yategekanya gutumako amatora ya kamarampaka mu kw'icenda uno mwaka yo kwemeza canke guhakana impinduka z'ibwirizwashingiro. Mu kwa kabiri igihe abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bwiwe bamusabiye gutanga imihoho, Moïse yavuze ko haburijwemwo integuro y'abashatse kumugandagura banatembagaze na reta yiwe. Gushika ubu abateguye ico gitero co ku wa gatatu n'intumbero yabo ntibaramenyekana. Hari ibibazo abantu bibaza ariko bitararonka inyishu, harimwo ukungene abo bicanyi bashoboye kwinjira mu muhana wiwe. Mu ndwi iza, abari bajejwe kumukingira ubuzima bazorengutswa kugira ngo bisigure. Umwe mu banyaporitike bakomeye batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi afise amakenga ku bivugwa. Steven Benoit  yahoze ari umukenguzamateka wa Haiti yabwiye iradiyo yo muri ico gihugu Magik9 ku wa gatanu ko atari "abanya Colombia bamwishe", ariko nta vyemezo yatanze. Igiporisi ca Haiti kivuga ko abenshi muri abo bacangero ari abanya Colombia, mu gihe babiri ari abanyamerika bakomoka muri Haiti. 17 mu bari bagize ako kagwi barafatiwe ku mugwa mukuru Port-au-Prince inyuma yo kurasana. Batatu mu bikekwa barishwe, mu gihe abandi umunani bakiriko barahigwa. Reta ya Colombia yemeye gufasha Haiti mu matohoza yayo. Umukuru w'igiporisi ca Colombia Jenerali Jorge Luis Vargas, avuga ko abahoze ari abasirikare 17 ba Colombia bikekwa ko babigizemwo uruhara. Ubunyamabanga bwa Amerika buvuga ko budashobora kwemeza nimba hari umwenegihugu wa Amerika yahagaritswe. Ariko, ibinyamakuru vya Amerika na Canada bivuga ko umwe muri babiri bafise ubwenegihugu bubiri, James Solages w'imyaka 35, yamuka muri Florida kandi ko yahoze ajejwe umutekano ku biro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Canada muri Haiti. Umucamanza ariko arakora amatohoza yabwiye ibinyamakuru ko Solages hamwe n'uyo wundi munyamerika azwi kw'izina rya Joseph Vincent, bavuze ko bari muri ico gihugu nk'abakarimani b'abo bacangero. Umucamanza Clément Noël yabwiye ikinyamakuru Le Nouvelliste ati: "Intumbero kwari uguhagarika Perezida Jovenel Moïse... ntikwari ukumwica". Ibwirizwashingiro rivuga ko Inama Nshingamateka yategerezwa gutora uwundi mukuru w'igihugu. Ariko haracari impari ku matora yategerezwa kuba mu kw'icumi 2019. Impinduka kw'ibwirizwashingiro - izo bose badahurizako - zivuga ko umushikiranganji wa mbere ari we yaca ashikirizwa amabanga. Hagati aho, Haiti isanzwe ifise umushikiranganji wa mbere mfatakibanza, Claude Joseph, hamwe n'uwari aherutse kugenwa, Ariel Henry, ariko akaba atari bwarahire. Aba bompi bavuga ko ari bo barongoye igihugu. Ku wa gatanu, hari umurwi w'imigambwe wateye igikumu ku cemezo gitangaza umukuru w'igihugu mushasha  - Joseph Lambert - hanyuma Henry ace amubera umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ibihe igihugu kirimwo ntivyorohereza iki gihugu gutorera umuti ingorane za poritike n''z'ubutunzi zihanze Haiti.

column2: Africa mu mafoto muri iyi ndwi: 20-26 Ukwezi kw'umunani 2021
column3: Amwe amwe mu mafoto meza cane muri Afrika n'ahandi. Amafoto yose afitiwe uruhusha rwo kuyakoresha.

column2: Papa Francis yashoboye gusoma imisa ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro inyuma yo kubagwa urura
column3: Papa Francis yashoboye kwiyereka abantu ubwa mbere kuva bamukoze kubera ingorane y'urura runini, haraciye indwi. Mu gihe yaboneka ko ameze neza, uyu mupapa w'imyaka 84 yasomye imisa yo muri ino ndwi ku rubaraza rw'ibitaro  Gemelli i Roma. Abantu baharurwa mu majana bakoraniye hanze y'ibi bitaro, bamwe bakoma akaruru ngo "Viva il Papa!" (Twogereranya na "Papa, ramba"). Vaticano ivuga ko igikorwa co kuvura Papa indwara y'urura runini izwi nka "symptomatic diverticular stenosis" cagenze neza. Papa yabwiye abari aho ati: "Ndanezerewe kubona nshoboye kurangura ibanga ryanje ryo ku wa Mungu n'aho ndi ng'aha". "Narumvise ko mwambaye hafi cane kandi ko mwansengeye. Ndabashimiye n'umutima wanje wose". Ashimira abakozi bo muri ivyo bitaro, yavuze ko "yiboneye ingene ubuvuzi bwiza ari nkenerwa, kandi bose bakaburonka, mu bindi bihugu nk'uko bimeze hano mu Butariyano". Yongerako ati: "Ntidutakaze aya mahirwe. Ni ngombwa ko tuyabungabunga". Bamwe mu bana barwariye muri ivyo bitaro babonetse bari kumwe na Papa ku rubaraza. Ntibiramenyekana ikiringo azomara muri ibi bitaro mu gihe azoba ariko ararwaruka. Indwara ya Diverticular ni indwara itera ibivyimba mu rura runini, bigashobora gutuma rwipfungānya, bigatuma umuntu yuzura inda akanababara mu nda. Francis, yavutse mu  1936 i Buenos Aires, yaratakaje igice c'ihaha ry'iburyo afise imyaka 21. Afise kandi ikibazo co mu matako kimutera ububabare buhera mu gice co hasi c'umugongo bukamanuka mu maguru. Mu 2014, yagiye ahagarika ibikorwa bimwe bimwe kubera ibibazo vyo mu mushishito.

column2: Mary Jackson: NASA igiye kwitirira icicaro cayo umuhinga w’umwiraburekazi
column3: Ikigo kijejwe ingendo zo kwiga ikirere NASA kigiye guhindura izina ry'icicaro caco kicitirire umuhinga m'umwiraburekazi wa mbere, Mary Jackson. Uwurongoye NASA Jim Bridenstine avuga ko Jackson yafashije cane mu gukuraho inzitizi ku banyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika n'abagore mu biraba ubuhinga. Amakuru ya Mary Jackson  yavuzwe mw'ireresi yasohotse mu 2016 yiswe Hidden Figures (Abantu banyegejwe).Yari yavukiye ahitwa Hampton mu ntara ya Virginia, asandaba mu 2005. Mu mwaka uheze, NASA yaritiriye ibarabara riri hanze y'ikigo cayo Hidden Figures Way. Mw'itangazo yasohoye, Bridenstine yavuze ati: "Ntibakinyegejwe, tuzobandanya kwibuka intererano y'abagore, Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika, hamwe n'abandi bantu b'amamuko yose bitanze kugira ngo ibikorwa vya NASA vyo kwiga ikirere bishoboke". "Mary W Jackson ni umwe mu murwi w'abagore bakomeye cane bafashije NASA kugira ngo ishoboze abahinga b'ikirere ba Amerika gushobora kuzunguruka mu kirere". "Mary ntiyigeze yemera ko ibintu biguma uko vyari biri, yarafashije gukuraho inzitizi arugururira inzira Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika hamwe n'abagore mu gisata c'ubuhinga". Iyo ngingo ije inyuma y'aho Abanyamerika bakubise agatima mpembero bakihweza akarenganyo Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika bakorewe kuva kera. Urupfu ruheruka rw'umwirabure George Floyd yapfiriye mu gasho k'igipolisi rwatumye haba imyiyerekano kw'isi yose basaba ko ivanguramoko riranduranwa n'imizi. Mu myaka ya 1940, NASA niho yatanguye guha akazi abagore b'Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika bakoreshwa nk'ico bise "inyabwonko-muntu" (Human computers), ariko bakaba bagiye bahura n'ibibazo vy'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba no ku gitsina. Mary Jackson yahawe akazi mu 1951 n'ikigo National Advisory Committee for Aeronautics cagiye huginduka kikitwa NASA mu 1958. Yatwarwa na Dorothy Vaughan - nawe nyene yavuzwe muri ya reresi Hidden Figures - mu gisata cakoramwo abahinga mu biharuro bakoreshwa 'nk'inyabwonko-muntu' mu karere ka Langley k'intara ya Virginia. Jackson yapfuye mu 2005 akaba yararonkejwe ikidari c'inzahabu gihabwa ibihangange vy'itavye Imana. Umukobwa wiwe, Carolyn Lewis avuga ko ari iteka rinini ku muryango kubona NASA ibandanya kwibuka iragi rya Mary Jackson. Ati: "Yari umuhinga, umugiraneza, umugore, nyina w'abana akaba n'intwari yaciriye inzira abandi ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vyatumye bagira ico bashitseko, atari muri NASA gusa, ariko n'ahandi hose mu gihugu cose".

column2: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
column3: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

column2: USA itangaza ko abasirikare bayo 34 bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko mu gitero ca Irani
column3: Ubunyamabanga bwo kwivuna abansi bwa Amerika, Pentagone, bumenyesha ko abasirikare 34 b'ico gihugu bagize ibibazo vyo mu bwonko (TBI)  bivuye kuri ca gitero ca Irani ku kirindiro cazo muri Irak. Umuvugizi w'ubwo bunyamabanga avuga ko gushika ubu, abashika 17 aribo bakiriko baravurwa. Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yari yatangaje ko ata musirikare wa Amerika n'umwe yigeze agira ingorane muri ico gitero ca Irani co ku wa 08 z'uku kwa mbere, mu kwihora igandagurwa ry'umusirikare mukuru wa Irani. Bwana Trump akaba yavuze ivyo ashaka gusigura ingingo yafashe yo kudasubiza ico gitero. Hagati aho mu ndwi iheze, Pentagon yari yamenyesheje ko abasirikare 11 bariko bavurwa kubera ibibazo vyo mu mutwe bagize bivuye kuri ico gitero. Abajijwe uko kuvuguruzanya mu gihe yari mu nama yerekeye ubutunzi kw'isi mu Buswisi, Bwana Trump yishuye ati: "Narumvise ko hari abari bamenetse umutwe, n'ibintu ataco bivuze, ariko mvuga nti, kandi ndavyemeza, si ibintu bikomeye". "Si mfata ko ari ububabare bukomeye nk'ubwo nabonye". Pentagone ivuga ko ata musirikare n'umwe yapfuye muri ico gitero ca Irani c'igisasu ca misire ku kirindiro ca Ain al-Asad, kuko hafi bose bari mu buraro bwo mu kuzimu igihe ivyo bisasu vyaterwa. Ejo ku wa gatanu, umuvugizi w'ubunyamabanga bujejwe kwivuna abansi, Jonathan Hoffman, yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko abasirikare umunani mu bagize ibibazo batahukanywe muri Amerika kugira ngo babandanye bavurwa, mu gihe abandi icenda nabo batwawe mu Budagi. 16 bavuriwe muri Irak uwundi umwe nawe muri Koweit imbere y'uko abo bose 17 basubira ku bikorwa vyabo, k'uko abategetsi babivuga. Bwana Hoffman avuga ko umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Mark Esper atashotse aronka amakuru y'uko hoba hari abasirikare bari bagize ibibazo mu minsi yakurikiye ico gitero. Ishirahamwe ry'abakukuruke bahoze barwana mu ntambara za Irak na Afghanistani, riranegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona butashotse bumenyesha ko hari abasirikare bagize ibibazo. Paul Rieckhoff, uwatanguje iryo shirahamwe avuga ati: "ico ni ikintu gikomeye. Leta ya Amerika yategerezwa guha Abanyamerika amakuru ku vyerekeye ubuzima bw'abana babo. Nta kindi kintu gisumba ico". Igisirikare ca Amerika kimenyesha ko izo ngorane zikunda gushika mu burere bw'intambara. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abanyagihugu ba Irak ibihumbi n'ibihumbi barihaye amabarabara ku mugwa mukuru Baghdad biyamiriza abasirikare mvamakungu baharurwa mu 5000. Inama nshingamateka ya Irak iherutse gusaba abarwanyi mvamakungu bose - harimwo n'abanyamerika - kuva muri ico gihugu.

column2: Burundi: Abakozi b'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi bagabisha ko bagiye guhagarika akazi
column3: Sendika y'abakozi ba Brarudi, SYLITRAB, itangaza ko igiye guhagarika akazi inyuma y'iminsi itandatu kuva ejo ku wa kane, mu gihe ibibazo bashikirije umukuru w'iryo hinguriro ry'inzoga bitoba biratorerwa umuti, nk'uko biri mu rwandiko bamwandikiye. Dieudonné Nizigiyimana arongoye iyo sendika yabwiye BBC ko ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi ritwawe nabi cane, bakagiriza umukuru waryo ko aho gushira imbere ibiganiro ashima ahubwo gufatira ingingo abamukebura. Mu minsi iheze, Brarudi yaragirijwe ko ibinyobwa isigaye ikora vyataye akanovera, mu gihe hari ibinyobwa bikundwa mu Burundi vyigeze gukena. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, Dieudonné Nizigiyimana yagiriza umukuru w'iryo hinguriro amakosa atari make, ivyo navyo ngo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku bakozi no kuvyo risanzwe rikora. Mu makosa ashirwa imbere, Bwana Nizigiyimana avuga ko harimwo ko iryo hinguriro risigaye rirangwamwo ubusuma cane cane bukorwa n'abakozi b'abacangero (Sous-traitants), kugabanya imishahara y'abakozi, kwirukana abakozi,  gutanga akazi ku kimenyane n'ibindi. Avuga ko umukuru w'iryo hinguriro aterekwa ibiganiro asabwa n'abakozi kugira ngo bigire hamwe ingene ingorane zihanze Brarudi zotorerwa umuti, ahubwo ko aca yihutira gufatira ingingo bamwe mu babaserukira mu ntumbero yo kubatera ubwoba. Bwana Nizigiyimana ati: "Abakozi babicishije ku basanzwe barongoye sendika yabo barazishikirije umukoresha kugira ngo hagire ikintu cohinduka, ariko wewe ntiyashatse kubumviriza , ahubwo yaciye yigizayo abaserukira abakozi kugira ngo yibandanirize imigambi yiwe igayitse atacamira". BBC yagerageje kuvugana na Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru muri Brarudi kugira agire ico ashikirije kuri ivyo bivugwa na sendika y'abakozi bayo ariko akaba yamenyesheje ko ataco bafise babivugako. Hagati aho, uburongozi bw'iryo hinguriro bwasohoye itangazo inyuma y'urwo rwandiko rwa sendika y'abakozi baryo, aho buvuga ko bwubaba uburenganzira bw'abakozi bwo guhagarika akazi mu gihe cose amategeko azoba yakurikijwe. Abarongoye Brarudi bamenyesha ariko y'uko amasezerano bafitaniye n'abakozi bazoba bahagaritse akazi azoca ahagarikwa muri ico gihe batazoba bari ku kazi, kandi ko ata n'imishahara n'utundi turusho bahabwa n'akazi bazoronswa. Mu kwezi kw'icumi umwaka uheze, mushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, amahinguriro n'ingenzi yaragabishije Brarudi ko mu gihugu hari imyidogo yavuga ko ibinyobwa bihingurwa n'iryo hinguriro vyatakaje akanovera, anarikebura ko ryokwikubita agashi rigakora ibinyobwa bitonona amagara y'abavyihereza. Ku ruhande rwaryo, Brarudi yarahumurije abanyagihugu, aho yamenyesheje ko amashiramamwe HEINEKEN na Coca-Cola akorana naryo, yama akora ivyigwa kugira ngo arabe ko inzoga zihingurwa zikwije ibisabwa kandi ko n'ibikoresho vyayo bimeze neza.

column2: R﻿eta y'Uburundi iragabisha abatimbo bari muri Nyege Nyege
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw’Uburundi bujejwe Afrika y’Ubuseruko, Urwaruka, inkino n’imico kama "buriyamiriza ikoreshwa nabi ry’ingoma z’Uburundi" mw’isabukuru Nyege Nyege ririko ribera muri Uganda. Amasanamu y’abavuzi b’ingoma z’Uburundi bambaye umwambaro w’ibendera ry’Uburundi bariko baravuza ingomba muri iri sabukuru yarakwiragijwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro. Ubu bushikiranganji bushira ku rubuga rwa Twitter amasanamu yerekana abagore bariko batamba, bavuza n’ingoma z’Uburundi mu buryo butamenyerewe mu bijanye n’umurisho w’ingoma z’Uburundi. Isabukuru ry’indirimbo n'intambo, Nyege Nyege, ririko ribera mu gisagara ca Jinja mu buseruko bwa Kampala muri Uganda kuva ku wa 16 z’uku kw’icenda, inyuma y’aho reta y’iki gihugu itangiye uruhusha ko rishobora kuba habanje kuba impari. Isoko ryo muri ubwo bushikiranganji ryabwiye BBC ko umurwi w’aba batimbo bari muri iyi sabukuru batazwi na reta y’Uburundi kandi ko atari yo yabarungitse. Buciye ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter, ubu bushikiranganji bumenyesha ko budashobora “kwihanganira umuntu uwo ari we wese acafuza imico n’akaranga vy’Uburundi”. Bwandika buti: “Uburundi burazi ko ingoma z’Uburundi ziriko zirakoreshwa nabi mw’isabukuru Nyege Nyene 2022 muri Uganda”. Ingoma z’Uburundi zanditswe mu murage ndangakaranga mw’ishirahamwe UNESCO kuva mu 2014, kandi ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko kuzikoresha binyuranyije n’amategeko bihanwa. Si bwo bwa mbere reta y’Uburundi yiyamiriza abavuza ingoma z’Uburundi reta itabitangiye uruhusha, cane cane abarundi b’impunzi ziba hanze. Mu 2019, reta y’Uburundi yamenyesheje ko hari abantu bashatse kwiba no kwiyitirira umurisho w’ingoma z’Uburundi mw’ihiganwa "East Africa's Got Talent" ryariko ribera i Nairobi. Ni inyuma y’aho umurwi witwa Himbaza Club wari ugizwe ahanini n’abarundi b’impunzi baba mu Rwanda witabiriye iri higanwa wambaye impuzu reta y’Uburundi ivuga ko zitemewe mu kuvuza ingoma.

column2: Uganda - Covid19: Ibiro vy'inama nshingamateka vyugawe indwi zibiri kugira bipompwe
column3: Inama nshingamateka ya Uganda yahagaritse ibikorwa vyayo mu kiringo c'indwi zibiri mu gihe ico gihugu gihanganye n'umupfunda ugira kabiri ca Covid - 19. Mu ndwi iheze, abategetsi bavuze ko abantu barenga 100 bo mu nama nshingamateka basanze bafise coronavirus. Itangazo rivuga ko ingingo yo kwugara iyo nyubakwa izoja mu ngiro kuva kw'itariki 28 ukwezi kwa gatandatu gushika igenekerezo rya 11 z'ukwezi kwa 11 kugira habe ibikorwa vyo gupompa iyo nyubakwa. Umuyobozi ajejwe igikorwa co kumenyesha amakuru mu nama nshingamateka, Chris Obore, yavuze ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gukumira ko ico kibanza ciganzamwo ico kiza. Urwo rwego rwaratunganije ibikorwa bikomakomeye bine kuva mu kwezi kwa gatanu, harimwo gutora mahera reta ikoresha, itorwa ry'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka hamwe n'ijambo ryashikirijwe igihugu cose. Uganda ihanganye n'igitero kigira kabiri ca Coronavirus, catumye prezida Yoweri Museveni afata ingingo zo gusubira kwiyugarana mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Hagize imisi higaragaza igitigiri kinini c'abandura iyo ngwara mu tundi duce twa Afrika y'ubuseruko. Mu ntara ya Kisumu iri mu burengero bwa Kenya, ibice 23 kw'ijana vy'abapimwe mu ndwi iheze basanze baranduye iyo ngwara.

column2: UK: umushikiranganji yasavye imbabazi inyuma y'amashusho amwerekana asomana n'umufasha
column3: Imiryango yaburiye ababo muri ca kiza karanda Covid-19 iragabisha ko umushikiranganji Matt Hancock yubahutse agasomana n'umufasha mu biro iwe bishobora gutesha urubwa reta, bigatuma abantu bahonyanga amabwirizwa ajanye no kutegerana mu ntumbero yo kurwanya iki kiza. Vyabaye ngombwa ko uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu asaba imbabazi inyuma y'aho amashusho avugwa ko yafashwe ku wa 06 z'ukwa gatanu amwerekaniye ariko asomana na Gina Coladangelo. Ishirahamwe riharanira agateka k'ababuze ababo bahitanywe na Covid-19 (Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice) rivuga ko mu gihe vyonanirana ko Hancock yirukanwa bishobora kugira ingaruka mbi nk'izabaye kuri Cummings, maze abantu bagahonyanga amabwirizwa. Umushikiranganji wa mbere wewe abona ko ikibazo carangiye. Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere avuga ko Boris Johnson yemeye imbabazi zasabwe na Hancock, kandi ko afitiye icizere uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu. Ishirahamwe Covid-19 Bereaved Families for Justice ryandikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson rimusaba kwirukana Hancock mu gihe atotanga imihoho, rikibaza mbere nimba uyu mushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu akibereye kuba umutegetsi yofata ingingo zijanye na Covid. Rivka Gottlieb wo mw'iryo shirahamwe yavugiye mu kiganiro The World Tonight ca BBC Radio 4 ati: "Mu gihe yoramuka atangaje izindi ngingo za guma mu rugo canke ayandi mabwirizwa, ubona hari n'umwe yokwumvira umuntu na we ubwiwe adakurikiza amabwirizwa"? "Ivyo twese vyaratubabaje. Kuri Cummings ntacabaye, yibandanirije akazi kiwe, ehe raba ivyabaye, abantu baciye batangura guhonyanga amabwirizwa. Mfise ubwoba ko ivyo ari vyo bishobora kuba". ingingo yo kutegerana ku kazi si itegeko, ariko reta isaba ko abantu batandukana imetero zibiri aho bishoboka - canke imetero imwe, hampande y'izindi ngingo zo kugabanya ikwirakwira, nk'izijanye n'ukwambara udupfukamunwa. Mu kwa gatatu kw'uno mwaka, umuhanuzi mukuru w'umushikiranganji wa mbere ico gihe, Dominic Cummings, yaniramuye afata urugendo rw'ibirometero birenga 418 ava i Londres aja mu karere ka  Durham kandi igihugu cari ingingo za guma mu rugo. Ico gihe reta yari yafashe amategeko akomeye yo kugabanya uruja n'uruza Mu nyuma we n'umugore wiwe bagiye kwandura Covid. Abanyagihugu bariyamirije Cummings, ariko umushikiranganji wa mbere yaramuryamaryamyeko, mu kuvuga ko ata "kundi yari kugira" atari ugufata urwo rugendo. Prof Stephen Reicher, wo kuri kaminuza yigisha ibijanye n'inyifato, University of St Andrews' School of Psychology, avuga ko icatumye inyifato ya Cummings ibonwa "nabi cane" si ukubera vyakozwe n'umuhanuzi wa reta, ariko ni ukubera ingene Boris Johnson yamuvugiye. Prof Reicher yabwiye Newsnight ca BBC Two ati: "Ugusamara kw'umuntu umwe kwatumye abantu bibaza ibibazo ku ntwaro, aho babona ko hari itegeko rituraba twebwe irindi rikaraba abandi". "Mu gihe igihugu gihanzwe n'ibibazo bikomeye, dukeneye reta twizeye, kandi dukeneye reta dushobora kwumviriza". Abashikiranganji bandi bari muri reta bashigikiye uyu mugenzi wabo ajejwe amagara y'abantu. Ariko Sir John Curtice yigisha ibijanye na poritike kuri kaminuza ya Strathclyde yabwiye BBC BBC Radio 4 ivyo ari vyo vyose umushikiranganji Hancock ata mahoro azoronka. Ikinyamakuru The Sun, ari naco ca mbere cerekanye aya masanamu ya Hancock n'umupfasoni Coladangelo kikayashikana mu biro bijejwe amagara y'abantu, yerekana n'ayandi mashusho y'aba bantu babiri ingene bavyifatamwo. Iki kinyamakuru kivuga ko iyi sanamu iheruka yerekana Hancock n'umupfasoni Coladangelo bari mu nzu y'uburiro ku wa 23 z'ukwa gatanu - haciye imisi 17 herekanywe amashusho y'ingene bariko basomana.

column2: Umunyamuziki Neil Young, yitwariye Trump kubera akoresha umuziki wiwe atabimusavye
column3: Neil Young yitwariye abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Donald Trump ariko yiyamamariza ikindi kiringo kubera bakoresha umuziki wiwe batamusavye uruhusha. Uyo muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa rock avuga ko uyo mukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika yahonyanze amategeko akingira umuziki mu gukoresha indirimbo ziwe mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Uyo mucuraranzi akomoka muri Canada yanse ko babandanya bakoresha indirimbo ziwe Rockin' in the Free World na Devil's Sidewalk kubera ico yise "isekeza ry'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Abajejwe imyiyamamazo ya Trump ntaco barashikiriza kuri ivyo birego. Young yavuze ko yitwariye Bwana Trump amwagiriza ko yakoresheje umuziki wiwe kuva mu 2015, ariko akinumya "n'ibigirankana". Uyo mucuraranzi, ubu afise ubwenegihugu bwa Amerika inyuma yo kuba muri iki gihugu imyaka iharurwa muri za mirongo, arasaba indishi y'amadolari agera ku 150.000 aho hose bagiye bakoresha umuziki wiwe. Aha harimwo ikoraniro rya Trump i Tulsa mu ntara ya Oklahoma mu kwa gatandatu, hamwe n'urugendo Trump yagize kuri Mount Rushmore mu kw'indwi. indirimbo ijanye n'icivugo Muri ino dosiye bashize ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'uyu mucuraranzi, abunganizi ba Young banditse bati: "Uru rubanza ntirufise intumbero yo gusuzugura uburenganzira n'ivyiyumviro vy'abanyagihugu ba Amerika kuko ni uburenganzira bwabo gushigikira umukandida bipfuza". "Hagati aho, nyene kwitwara ntashobora kwemerera ko umuziki wiwe ukoreshwa nk'  'indirimbo y'icivugo' mu ntumbero yo kubiba amacakubiri, 'ingendo y'ubujuju n'urwanko, ibintu bitari mu mico y'Abanyamerika". Uyu mucuraranzi w'imyaka 74 siwe munyamuziki wenyene ashavuriye Perezida Trump kubera akoresha indirimbo ziwe. Mu kwezi guheze, umurwi The Rolling Stones wo mu Bwongereza waragabishije Perezida Trump ko ashobora kwitwarirwa mu butungane mu gihe yobandanya akoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo yiwe. Abanyamuziki Mick Jagger na Keith Richards baragiye hamwe n'abandi banyamuziki barimwo Aerosmith na Elton John mu gutera igikumu ku rwandiko bandikiye abanyapolitike babahamagarira kubanza gusaba uruhusha imbere y'uko bakoresha imiziki yabo mu myiyamamazo n'amakoraniro ya politike. Ishirahamwe rishinzwe guharanira uburenganzira muvyo umuziki, BMI, rivuga ko impusha zitangwa ku bijanye n'ikoreshwa ry'umuziki mu biteramo n'ayandi makoraniro, zitaraba amakoraniro ya politike. Abakora imyiyamamazo ya politike bategerezwa gusaba uruhusha rusabwa n'amashirahamwe ya politike (Political Entities Licence) rubaha uburenganzira bwo gukoresha indirimbo zishika imiliyoni 15. Rero abajejwe imyiyamamazo ba Trump urwo ruhusha ntarwo bafise. Ariko abacuraranzi bafise uburenganzira bwo gukura indirimbo zabo kuri urwo rutonde. The Rolling Stones barabikoze, ariko Young ntatomora nimba nawe yoba yarabikoze.

column2: 'Igituririre ni cinshi muri Afrika y'Epfo' - Akanama ka Zondo
column3: Inyuma y'icegeranyo gishira ahagaragara ubusuma bw'ama miriyaridi y'amadolari mu kigega ca reta ya Afrika y'epfo ku ntwaro y'uwamubanjirije, prezida Cyril Ramaphosa yariyemeje ko "ivyo bitazosubira kuba ." Ariko abanye Afrika y'epfo ntibemera ko hari icigwa bakuyemwo. Barababajwe no kuba amahera yibwe yari gukoreshwa mu bisata vy'amagara y'abantu n'uburezi muri ico gihugu. Ayo matohoza akomeye ku giturire co ku ntwaro ya prezida Jacob Zuma yerekanye ingene nk'ibisata vyose vya reta vyanigiwe mu menshi, birononwa n'abategetsi ba ANC  (African National Congress), uri ku butegetsi kuva mu 1994 harangiye intwaro y'abazungu bari ku rushi. Iki cegeranyo cagiriza ahanini uwo mugambwe. Prezida Ramaphosa ubwiwe yabwiwe n'ako kanama karongowe n'umucamanza, ko atakoze ibikwiye mu gukumira ubwo busuma igihe yari icegera ca Zuma. Impapuro zirenga 5.000, akanama Zondo - kiswe izina ry'umucamanza wo mu rwego rwo hejuru akarongoye - karerekana ido n'ido ry'ingene ubutunzi bwa reta bwibwe. Kiranerekana ingene abagwizatunga bavukana bo mu muryango wa Gupta, bagerageje kugira uruhara mu ngingo za politike n'ubutunzi mu ntumbero yiswe  "kwigarurira reta". Zuma yirukanywe ku butegetsi mu 2018 yagirizwa igiturire caguma congerekana, hanyuma Ramaphosa aca afata ubutegetsi yiyemeje guhanagura ivyo vyose. Igice ca nyuma c'ico cegeranyo c'akanama ka Zondo cashikirijwe ku musi wa gatatu. Prezida akaba yavuze ko ivyo babonye ari "iceyi kuri demokrasi yacu kandi vyahonyanze uburenganzira bw'abanye Afrika y'Epfo bose." Ariko bimwe muvyo ico cegeranyo casozerereyeko ni gusigira ibibazo prezida ahari ubu ategerezwa kwishura vyerekeye impamvu vyabaye arorera. Ico cegeranyo kigira kiti: "Hari inkuru nyinshi zifise ifatiro zamenyekanye (...) zashobora kumutuma agira amatohoza akanafata n'ingingo kuri bimwe bivugwa bikomeye. "Nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, yari afise ububasha bwo kubikora." Mu ntango ayo matohoza yategerezwa kuba mu misi 180, ariko ukurengukisha abantu vyatwaye imisi 400 aho ivyabona 300 vyabajijwe. Ico gikorwa cose catwaye imyaka ine. Ivyemezo vyarerekanye ingene abategetsi ba ANC, harimwo abashikiranganji b'ubu n'abakera bagiye canke bafashije mu busuma  vyatumye igihugu gihomba amahera menshi. Muri ivyo harimwo kubuza gukora igisata kijejwe gutoza amakori mu gihugu, gupfukama mu nda ishirahamwe ry'indege South Africa Airways, kwiba amahera mu gisata kijejwe ingendo za gariyamoshi muri ico gihugu no mu kwivanga mu biraba ikinyamakuru ca reta, SABC. Igisata kijejwe iperereza na co nyene caragabanuwe inguvu mu kugena abakozi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru babujije ko haba amatohoza babisabwe na Zuma n'abandi bantu bifatwa ko bamwegereye.

column2: Kobe Bryant: Abakunzi biwe baracarira...
column3: Abakunzi b'umuhisi Kobe Ryant babandanije kumukeza no kwerekana akabaro batewe n'urupfu rwiwe rwashitse ku wa Mungu itariki 26/01/2020. Bwana Bryant yahitanywe n'impanuka y'indege ya kajugujugu ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe n'abandi bantu indwi.

column2: Serum Institute: Umuriro wishe batanu mw'ihinguriro rya mbere rinini ry'inkingo
column3: Abantu batanu bapfuye bahitanywe n'umuriro wadutse mw'ihinguriro rya mbere rinini ry'incanco mu burengero bw'Ubuhindi. Uwo muriro wahereye mu nyubakwa yari ikiriko iruduzwa mu kigo ca Serum Institute co mu Buhindi ahitwa Pune  ku muhingamo w'uyu wa kane. Amasanamu yerekanye umwotsi mwinshi uduga uva muri imwe mu  nyubakwa z'ico kigo gikwiye irya n'ino. Ico kigo ariko cavuze ko  ata ngaruka ivvaye bizogira ku bikorwa vyo gukora incanco. Icatumye uwo muriro waduka ntikiramenyekana. Uwo muriro bahavuye bashobora kuwuzimya ariko umukuru w'igisagara yemeje ko abantu batanu bapfuye. Umukuru w'ico kigo Adar Poonawalla yavuze ko ata ngaruka uwo muriro uzogira ku bikorwa vyo gukora urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca ruzwi aho mu Buhindi nka Covishield ''kubera inyubakwa nyinshi zo gukoreramwo urwo rucanco nategekanije habaye nk'ibi vyashitse.'' Covishield ni rumwe mu nkingo zemewe na leta y'Ubuhindi batara abantu mu kubakingira kwandura umugera utera indwara ya Covid-19, umugambi wo gucanca mu Buhindi watanguye ku ndwi iheze kandi niwo wa mbere muni kw'isi. Ico gihugu gitegekanya guha incanco abantu miliyoni 300 bitarenzae mu ntango z'ukwezi kw'umunani. Hari n'ibindi bihugu vy'uburyo buke canke ububayabaye navyo birindiriye urucanco  rwa Oxford-Zeneca rukorwa n'ico kigo ca Serum Institute co mu Buhindi. Ubuhindi buza ubugira kabiri kw'isi mu bihugu birimwo abantu benshi banduye corona inyuma ya Reta zunze ubumwe za Amerika. Kuva uwo mugera utanguye kuvugwa muri ico gijhugu, kimaze kwemeza abanduye barenga miliyoni 10.6 n'abamaze gupfa hafi 153.000, ku biharuro bitangwa na Kaminuza ya Hopkins.

column2: Burundi - Miriyaridi 7 ziranyuruzwa buri mwaka mu matagisi y'amasoko ya Bujumbura
column3: Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi agabisha abatoza amakori (taxes) mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ko bagiye gufatirwa ingingo hamwe bobandanya kuba intambamyi mu kwinjiza mu kigega c'igisigara amafaranga yose ategegerezwa gutozwa mu masoko. Ingingo ya mbere ija imaze gufatwa. Inyuma y'inama bagirishijwe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura na General Gervais Ndirakobuca, hafashwe ingingo yo guhagarika abari bajejwe gutoza amakori n'ama taxe mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura. General Ndirakobuca yavuze ko  ubushikiranganji bwo nyene bwitoreje ayo mafaranga buca burenzako miriyoni 121 ku ndwi, ''kandi aba commaissaires b'amasoko ntibigeze batworohereza''. Ati: "Mwonsigurira gute ko amafaranga atozwa muri mairie mu ndwi imwe, turavye n'inzitizi twahuye nazo, ubushikiranganji buriko buratoza burenzako miriyoni 121? Ntimwumva ko igihugu capfuye?" Yavuze ko ashobora no gushika miriyoni 150 ku ndwi, bisiguye ku mwaka ko arenga  miriyaridi ndwi (ashika miliyoni $3.5). Mu ma komine yo hagati mu gihugu ho ,  umushikiranganji Ndirakubuca yavuze ko basanze muri rusangi reta itakaza miriyaridi 40  ku mwaka. Yabwiye ibitavye iyo nama harimwo abajejwe gutoza amakori mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ati: "Inyuma y'iyi nama, uwusubira kuvyivangamwo, ibimushikira ntagire ngo n'ubushikiranganji…..ntavuge ngo reta mvyeyi itwara abantu ku Musaga'', imvugo iciye hirya yo kubagabisha ko bazofatwa, bagapfungwa-ku  Musaga niho hari ibohero rikuru rya Mpimba. Reta y'Uburundi isanzwe ishigikira imirimo y'amakomine ku mafaranga angana na miriyaridi 63  ku mwaka. Umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca  avuga ko hamwe ama komine yokwinjiza amafaranga yose ategerezwa kuboneka, ayo reta itanga yoheza agakora ibindi. Uburundi buri mu bihugu vya mbere kw'isi birangwamwo ibiturire cane, hakurikijwe icegeranyo c'uwu mwaka ca Transparency International, ikigo gikurikirana ibijanye n'ibiturire mu bihugu vyose vyo kw'isi.

column2: Iron Biby: umunya Burkina Faso yanditse amateka kw’isi mu guterura ikibuye kiremereye yakiriwe nk’intwari
column3: Kuri uyu wa mbere, umunonotsi wa Burkina Faso yanditse amateka kw'isi yose mw'ihiganwa ryo guterura ibibuye biremereye ku wa gatandatu yakiriwe nk'intwari ku kibuga c'indege ca Ouagadougou, nk'uko iradiyo y'abafaransa RFI ibitangaza. Sheick Ahmed al-Hassan Sanou - azwi kw'izina rya Iron Biby - yiremetse ikibuye  gipima ibiro 229 (229Kg) yikoreye ku mutwe mu rukino rwa nyuma wa Giants Live World Tour Final muri Ecosse/Scotland, akaba yarushije uw'imbere y'aho yari yiremetse icapima 228kg. N'akamwemwe kenshi, Iron Biby igikombe ciwe yagituye Burkina Faso, akaba asubirwamwo na RFI avuga ko intsinzi yiwe itanga ubutumwa bw'umwizero. Ati: "Ni ikintu gikomeye kuri jewe, kubera namye ngerageza kwandika aya mateka kuva mu 2018". RFI isubiramwo amajambo asa n'aya nyene y'umushikiranganji w'inkino Dominique Nana. "Ibendera rya Burkina Faso ryatsinze."

column2: Intambara ya Ukraine: Ni bande bari mu karwi gatoya ka Putin karongoye intambara?
column3: Vladimir Putin aboneka umengo arirebanga, mu gufata ingingo yo gushora Uburusiya mu ntambara ya gisirikare ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bw'igihugu ciwe butembagara. Ntiyari bwigere aboneka yirebanga nk'incuro zibiri ziherutse, aho yabonetse ari kumwe n'akarwi kiwe, yicaranye n'abahanuzi biwe ariko hagati ya we na bo hari intambwe nini. Nk'umugaba w'ingabo, niwe abazwa iki gitero, ariko yamye yiheka cane ku bantu bamwegereye kandi bamuyoboka cane, abenshi muri bo bakaba batanguriye amabanga yabo mu nzego z'Uburusiya zijejwe umutekano. ikibazo ni ukumenya ni nde amuhanura muri kino gihe kitoroshe c'ubutegetsi bwiwe. Nimba hariho n'umwe, ni uyu mwizigirwa wiwe w'igihe kirekire cane Sergei Shoigu, ari we yama ariko arasubiramwo amajambo ya Putin yerekana intumbero yiwe yo gusambura igisirikare ca Ukraine be no gukingira Uburusiya abansi babwo bo mu bihugu vy'Uburengero. Uyu ni umuntu yama ajana na Perezida iyo agiye guhiga canke kuroba mu ntara ya  Sibérie iri mu buseruko bw'igihugu, muri kahise akaba yaboneka ko yari we ashobora kumusubirira. Vera Mironova,  umuhinga mu bijanye n'intambara za gisirikare , ati: "Shoigu yategerezwa gufata Kyiv; ni umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi kandi yategerezwa gutsinda intambara". Azwi ko ari we yafashe ka karere ka Crimea mu 2014. Niwe kandi yari arongoye ishami rijejwe igendereza rya gisirikare, GRU, ryagirizwa ibitero bibiri vy'isumu  - ica mbere co mu 2018 cahitanye umuntu i Salisbury mu Bwongereza, ikindi cahatswe kugandagura wa munyaporitike arwanya ubutegetsi bwa Putin, Alexei Navalny, muri Sibérie mu 2020. Umwanditsi w'umurusiya Andrei Soldatov akongera akaba n'umuhinga mu bijanye n'umutekano yemeza ko uyu mushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi ari we muntu wa mbere avuga rikijana kwa Perezida Putin. "Shoigu uretse ko ari we ajejwe igisirikare, ni nawe ajejwe inyigisho (ideology) ku rugero rutari ruto - hanyuma inyigisho mu Burusiya zishingiye cane cane kuri kahise, niwe ategura vyose". Nk'umukuru w'ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare, yari afise igikorwa co gutera Ukraine kandi akarangiza intambara ningoga na ningoga, aha rero aboneka ko atararangura igikorwa ciwe. Afise uruhara rudasanzwe mu bikorwa vya gisirikare vya  Vladimir Putin kuva igihe yari arongoye ingabo muri ya ntambara ya Chechnya mu 1999, akaba mbere yari imbere mu gutegura iyi ntambara ya Ukraine, anahagarikiye imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri Biélorussie/Belarus mu kwezi guheze. Umuhinga w'umurusiya Mark Galeotti avuga ko, nk'umuntu "adatwenga kandi w'iminkanyari", Jenerali Gerasimov yagize uruhara rudasanzwe mu ntambara yo kwigarurira akarere ka  Crimea. Hari amakuru avuga ko ubu yoba ashirwa ku ruhande kubera uguhigimanga kwiwe mu gutanguza igitero ca Ukraine be n'amakuru avuga ko igisirikare gifise intege nke. Ariko Andrei Soldatov abona ko ibi ari ivyipfuzo vya bamwe. Ati: "Putin ntashobora kugenzura hose n'ingabo zose, rero iki ni co gikorwa ciwe". Avuga kandi ko n'aho akunda kwambara umwambaro wa gisirikare, nta nyigisho za gisirikare afise ari co gituma ari ngombwa kuri we kwiheka ku bahinga. Ben Noble, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Londres yigisha poritike y'Uburusiya, avuga ati: "Nikolai Patrushev ni we muntu wa mbere akokeza intambara, kubera yiyumvira ko ibihugu vy'Uburengero bimaze imyaka n'imyaka bihiga Uburusiya". Ni umwe mubayoboke batatu ba Putin bakoranye na we kuva mu myaka ya 1970 i St Petersburg, igihe iki gisagara kigira kabiri c'Uburusiya cari kicitwa Leningrad. Abandi babiri basigaye ni Alexander Bortnikov arongoye igisata c'umutekano hamwe na Sergei Naryshkin arongoye igisata kijejwe igendereza ryo hanze. Abari muri aka karwi k'abegereye Putin bose bazwi kw'izina rya siloviki, ariko aba batatu nibo bari hafi yiwe gusumba. Ni bake cane bafise ijambo rikomeye ku mukuru w'igihugu nka Nikolai Patrushev. Uretse ko yakoranye na we muri KGB mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gikomunista, niwe yamusubiriye mu rwego rwayisubiriye, ari rwo FSB, kuva mu 1999 gushika 2008. Mu mubonano w'inama nkuru ijejwe umutekano w'Uburusiya yabaye hasigaye imisi itatu ngo igitero gitangura, Patrushev yageze kure mu kuvuga ko "intumbero nyayo" ya Amerika ari ugusambura Uburusiya. Abakurikiranira hagufi Kremlin bavuga ko umukuru w'igihugu yemera inkuru ahawe n'inzego z'umutekano gusumba izindi zose, Alexander Bortnikov afatwa nk'umwe mu bantu begereye cane Perezida Putin. Nk'uwundi yakoranye na we muri KGB i Leningrad, niwe yahawe uburongozi bw'urwego FSB asubiriye Nikolai Patrushev. Aba bompi bazwi ko begereye cane umukuru w'igihugu, ariko nk'uko Ben Noble abivuga: "Ntitwovuga ko ari bo bonyene bafise ibintu mu minwe kandi ko ari bo bonyene bafata ingingo zose". Nk'uwungirije aba batatu bahoze ari abakozi ba Leningrad, Sergei Naryshkin ari kumwe n'umukuru w'igihugu mu gihe kitari gito amaze arangura amabanga yiwe. Arongoye urwego rujejwe igendereza ryo hanze (SVR). Sergei Naryshkin yamaze igihe kirekire ari kumwe na Putin, i St Petersburg mu myaka ya 1990, hanyuma no mu biro kwa Putin mu 2004 gushika n'aho aba umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Mu mwaka uheze yahaye ikiganiro umunyamakuru wa BBC i Moscou Steve Rosenberg aho yahakanye ko Uburusiya ata bitero ku nyabwonko n'ibindi vy'isumu bwakoze, kandi ko butivanga mu matora y'ibindi bihugu. Imyaka 18 yose ayimaze ari we mutegetsi mukuru ajejwe imigenderanire y'Uburusiya, ashikiriza aho Uburusiya buhagaze n'aho afatwa nk'uko ata ruhara runini afise mu gufata ingingo. Sergei Lavrov w'imyaka 71 , ni ikindi cemezo gikomeye c'uko Vladimir Putin yiheka cane ku bantu bakomeye bakoranye muri kahise. Ni umuhinga afise amayeri menshi: mu kwezi guheze yarashatse kumaramaza umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss mu kumubaza ivyo azi ku ndondagihugu y'Uburusiya, hanyuma mu mwaka uheze naho ashaka kumaramaza umukuru w'igisata kijejwe imigenderanire y'umuryango w'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Josep Borrell. Ariko, yamye ashirwa kure ku kintu cose cerekeye Ukraine, kandi n'aho azwi ko ari umuntu agumye, yabandanije ashira imbere ibiganiro ku kibazo ca Ukraine, bituma Perezida Putin amwihoza. Bisa n'uko ataco vyamubwiye igihe abenshi mu bagize Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu biyonjorora igihe yariko agerageza gusigura ingingo y'Uburusiya yo gutera Ukraine, hari mw'ijambo yariko ashikiriza hifashishijwe ubuhinga bwa videwo. Ari mu bagore bake cane begereye Putin, akaba ari we yahagarariye amatora mu nama nkenguzamateka yo kwemeza irungikwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya hanze, ivyaciriye inzira igitero kuri Ukraine. Valentina Matviyenko ni uwundi muntu ayoboka cane Putin yakoranye na we i St Petersburg akaba na we nyene yaranagize uruhara runini mu kwigarurira Crimea mu 2014. Ariko ntafatwa ko ari mu bantu bari imbere mu gufata ingingo. Nk'uko bimeze ku bandi bagize inama y'igihugu ijejwe umutekano, uruhara rwiwe ni urwo kwerekana ko ingingo ifashwe yaciye mu mwumvikano n'aho biba biboneka ko bisa nk'aho umukuru w'igihugu aba yamaze gufata ingingo. Nk'uwahoze ari we amucungereye ubuzima, ni we arongoye igisata ca gisirikare kijejwe umutekano w'igihugu kizwi nka, Rosgvardia,  cashinzwe na Perezida Putin nk'igisirikare ciwe bwite, haraciye imyaka itandatu gusa. Mu kurondera abajejwe umutekano biwe bwite, yashatse ko aronka abamuyoboka koko, Viktor Zolotov akaba yarongereje igitigiri cabo gushika ku 400.000. Vera Mironova yemeza ko integuro ya mbere y'Uburusiya kwari ugufata ubutegetsi bwa Ukraine mu misi mike cane, hanyuma bimaze kugaragara co igisirikare cariko kirananirwa, izi ngabo nizo zaciye zifata ibintu mu minwe. Ingorane gusa ni uko umukuru w'iki gisata ata nyigisho za gisirikare afise, kandi kubera ingabo ziwe ata bifaru zifise zirakunzwe guterwa bikomeye. Ni abahe bantu bandi bumvirizwa na Putin? Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mikhail Mishustin afise igikorwa kitoroshe co kunagura ubutunzi bw'igihugu ariko nta jambo rinini afise ku ntambara. umukuru w'igisagara ca Moscou Sergei Sobyanin hamwe n'umukuru w'igiko c'igihugu gicukura igitoro Rosneft, Igor Sechin, nabo nyene ni abantu begereye umukuru w'igihugum, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuhinga mu vya poritike Yevgeny Minchenko. Abatunzi ruhebwa babiri bavukana  Boris na Arkady Rotenberg, abantu bakuranye n'umukuru w'igihugu kuva mu bwana, ni abantu bamye ari abizigirwa kuri we. Mu 2020, ikinyamakuru Forbes cavuze ko ari wo muryango utunze gusumba iyindi yose mu gihugu cose c'Uburusiya.

column2: Espérance Mukashema uzwi kuri Radio Ubumwe yapfuye azize uburwayi mu Buholande
column3: Umupfasoni Espérance Mukashema asanzwe azwi mu batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda yapfuye azize indwara aho yari yarahungiye mu Buholande. Uyu mupfasoni ari mu barokotse Jenoside yo mu Rwanda yari umwe mu basaba ko Abanyarwanda bose bumva ko bakozweko n'iyo Jenoside. Espérance Mukashema n'umugabo wiwe bompi bari abatutsi. Umugabo wiwe wa mbere yishwe n'abahutu b'intagondwa, avuga ko umuhungu wiwe nawe yishwe n'abasirikare ba FPR/RPF b'ico gihe. Mukashema asize yanditse agatabo yise "Bishe Umumalayika", karimwo igishingantahe c'ivyabaye muri ubwo bwicanyi bw'agahomerabunwa mu mwaka wa 1994 mu Rwanda. Muri ako gatabo, avuga ingene imfura yiwe yari ifise imyaka umunani yishwe n'abasirikare avuga ko bari aba FPR. Ati: "Bishe umumalayika, ni ukuvuga ngo bishe umwana yari ataramenya ubwenge, wicaye ku bibero vya Musenyeri Gasabwoya, abasirikare b'inkotanyi bari bayobowe na Fred Ibingira, baraza bamurasa mu mugongo, acikamo kabiri". "Kuba umumalayika rero, ntabwo yabonye ko ari abagizi ba nabi, ntabwo yari azi ivy'ari vyo. Ni ukwica umuntu utabarwanya, utazi ikibi n'iciza, ari umwana mutoyi". Umupfasoni Mukashema yasaba Abanyarwanda kwiyubaka, bakirinda inzika n'inzangano. Avuga mu gihe co kwibuka umwana wiwe, yagize ati: "Ibibazo vyabaye iwacu vyabaye kuri buri Munyarwanda wese, Umunyarwanda wese afite ibikomere, yarakomeretse, Umunyarwanda wese yarababaye. "Icabivura ni uko twese twafatana mu mugongo, tukabona ko ikibazo atari icumwe, ariko ko ari ica twese nk'Abanyarwanda". Mukashema yumvikanaga anenga ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda kuri radio ikorera ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi yitwa Ubumwe. Yagiye ifatwa ko ari iy'urunani MRCD-Ubumwe rw'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi mu Rwanda yose ikorera mu mahanga, ruvugwa mu rubanza rwa Paul Rusesabagina n'abandi bantu 20 rubandanya mu Rwanda.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Bellingham, Fofana, Dembele, Alaba, Mbappe, Neymar
column3: Chelsea iripfuza kugura umukinyi wo hagati umwongereza Jude Bellingham w'imyaka 17 akina muri Borussia Dortmund iyi nayo ikaba imushakako imiriyoni zirenga 138 z'amadorari ya Amerika. (Eurosport) Manchester United iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Leicester City, umufaransa Wesley Fofana w'imyaka 20. (Foot Mercato - in French) Liverpool iripfuza kugura umukinyi w'imbere wa Barcelona  umufaransa Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka 23 kugira asubirire umunya Senegal Sadio Mane w'imyaka 29. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Arsenal iripfuza umukinyi w'imbere wa  Inter Milan  umunya Uruguay Martin Satriano w'imyaka 20, akaba kandi ariko aronderwa na  Chelsea hamwe na Manchester City. (Mail) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayern Munich umunya Autriche David Alaba w'imyaka 28 ashobora kuja gukinira Real Madrid mu ci riza ataco irinze gutanga, ariko uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ntaco wipfuza gutangaza imbere y'uko ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka rirangira. (Marca) Manchester City iriteguye kugiriranira ayandi masezerano n'umukinyi Phil Foden, umwongereza w'imyaka 20 akina hagati, amasezerano azotuma ahembwa ibihumbi birenga 138 vy'amadorari ya Amerika ku ndwi. (Mirror) Tottenham iripfuza umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Barcelona umunya Bresil Emerson w'imyaka 22 ubu asanzwe akina muri Real Betis, aho yatijijwe. (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Paris St-Germain Mauricio Pochettino arizeye ko abakinyi Neymar, umunya Bresil w'imyaka 29, hamwe na  Kylian Mbappe, umufaransa w'imyaka 22, bazoguma muri uyo murwi.  (Cadena SER - in Spanish) Real Madrid irashaka kugurisha mu ci riza umukinyi w'imbere Gareth Bale w'imyaka 31 akomoka muri Pays de Galles (Wales), ubu akaba akina muri Tottenham, iyo yatijijwe, hamwe n'umufaransa akina inyuma Raphael Varane, w'imyaka 27, kugira ngo ishobore kuronka amafaranga yo kugura Mbappe hamwe n'umusatirizi Erling Braut Haaland, umunya Norvege w'imyaka 20 akina muri  Borussia Dortmund. (Marca) Umunya  Uruguay Lucas Torreira w'imyaka  25 akina muri Arsenal, ariko ubu akaba akina muri Atletico Madrid iyo yatijijwe, avuga ko yipfuza kuja gukina muri Boca Juniors ku ntizo. (Perfil Bulos) Umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta avuga ko yizeye neza ko umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Argentina Lionel Messi ubu afise 33 yipfuza kuguma muri uyo murwi.  (Deportes Cuatro - in Spanish) West Ham ifise amahirwe menshi yo kugura umusatirizi wa Celtic umufaransa Odsonne Edouard w'imyaka 23 mu gihe hari ibihuha ko Leicester nayo nyene yoba iriko iramwiyumvirako. (Football Insider) Umukinyi w'imbere wa Eintracht Frankfurt Andre Silva w'imyaka 25 asanzwe ariko aronderwa na Manchester United hamwe na Atletico Madrid, nta gice kiri mu masezerano yiwe kimuha uburenganzira bwo kugenda.  (Goal) Barcelona nayo nyene yariko irondera Silva ariko yafashe ingingo yo kuvyihoza.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Liverpool yumva ko idashaka guhindura aho ihagaze mu biganiro irimwo n'umukinyi wo hagati Georginio Wijnaldum, umunya  Hollande w'imyaka 30, vyumvikana ko ashobora kugenda mu mpera z'iri higanwa atarinze kugurwa.  (Liverpool Echo) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa RB Leipzig, umufaransa  Ibrahima Konate w'imyaka 21, avuga ko ata kintu  Liverpool iravuga n'aho hari amakuru avugwa ko yoba ari mu kuja gukina mw'uyo murwi ufise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League. (Bild - in German) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid umunya Croatia Luka Modric w'imyaka 35 yemeye gukatwa umushahara mu masezerano mashasha y' umwaka umwe muri uyu murwi.  (AS)

column2: Omicron: US igiye kuvanaho kubuza ingendo ziva muri Africa y'ubumanuko
column3: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigiye kuvanaho ingingo zo kubuza ingendo z'indege ziva mu bihugu munani vyo muri Afrika y'ubumanuko kubera ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa coronavirus. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu White House vyavuze ko izo ngingo  zari yafatiwe ibihugu vya Afrika y'Epfo , Botswana, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Namibia, Lesotho, Eswatini na Malawi ku wa 29 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) zizovanwaho buca ari umunsi wa Bonane. Ivyo biro bivuga ko izo ngingo zitagikenewe mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abandura Omicron vyaduze cane muri Amerika. Ubu ubwo bwoko nibwo bwiganje mu bashasha batorwa ko banduye  uwo mugera. "Izo ngingo zaduhaye umwanya wo gutahura Omicron ubu tukaba tuzi ko incanco zihasanzwe zikora kuri Omicron, cane cane iyo umuntu yaronse urwo gushimangira" , vyanditswe kuri Twitter n'icegera c'umunyamabanga ajejwe ivyo kumenyesha amakuru muri White House Kevin Munoz. Izo ngingo zari zafashwe ubwa mbere n'Ishirahamwe rya Buraya n'Ubwongereza. Amerika n'ibindi bihugu bitari bike vyaciye bikurikira. Izo ngingo zaraneguwe cane, umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres akaba yazise ko ari "apartheid mu ngendo". Izo ngingo ntizabuza Abanyamerika gusubira mu gihugu iwabo bava muri ico gice ca Afrika, zakora ku bantu batari abanyamerika gusa. Mu gusigura igituma iyo ngingo yafashwe, umujenama mukuru ku bijanye na coronavírus muri biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu White House (Maison Blanche), Dr   Dr Anthony Fauci,  yavuze mu minsi iheze ko vyari "vyakozwe mu gihe ata na kimwe twari bwamenye" kuri Omicron. Yavuze ati: "Twese turababazwa cane n'amagume ashobora kuba yashizwe kuri Afrika y'Epfo, no ku bindi bihugu vyo muri Afrika." Ku ndwi iheze , Canada nayo yakuyeho ingingo zayo yari yafatiye ingenzi z'abanyamahanga ziva mu bihgu 10 vyo muri Afrika. Umutegetsi yavuze ko ukwiyongera kw'abandura uwo mugera mu gihugu gutuma izo ngingo "zitagikenewe". Ibinyamakuru vyo muri Canada imbere y'aho vyari vyavuze ko hari abanya-Canada bategerezwa guca baca muri Ethiopia mu gutaha n'ubwo hari  inama n'ubu ikiri mu ngiro  yo kutagendera ico gihugu co mw'ihembe rya Afrika. Abaganga muri Afrika y'Epfo -aho Omicron yavuzwe ubwa mbere-  bavuze ubu vuba ko kwandura ubwo bwoko bushasha  bitera gusa kurwara bibayabaye. Ivyo vyigwa kuva ico gihe vyarashigikiwe n'ivyigwa vyakzwe mu Bwongereza. Ubwo bwoko bwararandagase kuruta ubundi bwose muri Amerika ariko gushika ubu  nta bitigiri buratuma kwongerekana ku baja mu bitaro. Gushika ubu umuntu umwe wenyene niwe amaze gupfa kw'isano n'ubwoko bwa Omicron: umugabo wo muri Texas afise mu myaka 50 atari yararonse urucanco kandi yari asanzwe agendana izindi ngorane z'amagara.

column2: Harry Kane: Jose Morinho ati Tottenham 'ntishobora gukina neza ata musatirizi'
column3: Umumenyereza wa Tottenham, Jose Mourinho, avuga ko ata mukinyi ashobora gusubirira Harry Kane, kandi ko Tottenham idashobora gukina nk'uko isanzwe ikina atarimwo. Ashikirije ivyo mu gihe umurwi wiwe witeze kwakira Liverpool mu rukino rukomeye cane rwo kuri uyu wa gatandatu ruza gutangura isaha imwe n'igice z'ijoro mu masaha y'u Burundi n'u Rwanda. Uyo musatirizi wa Tottenham, Harry Kane, ntazosubira mu kibuga imbere y'ukwa kane uno mwaka, inyuma y'aho abagiwe kubera imvune yo kw'itako. Uyo musatirizi wa Tot ariwe kandi kizigenza w'u Bwongereza amaze gutsinda ibitsindo 27 mu nkino amaze gukinira Tottenham n'umurwi nserukiragihugu muri uno mwaka w'inkino. Morihno ati: "Ngize ngo mvuge menshi kuri Harry, bintera umubabaro mwinshi". "Vyombera vyiza tuganiriye ku vyotuma ntwenga". Kane yagize iyo mvune mu rukino rwayihuje na Southampton, urukino mbere yatsinzwe, hari ku munsi wa Bonane. Morinho ati: "Ico womenya coco, ni uko tudashobora gukina nk'uko dusanzwe dukina iyo Harry Kane ari kumwe natwe". "Nta mukinyi n'umwe ariho yofata ikibanza ciwe". Danny Rose yaragarutse mu myimenyerezo, eka na  Hugo Lloris na we nyene akaba ariko agaruka buke buke inyuma y'aho avunikiye inkokora mu kw'icumi kw'umwaka urangiye. Hagati aho, ibintu ntibitomoretse neza kuri kazoza k'umukinyi wo hagati, Christian Eriksen, mu gihe amasezerano yiwe n'uyo murwi azorangira mu mpera za rino higanwa ry'uno mwaka. Morinho avuga ati: "Ari nka hamwe umukuru w'umurwi [Daniel Levy] yotorera umuti ibi bibazo kugira ngo dushobore kuvyitwaramwo neza mu mezi ari imbere, ni ukuri vyoba vyiza". "Atari uko, twotegerezwa kurindira gushika mu ci kugira dutegure neza ikipe".

column2: DR Congo: FARDC yahaye igisirikare c' u Rwanda inyeshamba 71 zirwanya ubutegetsi bw'ico gihugu
column3: Igisirikare ca DR Congo kimenyesha ko ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iheze catahukanye inyeshamba z'u Rwanda 71 ziheruka gufatwa mu rugamba rubandanya rwo kurwanya imirwi y'inyeshamba muri ico gihugu. Kapiteni Dieudonné Kasereka avugira ingabo za Congo ziri muri urwo rugamba, yabwiye BBC ko abo barwanyi ari abo mu murwi Conseil national pour la renaissance et la démocratie (CNRD). CNRD ni umurwi wiyonkoye kuri Forces démocratiques pour la libération du Rwanda (FDLR) ikorera mu buseruko bwa Republika y'Itwaro Rusangi ya Congo. Urugamba rwo kurwanya imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho mu karere ka Kalehe rwatanguye ku wa 26 z'ukwezi kwa 11 mu karere ka Kalehe. Mu kiganiro yahaye BBC, Kapiteni Kasereka avuga ko abo barwanyi bashikirijwe igisirikare c'u Rwanda bari kumwe n'abandi 1471 bagizwe n'imiryango yabo. Amenyesha ko izo nyeshamba n'imiryango yabo bakiriwe na koloneli Patrick Musho ku ruhande rw'u Rwanda. Avuga ko intambara zikibandanya mu karere ka Mwenga, aho abo barwanyi ba CNRD bari bageze bariko berekeza mu karere ka Fizi. Amenyesha ko mu ntambara z'ejo ku wa Mungu mu gace ka Kasika zahuje abasirikare ba Congo n'izo nyeshamba avuga ko ziharurwa mw'ijana zanse gushira ibirwanisho hasi, bashoboye kwica umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNRD, bongera bafata mpiri n'abarwanyi bashika kw'icumi. Ku wa 16 z'uku kwezi, umurwi wa mbere ugizwe n'inyeshamba 291 hamwe n'abana 11 baratahukanywe inyuma y'aho batsindiwe n'igisirikare ca Congo mu ntara ya Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Kapiteni  Kasereka  avuga ko uwo murwi w'abo batahukanywe ku wa gatandatu "ugizwe n'abaheruka gufatwa no kwishikana, baka bari bacungiwe mw'ikambi ya gisirikare ya Nyamunyunyi", iri ku birometero 30 uvuye i Bukavu, umugwa mukuru wa Kivu y'Ubumanuko. Ku wa 08 z'uku kwezi nyene, igisirikare ca Congo cari catangaje ko abantu 1200 b'umurwi CNRD "bagizwe n'abarwanyi hamwe n'imiryango yabo" muri iyo ntara bishikanye. Mu buseruko bwa Congo, haharurwa imirwi  y'inyeshamba ishika 133, imwe igizwe n'abanyekongo iyindi igizwe n'abanyamahanga, muri iyo 35 irwanira muri Kivu y'Ubumanuko, nk'uko bivugwa na Kapiteni Kasereka. Avuga ko igisirikare ca Congo kitarota gihagarika ibitero ku mirwi y'inyeshamba irwanira muri ako karere gushika yemeye gushira ibirwanisho hasi.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa gatandatu: Kane, Conte, De Gea, Van de Beek
column3: Umusatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane w’imyaka 29, akaba na kizigenza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza yabaye arahagarika ibiganiro bijanye n’amasezerano mashasha gushika inyuma y’igikombe c’isi yose. Aba Spurs kandi baripfuza gushika ku masezerano mashasha n’umukinyi wo hagati wa Danemark Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg w’imyaka 27 be n’umwongereza Eric Dier w’imyaka 28 akina inyuma. (Evening Standard) Umusatirizi wa Tottenham Harry Kane araronderwa na Bayern Munich inyotewe ibitsindo vya Robert Lewandowski kuva yimukiye muri Barcelona mu ci. (Express) Juventus irashaka umumenyereza wa Tottenham Antonio Conte kuva mu ntango z’umwaka w’inkino uza inyuma y’aho uyu murwi umaze gutsindira ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano incuro 36 ikuriwe mw’ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League). Amasezerano Conte afitaniye n’aba Spurs azorangira mu mpera z’uno mwaka w’inkino ariko bakaba bafise akaryo ko kuyongerereza ikiringo c’umwaka. (Gazzetta dello Sport – mu gitaliyano) Newcastle United iripfuza umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Eguinaldo  w’imyaka 18 akina mu murwi Vasco da Gama wo mu cicaro ca kabiri. Mu masezerano afitaniye n’uyu murwi, harimwo umurongo uvuga ko umurwi womukenera utegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 26 z’ama pawundi. (Chronicle) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle Eddie Howe arahakana ko ata biganiro bijanye n’amasezerano bariko baragiriranira n’umukinyi akina hagati Miguel Almiron w’imyaka 28. (Sky Sports) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus umunya-Brezili Arthur Melo w’imyaka 26 azobandanya akinira Liverpool yatijijwemwo gushika uno mwaka w’inkino urangire n’aho yavunitse. Melo amaze gukina iminota 13 yonyene kuva agiye muri Liverpool mu kw’icenda. (Mirror) Umunyegori wa Manchester United  David de Gea w’imyaka 31, ntazoja mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose muri Qatar bikavugwa ko umumenyereza wa Espagne atamushize ku rutonde mfatakibanza. (Mail) Newcastle iriko itegura guha amasezerano mashasha n’umunya-Brezili akina hagati Bruno Guimaraes w’imyaka 24, amasezerano azomutuma ahembwa amapawundi 200.000 ku ndwi, mu ntumbero yo kwigizayo Chelsea na Real Madrid imukanuriye maremare. (Evening Standard) Valencia na Inter Milan ishobora kurwanira umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United umunya-Hollande Donny van de Beek w’imyaka 25, mu kwa mbere. (Todofichajes.com – mu ki Espagnol) Manchester United iri mu biganiro vyerekeye amasezerano y’igihe kirekire n’umukinyi wo kuruhande babonamwo amahirwe menshi cane, umunya- Argentina  Alejandro Garnacho w’imyaka 18. (Fabrizio Romano kuri Twitter) Umukinyi wa Chelsea ntazoshoka afata ingingo yo kuva muri uyo murwi gushika yumvise ko Barcelona iriko iramurondera. Uyu mukinyi wo hagati w’Ubutaliyano afise imyaka 30 ashobora kuzokwimukira mu murwi uwo ari wo wose atakirinze gusabwa mu mpera z’iri higanwa amasezerano afitaniye n’umurwi wiwe arangiye. (Sport – muki Espagnol) Arsenal, Newcastle na West Ham irarwanira umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Danemark Gustav Isaksen w’imyaka 21 asanzwe akinira  Midtjylland ariko imurwanira na AC Milan. (Calciomercato - mu gitaliyno) Leeds iriteguye gusubira kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa PSV Eindhoven umunya-Hollande Cody Gakpo w’imyaka 23,bakaba bamushaka mu ci riza. Gakpo yagize uruhara rukomeye igihe PSV yirahira Arsenal mw’ihiganwa Europa League ku wa kane. (Express) Umukinyi w’inyuma wa West Ham umwongereza Craig Dawson w’imyaka 32, arashaka kuva muri uyo murwi mu kwa mbere inyuma y’aho atakarije ikibanza mu bakinyi batangura mu kibuga. (Football Insider) Barcelona, Paris St-Germain na Real Madrid yose irarondera kugura umusatirizi wa Brezili  Endrick w’imyaka 16 asanzwe akina muri Palmeiras. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Brighton ifise icizere ko izoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa  Argentina Facundo Buonanotte w’imyaka 17, asanzwe akinira Rosario Central. (Fabrizio Romano kuri  Twitter)

column2: UK: Abarongoye amakompanyi bemeye kwongereza abakozi b'abirabure
column3: Amakompanyi Barclays na Deloitte hamwe n'ayandi atari make mu Bwongereza yiyemeje kwongereza igitigiri c'abakozi b'abirabure, ni mu ntumbero yo kurwanya akarenganyo gakorerwa abirabure. Mw'ikete ryateweko umukono n'abarongoye amakompanyi 40, basavye n'ayandi makompanyi gukora gutyo. Umukuru w'umurwi witaho Uburinganire n'Uburenganzira bwa Muntu mu Bwongereza yabwiye BBC  ko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwiha intumbero yo kwongereza abakozi batari abazungu mu nzego zo hejuru. David Isaac avuga ko amakompanyi akeneye "kugira uruhara rukomeye" mu guha ikibanza gikomeye abantu mu butandukane bwabo. Avuga ko urupfu rwa George Floyd muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rwashize ahabona akarenganyo gakorerwa abantu atari abazungu. Icegeranyo ciswe Colour of Power 2020, cakozwe n'ikigo Green Park gitanga ubuhanuzi ku bijanye n'ubutandukane, kivuga ko mu nzego zo hejuru mu makompanyi atari make mu Bwongereza, muri leta no mu bundi butegetsi bw'igihugu, inkehwa zingana n'ibice bidashika 5%. Kivuga ko ibiharuro bisa n'ivyagumye uko muri ino myaka mike iheze. Umukuru wa kompanyi E.On UK, Michael Lewis, yagize ico avuga ku vyo ayo makompanyi yiyemeje akavuga ati: "Tuzokwama duharanira ivyo twemera kandi twerekane ko dushize hamwe mu kurwanya ivanguramoko, kwigisha abandi no kwishimira ubudasa, ivyo bikazoduha inguvu zo guhindura isi ". Mu gutera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko, abarongoye amakompanyi biyemeje gufata ingingo ziboneka mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c'abirabure mu bakozi bayo. Zimwe muri izo ngingo harimwo: Suki Sandhu, uwatanguje akaba ari nawe arongoye ishirahamwe Imvolve ryishinze guhimiriza ubutandukane mu buzi, ni umwe mu bari muri iryo sekeza, avuga ko yatewe intege n'igitigiri c'abemeye gushira igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko. Avuga ati: "Akamo katewe n'isekeza Black Lives Matter ntikagiye uko, kandi amakompanyi akeneye guhaguruka agafata iya mbere mu mpinduka zigamije kwongereza abirabure mu buzi". "Ndafise icizere ko, mu gihe abayobozi benshi bateye igikumu kuri iri kete, dushobora gufatira ku ngingo biyemeje tukazana impinduka mu kazi kandi tukaguma dukurikirana ingene biguma bigenda, kuko amakompanyi ategerezwa kwama atanga ivyageranyo  buri mwaka ". Hagati aho, amakenga ntabura mu bakozi bamwe bamwe b'abirabure. Umwe mu bakozi ba Barclays atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nzovyemera ndabibonye". Icegeranyo Colour of Power 2020 kivuga ko mu bantu 1,097 barongoye inzego nkuru nkuru mu Bwongereza, 1,046 bose ari abazungu.

column2: Kenya igiye kuronka miriyoni zafatiwe muri Jersey zifashe kugwanya Covid
column3: Miriyoni z'ama dorari z'amafaranga y'igihugu bivugwa ko zibwe n'abanya-Kenya babiri ba mbere batunze cane zigiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu zigurwemwo ibikoresho  vyo kurokora ubuzima mu kugwanya  indwara ya Covid-19 hisunzwe  amasezerano y'imbonekarimwe yashitsweko i Londres. Ayo mazezerano na Jersey, izinga ryigenga mu ntwaro mu  kiyaga ca Manche (Ensglish Channel) yakiriwe nk'"intsinzi ku banya-Kenya" n'uwuhagarariye ico gihugu mu Bwongereza, Manoah Esipisu. Urufatangane rwahavuye ruvamwo  ayo masezerano rwatanguriye ku rubanza rwo kwahukana. Mu 2006, Samuel Gichuru, umuntuzi afise kompanyi y'umuyagankuba muri Kenya,  n'umugore wiwe Salome Njeri barahukanye. Hageze kugabura ivyo batunze, Madame Njeri yabonye ko ataronse ibikwiye. Yaciye avuga ko bimwe  mu vyo umugabo wiwe atunze vyanyegejwe hanyuma, sentare, ica ikora urutonde rw'ama konte yose umugore yavuze ko ari  aya Gichuru muri Jersey, izinga risanzwe rizwi gushingwamwo amakompanyi ba nyeneyo batamenyekana kandi rigatangisha amakori ari hasi cane. Ivyo vyatumye haba amatohoza yamaze imyaka icenda akorwa n'abategetsi ba Jersey. Muri ayo matohoza, mu 2011, bagirije Gichuru n'uwahoze ari umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta kujana muri kompanyi yari yanditswe muri Jersey amafaranga ya "commissions" bahabwa n'amakompanyi mpuzamakungu. Abategetsi ba Jersey baciye basohora imitahe yo gufatisha abo bagabo bompi,  kuva ico gihe bakaba bakirinridiye ko barungikwa bava aho bari muri Kenya. Ivyaha vy'ubutunzi bagirijwe vyarimwo amasezerano na kompamyi yo muri Finlande yo kwubaka uruganda rw'umuyagankuba hafi ya Mombasa, igisagara kiza ubwa kabiri mu bunini muri Kenya, aho ngo bahawe miriyoni na miriyoni z'amafaranga y'abongereza ya 'commissions'  bayahawe n'amashirahawe yo kwubakisha yo mu Bwongereza, Norvege, Ubudagi na kompanyi y'igihangange mu gutumatumanako yo muri Amerika. N'ubwo BBC yagerageje kenshi kubarondera, abo bagabo bompi n'abashingwamanza babo ntibashimye kugira ico bavuze kuri ivyo bagirizwa. Ariko iyo kompamnyi yanditswe muri Jersey Windward Trading Limited yahavuye yemera ivyaha bine vyo kugira amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi muri sentare yo muri Jersey. Sentare yaciye ishinga ingingo, ko iyo kompanyi, nyeneyo asanzwe ari Gichuru, itegerezwa kwakwa amafaranga arenga miriyoni 4,9 z'ama dorari mu vyo itunze kubera  amafaranga y'inkomoko mbi. Menshi muri ayo mafaranga niyo bivugwa ko yavuye mu biturire muri Kenya hagati ya 1999 na 2002 ubu ariyo agiye kugarukanwa mu gihugu. Ivyo vyashobotse kubera amasezerano yo mu 2018  yashizweko umukono na ministre wa mbere w'Ubwongereza w'ico gihe Theresa May, umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta hamwe na reta za Jersey n'Ubuswise.  Ayo masezerano yavuga ko amatungo yibwe ashobora gusubizwa muri Kenya ariko agakoreshwa  gusa ku bijanye n'imigambi y'iterambere. Ayo masezerano azwi nka Return of Assets from Corruption and Crime to Kenya (Fracck) aha abategetsi ba Jersey uburenganizra bwo kurekura amafaranga bazi ko yibwe hanyuma akarungikwa imbere y'uko abagirizwa kwiba bashikanwa imbere ya sentare. Ikoreshwa neza ry'ayo mafaranga kizoba ari igikorwa ca Crown Agents, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ridaharanira inyungu ryitaho iterambere. Umukuru waryo Fergus Drake, yabwiye BBC  ko avugana n'abategetsi bajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kenya kugira bavugane ibikenewe mu kurwanya Covid -19. Drake yiteze gushikiriza ibikoresho vya nkenerwa cane ku bitaro birenga 10 mu mezi ari imbere. Yavuze ko gupima neza bizofasha abanya-Kenya kurwanya ico kiza neza no kumenya ibice bikeneye incanco kurusha ibindi. Gushika ubu  muri Kenya abantu bamaze kuronka incanco ntibarenga 20% mu gihugu cose. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Drake yavuze ko ayo mafaranga agiye gusohora -miriyoni 3.5 z'ama dorari - atazokora ''ibintu vyinshi cane'' mu gikorwa c'igihugu co kurwanya Covid-19 , ariko yibaza ko bene iyo mfashanyo igenewe ahantu runaka izogira ingaruka zishika kure mu kurwanya uwo mugera. Abaharanira uburenganzira bavuga ko akarorero ka Fracck ari inzira nshasha yo kwerekana ko amafaranga abantu baba baronse mu buryo butari bwiza ashobora gusubizwa. Ubwongereza busanzwe bwaremeje kandi ayandi masezerano -amasezerano ya ONU yo kurwanya ibiturire -gutyo bukaba butegerezwa gusubiza amafaranga yaciye mu vyaha aho ibikenewe biba vyakwiye kugira asubizwe. Ariko ku bwa Steve Goodrich, umukuru w'ubushakashatsi n'amatohoza muri Transparency International (TI) UK, amafaranga asubijwe ava mu Bwongereza akenshi ntaja mu bikorwa vy'iterambere ata handi aciye.
