Atanga akarorero k'amafaranga yigeze gusubizwa yari ayo inkomoko mbi y'uwahoze ari umukuru w'intara ya Delta muri Nigeria  James Ibori mu 2012 agahabwa reta ya Nigeria. Afise amakenga ko amafaranga asubijwe ashobora guherera mu biturire. Goodrich  avuga ko ivyo vya Jersey ari intambwe mu nzira nziza. Ariko yongerako ko kugirango hajeko "igitururuza cizewe" ku bantu bibaza kuja kunyegeza amafaranga bivye mu Bwongereza, reta "vy'ukuri ikeneye gukaza umukono wayo" ku gusubira ku matungo (aba yibwe). Nk'akarorero, avuga ko Ubwongereza bukwiye gutangura gusuzuma ivyo yibaza ko ari "ibibanza/amazu biciye amafaranga arenga miliyaridi 5 z'ama pound (£ canke pound:amafaranga y'abongereza)  vyaguzwe mu Bwongereza n'amafaranga yo kwinuba. Aha rero hari n'ukuraba neza ikibazo c'ibiturire muri Kenya. Kenya kiza ubugira 128 ku rutonde rwa Transparency International rw'igipimo c'ibiturire kw'isi, abategetsi n'abagwizatunga bakaba  bavugwa cane mu biturire. Hasigaye amezi make ngo prezida Uhuru ave ku butegetsi, agishika ku butegetsi akaba yari yiyemeje kurwanya ibiturire. Muri iyo ntumbero abategetsi n'abanyaporotike bariko barasabwa kuvuga amatungo  bafise, hagakorwa isuzumwa ry'uko ata biturire yaciyemwo. Uwuhagarariye Kenya mu Bwongereza, Esipisu, yigeze kuba umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu, yabwiye BBC ko amasezerano ya Fracck ari "intererano ikomeye cane" ku mugambi w'umukuru w'igihugu kuko atanga ubutumwa ko "abantu bivye amafaranga " batazotekanirwa ngo n'uko gusa banyegeje amafaranga yabo mu mahanga". Yongerako ati "ayo ni amafaranga yibwe abanya-Kenya, yasahuwe abanya-Kenya, kubera ayo masezerano ayo mafaranga agiye kugaruka gufasha abanya-Kenya ari nabo ubwa mbere na mbere yari asanzwe agenewe. Rero iyo ni intsinzi ku banya-Kenya". Ubu amafaranga ari mu nzira ava muri Jersey aja muri Kenya, ubu abantu bazoca bahindukirira kuraba ko abo bagabo bagirizwa barungikwa muri Jersey. Mu kwezi kwa kabiri,  ibikeneye gukorwa kugira barungikwe vyaratanguye gukorwa muri sentare ya Nairobi City  Magistrates Court, inyuma y'imyaka 10 y'impari zo kumenya urwego rwoja imbere mu kubikora. Ubu igisata c'ubushikirizamanza nico kiriko kirabikora kandi icegera c'umuyobozi waco  Victor Mule yavuze ko intahe yitezwe mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Yavuze ko yizeye ko bitazosubira gufata iyindi myaka 10. Igihe BBC yabarondera, abashingwamanza ba Gichuru bahisemwo kutagira ico bavuze ku biriko birakorwa. Umukenguzamateka Ian Gorst, umushikiranganji wa Jersey ajejwe imigenderanire,  aremera ko ubwa mbere hoho hari ibitagenze neza  kugira ayo mafaranga bivugwa ko yibwe abe yarashitse muri iryo zinga. Agabisha abandi bashobora gukora gutyo muri kazoza ko amategeko y'iryo zinga ubu yakajijwe cane ariko kandi ko amafaranga yose yashitseyo aciye mu nzira zitari zo azoronderwa iyo ari kandi ko "tuzoyasubiza ku banyagihugu bo beneyo".

column2: Mason Greenwood: Uyu muyabaga rutahizamu wa Man Utd azoshikana hehe?
column3: "Ntafyinira imbere y'igoli." "Kwinjiza ibitsindo bimuri mu maraso." "Ni icago ku kipe ihura nawe." Abamukeza babaye benshi mu gihe Mason Greenwood yanditse ayandi mateka ku wa kane, mu gukina kwiwe kugitangura. Ku myaka 18 n'iminsi 72, uyu rutahizamu yabaye umukinyi wa Manchester United akiri muto kurusha abandi atsinze ibitsindo bibiri mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya aho United yatsinda 4-0 AZ Alkmaar mw'ihiganwa rya Europa League. Vyabaye ibitsindo vyiwe bigira gatanu na gatandatu mw'ikipe y'abakuze bikaba vyigaragaza ko azoba uwundi rurangiranwa avuye mw'ishure ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Manchester United. Mu vy'ukuri, Greenwood yarigaragaje cane mu bakiri bato, umumenyereza Ole Gunnar Solskjaer akaba yari amaze imyaka 11 amureretse ijisho. Solskjaer yahagaritse gukinira United mu 2007 yagize ati: "Ahubwo ndibuka aho nahura nawe ubwa mbere kuko umuhungu wanje nawe yagirira imyimenyerezo i Chill mu bafise imyaka umunani. Mason yari afise indwi." "Ndamubona ubwa mbere yaraboneka ko arusha abandi kandi twarifotoje hamwe. None ubu ari ngaha. Ibi nivyo dukora. "Namusavye ko twifotoza kuko nari nzi yuko azoba umukinyi. Nibaza ko iyo foto ayifise, canke se niwe ashobora kuba ayifise." None mu gihe yari umukinyi mwiza akiri muto cane uko, urwego ashobora gushikako ni uruhe? 'Ni icago ku bakinyi b'inyuma' - uko abonwa n'abamwegereye muri Man Utd Hari abatangaye igihe Solskjaer yemera ko Alexis Sanchez na Romelu Lukaku bagenda mw'ici riheruka kandi, hako azana abandi bakinyi bazimvye bo kubasubiriza, yashize icizere muri Greenwood. Iyo ngingo yafashe ubu isa nk'iyifise ishingiro, kuko Greenwood ubu amaze kwinjiza ibitsindo vyinshi kurusha ivyo Sanchez yinjije igihe cose yamaze Old Trafford. Solskjaer yagize ati "Twari tuzi ko afise impano". "Ku bwanje, guteza imbere umuntu afise impano nk'izi, nta handi wobikorera hasumvya ngaha (muri United)." Ku bitsindo vyiwe bibiri yinjije ejo, Solskjaer yongeyeko ati: "Birya ni vyo akora. Arabikora mu myimenerezo - kuri we ni ibisanzwe kandi uko asatira igoli niko asumbiriza gukara. Ni icago ku bakinyi b'inyuma." Mugenzi wa Greenwood bakinana, Juan Mata, ntatangara iyo abonye uyu muhungu avyifatamwo neza ku rwego rwo hejuru. Uwo munye Espagne agira ati "Igihe cose iyo akinye, aratsinda." "Turiko turimenyereza, ashobora kudakora ku mupira kenshi ariko arakomeye mu kwinjiza kandi ntafyina imbere y'igoli. Ni umwana mwiza kandi ndahimbawe ku bwiwe." Uwahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Owen Hargreaves ntakekeranya ko Greenwood ashitse aho yokina ku rwego rwo hejuru mu mupira w'amaguru naho akiri muto. Hargreaves yabariye BT Sport ati: "Ibitsindo yinjiza, sinzi ingene abigenza ariko atera umupira neza cane. Ndakunda kuraba ingene atsinda kuko aravyorosha cane. Ntahatiriza. "Afise uwo arabirako vyiza ari we Marcus Rashford, ico akeneye gusa n'ukumwigirako. Ku myaka yiwe, 18, nibaza ko ari umuntu yaremewe kwinjiza ibitsindo. Azoba rurangiranwa, nta nkeka." Uwahoze ari rutahizamu wa Manchester United Michael Owen avuga ko Greenwood afise ubushobozi bwo kumara imyaka myinshji ari umukinyi akomeye - mu gihe atoreka uku kuduga kwiwe kunyaruka kukamusindisha. "Uraba ko babishoye iyo bakiri bato cane, ariko ubu igikenewe ni guhagarara neza mu mutwe. "Niyabandanya muri ino nzira mw'ikipe nziza imaze kurerura urwaruka rutari rukeyi, urashobora kwizera ko vyose bikwiye. Nta nkeka azomara igihe kinini ari umukinyi akomeye."

column2: Burundi: OLUCOME iriyamiriza ingingo yo kwugara ibiryo vy'abavunjayi (bureau de change)
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu, OLUCOME, aranegura ingingo y'Ibanki Nkuru y'u Burundi yo kwugara amazu adandaza amafaranga  mvamakungu. Mw'itangazo yasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, Gabriel Rufyiri arongoye Olucome avuga ko iyo ngingo itazotorera umuti ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafaranga mvamakungu cibonekeza mu gihugu. Ku wa 07 z'uku kwa kabiri, Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yarafashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga mvamakungu mu Burundi. Iyagiriza ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu, nk'uko BRB ibivuga. Mw'iryo tangazo, Bwana Rufyiri avuga ati: "Iyo ata mafaranga y'agaciro ahari, ingingo nk'iyo siyo iza gukemura ikibazo kuko ibiciro vy'amafaranga y'agaciro bivana n'ingene aboneka kw'isoko ryayo". Yibutsa ko iryo kena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro rituma ibidandazwa bimwe bimwe mu gihugu bikena kubera hakenerwa ayo mafaranga kugira ngo hagurwe ibikoresho nkenerwa mu guhingura ivyo bidandazwa. Atanga akarorero k'isima, amafanta, ibiyeri n'ibindi, avuga ko "iyo bibonetse usanga bigurishwa ku biciro vy'umurengera". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyarahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena. Leta y'u Burundi yagiye ifata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kugenzura ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga mvamakungu, ariko cagumye ari ikibazo ngorabahizi, arico catumyeIbanki Nkuru y'igihugu yugara amashirahamwe yose adandaza ayo mafaranga. Olucome isaba leta kuvyura imigenderanire n'ibihugu bitanga imfashanyo, kwongereza ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze, guhimiriza abarwizatunga b'banyamahanga kuzana imitahe yabo mu gihugu, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, ivyo vyose kugira ngo amafaranga mvamakungu yinjire mu Burundi.

column2: Afghanistan -Taliban: Urwamo rw'amasasu rwo kwigina itaha ry'Abanyamerika
column3: Mu gisagara ca Kabul humvikanye urwamo rw'amasasu menshi rwo kwigina ukuva mu gihugu kw'ingabo za nyuma za Amerika mw'ijoro ryakeye - ikiringo caranze irangira ry'imyaka 20 izo ngabo zari zimaze muri ico gihugu. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Lyse Ducet ari i Kabul yakurikiye ingene vyari vyifashe igihe inkuru yamenyekana ko indege ya nyuma y'Abanyamerika ihagurutse, yabwiwe mugenziwe yariko aramubaza ikibiriraraho kuri mboneshakure (television) ati : "Wewe umviriza ibiriko biraba mu kirere hejuru yacu mu gisagara ca Kabul. Niba atari ikimenyamenya [ko abanyamerika bavuye burundu mu gihugu] sinzi icari co. Wewe umviriza urwo rwamo rw'amasasu". Aba Taliban n'ababashigikiye mu gisagara co mu bamuko ca Kandahar biriwe barigina inyuma y'aho ingabo za Amerika ziviriye muri ico gihugu. Kandahar nico gisagara kiza ubugira kabiri mu bunini muri Afghanistan. Ni naco gifatwa nk ''iwabo w'umutima w'aba Taliban". Abantu muri ico gisagara biriwe barazunguka mu mabarabara bazungagiza amabendera y'aba Taliban mu kwigina irangira ry'imyaka 20 ingabo za Amerika zari zimaze muri ico gihugu. ukwigina muri Kandahar Yakejewe kuba yavuye  ku butaka bwa Afghanistan ubwa nyuma Gen Major Chris Donahue niwe yabaye umusirikare wanyuma wa Amerika mu kuva ku butaka bwa Afghanistan. Niwe yuriye ubwa nyuma indege C-17   yatahukanaye ingabo za nyuma za Amerika mw'ijoro ryakeye. Uwo mu komanda wa division y'indege  ya 82 yashimagijwe cane ku mbuga hwaniro. Alex Plitsas yanditse kuri twitter ati: " Ico niko uburungozi busa… yabanje kuraba ko abasirikare bose binjiye mu mutekano". Uwundi akoresha twitter iblondeitall ati: "Niwe akoza ikirenge hasi ubwa mbere, niwe wa nyuma mu kuva ku butaka" Intwazangabo yavyigiye muri kaminuza ya gisirikare ya West Point , Donahue- jenerari w'inyenyeri zibiri - afise uburambe kandi bw'amateka meza mu ngabo za Amerika. Yaranagwanye mu ntambara ya Iraq mu 2003-11. Niwe yatwaye ingabo za Delta Force squadron muri Afghanistan mu gihe cataziriwe ''isugerezwa " mu  2011, hanyuma aba umukuru w'ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu 2019-20. Abategetsi ba Amerika bavuga ko bafatanije n'ibihugu bacuditse , bashoboye kuvana muri Afghanistan abantu bashika ibihumbi 123 imbere y'umunsi ntarengwa wa  31 isaha zitandatu z'ijoro. Ariko haracasigayeyo abanyamahanga benshi, barimwo amajana y'Abongereza n'Abanyamerika bari hagati ya 100 na 250, nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Dominic Raab yavuze ko Ubwongereza bukeneye guhangana n''uko ibintu bisigaye vyifashe'' muri Afghanistan hanyuma bakorane n'ibindi bihugu kugira botse igitutu aba Taliban ariko mu buryo bworoheje. Hamaze igihe atawuzi iyo ibintu biva n'iyo bija kuva aba Taliban  bigaruriye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan hakaba hagumye ibibazo vyo kumenya ingene reta nshsaha igiye kuba imeze. Ariko umushikiranganji bwa Pakistan ajejwe  imigenderanire  yavugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ko "reta yumvikanyweko igiye gushingwa mu minsi ya vuba" muri Afghanistan. Aba Taliban bari bavuze ko bari mu biganiro n'imigwi yose kugira bashike ku mwumvikano wo gushinga reta. Ingene uwo mugwi uzotwara igihugu n'ico intwaro yabo izoba ivuze ku bagore, uburenganzira bwa muntu  n'ubwisanzure muri poritike gushika ubu ntibiramenyekana.

column2: Impunzi z’Abarundi zivuga iki ku mushikiranganji wa Tanzania yazisavye gutaha?
column3: Inyuma y'urugendo rw'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati muri Tanzania yagize mu makambi y'impunzi z'Abarundi mu ntara ya Kigoma, bamwe mu mpunzi bafise ubwoba ko impera n'imperuka bazohava batahukanwa ku nguvu. Umushikiranganji George Simbachawene yabwiye impunzi ko zokwiyandikisha zigahunguka "kuko u Burundi ari nyabagendwa, amahoro ari yose". Umwe mu baserukira impunzi mw'imwe muri izo nkambi ariko atashatse ko izina ryiwe rimenyekana, avuga ko atari we yari akwiye kubabonera ko hari amahoro, ko ari bo bonyene ubwabo bakwiye kuvyibonera. Ati: "Kutubwira y'uko iwacu ari amahoro natwe ari twebwe tuzi ico twahunze, si ivy'iwe kuko ni twebwe dukwiye kubona ko hari amahoro, ivyo rero vyaradutangaje". Inyuma y'urugendo yagize mu makambi ya Nyarugusu, Nduta na Mtendeli mu ntara ya Kigoma ku wa mbere no ku wa kabiri w'iyi ndwi, umushikiranganji Simbachawene yategekanya guca arubandaniriza mu makambi ya Ulyankulu mu ntara ya Tabora, hamwe na Mishamo na Gatumba ari mu ntara ya Katavi. Aya makambi arimwo impunzi zahunze ubwicanyi bwa 1972. Avugana na BBC, uyo ari mu baserukira izindi mpunzi abona ko ubutumwa bashikirijwe na leta ya Tanzania ari ubwo bumvikanye na Leta y'u Burundi ariko atariko izo mpunzi zozo zibona ibintu. Afise ubwoba ko impera n'imperuka leta ya Tanzania ishobora gukoresha inguvu kugira ngo bave muri ico gihugu. Leta ya Tanzania yoyo ivuga ko gushika ubu bahimiriza impunzi gutahuka ku bushake bwazo. Hagati aho, uyo aserukira abandi aremeza ko "abantu bariko baratahuka kandi ko n'abandi babandanya biyandikisha," ariko y'uko ari ya mvugo ngo 'ntahatagira imva'. Ati: "Turavye ukuntu dufashwe n'ukuntu turi, abantu babona ko aho ari ho hose umuntu ashobora gutakaza ubuzima, bakabona ko hako bomererwa nabi mu buhungiro, bopfuma bahitamwo kugenda, na kare ntarusi rudahamba". Ariko avuga ko we ubwiwe atiteguye guhunguka, ko ico yahunze ari co kigihari, kandi ko icuka kiri mu gihugu kitamuhumuriza. Avuga ko hari abari bahungutse ariko bakaruhira gusubira guhunga, ubu bari kumwe mu nkambi. Asaba leta ya Tanzania n'ishirahamwe ONU ko boba barabagumiza aho bari canke n'aho bakabaronderera ahandi hantu baba barabashira "nimba Tanzania yoba irushe". Ati: "Ariko nimba itarushe naho ibandanye yubahiriza amategeko atugenga". Mugenziwe wo mw'ikambi ya Nyarugusu avuga ko koko mu nkambi zose hari abafashe ingingo yo guhita bataha inyuma yo kugenderwa n'umushikiranganji Simbachawene, ariko ko bakiri bake ugereranije n'abatuye muri izo nkambi. Mu gihe abarenga 250.000 bazwi ko bahungiye muri ico gihugu, gushika kuwa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu, abashika 87.194 nibo bari bamaze guhunguka, nk'uko vyemezwa n'ishirahamwe ryitaho impunzi HCR mu Burundi. Ariko ibitigiri bigenda vyiyongera cane kuko hari ababandanya bahunguka.

column2: CAN 2021: Mali yatsinze Tunisia mu rukino rwaheze mu mpari
column3: Mali yatsinze Tuniziya 1-0 mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika c'umupira w'amaguru, mu rukino  rwarangiye mu mpari zikomeye mu gihe umuhagarikize yavugije ifirimbi yanyuma hataragera. Umumenyereza w'ikipe Aigles du Carthage, Mondher Kebaier hamwe n'abamufasha kumenyereza baciye binjira mu kibuga guhangana n'umuhagarikizi Janny Sikazwe nyuma yo kurangiza urukino hasigaye iminota. Bwana Sikazwe yabanje kurangiza urukino ku munota wa 85, abantu bose bagwa mu gahundwe nawe aravye isaha yiwe arabona yuko yihenze, niho yabaza abo bakorana aca afata ingingo yo kubandanya urukino. Ariko naho nyene ku munota wa 89 yaciye arangiza urukino mu gihe vyagaragara ko hategerezwa kuba umwanya wongerwako. Ikiganiro n'abanyamakuru kimaze gutangura, abateguye ihiganwa bategetse ko urukuno rubandanya gushika ruheze. Ariko, Tuniziya yanse gusubira mu kibuga hanyuma Mali ica yegurirwa intsinzi. Hagati aho, Tuniziya yananiwe penaliti yari yatanzwe naho nyene habanje kuba impari, umuhagarikizi abwirizwa kuraba television imwereka ivyabaye (VAR). Ibindi biraza gukurikira.
