column2: Francine Niyonsaba avuga iki inyuma yo kuba uwa mbere ku metero 3000 i Lausane?
column3: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yatahukanye ikibanza ca mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League ryariko rirabera i Lausane mu Buswisse ku metero 3000. Uwo murundikazi aherutse guhabwa icubahiro co kwitwa ambasaderi yasize isegunda imwe gusa umunye Amerika Alicia Monson. Francine Niyonsaba yagize iminoto 8:26:80 na we Monson agira iminota 8:26:81. Ihiganwa rya nyuma rya Diamnond League ritegekanijwe itariki 6 z'ukwezi kw'icenda mu 2022.

column2: DRC: Delcato Idengo yafatiwe i Butembo n'abajejwe umutekano
column3: Umuririmvyi akunzwe muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo, Delcato Idengo, yafashwe yagirizwa guhamagarira abantu kugirira nabi abajejwe umutekano Uyu munyamuzika yafashwe ejo kuwa mungu ari mu muji wa Butembo uri mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko. Abakunzi biwe bakoze imyiyerekano basaba yuko yorekurwa. Igipolisi cavuze yuko Idengo azoshinjwa ivyaha vyo kugomorera abantu kugirira nabi abapolisi n'abasirikare. Ariko uyu munyamuzika ntararenguka imbere ya sentare. Indirimbo za Idengo kenshi zinegura abajejwe intwaro, cane cane ingene bananiwe kugarukana umutekano mu buseruko bwa Kongo. Yarigeze kwagiriza igipolisi kuba ata na kimwe gikora ngo gihagarike ubwicanyi.

column2: Urucanco rwa malaria 'ruzohindura ubuzima bw'Abanya-Africa ubudasubirwamwo'
column3: "Twamana malaria. Abagenzi banje bose nta wutayirwara, nanje narayirwara, abo tuvukana n'abavyeyi kwari uko." Bello Abdul Hakeem Bolaji n'umwe muri miriyoni z'abantu muri Afrika bakuranye na malaria. Uwo munya-Nigeria w'imyaka 25 avuga ko ingingo yo gucandaga abana muri Afrika yose ari ikintu kigiye "guhindura ubuzima". Iyo ndwara mu bindi bice vy'isi nticica abantu cane ariko muri Afrika iracari  iya mbere mu kwica abantu, aho yahitanye abana bashika 260.000  mu 2019. Bello akora  mu vy'ubuhinga bwa none avuga ati: "Ni inkuru ije guhindura umukino". "Igihe nayumva ubwa mbere, nagize ibishobisho. Ubuhinga nibwo bugenga ibihe vya none nazo inyishu nk'incanco muri kahise zarakijije isi  ubukangwe (polio), agasama, mbere na Covid -19." Malaria n'indwara ikwiragizwa n'imibu,  yica cane cane inzoya n'abana bakiri bato. Gukora urucanco inyuma y'imyaka 100 rugeragezwa bibonwa nka kimwe mu bintu bikomeye cane bishitsweko n'ubuvuzi. Bello yaragwaje mushikiwe mutoya igihe yafatwa na malaria afise imyaka 12. Yari asanzwe afise iyindi ndarwa  y'amaraso, gutyo aca  arasinzikara cane. Avuga ati ico gihe "abavyeyi bari mu mahanga, nari jenyene, kandi aho nari ngifise imyaka 17 canke 18". "Hari mw'ijoro hagati, aca atangura kurira, adahwa, ubushuhe bwiwe buraduga gushika n'aho atari agishobora kumbona. "Naragize ubwoba bwinshi cane, ntangura gukoma induru kugira ababanyi baze kumfasha. "Naciye  ndamwirukana kwa muganga, bamushiramwo umwuka wo guhumeka (oxygene), serumu, hanyumma bamukorera ibipimo." Bello avuga ko yari mu bari bafise amahirwe kuko abavyeyi biwe bashoboye kuriha amafaranga yo gushira  mushikiwe ku miti - ariko benshi ntavyo bashobora. Bello avuga ko hari abagenzi biwe n'abo bigana benshi bishwe na malaria - bamwe bakaba bapfuye batararenza n'imyaka itatu. "Novuga ko bihahamura gusubira kuvyibaza no kwibuka abantu twakuranye, benewacu n'abandi bo mu muryango wagutse, abo twigana n'abagenzi. "Abo n'abantu tuba dukunda kandi tuba twifuza kugumana, abantu ubuzima bwabo buhagarikwa n'iyo ndwara. "Abo ni abantu bashobora kuba bavuyemwo abaganga bakomeye, abahinga bakomeye mu bisata bitandukanye, abazana impinduka, indongozi zikomeye zari kuba zagize ivyo zihindura ku bijanye n'ibidukikije canke ubuzima mu kibano". "Ariko nta n'amahirwe bigeze baronka". 'Ibishobora gushika ni bibiri: urupfu canke ubukene' Bello avuga ko imiryango  myinshi  iba munsi y'umurongo w'ubukene, idashobora  kuriha amafaranga yo kuja mu bitaro kwivuza. "Ikigoye n'uko imiryango myinshi idashobora kwirinda kwandura malaria, ntishobore kuriha amafaranga yo kwivuza, y'ivyo kurya canke y'umwuka wa oxygene. Akenshi  abo bana amaherezo barapfa. "Hari ibintu bibiri bishika kubera malaria - urupfu canke ubukene. Mu gihe imiryango myinshi yategerezwa kuba iriko irashira uburyo mu bikorwa vyo kwiteza imbere canke mu mashure y'abana bayo, basohora  amafaranga mu kwivuza malaria." Nico gituma kuri Bello, urucanco rugiye kuba ikintu "gihindura umukino". "Abana benshi twakuranye ntibashobora kuriha amafaranga y'ishure, canke ngo bagure umwambaro w'ishure kandi rimwe na rimwe ntibashobora no kurya kuko amafaranga yaherera mu bitaro. "Niho rero wasanga amaherezo bamwe bahevye ishure bagaca baja mu buzima bw'amabi canke  mu buzi buhemba intica ntikize". 'Ni ngombwa ko bose babasha kururonka' Ndifanji Namacha, umuganga  akorera  muri Malawi avuga ati: "Sinzi ingene nogaragaza ingene niyumva". "Kuva tukiri abana, twari tuzi ko malaria ari indwara idashobora kwirindwa. Wakura wumva ngo abana mwigana ntibashoboye kuza kw'ishure kuko barwaye." Ndifanji avura malaria akanahimiriza abantu kumenya ibijanye n'iyo ndwara mu gihugu. "Afrika itakaza amafaranga menshi kubera malaria. "Ayo mafaranga bahora basohora kugira baje kwivuza, ubu bashobora kuyakoresha mu kwiteza imbere." Urwo rucanco rushasha rwatunganijwe na kompanyi ikora imiti yo mu Bwongereza GlaxoSmithKline, bikaba vyatanguye kugaragara ko rukora haraheze imyaka itandatu. Ndifanji avuga ati: "Ukorera mu bitaro vyo muri Malawi, na cane cane mu gihe malaria iba ikaze, urabona abavyeyi bazana abana baravye kubera malaria yabasinzikaje." "Urabona abagore bafise inda baremvye, mbere n'inda zigakoroka kubera malaria, abana bakavukana ibiro bidakwiye kubera malaria. Usanga bimeze nk'ibintu ugera aho ukamenyera." N'ubwo urwo rucanco rwemerewe gukoreshwa, Ndifanji avuga ko atazoreka kubandanya ahimiriza reta yiwe. "Dukeneye ko urwo rucanco ruba urushobora gushikirwa n'abantu bose, aho niho tuzomenya ingene abantu barwakiriye n'ingene rukora."

column2: Trump aranegura uwuserukira Ubwongereza ku butumwa bw'ibanga bwagiye ahabona
column3: Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aranegura uwuserukira Ubwongereza muri ico gihugu yavuze mu butumwa bwa email ko ubutegetsi bwiwe "ataco bushoboye". Bwana Trump avuga ati: "Jewe nokubwira ko uwuserukira Ubwongereza atakoreye igihugu ciwe neza". Ubwo butumwa bwa Sir Kim Darroch yanditse kuri email  bwavuga ko abagize ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika (Maison Blanche) kuri Trump "ataco bashoboye" kandi ko "batumvikana". Umunyamabanga ajejwe ubudandaji, Liam Fox, yabwiye BBC ko kubona ubwo butumwa bumenyekana ari "ubumenyi buke, ingeso y'ukumena amabanga y'akazi kandi ari ukudakunda igihugu". Yavuze ko uwo ari we wese yashize ahabona izo emails yari afise "intumbero mbi" y'ugusambura imigenderanire mu vyo umutekano hagati ya Amerika n'Ubwongereza. Yavuze ati: " Ndizeye ko mu gihe twomenya uwabikoze, twokoresha inguvu zose tukamushira ku murongo, bibaye ngombwa n'amategeko akajamwo". Ubunyamabanga bujejwe imigenderanire buriko burakora amatohoza kugira bumenye ingene ubwo butumwa bwashikiriye ikinyamakuru Daily Mail co mu Bwongereza ejo ku wa Mungu. Ku ruhande rwiwe, Bwana Trump yabwiye abanyamakuru i New Jersey ati: "Twebwe si ukuvuga ngo turashima cane rwose urya muntu, kandi yarakoreye nabi Ubwongereza". "Rero ndashobora kumutahura kandi ndafise n'ivyo nomuvugako, ariko ntaco bimbwiye". Muri ubwo butumwa bwari ibanga ariko bugashirwa ahabona, Sir Kim yanditse ati: "Mu vy'ukuri nta cizere dufise ko ubu butegetsi buzoshika aho buja ku murongo; bugakora neza, bugafata intumbero  nziza; ntibucanemwo; bukagira imigenderanire myiza; bukerekana ko bushoboye". Umunnyamabanga ajejwe imigenderanire y'Ubwongereza, Jeremy Hunt, avuga ko ivyo Sir Kim yanditse biri "ku gatwe kiwe", atari kubw'ubutegetsi bw'Ubwongereza. Bwana Hunt asanzwe ariko ahiganirwa kuba umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, avuga ko cari igikorwa ca ambasaderi gutanga "ivyiyumviro vyiwe", ariko ko bitavuga ko ari ho leta ihagaze. Avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Bwana Trump "budakomeye gusa, ahubwo ko ari incuti ya mbere y'Ubwongereza kw'isi".

column2: Burundi: BRB yugaye amashirahamwe agurisha amafaranga
column3: Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yaraye ifashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro yari asanzwe yemewe. Mwitangazo ryasohowe n'umukuru w'iyo banki, Ciza Jean, avuga ko iyo ngingo izotangura kuja mu ngiro mu ndwi iza, igenekerezo rya 15 z'uku kwa kabiri. Yagiriza ayo mashirahamwe ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyo ngo bikaba vyaragize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu. Mu kwezi kw'icenda umwaka uheze, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Muri iryo tangazo, Bwana Ciza ategeka abafise amazu yo kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga y'agaciro gukuraho vuba na bwango ivyapa n'ibindi bimenyetso biyaranga. Amenyesha ko kuva ubu, amazu yemerewe kugura n'ukugurisha amafaranga mvamakungu ari ayegukira amabanki. Mu rwandiko rwasohowe ku wa 15 z'ukw'icenda umwaka uheze wa 2019, buri shirahamwe ryategerezwa kuvunja amafaranga ryisunze igiciro cashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu "ritarengeje inyungu y'ibice 15%". Iyo ngingo isa n'iyagoranye gushira mu ngiro, ari co catumye mu kwezi kwa 11 umwaka uheze, BRB isohora itangazo, aho yagabisha ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Abanganga bateye ifyigo ry'ingurube ku muntu umubiri wiwe ntiwaryanka
column3: Abanganga babaga muri Amerika bavuga ko bashoboye guha ifyigo ry'ingurube umuntu mu gikorwa gikomeye co gutera umuntu ingingo zikomotse ahandi bizigiye ko kizofasha gutorera inyishu ubukene bw'ingingo zikekenewe na benshi. Uwo yatewe iryo fyigo ubwonko bwiwe bwari bwamaze gupfa, bisigura ko bifashisha imashini zo kugumiza ibice bimwe kubandanya ari bizima ariko ata mahirwe y'uko umuntu wese yari gusubira kuba muzima. Iryo fyigo ryavuye mu ngurube yahinduriwe bimwe muri kamere kayo (génétiquement modifié/genetically modified) kugira babuze ko "rimenyekana nk'irinyamahanga" hanyuma ngo umubiri uryanke. Ico gikorwa ntikirihwezwa n'abandi baganga canke ngo gisohoke ku mugaragaro ariko bitegekanijwe ko ivyo bikorwa. Abahinga bavuga ko ariryo gerageza rya mbere riteye imbere cane muri ico gisata gushika ubu. Ibipimo nk'ivyo vyari bimaze gukorwa ku bikoko bitari abantu, ariko gushika ubu nta muntu yari bwageragerezweko. Ariko gukoresha  ingingo zivuye ku ngurube si icuyumviro gishasha. Uduce tw'umutima twitwa valves dusanzwe dukoreshwa cane ku bantu. Kandi ingingo z'ingurube zirahura neza cane n'izo abantu ku vyerekeye ubunini. Ico gikorwa co kubaga camaze amasaha abiri n'inusu mu kigo c'ubuvuzi ca kaminuza ya New York University Langone. Abo baganga bafatanije iryo fyigo ry'ingurube n'inzira z'amaraso z'uwo muntu yari yamaze gupfa ubwonko kugira barabe ko ryokora hamwe boritera umuntu canke ko umubiri woryanka. Ku minsi ibiri n'igice ikurikira baciye bakurikiranira hafi iryo fyigo, basuzuma cane banakora ibipimo vyinshi. Umushakashatsi yari arongoye abandi Dr Robert Montgomery yabwiye BBC ati: "Twabonye ifyigo ahanini ryakoze nk'ifyigo ryatewe rivuye mu wundi muntu, ivyo vyagaragaye nk'ibihuye co kimwe n'uko vyagenze no ku bindi vyose vyokorwa n'ifyigo ry'umuntu risanzwe. "Ryarakoze uko bisanzwe, kandi ntavyabonetse ko umubiri waryanka". Abo baganga babaga bateye kandi agace k'iyindi ngingo y'ingurube yitwa glande thymus hamwe n'iryo fyigo. Bibaza ko iyo ngingo ishobora gufasha guhagarika ko umubiri w'umuntu amaherezo wokwanka iryo fyigo mu gukukumba uturemangingo two kwigwanira twoba twagiye ku ruhande ubundi  dushobora kurwanya iyo ngingo ivuye ku ngurube. Umuntu nawe asanzwe yaratewe uwundi mutima, Dr Montgomery avuga ko hakenewe vyihuta ko haboneka uburyo bwo kurondera ingingo zo guha abantu bari ku rutonde rwo kurindira kuzironka, n'ubwo yemera ko igikorwa ciwe kidahurizwako. "Ic'uko nk'uko vyamye kuva kera hari uwubanza gupfa kugira uwundi muntu abeho ntikizokwigera gitanga inyishu ikwiye. "Nta nkeka ko numva impungenge, kandi ico novuga ni uko gushika ubu 40% abantu barindiriye guterwa ingingo bapfa batarazironka. "Ingurube turazirya, turakoresha ingurube mu buvuzi - ku duce tw'umutima bita valve, ku miti. Nibaza ko no kuri ivyo bidatandukanye cane." Yavuze ko ubushakashatsi bukiri mu ntango ko rero hakenewe gukorwa ibindi vyigwa vyinshi, ariko yongerako ati: "Biduha, uko ndavyibaza, icizere ko ata kibazo mu minsi tubijanye  mu bitaro". Umuryango w'uwo yagiriweko ibipimo, yari asanzwe yarifuje ko yotanga ingingo, waratanze uruhusha rw'uko abo baganga bakora ico gikorwa. Urwego rwa Amerika rugenzura bene ivyo bikorwa FDA narwo rwaremeye ko hakoreshwa ingingo y'ingurube yahinduriwe kamere  mu  bushakashatsi nk'ubwo. Dr Montgomery yizeye ko mu myaka cumi,  izindi ngingo z'ingurube - imitima, amahaha n'ibitigu (imyijima) - bishobora kuzohabwa abantu bakeneye  guterwa ingingo. Dr Maryam Khosravi, umuganga w'amafyigo no gukurikirana abantu bategerezwa kwitabwo cane mu bitaro (intensive care) akorera urwego ruvuza abantru mu Bwongereza, NHS, avuga ati: "Gutera abantu ingingo z'ibikoko n'ibintu tumaze imyaka myinshi twiga, kandi ni vyiza kubona abo bantu bateye iyindi ntambwe imbere muri iyo nzira." Ariko ku karangumutima k'ibirekurwa n'umwugwa gukorwa avuga ati: " Kuba twobishobora ntibisigura ko dutegerezwa kubikora. Nibaza ko umuryango w'abakora muri ico gisata ariwo utegerezwa kwishura ivyo bibazo." Umuvugizi w'igisata c'amaraso n'ugutera ingingo zivuye ahandi, avuga ko gutanga ingingo zivuye ku bandi bantu arivyo bishirwa imbere gushika ubu. "Haracari inzira ndende imbere y'uko ingingo bene izo zija mu buzima bwa minsi yose. "Mu gihe abashakashatsi n'abavura tubandanya dukora ibishoboka vyose kugira twongereze amahirwe y'abarwayi bakeneye kuronka ingingo, turacakeneye ko umwe umwe wese mu batanga ingingo afata icemezo co kubikora hanyuma akamenyesha umuryango wiwe ico yifuza ko coba hamwe ibihe vyo gutanga ingingo vyoshoboka."

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Magufuli yirukanye umukozi wa leta yatabuye Ikorowani
column3: Perezida John  Magufuli wa Tanzania amenyesha ko yirukanye burundu mu kazi umukozi wa leta yatabuye igitabo ceranda c'Ikorowani, maze akwiragiza isanamu ku mbuga hwaniro ariko arayitabura. Yatangaje iyo ngingo uno munsi mu gihe yari mu birori vyo kwugurura ibiro vy'akarere ka Kigamboni mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. Ati: "Nyakwubahwa Jafo, hirya y'ejo niho numva, ko hari umuntu hariya i Kilosa yatabuye igitabo ceranda". "Ndagushimiye cane kubona warafashe ingingo yo kuba uramuhagarika, ariko jeho ndamwirukanye burundu. Mwandikire ikete ko yirukanywe burundu". "Atsinda urubanza canke atsindwa, uyo ntakiri umukozi wa leta, ntidushobora kubandanya dukorana n'abakozi b'ibijuju nk'abo muri ino leta". Mu ndwi iheze, umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutegetsi bw'intara n'amakomine, Selemani Jafo, yategetse ko umukozi w'ibiro vy'akarere ka Kilosa mu ntara ya Morogoro, Daniel Elimringi, ahagarikwa, ku caha co gutabura igitabu c'idini rya Isilamu, Ikorowani. Jafo ati: "Ni ukuri, iki kintu cakozwe n'umukozi nk'uyu nta ciza kizanira igihugu cacu kubera abanyagihugu bacu mu madini yose basanzwe babanye mu mahoro kandi bubahana mu butandukane". Iyo ngingo ya Jafo yafashwe inyuma y'aho isanamu yerekana uyo mukozi wa leta mu gisata c'ubudandaji mu biro vy'akarere ka Kilosa ariko aratabagura ico gitabo, ikwiragijwe ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye. Ikinyamakuru Mtanzania co muri ico gihugu kimenyesha ko uyo mukozi yamaze kurengutswa muri sentare, kandi ko yankiwe kuburana yidegemvya. Ico kinyamakuru gitangaza ko urwo rubanza ruzosubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 20 z'uku kwa kabiri.

column2: Imvo n'imvano: Amateka y'umupira w'amaboko, Volley Ball na Basket Ball mu Rwanda
column3: Amateka y'umupira w'amaboko, Volley Ball na Basket Ball mu Rwanda mu ruhererekane rw'ibiganiro bine twabateguriye turi i Paris, muri Studio za Radio France.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Kante, Ziyech, De Vrij, Ronaldo, Min-jae, Berge, Smalling
column3: Barcelona irashobora guheraheza amasezerano yo kugura umufaransa akina hagati  N'Golo Kante, mu kwa mbere, ariko bikazovana n'ingene imvune yiwe yo mw'itako izoba imeze, amasezerano afitaniye na  Chelsea akaba azorangira mu ci riza. (Sport) AC Milan ishobora guhagarika urugamba rwayo rwo kurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa  Chelsea, Hakim Ziyech w'imyaka  29, kubera ivyo uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Maroc asaba, ariko uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano ukaba ucipfuza umusatirizi wa Albania Armando Broja w'imyaka 21 na we nyene akina muri aba ba Blues. (Gazzetta Dello Sport, via Football Italia) Tottenham ishobora kuraba ingene yogura umukinyi w'inyuma, umunya-Hollande  Stefan de Vrij w'imyaka 30 akina muri Inter Milan mu kwa mbere.  Atletico Madrid nayo nyene iripfuza uyu mukinyi azoba yirebanga mu ci riza. (Football Insider) Umumenyereza wa Manchester United  Erik ten Hag yari yashatse guha uruhusha umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo akigira mu kwa munani guheze ariko imirwi itari mike yaranse ayo mahirwe yo kugura uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 37 ubu yasezeye muri uyo murwi wa Old Trafford, ku mushahara wa 80.000 vy'amapawundi ku ndwi. (Athletic) Manchester United yasubiye kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Naples/Napoli Kim Min-jae ariko rero iriko imurwanira na Real Madrid, amasezerano y'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 26 akomoka muri Korea y'Epfo akaba arimwo ingingo ivuga ko umurwi umushaka utegerezwa gutanga imiriyoni 38 z'amapawundi. (Sunday Mirror) Tottenham, Juventus, Inter Milan na  Atletico Madrid yose iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati akina muri  Brighton, umunya-Argentina Alexis Mac Allister w'imyaka 23. (Fichajes) Arsenal na Chelsea yompi yari yipfuje kugura mu mwaka uheze umusatirizi wa Côte d'Ivoire  Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 30 asanzwe akinira  Crystal Palace. (Teamtalk) Newcastle ni wo murwi ufise amahirwe menshi yo kugura umukinyi w'inyuma akina muri Inter Milan, umunya Slovakia  Milan Skriniar w'imyaka 27. (Calciomercato) Chelsea na Liverpool yompi iripfuza umukinyi w'umunya-Norvège  akina hagati, Sander Berge, 24, akina muri  Sheffield United wo mu cicaro ca kabiri. (Jeunesfooteux). Juventus yahambije Inter Milan mu gukurikiranira hagufi  umwongereza akina inyuma  Chris Smalling w'imyaka 33, akaba ashobora kwirebanga mu ci riza mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye na Roma azoba arangiye, mu gihe yokwanka amasezerano mashasha canke akanka kwongereza ayo afitaniye n'uyu murwi w'Ubutaliyano.  (Sky Sports Italia ) Umunya-Portugal akina inyuma ku ruhande rw'ibubamfu Raphael Guerreiro w'imyaka 28, asa n'uwushobora kuva muri  Borussia Dortmund mu ci riza. (Ruhr Nachrichten) Sevilla iripfuza umukinyi wo hagati wa Angers  Azzedine Ounahi w'imyaka 22 ariko yitwara neza mu murwi nserukira gihugu wa Maroc muri rino higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi yose 2022. (Fichajes ) Borussia Dortmund ntishaka kugurisha umubirigi akina ku ruhande rw'i buryo inyuma, Thomas Meunier, mu kwa mbere, ni mu gihe Barcelona yipfuza uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 31. (Sport ) Umukuru wa Bayer Leverkusen  Simon Rolfes avuga ko uyu murwi "ata bwoba na buke ufise" ku bijanye na kazoza k'umukinyi wayo w'inyuma, umunya-Hollande  Jeremie Frimpong w'imyaka 22,  asanzwe yipfuzwa na  Manchester United, ni mu gihe amasezerano afitaniye n'uyu murwi azorangira mu 2025. (Sky Deutschland iciye kuri Manchester Evening News)

column2: Lionel Messi yaraye anganije na Pele ku gitsindo ca 643 atsindiye muri Barcelona
column3: Lionel Messi yaraye yinjije igitsindo catumye anganya n'uwahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa wa Brezili Pele ku bitsindo 643 mu murwi umwe gusa, igitsindo yinjirije Barcelona ejo ku wa gatandatu mu rukino rwarangiye uyu murwi unganya na Valencia ku bitsindo 2-2. Uyu musatirizi wa Argentine w'imyaka 33 yashitse kuri iyi ntambwe ku gitsindo yinjije n'umutwe imbere y'uko igice ca mbere kirangira, haciye akanya isase umunyegori Jaume Domenech wa Valencia akuyemwo penalty yiwe. Messi yinjije igitsindo ciwe ca mbere muri Barcelona mu mwaka wa 2005 igihe uyu murwi wariko ukina na Albacete. Pele yinjirije umurwi wa Brezili Santos ibitsindo 643 mu myaka y'inkino 19  hagati ya 1956 na 1974. Ariko rero ikibabaje kuri Messi, uwu munezero wari uvanze n'umubabaro kuko Barcelona yananiwe no gutsinda uyu murwi bari bahanganye. Ibi vyatumye uyu murwi umaze gutsindira ihiganwa rya Espagne La Liga incuro 26 zose urangiza urukino uri mu kibanza ca gatanu, ukaba uri inyuma ku manota umunani yose usumbwa na Atletico Madrid uri mu kibanza ca mbere, inyuma yo kwirahira Elche ku bitsindio 3-1. Umukeba wayo ruhebwa Real Madrid ari nayo ifise igikombe c'iri higanwa, isumvya Barcelona amanota atanu, ariko ikaba yiteze guhura na Eibar kuri uyu wa Mungu. Barcelona yabanje gukorwa mu maso ku munota wa 29 igihe umukinyi w'inyuma Mouctar Diakhaby abaciriye mu ryahumye akinjiriza Valencia igitsindo ca mbere ku mupira wari uterewe mu mfuruka z'ilkibuga. Valencia yabandanije ikingira urugo rwayo gushika mu minota yanyuma y'igice ca mbere aho Barca ironkeye penalty bigaragaye ko umukinyi Jose Gaya yasunitse Antoine Griezmann muri ca gice ca mukore umbone. Hagati aho, vyabaye ngombwa ko umuhagarikizi Alejandro Hernandez yifashisha bwa buhinga bwa videwo imbere y'uko yemeza ko koko habaye ikosa, maze Messi aca aja gutera uwu mupira wari kumwandikishiriza amateka. Ibi ntivyabaye muri ako kanya kuko umunyegori Domenech yari yahumaganye, akurayo iyo penalty. vyabaye ngombwa ko Messi arindira amasegonda makeya kugira ngo ashikie ku ntego yiwe, mu kwinjiza iki gitsindo mu minota imbere y'uko ifirimbi yo kurangiza igice ca mbere ivuga. Barcelona yariyongeye ica kabiri mu gice ca kabiri nyene, ku munota wa 52,cinjijwe ku buhinga bukomeye n'umukinyi wa Uruguay Ronald Araujo. Aba bakinyi ba Ronald Koeman babandanije basatira bikomeye kugira ngo barabe ko bokwiyambura Valencia, ariko rero ibintu vyagiye kwononekara ku mupira w'umuvuduko (contre-attaque) wa Valencia, watumye Maximiliano Gomez Gonzalez yinjiza igitsindo ca kabiri, ku munota wa 69,  gutyo baba baranganije 2-2, urukino rurinda rurangira ari uko.

column2: Sudan y'Epfo:''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju''
column3: Umu Karidinari ari mu kiruhuko c'izabukuru muri Ekleziya Katorika yaneguye ubushobozi bwa bamwe mu ndongozi za Ekleziya muri Sudan y'Epfo. Kardinari   Gabriel Zubeir Wako yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Khartoum yavuze ati: ''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju mw'isengero'', aho hari mu rugendo yagize mu gisagara ca Wau kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero. Yavuze kuri uyu wa mungu ati: ''Mu minsi maze ngaha i Wau, hariho abapatiri twabonanye ndumva ko benshi batazi indinganizo n'inyigisho zo mw'isengero,  bigisha ibintu bidafashe. Bakeneye gusumvya aho bageza ubu ". Uwo mu karidinari azokwiza imyaka 80 y'amavuko mu kwezi kuza, , arubashwe kandi arazwi cane mu kuba yarashigikiye amashure. Yaratewe iteka na reta ya Sudan y'Epfo mu 2016 kubera uruhara rwiwe mu gushigikira indero y'abana bangana na miriyoni zibiri bari barateshejwe izabo n'intanbara muri Sudan y'Epfo. Yaranarungitse abapitiri kubandanya ivyigwa i Roma no muri Kenya , kugira bace impamyabushobozi za masters na doctorat. Mu bo yarungitse kubandanya ivyigwa harimwo uwamusubuiriye Musenyeri Mukuru Dr Michael Didi, ubu arongoye diyosezi ya Khartoum , n'uwurongoye diyosezi nkuru ya Juba, Dr Stephen Ameyu.

column2: Gukingira ibikorwa mva-bwenge mu Burundi bigeze hehe?
column3: Itariki 26 ukwezi kwa kane ni umunsi ngaruka-mwaka uzwi nka World Intellectual Property Day, canke umunsi wo kuzirikana "ibikorwa mva-bwenge". Ni umunsi ushishikariza inyungu ziva ku bikorwa bishingiye ku bwenge  birimo ubugeni, ubuvanganzo, ubusizi, birimo na muzika. Ikigaragara ni uko, mu bihugu vyinshi bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere, bene abo banyabwenge batabona inyungu z'ibikorwa vyabo n'ubwo hari amategeko abarengera. Akarorero ni  mu Burundi, aho kiretse kugira amategeko, banafise ikigo cashinzwe na leta, OBDA (Office Burundais des droits d'auteurs) co gufasha gutoza utwo turusho. Impamvu ituma ayo mategeko atubahirizwa n'izihe? Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Francis Muhire, umwe mu bafise ibikorwa mva-bwenge, yanakurikiranye n'ivyirwa vy'amategeko ajanye no gukingira ibikorwa nk'ivyo. Yatanguye kumubaza nimba abafise ivyo bikorwa mva-bwenge bumva ko bakingiwe n'ayo mategeko (umva ico kiganiro aho hejuru). Woraba kandi n'ibi:

column2: Tanzania: Prezida Samia Suluhu yemeje ko hariho igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona
column3: Prezida wa Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan yemeje ko  hari ibimenyetso vy'igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona muri  ico gihugu. Avugira mu gisagara ca Dar Es Salaam mu nama yagiranye n'abagize inama y'abasenyeri ba Katolika muri Tanzania (TEC), prezida Samia yavuze ko hari ibimenyetso hagati mu gihugu ko ico kiza kiriho. Yagize ati:"Nk'uko tubizi ubu kw'isi yose yariho igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona, twavuye mu gihuhusi ca mbere muri Tanzania cagiye kirahera buke buke, tuja mu ca kabiri, ubu naho twinjije mu gihuhusi ca gatatu." Prezida Samia yavuze 'ibimenyetso hagati mu gihugu vyatanguye kwibonekeza, tuza dufise abagwayi bamaze guhura n'iki gihuhusi ca gatatu'. Yasubiye kwibutsa urugendo yagize ku bitaro vya Mwananyamala mu gisagara ca Dar es Salaam. "Nimwaba mwibuka umusi nagendera ibitaro vya Mwananyamala, hari icumba umuganga yanyinjijemwo ambwira ko harimwo abagayi bafise ingorane yo guhema, ndamubwira nti dudurirako, ni Covid? "Aca ambwira ati ego ni Covid, mu gihe abafata amasanamu bari bamaze kwinjira, nca ndabahamagara nti nimuveyo n'ingoga." Uretse kuvuga ko hari igihuhusi ca gatatu ca Corona, prezida Samia, yasavye ko hoba ukwiyubara kuri ico kiza candukira cane ca corona.

column2: Burundi: Abantu ijana bashasha batowe umugera wa Covid-19
column3: Abantu ijana bashasha batowe umugera w'indwara ya Covid-19 nk'uko bitangazwa n'umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe  amagara y'abantu, mu gihe uyu munsi ariho hatangura ingingo yo kwugara imbibe zo hasi z'Uburundi mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'uwo mugera. Mu kiringo kidakwiye n'indwi, babaye abantu 140 batowe uwo mugera hari haheze amezi abiri ata muntu avuzwe ko yanduye mu gihugu hagati. Ku wa gatatu uheze , ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwari bwatangaje ko mu minsi ibiri gusa bwatoye abantu 40 banduye uwo mugera mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe amagara y'abantu  Thadee Ndikumana yanditse kuri twitter ati : ''kwandura coronavirus birahumaganye mu Burundi''. Amenyesha ko abo bantu ijana bashasha banduye batowe mu bantu 5300 bapimwe kuko hari aho bahuriye n'abo 40 bari batowe mu bipimo vyo kw'itariki 4 na 5 z'ukwezi kwa mbere. Abantu ijana babaye igitigiri  ca mbere kinini gisahsha c'abantu batorewe uwo mugera icarimwe  kuva utangura kuvugwa mu gihugu  mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu mwaka uheze. Uyu munsi niho hatangura kuja mu ngiro ingingo yo  kwugara imbibe zo hasi no mu mazi. Uretse  ibidandazwa,  abashobora kwinjira mu Burundi bakaba ari abagenda n'indege gusa. Nabo nyene bashika bashirwa ukwa bonyene mu mahoteri  iminsi indwi bagapimwa coronavirus bagishika bagasubira ku munsi ugira gatandatu. Hanatangujwe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura isekeza ry'iminsi 30 ryo gupima uwubishaka wese mu gihe yiyumviseko  ibimenyetso vy'indwara ya Covid-19. Uburundi buri hafi yo gushika abantu igihumbi -barenga 980 bamaze kwandura coronavirus na babiri bamaze kwicwa n'iyo ndwara hakurikijwe ibiharuro vy'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara y'abantu.

column2: Burundi: Leta ikemura gute ikibazo c'ikena ry'amahera y'agaciro?
column3: Leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata ingingo mu gisata c'ubutunzi n'urudandazwa benshi bavuga ko zigamije kugerageza kubungabunga amahera y'agaciro ari muri ico gihugu. Muri urwo rwego, Banki ya Republika y'u Burundi iherutse gufata itegeko riraba abinjirana amafaranga muri ico gihugu, harimwo n'abanyamahanga. Iryo tegeko ribabwiriza gukoresha amafranga y'amarundi mu kugura ibintu vyose imbere mu gihugu. Baterezwa kandi  kuvunjisha mu bigo vyemewe n'amategeko amafranga y'agaciro baba bafise, bashaka kuyakoresha. Iyo ngingo yakurikiranye n'iyindi igenga ukudandaza ubutare n'ayandi mabuye y'agaciro muri banki y'igihugu. Ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafatanga y'agaciro mu Burundi bivugwa ko coba kiva ahanini ku bihano u Burundi bwafatiwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya, ryahagaritse amahera ryaha ico gihugu kuva mu 2015 igihe hatangura ingorane za politike. Mu gushaka kumenya vyinshi kuri izo ngingo leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata, Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Faustin Ndikumana, umuhinga mu vy'ubutunzi. Ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro ngaha

column2: Umuyobozi wa Bujumbura agabisha ko CHOLERA yateye igisagara ca Bujumbura
column3: Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura, Freddy Mbonimpa, aragabisha ababa muri ico gisagara ko indwara ya CHOLERA yamaze kubashikamwo. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 05 z'ukwa munani, Bwana Mbonimpa amenyesha ko abantu 126 bamaze kwandura iyo ndwara. Avuga ati: "Gushika ubu ama zone abangamiwe kurusha ayandi ni KANYOSHA, BUYENZI, BUTERERE, na CIBITOKE". CHOLERA yandukira mu kunywa amazi canke gufata imfungurwa zandujwe n'amazirantoke arimwo imigera yayo. Bwana Mbonimpa agabisha ko "hari ibibanza bikoraniramwo abantu benshi bitubahiriza isuku, nk'amazu y'uburiro n'ubunywero ...". Avuga ko ku munsi ku munsi "hibonekeza abarwayi  bashasha bane canke batanu". Umukuru w'igisagara atangaza ingingo zafashwe mu ntumbero y'uguhangana n'iyo ndwara. Muzi izo ngingo harimwo guhagarika: "Ubunywero n'uburiro bikorera mu masoko, mu ma parking y'imiduga, iruhande y'amabarabara canke ku miserege y'amazi". Meri ya Bujumbura kandi yahagaritse "uruja n'uruza rw'amasorori arimwo imfungurwa, urudandazwa rw'abatembereza amazi yo kunywa ari mu ma sachets, imitobe n'izindi mfungurwa ku ma parking n'ibindi bibanza vy'ihuriro". Meri kandi yabujije kuvoma no gukoresha amazi y'inzuzi canke y'imiserege. Freddy Mbonimpa asaba ko ahantu hose hugawe hatokwugururwa abajejwe intwaro n'amagara y'abantu batabonye ko hakwije ibisabwa  mu vyo isuku. CHOLERA ni indwara yandukira cane kandi yica ningoga mu gihe umurwayi atavuwe hakiri kare.

column2: Kenya: abatemera Imana basaba ko amasengesho mu mashure avanwaho
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'abahakanyi muri Kenya ryandikiye umushikiranganji w'indero w'iki gihugu rimusaba kubuza ivyo gusenga mu mashure ya reta imbere y'uko ibibazo vya reta bitangura. Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko guhatira abanyeshure gusenga ari uguhonyanga agateka kabo. Amashure ya reta muri Kenya afise umugenzo wo gutegura amasengesho imbere y'uko abanyeshure batangura ibibazo vya reta. Muri ino ndwi, amashure yateye akamo abavyeyi ko bokwifatanya nayo muri ano masengesho  yamaze kuba nk'umugenzo kugira ngo abana babo bitegurire neza ibibazo. Muri uru rwandiko, havuga ngo: "Abanyagihugu ba Kenya benshi bari muri ano mashure ya reta aho ivy'amasengesho ari itegeko". Iri shirahamwe rivuga ko abana bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bo nyene bwo kwifatira ingingo ku bijanye n'idini.

column2: Ethiopia: Igisirikare cishe abantu 40 inyuma y'igitero cahitanye hafi 100
column3: Igisirikare ca Ethiopia cishe abantu barenga 40 bakekwa kugira uruhara mu bwicanyi bw'abantu hafi ijana, harimwo abana, mu karere ka Benishangul-Gumuz, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vya reta. Izo nkuru zongerako ko abategetsi b'ubu n'abakera batanu na bo nyene bafashwe bagirizwa ubwo bwicanyi. Abateye baturiye amazu y'abantu baryamye mu bigwati, barabarasa bongera barabacumita mu gitero cabaye ku musi wa gatatu. Ico gitero cabaye inyuma y'umusi umwe umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed agendeye ako karere. Ntiharamenyekana abateye abo ari bo, ariko bigaragara ko batumbereye abo mu bwoko bw'inkehwa bafatwa "nk'abakoloni" muri ako karere, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Amnesty International. Muri iyi myaka ya vuba, muri Ethiopia hongerekanye imishamirano muri politike, mu moko hamwe no mu madini. Mu 2018, ico gihugu cari gifise igitigiri kinini c'abantu bahungiye hagati mu gihugu muri Africa - hafi umuliyoni 1.8. Amatati yagiye kwongerekana bivuye ku migwi isaba kwongererezwa amatongo n'ivyicaro, ari na ko banagerageza kwirukana abantu bafata ko atari imvukira. Abiy avuga ko ubwo bw'icanyi ari nk'akaga, kandi ko reta yarungitse igisirikare muri ako gace gufasha gutora inyishu y'iyo ntambara. Ibinyamakuru vya reta ntibivuga abo bantu 42 biciwe mu bikorwa vya gisirikare kiriko kirahiga abari bateye, abo ari bo. Inkuru zivuga ko ibigwanisho, harimwo imiheto n'imyampi vyafashwe. Icegera c'umushikiranganji wa reta ari mu bantu batanu bafashwe bafitaniye isano n'ubwo bwicanyi, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vya reta. Ariko, ntiharamenyekana neza na neza ico bagirizwa.

column2: Coronavirus: Umuti wa Remdesivir wariko urageragezwa kuyivura warananiwe
column3: Igerageza rya mbere ry'umuti wari wizewe ko ushobora kuvura coronavirus rivugwa ko ataco ryatanze. Hari icizere c'uko umuti remdesivir wari gushobora kuvura Covid-19. Ariko igerageza ryabereye mu Bushinwa ryerekana ko uwo muti ataco washitseko, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icegeranyo caciye mu ryahumye umuryango ujejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko uwo muti utashoboye no gutanga ka mitende kubarwayi canke ngo ubure ugabanye n'umugera mu maraso. Ihinguriro ryo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ryakoze uwo muti,  Gilead Sciences, rivuga ko iryo geragezwa ryafashwe ukurati ko. Amakuru y'uko iryo gerageza ataco ryashitseko yagiye kumenyekana inyuma y'aho OMS yerekaniye ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwayo icegeranyo c'ivyavuye muri iryo gerageza, ariko mu nyuma ikaza kugikurako. OMS ibandanya ivuga ko habaye ukwihenda mu gushira ahabona ico cegeranyo. Ico cegeranyo cerekana ko iryo geragezwa ryakorewe ku barwayi 237, aho abashika 158 bahawe uwo muti kugira ngo barabe ko hari igihinduka bagereranije n'abandi 79 bobo bahawe iyindi yo gupfupfahaza. Inyuma y'ukwezi, ibice 13.9% vy'abarwaye bahawe uwo muti barapfuye, mu gihe ibice 12.8% vya bamwe bahabwa imiti yo gupfupfahaza aribo bapfuye. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "remdesivir nta kintu yamariye abawufashe, haba mu kubavura canke mu kugabanya ubukari". Gilead iriyamiriza ico cegeranyo ca OMS. Umwe mu bavugizi ba Gilead avuga ati: "Twibaza ko inkuru yatanzwe yarimwo ibintu bitari vyo ku vyerekeye iryo gerageza". Yongera ko y'uko iryo gerageza ryahagaritswe haciye akanya gato kubera atari benshi baryitabiriye, vyumvikana ko ibitigiri bitari bikwiye. Ati: "Ikiboneka ni uko iryo gerageza ritarangiye, kuko ibiharuro vyerekana ko remdisivir ishobora kugira akarusho, cane cane mu gihe abarwaye bivujije hakiri kare". Hagati aho, si ukuvuga ko ivy'uwo muti birangiriye aha, kuko ibikorwa vyo kuwugerageza bibandanya mu minsi iri imbere bikazoshobora kwerekana neza isanamu nyayo ku vyerekeye ikoreshwa ryawo.

column2: US: Bane bapfuye mu migumuko y'abashigikiye Trump ku ngoro ya Capitol
column3: Abantu bane bapfuye mu myiyerekano y'abashigikiye Perezida Donald Trump batera ingoro y'inama nshingamateka, Capitol. Umugore umwe yarashwe n'abapolisi, abandi bantu batatu bapfuye kubera kutaronswa "ubutabazi bwihutirwa". Uyo mugore yarashwe ibinyamakuru muri Amerika bivuga ko yahoze ari mu ngabo za US Air Force, akaba yari mu bantu bari imbere binjira ku nguvu mu cumba abashingamateka bateraniramwo. Abandi bapfuye bivugwa ko ari abagabo babiri n'umugore umwe. Igipolisi kivuga ko capfunze abantu 52  - muri bo 47 bazize kurenga ku mategeko y'umukwabu. Vyabaye ngombwa ko inama rusangi y'abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka ibanza guhagarara inyuma y'aho abashigikiye Perezida Trump batereye ingoro y'inama nshingamateka. Igiporisi gikorera kuri Capitol cabujije uruja n'uruza ico gihe maze gisaba abari mu ngoro bose "kwinyegeza". Imbere y'uko ibi biba, Perezida Donald Trump yari yashikirije ijambo hanze y'ibiro vyiwe maze abatera intege ngo babandanye imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivyavuye mu matora.

column2: Kuba wararwaye Covid-19 bishobora gutanga 'amezi y'ubudahangarwa'
column3: Benshi mu bantu barwaye Covid-19 baba bakingiwe gusubira kuyandura mu kiringo nibura c'amezi atanu, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa cakozwe na Public Health England. Kuba warigeze kuyirwara bituma ugira amahirwe ashika kuri 83% yo kudasubira kuyandura, ugereranije n'ababa batarigera bayirwara, nk'uko abahinga babitoye. Ariko baragabisha ko abantu basubira kwandura Covid-19 kandi bakanduza abandi. Abategetsi rero bahimiriza abantu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kuguma mu ngo zabo-baba barigeze canke batigeze bandura uwo mugera. 'Rokora ubuzima' Umwigisha wa kaminuza Susan Hopkins, yari arongoye ico cigwa, avuga ko ivyavuyemwo bitera intege, avuga ko ubudahangarwa bumara igihe kirekire gusumba uko abantu bavyibaza, ariko agashimangira ko kwikingira arico gikomeye gusumba. Avuga ko vyateye umutima uhagaze kubona abasubiye kwandura babasangamwo urugero runini cane rw'uwo mugera, n'iyo boba ata bimenyetso berekana, kandi bakaba bashobora kwanduza abandi. Avuga ati: "Ibi bisigura ko naho woba wibaza ko wamaze kurwara iyo ndwara none ukaba ukingiwe, umenye ko ufise amahirwe menshi yo kudasubira kurwara cane ariko biguma bishoboka ko wandura kandi ukanduza". Ati :"Ubu gusumba na mbere, birakenewe cane ko tuguma i muhira kugira dukingire igisata cacu c'amagara y'abantu twongere turokore ubuzima." Kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu gushika mu kwa cumi na rimwe mu 2020, hafi abantu ibihumbi 21.000 bakora kwa muganga mu Bwongereza bwose baragiye barapimwa kugira basuzumwe ko; Mu batasanganywe abasirikare b'umubiri bo kurwanya uwo mugera, bisigura ko atawo bigeze bandura, 318 barawanduye muri ico kiringo nk'uko ibipimo vyavyerekanye. Ariko ku bantu 6.614 bari bafise abasirikare mu mubiri, ico gitigiri cabaye  44 gusa. 'Amahirwe y'igihe kirekire' Abahinga bazokomeza gukurikirana abakozi bo kwa muganga mu kiringo c'amezi 12 kugira barabe igihe ubudahangarwa bushobora kumara. Bazokurikiranira hafi kandi abanduye ubwoko bushasha bwa corona-kuko butari bwakwiragire cane igihe iki cigwa cakorwa-bongere barabe ubudahangarwa bw'abahawe urukingo. Muganga Julian Tang, umuhinga w'imigera kuri  kaminuza ya Leicester, avuga ko ivyo batoye muri iki cigwa bihumuriza abakozi bo kwa muganga. Yongeye ati: "Guhabwa urukingo imyuma yo gukira Covid-19 nta kibazo...kandi bishobra kwongereza ubudahangarwa umuntu asanganywe. "Turabibona no ku rukingo rw'igihe ku bicurane. "Twizigiye ko ibiri muri iki cigwa bizogabanya amakenga ya bagenzanje b'abakozi bo kwa muganga bafise ubwoba bwo kandura Covid-19 ubugira kabiri."

column2: Mesut Ozil na Sead Kolasinac ntibazokina igihe Newcastle yizoba akira Arsenal kubera ikibazo c’umutekano
column3: Mesut Ozil na Sead Kolasinac ntibari ku rutonde rw'abakinyi ba Arsenal bazoja guhura na Newcastle ejo ku munsi wa Mungu kubera "ibibazo vy'umutekano wabo". Abo bakinyi bompi baherutse guterwa n'akarwi nk'inkozi z'ikibi zahatswe kunyuruza amamodoka yabo, mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, mu buraruko bw'igisagara ca Londres. Arsenal ivuga ko yashikirije igipolisi ico kibazo kandi "ko ibandanya ifata mu mugongo abo bakinyi n'imiryango yabo". Iti: "Umutekano w'abakinyi n'imiryango yabo, nico gikorwa kiza imbere ya vyose". "Twafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho tuvuganiye nabo hamwe n'ababaserukira". "Twibaza ko vuba bwango tuzoba turi kumwe nabo mu murwi". Igipolisi kivuga ko kiriko kirakora amatohoza ku vyabaye. Mw'itangazo casohoye, kivuga ko kiriko "kivugana na Arsenal kandi ko kizokora amatohoza ku bukozi bw'ikibi bwose bwashikirijwe". Hampande y'ivyo, ihiganwa ry'Ubwongerezwa Premier League ryaraye ritanguye icese, aho umurwi wa Liverpool waraye ukosoye umurwi wa Norwich. Hampande ya kizigenza wa Norwich Grant Hanley yiyinjije igitsindo ca mbere ca Liverpool ku munota w'indwi, Mohamed Salah, Virgil van Dijk, na Divock Origi babandanije bereka uwo murwi winjiye muri Premier League uvuye mu cicaro ca kabiri ko ibintu bitoroshe mu Bwongereza. Liverpool yarangije igikorwa mu gice ca mbere gusa, cagiye kurangira ifise ibitsindo bine ku busa bw'umurwi Norwich, n'aho yabandanije isatira ariko biranka ko ironka ikindi. Norwich yoyo yarinanase iraronka igitsindo kimwe rudende ku munota wa 64, urukino rurangira ari bine vya Liverpool kuri kimwe ca Norwich. Uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, hategekanijwe inkino zitandatu ziza gutangura isaha indwi n'igice ku masaha y'Uburundi n'u Rwanda, ku rukino ruza guhuza West Ham United iza kwakira Manchester City yatsindiye ihiganwa ry'umwaka uheze. Ejo ku wa Mungu, hampande ya Arsenal irindiriwe n'igishika cinshi kugira yerekane inguvu zayo aho zigera mu gihe izoramuka yakirwa na Newcastle, urundi rukino rurindiriwe cane ruzohuza Manchester United na Chelsea i Old Trafford isaha cumi n'imwe n'igice (17h30) mu masaha y'Uburundi nu Rwanda.

column2: Coronavirus: Togo nayo yatangaje umurwayi wa mbere
column3: Igihugu ca Togo kimenyesha ko hari umuntu wa mbere yapimwe agasanga yaranduye umugera ruhonyabantu, coronavirus. Mw'itangazo yasohoye nijoro, leta y'ico gihugu imenyesha ko uyo murwanyi ari umukenyezi asanzwe aba ku mugwa mukuru Lome n'umuryango wiwe. Rivuga ko uyo mukenyezi w'imyaka 42 yafashwe inyuma y'ingendo yakoze mu bihugu vya Benin, Ubudagi, Ubufaransa naTurukiya hagati y'amagenekerezo ya 22 z'ukwa kabiri na 02 z'uku kwa gatatu. Togo rero igize umunani mu bihugu vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze guterwa n'uwo  mugera, inyuma ya Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya,  Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ishami ry'ishirahamwe ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, ritangaza ko ubu abamaze kwandura uwo mugera hafi 100.000, nayo abarenga 3000 bakaba bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima, benshi bakaba ari abo mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Bulaya, igihugu c'u Butaliyano nico kibangamiwe gusumba, aho abashika 4600 bamaze kuwandura, nayo abamaze gupfa bakaba bageze kuri 197. Abategetsi b'ico gihugu bavuga ko mu masaha 24  gusa aheze abantu 49 aribo bapfuye bishwe n'uwo mugera. Nayo mu Bwongereza aho abantu 164 bamaze kuwandura,  umuntu agira kabiri akaba yaraye apfuye yishwe na coronavirus.

column2: Intanbara ya Ukraine : Abarugwanye biteguriye intambara ku karere kigaruriwe ka Luhansk
column3: Urwamo rw'ibisasu bikomakomeye vyumvikana cane igihe twariko turagana ku kirindiro c'abasirikare ba Ukraine i Luhansk. Hari kandi n'urwamo rw'amabombe aho haza haracamwo n'urwo inkoho zito zito. Twari nko ku metero 50 uvuye ku birindiro vy'abarusiya. Iyi ishobora kuba ari intambara yo mu kinjana ca 21, ariko uko ibinogo vyo kwinyegezamwo yimbwe, bisa n'ivyo mu ntambara ya mbere y'isi yose. Ibitero vy'Uburusiya mu buseruko bwa Ukraine biza vyamaze kugwira. Ivyo ushobora kubibonera ku rukurikirane rurerure rw'amamodoka mu burengero rugana ahakiri agahengwe; ushobora no kubibonera ku mabarabara agaragara uriko uraca mu bisagara vya Donbas, kandi ushobora no kuvyumvira ku rwamo rw'ibisasu bikomakomeye vy'Uburusiya. Uburusiya buriko burarungika benshi mu basirikare babwo bahora mu buraruko no mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Intumbero n'iyo kwongereza inguvu mu ntambara iriko ibera i Luhansk na Donetsk - ibice bimwe bimwe vyaho bikaba vyari bisanzwe vyarigaruriwe n'abiyonkoye bashigikiwe n'Uburusiya. Uburusiya buzoharonkera akoyoko mu kuronka inzira ngufi bucishamwo ivyo bukeneye ku rugamba - ivyabateye ikibazo bigatuma bananirwa mu bitero vy'i Kyiv. Uburusiya n'ababuyoboka ubu bagenzura ibice 90% vya Luhansk hamwe n'igice kirenga ca Donetsk - ahahoze ari umutima w'amahinguriro muri Ukraine. Hari umwotsi uri hejuru muri ako karere gasanzwe karasinzikajwe no kwimbwamwo ubutare hamwe n'amahinguriro. Ingabo za Ukraine zimaze imyaka umunani zigwana iyi ntambara ngaha. Muri bo harimwo bamwe mu basirikare karuhariwe b'ico gihugu. Abategetsi ba Buraya bavuga ko ingabo za Ukraine ziri mu karere ka Donbas ari aba mbere mu buhinga bwa gisirikare kandi bafise n'ibigwanisho bigezweho. Mu gihe ingabo z'Uburusiya ziriko ziregerana ziva mu buraruko, mu buseruko no mu bumanuko, hari ubwoba ko bashobora kubakikuza bagasigara mu kangaratete. Uburusiya buramaze kwigarurira igice kinini ca Ukraine. Ariko baracabandanya kwimba ibinogo  mu kubandanya urugamba.  Mu gihe twariko turaca mu buseruko ku birindiro vyabo twabonye ibirindiro vyabo vyo kwivuna umwansi, kandi hari himvye n'ibinogo. Anatoly, umusirikare w'imyaka 52, ariko ararabira mu matarubindi yinyegeje mu kinogo, ahari ibirindiro vy'abarusiya. Yambwiye ati:   "Ndabona abarusiya, turasa". Ariko yari yiteguye kugumya ico kirindiro. Yavuze ati : "Mu gihe bogerageza gufata ikirindiro cacu, nzobica. Ntabishe bazonyica. N'uko intambara imera." Bamwe mu bagabo twavuganye bemeza ko bateguye neza ibinogo binyegezamwo kandi ko uko biteguye kwivuna bibaha inguvu zisumba ababateye. Andrej, umusirikare w'imyaka 27, yari kumwe n'imbwa yiwe yitwa Lucifer mu kinogo. Yambwiye ati: "Dufise ibigwanisho vyiza, kandi dufise aho twinyegeje hakomeye, mu gihe abarusiya bodutera ngaha, bazotsindwa". Izo ngabo zivugako zagumye zirungikirwa ibigwanisho vy'i Buraya nka misile zitwa Javelin zirarasa ibimodoka bitamenwa. Barashima ariko bizeye kuronka vyinshi gusumba. Andrej yavuze ko prezida Putin "afise ingorane mu mutwe" (Psycho) ariko yongerako ko ibiziga vy'abasirikare biwe b'abarusiya bishobora kuba ibitabizo vy'isi yabo. Abo basirikare baboneka nk'abantu barushe  kubera iyo ntambara, ariko bose bavuga ko ishaka rikiri ryose. Icegera c'uwurongoye urugamba, Roman, yamaze imyaka ine yiga ivyigwa vy'inyifato y'abantu (Psychology) muri kaminuza ya Lviv. Iruhande yo kurwana, arafasha abo bari kumwe ku rugamba bafise ibibazo vyo mu mutwe. Ariko yavuze ati: "Mu bisanzwe abantu ntibakeneye ubufasha bwanje. Bafise ishaka rikomeye ryo kugwanira imiryango yabo, abagenzi n'ivyabo ugereranije n'abarusiya agereranya n'agasuzuguro kenshi nka "zombie". Abasirikare ba Ukraine bose barazi neza ko abarusiya bariko bararungika abasirikare benshi mu busruko. Barazi ko hagiye kuba ibintu bibi. Ariko Roman yemeza ko abasirikare ba Ukraine bafise amayeri yo kugwana akomeye. Avuga ko amatwara ya gisirikare y'Uburusiya atarigera atera imbere kuva habaye intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose, aho bishimikiza ibirwanisho birasa kure. Ariko ivyo bigwanisho birasa kure vy'Uburusiya bimaze gutuma abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bata izabo.

column2: Umunyamabanga w'ubudandaji wa Amerika Wilbur Ross avuga ko coronavirus izotuma ubuzi bwiyongera
column3: Umunyamabanga ajejwe ubudandaji wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Wilbur Ross, avuga ko ikiza ca coronavirus mu Bushinwa gishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bwiyongera. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na televiziyo imwe, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Ndibaza ko kizofasha mu kugarukana ubuzi bwinshi muri Amerika ya Ruguru". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'abanegura ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Donald Trump. Ikwirakwira ry'ico kiza ryatumye haba ubwoba ko ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bushobora kugira ibibazo. Yishura ku kibazo yari abajijwe na televiziyo Fox Business nimba ico kiza gishobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwa Amerika, Bwana Ross yavuze ati: "Si nipfuza kuvuga ko ari intsinzi ntoya mfatiye ku ndwara nk'iyo ije guteza ibibazo, indwara mbi cane". "Ariko ikiriho ni uko ivyo bituma amakompanyi aronka ikindi kintu afatirako mu bikorwa vyayo n'aho akorera... Rero ndibaza ko ivyo bizotuma ubuzi bugaruka muri Amerika ya uguru". Mu nyuma niho ubunyamabanga bw'ubudandaji bwasubiramwo amajambo yiwe buti : "Nk'uko umunyamabanga Ross yabisiguye, igikorwa ca mbere ni ukurwanya uwo mugera no gufasha abawanduye". Umuvugizi wabwo ati: "Ariko kandi ni ngombwa kwihweza neza ibijanye no gukorana n'igihugu kimenyereye kunyegeza ibibazo bihanze abanyagihugu baco n'isi yose". Ayo majambo yiyamirijwe bikomeye n'umushingamateka w'umu Démocrate Don Beyer abona ko ari ugukina ku muvyimba abantu mu gushaka kwungukira ku kiza ruhonyanganda nk'ico. Eka n'abahinga muvyo ubutunzi baneguye ayo majambo ya Bwana Ross. Simon Baptist umuhinga muvyo ubutunzi wo mu gihugu ca Singapour yabwiye BBC ko yakubiswe n'inkuba yumvise amajambo ya Ross. Avuga ko uwo mugera ushobora kugira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika aho kuzana akarusho. Ati: "Ikiriho ni uko Amerika izohahombera cane kuko n'aho bimeze uko bimaze, Amerika irashorera cane mu Bushinwa. Rero iyo ubutunzi bw'Ubushinwa bugize ibibazo bikomeye, bigira ingaruka mbi kuri Amerika". Ishami ry'ishirahamwe ONU ryitaho amagara kw'isi OMS ryatangaje ko isi iri mu bihe bidasanzwe kubera uwo mugera  ubandanya ukwiragira hanze y'Ubushinwa. Umaze guhitana abantu bashika 213 mu Bushinwa, mu gihe umaze gushika mu bindi bihugu 18. Abahinga muvyo ubutunzi bavuga ko Coronavirus ishobora kugira ingaruka mbi cane ku butunzi bw'isi gusumba ikiza ca SARS co mu mwaka 2002-2003. Ico kiza candukiye abantu barenga 8000, abarenga 700 nabo bahasiga ubuzima, bikaba vyasavye imiliyaridi zirenga 30 z'amadolari kugira kirwanywe. Muri kino gihe, uwu mugera coronavirus watumye amakompanyi mpuzamakungu akomeye harimwo ay'ubuhinga bwa none, ayakora n'ayagurisha imiduga ahagarika vy'agateganyo ibikorwa vyayo mu Bushinwa.

column2: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
column3: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

column2: Africa yahomvye miriyoni z'ama dorari kubera ihagarara rya Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp
column3: Abifashisha  imbuga hwaniro muri Afrika kugira bagurishe ibicuruzwa bitandukanye bariko baraharura igihombo baraye bagize mu masaha atandatatu Facebook, Instagram na Whatsapp vyamaze bidakora. Ikigo kigenzura ingene internet ikora Netblocks kigereranya ko iryo hagarara rishobora kuba ryateye ubutunzi bwa Africa yo munsi y'ubugararwa (ubutayu)  bwa Sahara igihombo ca miriyoni 19,8 z'ama dorari (miriyaridi hafi 40 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi). Abahinga bavuga ko ibigo vyari vyarateye imbere cane  muri urwo rudandazwa rwo kuri internet na cane cane muri ibi bihe vya Covid arivyo vyakozweko cane n'ico gihombo. Kuri bamwe bamwe iryo hagarara ryashitse mu masaha arijo haba hageze ko bagurisha cane. Kafui Adza  atwara kompanyi ya Akosombobar, inzu y'uburiro igurisha ivyo kurya kuri internet no ku bahishikiye hagati mu gisagara ca Accra AirportCity, irabana n'ikibuga mpuzamakungu c'indege ca Kotoka. Avuga ko izo mbuga hwaniro zabaye mu masaha yo kurya ivyo ku murango. Kafui avuga ati: "Nico cari igihe cacu ciza kuko 80% y'ivyo tugurisha ni ku  bakiriya baciye kuri internet. Abakiriya bake bashoboye kuza n'imiduga muri ico gihe c'urutavanako mu mabarabara nibo bonyene bashitse ku buriro. Igihe izo mbuga zahagarara , abakozi banje baciye babona ko tutariko turaronka abadusaba kubarungikira ivyo kurya uko twahora. Benshi baca barungika ubutumwa busanzwe bwa telefone, ariko ingorane ni uko udaheza ngo urungike igoto y'ivyo kurya ushaka". Kafui yabwiye BBC ko akoresha amadorari hafi 3.200  (miriyoni zirenga 6 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) ku mwaka kugira amenyekanishe ivyo akora kuri Facebook na Instagram. Ahandi nko muri Afrika y'ubuseruko, , Richard Gikonyo  afise Rickys Home Interiors. N'urudandazwa rushingiye i Nairobi, umurwa mukuru wa Kenya, rukoresha internet  mu gushira abakiriya ibikoresho bitandukanye vyo mu mazu mu gihugu cose. Ihagarara ry'imbuga hwaniro ryabaye mu gihe ku munsi usanzwe ariho akazi kaba gashushe. Gikonyo avuga ati: "Buno nyene naciye mbona ko habaye ikibazo kuko nama ndi ku murongo. Hagati y'isaha cumi z'umuhingamo n'isaha imwe y'ijoro, niho turonka abantu benshi ku mirongo yacu, kuko abantu baba bari mu rutavanako rwo mu mabarabara baca baja ku mbuga hwaniro bagatangura kugura ibintu". Yagiye kumenya ko vyahagaze atanguye kuronka ama terefone menshi y'abakiriya bidoga bamuhamagara  bavuga ko abakozi biwe batariko barishura ubutumwa bwabo. Avuga ati: "Tugereranya ko hari abakiriya 50 tutatunganirije, none uyu munsi (ku wakabiri), imirimo iri hasi cane". Karen Wambugu, umuhinga mu kugurisha kuri internet avuga ati: "Abakozweko cane n'abahembwa kuri buri kintu bagurishije hamwe n'imangazini ntonto, kuko nini nini zo zifise imbuga zazo (websites). Iyo imbuga hwaniro nka Facebook na Instagram zihagaze, imangazini ntonto ntizishobora kugurisha kuko nta yindi  nzira zifise" Aho iryo hagarara ribereye, abantu baciye baja ku zindi mbuga hwaniro nka Twitter kugira baronke umurongo. Ariko nko muri Nigeria, Twitter ntaco yafashije. Reta y'ico gihugu yarayihagaritse mu ntango z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu inyuma y'aho ikuriye ku rubuga rwayo ubutumwa bwa prezida Muhammadu Buhari imwagiriza kurenga ku mategeko yayo agenga "inyifato itari nziza". Ariko abanya-Nigeria bamwe babandanije kwandika kuri Twitter baciye ku buhinga buziguye bwa Virtual Private Networks (VPN).

column2: Caster Semenya agiye kwungururiza muri sentare ya Bulaya urubanza rw'abanonotsi b'igitsinagore bafise testosterone irenze urugero
column3: Umunonotsi  wa mbere mu kwiruka 800m Caster Semenya agiye kwunguruza urubanza muri sentare ya Bulaya y'agateka ka zina muntu ku ngingo ibuza guhiganwa abagore n'abakobwa bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo/umusemburo (hormone) ya testosterone. Semenya ntiyemerewe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na mile (1.609,34m) atabanje gufata imiti igabanya testosterone, kuva urwego rw'ubunonotsi World Athletics rubihinduye mu 2019. Uwo munya-Africa y'Epfo yatsinzwe urubanza yunguruje muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu kwezi kw'icenda ariko n'ubu aracafise icizere ko ashobora kwemererwa kuhiganwa mu nkino zo mu Buyapani uyu mwaka kugira  arwanire  kugumana ikibanza ca mbere muri Olympic. Yavuze ati: "Nta kindi dusaba atari kutureka,rimwe kandi rizima,  tukiruka ata nkomanzi, nk'abagore b'inguvu kandi badatinya nk'uko twamye na mbere hose." Abashingwamanza biwe bazosigura ko Ubuswise bwananiwe mu nshingano zabwo zo kumukingira ihonyangwa ry'uburenganzira bwiwe. Urwego rw'ubunonotsi rwashinze ingingo ivuga ko abanonotsi bafise uko bateye kurenze urugero rusanzwe rw'abandi bahuje igitsina (differences of sex development,DSD) bategerezwa gufata imiti kugira bahiganwe hagati ya 400m na mile canke  biruke ku zindi metero. Abanonotsi bafise DSD bagira urugero ruri hejuru rwa testosterone kama, urwego rw'ubunonotsi rukavuga ko  ivyo bibaha ico barusha abandi  mw'ihiganwa. Sentare ijejwe amatati mu nkino yimye agaciro urubanza rwungurujwe na Semyenya kuri iyo ngingo mu 2019. Sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yaciye iba irahagaritse iyo ngingo vy'agateganyo, ariko mu nyuma yisubirako. Vyasigura ko Semenya yabaye uwa mbere  ku 800m mu nkino za Olympic za 2012 na 2016 , yaciye yamburwa uburenganzira bwo gusubira guhiganwa mu nkino z'isi za Doha kuko atari yatsinze urubanza rwo guhagarika iyo ngingo y'urwego rw'ubunonotsi. Mw'itangazo inyuma y'ingingo ya sentare  y'Ubuswise mu  kwezi kw'icenda, World Athletics yagize iti : "Mu myaka itanu ishize, World Athletics yaragwaniye ukungana kw'uburenganzira n'amahirwe ku bagore  n'abakobwa bose mu nkino zacu ubu no muri kazoza. "Nico gituma dushimye ingingo y'uyu munsi ya sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yo kwemeza amategeko yacu ajanye na DSD nk'uburyo bubereye kandi buri hagati na hagati bwo gukingira uburenganzira bw'abanonotsi bose b'igitsinagore mu kwitaba inkino zacu mu buryo atawe burenganya kandi bwumvikana." Sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise yavuze ko: "kugra amahirwe amwe mu nkino n'umwitwarariko wumvikana kandi kugize ishingiro ryo guhigana mu nkino.Ni kimwe mu nkingi ihiganwa rishingiyeko." Mu kwezi kwa gatatu mu 2020, Semenya yavuze ko ashaka kwiruka 200m i Tokyo , ico gihe akaba  atokenera kwirirwa arafata imiti. Kugira ashobore guhiganwa, yotegerezwa kubanza kwiruka izo metero mu mwanya w'ama sekunda 22,80 umuha uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa  mu gihe gushika ubu umwanya mwiza afise ari amasekunda 23,49. Itangazo ry'abunganira Semenya, Norton Rose Fulbright, ryo kuri uyu wa kane rivuga riti: "N'ubwo sentare ariyo izotanga ikirangaminsi y'aho izocira urubanza rwacu, Caster agumana icizere kuruta na mbere ko vuba azokwemererwa gusubira kwiruka 800m mu mahingwanwa mpuzamakungu."

column2: Coronavirus-Afrika: ibitigiri vy’abanduye bigenda vyiyongera muri Algeria na Senegal
column3: Igitigiri c'abamenyekanye ko banduye wa mugera ruhonyabanyu wa coronavirus muri Algeria caraye kiduze gushika kuri 17 muri iri joro ryakeye ku wa gatatu, mu gihe Senegal nayo itangaza ko abantu bantu babiri bawanduye bakaba baheruka i Bulaya. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Algeria atangaza ko abantu icenda bo mu muryango umwe baba mu karere ka Blida mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu ku birometero 30  uvuye ku mugwa mukuri Alger, basanze baranduye. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ritangaza ko mu kwezi guheze uyo muryango wari wakiriye incuti zabo z'Abafaransa bapimwe bagasanga baranduye bamaze gusubira mu Bufaransa. Nayo muri Senegal umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu avuga ko hari abandi babiri banduye ejo ku wa gatatu, gutyo igitigiri c'abanduye muri ico gihugu gica gishika kuri bane. Umwe mu batangajwe ko banduye ni umwongerezakazi afise imyaka 33 yinjiye ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu, Dakar, ku wa 24 z'ukwa kabiri avuye i Londres. Uwa kabiri ni umufaransakazi w'imyaka 68 yinjiye ku wa 29 z'ukwa kabiri. Hirya y'ejo ku wa kabiri, umugabo wiwe yari yapimwe basanga yaranduye. Abo bantu babiri bashasha banduye barwarijwe mu bitaro, aho bivugwa ko amagara yabo atabangamiwe. Muri Afrika, igitigiri c'abamaze kumenyekana ko banduye coronavirus gishitse kuri 26:  Algeria 17, Senegal bane, Misiri babiri, Maroc, Nigeria na Tuniziya umwe umwe.

column2: Theodore McCarrick yahoze ari kardinali muri US arahakana ivyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
column3: Uwahoze ari kardinali wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arahakana ivyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 16 mu myaka ya 1970. Theodore McCarrick, 91, yarengutse imbere ya sentare i Massachusetts kugira yisigure ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu no gukubagura (coups et blessures) yagirizwa ko yakoze mu 1974. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Washington DC azwi ko ari we mutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Amerika yagirijwe ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Imbere y'aho yahora avuga ko atibuka ko hoba hari ivyo guhohotera yoba yarakoze. Mu rubanza rwashinzwe mu kw'indwi, McCarrick yaragirijwe ivyo gukwegakwegera uyo mwana w'umuhungu - ariko atavuzwe izina -  mu buhumbu, mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Uyu mugabo avuga ko yakorewe aya mabi yavuze ko igihe kimwe vyabaye mu gihe yari mu bugeni bwa mwenewabo kuri kaminuza ya Wellesley muri Massachusetts mu 1974. Nyene gukorerwa aya mabi avuga ko McCarrick yamukwegeye mu cumba kimwe co muri iyo kaminuza aca atangura kumukuyakuya. Inyuma yaho, uyo mupatiri avugwa ko yaciye abwira uyu mugabo kuvuga ibisabisho kugira ngo akire "ibicumuro". Muri sentare ku wa gatanu, McCarrick yategetswe kutavugana n'uyu nyene guhohoterwa canke n'umwana n'umwe. Yasabwe gutanga ingwati y'ibihumbi 5000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 28 z'ukw'icumi. Buri caha gishobora guhanishwa umunyororo wo gushika ku myaka itanu, kandi agategerezwa kwandikwa ku nguvu nk'umusambanyi (délinquant sexuel/sex offender) McCarrick ni umwe mu bategetsi ba Ekleziya Katorika bagirizwa gushurashuza abana mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Mu 2019, yarakuwe mu mabanga inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na Vaticano ku vyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu mu myaka itari mike. Yaragirijwe kandi ko yafashe ku nguvu umuyabaga i New York hagati mu myaka ya 1970, yongera ahatira abagabo kuryamana nawe mu rugo i New Jersey mu gihe bariko bigira ubupatiri. Icegeranyo c'impapuro 450 ca Vaticano casanze Papa Yohani Paulo wa kabiri yarabwiwe ivyerekeye ibi vyagirizwa McCarrick, ariko agahitamwo kwizera abepiskopi ba Amerika bamukingiye ikibaba. Casanze kandi Papa Benoit/Benedict XVI - yatanze imihoho mu 2013 - ashobora kuba yaranse iciyumviro co gukora amatohoza kubera ata "vyemezo vyari bihari" ku vyo yagirizwa.

column2: Filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi Muhammad yahagaritswe mu Bwongereza
column3: Ikigo cerekana za filime co mu Bwongereza, Cineworld, cahagaritse kwerekana mu mazu ya filime (cinema) yaco yose muri ico gihugu filime ivuga ku mukobwa w'umuhanuzi w'idini rya Islamu, Muhammad, nyuma y'imyiyerekano yadutse hanze y'ama-cinema amwe amwe. Ico kigo ca cinema cavuze yuko cafashe iyo ngingo "ku bw'umutekano w'abakozi n'abakiriya bacu". Abantu barenga 120.000 bashize umukono ku nyandiko isaba ko filime yitwa The Lady of Heaven (Umudamu w'Ijuru) itokwerekanwa muri za cinema zo mu Bwongereza. Ihuriro ry'imisigiti, The Bolton Council of Mosques, ryavuze ko iyo filime ari sakirirego kandi irimwo amacakubiri afatiye kw'idini. Ariko umukenguzamateka Baroness Claire Fox yavuze ko iyo ngingo "ari icago ku bugenegene kandi ikaba ari mbi cane ku bwigenge bwo gushikiriza iciyumviro". Nayo umushikiranganji w'Ubwongereza ajejwe amagara y'abantu, Sajid Javid, yavuze yuko "atewe umwitwarariko cane n'umuco wo kwiyamiriza uriko uragwirirana" mu Bwongereza. Iyo filime yakuwe mu bigo vya cinema vy'ikigo Cineworld nyuma y'amakuru y'imyiyerekano mu miji wa Bolton, Birmingham na Sheffield. I Bolton, abantu barenga ijana bagize imyiyerekano hanze ya cinema, nk'uko vyatangajwe n'ikinyamakuru caho, Bolton News. Mu butumwa bwa email bugenewe Cineworld bwashizwe ahabona na Bolton News, umukuru w'urwego Bolton Council of Mosques, Asif Patel, yavuze ko iyo filime "irimwo ingengabitekerezo y'amacakubiri afatiye ku dini" kandi yuko "ivuga ukutari ko kahise k'idini ikanasuzuguza icubahiro Islamu ihabwa n'amateka yayo". Igitangazamakuru cegamiye idini rya Islamu co kuri internet, 5Pillars, catangaje kuri Twitter amafoto y'abo cavuze ko ari aba-Islamu 200, bari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyo filime imbere y'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Birmingham ku munsi wa Mungu. Video yahanahanywe kuri internet isa n'iyerekana umuyobozi w'inyubakwa ya Cineworld i Sheffield ariko arabwira abari mu myiyerekano ko iyo filime yahagaritswe kwerekanwa, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Guardian. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Umuhinguzi mukuru (executive producer) ari mu bateguye iyi filime, Malik Shlibak, yabariye BBC ko abari mu myiyerekano bigenza "nk'amabandi arenganya abandi, bakisuka muri za cinema banatera ubwoba abahakora". "Ibi ni ibintu bitari bikwiye kwihanganirwa mu Bwongereza", nk'uko yabandanije avuga, aca agabisha yuko guhagarika kwerekana iyi filime bizoha ingoga abakoresha ukwiyamiriza nk'uko muri kazoza. Yabandanije agira ati "ibi birarengeye filime. Uno munsi hifatiwe mu gahanga filime Lady of Heaven, ejo harashobora kwiyamirizwa ikindi kigushika ku mutima kurusha". Yavuze kandi yuko abakora imyiyerekano batazoshobora kubuza kubaho kw'iyi filime.

column2: Liberia: Indirimbo 'Mr Liar Man' ya George Weah yateye ibibazo vyinshi abanyagihugu
column3: Muri Liberiya haravugwa vyinshi ku muntu yoba yagiriye nabi Perezida George Weah ku buryo vyamutumye yerekana akababaro n'uburakari mu ndirimbo nshasha yasohoye muri iyi ndwi. Mr Liar Man (Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi), indirimbo igize kane isohowe n'uyu mukuru w'igihugu yahoze ari umukinyi rurangiranwa w'umupira w'amaguru yahavuye aba umunyapolitike - rimwe na rimwe agacishamwo n'ivy'umuziki, iri mu mudiho wa reggae Bimwe mu biri muri iyo ndirimbo, harimwo nka: "Mu gihugu canje, bariko bagerageza kumpiga mu vyo ntazi…Ariko Mr. Liar Man (Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi), urazi neza ko ntigeze nkora ivyo unyagiriza". Abraham Darius Dillon, umukenguzamateka azwi cane atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi yibaza ko umukuru w'igihugu yariko avuga umunyamakuru yakora kw'iradiyo y'igihugu aherutse kwirukanwa kubera yaneguye ingene Perezida Weah arongoye igihugu, mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga rwa Facebook. Eka n'abandi batari bake mu basanzwe bakurikiranira hafi ivya politikie hamwe n'ibimenyeshamakuru bavuga ko Perezida Weah yariko yihora uyo yahoze ari umukozi wa reta. Ariko ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu hamwe n'abanywanyi biwe babandanya bahakana mbere batera ivyatsi ibi bimuvugwako. Perezida Weah yahoze ari umusatirizi mu mirwi ya AC Milan, Chelsea na Paris Saint Germain, yaragiye asohora indirimbo. Mu ntango za 2000, yarasohoye ururirimbo yaririmbanye n'abahoze bakina umupira w'amaguru i Buraya yavuga ku rukundo n'ubumwe muri Afrika. Mu 2014, yararirimbanye n'umucuraranzi w'umunya Ghana, Sidney, mu ndirimbo yo guhimiriza abanyagihugu ku kiza ca Ebola mu gihe cariko kiratema gitongora mu karere ka Afrika y'Uburengero. Mu mezi aheze, aherutse gusohora n'iyindi, aho yavugamwo ibijanye no kurwanya ikiza karanda ca Covid-19. Ariko ndirimbo yateye ibibazo abantu ni iyi ya kane, aho gushika ubu abanyagihugu babandanya bibaza bati: uyu Mr Liar Man ( Nyakwubahwa Mubeshi) ni nde?

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa Mungu: Aubameyang, Cavani, Mata, Mbappe, Alli, Raphinha
column3: Juventus irashaka umusatirizi wa Arsenal umunya Gabon Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, 32, mu gihe kazoza kiwe muri uyu murwi wa Emirates Stadium karimwo igipfungu inyuma y'aho yakiwe ikibanza ca kizigenza. (Tuttosport - in Italian) Leeds United iriko irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus umunyamerika Weston McKennie, 23, ariko igategerezwa kuzoriha amafaranga yababa imiriyoni 26.5 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Sun) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United umunya Uruguay Edinson Cavani, 34, araronderwa cane na Barcelona mu kwa mbere ariko ikeneye kubanza kuronka icemezo c'uko yakize imvune yiwe imbere y'uko igiranira amasezerano nawe.  (Sport - in Spanish) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande Juan Mata, 33, abandanya aronderwa na Barcelona, mu gihe uyu munya Espagne adakunze kuronka amahirwe yo gukina muri Manchester United. (Star) Manchester United iriteguye guhangana na Chelsea mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma w'umufaransa Jules Kounde, 23, asanzwe akinira Sevilla. (AS - in Spanish) Umumenyereza wa Liverpool Jurgen Klopp avuga ko umurwi wiwe utaragera ku mugambi wo kurondera abakinyi muri uku kwa mbere kuza, ariko akavuga ko, mu gihe vyoramuka bishitse, afise impungenge zo kuzana umukinyi ataricandagisha Covid-19.  (Mirror) Newcastle irashaka cane ko Manchester United yoyitiza umusatirizi wayo w'umufaransa Anthony Martial, 26, muri uku kwa mbere, ni mu gihe kandi ishaka n'uwundi musatirizi wa Inter Milan umunya Bosnia Edin Dzeko, 35.. (Sun) Uwujejwe kwinonora imitsi muri Paris St-Germain Leonardo ntarota aheba umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe, 22, kugira atere igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'aho Real Madrid imurondera. Mu kwa mbere, Mbappe arashobora gutangura kuvugana n'imirwi imushaka hanze y'Ubufaransa.  (AS, via Sky Sports) Paris St-Germain iriko iritegura kugerageza Barcelona kugira irabe koko ko yiteguye kugumana umukinyi wo hagati wa Espagne Gavi, 17. (El Nacional - in Catalan) Hagati aho, umumenyereza wa  Barcelona Xavi avuga ko Gavi ari we "kazoza k'umurwi" kandi ko uyu musore ata kiguzi ntarengwa kuri we kirashingwa.  (Marca, via 90 Min) Newcastle iravugwa ko izoruhira kuzana umukinyi wo hagati wa Tottenham umwongereza Dele Alli, 25, mu gihe bokwemera kumutiza mu kwa mbere.  (Football Insider) Uwundi mukinyi aronderwa na Newcastle umunya Hollande akina inyuma muri Lille Sven Botman, 21, ntazi nimba mu kwa mbere ashobora kuva muri uyu murwi ufise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'ubufaransa.  (90min) Manchester City igiye gutangura ibiganiro ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Portugal Joao Cancelo mu mwaka buca utangura mu ntumbero yo kugiriranira nawe amasezerano yisumbirije n'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27.  (Star) Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Antonio Conte yavuganye na Inter Milan be n'umunya Chili akina hagati Arturo Vidal, 34, kugira ngo arabe ko yomuzana muri uyu murwi wa Londres/London. Aba bompi baratsindiye ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A igihe bari kumwe muri Juventus na Inter. (La Tercera - in Spanish) Napoli yamaze gutegura urutonde rw'abo ishobora kurondera mu kwa mbere, harimwo n'umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham umunya  Colombia Davinson Sanchez, 25. (Corriere dello Sport - in Italian) Bayern Munich igiye kwinjira ku rutonde rw'imirwi irondera umusatirizi wa Leeds umunya Brésil Raphinha, 24, mu ci riza. (TodoFichajes - in Spanish) Arsenal irarondera kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Juventus, umunya Suède Dejan Kulusevski, 21. (CalcioMercato - in Italian) Umumenyereza wa Roma Jose Mourinho asaba Tammy Abraham, 24, gufasha kwumvisha mugenziwe w'umwongereza Ruben Loftus-Cheek, 25 bahoze bakinana muri Chelsea ko yoja gukinira uyo murwi wo mu Butaliyano. (Star) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Danemark Christian Eriksen, 29, afise "indoto" zo gusubira gukina umupira w'amaguru inyuma y'aho asezereye muri Inter Milan, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuserukizi wiwe. (Mail) Watford iracarondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa  Sampdoria umunya Gambia Omar Colley, 29, mu gihe umumenyereza w'aba Hornets Claudio Ranieri ariko arondera gukomeza uruhande rw'inyuma muri uku kwa mbere. (Tuttomercatoweb - in Italian)

column2: South Africa yashinguranye iteka Musenyeri Desmond Tutu
column3: Abanya Afrika y'Epfo biriwe mu birori vyo gushingura wa musenyeri Desmond Tutu  yarwanije intwaro y'ivanguramoko ya Afrika y'Epfo, ibirori vyabereye mw'isengero nkuru ya Anglican  i Cape Town. Tutu, yagize uruhara rukomeye mu kurangiza intwaro y'ivanguramoko muri Afrika y'Epfo akanahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel, yapfuye ku wa Mungu afise imyaka 90. Perezida  Ramaphosa wa Afrika y'Epfo ni we yashikirije ijambo rikuru muri ibi birori vyo gushingura uyu musenyeri kuri uyu wa gatandatu, ibirori vyari vyitabiriwe n'abantu 100 gusa kubera amategeko yo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Ramaphosa  yavuze ko Tutu  ari "umuvyeyi w'imitima w'igihugu cacu gishasha". Kuva yitavye Imana ku wa Mungu uheze, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi baragiye kumwunamira kw'isengero  St George's Cathedral,  aho ikiziga ciwe cari. Tutu ni umwe mu bantu bakomeye barwanije cane intwaro y'amacakubiri n'ivanguramoko yashizweho n'inkehwa z'abazungu mw'ikubagurwa bakoreye nyarwinshi b'abirabure, kuva mu 1948 gushika mu 1991. Perezida Ramaphosa yavuze ko Tutu yari "umurwanyi mu rugamba rwo kurwanira ubwigenge, ubutungane, amahoro n'uburenganzira kuri bose. Atari muri Afrika y'Epfo honyene...ariko kandi no kw'isi yose". Ati: "Niba dushaka kumenya akarorero k'umuntu w'igihagararo kidasanzwe, w'imico idasanzwe kandi yitaho abantu, nta nkeka ko ari uyu mugabo turiko turashingura uyu musi". Mu bitabiriye ibi birori kw'ishengero rikuru rya Cape Town harimwo abagenzi, umuryango, abarongoye ishengero n'abanyaporitike. Tutu yari yasavye ashimitse ko mu kumushingura hatoba "ugusesagura canke gukoresha uburyo buhanitse", kandi bagakoresha "isandugu izimbutse ishoboka". Yasavye kandi ko amashurwe yonyene yoba ari mw'isengero yoba "urugori rw'amashure rw'umuryango wiwe", nk'uko bivugwa n'ibigo  Archbishop Tutu IP Trust hamwe na Desmond and Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation. Vyitezwe ko ibisigarira vyiwe bihambwa inyuma ya arutari mw'isengero nkuru St George's Cathedral - isengero nkuru yamaze imyaka 35 arongoye. Mu butumwa yatanze mu buryo bwa videwo, Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasiguye ingene Tutu "yamurikiye isi yose". Avuga ko icubahiro yahaye Tutu ari nk ' "imbeba yunamira inzovu". Umukobwa wa Tutu Mpho yavuze ko urukundo berekanye kuri se wiwe "rwatsimbataje imitima yabo". Ati: "Kubera twamusangiye n'isi, namwe muradusangije igice c'urukundo mwari mumufitiye". Igihe ikiziga ciwe cashirwa ahagaragara muri Cape Town, abantu benshi baraje kumusezera ubwa nyuma. Umugabo umwe, Wally Mdluli, yagenze ibirometero birengo 1000 kuva Bloemfontein gushika Cape Town agenda arasaba ko bamwunguruza kuri gusa (lift)  - aca mu ncuti n'abagenzi asaba ko bomufasha kugira ashobore gukora urugendo rwiwe, mbere akaryama muri station y'igitoro igihe yari ku rugendo. Yabwiye umunyamakuru wa BBC i Cape Tow ati: "Numva nuzuye umunezero inyuma y'aho mboneye isandugu y'ikiziga. Ni nk'uko umengo umutima wiwe uri muri jewe". Tutu yarakoresheje igihagararo ciwe mu kwiyamiriza agahotoro kakorerwa abirabure mu gihugu ciwe, akama avuga ko yabikora kubw'ukwemera atari ku mvo za poritike.

column2: Abagore bashika 50 bo muri Afrika y’Epfo 'bagizwe ingumba kubera barwaye umugera wa SIDA'
column3: Amatohoza yakozwe muri Afrika y'Epfo yerekana ko abagore bashika 50 basanzwe baranduye umugera wa SIDA bagizwe ingumba ku nguvu imbere y'uko bibaruka mu bitaro bitandukanye muri ico gihugu. Umurwi ujejwe uburinganire hagati y'abagabo n'abagore muri ico gihugu (CGE) uvuga ko ibitaro vya leta vyahonyanze agateka k'abakenyezi mu gihe "ubugumba batewe ku nguvu butuma bafatwa nabi bakabaho mu gatotezo". Ayo matohoza yashizwe ahabona ejo ku wa mbere yatanguye gukorwa mu 2015 igihe amashirahamwe abiri aharanira agateka k'abagore yitura uyo murwi afise amazina y'abantu 48 bavugwa ko bagizwe ingumba ku nguvu, nk'uko bivugwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters. Uwo murwi waciye utangura kwegeranya ivyemezo kuri abo bagore bavugwa ko batewe ubugumba. Uwo murwi wasanze abaganga bo mu bitaro bimwe bimwe vya leta batera ubugumba abagore bategerezwa gukorwa mu kuvyara, bababwira ko abanduye umugera badategerezwa kuvyara abana, ngo kandi ko bashobora gupfa mu gihe bosubira kuvyara. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "Rimwe rimwe, mu gihe bari mu bubabare burenze urugero bari ku bise, abo bagore bategekwa gutera igikumu ku nguvu ku rwandiko bagiye kumenya mu nyuma ko rwari urwo kwiyemeza ko batanze uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uburyo bwose kugira babatere ubugumba". Abakoze ayo matohoza basanze hari abaganga muri ivyo bitaro batera ubwoba abo bagore ko mu gihe batotera igikumu kuri urwo rwandiko badashobora kubafasha kuvyara. Ubwo bubisha buvugwa muri ico cegeranyo bwakozwe hagati ya 2002 na 2015. Uwo murwi kandi wagiriza abo baganga ko barenze ku "masezerano biyemeje yo kuvura abantu". Ico cegeranyo cashikirijwe ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu bwa Afrika y'Epfo. Uwo murwi umenyesha ko vyabaye ibintu bigoye kurangiza ayo matohoza kubera amafishe y'abo bagore "yari yatakaye" mu bitaro. Umukuru w'uwo murwi, Tamara Mathebula, avuga ko "bitaboneka neza ingene ico kibazo cifashe muri Afrika y'Epfo, ariko turizeye ko ivyo twasavye bizotuma imiryango yuguruka maze ibinyegejwe bikamenyekana". Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Zwelini Mkhize, yasavye umubonano wihuta n'umupfasoni Mathebula  kugira ngo bavugane kuri ico cegeranyo, nk'uko bivugwa na Reuters isubiramwo ivyavuzwe n'ubwo bushikiranganji.

column2: Big Fizzo yoba yariganye indirimbo ya Diamond Platnumz?
column3: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa mu Burundi, Desire Mugani, azwi cane kw'izina rya Big Fizzo, avuga ko atiganye indirimbo ikunzwe cane ya Diamond Platnumz wo muri Tanzania. Big Fizzo yatanguye kumenyekana mu Burundi mu myaka 1996 aho yaririmba mu mugwi wavuza injana ya rap witwa N***a Soul. Ico gihe, naho igihugu cari mu bibazo bitoroshe vy'intambara, ari mu baririmvyi bake baremesha ibiteramo bihimbaye mu Burundi. Nyuma y'imyaka irenga mirongo ibiri ari muri uyu mwuga, Fizzo aracari ku rwego rwo hejuru mu muziki ndundi uvuzwa henshi wokwita pop music mu Congereza. Indirimbo ziwe zigezweho ubu nka Konzi, You na Sugua, zirirwa zisamirana ku maradiyo mu Burundi n'ahandi, mu butambiro eka mbere no ku mbuga nka Youtube, aho usanga zinaherekejwe n'amasanamu ahinguye bigezweho. Ariko bamwe mu bakunzi b'umuziki hamwe n'ababikurikiranira hafi, batanguye kwibaza niba Big Fizzo atoba ariko arafata inzira ya hafi mu kwandika indirimbo ziwe. Indirimbo Tetema y'umuririmvyi Diamond Platnumz yaririmbanye na Rayvanny imaze kurabwa kuri Youtube inshuro zirenga imiriyoni 27, kuri ubu ikaba iri mu zirabwa cane z'uwo munyamuzika. Uyumvirije ugaca unumviriza Sugua ya Big Fizzo yaririmbanye na Elly's Boy, Double Jay na Kirikou A-Kili bo mu kigo c'umukizi Bantubwoy, ntiwogenda udakozweko n'ugusa kwazo. Uhereye ku mudiho, ku ntambo co kimwe na hamwe hamwe mu majambo, ufise ugutwi kw'umuziki urashobora kwumva ko harimwo ibija gusa. BBC Gahuza yashatse kumenya ico uwo muririmvyi avuga kuri ukwo gusa kw'izo ndirimbo, ica ivugana nawe aho asanzwe ari mu gihugu c'Ubutariyano. Big Fizzo yatanguye ahakana ko ata ntumbero n'imwe yigeze agira yo kwigana iyo ndirimbo Tetema ya Diamond Platnumz. Yagize ati: "Abantu bavuga ivyo amatwi yabo agomba kuba atumva neza. Ntushobora kuvuga ko indirimbo zisa kubera ko gusa zifise umudiho umwe. "None duce tuvuga ko zouk zose zisa? Canke ko reggae zose zisa? Ku ntambo naho, imiziki myinshi abantu batamba bimwe, none ni kangahe batamba ndombolo mu miziki yo muri Kongo?" Fizzo kandi abandanya avuga ko mu ndirimbo nyinshi abantu bandika bimwe, gusa bigatandukanywa n'umudiho w'indirimbo canke injana. Ati: "None nk'ubu noreka kuririmba ngira nti 'ndagukunda' kuko hari uwundi yabivuze? Ivyo ntibishoboka. Amajambo ategerezwa gusa, ariko uburyo tubiririmba nibwo buzana ubudasa". Iyindi ndirimbo bivugwa ko Big Fizzo yiganye ni indirimo You, aririmba asa n'uwiyama abamuzanako ingorane mu buryo butandukanye. Iyi ndirimbo nayo uyumvirije, hanyuma ugaca wumviriza indirimbo yitwa F*** You y'umuririmvyi Kizz Daniel wo muri Nigeria, uca umengo hahindutse ururimi n'umurindi gusa. Fizzo yagize ati: "Kuri iyi ndirimbo yoyo sinobesha, kuko Kizz Daniel yampaye 'inspiration'. Harimwo vyinshi bisa muri izo ndirimbo zibiri. Wumvirije nko ku gitari hoho uravyumva." Big Fizzo yabandanije avuga ko ari ibintu bisanzwe kwisunga abandi baririmvyi, mu gihe ugerageje ukazanamwo umwihariko wawe. Abaririmvyi basubiramwo indirimbo z'abandi canke bifashisha bimwe mu biri mu ndirimbo z'abandi bariho, kandi si ibintu vya vuba eka mbere na barurangiranwa mu muzi barabikoze. Aha twotanga nk'akarorero ka Michael Jackson ku ndirimbo ya Manu Dibango yitwa Soul Makossa. Umuhisi Michael Jackson yafashe amajambo "ma-mako, ma-ma-sa, mako-mako ssa", ari mu iyo ndirimbo, ayakoresha mu ndirimbo yiwe "Wanna be starting something". Michael Jackson yaremeye ko yitije ayo majambo ayashira mu ndirimbo yiwe, aca yemera kuriha amahera Dibambo bitarinze guca muri sentare. Mu mwaka uheze, vyaramenyekanye ko hatanguye urubanza rwarezwemwo Ed Sheeran ku ndirimbo yiwe "Thinking Out Loud", urubanza rukibandanya. Umuryango wa Ed Townsend, yandikiye hamwe na Marvin Gay indirimbo rurangiranwa "Let's Get it On", wareze Ed Sheeran kwigana iyo ndirimbo ntegerwa yo mu 1973.
