Gutera imbere kw'ikintu ico ari co cose kuvana n'ubwira abagikora bagishiramwo hamwe n'umwihariko gifise mu kwitandukanya n'ibindi bikorerwa ahandi. Mu gihe vyotangura kwibazwa ko abaririmvyi mu Burundi atakindi bakora atari gukoporora indirimbo z'abandi, kazoza k'umuziki wo mu Burundi koba kageramiwe. Vyoba ari ibintu bitangaje kuko u Burundi bwamye bufise abaririmvyi bandika indirimbo nziza zibereye ugutwi nka ba Canco Amisi, Christophe Matata, Africa Nova, Kidumu eka mbere na Big Fizzo. Mu gutera imbere kw'umuziki ni ngombwa ko urwaruka rugitangura kwumva imuziki mu gihugu kinaka, rwumvishwa umuziki wihariye wo muri ico gihugu. Iki ni igikorwa cega abanyamuziki bo nyene, ariko cane cane amaradiyo ategura ibiganiro vy'urwaruka harimwo umuziki.

column2: Umupira w'amaguru muri Ghana wahagaritswe vy'imfatakibanza kubera coronavirus
column3: Inkino z'umupira w'amaguru muri Ghana zahagaritswe mu bice zari zigezemwo vyose inyuma y'isohoka ry'itegeko rya leta Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Ghana ryafashe iyo ngingo ku musi w'Imana, inyuma yaho umukuru w'ico gihugu Nana Akufo-Addo, ategekeye ko hahagarikwa mugihe mfatakibanza amahwaniro y'abantu benshi, harimwo itunganywa ry'imikino. Urwandiko rwasohotse rumenyesha ko hakurikijwe intumbero zatanzwe n'umukuru w'igihugu. Ishirahamwe rijewe  umupira w'amaguru muri Ghana ryahagaritse mu kiringo mfatakibanza amahiganwa yose kandi iyo ngingo yatanguye kuja mu ngiro ubwo nyene gushika habaye irindi tegeko. Iri shirahamwe ryari rifise icizere  ko rishobora kubandanya imikino, hakabandanya hisungwa impanuro z'abayozi b'igisata c'amagara y'abantu, ariko itangazo rya leta ryamenyesheje ko ritabishigikiye. Igihugu ca Ghana cakurikiye ibindi bihugu vyinshi mu guhagarika vy'imfatakibanza umupira w'amaguru. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika, CAF, ryari mu gihugu ca Kameruni mu mpera z'indwi kugira ryihweze ibijanye na kazoza k'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika, riziga gukinwa guhera mu  kwezi kwa 4. Icegeranyo ca komisiyo kizoshikirizwa vuba CAF

column2: OMS ivuga ko ikiza ruhonyanganda ca Ebola atari akaga gahanze isi yose
column3: Ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi , OMS, ryafashe ingingo yo kudafata ikiza ca Ebola kiri mu gihugu ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi nk'ikibazo gihanze isi yose. OMS ivuga ko Ebola "ari ikiza gihanze cane" akarere, ariko ko atari ingorane y'isi yose. Hagati aho, rirababazwa n'uko ibihugu bitanga amahera make cane, angana n'igice gusa, c'amahera akenewe kugira ngo bashobore guhangana n'iyo ndwara. Ico kiza kimaze guhitana abantu barenga 1400 muri ico gihugu, kikaba kigize kabiri muri kahise. Muri iyi ndwi, hari abarwaye babonetse mu gihugu ca Uganda, mbere batatu muri bo barahasiga ubuzima, n'aho uwo mugera utarakwiragira hose. Ingingo y'ugutangaza ko indwara kanaka ko ari ingorane iahnze isi yose, iri mu  ngingo zikomeye cane zishobora gufatwa n'ishirahamwe OMS. Rimaze kubikora incuro zine gusa, harimwo iyafashwe ku kiza ca Ebola cari ciziziye akarere ka Afrika y'Uburengero, kigahitana abantu barenga ibihumbi 11. Mu bisanzwe ingingo nk'iyo isigura ko haca haboneka ayandi mahera n'abandi bakozi kugira ngo bashobore kurwanya ikiza kanaka - canke ingingo za politike zishobora guhagarika intambara kugira ngo abavuzi bashobore guhangana naco. Ntiyabaye ingingo yoroshe gufata. Dr Preben Aavitsland arongoye vy'imfatakibanza umurwi wa OMS ujejwe ibibazo bidasanzwe, avuga ko habaye impari ndende  n'ukutumvikana mu nama yihutirwa yabereye i Geneve ejo ku munsi wa gatanu kuri ico kiza. Ico kiza kirakwije ibikenewe kugira ngo citwe ko ari ikiza c'isi yose kuko ari ikibazo kidasanzwe kandi ko gishobora gukwiragira no mu bindi bice vy'isi. Ariko, utwigoro turiko dukorwa n'abari ku rubuga "ntidushobora gutsimbatazwa" mu kuvuga ko ari ikiza kidasanzwe. Dr Aavitsland avuga ati: "Iki si ikibazo gihanze isi yose, gihanze igihugu ca Kongo, kandi kirakomeye". Ariko, amenyesha ko ugutangaza ko ari ingorane ihanze isi yose bishobora gutuma n'imbibe zugarwa, eka n'indege zigahagarika ingendo zazo muri Kongo, ivyo navyo bikaba vyokwica gusumba gukiza. Avuga ati: "Nta nyungu yoboneka, ahubwo uruhombo rwoba runini". OMS yari imaze kugira inama zibiri zose yiga nimba ikiza ca Ebola muri Kongo gishobora gutangazwa nk'ingorane ihanze isi yose. Kuri izo ncuro zompi, iyo ngingo ntiyashoboye gufatwa kubera cari ikiza kiri mu karere gusa, kitari mu bindi bihugu. Ico kiza catanguye muri ico gihugu mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze wa 2018 kikaba ciganje mu ntara zibiri, Kivu y'Uburaruko na Ituri. Abarenga 2100 baramaze kuyandura, abarenga nabo 1400 ikaba yarabahitanye. Muri iyi ndwi, hari abarwaye babonetse mu gihugu ca Uganda, mbere babiri muri bo barahasiga ubuzima, n'aho uwo mugera utarakwiragira hose. N'aho OMS ivuga ko ivyo "biteye ubwoba", ivuga ko ata cemezo na kimwe cerekana ko umugera uriko urakwiragira muri Uganda . Abantu 27 nibo bikekwa ko boba barashikiranye n'umuryango wabonetsemwo iyo ndwara, bakaba bugananiwe ku mihana yabo aho bazoronkera urucanco rwa Ebola. OMS ivuga ko impinga ikiri ndende, ikamenyesha ko igikeneye imiliyoni 54 z'amadolari  mu miliyoni 98 ivuga ko yari ikeneye hagati y'ukwezi kwa kabiri n'ukw'indwi  kugira ihangane n'ico kiza.

column2: France: Umuriro wadutse mw’isengero nkuru rya Nantes
column3: Isengero rikuru Saint-Pierre-et-Saint-Paul  ryo mu gisagara ca Nantes mu Bufaransa ryatewe n'umuriro w'icaduka. Abajejwe kuzimya imiriro y'ivyaduka barenga 60 nibo bashitse kuri iryo sengero kugira bagerageze kuwuzimya nk'uko bivugwa n'ibiyamakuru vyaho. Nta wuzi icateye uwu muriro. Amasanamu ava aho ivyo biriko biba yerekana umuriro n'umwotsi biva muri iyo nyukabwa. Uyu muriro wadutse haciye umwaka umwe gusa uwundi muriro ukoze ibara kw'isengero rikuru Notre-Dame mu gisagara ca Paris, rimwe mu mitungo ya kahise k'u Bufaransa. Televiziyo BFM TV, itangaza ko abapolisi muri ico gisagara ca Nantes kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'u Bufaransa batumweko hafi isaha imwe n'iminota 44 mu gatondo. Umwe mu babibonye avuga ko yashobora kubona uwo mucanwa ari muhira, hafi y'iryo sengero. Avuga ko yakanguwe n'urwamo rudasanzwe rw'inkengeri. Ati: "Ku vyo mbona, ni uko umwotsi utera wongerekana". Iryo sengero sibwo bwa mbere riterwa n'umucanwa. Mu 1972, umuriro warasambuye igisenge caryo, bituma ryugarwa mu kiringo c'imyaka itatu ririko rirasubirwamwo.

column2: Germany: Igarariza rya Katolika mu guhezagira ababana basangiye igitsina, n'abagore basoma misa
column3: Ng'izo inkengeri ziravuze, inanga ziratangura gusamirana, maze Patiri Jan Korditschke na we araduga kuri Arutari kugira ahereze inkuka y'imisa. Vyose bisa nk'uko vyahora bimeze iyo hageze imisa ku wa Mungu muri Katolika. Ariko muri ako kanya nyene, hari ikintu kidasanzwe kiri mu mitima ya bamwe kandi kibateye impungenge. Ikintu kigomba kibe ni ikidasanzwe na gato. Patiri Korditschke arafashe ijambo, ati "uwo wese yipfuza umuhezagiro w'Imana ni ahaguruke". Hafi abari mw'isengero bose barahaguruka, harimwo n'abatari bake basanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina. Ng'ako akaririmbo karatanguye, patiri na we aregera, maze abaza umwe umwe ico yipfuza gusaba Imana mu bisabisho vyabo. Hanyuma niko kuganzura ibiganza yubika ku mitwe yabo asengera umwe umwe. Hari benshi bakoroye amosozi. Aba rero si abandi, ni ba bandi bubakanye basangiye ibitsina, inyuma y'imyaka itari mike nibwo bwa mbere bakiriwe ukuri kwamye muri Ekleziya. Umwe muri bo Sangha, umukatolika kuva avuka ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye, Frieda kuva imyaka 25 yose, ati: "Ni ibintu bibabaje cane kandi ubu niho mbonye ingene nakomerekejwe ku mutima". "Mu myaka 49 yose, sinigeze nakirwa. Ariko rero impera n'imperuka, abantu baratanguye kuvuga bati: 'kuba uri ng'aha nta ngorane'". Ku bwa Matthias, na we nyene yavutse ari umukatolika akaba yaronse uwo muhezagiro ari kumwe n'uwo bubakanye Thomas, kuja mu misa ntiyigeze iba ingorane. Ariko avuga ko amajambo ashikirizwa n'abategetsi ba Katolika yamutumye yiyumvira guhindura idini. Ati: "Igihe cose namye nibaza nimba ari ngombwa ko nguma mw'idini ritanyemera. Ariko rero, Ekleziya 'nyayo' hano ku rubuga, irongeye kugarura ukwemera kwanje". Mu buryo bw'agahemo, ijambo nk'iri rishikirizwa n'abategetsi ni ryo ryatumye iyi misa igenda uko yagenze. Mu kwa gatatu, Vaticano yasohoye itangazo rikomeye rivuga ko ukwubakana hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ari "icaha", rinashimangira ko abapatiri bose bazohirahira bagahezagira abubakana basangiye igitsina bashirwa ku ruhande. Iki ni ikintu abapatiri bo nyene ku giti cabo bakora - ariko ni gake biba ku mugaragaro. Iri jambo rikarishe rya Vaticano ryashavuje abakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Mu kwishura, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abapatiri, ababikira n'abakirisu baciye batanguza isekeza bise Liebe gewinnt (Urukundo Ruratsinda/l'Amour Triomphe/Love Wins), kugira bemeze ku mugaragaro ko ababana basangiye ibitsina bemewe mu masengero yabo. Patiri Korditschke ati: "Narashavuye numva n'isoni kubera nibaza ko ari ijambo ribabaje cane". Ni umwe mu bapatiri hafi  120 bo mu Budagi bafashe ingingo yo kugarariza ku mugaragaro iri tegeko rya Vaticano. Mu kiringo c'indwi imwe gusa abapatiri baremesheje ibisabisho mu masengero ya Katolika mu gihugu cose c'Ubudagi bahezagira abantu abo ari bo bose babisavye, harimwo n'abubakanye mu buryo Vaticano ibona ko ari icaha, nk'abubakanye n'abahukanye, hamwe n'abubakanye basangiye igitsina. Umunyamakuru wa BBC abajije Patiri Korditschke ingene asigura igituma aja kubiri n'itegeko rya Vaticano, yishuye akorora amosozi. Guhezagira abubakanye basangiye ibitsina biri mu bintu bigenda vyiyongera mu bakatolika bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka mu Budagi. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka k'abagore, nka Maria 2.0, nayo nyene asaba uburenganzira bungana muri Ekleziya. Haciye umusi umwe inyuma y'iki gisabisho ca Patiri Korditschke i Berlin, abagore baragiye ku ruhimbi basigura ijambo ry'Imana mu masengero ya Katolika 12 atandukanye y'Ubudagi - na vyo nyene Vaticano ikaba itavyemera. Ulrike Göken-Huismann umugore yashikirije ijambo mw'isengero asengeramwo mu karere ka Düsseldorf, avuga ati: "Ekleziya yahora itwigisha ko Isi iringaniye kandi yatwigisha ko twategerezwa kuvyemera uko. Ariko rero vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya ihindura. Canke kandi wibuke ko wategerezwa kwemwera ko Adamu na Eva ari abantu babayeho. Ntibivuga y'uko Ekleziya idategerezwa guhindura ivyo yigisha". Abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika mu Budagi ntibahuza: hari uruhande rumwe rw'abasenyeri  rushigikiye ko ibintu bihinduka, mu gihe urundi ruhande rw'abarongoye Ekleziya ruryumako, rukaba rushigikiye intumbero ya Vaticano itarota iva kw'izima . Hagati aho, ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko hari abakatolika ku giti cabo mu Budagi bashaka ko ibintu bihinduka. Icigwa kimwe cakozwe n'amashure kaminuza yo mu bisagara vya Berlin na Münster cerekana ko ibice 70% vy'abakatolika mu Budagi bashigikiye ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bahezagirwa, 80% nabo bakaba ata ngorane babona ku bantu babanye batarahezagirwa, hanyuma 85% nabo bakaba babona ko abapatiri nabo bokwemererwa kurongora. Inyuma y'igisabisho co guhezagira abubakanye basangiye igitsina i Berlin, abantu baharurwa mw'ijana baciye bakoranira hamwe hanze y'isengero biha agacupa mu buryo bwo kwigina kuri iyo ntambwe. Ariko kw'irembo ry'isengero, abantu bashika cumi bakoze imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza iyi ngendo, bafise icapa canditseko ngo "Imana ntihezagira icaha". Nta mishamirano iri hagati y'izi mpande ariko zompi zigizwe n'abantu bakomeye muri Ekleziya Katolika badahuriza hamwe. Amwenyura, Patiri Korditschke  wewe yivugira ati "ivyo na vyo ni sawa." Papa avuga iki ku bijanye n'abahuza ibitsina babisangiye? Mu kw'icumi 2020: Papa Francis yabwiye umuhinga akora amareresi ko abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina "bokwemererwa imbere y'amategeko".  "Abahuza ibitsina babisangiye ... ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu muryango. Nta n'umwe yokwirukanwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico". Mu kw'icumi  2014: Ikoraniro ry'abasenyeri b'Ekleziya (synod) bahakanye ivyipfuzo vyari bishigikiwe na Papa ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye bokwemerwa. Mu kw'indwi  2013: Ari mu ndege ari ku rugendo, Papa yabwiye abanyamakuru ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye batokumirwa ahubwo ko boshirwa mu muryango. Yavuze ko abahuza ibitsina babisangiye basanzwe bari mu barongoye Ekleziya bogirirwa imbabazi, ivyaha vyabo bigaharirwa. 2013:Mu gitabo On Heaven and Earth (Ku vyerekeye Ijuru n'Isi), Papa avuga ko gufata ku rugero rumwe abahuza  ibitsina babisangiye n'abubakana badasangiye ibitsina kwoba "ari ugusubira inyuma nk'ibirenge". 2010: Igihe yari musenyeri mukuru wa Buenos Aires yariyamiriza ko amategeko yemerera abashaka kwubakana basangiye ibitsina ariko agashigikira ko abasanzwe bubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokingirwa n'amategeko ku rugero kanaka.

column2: Ingene Russia yanesheje Ukraine muri Africa
column3: Na  Paul Melly Igisata ca Afrika, Chatham House, London Amajambo ashikiriza amakoraniro n’amanama nshingamateka kw’isi vyabaye umushinge wa Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine mu twigoro twiwe two gutsimbataza imigenderanire kuva mu mezi make aheze. Ariko igihe ashikiriza ijambo Ubumwe bwa Afrika (AU) ku wa mbere abakuru b’igihugu bane gusa nibo bamwumvirije, mu gihe abandi nabo baserukiwe n’intumwa. Kubona yitabwa n’abantu bake vyerekana neza ingene bitoroshe kuri Kyiv kugira ngo ijambo ryayo ryumvikane kuri uno mugabane ufise ibihugu 54 ariko Ukraine ikaba ifise ibiro vy’ubuserukizi mu bihugu cumi vyonyene, ica kane c’ivyo Uburusiya bufise. Rero mu kugerageza guhindura imbono y’abanyafrika ku ntambara yavuye ku gitero ca Perezida Vladimir Putin, Perezida Zelensky ntashobora gushinga imizi haba mu vya poritike canke umutekano ku rugero Moscou igezeko. Ukraine si igihugu gifise inguvu za gisirikare rutura kw’isi kandi si n’igihugu ntayegayezwa mu Nama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano, nk’uko biri ku Burusiya. Kubera iyi mvo, abategetsi benshi ba Afrika bafashe ingingo ko badashobora guhirahira ngo bigane ibihugu vy’Uburengero mu guhangana na Moscou. Ibintu bimeze uku mu gihe amayira yo gusohora intete ziva muri Ukraine yazibiwe, bikaba biriko birunyura ikibazo c’imfungurwa cari gisanzwe kihari, ivyatumye ibiciro vy’ibidandazwa vyinjira biduga, maze ingano n’izindi ntete hamwe n’amavuta bikena  cane mu bihugu vya Afrika vyari bisanzwe bitikwije. Mu ntango z’uku kwezi, umukuru w’igihugu ca Sénégal Macky Sall, ari na we arongoye Ubumwe bwa Afrika muri kino gihe, yarafashe urugendo rwamushikanye mu gisagara ca Sochi kiri ku nkengera y’inyanja yirabura (Black Sea/Mer noire) kugira ngo aganire na Perezida Putin ku kungene bokuraho inzitizi zituma ata bidandazwa vyinjira ku mugabane bivuye mu Burusiya hamwe no muri Ukraine. Hanyuma kandi, mu ndwi iheze, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa wa Afrika y’Epfo yarahamagaye Putin kuri terefone kugira bavugane ingene Uburusiya bwoha Afrika ivyimburwa hamwe n’ibitabizo. Ibi biganiro vyarazanye akarusho gatoya n’aho ata nyinshu burundu yaboneste. Hagati aho, hari ibimenyetso vy’uko igitero kuri Ukraine gishobora kuba kiriko gituma haba ingorane ku bikorwa vya gisirikare vy’Uburusiya muri Afrika, aho hari ibihuha bitaremezwa bivuga ko hari zimwe mu ngabo za wa muhari w’abacangero Wagner zishobora kuba ziriko rizakurwa muri Centrafrique. Ibi ntivyotangaza cane uravye ibikenewe mu bikorwa vya gisirikare bikomeye mu karere ka Donbas. Hagati aho, nta kimenyetso na kimwe kihari cerekana ko abarwanyi ba Wagner boba bariko baragabanuka muri Mali – aho ingabo zawo zikunze kuboneka ziri kumwe n’iza reta mu bikorwa vya gisirikare. Vyongeye, amasezerano ya gisirikare no mu vyo umutekano Uburusiya bufise muri Afrika muri kino gihe ariko aratsimbatazwa, n’aho ivya nkenerwa mu ntambara yo muri Ukraine ari vyinshi. Cameroun nico gihugu kindi giherutse kwisanga muri uru rugamba rutoroshe. Umushikiranganji wa Cameroun ajejwe kwivuna abansi Joseph Beti Assomo yari i Moscou mu kwezi guheze aho yari yagiye kubonana na mugenziwe w’Uburusiya Sergei Shoigu ngo batere igikumu ku masezerano y’imyaka itanu y’ugufashanya mu vya gisirikare. Muri ano masezerano harimwo ibijanye n’igendereza, kwigisha no guhanahana ubuhinga mu kurwanya iterabwoba n’ubusuma bwo mu mazi. Harategurwa n’imyimenyerezo rusangi. Aya masezerano ntavuga ibijanye n’irungikwa ry’ibirwanisho ariko agasa n’ayerekana ko hashobora kwumvikanwako ubundi buryo bwo gufashanya. Mu vy'ukuri, amasezerano yo mu  2015 yatumye Uburusiya burungika imfashanyo y’ibirwanisho n’uburyo yabaye kirumara mu ntambara yo kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam mu ntara y’Uburaruko muri Cameroun. N’aho gushika ubu aya masezerano mashasha na Moscou ataramenyekana neza, asa n’uko ateye impungenge ibihugu vy’Uburengero. Mu ndwi nkeya umukuru w’igisata kijejwe Afrika mu bushikiranganji bw’imigenderanire w’Ubufaransa, Christophe Bigot, yari yagiye i Yaoundé, asa n’uwugiye guhumuriza umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Cameroun Joseph Dion Ngute ko Paris nayo nyene iciyemeje gukomeza ubucuti mu vy'ubutunzi, imico no kurwanya iterabwoba. Aya masezerano na Cameroun yateweko igikumu mu gihe kitoroshe ku rwego mpuzamakungu – igihe c’intambara ivuye ku gitero c’Uburusiya kuri Ukraine. Abategetsi b’ibihugu vy’Uburengero babona ko Uburusiya ari akaga gakomeye ku mutekano wavyo, kuko burwanya umushinge w’intwaro rusangi be n'uko amategeko asanzwe agenda isi. Hagati aho, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika bifise amadidane kuri uku kubonwa nabi kw’ubutegetsi bwa Putin. Kandi ibi si kuri Mali na Centrafrique gusa. Hariho kandi n’ibihugu bicuditse n’Uburengero kuva kera ariko vyirinda kunegura mu buryo bweruye ibikorwa vya Putin. Nk’akarorero, Sénégal yafashe ingingo yo kudashigikira iciyumviro c’inama nkuru y’ishirahamwe ONU co ku wa 02 Ntwarante (3) casaba Uburusiya guhagarika ikoreshwa ry’inguvu kuri Ukraine. Cameroun nayo nyene yafashe ingingo isa n’iyi, aho umuserukizi wayo muri ONU yahisemwo gufata indege imushikana mu gihugu ciwe mu ntango z’ukwa gatatu kugira ngo akwepe iyi nama yari ikomeye yo gutora ngo bemeze iyi ngingo. Inyuma y’aho, ku wa 07 Ndamukiza (4) iki gihugu cashimye kutagira aho cegamira igihe Inama Nkuru ijejwe Umutekano yagira amatora yo guhagarika Uburusiya mu Nama ya ONU ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu. Ivyiyumviro vyo hagati mu gihugu navyo bifise uruhara mu bihe nk’ibi. Kuja ku ruhande rw’Ubufaransa, Amerika n’Ubwongereza, si ukuvuga ko vyama bishimwa na benshi kuri uno mugabane, kandi reta ya Cameroun, co kimwe n’ibindi bihugu bigenzi vyayo, isa n’iyafashe ingingo yo gushira imbere ico abanyagihugu biyumvira. Hagati aho, Cameroun ishika kure, mu gufata ingingo yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha yo gufashanya mu vya gisirikare n’Uburusiya n’aho ingabo zabwo zibandanya zicucagira amabombe ku bisagara vya Ukraine. Iyi ngendo iki gihugu cisangije ifise kumbure kuba isigurwa n’ingene ibintu bimeze hagari muri Cameroun. Umukuru w’igihugu Paul Biya asanzwe avuga igifaransa ahanganye n’ibibazo vy’umutekano ku mpande zibiri: mu gihe ubutegetsi bwiwe buhanganye n’umuhari Boko Haram wiyitirira idini rya Islam ufise icicaro muri Nigeria, hamwe n’umuhari Islamic State West Africa Province (Iswap) mu ntara y’Uburaruko, iri kandi mu ntambara imaze igihe kirekire n’inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora mu ntara zibiri zikoresha ururimi rw’icongereza, intara y’Ubumanuko bushira uburengero hamwe n’iy’Uburaruko bushira uburengero. Hampande y’Uburusiya, Cameroun ifitaniye kandi amasezerano yo gufashanya mu vya gisirikare n’ibihugu vy’Ubufaransa, Ubushinwa, Brezili na Turukiya – kandi yarigeze no kuba ifitaniye amasezerano na Amerika. Gusa, incuti zayo nka Washington na Paris zifise impungenge ku bijanye n’agateka ka zina muntu n’intwaro, kandi mu gutanga imfashanyo zavyo hari ivyo zibanza gusaba. Mu vyo ukuri, impungenge ku kungene ibintu bimeze mu turere twa Cameroun dukoresha icongereza ziherutse gutuma Amerika ihagarika imfashanyo ya gisirikare yahora iha Cameroun. Mu gihe abanyamerika bariko bariyonjorora, bamwe mu banyakameruni bihweza ibintu n’ibindi bafise ubwoba ko reta ubu ifise kuba iriko irarondera iyindi ncuti yoyiha imfashanyo itarinze gushiramwo amananiza ashingiye ku mayeri yayo ya gisirikare, ariko uburenganzira bwa muntu bukahagirira ingorane. Mu tundi turere twa Afrika, kahise ka Moscou kerekana ko yishimira gufasha ibihugu bitorosha ibintu. Muri Centrafrique, umurwi Wagner ubandanya wigisha igisirikare kuva mu 2018 mbere n’ingabo zawo zarafashije ingabo za reta mu gutuza igitero c’inyeshamba ku mugwa mukuru Bangui mu ntango za 2021. Ariko abahinga ba ONU bagiriza Wagner ivyaha bikomeye vyo guhohotera abasivire; abarwanyi bayo baherutse kwagirizwa ko bishe abasivire hafi y’akarere ka Bria, icicaro c’uruganda rucukura ubutare bwa diyama. Wagner kandi ikorera hagati muri Mali, iri kumwe n’igisirikare, aho nk’uko bivugwa n’ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch n’abanyagihugu, izi ngabo zikorera hamwe zaboreje igufa zica n’abanyagihugu. Ingabo za reta ya Mali hamwe n’abacangero b’abarusiya bagirizwa kwica abantu barenga 300 i Moura, hagati muri Mali mu kwa gatatu. Ntivyoroshe ingene reta ya Cameroun yoha akazi uyu murwi w’abacangero utavugwako rumwe. Bisa n’uko ishira imbere cane ubucuti hagati ya reta n’iyindi  nk’uko biri mu masezerano yo mu kwezi guheze i Moscou. Ariko, ubu bucuti bushasha n’Uburusiya bushobora cane kuba ikimenyetso c’uko igisirikare casubiye kwihagararako mu gihe ubutegetsi bugerageza gutuza ibikorwa vy’inyeshamba zishaka kwiyonkora mu ntara zikoresha icongereza hamwe n’abarwanyi biyitiriria idini rya Islam mu ntara y’Uburaruko.

column2: Qatar 2022: Messi, Ronaldo, Mbappé, Neymar n’ibindi bihangange vyiteguriye inkino za 1/4
column3: Na Shamoon Hafez BBC Sport i Doha Imirwi umunani gusa niyo isigaye mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ca 2022 muri Qatar, yose ifise indoto imwe yo guterura igikombe ku wa 18 z’uku kwa cumi na kabiri. Inyuma y’ihiganwa ryo mu matsinda ryabereyemwo ibitangaza, ubu turi mu nzira y’igikorwa nyaco, igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma kikaba cuzuye abakinyi b’ibihangange. Itandatu mu mirwi isigaye ni iyigeze gutsindira iri higanwa canke yashitse muri finale – kandi hagati yayo imaze gutsindira iki gikombe incuro cumi. Ariko gusa ibitangaza vyovyo bishobora gushika, aho Maroc ubu irondera kuba igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika coba gishitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma, inyuma yo gushika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ku ncuro ya mbere muri kahise k’umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu. BBC Sport, igisata ca BBC gikurikirana inkino, irihweza bimwe mu vyitezwe, mu gihe abakinyi barondera kwerekana ubuhinga bwabo muri uru rubuga rw’umupira w’amaguru. Ku wa gatanu: Croatia v Brezili (17:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda), Ubuholande v Argentina (21:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda). Ku wa gatandatu: Maroc v Portugal (17:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda), Ubwongereza v Ubufaransa (21:00 mu masaha y’Uburundi n’Urwanda). Kubona ibihugu nk’Ubudagi n’Ububirigi bisezererwa mu nkino z’amatsinda mu buryo butangaje  - hamwe n’ugutsindwa kwa Espagne mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma – ni ibintu bizoguma mu mitima y’abantu igihe kirekire kubona ibihugu nk’ibi binanirwa no gushika muri iki gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo ni amazina agaruka cane mu binyamakuru, ariko ibihangange nka Neymar, Harry Kane, Kylian Mbappe na Luka Modric baracahagaze. Ubwongereza n’Uburafansa – igihugu gisanzwe gifise iki gikombe – bigiye guhurira mw’ihiganwa rikomeye ku ncuro ya mbere mu myaka cumi, ikaba ari n’incuro ya mbere mu gice co gukuranamwo. Iyi mirwi yaheruka guhura muri Euro 2012 mu nkino zo gukuranamwo aho yanganije 1-1, ariko ubwa nyuma iheruka guhura mu gikombe c’isi yose hakaba hari mu 1982. Bryan Robson yateye ibitsindo bibiri mu rukino Ubwongereza bwatsinze 3-1, ico gihe kizigenza w’Ubufaransa akaba yari igihangange Michel Platini. Umurwi nserukiragihugu w’Ubwongereza, uzwi nka, Three Lions, ntiwashoboye kubandanya ngo utsindire ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose uwo mwaka muri Espagne, ariko igihe conyene baherukira kugitwara – ni ukuvuga mu 1966 – umwe mu mirwi batsinze mu rugendo rwabo, kumbure ushobora kuba uwikeka, ni Ubufaransa. Si ikimenyetso kibi. Hagati aho, bafise igikorwa kitoroshe co guhura n’umusatirizi rutura Mbappé, ari na we ari imbere mu bitsindo muri rino higanwa, aho amaze kwinjiza bitanu, akaba akinana n’umukinyi mugenziwe ari na we amaze kwinjiriza Ubufaransa ibitsindo vyinshi gusumba abandi muri kahise k’umupira w’amaguru muri ico gihugu, Olivier Giroud. Kizigenza w’Ubwongereza, Kane, ati: "Ku wa gatandatu ntibizoba vyoroshe. Ubufaransa ni umurwi ukomeye, ari na wo ufise igikombe, rero turazi ko uzoba ari umugoroba utoroshe na gato. "Nibaza ko nimba ushaka gutsindira igikombe c’isi yose, utegerezwa guhura n’imirwi y’ibihangange kw’isi, Ubufaransa rero buri imbere”. Ku wa Mungu, igenekerezo rya 18 Kigarama. Urugamba rutoroshe ku kibuga ca Lusail i Doha. Ibihangange bibiri kw’isi mu gihe cabo bararwanira ubugabo, akaryo kabo ka nyuma  ko kurwanira iri teka ry’igikombe c’isi yose. Ubutigu bwageze. Messi wa Argentina hamwe na Ronaldo wa Portugal bamaze imyaka baterana inkokora umwe wese arondera kwandika amateka. Muri rino higanwa ryonyene, Messi yinjije igitsindo ku rukino rwiwe rwari rugize 1000 igihe bahura na Australia mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma, mu gihe Ronaldo nawe yabaye umukinyi wa mbere yinjije ibitsindo mu mahinganwa atanu yose y’igikombe c’isi yose. Bompi baramaze gutsindira igikombe c’amahiganwa ku migabane yabo – Messi yatsindiye Copa America mu mwaka uheze, mu gihe Ronaldo yari yatsindiye ihiganwa rya Bulaya mu 2016 – ariko iki gikombe ca mbere nyamukuru kw’isi kiracari umugani kuri bo. Ku myaka 35 Messi aboneka ko ari ryo higanwa rya nyuma ry’igikombe c’isi yose kuri we, mu gihe Ronaldo wewe azoba afise imyaka 41 mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose kizokurikira. Aha ata nkeka biraboneka ko ari yo mahirwe ya nyuma kuri bo yo gushobora guterura iki gikombe c’iteka. Hagati aho, vyabaye ngombwa ko Ronaldo yemera ko yari afise uruhara ruto mu rukino rwa Portugal rw’igice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma - aho yashizwe ku rutonde rw’abagombora, mu gihe uwamutwaye ikibanza Goncalo Ramos w’imyaka 21 yakoze ibintu bidasanzwe mu gutera bitatu wenyene mu rukino rwabo n’Ubuswisi. Nko mu gihe vyoshika ibi bihangange bigahurira muri finale, ivy’ari vyo vyose n’abatagira aho begamire bogira amero. None twizere ko impari kuri ‘GOAT’ (impfunyapfunyo ya Greatest Of All Time, twogereranya na ‘Igihangange c’ibihe vyose) zishobora kuba zigiye guhera? Imbere y’aho, birashoboka ko turorera urukino ruryoheye ijisho rwo mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Mu gihe yompi yorengana Croatia n’Ubuholande uko ikurikirana, urugamba rw’agakura muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko ni rwo rwokurikira hagati ya Brezili na Argentina ku kibuga ca Lusail. Brezili, igihugu kimaze gutahukana iri higanwa incuro zitanu kandi kikaba ari co gihabwa amahirwe menshi, yarerekanye ubuhinga bwayo mu kwirahira bikomeye Korea y’Epfo, mu gihe Argentina yari ikeneye ubuhinga bwa kizigenza wayo Messi kugira ngo ishire Australia ku ruhande. Iyi mirwi imaze guhura incuro zine mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, ariko ubwa nyuma iheruka guhura hakaba hari mu 1990, igihe igitsindo ca Claudio Caniggia mu minota ya nyuma y’urukino cahaye akaryo Argentina ko kwinjira mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma. Amahirwe yo kuvana iki gikombe i Bulaya ari cane cane mu minwe y’ino mirwi ibiri, Brezili ikaba ari co gihugu ca nyuma kitari ico ku mugabane wa Bulaya giheruka gutsindira iki gikombe, hari mu 2002. Igihangange Neymar yarakize imvune yo mw’ivi yari yanduye mu rukino rwabo rwa mbere, yongera araninjiza igitsindo mu gice c’umunani gishira ica nyuma na Korea y’Epfo, ubu akaba akeneye igitsindo kimwe gusa kugira ngo anganye n’igihangange Pele ku bitsindo 77 mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Brezili, uzwi nka Selecao. Ariko Croatia ya Luka Modric hamwe n’Ubuholande bwa Virgil van Dijk navyo bifise ijambo rikomeye mu kwemeza nimba iki kirori kizoshoboka canke kitazoshoboka. Tugiye ku Buholande, uyu murwi wa Louis van Gaal hamwe na Argentina ni abakeba bamenyeranye cane muri rino higanwa, biteze guhura ku ncuro ya gatandatu barwanira itike yo mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Ni isubiramwo rya finale yo mu 1978, aho uyu murwi wo muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko ari wo watahukanye intsinzi, mu gihe urukino rwa nyuma iyi mirwi yaheruka guhuriramwo ari urwabaye mu myaka umunani iheze, Argentina ikaba ari yo yatsinze ku ma penalties. Ariko kimwe mu bihe ntibagiranwa - atari gusa hagati y’ibi bihugu ariko muri kahise k’igikombe c’isi yose – ni icabaye mu 1998 igihe Dennis Bergkamp yinjiza igitsindo ciza cane cahaye akaryo Ubuholande kubandanya mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. "Dennis Bergkamp, Dennis Bergkamp, Dennis Bergkamp," niko umunyamakuru w’Ubuholande yiha karuru avuga igihe uyu mukinyi yakinira Arsenal yakubita icenga n’ubuhinga bwinshi ku mupira yari ahawe na Frank de Boer, aca aroba Roberto Ayala maze yinjiza igitsindo ciza cane. None Cody Gakpo arashobora gukora nk’ibi muri kino gihe...? Penalty ya Achraf Hakimi muri wa mwanya w’ama penalties ari nayo yahaye intsinzi Maroc kuri Espagne yatewe neza cane, umupira uca neza neza hagati mw’igori aho umunyegori yari avuye, uva mw’igitsindo casarishije abarorerezi mu kibuga ca Education City. Itsinzi yabo yatumye bashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yashimagijwe n’ubwami bw’ico gihugu, aho umumenyereza Walid Regragui yahamagawe kuri terefone n’umwami  wa Maroc Mohammed VI urukino ruheze. Umurwi upanze neza kandi ugoye gutsinda, Maroc ni urutare,  ntirigera itsindwa na rimwe muri rino higanwa ry’iki gikombe c’isi yose, ikaba imaze kwinjizwa igitsindo kimwe gusa mu nkino zabo indwi ziheruka. Maroc kibaye igihugu ca kane c’umugabane wa Afrika gishitse mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, kikaba kiriko kirondera itike yo gushika mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma. Hagati aho, ni ikindi gipimo gikomeye kiyirindiriye imbere y’uyu murwi w’i Bulaya – na rirya Portugal nayo iriko irondera kwandikisha amateka mu kurondera gushika mu gice ca nyuma ku ncuro ya mbere.

column2: DR Congo: Ekleziya Gatorika isaba abapatiri bavyaye kuva mu mabanga
column3: Urwandiko rw'Inama y'Abepiskopi ba Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, CENCO, rwanyereye rugashika mu minwe y'ibinyamakuru rusaba abapatiri bo muri Congo bavyaye abana gutanga imihoho mu mabanga yabo y'ubusaserdoti, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru RFI. Inama y'abepiskopi CENCO, itegeka ko kizira y'uko abapatiri barangura amabanga y'abubatse. Urwo rwandiko rusohotse mu gihe Papa Francis yimirije kugendera Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo muri Mukakaro (7) uyu mwaka. Muri uru rwandiko rw'impapuro 19 rwiswe "A l'école de Jésus-Christ. Pour une vie sacerdotale authentique" (ni ukuvuga: Kw'ishure rya Yezu/Yesu Kristu/Kristo. Ubuzima nyabwo bw'ukwihebera Imana), abasenyeri bavuga ko ubuzima bw'igipatiri budashobora kubangikanwa n'ubuzima bw'ukuba serugo. CENCO isaba uwihebeye Imana uwo ari we wese afise umwana "gusaba uruhusha Papa rwo kuva muri ayo mabanga", nk'uko bisubirwamwo na RFI. Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko mu gihe hogira abihebeye Imana bovyanka, musenyeri ashobora kwitura Vaticano kugira ngo ifate ibihano vyo ku rwego rwa nyuma, ibi bigasigura kwirukanwa burundi muri Ekleziya. Hari igice kimwe muri uru rwandiko rwa CENCO kivuga ibijanye n'abana b'aba bapatiri hamwe na ba nyina babo. Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi ivuga ko ishaka "gushira ibintu ahabona" ku bijanye n'ingene ibintu bimeze kuri bo, ikibutsa ko muri rusangi usanga "banenwa mu kibano". Ico gice kigira kiti: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima".i: "Ni ngombwa kuri twebwe ko twemeza ko abo bantu bariho kandi ko bababarira ku mutima". Ikibazo c'abihebeye Imana bavyara abana muri Ekleziya Gatorika ni ikibazo giteje impari no mu bindi bihugu vy'akarere no kw'isi. Mu mpera z'umwaka uheze uwari Musenyeri mukuru wa Paris, Musenyeri Michel Aupetit, yasavye imbabazi aca atanga n'imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera "umubano udasanzwe n'umugore". Ico gihe kandi, Patiri Wenceslas Munyeshyaka w'umunyarwanda, yahagaritswe ku kuba padiri wa paruwasi ya Brionne mu Bufaransa inyuma y'uko bimenyekanye ko yemeye mu nzego z'ubutegetsi ko ari se w'umuhungu yavutse mu kw'indwi 2010.

column2: Tigray: Urwikekwe no kwitanga mu gihe intambara iriko irakwiragira hose muri Ethiopia
column3: Hageze mw'ijoro, mu micungararo y'umugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa, abasivile barenga mirongo ibiri bariko barakizura mu mabarabara yaho mw'ijoro rimwe mu ndwi iheze, bahagarika bongera basaka imodoka n'indangamuntu. Umugabo umwe ashaje bisa n'uko ari we arongoye ico gikorwa c'isaka yagize ati:"Abari muri kino gikorwa aha mu micungararo barashika 180. Turamaze gufata abantu benshi. Turamaze no gutora ibikoresha vyinsi biteye amakenga, harimwo inkoho n'ibintu biturika." Abo bakorerabushake barondera abagwanyi b'aba Tigray n'ababashigikiye, hisunzwe itegeko nk'iryo ibihe vy'intambara ryashizweho na reta ya Ethiopia mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'ibitero vya gisirikare vy'aba Tigray. Abatavuga rumwe na reta bavuga ko abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bapfunzwe ata co bazira, ariko ko uruhigi rusa n'ugwakwiragiye mu gisagara hose. Uwundi mugabo avugira kuri telefone ngendanwa, twagiye twumva avuga:"Nimunyaruke, ariko aragerageza kudutoroka." Ku yandi mabarabara hirya, uwundi mugwi ugizwe ahanini n'abitanga ku bushake bakuze, bari biyegeranirije hamwe mu myimenyerezo, batambukira hamwe ari na ko bumviriza amategeko. Hose mu gisagara bisa n'uko hatekanye. N'aho Ubwongereza hamwe n'ibindi bihugu bagabishije umutekano ugenda "ugabanuka cane", mu gihe abagwanyi b'aba Tigray n'iyindi migwi bavuga ko bariko baregereza Addis, ubuserukizi bw'Uburusiya butanga ubutumwa butandukanye n'ubwo ku mbuga hwaniro. Bwavuze ko "itegeko nk'iryo igihugu kiri mu ntambara ata kintu kinini ryahinduye ku buzima bwa misi yose ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia." Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, aherutse kumenyesha ko agiye ku rubuga rw'intambara kurongora ingabo ku rugamba. Vedeo yashizwe ahabona na reta iramwerekana mu mpuzu za gisirikare akikijwe n'abasirikare, ari aahasa n'akarere ko mu bugaragwa ka Afar mu buraruko bw'umugwa mukuru Addis Ababa. Muri iyo video umushikiranganji wa mbere agira ati:"Ubu twashoboye kwigarurira aka karere kose." Abandanya avuga ati:"Ingabo z'igihugu zifise ishaka ridasanzwe. Tuzobandanya gushika Ethiopia ironse ukwishira n'ukwizana." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze ko ingabo ziwe ziri mu gikorwa co kwigarurira ibisagara vyinshi vyigaruriwe n'umuhari Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF). Ariko ivyo bivugwa biragoye guhinyuza mu gushika canke guhanahana inkuru ku turere tuberamwo iyo ntambara bigoye, no mu gihe hari itegeko rishasha ribuza kuvuga inkuru yerekeye aho igisirikare giteye canke "ibiriko birabera ku rubuga rw'intambara" reta itabitangiye uruhusha. Abategetsi ba TPLF - baherutse kwerekana amasanamu y'indege itagira umudereva y'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'impfungwa z'intambara za Ethiopia - bavuga ko babandanya gutera intambwe mu duce dutandukanye, inguvu nyinshi zikaba zashizwe ku gisagara ca Debre Birhan, kibonwa nk'ikibanza Ethiopia yiteguriye kugwanira kiri inyuma y'umugwa mukuru. Ariko bamwe mu baraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ingabo za Tigray zishobora kurengerwa no kugabanuka inguvu mu gihe zogirwako mibitero n'igihe hoba ibitero vy'igihugu ibanyi ca Erythrea. Utaravye uruhande ruriko ruratahukana intsinzi, biragaragara ko iyi ntambara iriko ikwiragira hose, ari na ko izana akaga ku banye Ethiopia. Ishami rya Onu ritanga imfashanyo kw'si (WFP/PAM) ubu rigereranya ko abantu imiliyoni 9.4 bakeneye imfashanyo vyihuta. Umutegetsi wa PAM ari Addis Ababa, Claire Neville yavuze ati:"Mu gihe intambara ariko irakwiragira hose mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia, tuguma tubona abantu benshi bagenda bongerekana baja mu buzima bubi cane." Avuga ko "ibintu bitandukanye"ari vyo bituma badashikira abamerewe nabi, harimwo ibitero vy'abagwanyi b'aba Tigray, umutekano muke hamwe n'impusha z'abategetsi ba Ethiopia ziteba gutangwa. Ariko PAM iherutse gushobora gushikira ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bo mu bisagara bibiri vyo muri Amhara vyigaruriwe n'abagwanyi b'aba Tigray. I Addis, umugambwe uri ku butegetsi wa Prosperity Party ubandanya gutunganya ibirori vyo gshimira abariko baritaba urugamba ku bushake bwabo. Etisa Deme, umwe mu bagize akanama karongoye igisagara avuga ati:"Turi mu ntambara n'ibihemu vyo hagati mu gihugu n'abanyamahanga babasgikikiye." Babush Sitotaw, umusore w'imyaka 22 yagize ati:"Naratewe akamo ko kuja kugwanira agateka k'igihugu canje. Urashobora kurira mu gihe umuryango wawe wishwe, ariko uja he mu gihe utakaje igihugu cawe? Ni co gituma nitegye gutanga ubuzima bwanje. Nta bwoba mfise ko gushika ubu ata myimenyerezo turaronka." Umupfasoni w'imishatsi isa n'uruvuzo, Dinkinesh Nigatu, nawe yaje imbee aca ereka isinzi ry'abantu. Yavuze ati:"Ndakunda igihugu canje. Nashaka kuja ku rugamba ariko yaba umuhungu wanje n'umugabo wanje bose bansavye kuguma muhira na bo bagende kungwanira." Yabwiye BBC ati:"Naragize imyimeyerezo nk'umukorerabushake ubu ndakizura mu mabarabara mu gihe abahungu banje n'umugabo wanje bari ku musitari w'imbere muri iyo ntambara. Ahantu hose mbonye abantu mw'ibarabara, ndabahimiriza kuja kugwana. Ntidushobora kurindira gushika umwansi adusange kutwicira ngaha twese." Umutegetsi wo mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi Prosperity Party, Ayda Awol, yashize ku bitugu vya Dinkinesh Nigatu ukuboko, yagize ati:""Ni rurangiranwa. Itara rituboneshereza twese." Ayda Awol yabandanije avuga ati:"Twiteze urwaruka rwinshi rukurikiza aka karorero. Ethiopia iri hamwe k buryo butari bwigere buboneka. Abarenga ibihumbi indwi (bava mu karere ka Arada ku mugwa mukuru) baramaze kwitaba akamo ku gushaka ko kuja kugwanira igihugu." Reta ya Ethiopia yaridogeye isekeza ry'ibihugu vya Buraya n'ibimenyeshamakaru ryo kuvuga ukutariko n'ibigirankana intandaro y'iyo ntambara. Ku mbuga hwaniro, abaye Ethiopia bariyamiriza ukugerageza kw'abakoloni kuvuga nabi gihugu cabo no kurenza rugero mu kuvuga intsinzi TPLF imaze kugira ku rugamba. Umusesenguzi muri politike ya Ethiopia, Achamyeleh Ewunetu, avuga ko nawe atavuga rumwe na reta ya Ethiopia, ariko aharanira ubwigenge bw'igihugu ciwe yavuze ati:"Turi mu ntambara ku mpande zibiri. ububeshi bw'ubukoloni bushasha n'inkuru zitari zo zitangwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'i Buraa, harimwo BBC, hamwe n'intambara ya genocide yatangajwe na TPLF." Reta ya Ethiopia yagumye yanka incuro nyinshi guha BBC ijambo. Ariko reta yaranebagwe cane kubera ugucinyiza itangazamakuru ryo hagati mu gihugu na mpuzamakungu mu gukoresha amajambo akarishe no mu kubabuza gushikira inkuru. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed yashimagijwe cane imbere y'uko haduka iyo ntambara kubera kurekura imfungwa za politike n'abamenyeshamakuru, aherutse kwagirizwa kugarukana icuka c'iterabwoba ku bamenyeshamakuru. Muri ico gihe nyene, BBC yemeza ko ibandanya gutanga inkuru ata ho mu bwigenge, nyazo kandi ata ho zegamiye zo mu karere no kw'isi yose.

column2: Rwanda-Covid: reta yatezuye ingingo ariko uticandagishije ntugiye kworoherwa
column3: Reta y'Urwanda yafashe ingingo zo gutezura amabwirizwa yo gukumira ikiza ca Covid-19, ariko igategeka ko Abanyarwanda n'abandi bose basanzwe baba muri iki gihugu bategerezwa kwicandagisha vyuzuye kugira bemererwe kuja ahahurira abantu benshi. Nk'uko biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe inyuma y'inama nshikirangaji yakoranye  ejo ku wa gatanu, ingingo zaraye zifashwe zitangura gukurikizwa kuva kuri uyu wa 05 Ntwarante (Werurwe mu Kinyarwanda), zikazosubirwamwo inyuma y'ukwezi kumwe "hashingiwe kw'isesengura ry'inzego z'Ubuzima". Amakoraniro rusangi kandi aruguruwe guhera ku wa mbere igenekerezo rya 07 z'uku ariko bikaba ngombwa kwerekana ko bipimishije Covid-19 mu gihe c'amasaha 48 (ni ukuvuga imisi ibiri) imbere yob kuyitabira. Zimwe mu zindi ngingo zafashwe ni uko kuva ku musi wa mbere igenekerezo rya 07 uku kwezi imbibe zo ku butaka zizoba zuguye, ariko bibaye ngombwa ingenzi zibanze gusuzumwa Covid-19 imbere yo kwinjira. Ingendo n'ibikorwa vyose biremerewe kubandanya amasaha 24/24, havuyemwo ibiteramo vy'umuziki, amazu y'ubutambiro, ububare, ibirori vyo kwiyakira (receptions) hamwe n'ibikino vy'akamari (betting) bidategerezwa kurenza isaha umunani z'ijoro. Kwunguruza abantu ku mamodoka rusangi, ku mapikipiki no kumakinga birarekuwe ariko bigasaba ko bene kuvyurira no kubikoresha babanza kwerekana ko bicandagishije. Amanama n'amakoraniro rusangi, amasengero, amazu y'uburiro, nay'ubunywero, ibibanza vy'inkino n'ibigo vy'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri biremewe, ariko ibi vyose ni ngombwa ko ababijamwo bategerezwa kuba "barikingije Covid-19 mu buryo bwuzuye". Ibigo vy'inzego za reta n'ivy'abikorera utwabo navyo nene biremerewe gukoresha abakozi bavyo bose, ariko ni ngombwa ko abakozi bose bo mu gisata c'abikorera utwabo "baba barikingije Covid-19 mu buryo bwuzuye. Ubushikiranganji bw'ubuzima bushobora kwugara vy'agateganyo inyubakwa zaba iza reta canke iz'abikorera utwabo mu gihe bibonetse ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye Covid-19 , nk'uko iri tangazo rya reta ribivuga. Eka n'bikorwa vyo mu gisata c'ingenzi birabandanya ukuri kwamye ariko reta igasaba ko amabwirizwa yo kwirinda Covid-19 yubahirizwa. Urwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu biri imbere mu gukingira abanyagihugu bavyo muri Africa, kikaba ica mbere mu karere k'ibiyaga binini. Abantu benshi mu Rwanda barikingije ku gushaka kwabo mbere n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavuga kwikingiza bikorwa ku gushaka, ariko hari abanyagihugu bamwe mu ntara za ruguru bavuga ko abatabishaka bacandagwa ku ngufu.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Pogba, De Ligt, Neymar, Torres, Solomon, Diaby
column3: Juventus yageze ku mazeserano yo kugarukana umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa Paul Pogba w’imyaka 29 mu masezerano y’imyaka ine inyuma y’aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na Manchester United arangiriye. (Sky Sports) Chelsea yizeye gushika ku masezerano y’umwe mu bakinyi b’inyuma babiri irondera mu gihe ibiganiro bibandanya kuri aba bakinyi mpuzamakungu ba Hollande, Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka  22 akina muri Juventus, hamwe na Nathan Ake w’imyaka 27 akina muri Manchester City. (Standard) Hahati aho, Bayern Munich yageze ku masezerano yo ku munwa na De Ligt iyi ikaba atari inkuru nziza ku vyo Chelsea yari yizeye. (Sport1 mu kidagi) Umumenyereza Paris St-Germain mushasha Christophe Galtier avuga ko yipfuza y’uko Neymar aguma muri uyu murwi, n’aho hari vyinshi bivugwa kuri kazoza k’uyu musatirizi wa Brezili w’imyaka 30 muri uno murwi. (Metro) Tottenham iracipfuza kugura umukinyi w’inyuma wa Villarreal umunya-Espagne Pau Torres w’imyaka 25, n’aho bakirindiriye ko umufaransa akina inyuma  Clement Lenglet w’imyaka 27 ashika avuye muri Barcelona. (Mirror) Ajax yemereye Tottenham imiriyoni 28 z’amapawuni mu kugerageza kugura umukinyi wo muri Hollande akina ku ruhande Steven Bergwijn w’imyaka 24 muri uyu murwi w’i Londres. (Mail) Fulham iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi mpuzamakungu wa Israel akina ku ruhande Manor Solomon w’imyaka 22 nk’intizo avuye muri Shakhtar Donetsk. (Athletic) Newcastle nta mugambi ifise wo gutanga imiriyoni 60 z’amapawuni zisabwa na Bayer Leverkusen ku mufaransa akina ku ruhande Moussa Diaby w’imyaka  22. (Telegraph) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Chelsea umwongereza Callum Hudson-Odoi hamwe n’umusatirizi wa Everton umwongereza Anthony Gordon, bompi b’imyaka 21, bararonderwa na Newcastle.(90 Min) Brentford yizeye kwemeza ko yaguze umukinyi w’inyuma wa Ecosse ku miriyoni 18.9 z’amapawundi Aaron Hickey w’imyaka  20 imukuye muri Bologna mw’iyi ndwi. (Guardian) Nottingham Forest yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Bayern Munich mu ntumbero yo kugura umwongereza akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu Omar Richards w’imyaka  24 asanzwe ari ku giciro c’imiriyoni 8.5 z’amapawundi. (Telegraph iciye kuri Nottingham Post) Southampton iri mu biganiro kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati wa Nigeria Joe Aribo w’imyaka  25 asanzwe akinira Rangers ku miriyoni 10 z’amapawundi. (Athletic ) Leicester yatanguye ibiganiro na Feyenoord kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi mpuzamakungu wo hagati wa Turukiya Orkun Kokcu w’imyaka 21. (Mail) Bournemouth irarondera umukinyi w’inyuma, umwongereza Nathaniel Phillips w’imyaka  25, ko yosubira muri uyo murwi avuye muri Liverpool ku ntizo. (Football Insider) Everton yatanguye kubaza nimba umukinyi mpuzamakungu w’umusatirizi wa Albania asanzwe akinira Chelsea Armando Broja w’imyaka 20, mu ntumbero yo gusubiriza Richarlison yamaze kwimukira muri Tottenham. (Telegraph) Uwahoze ari umumenyereza wa Tottenham Mauricio Pochettino w’imyaka 50, ariko araraba ingene yosubira muri Premier League inyuma yo kwirukanwa na Paris St-Germain. (Sun) Amasezerano y’umukinyi wo hagati w’Ubutaliyano Jorginho w’imyaka 30 muri Chelsea azorangira mu ci rya 2023, umuserukizi wiwe akavuga ko ibiganiro ku bijanye n’amasezerano mashasha vyiteze gutangura mu kw’icenda. (Tuttomercatoweb kibicishije muri Goal)

column2: Russia Vs US: aba 'hackers' bakoze ikindi gitero c'imigera ku nyabwonko z'abagiraneza - Microsoft
column3: Ikompanyi ihingura inyabwonko Microsoft, ivuga ko habaye ikindi gico c'ibitero vy'abasuma bo ku nyabwonko (hackers) b'abarusiya bakoresha imigera ku nyabwonko z'amashirahamwe yegamiye reta n'amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu mu bihugu 24, cane cane muri Reta zunze Ubumwe za amerika. Microsoft ivuga ko amakonte muravyo (email accounts) ashika 3000 mu mashirahamwe atandukanye arenga 150 ari yo yatewe muri ino ndwi turimwo. Microsoft yagiriza abakoze vya bitero vyo mu mwaka uheze kuri kompanyi SolarWinds, aho urwego rw'Uburusiya (SVR) rujejwe igendereza rwagirijwe, ko ari rwo rwabikoze. Uburusiya burahakana ibi bitero vyompi. Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu w'Uburusiya) ivuga ko itazi ivy'ibi bitero bishasha, igasaba iyi kompanyi ya Amerika gutanga izindi nsiguro, harimwo ingene yagiriza Uburusiya. Mu nkuru yacishije ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi ku wa kane, Microsoft yavuze ko ibi bitero bishasha vyakozwe ku nzego za reta zijejwe imigenderanire n'amakungu mu gikorwa co "kwegeranya c'igendereza". Ivuga ko n'imiburiburi ica kane c'amashirahamwe yatewe afise uruhara mu bijanye n'ibikorwa mpuzamakungu vy'iterambere, ubutabazi hamwe n'agateka ka zina muntu. Mu gihe hafi yose ari muri Amerika, aya mashirahamwe yatewe ni ayo mu bihugu n'imiburiburi 24. Nk'uko Microsoft ibivuga, Nobelium, umurwi ukomoka mu Burusiya, niwo wakoze ibitero vyo muri ino ndwi mu kwinjira muri konte ya email ikoreshwa n'ishirahamwe rya reta ya Amerika rijejwe ugufashanya, USAID. Abo ba hackers baciye barungika ubutumwa muravyo (emails) busa nk'uko umengo ni ubw'ukuri, ariko bukaba bufise link/lien, uyifyonzeko ica yinjiza umugera mubi wiba amakuru yose ari mu nyabwonko yawe, ukongera ugaca utera imigera mu zindi nyabwonko zose ziri ku murongo umwe na rwawe (network/réseau). Umuvugizi w'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe gukingira umutekano w'inyabwonko (Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency, Cisa) yabwiye ikinyamakuru CBS News  ko abategetsi bari bamenye iki gitero kandi ko bariko baragerageza "gutahura neza ingaruka zaco no gufasha abo bose bashobora kuba baratewe". Microsoft ivuga ko imigera y'ivyo bitero vyose ku bakiriya bayo yazibiwe mu buryo bwikora (Automatiquement). Ntibiramenyekana neza igitigiri c'izoba zarashoboye kwinjirwa n'iyo migera. Mu mwaka uheze, aba hackers barakoresheje ikompanyi ya Amerika, SolarWinds' Orion, bavogera ibisata vya reta ya Amerika, amakompanyi ategamiye reta hafi 100 hamwe n'amashirahamwe makeya y'Ubwongereza. Vyagiye kurangira abakiriya hafi 18.000 binjije iyi logiciel y'umugera. Amerika n'Ubwongereza bwagirije ikigo SVR ko ari co cari cakoze iki gitero. Kirahakana ivyo cagirizwa.

column2: Kenya: Umupasitori yishe umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero
column3: Umupasitori wo muri Kenya yatangaje abakirisu igihe yacumita umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bari gusenga ejo ku wa Mungu, mu rusengero bafatanije gushinga mu gisagara ca Mombasa. Abakirisu bari muri urwo rusengero babwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko Elisha Misiko yari yicaye mu kibanza c'imbere, igihe umugore wiwe nawe, Ann Mghoi, yari kuri arutari ariko arasigura. Niho umugabo wiwe Misiko yamusangayo n'imbugita yari yanyegeje mw'ishati yari yambaye amucumita mu mugongo. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfa uburongozi bw'urwo rusengero rwitwa 3 G (Grounds for God's Gospel). Umwe mu bakirisu basengera muri urwo rusengero ati: "Twebwe twibaza ko cari ikintu yari agiye kumubwira, kumbe yari agiye kumucumita imbugita". Uwundi ati: "Uyu mugabo yari yarubakanye n'uyu mupfasoni arongoye uru rusengero, ariko bari barahukanye. Yari amaze kumutera ubwoba incuro nyinshi, kandi yari yanavuze ko azokora ivyo yakoze uno munsi". Ahejeje kumucumitaniho  nawe yaca yicumita mu nda, agerageza no kwikata izosi, mu gihe abakirisu bari bagiye gutabara. Uyo mugabo yaciye apfa ubwo nyene, mu gihe umugore wiwe yagiye gupfira mu bitaro. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bari baratandukanye bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero, aho umwe wese yashaka kuba ari we mukuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Daily Nation. Rwari rusigaye ruyobowe n'umugore, ivyo Pasitori Misiko, umugabo wiwe, atashaka kwumva.

column2: Kardinari w'i Vatican Becciu mu rubanza rwo kunyonyeza miriyoni 412 z'ama dorari
column3: Umukardinari  w'ishengero Katorika yigeze kuba akorana hafi cane na Papa François agiye gucirirwa urubanza i Vaticano, yagirizwa gukoresha nabi amafaranga y'ishengero mu kamaramaza kahombesheje amafaranga menshi mu mugambi wo kugura inyubakwa i Londres/London. Kardinari Angelo Becciu, w'imyaka 73, niwe mwubahwa  akomeye cane mu barongoye Ekereziya Katorika  mu bihe vya none agiye imbere y'ubucamanza  kubera gukekwako ivyaha bijanye n'amafaranga. Yagirizwa gusohora amafaranga y'amanyaburaya, Euro, angana na miriyoni 350 (arenga miriyaridi 800 mu mafaranga y'Uburundi) y'ishengero mu mugambi utagenze neza  wo kugura inyubakwa  muri Chelsea watumye hatakara amafaranga menshi cane. Arahakana kuba hari icaha yakoze. Abandi bantu icenda bakurukiranwa muri urwo rubanza nabo bagirizwa ivvyaha birimwo kuronka amafaranga ku nguvu canke kw'iterabwoba, kunyuruza no gukoresha nabi ububasha bw'akazi. Kardinari Becciu yirukanywe mu kazi na Papa François mu kwezi kw'icenda igihe amakuru y'ugukoresha nabi amafaranga yaja ahabona. Amatohoza yamaze imyaka ibiri yerekanye ingene Vaticano yatakaje miriyoni z'ama euro, arimwo amashikanwa, inyuma yo kugura inyubakwa  yahora ari ububiko bwa Harrods kuri Sloane Square  Avenue muri Chelsea, mu 2014. Uwo mukardinari yahora  araba amashikanwa mu biro bijejwe amafaranga ya  Vaticano. Ivyaha akurikiranwako birimwo kurungika amafaranga mu rudandazwa rwari rurongowe n'abavukanyi biwe mu ntara y'amavukiro yabo muri Sardaigne. Urwo rubanza rwitezwe kumara amezi menshi. Intahe zibiri zizosasa muri iyi ndwi - ku bibazo  vy'ubuhinga - zishobora kwungururizwa mu kwezi kw'icumi. Abandi icenda bagirizwa barimwo: Abagirizwa bose barahakana kuba barakoze icaha. Hamwe bokwagirwa n'ivyaha, bashobora guhanishwa umunyororo canke ihadabu, canke vyompi. Abashikirizamanza bavuga ko umuranzi  akorera Londres, Gianluigi Torzi,  yanyonyeje Vaticano mu gukoresha amafaranga yayo mu kugura imitahe yo muri iyo nyubakwa yo muri Chelsea yari guca isubirwawo ngo ivemwo amazu y'agaciro yo kubamwo. Torzi avuga ko ibivugwa bishingiye ku kwumva ibintu ukutariko. Ubutariyano buriko buragerageza ngo burabe ko  Ubwongereza bumubarungikira. Mu kwezi kwa kane Papa yafashe ingingo ko aba kardinari n'abepiskopi bagirijwe ivyaha bashobora gukurikiranwa n'abacamanza basanzwe - aho gucirirwa imanza n'aba kardinari nk'uko vyahora. Umukuru mushasha ajejwe amafaranga muri Vaticano, Juan Antonio Guerrero, avuga ko Vaticano iriko irashiramwo inguvu zitari bwigere ziboneka kugira ikorere ku mugaragaro mu bijanye n'amafaranga. Ku wa 24 ukwezi kw'indwi, ku ncuro ya mbere Vaticano yashize ahabona ido n'ido ry'imitahe yayo: amazu 4.051 mu Butariyano n'izishika 1.120 i Londres, Paris, Geneve  na Lausane. Furera Guerreo yagize ati: ''Twamenyereye gukorera mw'ibanga, ariko twamenye ko mu vyerekeye ubutunzi, gukorera ku mugaragaro bidukingira kurusha gukorera nw'ibanga."

column2: Burundi: Gen. Maj. Evariste Ndayishimiye azoserukire CNDD-FDD mu matora ni inde?
column3: Kuri uyu wa Mungu 26/01/2020 niho Jenerali Majoro Evariste Ndayishimiye yemezwa n'abanywanyi b'umugambwe CNDD-FDD ngo azoserukire uwo mugambwe mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa gatanu uno mwaka. Yatowe mw'ikoraniro kaminuza ridasanzwe ry'uwo mugambwe ryabereye i Gitega, umugwa mukuru wa politike w'u Burundi, inyuma y'igikorane cari kimaze minsi itatu kibera muri iyo ntara. Iryavuzwe riratashe kuko izina rya Evariste Ndayishimiye ryari rimaze iminsi rizunguruka ku mbuga hwaniro zitandukanye ko ari we afise amahirwe yo guhiganirwa ico kibanza kugira ngo asubirire Perezida Petero Nkurunziza. Evariste Ndayishimiye yinjiye mu rutonde rw'abandi ba candida bamaze kumenyesha ko bemejwe n'imigambwe yabo kugira ngo bayiserukire muri ayo matora ategurwa ko azoba ku wa 20/05/2020. Mu mwaka wa 2018, u Burundi bwarahinduye ibwirizwashingiro, ivyanuganurwa ko yari amayeri ya Perezida Nkurunziza yo kurondera kwigumiza ku butegetsi, nk'uko abakuru b'ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika basanzwe babigira. Hagati aho, umunsi ariterako igikumu yatangaje abatari bake aho amenyeshereje ko atazokwisubirako ku vyo yari yemeye igihe yitoza mu 2015, ko cari ikiringo ciwe ca nyuma. Ariko kuri benshi, amazinda ntiyaheze n'aho yagumye abisubiramwo igihe cose. Rero, ayo matora abaye mu mugambwe CNDD-FDD amaze amazinda ku bibaza ko Perezida Nkurunziza yari agifise umugambi wo gusubira kwitoza ngo abandanye atwara igihugu. Ingingo yo kwitoreza ikindi kiringo mu 2015 yatumye u Burundi bwinjira mu ndyane za politike, maze imigenderanire y'u Burundi n'ibihugu bitari bike iratoseraka. Evariste Ndayishimiye ni umunyamabanga mukuru w'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD  kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani 2016, aho uwo mugambwe usubiriyemwo itunganywa ryawo, asubirira Pascal Nyabenda yari umukuru wawo. Yavukiye muri komine Giheta y'intara ya Gitega ubu isigaye ari umugwa mukuru wa politike w'u Burundi kuva mu 2018. Jenerali Ndayishimiye azwi ko yarwanye muri uwo mugambwe ucitwa umuhari, mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye yari amaze amezi atatu ku butegetsi. Melchior Ndadaye yari yatowe ku wa 01/06/1993, ashikirizwa ubutegetsi ku wa 10/07/1993.  Inyuma y'amezi atatu gusa, ni ukuvuga ku wa 21/10/1993, yaragandaguwe n'igisirikare c'ico gihe, bica bituma igihugu cinjira mu ntambara hagati y'Abarundi bo nyene yamaze imyaka irenga cumi. Jenerali Ndayishimiye ari mu bacitse kw'icumu mu bwicanyi bwakorewe abanyeshure b'Abahutu kuri kaminuza y'u Burundi mu kwa gatandatu 1995. Yaciye ahamvya abandi barwanyi b'umuhari, ico gihe wari ucitwa CNDD ishami ryawo rikitwa FDD, urongowe na Leonard Nyangoma yawutanguje mu 1994. Uyo muhari, mu nyuma wagiye kwitwa CNDD-FDD, umaze kwinjira mu masezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha yo mu 2000 ugashira ibirwanisho hasi mu 2003, Jenerali Ndayishimiye yarakoze mu biro bikuru vya gisirikare. Inyuma y'amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu ya 2005 yatsinzwe na CNDD-FDD, Jenerali yaragenywe nk'umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu 2006-2007, imbere y'uko agenwa kuba umuhanuzi wa gisirikare mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Ku myaka 52 y'amavuko, Evariste Ndayishimiye aharurwa mu bategetsi bakomeye b'igihugu.

column2: La Haye: Kabuga Felicien yasubiye kumenyesha ko adashaka uwumwunganira
column3: Felicien Kabuga akekwa uruhara muri jonoside yo mu Rwanda yasubiye kubwira sentare ko adashaka uwumwunganira, Maitre Emmanuel Altit. Yabivugiye mu kwumvirizwa kw'uno munsi kwabaye hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa none, kwari ukwo kuraba nimba uruhande rurega n'ururegwa ata nzitizi bagifise zotuma urubanza rudatangura ukuri kwamye. Umucamanza w'igisata c'i La Haye mu Buholandi c'urwego rwasigaranye imanza zasizwe na Sentare Mpanavyaha Mpuzamakungu yashiriweko u Rwanda, Iain Bonomy, yabanje gusubiramwo intambwe zose uru rubanza rumaze gucamwo kuva uwuregwa agifatwa. Yibukije yuko yemerewe kuburanira i La Haye hako yojanwa i Arusha muri Tanzania kubera imvo z'amagara, anavuga yuko sentare ishikirizwa ivyegeranyo vy'ukuntu amagara y'uwuregwa yifashe. Ku nshuro zibiri zose kwumvirizwa kwagomvye gushirwa mu mwiherero bisabwe n'uwunganira Bwana Kabuga ari we Maitre Emmanuel Altit. Ku nshuro ya mbere urubanza rwashizwe mu mwihero igihe umucamanza Iain Bonomy yabaza niba hari inzitizi Bwana Kabuga yoba agise zobuza urubanza gutangura. Maitre Altit yavuze ko hari ikibazo c'amagara adashobora kuvugira ahabona, umucamanza aca ashira urubanza mu bwiherero. Kwumvirizwa kwashizwe mu mwiherero ubugira kabiri nyuma y'aho Kabuga aherewe ijambo ngo avuge inzitizi we abona zoba zikiriho, akavuga yuko gushika ubu atavugana n'uwumwunganira Maitre Altit, ko atamushikiriza amakuru n'amwe akaba ahubwo ashaka yuko yosubirizwa n'uwitwa Peter Robison. Maitre Altit abajijwe ico abivugako, yaciye abwira umucambanza yuko impungenge Bwana Kabuga amufiseko atozivugira ahabona, gutyo ukwumvirizwa gushirwa kandi mu mw'iherero. Twokwibutsa ko iki kibazo co kwanka kwunganirwa na Maitre Altit, Felicien Kabuga be n'umuryango wiwe bagishikirije kuva yashikamwa imbere ya sentare ku nshuro ya mbere mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe 2020, bakavuga yuko ata kwumvikana n'uwo mushingwamanza kuriho. Bwana Kabuga, yarengutse hakoreshejwe uburyo bwa video, yongeyeko yuko kiretse uwo mwunganizi wiwe adashaka, yumva ata kindi comubuza kwitabira urubanza rwiwe. Ubushinjacaha nabwo bwahawe ijambo, buvuga yuko ata nzitizi bobo bafise, kiretse kumenyesha ko hari ingingo zibiri batazokurikirana, ingingo bise ko ari izo mu muce wa 45 A, E hamwe na 64 A mu kirego bashikirije. Kwumvirizwa kwaciye kwimurirwa ku tariki itaciye imenyeshwa. Kabuga Felicien yafatiwe mu Bufaransa itariki 16/05/2020, nyuma y'imyaka irenga 20 aronderwa n'ubutungane ku ruhara yagirizwa muri jenoside yo mu Rwanda mu 1994.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Foden, Kante, Eriksen, Martinez, Dybala, Raphinha, de Ligt
column3: Amakuru avugwa cane ni uko Chelsea yumyikanye na Manchester City ku giciro c’umwongereza Raheem Sterling akina ku ruhande. Ni mu masezerano y’imiriyoni 50 z’amapawundi, akaba yiteze gushika i Stamford Bridge gukinira uyu murwi mu kiringo c’imyaka itanu, akaba kandi afise amahirwe yo kwongerako umwaka umwe. Uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 27 azotegerezwa kubanza gukorerwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga imbere y’uko aya maezerano atangazwe. Umusatirizi w’umwongereza Phil Foden w’imyaka 22 ariteguye gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y’imyaka itandatu muri Manchester City ku mushahara w’amapawundi  200.000 ku ndwi. (Star) Arsenal ishobora, mu buryo butangaje, kwegera Chelsea iyisaba umukinyi wo hagati w’umufaransa N'Golo Kante w’imyaka 31. (Star) Manchester United izi neza ko umunya-Danemark akina hagati Christian Eriksen  w’imyaka 30 azokwimukira i Old Trafford n’aho hari amakuru ava muri Brentford ko ashobora kubandanya ayikinira. (ESPN) Ajax yabwiye Manchester United ko yokwongereza amahera ishaka gutanga irondera umunya-Argentina akina inyuma Lisandro Martinez w’imyaka 24, ikaba yari yemeye gutanga imiriyoni 43 z’ama-euros. (90 Min) Erik ten Hag kandi arashaka kwongereza akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya-Argentina Antony w’imyaka  22 asanzwe akinira Ajax nyene. (Times) United yasabwe kuzana Paulo Dybala nk’uwushobora gusubirira umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w’imyaka 37 yipfuza gusezera muri rino ci. Uyu musatirizi w’umunya-Argentina w’imyaka 28 arigenga inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Juventus mu mwaka w’inkino waraye urangiye. (Star) Aba ba Red Devils (Amashetani atukura) bariko barasunikwa n’abatanga uburyo ko bogumya Ronaldo, umukinyi yatsindiye ka gashimwe ka Ballon d'Or incuro zitanu. (Mirror) Barcelona yashikanye imiriyoni 60 z’amapawundi, harimwo n’uturusho, zitangwa na Chelsea ku musatirizi wa Leeds United umunya-Brezili Raphinha w’imyaka 25. (Goal) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25 yamaze gutegura umutima wiwe ko azoguma muri Barcelona akaba yiteguye kwankira Manchester United. (Sport – mu ki Espangol) Juventus irazi ko hari ibiganiro hagati y’abaserukizi ba Matthijs de Ligt na Bayern Munich ariko uno murwi wo mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano Serie A ntawurigera awushikira awusaba uyu mukinyi w’inyuma wa Hollande afise imyaka 22, avugwa kandi ko aronderwa na Chelsea. (Fabrizio Romano) Chelsea yabwiwe ko Bayern ishobora gushira kw’isoko umukinyi w’inyuma w’Ubufaransa Dayot Upamecano w’imyaka  23, mu gihe uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa ry’Ubudagi Bundesliga woronka De Ligt. (90 Min) Arsenal iriko irategura amahera yotanguza mu gusaba ko Benfica yoyiha umukinyi wayo w’inyuma, umunya-Espagne Alex Grimaldo w’imyaka 26. (Jornal de Noticias, iciye kuri Express) Everton ntabwo iriko irarondera umusatirizi wa Watford umunya-Nigeria Emmanuel Dennis n’aho hari amakuru avuga ko yoba yipfuza uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 24. (Football Insider) Manchester United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n’umunyegori wa Albania Thomas Strakosha w’imyaka 27 yigenga inyuma y’aho aviriye muri Lazio. (Talksport) Brighton iri mu biganiro ku masezerano yosa n’ayisumbuye gatoya n’umukinyi wa Espagne akina inyuma  Marc Cucurella w’imyaka 23, mu gihe ariko arabwa ryiza na Manchester City. (Athletic) Everton yongereje icizere co kuronka umusatirizi wa Chelsea  Armando Broja inyuma y’aho uyu murwi wa Stamford Bridge ufatiye ingingo yo kudatwara uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 20 mu bandi bafashe urugendo baja muri Amerika mu ntumbero yo kwitegurira ihiganwa ryimirije. (Liverpool Echo) Aston Villa iri mu biganiro na Sevilla ku mukinyi w’inyuma wa Suède, Ludwig Augustinsson w’imyaka 28. (Mail) Umukuru wa Napoli  Cristiano Giuntoli avuga ko umusatirizi w’Ububirigi Dries Mertens w’imyaka 35 yanse amasezerano mashasha n’uyu murwi. (Fabrizio Romano) Borussia Dortmund nta mugambi ifise wo gutiza umusatirizi wayo, umunyamerika Gio Reyna w’imyaka 19 ariko ararabwa ryiza na Rangers. (Fabrizio Romano) Brentford yegereye Wolfsburg iyisaba umunyamisiri akina imbere Omar Marmoush w’imyaka 23, ariko uyu murwi w’Ubudagi uracijijanya imitima ku vyerekeye ivyo kugurisha uyu mukinyi. (Sky Sports – mu kidagi)

column2: Nigeria: Uyu mupatiri yiyemeje gukingira ibigirwamana vy'aba Igbo biriko biraturirwa
column3: Mu gihe abavugabutumwa bo mw'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu buseruko bwa Nigeria bagenda baturira ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyo muri kahise babona ko ari ibigirwamana, umupatiri umwe w'umukatorika wewe abandanya avyegeranya. Ibi bibumbano bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu madini kama yo muri ako karere kabamwo abo mu bwoko bw'aba Igbo, basanzwe babifata nk'imana zabo kandi bemera ko bifise ubushobozi ndengakamere. Gusa abanywanyi b'aya madini kama bagenda bagabanuka kubera idini rya Gikristu - ahanini rigizwe n'amashengero ya Pentecote - rigenda ryigarurira abatari bake. Abanyamakuru ba BBC Igbo Chiagozie Nwonwu na Karina Igonikon barerekana utwigoro tw'uyu mupatiri two gukingira kahise kariko karatokombera kubera ibikorwa vy'abavugabutumwa bamwe bamwe. N'aho bamwita "umuriro waka", nta kintu giteye ubwoba kuri Patiri Paul Obayi arongoye inzu ndangamurage ishinguwemwo ibigirwamana mu gisagara ca Nnsuka kiri mu buseruko bwa Nigeria. Iyi nzu ndangamurage y'ivyumba bitatu iherereye mu kigo c'Isengero nkuru ya Katorika yitiriwe umweranda Tereza (Saint Theresa), irimwo amajana n'amajana y'ibigirwamana bitandukanye, ikibumbano c'intambwe hamwe n'ibishusho vy'imana z'aba Igbo. Iyo hagize abava inyuma y'izi mana kama, cane cane kubera inyigisho z'amashengero ya Pentecôte bamwe mu bavugabutumwa baca baturira ibi bibumbano, bavuga ko biteye kubiri n'ukwemera gushingiye ku Mana imwe, kandi ko ari "impwemu mbi zitera imikoshi". Rimwe na rimwe, hari n'abemera izo mana kama bo nyene ubwabo bavyituririra bishimikije umugani wo mu migenzo y'aba Igbo uvuga ngo: "Iyo imana ibangamye cane, icika urukwi rwo guturira". Ariko Patiri Obayi wewe yafashe iyindi nzira mu gukingira izo mana n'imanakazi, akavuga ko akoresha ububasha ahabwa n'Imana kugira ngo azake izo nguvu ndengakamere. Ibi vyamutumye bamutazira Okunerere - "umuriro uturira ibigirwamana muri mutima". Ari kuri iyo nzu ndangamurage, yavuze ati: "Naramaze gusambura izi mpwemu". "Iki ubona hano ni ikibarara. Nta kintu na kimwe kirimwo". Patiri Obayi avuga ko ahanini yigiye ku mazu ndangamurage yo mu bihugu vyo mu burengero bw'isi biriko biraterwa igitsure kugira ngo bigarukane ibibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni, aho atanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Benin Bronzes/Bronzes du Bénin (ibibumbano vy'ivyuma birenga igihumbi vyari bishashije ingoro y'umwami w'icitwa Ubwami bwa Benin, ari yo Nigeria ya kino gihe). "Naragendeye amazu ndangamurage yo mu burengero nca nsangayo ibi bibumbano, harimwo mbere n'ivyavuye muri Benin, ariho naca nigira inama yo kubibungabunga". Uwurongoye iyi sengero nkuru, Patiri Eugene Odo, arashigikiye aka kigoro kiwe, aho agereranya iyi nzu ndangamurage n'iyindi yegukira Katorika mu Butaliyano. Ati: "I Roma nk'akarorero, hari inzu ndangamurage ibitsemwo ibintu vyahinguwe mu gihe c'ubutegetsi bwa gipagani bw'Abaromani, kandi ingenzi zama zigendera iyo nzu mu ntumbero yo kwiga ingene umuntu yagiye atera imbere". N'aho iyi nzu ndangamurage ibitse ibi bigirwamana yakira ingenzi ziva kure mbere n'i Lagos, irakeneye kugarukirwa. Ibibumbano, bimwe mbere bimaze ibinjana, bisanzaye irya n'ino hasi muri iyo nzu, vyuzuye inkungugu. Hari mbere n'ivyamaze kuribwa n'umuswa. Ibi vyose ni ivyo yegeranije mu "butumwa amaze akora mu kiringo kirenga imyaka 20 aho agenda yigisha mu bisagara no mu mitumba itandukanye mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. Ati: "Abantu barandikira isengero ryanje bansaba ko ngenda kubakuriraho ibi bigirwamana bibabujije amahoro". Ni itunga rikomeye ryerekana imana z'aba Igbo z'ubwoko bwinshi. Ariko iyikomeye muri izi zose ni Adaada leja, ikigirwamana cambitswe inkofero y'injishano yasengwa n'abarondera kuvyara. Patiri Obayi avuga ko iyi imaze imyaka hafi 200. Odinani, idini kama ry'aba Igbo, ryariho imbere y'umuzo y'idini rya Gikristu n'ubukoloni.  Ni uburyo bwo guterekera aho abantu basenga umuzimu userukiwe n'igishusho kizwi kw'izina rya chi, kugira ngo ubasabire kuri Rugira Vyose, bita Chukwu. Izindi mana basenga harimwo: Si benshi bagisenga izi mana kama, kandi abenshi barahamwa cane n'abakirisu basanzwe ari na bo benshi. Imisi mikuru yabo irasuzuguritse, kandi n'imigirwa imwe imwe isa no kubandwa ibonwa nabi mbere birashika n'utuzu tw'indaro tugaterwa mu bikorwa bijanye n'ubukristu. Muri kino gihe, abenshi mu bakigendera muri aya madini kama ni abatama, n'aho ubu hari bamwe mu rwaruka bagenda bagarariza ubukristu bagashira imbere imigirwa barazwe n'abakurambere. Chinasa Nwosu, umusenyeri w'ishengero rya Pentecôte mu rusengero rwa Royal Church ruri mu gisagara Port Harcourt kiri mu buseruko, ararwanya bikomeye uku kwemera kama. Musenyeri Nwosu yatanguye kumenyekana mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990 igihe yasambura utuzu tw'indaro, aturira ivyitwa ibigirwamana, anarandura ibiti avuga ko vyari "ibiti vya shetani/satani". Ibi biti, bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivya kera cane, bizungurutswe hasi n'ibitambaro vy'amabara atukura canke yera, bigafatwa nk'ivyeranda ku bayoboke bavyo babisenga bakanabitambira. Hari bimwe usanga biri ku mihana y'abantu ariko vyinshi biri mu mashamba. Ati: "Imana ntishaka ko dusenga ibigirwamana. Idini kama rya Afrika akenshi rishingiye ku gusenga ibigirwamana". Asubiramwo amajambo yo muri Bibiriya, yongerako ati: "Imihezagiro uyironka mu gihe utaye ivyo bintu vyavumwe". Avuga ko ibishusho n'ibindi bibumbano vyanyazwe mu gihe c'ubukoloni mu burengero bwa Nigeria ubu bikaba bibarizwa mu mazu ngandamurage yo mu bihugu vy'uburengero, bitirirwa Imana iyo ari yo yose, akaba ashigikiye ko bigarukanwa mu gihugu. Hagati aho, aragabisha reta ya Nigera ko mu gihe yogarukana ibibumbano bishobora kuba vyaragizwe ibigirwamana, agatanga akarorero k'ivyitwa Ikenga biri mu nzu ndangamurage y'Ubwongereza, ko bikwiye guturirwa. Ibi vyiyumviro birarwanywa bikomeye na Patiri Obayi yiyemeje gukingira ibi bibumbano mu nzu yiwe ndangamurabe. Ati: "Ibi ni ibibumbano abana bacu bazokwigirako kugira ngo batahure neza ingene abakurambere babo bari babayeho".

column2: Sharia: kubera iki iri tegeko rya Islam ribuza umuzik? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia. Muri iri tegeko, hari vyinshi bibujijwe, kimwe muri vyo ni  umuziki. Mu ndwi iheze, umuvugizi w’aba Taliban Zabihulah Mujahid yabwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko umuziki ubujijwe mw’idini rya Islam. Mu gihe c’ubutegetsi  bw'aba Talibani mu myaka ya 1990, umuziki hafi ya wose, televiziyo n'amazu ya sinema vyari bibujijwe kandi kubirengako vyashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye. Iri tegeko Sharia ririmwo ibifatwa nk’indenzarugero. BBC yashatse kumenya ico iri tegeko rivuga n’uko Islam ifata umuziki muri rusangi, ikaba yavuganye na Haruna Nkunduwiga yigeze kurongora umuryango w’aba-Islam mu Burundi. Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga ko iri tegeko ari itegeko ngenderwako rikunze gukurikizwa mu bihugu vya Islam, ariko ridakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu nk’Uburundi kubera Islam iri kumwe n’ayandi madini. Fyonda aho hejuru wumvirize ingene Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga.

column2: Benjamin Mendy: Uyu mukinyi wa Manchester City yagirijwe ibindi vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu
column3: Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester City, Benjamin Mendy, yasubiye kwagirizwa ibindi vyaha bibiri bijanye no gufata ku nguvu. Mendy ategerezwa kwitaba ubutungane muri sentare yo mu karere ka Stockport kuri uyu wa gatatu. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27, aho ari mu gasho, ubu ahanganye n'ivyaha bitandatu vyo gufata ku nguvu, hamwe n'ikindi caha c'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Yitwariwe n'abamwagiriza barenza gato imyaka 16, bakaba bavuga ko yabakoreye ibi vyaha hagati y'ukwa cumi 2020 n'ukwa munani 2021. Uyu mukinyi mpuzamakungu w'Ubufaransa aheruka gukinira Manchester City mu mwaka w'inkino uheze kuva mu 2017, igihe yinjira muri uyu murwi avuye muri Monaco yo mu Bufaransa, aguzwe imiriyoni hafi 70 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Yabaye arahagarikwa n'uyu murwi igihe yagirijwe n'igipolisi, kugira ngo habanze kuba amatohoza. Asangiye ivyaha na mugenziwe yahoze ari umunonotsi Louis Saha Matturie, nawe nyene yagirizwa ivyaha bine nyene vyo gufata ku nguvu yakoze hagati y'ukwa gatatu 2021 n'ukwa munani 2021. Louis Saha Matturie [ntahave yitiranywa na Louis Laurent Saha  yahoze ari umukinyi wa Manchester United], umunya Sierra Leone ubu afise imyaka 40 akaba aba mu karere ka Edwin Ct, Eccles, muri Manchester mu Bwongereza, yagirijwe n'ibindi bibiri nk'ivyo hamwe n'ikindi caha c'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, akaba nawe nyene yarengukishijwe n'iyo sentare yatumyeko Mendy. Aba bagabo bompi bitezwe gucirirwa urubanza ku wa 24 z'ukwa mbere 2022.

column2: Abahitanywe na Covid-19 bamaze kurenga imiriyoni zitatu kw'isi
column3: Abantu bamaze guhitanwa na ca kiza karanda ca Covid-19 kw'isi barenze imiriyoni zitatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rikurikiranira hagufi iki kiza. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe umukuru w'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, agabisha ko isi "iriko yegereza igitigiri kitari bwabeho c'abandura" gushika ubu. Ubuhindi - igihugu gihanzwe n'ubwoko bugira kabiri bwa coronavirus - catangaje ko abantu barenga 230.000 ari bo banduye ku musi w'ejo wa gatandatu wonyene. Hafi abantu imiriyoni 140 nibo bamaze kwandura uwu mugera kuva wadutse. Ku wa gatanu, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus arongoye OMS yagabishije ko "ibitigiri vy'abandura n'abapfa bibandanya biduga ku rugero ruteye ubwoba". Yongerako y'uko "mu mezi abiri aheze, ibitigiri vy'abandura ku ndwi vyiyongereye hafi incuro zibiri kw'isi". Ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins rivuga ko Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubuhindi na Brezil - ibihugu bifise abanduye benshi gusumba ibindi kw'isi - vyonyene biteranije ibitigiri vy'abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera barenga umuriyoni. Itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP rivuga ko mu ndwi iheze, abantu bashika 12.000 kw'isi yose bahitanye n'iki kiza. Hagati aho, ibitigiri bitangwa n'ibihugu vyinshi kw'isi bishobora kuba atari vyo. Amadoze arenga imiriyoni 800 y'incanco za coronavirus aramaze guhabwa abantu mu bihugu 165 kw'isi yose. Hagati aho, Dr Tedros yabwiye abategetsi ba ONU ku wa gatanu ati: "Ubusumbasumbane mu bijanye no kuronswa incanco nico kibazo nyamukuru muri kino gihe - kandi turiko turananirwa". Ibihugu bimwe biramaze kuronka no gucandaga abanyagihugu bavyo batari bake. Ivyo bihugu bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanyagihugu bavyo bamaze gucandagwa, aha harimwo nk'Ubwongereza na Israel, bifise agahengwe kuko ibitigiri vy'abandura vyagabanutse cane rwose. Abahinga bo kw'ishure kaminuza  Imperial College London bavuga ko isekeza ry'ugucandaga ririko riragabanya abandura, abapfa n'abinjizwa ibitaro. Muri iyi ndwi, umuganga akomeye w'umunya Israel yavuze  y'uko yemera ko Israel - aho abarenga igice c'abanyagihugu bose bamaze gucandagwa - iri mu gushika ku rugero rw'aho igihugu cose kizoba gikingiwe. Ibi rero biri uko mu gihe hari ibihugu vyinshi bikirindiriye kuronswa incanco za mbere. Ibi nivyo vyatumye OMS igabisha ko hari ubusumbasumbane mu kuronswa incanco, aho biboneka ko zitariko zitangwa ku rugero rumwe hagati y'ibihugu bitunze n'ibikenye. Dr Tedros avuga ko mu bihugu bitunze, ica kane (1/4) c'abanyagihugu bamaze gucandagwa, mu gihe mu bihugu bikenye ari umwe ku bantu amajana ane (1/400). OMS iriko ikorana n'umugambi mpuzamakungu covax, mu guhimiriza ko ibihugu bitunze vyosangiza incanco ibihugu bikenye. Gushika mu mpera z'unwo mwaka, covax itegekanya ko yoba imaze gutanga imiriyaridi zibiri z'amadoze kw'isi yose, gusa incanco zimwe zisaba ko umuntu aterwa doze zibiri. Abahinga kandi bafise impungenge ku kuntu izi ncanco ziriko ziratangwa ubu zidashobora kurwanya ubwoko bushasha bw'iyi ndwara bukwirakwira ku muvuduko udasanzwe. Hariko harakorwa ubushakashatsi kugira ngo incanco zisubirwemwo kugira zishobore kurwanya ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera. Prof. Adam Finn ari mu murwi w'Ubwongereza ujejwe incanco (JCVI), avuga ko yiteze ko incanco zigiye kugenda zita inguvu buke buke uko uwu mugera uzogenda uhinduka.

column2: Ukraine: Putin yategetse ingabo kubandanya zisatira inyuma yo gufata Lysychansk
column3: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya yategetse umushikiranganji wiwe wo kwivuna abansi kubandanya basatira Ukraine inyuma y’aho ingabo z’ico gihugu zigaruriye igisagara ca Lysychansk. Perezida Putin yerekanywe ku mboneshakure y’Uburusiya atera akamo ingabo ziri hakurya kubandanya intumbero yazo nk’uko biri “mu nteguro zamaze kwemezwa”. Ifatwa rya Lysychansk risigura ko ubu intara ya Luhansk yose iri mu minwe y’Uburusiya. Mu ntango buramatari w’umunya-Ukraine yavuze ko iki gisagara bakivuyemwo kugira ngo Abarusiya ntibagisambure bibereye kure. Abasirikare ubu bagiye ku bindi birindiro bishasha vyakomejwe, nk’uko buramatari Serhiy Haidai yabibwiye BBC. Avuga ko guhebera Abarusiya iki gisagara n’intara ya Luhansk cabaye ikintu kibabaje, ariko akongerako ati: “Iyi ni intambara imwe gusa dutakaje, nti dutakaje urugamba”. Yasavye ibindi birwanisho biva mu Burengero kugira ngo bashobore guhangana n’inguvu z’Uburusiya. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky arizeza ko ingabo za Ukraine zizosubirayo kugira zisubize Lysychansk "kubera ibirwanisho bigezweho biriko birongerezwa”. Uburusiya bwarongereje inguvu mu bitero vy’amabombe mu bisagara vyegereye akarere ka Donbas, aho uduce turi mu micungararo ya Sloviansk n’ibarabara riri hagati ya Lysychansk na Bakhmut ari two twiziziwe, nk’uko ingabo za Ukraine zibivuga. Intara za Donetsk na Luhansk zose hamwe nizo zigize akarere k’amahinguriro ka Donbas. Perezida Putin yabonetse abwira umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi  Sergei Shoigu ko ingabo zagize uruhara mw’ifatwa rya Luhansk zikwiye “kuruhuka kugira ngo zitegurire urundi rugamba”. Avuga ati: "Iyindi mirwi y’ingabo, harimwo umurwi wo mu Buseruko n’umurwi wo mu Burengero, itegerezwa kurangura imirimo yayo hakurikijwe integuro zamaze kwemezwa”. Yizeye kandi ko no kuri izo mpande zindi bazoshika ku ntambwe nk’iyatewe mu ntara ya Luhansk. Imbere gato y’uko atanguza igitero kuri Ukraine ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), Putin yari yemeje Luhansk na Donetsk nk’ibihugu vyigenga. Inyeshamba zegamiye Uburusiya zatanguje intambara muri ako karere mu 2014 - umwaka nyene Uburusiya bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea. Haraciye indwi irenga ingabo z’Uburusiya zigaruriye Severodonetsk – igisagara cabaye umunyota kubera ibibombe vy’Uburusiya. Avuga ku ngingo yo kuva muri Lysychansk, Haidai yavuze ati: "Igisirikare cacu kiba caragumije iki gisagara igihe kirekire, ariko ingabo z’Uburusiya ubu zifise amahirwe menshi ku birwanisho vya rutura n’amasasu. Zari gusambura iki gisagara zibereye kure, rero ntaco vyari bimaze kugumayo”. Haidai avuga ko ubu ingabo zimukiye ku birindiro biri mu ntara ya Donetsk ihana urubibe na Luhansk, ariko ko abantu 10.000 bakiri muri iki gisagara.

column2: Tanzania-Dr Philip Mpango:Video y'umushikiranganji abeshuza ko yapfuye yaneguwe cane
column3: Video ibabaje y'umushikiranganji  wa Tanzania ajejwe ikigega ari imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru kubeshuza ibihuha vy'uko yapfuye yaneguwe cane, benshi bakavuga ko bitari bikenewe kandi  ari ukumugirira nabi. Ku ndwi iheze prezida John Magufuli yari yebeshuje ivyo bihuha , avuga ko Dr Philip Mpango akiriho kandi ariko aratora mitende. Ku wa kabiri, Dr Mpango, ahagatiwe n'abakozi bo kwa muganga babiri , batambaye udufukamunwa, yasomye itangazo imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru mu bitaro vyitiriwe Benjamin Mkapa ku murwa mukuru Dodoma. Yarakoroye   aranahagirika kenshi  kugira abashe gusubira guhema neza igihe yariko arasoma iryo tangazo. Ntibizwi indwara agwaye iyariyo ariko yavuze ko yari afise "ingorane zo guhema" kandi ko yari akeneye  umwuka(oxygene). Yavuze kandi ko yakize. Uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Tundu Lisu yaneguye abategetsi baretse ngo iryo tangazo rigenewe abamenyeshamakuru risomwe. Ati: "Ninde yaretse umuntu arwaye ngo akore ivyo, yarakorora kandi ntiyari yambaye agafukamunwa. Yategerzwa kuba ariko araruhuka  anavurwa.'' Lissu yongeyeko ati uko "n'ukwigira sindabibazwa'' Dr Mpango yageze ahantu ikigumbagumba kiramufata igihe yariko arahoza ababuze yongera asaba imbabazi ko atashoboye  imigirwa yo gusezera icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar Sef Sharif Hamad, yapfuye ku ndwi iheze ahitanywe na Covid-19,n'umunyamabanga mukuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu John Kijazi n'uwahoze ari umukuru wa banki nkuru y'igihugu Prof Benno Ndulu. Dr Mpango ati: "Narababaye kubona  ata n'umwe nashoboye guherekeza ariko ndabifuriza amahoro adashira." Hamaze kuvugwa impfu nyinshi zifatiye kuri Covid-19 muri Tanzania ariko ntizigeze zemezwa icese canke naho vyavuzwe ko umugera wa corona atari wo waziteye. Ariko ubu Tanzania  ubu bwa vuba yarahinduye imvugo, ubu abategetsi ntibakivuga koi co gihugu ata Covid-19 ikirangwamwo ahubwo bagahamiriza abanyagihugu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kwikingira harimwo kwambara agafukamunwa.

column2: Mboma na Masilingi bo muri Namibia bompi ntawuzokwiruka 400m muri olympic kubera testosterone nyinshi
column3: Umukobwa w'umuyabaga wo muri Namibia  Christine Mboma - yaciye umuhingo wa metero 400 wari umaze imyaka 30 - mu batarenza imyaka 20 ku wa gatatu - yavuye mu bazohiganwa kuri uwo mwanya mu nkino za olympic za Tokyo kuko basanze umubiri wiwe ufise inkabuzo/umusemburo kamere wa testosterone uri ku rugero rurenze urwemerwa n'urwego ruraba izo nkino kw'isi,  World Athletics. Umwanya wari wagizwe n'uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 18 Mboma ku wa gatatu mu gisagara co muri Pologne ca  Bydgoszcz waza ubigira ndwi mu myanya mito ku 400m wirutswe n'umugore gushika ubu - ukaba wamuha amahirwe yo kuronka umudari w'inzahabu kuri izo metero i Tokyo.
