Ariko komite ya olympic ya Namibia (NNOC - CGA) yemeje ko abo bakobwa bompi batazoshobora guhiganwa kuri izo metero kubera amategeko ya  World Athletics ku bagore bari mu mugwi w'abafise  "Differences of Sexual Development", canke DSD, inyuma yo gupimwa n'urwo rwego. NNOC -CGA yavuze mw'itangazo ko  "bikenewe cane ko abantu bumva ko abo banonotsi bompi atawari azi ko afise ico kibazo. Nta n'uwo mu muryango yari abizi, naho n'umumenyereza wabo canke NNOC -CGA." Mboma yari amaze umwaka atera imbere bigaragara, agumya asumvya aho yari amaze kugera, anaca imihigo mu gihugu,  ku mugabane mbere no kw'isi ku metero 400. Umwanya wiwe w'amasekunda 48.54 -hafi ica cenda kuri cumi (9/10) wihuse kurusha umwanya wa mbere  mwiza wari uhari gushika ubu wagizwe n'umudagikazi wo mu buseruko  Gritt Breur mu 1991 - wari muto cane ku buryo ubwo nyene yaciye aba umwe mu bohiganiwe umudari w'inzahabu na cane ko muri iyo ndwi uwundi mukeba kuri izo metero, Salwa Eid Naser wo muri Bahrain, yari yafatiwe ibihano vy'imyaka ibiri kubera kurenga ku mategeko yo gufata imiti yongereza inguvu zo kwiruka. Ariko uko gutera imbere cane kwatumye World Athletics imukurikiranira hafi, ica isaba ko hasuzumwa  ibipimo vya mbere vyari vyakorewe muri Namibia. Ibindi bipimo vyaciye bikorwa mur iyi ndwi aho bompi Mboma na Masilingi bagirira imyimenyerero ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubutariano Roma, ''inyishu ikaba yaje ivuga ko abo banonotsi bompi umubiri wabo usanzwe ufise inkabuzo kamere za testosterone zirenze urugero". Itangazo ry'urwego rwa Namibia rujejwe inkino za olympic rivuga ko "NNOC -CGA n'umuganga wacu aguma avugana n'umuganga wa World Athletics ku vyerekeye ibigiye gukurikira kuri abo banonostsi babiri." "Tuzokwihweza inkuru zose. Turizeye kazoza kabo nk'abanonostsi bo mu rwego rwo hejuru. Christine na Beatrice bompi bazoshobora guhiganwa ku metero 100 na 200. "Umumenyereza ariteguye kubandanya akorana n'abo bakobwa kuri izo metero mu gihe tukiraba ikigiye gukurikira." Mboma na Masilingi bompi bazohiganwa ubwa mbere mu nkino za olympic i Tokyo mu Buyapani, aho izo nkino zitegekanijwe hagati y'itariki 23 ukwezi kw'indwi n'itari 8 ukwezi kw'umunani. World Athletics irabuza abagore bari mu mugwi wa DSD guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya metero 400 na mile imwe (1,6km) mu mugwi w'abagore kiretse babanje gufata imiti igabanya urugero rw'inkabuzo ya testosterone. Ni co cakuye  umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba, umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Caster Semenya n'umunya-Kenya Margaret  Wambui mw'ihiganwa ku metero 800 mu  nkino za Tokyo. Uko ari batatu nibo bari baronse imidari kuri izo metero mu nkino za Rio mu 2016. Francine Niyonsaba ubu azogeragaza amahirwe yiwe ku metero 5,000 mu gihe  Caster Semenya we vyamunaniye kuronka umwanya usabwa kugira aronke uburenganzira bwo guhiganwa kuri izo metero mu nkino za Tokyo. World Athletics ivuga ko urugero runini rw'iyo nkabuzo rwongereza  kutaruha no gukomera kw'imitsi bigaha amahirwe abafise ururi hejuru cane kurusha abandi. Caster Semenya amaze igihe  yarajanye urubanza muri sentare kugira iyo ngingo ivanweho, ubu akaba arugejeje muri sentare ya Buraya yubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu. Avuga ati: ''Iyo ngingo nta nsiguro igira. Nzoguma ngwanira uburenganzira bwanje."

column2: Malaria-Malawi: Ubwa mbere kw'isi  urucanco rutanzwe mu gihugu cose
column3: Malawi yatanguye isekeza ryo gukingira ku bwinshi  abana malaria mu kubaha urucanco rw’iyo ndwara, kikaba arico gikorwa ca mbere nk’ico kw’isi, nk’uko bivugwa na  Muganga Dr Neema Kimambo aserukira muri ico gihugu ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw’isi, OMS. Aho muri Malawi hariko harakoreshwa urucanco  rumwe rwonyene rumaze kwemezwa na OMS. Urwo rucanco ruzwi nka RTS,S rwarageragejwe incuro nyinshi mu bihugu vya Malawi, Ghana na Kenya muri iyi myaka mike iheze. Mw’igeragezwa ryarwo rya vuba kuva mu 2019, OMS yafashije mw’icandagwa  ry’abana 360.000 ku mwaka  muri ivyo bihugu bitatu. Iryo geragezwa ryerekanye ko mu bahawe urwo rucanco, 30% y’abana bafise hagati y’amezi 5 n’amezi 17 baronka ubudahangarwa. Urwo rugero ruri hasi rw’ingene urwo rucanco rukingira vyatumye hari abibaza niba koko bokwirirwa bararurondera. Ishirahamwe Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation risanzwe rishigikira gukora incanco, nta ruhara rutaziguye rifise mu gushigikira iryo sekeza ryatanguye muri Malawi kuko ryibaza ko  vyoba vyiza gusumba gushira amafaranga mu bundi buryo bwo kurwanya malaria hamwe n’izindi ncanco ziriko ziratunganywa, nk’uko bivugwa n’urubuga Devex. RTS,S rwa kompanyi ikora imiti ya GSK (GlaxoSmithKlein) rwari rumaze imyaka 30 ruhingurwa. N’aho urwo rucanco rufise urugero ruri hasi rwo gukinga, rwatumye hiyongera icizere co kubuza gupfa bamwe mu bantu 400.000 bahitanwa buri mwaka n’iyo ndwara ikwiragizwa n’imibu, benshi muri abo  akaba ari abo muri Afrika. Mu 2020, abantu barenga miriyoni 4 muri Malawi barafashwe na malaria, kandi kuri abo barenga 2.500, cane cane bafise munsi y’imyaka itanu, vyaremejwe ko bishwe n’iyo ndwara. Uwujejwe igisata co kurwanya malaria muri ico goihugu, Muganga  Michael Kayange, yabwiye ikiganiro Focus on Africa  ca BBC ko urwo rucanco ubu ruzobuza zimwe muri izo mpfu. Ati: ‘’Turazi neza ko rufise urugero ruto cane rwo gukora… (ariko) mu kurwanya malaria, nta buryo na bumwe buhari bushobora vyose. Ntituriko turavuga ngo urwo rucanco rwa malaria ruje kuyizimanganya burundu, ariko ni bumwe mu buryo bwo kuyizimanganya’’. Izindi ngingo zirimwo gutanga imisegetera irimwo umuti yo kwikingira imibu iyo abantu baryamye. Urwo rucanco ruzotangwa mu gihugu cose. Muganga Kayange yavuze ko abana bose bafise munsi y’imyaka itanu, aho bari hose, bazotegerzwa kururonka. Urwo rucanco rutangwa kane - rimwe buri kwezi mu mezi atatu ya mbere hanyuma irya kane haheze amezi 18.

column2: Burundi: 'Turiyamirije abatwitiranya n'umugambwe' - Abepiskopi gatolika
column3: Inama y'Abepiskopi b'i Burundi imenyesha ko ibabajwe n'uko hari bamwe bashaka kuyitiranya n'umugambwe biturutse ku gikorwa bakoze mu matora aheruka nk'indorerezi, mbere bakanashikiriza amahinyu bayabonyewo. Biri mw'itangazo ryasomwe n'umukuru w'iyo nama musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye atanga umuco ku ruhara rwayo muri ayo matora. Iyo nama imenyesha ko itishimiye ingene sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro yavuze ivyo yashikirijwe "nk'uko yoba yaritwaye ku vyerekeye amatora". Ku wa 04 z'uku kwa gatandatu, iyo sentare niho yashikiriza ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa 20/05/2020, aho yanavuze ko utunenge twashikirijwe n'inama y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, co kimwe n'ibirego vyatanzwe n'umugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ata shingiro bifise. Mw'iryo tangazo, musenyeri Joachim Ntahondereye  arongoye inama y'abepiskopi amenyesha ko itigeze yitwara muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingio. Ati: "Ico yakoze kwabaye ukugira ico ishikirije icese ku vyerekeye igikorwa c'uburorerezi yari yaronkeye uruhusha". Abasenyeri b' i Burundi bavuga ko ata mvo n'imwe yari ihari y'uko bitwara ngo kuko uruhara rwabo muri ayo matora cari igikorwa c'umurorerezi kandi bakagendera ku ngingo ngenganyifato y'abarorerezi b'amatora. Avuga ko igikorwa c'abarorerezi kwari ukwandika n'ukugumya gusa amahinyu y'ivyabaye yiboneye n'amaso yiwe gusa. Musenyeri Ntahondereye ati: "Turababajwe n'uko Inama y'abepiskopi yafashwe mu buryo butumvikana nk'uko yoba yaritwaye , ivyo navyo bigatera agapfungu mu mitima y'abantu". "Turanse ko twitiranywa n'umugambwe canke n'umuntu uwo ari we wese yahiganywe mu matora". Inama nkuru y'abepiskopi b'i Burundi, CECAB, yararungitse abarorerezi bayo barenga 2,700 mu makomine yose bashoboye kuja mu tuzu tw'amatora bahisemwo, nk'uko babivuga mw'itangazo ryabo ryo ku wa 26/05, iminsi ine inyuma y'ayo matora. Mw'iryo tangazo bari bamenyesheje ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twari gushobora gutuma ivyari gutangazwa ko vyayavuyemwo bishobora kutizigirwa. Inyuma y'iryo tangazo, hari bamwe babonye ko Ekleziya Gatorika mu Burundi itari yishimiye ivyari vyaraye bitangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko ari vyo vyavuye mu matora. Hagati aho, inyuma y'aho Evariste Ndayishimiye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi atangarijwe burundu na sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro ko ari we yatsinze ayo matora, iyo nama y'abepiskopi yaranamukeje mw'itangazo ryayo ryo ku wa 05/06, inamusaba kuba "umukuru w'igihugu wa bose".

column2: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Coronavirus: Inkingo batanga zikingira ubwoko bwose bwayo?
column3: Muri rwa rukurikirane rw'inyishu ku bibazo vyanyu ku kiza ca Coronavirus, muganga Leonard Nduwayo akorera mu Bufaransa atangura yishura ku kibazo ca Bigirimana Aloys abaza ati: Incanco batanga zikingira ubwoko bwa Coronavirus bwose?

column2: Haribonekeza ubukene bwa Amstel ndende na bock mu Burundi
column3: Haraciye igihe mu Burundi hibonekeza ubukene bw'ikinyobwa ca Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock nk'uko abakunzi b'izi nzoga babivuga. Abihereza ivyo binyobwa bavuga ko bisigaye ari umuzi w'ibuye, bikaba ngombwa ko bihereza Primus canke Royal badakunda, canke bakanywa za skol bavuga ko ziva mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, zigurishwa ku giciro kiri hejuru. Umwe ati: "Si benshi bashoboye kwigurira skol kuko zirazimvye". Hampande y'inzoga za Amstel, haranavugwa kandi n'ikena ry'amafanta yo mu bwoko bwa coca. Ikompanyi Brarudi iremera ko izo nyobwa zikenye, ariko ko ikibazo kiri ahanini ku bakiriya b'umurengera muri kino gihe. Aho ni mu gihe hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro. Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi, aremeza ko iyo ngorane iriho ariko ko bakora ibishoboka kugira ngo bayitorere umuti. Ati: "Mu gihe nk'iki, turonka abanywanyi b'umurengera, ariko Brarudi iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ishobore gushimisha abakiriya bayo". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko mu 2015 ubutunzi bw'Uburundi bwagabanutse ku rugero rwa -3.9%, mu 2016 bukagabanuka ku rugero rwa -0.6%, mu 2017, ariko bukaduga kuri 0.5% nayo mu 2018 bukaduga kuri 1,6%. Iyi banki ariko ivuga ko iri duga ryo mu myaka ibiri iheze ari rito cane ugereranyije n'ivyo igihugu gikenera, ikena rikomeye ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ihagarikwa ry'intererano z'amakungu ivyo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku rudandazwa rw'ibiva hanze.

column2: Novak Djokovic: Singwanya kwicandagisha ariko nemeye guheba ibikombe haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco
column3: Novak Djokovic  avuga ko yopfuma aheba gukinira ibikombe vyo muri kazoza haguhatirwa kwiteza urucanco rwa Covid -19. Mu kiganiro cihariye na BBC, yavuze ko ataho ahuriye n'abagwanya incanco, ariko ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'umuntu bwo guhitamwo ico ashaka. Djokovic yabajijwe niba yohitamwo guheba amahiganwa nka Wimbledon na French Open haguheba aho  ahagaze ku vyerekeye incanco. Nawe ati : "Ego, ico nico kiguzi niteguriye kuriha." Uwo mukinyi amaze gutsinda Grand Slam incuro 20 yarirukanywe muri Australia mu kwezi guheze reta y'ico gihugu imaze gufuta  visa yiwe ku mpari zijanye no kuba aticandagishije. Djokovic, asanzwe ariwe wa mbere kw'isi  muri tennis y'abagabo, avuga ko yari yarasonse uruhusha rudasansazwe rwo kwinjira muri ico gihugu gukina mw'ihiganwa rya Australian Open kubera yari amaze iminsi aheruka gukira Covid-19. Ariko umushikiranganji wa Australia ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira , Alex Hawke, ubwiwe yaciye afuta visa y'uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 34, ku mvo z'uko kuba ari muri Australia vyari gushobora "kugumura" bigaha intege  agatima ko kugwanya incanco. Yabwiye BBC ati "Sinigeze ngwanya incanco", yemeza ko yatewe incanco akiri umwana, "ariko namye nshigikira uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ico ushira mu mubiri wawe." Mu kiganiro caciye irya n'ino ibibazo vyinshi, ica mbere kuva apfungiwe i Melbourne muri Nzero (ukwa 1), Djokovic yisiguye ku bijanyue n'igihe yatorwa ko yanduye umugera wa corona muri Kigarama (ukwa 12) hamwe n'ingene abona incanco. Djokovic  yavuze ko yizeye ko ingingo zijanye n'ukwicandagisha ku mahiganwa amwe amwe zizohinduka,  anavuga ko yizeye ko "ashobora kuzokina iyindi myaka myinshi". Ariko yanemeje kandi ko yiteguriye guheba amahirwe yo kuba umugabo wa mbere w'ibihe vyose muri tennis kubera uko yumva ibintu. Umukeba wa Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, amaze gutahukana intsinzi 21 za Grand Slam, gutyo akaba ariwe mugabo wa mbere afise intsinzi nyinshi za wenyene kurusha abandi bose. Abajijwe igituma, yishuye ati: "Kubera ica ngenderwako mu gufata ingingo ku vyerekeye umubiri wanje kirakomeye kuruta igikombe canke ikindi kintu ico arico cose. Jewe ngerageza gukurikiza ivyo umubiri wanje ushaka uko bishoboka kwose." Djokovic  yavuze ko yamye ari umuntu ashira imbere "kumererwa neza, amagara, kurya neza," kandi ko ingingo yiwe ku ruhande rumwe yatumwe n'ingaruka nziza ibintu bimwe bimwe nko guhindura ingene arya n'ingene aryama, vyagize ku bushobozi bwiwe nk'umunonotsi. Avuga ko aguma "ari maso" ku bijanye no gushobora kuzokwicandagisha muri kazoza "kuko  turiko turagerageza gutora, twese hamwe, inyishu nziza ishoboka yo kurangiza Covid". "Sinigeze ngwanya kwicandagisha. Ndatahura ko, kw'isi yose, abantu bose bariko baragerageza gushira inguvu mu kurwanya uwo mugera, kandi bizeye ko ugiye kurangira vuba." Umwihwezo w'umunyamakuru Fergus Walsh Incanco (doses) zirenga  miriyaridi 10 za Covid ziramaze guterwa kandi abantu hafi batandatu kuri 10 kw'isi yose baramaze kuronka nibura rumwe. N'ukuvuga ko hari amakuru menshi. Nko ku yindi miti myinshi, incanco za Covid zirashobora kugira ingaruka, ariko integuro yazo ku mutekano ni nziza cane. Zimaze gukiza ubuzima bw'abantu badaharurwa, zakingiye abantu kurwara bakaremba, kandi zishobora kubuza kurwara Covid igihe kirekire. Izi ncanco zakozwe mu mwanya muto cane, ubundi gukora urucanco bikunze guteba kubera ibibazo vyo kuronka uburyo. Abahinga bagize uruhara mu kugerageza incanco za Covid, hamwe n'inzego zijejwe  kuzemeza, bavuga ko ataco birengangije mu bijanye n'umutekano wazo. Hari ingaruka zishika gake cane zibonekeje hagitangura gutangwa izo ncanco ku bantu ama miriyoni, ari naco gituma abagenzura bama bariko barabikurikirana indwi ku ndwi. Biragoye kumenya ibindi Djokovic akeneye canke yifuza kumenya.  Avuga ko adafise amakuru akwiye ku "rucanco" nk'uko umenga hari rumwe gusa. Hari nyinshi.  Nk'umunonotsi,  ivyago vyo kurwara Covid ni bike. Ariko ntibingana n'ubusa. Kanatsinda amaze kuyirwara kabiri. Uruhusha rudasanzwe rwo kwemererwa kwinjira muri Australia kandi aticandagishije rwasabwe hatavuzwe uwurusavye uwari we, kandi rwemewe n'imigwi y'inzego zibiri zigenga zo muri Australia. Ariko hari n'urundi rupapuro rw'urugendo, rwagiyemwo ikosa. Djokovic aremera ko "vy'ukuri, iryo kosa ku rupapuro rwo gusaba visa ntiryakozwe ibigarankana." "Ryaremewe kandi riremezwa na sentare y'igihugu mbere n'umushikiranganji ubwiwe mu bushikiranganji bw'abinjira n'abasohoka muri Australia. "Ico abantu bashobora kuba batazi ni uko  ntirukanywe muri Australia ku mvo z'uko ntari naracandazwe, canke ko hari amategeko narenze canke ko nagize ikosa mu kwuzuza urupapuro rwo gusaba visa. Ivyo vyose vyaremejwe na sentare y'igihugu n'ubushikiranganji bw'abasohoka n'abinjira. "Igituma nirukanywe muri Australia n'uko umushikiranganji ajejwe abasohoka n'abinjira yakoresheje ububasha bwiwe mu gufuta visa yanje agendeye ku kwibaza ko nshobora guha intege abafise agatima ko kurwanya incanco mu gihugu canke mu gisagara, ivyo navyo nkaba ntavyemera na gato."

column2: Burundi - AMB: Umukuru mushasha Bright Ndayishimiye avuga ko guterana amajambo bigiye guhagarara
column3: Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye yatorewe kurongora ishirahamwe ry'abaririmvyi mu Burundi, Amical des Musiciens du Burundi, AMB, mu kiringo c'imyaka itanu,  avuga ko bagiye gukorera hamwe mu guteza imbere umuziki. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umuziki Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye agiye kurongora iryo shirahamwe mu kiringo c'imyaka itanu, icegera ciwe akaba ari umupfasoni Kimana Edith, umupfasoni w'umuririmvyi Mugani Desire azwi kw'izina ry'ubuhizi rya Big Furious. Uwo mukuru mushasha wa AMB avuga ko azi ingorane zihanze umuziki w'i Burundi kandi bigiye gutorerwa inyishu. Agira ati: "Kugira ibintu bigende neza, dukeneye gusa kumenya ico [dushaka], aho tukironderera n'ingene tukirondera. "Tugiye guhanahana ivyiyumviro n'abo dukorana mu mwuga nk'abahinyanyuzi b'umuziki, abamenyeshamakuru eka mbere n'abawumviriza kugira dusenyere ku mugozi umwe. Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye avuga ko ivyadindije umuziki w'i Burundi ari umwumvikano muke urangwa mu baririmvyi no guterana amajambo ku mbuga hwaniro. Avuga ko bigiye gutora inyishu. Ati: "Tugiye guhimiriza abaririmvyi kuza baraganirira muri AMB ivyo batumvikanako batarinze kwararazanya ku mbuga hwaniro. "Ingorane zirabaho ariko si vyiza ko zandagara mw'ibarabara." Ikibazo gikomeye gihanze umuziki w'i Burundi, n'uko utungisha abandi abawukora ataco bawukuramwo. Haraciye imyaka itari mike hari ikigo kijejwe gukingira ivyahinguwe n'abantu, OBDEA (Office Burundaise des Droits d'Auteurs), ariko ntikibuze ko abantu baguma bavuza banashiramwo indirimbo z'abandi. Uwo aramutswa AMB mushasha avuga ko ivyo biri muri bimwe bagiye gutorera inyishu. Ati: "Vyari bigoye kugira dukingire ivyacu twese kandi na twebwe ubwacu tutumvikana. Habura aho tuganirira neza ico kibazo kitwega twese. Ubu ko habonetse abarongozi bashasha ba AMB, bemewe na bose, ico kibazo kizova mu nzira. Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye avuga kandi ko bagiye gushira inguvu mu kwunga ubucuti n'abandi baririmvyi bo mu bindi bihugu, kugira umuziki ndundi umenyekane mu makungu. Agira ati: "Tuzogendera amashirahamwe y'abaririmvyi yo mu bindi bihugu, tugiriranire amasezerano azotuma bavuza imiziki yacu ku buryo hari uwugiye kugirisha igiteramo muri ico gihugu, azosanga izo ndirimbo bazizi. Kuva ishirahamwe AMB rishingwa mu 1986, n'ubwa mbere abaririmvyi bo mu Burundi bategura amatora ya bose, inyuma y'imyaka myinshi batwarwa mu biringo mfata kibanza. Bright Olivier Ndayishimiye asanzwe azi ivyerekeye umuziki kuko yatanguye ari umutamvyi, imbere y'uko aba DJ. umumenyeshamakuru hanyuma umuhinyanyuzi (Producteur). Yize ivyo gufata amajwi muri Cinema, ubu akaba ari mu batunganya agakino 'Agashi' gaca ku maradiyo amwe amwe yo mu Burundi gatanga inyigisho ku nyifato ijanye n'amagara meza.

column2: Imvo n'Imvano ku musi mukuru wa Noheli abakristu kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu
column3: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze mu kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 25 ukwezi kwa 12 mu 2021. Imvo n'Imvano y'uyu musi yerekeye umusi mukuru wa Noheli, aho abakristu hirya no hino kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu. Buri mwaka, abemera Kristu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni hirya no hino kw'isi barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli. Noheli y'uyu mwaka, ibaye mu gihe ikiza Covid kibandanya kuvugwa mu bihugu bitandukanye kw'isi no mu gihe haherutse kugaragara ubundi bwoko bita Omicron bwandukira ku buryo bwihuta. Muri kino kiganiro, twahisemo guha umwanya abakunzi b'Imvo n'Imvano bifuje kutubwira uko bariko barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli, ari na ko tugenda tubashikiriza uturirimbo dutandukanye two guhimbaza uyu musi. None Noheli yiteguriwe gute muri iyi misi ikiza coronavirus cakwiragiye kw'isi? Ababa mu karere k'ibiyaga binini n'abari mu bindi bihugu eka mbere n'abari mu makambi y'impunzi bariko bayihimbaza gute? Inyishu ni muri kino kiganiro. Mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo, muri studios za BBC i Nairobi.

column2: India: Ingene umwambaro wa hijab wambarwa n'abagore bo muri Islam uteje ibibazo
column3: Intara yo mu Buhindi yugaye amashure yisumbuye na kaminuza biturutse ku kibazo c'umwambaro wa hijab kiriko gikurikiranirwa hagufi n'amakungu inyuma y'aho uwuharanira agateka ka muntu Malala Yousafzai yatsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel avyinjiriyemwo. Reta y'intara ya Karnataka iri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi yafashe iyi ngingo inyuma y'aho abanyeshure bihereye amabarabara mu myiyerekano ishingiye ku bakobwa bambara uwu mwambaro wo mw'idini rya Islam, imyiyerekano yandurutsemwo imigumuko. Kuri uyu wa gatatu, sentare nkuru y'iyo ntara itegekanya kwiga ku rwandiko ruvugira abagore b'aba Islam. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho abanyeshure batandatu b'urwaruka bagiriye imyiyerekano imbere y'ishure ryegukira reta ku kibazo co kwambara hijab, imyiyerekano yaciye ikwiragira ku yandi mashure. Abanyeshure batari bake b'aba Hindu nabo baciye biha amabarabara bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ibara ry'ikimenyetso c'idini rya Hindu - mu kwiyamiriza abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab. Ejo ku wa kabiri, umupfasoni Malala - umugore yarokotse igitero c'aba Taliban muri Pakistan afise imyaka 15 ahorwa ko yariko avugira abakobwa ko boronswa uburenganzira bwo kwiga  - yateye akamo abategetsi b'Ubuhindi ko bogira ico bakoze kugira "bahagarike inenwa abagore b'aba Islam bakorerwa". Uyu mupfasoni w'imyaka 24 yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Kubuza abakobwa kuja kw'ishure bambaye hijab zabo ni ibintu bibabaje. Ivyo gufata nabi abagore birabandanya - kubera uko bambaye". Mu Buhindi, uru ruhagarara rwongereje ubwoba n'ishavu mu nkehwa z'aba Islam bavuga ko ibwirizwashingiro ribaha uburenganzira bwo guhitamwo ivyo bambara. Ejo ku wa kabiri, amareresi yakwiragiye cane yerekana umukobwa w'umu Islam ariko azomerwa n'ikirwi c'abagabo bakiri bato  bamuvugiriza induru, n'impari zikomeye hagati y'abanyeshure bambaye hijab n'abandi bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu bintu bidakunze kuba, umucamanza ariko arakurikirana uru rubanza yateye akamo abanyeshure hamwe n'abandi "kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano". Ikibazo catanguye kuja hejuru igihe abanyeshure batandatu biga kw'ishure ryisumbuye ryo mu karere ka Udupi mu ntara ya Karnataka batangura imyiyerekano kubera bari babujijwe kuja mw'ishure bambaye hijab. Udupi ni kamwe mu turere dutatu tugize intara ya Karnataka iri ku nkengera - ari naho higanje umugambwe Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) w'umushikiranganji wa mbere Narendra Modi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bafata ko iyo ntara ari icicaro gitegurirwamwo poritike y'aba Hindu ari na bo benshi mu gihugu. Umugambwe BJP kandi ni wo urongoye iyi ntara ya Karnataka. Iri shure rivuga ko ryemereye abanyeshure kwambara hijab mu gihe bari mu kigo, ariko bagasabwa gusa kuzikura iyo bari mu masomero. Ariko abari mu myiyerekano  - bose bakaba bari mu mwambaro w'ishure - bavuga ko ari ngombwa ko bemererwa gupfuka imishatsi yabo mu masomero. Umwe muri aba banyeshure Almas AH, yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Turafise abigisha bakeya b'abagabo. Rero ni ngombwa ko dupfuka imishatsi yacu imbere y'abagao. Ni co gituma twambara hijab". Aba banyeshure barahakana ivyo bagirizwa ko bazambara babitegetswe n'umurwi Campus Front of India - ishami ry'umurwi w'abanyeshure ugendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vya Islam, Popular Front of India - ari na wo ubavugira. Si kenshi abagore bakunze kuboneka bambaye hijab na burka (umwitwikiro w'umubiri wose mw'idini rya Islam) mu Buhindi, aho kwerekana ibimenyetso vy'idini ku mugaragaro ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ariko umukuru w'iri shure avuga ko ari ngombwa ku mwigisha kubona abanyeshure mu maso, kandi ko umwambaro w'ishure utuma ata vangura riba mu banyeshure. Inama z'urutavanako hagati y'abanyeshure, abarongoye ishure hamwe n'abaserukira reta ntaco zashitseko. Ikibazo c'abanyeshure b'abakobwa b'aba Islam bambara hijab carakwiye mu yandi mashure makuru makeya y'i Karnataka, ariko cagiye kurenga inkombe igihe amasanamu y'aba bakobwa bari mu myiyerekano i Udupi akwirakwirijwe. Ubwo nyene, abanyeshure b'aba Hindu mu yandi mashure amwe amwe baciye batangura kuza mu masomero bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu  - ivyatumye abarongoye ishure bategeka ko iyi myambaro yompi itemewe mu bigo. Mu ndwi iheze, ireresi yafatiwe kw'ishure rikuru rya Kundapur mu karere ka Udupi yerekana abanyeshure bambaye hijab bankiwe kurengana bariyeri, yatumye ibintu biyangara. Imirwi y'abanyeshure b'aba Hindu  - abahungu n'abakobwa - nabo baciye batangura imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza bagenzi babo bigana bambaye hijab. Gusa nta mishamirano yari bwabe gushika ejo ku wa kabiri - hasigaye amasaha makeya ngo sentare itangure kwiga urwo rwandiko - aho baciye batangura guterana amabuye mbere baranaturira mu bisagara bimwe bimwe. Abategetsi b'abakere baciye bashira mu ngiro ingingo ya 144 (Section 144) - itegeko ryo mu gihe c'ubukoloni ryabuza abantu barenga bane gukoranira hamwe - mu ntumbero yo guhagarika iyi migumuko. Mu karere ka Shivamogga, umurwi w'abanyeshure b'abahungu bafashwe amashusho baduza ibendera ry'umutugutu kw'ishure ryabo, reta ica itangaza ko hagiye gukorwa amatohoza. Mu karere ka Mandya, ireresi yazungurutse cane yerekana umukobwa yambaye burka asugerezwa n'umurwi w'abagabo bambaye ibitambara vy'umutugutu. Mu gihe babandanya bamuzomera bavuga ngo Jai Shri Ram (twogereranya na 'Mana nziza'), nawe yarihagarayeko, ashira ijwi hejuru ati "Allah Akbar" (Imana ni yo nkuru) mu gihe abarongoye ishure bamuherekeza bamuvanaho. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Mu nyuma, uyo mugore azwi kw'izina rya Muskan yavuze ko umukuru w'iryo shure yamwemereye ko azomushigikira. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru The Indian Express ati: "Hari abandi bakobwa b'aba Islam na bo nyene bazomerewe nk'uku. Abarongoye ishure be n'umukuru waryo ubwiwe ntibigeze batubuza kwambara burka, none ni kubera iki nokwumviriza abo hanze?" Umutegetsi mukuru mu gipolisi yabwiye BBC Hindi ko ibi ari "ikibazo gito" kandi ko bafise ibintu mu minwe. Reta y'intara ivuga iki? Umushikiranganji w'indero w'intara ya Karnataka Nagesh ashigikiye abategetsi b'ishure bavuga ko, vyaba ibitambara n'ibisikafu vy'umutugutu, vyaba ibitambara vy'imyitwikiro, vyose ntivyemewe mu bigo vy'amashure. Avuga kandi ko aba banyeshure bagumuwe "n'inkozi z'ikibi". Afatiye ku kungene ishami rya poritike ry'umurwi Popular Front of India ririko rigerageza gushinga imizi mu karere ko ku nkengera, Nagesh yabwiye BBC Hindi ati: "Vyose bishingiye kuri poritike. Ibi vyose biriko biba kubera amatora yimirije mu mwaka uza". Sentare ivuga iki gushika ubu? Sentare yahawe inzandiko zibiri zivugira abari muri iyi myiyerekano. Rumwe ruvuga ko ibwirizwashingoro ry'Ubuhindi ritanga uburenganzira kuri buri muntu guhitamwo ivyo yambara. Urundi narwo rukarwanya itegeko riherutse gushingwa na reta y'intara ritegeka inyambaro yemewe mu mashure, ribuza ibitambara vyo mu mutwe n'ama hijab. Imbere y'uko urubanza rutangura kwigwa, igihe umushingwamanza yari asavye ko rwunguruzwa, umucamanza Krishna Dixit yaranse. Ati: "Ibishobisho vyose bigume hanze. Ibwirizwashingiro ni Bhagavad Gita (igitabo ceranda c'aba Hindu). Jewe nzokorera ku ndahiro nagize igihe ntangura akazi. Si vyiza ko abanyeshure baguma hanze". Uyu mushingwamanza aburanira abari mu myiyerekano avuga ko itegeko rya reta ribuza hijab riteye kubiri n'amategeko kandi ko rihonyanga ibwirizwashingiro - agasaba kandi ko sentare ifata ingingo mfatakibanza yokwemerera abanyeshure kubandanya biga imbere y'uko ibibazo bitangura.

column2: Umushikiranji w'amagara muri Kongo yasezeye kubera ukutumvikana mu kurwanya Ebola
column3: Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo yatanze imihoho mu kwiyamiriza ingingo ya leta yo mu ndwi iheze yo kwifatira mu minwe kurwanya ebola mu buseruko. Olly Ilunga yanditse ikete ryo gutanga imihoho aho yavuze yuko hari ukwivanga gukabije mu gutunganya ibikorwa vyo guhangana n'iki kiza, ca kabiri muri kahise kimaze guhitana benshi. Yiyamirije kandi igitsure co hanze catumye hakoreshwa urikingo rwa kabiri rwa Ebola rukigeragezwa, kandi yari yasavye ko rutokoreshwa. Kuva mu kwezi kw'umunani abantu barenga igihumbi n'amajana indwi baramaze kuhasiga ubuzima. Mu ndwi iheze ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, ryavuze ko ico kiza ubu kimaze gufatwa nk'ikibazo mpuzamakungu.

column2: Barcelona: Gerard Pique avuga ko hakenewe impinduka zikomeye inyuma y'agasuzuguro ka nijoro
column3: Inyuma y'igihe kitari gito Barcelona yiganje mu mupira w'amaguru, haraciye igihe itsindwa mu buryo buteye isoni, ivyaraye bibaye nijoro vyo yo bikaba ari agahomerabunwa. Urukino rwa nijoro rwayihuje na Bayern Munich mw'ihiganwa rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere I Bulaya (Uefa Champions League), aho Barça yaraye ikubiswe ibitsindo 8 kuri 2 vyatumye Gerard Pique avuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka zikomeye muri uyo murwi. Uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 33, yashoboye gufasha Barcelona gutsindira ibikombe 20 mu myaka 12 avuga ko bibaye ngombwa "ari we azoba uwa mbere kuva muri uyo murwi" mu gihe wobona ko ari co gikenewe. Barcelona yaraye itsinzwe mu buryo butari bwigere buyishikira ku mugabane wa Bulaya kuva igihe kitari gito, inyuma y'ihiganwa ryo mu gihugu hagati La Liga ryagiye kurangira Barça itakaje igikombe catahiye Real Madrid. Pique ati: "N'ukuri twaraye twigonze ku rutare". "Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere, canke ubwa kabiri, canke ubwa gatatu. Ntabwo turi mu nzira nziza." Abandanya avuga ati: "Abamenyereza n'abakinyi baragenda hakaza abandi, ariko mvugishije ukuri haraciye igihe kirekire tudafise inguvu z'ugushobora guhangana n'iyindi mirwi ku rugero rw'umugabane w'Ubulayi". "Nibaza ko twese hamwe dutegerezwa kwicara tukiyumvira hagati yacu icokorwa ku neza y'umurwi. Ibitubayeko ntibishobora kwihanganirwa". "Biragoye cane kwemera ariko nibaza ko bizodufasha kwiyumvira icokorwa, kuneza yacu twese". "Umurwi wacu ukeneye impinduka. Sindiko mvuga umumenyereza canke abakinyi, ariko umurwi wose muri rusangi ingene utunganijwe bitegerezwa guhinduka". "Turakeneye amaraso mashasha kugira ngo ibintu bihinduke, kandi bibaye ngombwa, noba uwa mbere kuva mu murwi". Harategekanijwe amatora y'umukuru w'umurwi muri Barça mu 2021 kugira ngo barondere uwusubirira Josep Maria Bartomeu. Umumenyereza wa Barcelona Quique Setien yagiye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma muri Champions League ibintu bitameze neza na gato kuri we, inyuma y'amezi indwi yose yari amaze kuva mu kwa mbere asubiriye Ernesto Valverde umurwi ukaba utavyifashemwo neza muri ico gihe cose. Abajijwe ivyerekeye kazoza  k'umurwi n'ivyari bihejeje gushikirizwa na Pique, Quique Setien yishuye ati: "Si nshobora kuvuga igikenewe mu murwi, urazi ko maze amezi make cane". "Nimba Gerard avuga ko hakenewe impinduka zikomeye, aya ni amajambo akomeye cane. Harageze ko twihweza ibintu tugafata ingingo zikomeye kugira ngo twubake kazoza". Abajijwe nimba ikibazo ciwe gikenewe kwigwa nk'umumenyereza wa Barca, avuga ati: "Nibaza ko ubu nyene hakiri kare cane kuvuga nimba nzoguma mu murwi canke nzogenda. Ikiriho ni uko ibiba atari jewe ndabituma". "Ni ngombwa ko twese hamwe turabira hamwe igikenewe gukorwa, tukanigira hamwe ibintu vyose vyatumye tumaramara uku". Amahirwe yo kubandanya amenyereza uyu murwi inyuma y'ibara waraye ubonye i Lisbone ni make cane, mu gihe hari amakuru abandanya azunguruka avuga ko Barça yoba yaramaze gufatna ingingo yo kumwirukana. Chris Sutton yahoze akinira umurwi Blackburn Rovers mbere uyu murwi ugatsindira ihiganwa ry'u Bwongererza mu 1995 isumbije Man U inote rimwe rudende, yabwiye radiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Aragenda nta gisivya, ntashobora kubandanya". "Ntushobora kumaramazwa gutya nk'umumenyereza wa Barca. Ibibaye ni agasuzuguro karenze urugero". Mu bantu bavugwa ko bashobora kumusubirira, harimwo Mauricio Pochettino yahoze amenyereza Tottenham, hamwe na Ronald Koeman yahoze amenyereza Everton. Koeman, umumenyereza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubuholande 2018, yamaze imyaka itandatu akinira Barça hagati ya 1989 na 1995, mu gihe Pochettino amaze igihe atakazi afise kuva yirukanywe muri Tottenham mu kwa cumi na rimwe 2019. Umwanditsi w'umunya Espanye mu bijanye n'umupira w'amaguru, Guillem Balague , avuga ati: "Pochettino nta kazi afise kandi ni umuntu azi neza uyo murwi". "Umukuru w'umurwi Josep Maria Bartomeu na Pochettino basanzwe ari abagenzi". Kuva Setien atanguye kumenyereza uyo murwi mu kwa mbere uno mwaka, ntiyiyumviswemwo n'abantu benshi muri uyo murwi, mu gihe abakinyi bakomeye muri uyo murwi harimwo na Lionel Messi batigeze biyumvamwo ubuhinga yashaka kuzana mu murwi. Nibwo bwa mbere Barça itsinzwe ibitsindo umunani mu rukino rumwe kuva mu 1946 igihe Sevilla iyitera ibitsindo 8-0.
