column2: Burundi - Ingoma: Reta yahagaritse abavuzi b'ingama b'umugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu
column3: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwahagaritse abatimbo b'umugwo Amagaba ikiringo c'amezi atandatu bagirizwa kuvuza ingoma bahonyanze amategeko azigenga. Abo bavuzi b'ingama canke abatimbo bagirizwa kurenga kw'itegeko ryo ku wa 20 ukwezi kwa cumi mu 2017 rigena uko ingoma zivuzwa haba mu Burundi canke mu makungu. Mu ngingo y'ubwo bushikiranganji bugira buti: "Twishimikije ko dutegerezwa kugikingira no kubungabunga akaranga k'Uburundi, duhagaritse mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu abavuzi b'ingoma  bo mu mugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. "Abo batimbo bavugije bongera batamba ingoma bahonyanze akaranga k'abarundi." Muri ico kiringo, nta muntu n'umwe wo mri abo batumbo azoba afise uburenganzira bwo kuja mu biteramo vy'akaranga canke kuja mu wundi mugwi canke abantu berekana akaranga k'abarundi. Ku musi wa mbere itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri mu 2022, igihe hariko harugururwa igiteramo ca Buja Sans Tabou, abavuzi b'ingoma b'wumugwi Amagaba bagaragaye bavuza ingoma bambaye amakoti n'amakaruvati. Iyo nyifato ikaba yarateye impari ku mbuga hwaniro, aho bamwe babitera ivyatsi abandi bavuga ko ari ibisanzwe kuko imico igenda ihindagurika uko imisi igenda irahera. Mw'itangazo Amagaba yasohoye itangazo aho bavuga ko bakiriye nkama ibihano bafatiwe. Bagira bati: "Kubwo abatimbo b'Amagaba, turakiriye nkana igihano ubushikiranganji bwadufatiye kw'ikosa ryadushikiye ryanatirimukije abatari bake n'aho atari yo ntumbero yacu." Inyuma y'umusi umwe igiteramo Buja Sans Tabou gitanguye, ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwaciye bufata ingingo yo kugihagarika kubera ivyo vyabaye.

column2: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
column3: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

column2: Nigeria: Umupasitori atangisha 700$ kugira yereke abantu 'irembo ribashikana mw’ijuru’
column3: Umuvugabutumwa muri Nigeria ari mu yabira inyuma yo kubwira abantu ko azi irembo ribashikana mw'ijuru riri mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'ico gihugu, ariko ko kugira aribereke bategerezwa gutanga amafaranga. Pasitori Ade Abraham yarezwe mu gipolisi n'umwe mu banywanyi biwe avuga ko uyo mu pasitori yamutangishije 310.000 y'amanaira (amafaranga yo muri Nigeria), angana n'amadorari y'abanyamerika 750, kugira ngo bashobore kubona iryo rembo avuga ko riri mu gisagara ca Araromi-Ugbeshi, mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu muvugabutumwa yemereye BBC ko koko yabwiye abantu ivy'iryo rembo, akavuga ko ari "Imana akorera" yarimweretse mu ntumbero yo kuraba aho abanyashengero biwe bageza mu kwemera kwabo, ariko akavuga ko ata muntu n'umwe aramuha amafaranga. Ishirahamwe ry'Abakristu muri Nigeria ryasohoye itangazo ryikurako uyo mupasitori Ade Abraham, igipolisi co mu ntara ya Ekiti naco kikaba cegeranije inzandiko z'abanywanyi b'ishengero ryiwe, kikaba catanguye amatohoza. Ishengero rya Pasitori Ade Abraham ryahora rifise icicaro mu ntara ya Kogi, mu nyuma ryimukira mu ntara ya Kaduna, imbere y'uko ryimukira amaja mu bumanuko n'abanywanyi baryo, mw'ikambi yubatse mu ntara ya Ekiti. Uyu munyashengero yamureze ku gipolisi yaciye yisubirira muhira iwe i Kaduna kuva ico gihe, ariko umugore wiwe yaranse kumukurikira, akavuga ko "igihe c'umunezero" cari kigiye gushika vuba. Ariko uyu mugabo n'umugore badashaka ko amazina yabo amenyekana babwiye BBC ko babandanya bavugana kuri terefone umusi ku musi. Pasitori Ade, azwi kandi kw'izina rya Noah Abraham (Nowa Aburahamu), aherutse kwerekanwa mw'ireresi yazungurutse cane, aho yariko asaba abasenga Imana gutera akamo incuti zabo ziri mu mahanga gutanga intererano y'amafaranga mu rusengero rwiwe.

column2: Russia ifise umugambi wo kwigarurira ubutaka bwa Ukraine – US
column3: Uburusiya bufise umugambi wo kwigarurira ubundi butaka bwa Ukraine bukoresheje “amayeri” nk’ayo bwakoresheje mu kwigarurira akarere ka Crimea/Crimée, nk’uko Amerika ibivuga. Yisunze amatohoza ya Amerika, umuvugizi w’Inama nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano John Kirby avuga ko Uburusiya buriko burategura inzira yo kwigarurira ubutaka. Uturere twa Ukraine tumaze kwigarurirwa dushobora kubamwo amatora ya kamarampaka “y’uruhendo” yo kwegekwa ku Burusiya imbere y’ukwezi kw’icenda, nk’uko abivuga. Uburusiya bwarigaruriye Crimea buyonkoye kuri Ukraine mu 2014 inyuma ya kamarampaka yabonetse cane ko itari yemewe. Kirby yabwiye abanyamakuru ati: "Turashaka kubisigurira neza abanyagihugu ba Amerika. Nta n’umwe ashobora kwihenda. [Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya] ariko arakoresha amayeri yo mu 2014". Yagiriza Uburusiya gushira intwaro mu minwe y’abategetsi batemewe begamiye ku Burusiya mu burongozi bw’uturere twa Ukraine twigaruriwe, mu ntumbero yo gutegura amatora ya kamarampaka yo kwegukira Uburusiya. Kirby avuga ko ibizoba muri ano matora bishobora gukoreshwa n’Uburusiya mu “kugerageza gusaba ko ubutaka bwa Ukraine bubwegukira”. Uburusiya bwaramaze gushiraho abategetsi b’uturere babwo mu bice vya Ukraine bumaze kwigarurira. Crimea yigaruriwe n’Uburusiya mu 2014 inyuma y’amatora ya kamarampaka yateguwe gihutihuti - amatora amakungu yafashe ko ateye kubiri n’amategeko, aho abatoye bahisemwo kwegukira Uburusiya. Abenshi mu bari bashigikiye Kyiv baranse kuja muri ayo matora kandi n’imyiyamamazo ntiyabaye mu muco. Amatora asa n’ayo mu tundi turere twa Ukraine nta nkeka ko ashobora kuba nk’aya nyene, aho uwo ari we wese yorwanya umugambi wo kwegukira Uburusiya yorwanywa bikomeye. Kirby avuga ko ashize ahabona imigambi y’Uburusiya “kugira ngo isi imenye ko umugambi uvugwa wo kwigarurira ubutaka bwa Ukraine ari ikintu categuwe imbere y’igihe, kandi ko kitemewe n’amategeko”, mbere akaba yavuze ko Amerika n’incuti zayo bizotegerezwa kwihora vuba bwango. Avuga ko mu turere dushobora kwigarurirwa harimwo Kherson, Zaporizhzhia, Donetsk na Luhansk.

column2: Luis Suarez: 'Barcelona yaramfashe nabi gushika aho ndira imbere y'uko nja muri Atletico Madrid'
column3: Luis Suarez avuga ko yarize kubera ingene Barcelona yamufashe nabi imbere y'uko ayivamwo akaja muri Atletico Madrid. Uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 33 akomoka muri Uruguay yarangije ikiringo ciwe c'imyaka itandatu yari amaze muri Barça mu kw'icenda akavuga ko yankiwe kuja mu myimenyerezo n'umurwi mukuru imbere y'uko agenda. Ati: "Iyi minsi yambereye mibi cane. Nararize kubera ivyo nariko ndakorerwa". "Imbere ya vyose nababajwe n'ingene ibintu vyariko birakorwa, kuko umuntu ategerezwa kuvyemera igihe ciwe kirangiye". Suarez yinjiye muri Barcelonamu 2014 avuye muri Liverpool ku giciro c'imiliyoni zirenga 96 z'amadorari akaba yabaye igihangange kigira gatatu ca Espagne yatsinze ibitsindo vyinshi. Yashoboye gutsinda ibitsindo 198, atsindira ihiganwa La Liga incuro zine, atwara n'ibikombe bine vyo mu gihugu hamwe kandi n'igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'imirwi yabaye iya mbere i Bulaya (Champions League) mu 2015. Mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2019-2020, yinjije ibitsindo 21, bikaba ari vyo bitsindo bike yinjije mu mwaka wose mu myaka itandatu yose yari amaze muri Barça. Mu gihe atari yitavye inkizo za kivandimwe za Barcelona, ayivuyemwo yari asigaje umwaka umwe ngo amasezerano afitaniye nayo arangire. Atletico yatanze imiliyoni zitarenga zitandatu z'ama euro mu kugura suarez. Amaze gutsinda ibitsindo bibiri mu nkino zitatu amaze gukinira Atletico. Avuga ati: "Sinigeze nizera ubutumwa bama bampa ngo bariko bararondera ingene botorera umuti ikibazo canje kugira ngo ibintu bigende neza". "Si bose bazi ivyabaye ariko ikibabaje gusumba vyose ni ukwitaba imyimenyerezo ariko ugashirwa ku ruhande kubera ntari nemerewe gukina mu nkino za kivandimwe zo kwitegurira ihiganwa". "Umugore wanje yarabona ingene nari mbabaye akipfuza gusubira kumbona ndiko ndamwenyura, rero igihe ndonkeye akaryo ko kuja muri Atletico, sinigeje nijijanya imitima". Lionel Messi, umusatirizi amaze gutsindira ibitsindo vyinshi Barcelona gusumba abandi bose yanditse ubutumwa ku mbuga hwaniro bwo guhoza suarez, avuga ati"yarirukanywe". Suarez ati: "Sinatangajwe n'ingene Messi yanshigikiye ku mugaragaro kuko nanje ndamuzi cane". "Arazi ingene nari mbabaye, nayo kwumva ko nagira nirukanwe nico cambabaje gusumba". "Uburyo babikoze ntibwari bwiza kandi Leo arazi ingene jewe n'umuryango wanje twababaye".

column2: Jane n'umugabo wiwe Donah Omondi bamaze imyaka 12 bubakanye, nta mwana bararonka
column3: Uravye indirimbo ziwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ntushobora na gato kwibaza ko Jane Aller ari mu bibazo bingana ukuraha mu buzima bwiwe. Kuva bubakanye, we n'umugabo wiwe Donah Omondi ntaco batakoze kugira ngo bikunde baronke ikibondo. Ariko hageze neza ko Imana ibahezagira, umugisha ukabaca mu myanya y'intoke. Jane avuga ko uru ari urugendo abagore benshi bagira mu gacerere ntibubahuke kubivugira hejuru. Jane, umuririmvyi w'indirimbo zo guhayagiza Imana muri Kenya, avuga ko yafashe kuvugira ku mugaragaro amageragezwa ahura nayo kugira ngo atere intege abandi. Jane Aller amaze imyaka 12 yubatse. Imyaka ine ya mbere yaranzwe n'ibigeragezo  bidasanzwe. Ati: "Maze umwaka umwe gusa, narasamye inda, ngira umunezero udasanzwe, co kimwe n'umugabo wanje. Ariko rero ku gihamana kibi, iyi mbanyi yarikoroye yo nyene imaze amezi atatu gusa". Kubera vyari bibaye ubwa mbere, yibajije ko ryari isanganya risanzwe, nta mutima wasimvye. Yari azi ko umwanya n'umwanya yari gusama iyindi mbanyi kandi akibaruka. Mu bijanye no gusama imbanyi, mu bisanzwe igi ry'umugore rihura n'urubuto rw'umugabo mu karingoti nyabavyeyi (trompe de Fallope), maze rigaca rija mu gitereko. Nibwo umwana aba atanguye kubaho. Ariko rero kuri Jane, ivyo gusama imbanyi ya kabiri vyabereye hanze y'igitereko. Inda nk'izo zizwi nka ectopique canke extra-utérine. Ati: "Ku munsi ugira kane natanguye kuva amaraso mu gitereko, aho si nari nzi ko imbanyi yanje yari yononekaye kandi ko ndi ku manga y'urupfu". "Muri iyo minsi ine yose numva mfise ububabare butagira izina. Kubera ko umuganga yari asanzwe ankurikirana atari ho yari ari, vyabaye ngombwa ko ndindira mpaka agarutse". "Muri ico gihe cose, sinari nzi ko umwana yari yamaze gupfa, kandi ko igitereko canje cari cuzuye amaraso yari yafatanye". Vyabaye ngombwa ko uyu mugore ashirwa mu bitaro akabagwa kugira ngo bashobore kurokora ubuzima bwiwe. Avuga ko iki cabaye igihe c'ububabare budasanzwe, atari ku mubiri gusa, ariko n'umwikomo mwinshi cane kubona abuze umwana wiwe ku ncuro ya kabiri. Jane ati: "Imbere y'uko banjana mu cumba co kubaga, vyabaye ngombwa ko muganga amfata amaraso kugira ngo ampime bisanzwe. Aho rero niho yambaza ingene nari nkiri muzima mu gihe amaraso yanje yari yavuze". Ico gihe, Jane yaciye atangura kwibaza ibibazo vyinshi cane, yuzura umwikomo mwinshi abaza Imana igituma yemeye ko aca muri ayo mageragezwa. Jane avuga ko basubiye muhira ata mwana bafise. Haciye umwanya yarasubiye arasama iyindi mbanyi, ariko yoyo nta mwanya wahaciye idakorotse. Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko n'aho yari umukozi w'Imana, we n'umugabo wiwe harageze igihe bashavura cane, nawe yuzura umubabaro mwinshi. Nta nyishu baronse ku bibazo vyiwe, mbere n'abaganga nta nyishu bamuhaye kuko igihe cose yabwirwa ko igitereko ciwe ata ngorane n'imwe gifise. Ati: "Igihe imbanyi yanje ya gatatu ikoroka, nari mu bikorwa vyo kuririmba, hanyuma kubera nari nabazwe, umushono watanguye kugira ibibazo ndiko ndaririmba nyene". "Muri uwo mwanya sinatahuye igituma nariko nca muri ayo marushwa kandi ndi umukozi w'Imana, ndiko ndirimbira Imana". Uyu mukenyezi avuga ko atumva ingene Imana yamukoresha gukiza imibiri n'imitima y'abantu aciye mu kuririmba, mu gihe wewe yabandanya abura abana igihe cose asamye imbanyi. Nico gituma ico gihe, arinze afata mikoro aririmba, yari amarira gusa, amosozi akamurenga. Avuga ati: "Aho rero ndiko ndarira abantu bibaza ko nari mu mpwemu, ntibari bazi ko ndiko ndira kubera amarushwa yo kubura abana banje". Rero igihe asama imbanyi igira kane, yumvise umunezero, ariko Jane n'umugabo wiwe bahisemwo kuja kwa muganga kugira ngo bamupime barabe ko ata ngorane afise. Inyishu zavuye mu bipimo bamukoreye zarabaciye intege. Muganga yamubwiye ko imbanyi yayisamiye mu mutsi, kandi ko mu gihe uwo mutsi wosaduka, ubuzima bwiwe bwoba bugiye mu kaga. Yagiriwe inama rero ko ari ngombwa ko bakurayo iyo mbanyi kugira ngo ntapfe. "Maze gukorora imbanyi ya kane, ibintu ntivyanyoroheye, nararize iminsi myinshi cane, mbere sinshake no kuraba impuzu nagira ngo nguriye abana  banje.  Hanyuma kandi nkaguma nibaza nti kubona maze gukorora inda zine zose, ubwo uyu mugabo wanje aracankunda"? Jane avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubereye urutare, kuko yamugumye iruhande igihe cose yagiye agira ibibazo vyo kubura abana biturutse ku mbanyi zakoroka. Bamaze kubura umwana wabo agira kane, Jane yaciye amara imyaka itari mike adasubiye gusama iyindi mbanyi. Mu mwaka uheze, niho yasubiye gusama imbanyi igira gatanu. Iyi mbanyi imaze amezi atatu gusa, yaciye ikoroka. Ikintu kidasanzwe nk'uko Jane we nyene avyivugira, ni uko bwa bubabare yagira ubwa mbere ubu atabwo yumvise. Avuga ko yaciye abona ko ata kundi ategerezwa kubifata uko biri, maze yizera ko igihe ni cagera Imana izomuha umwana. Jane Aller nk'umuririmvyi, umugabo wiwe niwe ategura akamufasha no gutunganya indirimbo ziwe. Ubuvugabutumwa be no gukunda kuririmba, ibi nivyo vyashoboye kubanywanisha. Uretse ko ari umugabo n'umugore, biyumvirira hamwe ibijanye n'ibikorwa vyabo vya minsi yose ibi navyo bikaba ari ukuririmba. Uyu mugore avuga ko umugabo wiwe yamubereye inkingi nyamukuru mu buzima bwiwe cane cane muri aya makuba y'imbanyi ziwe zikoroka. Ikibazo nyamukuru kuri we cabaye ingene ababanyi bafata ibimubako, ariko Jane avuga ko incuti ziwe za hafi nk'akarorero inabukwe wiwe yamubaye hafi cane. Kandi iyo ariko atanga impanuro ku bantu baca mu bibazo nk'ivyo acamwo abasaba kudacika intege. Ati: "Ico womenya ni uko hari abantu bahukanye kubera kubura abana, kandi n'igihe basubiriye kwubakana  gushasha bongera guhura n'ivyo bibazo nyene". "Ni nkenerwa ko abantu baca mu bibazo nk'ibi bihangana, bagakomeza urukundo rwabo bakabandanya bihanganiranira". Jane avuga ko ubuzima ari nk'ukugendesha igari, kugira ngo ntuyumbayumbe utegerezwa kubandanya urinyonga. Rero ibintu bizima biza ku bantu babandanya bizeye mu gihe ataco bafise bishimikiza mu kwizera. Jane Aller n'umugabo wiwe Donna babandanya bizeye ko umunsi umwe bazoterura umwana wabo mu maboko. Imbanyi gukoroka ni ikintu gikunze kwibonekeza cane ku bagore benshi kw'isi yose. Hari igihe ivayo hakiri kare cane mbere ugasanga n'umugore ntiyari bwamenye ko yari yaramaze gusama. Kwandura indwara zica mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, ihahamuka, ibibazo vyo mu mutwe, ibi ni bimwe mu bishobora gutuma inda zikoroka hakiri kare. Imbanyi kandi irashobora gukoroka kubera umugore yibungenze yagumye hafi y'isumu canke imiti kanaka irimwo isumu. Si ibintu vyoroshe igihe cose kumenya igituma inda zikoroka, ariko vyinshi mu bituma birashobora kwirindwa. Ingorane zo gukorora inda zirashobora gutorerwa umuti mu kuvura abagore bafise ico kibazo indwara zibibatuma, canke mu kubafasha kwirinda kwegera ahantu hari isumu canke hatameze neza. Hagati aho, hari abandi bagore inda zama zikoroka buri mwanya mbere ugasanga igituma ntikizwi. Abagore bafise ico kibazo c'imbanyi gukoroka igihe cose bategerezwa gupimwa, bakavurwa n'abahinga banonosoye ivy'izo ndwara, kugira ngo bashobore kurondera igituma biba, hanyuma bakabafasha kwibungenga gushika bashikane.

column2: New York 'yubatswe n'ukuboko kw'Imana' - indirimbo nshasha ya Cinjire
column3: Ni umuvugizi w'Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi, ariko kandi abatari bake bamuzi kw'izina rya CINJIRE, uyu si uwundi ni Pierre Nkurukiye, yahawe iryo ritazirano kubera ururirimbo n'urukurikirane rw'indirimbo yise CINJIRE rwasohotse mu 2019. Cinjire aherutse gusohora ururirimbo yise New York Chante Dieu (twovuga mu kirundi tuti New York, ririmba Imana), akavuga ko yaruririmvye ari muri ico gisagara gikomeye co muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Nkurikiye alias Cinjire yabwiye BBC ko mu kuririmba iyo ndirimbo yakozweko n'ukuntu New York yubatse vy'igitangaza, ariko asanga ibibanza vyo guhimbaziramwo Imana vyariyumanganijwe. Ati: "Nshitseyo naritegereje New York ndabona ko ari igisagara cubakitse koko, n'amazu maremare cane, mugabo ngiye kurondera ibibanza canke ingoro z'Imana, nasanze ari utuzu dutoduto, umengo ntaco tumaze, ari naho naciye ngira iciyumviro co kubabwira nti baririmbe Imana. "Nahisemwo New York kuko ari bwo bwa mbere nari ngiyeyo, nabonye ibintu bitangaje, na rirya ari ikirimba c'isi yose kuko ari ho hari icicaro c'ishirahamwe ONU. "Naririmvye ivyo mbona kuko vyarantangaje kubona mu gisagara nka kiriya ata ngoro z'Imana nininini zihari kugira ngo biboneke ko nabo bayihaye ikibanza. "Rero nashimye kuhatangira ubwo butumwa kugira ngo nabo koko bahe Imana ikibanza kiyibereye kuko yabahaye ivyo vyiza bagashobora gushika kuri biriya bashoboye kwubaka". Pierre Nkurikiye alias Cinjire avuga ko yatanguye kwandika indirimbo yiga mu mwaka wa kane w'amashure y'intango. Ati: "Niho natanguriye buke buke kuririmba". Yabandanije aririmba mw'isengero kubera yari mu mihari ya Gatorika, akaba yari mu muhari w'aba Scout. Ivy'umuziki ugezweho yagiye kubitangura ageze muri kaminuza y'inyamiramabi, ari ho yatanguye gukora ururirimbo rwa mbere rukozwe muri studio, asanzwe ari intwazangabo mu gipolisi c'Uburundi. Ati: "Kuririmba n'amabanga nsanzwe njejwe biranyorohera kuko ni ubutumwa bumwe. "Mu ndirimbo zanje nsaba abantu gushira imbere ineza bakarwanya ikibi, urwego ndimwo rw'inyamiramabi narwo rujejwe kurwanya ikibi, urumva rero ko ari ibintu bijanye". Yagiye gusohora urukurikirane rw'indirimbo (album) rwa mbere mu 2019 yise CINJIRE, izina rizwi cane yahavuye yitirirwa gushika ubu. Pierre Nkurikiye alias Cinjire avuga ko mu Burundi hakiri ikibazo nyamukuru ku banyamuziki kuko umuziki utaratangura guhemba neza canke kubeshaho abawukora nk'uko bimeze mu bindi bihugu. "Abumviriza imiziki ntibaturiha, haracariho ikibazo", niko avuga, akizera ariko y'uko mu misi iri imbere ibintu bishobora guhinduka kuko hari "amategeko ariko arahinyanyurwa". Hagati aho, avuga ko akarusho gakomeye ari uko ashoboye gushikiriza ubutumwa bwiwe uko abona ibintu, "hanyuma abantu bakabwakira bakagira ico babuvuzeko, kandi bukanagira ico bubahinduyeko". Ati: "Utanze ubutumwa ntihabura n'umwe buhindura. Ururirimbo rwanje ndarutanze ntirubura n'umwe ruryohera rukamunezera, kubwanje iyo niyo nyungu ihambaye". Nkurikiye aranegura ukungene abarundi bahurumbira umuziki wo hanze, ariko akavuga ko ahanini biva ku nzira uzananamwo, inzira avuga ko ari iz'abazungu bafise intumbero zabo n'uburyo bwo gukundisha ibintu vyabo. Ati: "Abarundi barakunda ivy'iwabo ariko baraneshwa n'ibiba bivuye hanze kuko akenshi biza mu nzira z'itangazamakuru atari iz'abarundi". Abona ko amaradiyo n'imboneshakure bidaha umwanya ukwiye indirimbo n'utugenegene vy'Uburundi nk'uko biri mu bindi bihugu avuga ko amaze kujamwo, aho usanga "indirimbo n'imico kama babiha 80%", akabona ko ari ukutamenya. Ati: "Uburundi burikwije haba mu mvyino, mu ntambo, mu ngoma n'ibindi bijanye n'imico n'imigenzo vy'Uburundi". Atera akamo ibimenyeshamakuru guha ikibanza kinini ivyo "ng'aha iwacu mu Burundi", akavuga ko bifise akanovera kuko biba ari ibintu bitarononwa.

column2: Covid: India yagize igitigiri ca mbere kinini kw'isi c'abanduye mu gihe oxygene nayo ikenye
column3: Ubuhindi bwatangaje  abantu bashasha 314.385 batowe  coronavírus mu masaha 24 - igitigiri ca mbere kini gitowe ku munsi umwe ata handi na hamwe cari bwashikweko kw'isi. Abapfa biyongeyeko 2.104 muri ico kiringo, naco nyene nico gitigiri ca mbere kinini Ubuhindi bushitseko ku munsi umwe. Bitumye ico gihugu gishika  hafi ku miriyoni 16 z'abantu bazwi icese ko banduye, ikibanza ca kabiri inyuma ya Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zigeze  ku miriyoni 31.9 bazwi. Ubuhindi bwugarijwe n'umurindi ugira kabiri wo kwandura, nabwo ubukene bukabije bw'umwuka wo guhumeka (oxygene) bukaba bwongereje ubwoba ku nzego  z'ubuvuzi zarengewe. Vyatumye sentare nkuru  y'i Dehli igera aho iruha ikanegura ingene reta mpuzantara iriko iritwara muri ico kibazo ca oxygene muri ico gisagara. Igihe bariko barasoma urubanza rwazanywe n'umuntu afise ibitaro bitandatu vyigenga, abacamanza bavuze bati: "Ibi  biteye isoni. Dukeneye kumenya ico reta iriko irakora ku bijanye  n'uko haboneka oxygene mu Buhindi". Sentare yategetse reta gukora ku buryo oxygene iva aho ihingurirwa igashikira neza ibitaro mu gihugu cose. Hari abantu benshi bamaze gupfa muri ico gihugu barindiriye kuronka umwuka , n'ubwo bitoroshe kumenya ingene igitigiri cabo kingana. N'imbuga  hwaniro aho mu Buhindi zuzuyeko ubutumwa  bw'abatabaza basaba umwuka. Abantu isinzi usanga bakoraniye  imbere y'ibitaro mu bisagara bikuru bikuru vyuzuye abarwayi gushika aho ata kibanza na kimwe gisigara. Hagati aho abategetsi bo mu ntara ikomerewe cane kurusha izindi ya Maharashtra  batangaje ko  hongeweko izindi ngingo zo kugerageza kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'iyo ndwara kuva kuri uyu wa kane ku mugoroba, mu gihe ihanganye n'iyongerekana rikomeye ry'abafatwa. Iyo ntaya yari isanzwe iri muri gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo amasaha atari make y'umunsi kuva itariki 14 z'ukwezi kwa kane. Maharashtra niyo ntara ya mbere itunze cane mu Buhindi ikaba ari nayo irimwo igisagara c'ivyashara vyinshi vy'amafaranga, Mumbai. Ninayo yagumye ari ikirimbiro rikomeye rya Covid kuva ico kiza  cadutse,  yonyene ikaba irimwo ica kane c'abandura uwo mugera mu gihugu. Maharashtra ni nayo ntara imaze  gupfamwo abantu benshi kurusha izindi ntara zose, bagera ku 67. 468. Ariko n'ubwo impfu zakomeje kwiyongera, urugero rw'abapfa ugeraranije ruracari hasi. Vikas Pandey, umunyamakuru wa BBC News i  Delhi avuga ko telefone yiwe buri igihe iba iriko irahamagarwa n'abagenzi bihebuye basaba ico yobafasha mu kurondera igitanda mu bitaro hamwe n'imiti. Avuga ko  hari bamwe ashobora gufasha n'abandi atako ari bugire. Ati : " Ndazi ubwanje abarwayi benshi bamaze gupfa kuko batashoboye kuronka oxygene hakiri kare. N'ibintu bibabaje cane ku miryango kwumva ko ibitaro ababo baba bariko baravurirwamwo  vuba bigiye  kuba ata mwuka bifise". Vikas Pandey avuga ko gushika ubu reta yakoze ku buryo ata kaga gokomeye karaba, ariko biruhuta cane ko ibitaro bironswa oxygene kugira bishobore kwitaho ibitgiri vy'abarwayi biguma vyiyongera. Avuga ko abahinga bibaza igituma ibintu bimeze uko mu gihe mu kwezi kwa mbere umuvuduko w'iyo ndwara wasa n'uwahagaritswe. Asigura ko ako kanya k'agahengwe katakoreshejwe kugira hongerezwa uburyo bwo kwitaho abarwayi. Avuga ko ubu rero abanttu bariko baravyishura ku rugero aho ''twese dusanga ataco turi bufashe". Icateye uwo murindi mushasha ni igiki? Ubuhndi bwugarijwe y'iyongerekana rinyaruka cane ry'abandura mu kwezi guheze, ryatewe no gufata minenerwe ingingo zo kwirinda, hamwe n'isabukuru ry'aba Hindu ryitabiriwe na miriyoni z'abantu ukongerako amoko mashasha y'uwo mugera, harimwo ubumaze kwihindura kabiri. Ubwo bwatowe muri 61% y'ibipimo vyafashwe muri Maharashtra , nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kiraba indwara z'imigera. N'amakoraniro y'amatora - arimwo na ministre wa mbere Narendra Modi - nayo ntiyahagaritswe mu ntara ya West Bengal, ahabaye amatora ku bice ku bice  mu ndwi ziheze. N'uyu munsi hari ahari kuba amatora ariko reta yahagaritse ingingo yo kuyabandanya.

column2: France: Cardinali Ricard ari mu basenyeri 11 bagirizwa guhohotera abana
column3: Umu cardinali w’Umufaransa Jean Pierre Ricard yavuzwe izina na Ekleziya Katolika nk’umwe mu basenyeri 11 bagikorera canke bigeze gukorera iryo shengero bagirizwa guhohotera abana Mw'itangazo, uyo mu cardinali yanditse ko yahohoteye  umwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 igihe yari akiri padiri kw'iparuwase haraheze  imyaka mirongo 35,  kandi ko ubu ashobora gukura meza mu mabanga yiwe. H﻿araciye umwaka, umugwi washinzwe utoye ivyemeza ko hari ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abantu bashurashuza abana, bakorera mw'ishengero Katolika ry'Ubufaransa mu myaka irenga mirongo ibiri. Uko   bagirizwa ari 11 bose barashengejwe mu butungane canke bahabwa ibihano na Ekleziya Katolika. I﻿bi vyagiye ahabona mu gihe mu gihe hariko haraba inama y'abepisikopi b'Ubufaransa i Lourdes, mu bumanuko bushira uburengero bw'Ubufaransa. Musenyeri mukuru Eric de Moulins-Beaufort yabariye abamenyeshamakuru ko muri abo 11 harimwo Musenyeri wa Creteil Michel Santier yagiye mu karuhuko ko muzabukuru mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo kwagirizwa ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina mu myaka  mirongo ibiri iheze. Bamwe bariko bakorwako amatohoza ajanye n'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina  mu gihe abandi bagirizwa kubinuma. Musenyeri mukuru yasomeye ku mugaragaro ikete rya Cardinali Ricard, aho yavuze ko yitwaye nabi "mu buryo bukwiye guhanwa" ku mwana w'umukobwa w’imyaka 14 kandi ko  mu vy’ukuri imyitwarire yiwe yagize ingaruka mbi kandi  zitazopfa zibagiwe kuri uwo mwana w'umukobwa. Mu gihe ubu ari mu karuhuko k'iza bukuru inyuma y'imyaka 18 ari musenyeri wa Bordeaux, uwo mu cardinali w'imyaka 78 yavuze ko yamusavye ikigongwe kandi asaba n'imbabazi ku bantu bose yababaje. M﻿usenyeri ahari ubu, Jean Paul James, yavuze ko yifatanije umubabaro n'abakorewe icaha, aca asubira gutera akamo uwo ari we wese yoba yarahohotewe muri iyo diyoseze kubivuga. Umukuru w'imana y'abepisikopi yavuze ko kiretse uwo mu Cardinali na Michel Santier, abasenyeri batandatu bagirijwe n'ubutungane canke ishengero kandi ko  umwe aza yaramaze gupfa. Yongeyeko ati:"A﻿bandi bahoze ari abasenyeri bariko baragirwako amatohoza n'ubutungane mu gihe uwundi wa gatatu amaze kwitaba abashikirizamanza." Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kwezi kwa 10 mu 2021 , akanama kigenga kashizweho na Ekleziya Katolika yo mu Bufaransa kasanze abana ibihumbi 216 barahohotewe kuva mu myaka ya 1950, benshi muri bo bakaba bari abana b’ababahungu bari gahati y’imyaka 10 na 13. Umukuru w'ako kanama yavuze ko hari ivyemezo ko hari abakoze ihoterwa bashika 3.200 kandi ko ivyo vyemezo vyarahawe  abashikirizamanza mu mice 22 aho ingingo zo gukurikiranwa kuri ivyo vyaha zishobora gufatwa. U﻿bufaransa ni kimwe mu bihugu aho ibivugwa ko habaye ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina vyateye vyanyiganyije ishengero ya Ekleziya Katolika. Mu mwaka uheze, Papa Francis yarahinduye amategeko agenga ishengero Katolika kugira ihohoterwa rifatiye ku gitsina, kwiyegereza abana ugamije kubashurashuza, gutunga ama film y’abana bariko barahuza ibitsina hamwe no gukingiranira ikibaba ku caha c'ihohoterwa, ko ari icaha gihanwa n'amategeko ya Vatikano. Mu butumwa yatanze imbere y'uko hatangura iyo nama y'abepisikopi i Lourde, Papa yavuze ko ishengero ryo mu Bufaransa ryaguye mu gahundwe kubera ihohoterwa ryakozwe na bamwe mu bungere baryo. I﻿yo nama yari ifise intumbero yo guteza imbere uburyo bwo guhanahana amakuru no gukorera mu muco ku mabi y'ihohoterwa ishengero rifisemwo uruhara.

column2: Guinea-Bissau: CEDEAO iriyamiriza 'kugerageza' gutembagaza ubutegetsi
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'akarere k'ibihugu vya Afrika y'uburengero, CEDEAO/ECOWAS, ryiyamirije ico ryise "kugerageza" gutembagaza ubutegetsi muri Guinée-Bissau, risaba abasirikare gusubira mu makambi. Ibi bikurikiye amakuru y'uko hari abantu bambaye impuzu z'igisivile batanguye kurasa bari hafi y'inyubakwa ya leta yaberamwo inama hagati y'umukuru w'igihugu n'umushikiranganji wa mbere b'iki gihugu, aho bari hakaba hatazwi. Ibiro ntaramakuru Reuters bisubiramwo amajambo y'itangazo rya CEDEAO agira ati: "CEDEAO iriko irakurikirana n'impungenge nyinshi ibiriko birabera muri Guinea-Bissau... aho abasirikare bariko bararasa mu micungararo y'ingoro ya leta." "CEDEAO iriyamiriza kugerageza gutembagaza ubutegetsi ikaba inashinze ijisho abasirikare ku bijanye n'umutekano wa Prezida Umaro Sissoco Embaló hamwe n'abagize leta yiwe." Muri iyi minsi ya vuba CEDEAO yahagaritse ikindi gihugu c'ikinyamuryango, Burkina Faso, aho abasirikare batembagaje ubutegetsi.

column2: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje iduzwa ry’amakori mu kwihora Ubushinwa
column3: Prezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yatangaje ko agiye kwihora igihugu c'Ubushinwa mu kuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biva muri ico gihugu, ivyatumye ibintu biyangara mu ntambara y'ubutunzi hagati y'ivyo bihugu vyompi. Hari haciye amasaha make Ubushinwa butangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori ku bidandazwa biciye  imiliyoni 75 z'amadolari vyinjiye muri ico gihugu bivuye muri vya Amerika, ivyo Perezida Trump yiyamiriza. Bwana Trump avuga ko iyo ngingo y'Ubushinwa ari iya "politike", akabwagiriza ko bushaka "kugendera" kuri Amerika. Ubushinwa bwatangaje integuro y'ukuduza amakori kuva ku bice 5% gushika kuri 10% ku bidandazwa birenga 5000 biva muri Amerika, harimwo ivyimburwa vyo mu burimyi, indege n'ibitoro bitarahingura. Butegura kandi gutoza ikori ryari ryarabangiriweko ry'ibice 25% ku mamodokari ava muri Amerika. Abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter ejo ku wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yatangaje iduzwa ry'ayo makori ku bice 5% ku bidandazwa vyinjira bivuye mu Bushinwa. Avuga ko kuva kw'igenekerezo rya 01 ukwezi kw'icumi, Amerika izoduza amakori kuri ivyo bidandazwa biciye imiliyoni 250 y'abanyamerika, kuva kuri 25% gushika kuri 30%. Avuga kandi ko ibidandazwa biciye amadolari 300 vyari vyitezwe gutozwako ikori ingana n'ibice 10% rizoduga gushika kuri 15%. Ati: "Ikibabaje, ni uko ubutegetsi bw'inyuma bwaretse Ubushinwa bukarengera inyungu za Amerika muvyo ubudandaji, ku buryo bwabaye umuzigo ku mutangakori wa Amerika. Jewe nk'umukuru w'igihugu, sinshobora kwemera ko ivyo bisubira". Bwana Trump amenyesha ko "kuri iyo mvo, yategetse" amakompanyi ya Amerika kuvavanura n'Ubushinwa bakarondera abandi bakorana, agapfuma arondera ingene yokorera muri Amerika. Izo ngingo zerekana ukutumvikana hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri ku vyerekeye ubudandaji zatumye ibintu biba nabi ku masoko y'ivunja n'ivunjwa ry'amafarangam haba muri Amerika, canke i Bulaya. Ku munsi wa gatanu, Bwana Trump yarifatiye mu gahanga umukuru w'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu ca Amerika, Jerome Powell, inyuma y'aho avugiye ko iyo ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora gutuma ubutunzi bwa Amerika bugira ibibazo. Aciye kuri Twitter, Perezida Trump yashitse kure, aho yibajije nimba uyo mukuru w'ibanku nkuru y'igihugu atoba ari "umwansi" mukuru gusumba umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubushinwa, Xi Jinping.

column2: Hari ubwoko bwa Covid bungana gute, incanco zihasanzwe zizokora?
column3: Hadutse ubwoko bwa coronavirus bwihinduye cane abahinga bavuga ko "buteye umutima uhagaze". Kimwe mu bibazo vyihutirwa cane n'ukumenya niba incanco zizobandanya zikora? Hari ubwoko ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bwa Covid butembera mw'isi. Ivyo ni ukuvyitega kuko imigera (virus) irihindura buri gihe. Ariko ubwo bwoko bushasha, bwitwa B.1.1.529 cane  Omicron, bwatumye abahinga bagira umutima uhagaze cane kuko butandukanye n'ubwo mu ntango, ari nabwo incanco zakozwe kugira zirwanye. Bufise ubushobozi bwo kwihundura kenshi -gashika 50.  Muri ako kose, 32 kari mu murongo w'izo incanco zishobora kurwanya. Ariko haracari kare cane kugira hamenyekane ingene bubangamye. Incanco zihari gushika ubu ntizihuye cane nabwo bishoboka rero ko zidakora, nk'uko bivugwa n'abahinga. Ariko ivyo ntibisigura  ko ata gukinga zotanga na gato. Mwibuke, incanco zifise akamaro cane mu gukingira ubuzima mu kugabanya ivyago vyo kurwara ukaremba kubera ubundi bwoko bwa Covid, harimwo  Delta, Alpha, Beta na Gamma. Abaganga bavuga ko ari nkenerwa cane ko abantu baronka  igitigiri c'incanco zitegerezwa kugira baronke ubudahangarwa bukwiye ku bwoko buhasanzwe n'ubushobora kwaduka. Abahinga bagiye gukora ibipimo vyinshi kugira barabe ko incanco zizokora kuri ubwo bwoko bwadutse ubu vuba. Haracari kare, ariko abahinga bazokwiga ukwihindura gushoboka kwotuma ubwo bwoko  bwandukira kurusha kandi bukagira impfagusa ubudahangarwa bwari bwatanzwe n'incanco. Kandi bazokwiga kugira bamenye niba butera kuremba kurusha ubundi bwari buhasanzwe, Incanco  zijanye n'aho uwo  mugera wa Covid ugeze zija ziriko zirigwa kandi zigeragezwa, hamwe vyoshika zigakenerwa. Hamwe ico gihe coshika, urucanco rushasha rwoshobora kuboneka mu kiringo c'amayinga kugira rurabwe ko rukora. Abakora incanco barashobora kandi guca banyarutsa cane kuzigwiza kandi abagenzura ingene zikora baramaze kuvugana ingene boca bihutisha inzira bicamwo kugira zemezwe. Amakenga ntiyoba aheze, ariko iyo nzira yose -kuva kurukora gushika rwemezwe- yonyaruka kurusha igihe incanco za mbere za Covid zatangura gukoreshwa. Ababijejwe hari ubwo  bashinze ijisho. Ubushobora kubangama cane bawitwa  ubwoko buteye impungenge  hanyuma bukaba burimwo: Mu Bwongereza hari n'ubundi bwamuka kuri Delta bashinze ijisho, ubwo nabwo bukitwa  AY.4.2 canke "Delta plus". Nta kigaragaza ko hari na bumwe muri ubwo butera kuremba kurusha ku bantu benshi. Naho ku bwoko bwa Covid bwo mu ntango, ivyago vyinshi biri ku bantu bageze mu za bukuru canke basanzwe bagendana izindi ndwara zikomeye. Ariko naho biri uko, iyo ubwoko bwandukira cane, bwongereza igitigiri c'abapfa mu bantu baba bataronse incanco. Incanco zikingira umuntu ku rugero rwo hejuru kuremba kubera Covid-19, harimwo n'indwara zivuye ku bwoko bw'impungenge. Incanco zigabanya kandi ivyago vyo kwandura. Ariko ntizikura ivyago vyose. Impanuro yo kwirinda kwandura iguma ari imwe ku bwoko ubwaribwo bwose: gukaraba intoke, kuja kure y'abandi, kwambara agafukamunwa uri mu bantu benshi hanyuma no kwiyubara ko aho uri haca akayaga. Kuki haboneka ubwoko bushasha? Imigera (virus) ikora nka kurya kwa kopi ya carbone (carbon copy) mu kugwira, ariko ntibikora  neza. Hari igihe hajamwo ikosa gutyo igaca ihindura uko uturemangingo dupanze, bigaca bivamwo ubwoko bushasha. Iyo ivyo bihaye umugera amahirwe yo kubandanya ubaho, ubwoko bushasha buratera imbere. Uko umugera wa coronavirus uronka amahirwe yo kwikorera kopi muri twebwe -tuwuhaye indaro- niho hongerekana amahirwe ko haboneka  ubwoko bushasha. Nico gituma kugabanya kwandura ari nkenrwa cane. Incanco zifasha guhagarika guhanahana umugera kandi zikabuza ko umuntu aremba iyo arwaye Covid. Abahinga bavuga ko bishoboka ko ubwo bwoko bwihinduye cane B.1.1.529 bushobora kuba bwavuye ku murwayi umubiri wiwe utashobora kwikura indwara ya Covid vuba, gutyo biha uwo mugera uwundi mwanya wo kwihindura.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Saka, Kounde, Saint-Maximin, Bellingham, Depay
column3: Inyuma yo kugura umukinyi Oleksandr Zinchenko yahora akina muri Manchester City, Arsenal yemereye umusatirizi wayo, umwongereza Bukayo Saka w’imyaka 20, ayandi masezerano mashasha y’igihe kirekire ashobora kumutuma yongererezwa umushahara incuro zibiri ku wo asanzwe ahembwa, kugira ngo iyindi mirwi y’abakeba nka Manchester City ntihave imutwara. (Mail) Chelsea yakubise hasi Barcelona mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Sevilla umufaransa Jules Kounde w’imyaka 23, ikaba igiye kumuha amasezerano y’imyaka itanu. (Telegraph) Umumenyereza wa Ajax Alfred Schreuder avuga ko umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Brezili Antony w’imyaka 22 yiteguye kuguma muri uno murwi n’aho Manchester United imurondera muri rino ci. (ESPN) Chelsea na Tottenham iriko irakurikiranira hagufi umufaransa akina ku ruhande muri Newcastle United  Allan Saint-Maximin w’imyaka  25. (Athletic) Mu kwa gatandatu, Liverpool yarakurikiranye umukinyi wo hagati wa Borussia Dortmund umwongereza Jude Bellingham ariko uyu murwi wo mu Budagi ufata ko uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 19 ari ntakorwako muri rino ci. (Fabrizio Romano) Umusatirizi wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Memphis Depay w’imyaka 28 asa n’uwanse ivyo kwimukira muri Newcastle. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) West Ham iri hafi yo kuronka umusatirizi w’umutaliyano Gianluca Scamacca w’imyaka 23, inyuma yo gushika ku masezerano y’imiriyoni 30.5 z’amapawundi na Sassuolo. (Guardian) Aba Hammers kandi bariko bararaba ko boshika ku masezerano na Eintracht Frankfurt ku munya-Serbia akina inyuma ku ruhande Filip Kostic w’imyaka 29. (Fabrizio Romano) Umwongereza Luke Thomas w’imyaka 21 akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu muri  Leicester City ariko kandi araronderwa na West Ham. (Guardian) Arsenal na Everton yanse amahirwe yahabwa yo kugura umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Atletico Madrid umufaransa Thomas Lemar w’imyaka 26. (L'Equipe, iciye kuri Express) Newcastle, Everton na West Ham yahawe amahirwe yo kuronka umusatirizi w’umutaliyano Andrea Belotti w’imyaka 28, asanzwe yidegemvya inyuma y’’aho aviriye muri Torino mu kwezi guheze. (Sun) Leeds United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano na n’umusatirizi wa Paris St-Germain umufaransa Arnaud Kalimuendo w’imyaka 20. (Express) Crystal Palace iripfuza umwongereza akina hagati Morgan Gibbs-White w’imyaka 22, ariko wewe yipfuza kwigumira muri Wolves kugira abandanye n’urugamba rwo kurondera ikibanza muri uyu murwi. (Guardian) AC Milan yahambije Borussia Dortmund na Barcelona mu rugamba rwo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Aston Villa umwongereza Carney Chukwuemeka w’imyaka 18. (Athletic) Everton yashize ku rutonde rw’abo irondera muri rino ci umukinyi wo hagati wa Wolverhampton Wanderers umubirigi Leander Dendoncker w’imyaka 27. (Fabrizio Romano) Everton iriko irihweza umukinyi w’inyuma wa Norwich City umwongereza Max Aarons w’imyaka 22 ariko kandi akaba arabwa ryiza na Borussia Monchengladbach, Wolfsburg hamwe na Marseille. (Sun) Bournemouth iri mu biganiro bigeze ku ntambwe ikomeye mu ntumbero yo kurondera umukinyi wo hagati umwongereza Marcus Tavernier w’imyaka 23 akinira Middlesbrough. (Football Insider) Newcastle yiteze ko abandi bakinyi bagenda imbere y’uko umwaka w’inkino utangura, harimwo umwongereza yari amaze igihe kinini Matt Ritchie w’imyaka 32 akina ku ruhande. (Chronicle)

column2: Ubuhindi bwategetse Google kuriha irindi hadabu ry’imiliyoni $113
column3: Ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko caciye Google ihadabu ry’imiriyoni 113 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera ibikorwa biteye kubiri n’amategeko ajanye n’ihiganwa mu gisata c’itumatumanako, igihano kigira kabiri mu kiringo kiri munsi y’indwi imwe. Ico kigo cagiriza Google gukoresha ubwiganze ifise mu bubiko bwayo bw’ama Apps (applications)  mu guhatira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje app yayo. Iki kigo gisaba iyi kompanyi rutura y’ubuhinga kutazibira abahingura ama Apps kuriha bakoresheje ubundi buryo canke baciye mu zindi nzira. Google yavuzeko iriko irihweza ivyo birego. Umuvugizi wa Google avuga ati: “Mu kugumiza ku giciro gito,  vyatumye ubuhinga bwa digital (numérique) bukomera mbere bwugururira imiryango amamiriyoni amajana n’amajana y’Abahindi”. Uyo muvugizi yagize ati: “Tubandanya kwitaho abakoresha n’abahingura ama Apps, tukaba turiko turihweza iyi ngingo kugira ngo turabe intambwe zikurikira”. Muri iki cemezo canditse ku mpapuro 199 casohowe ku wa kabiri, ikigo c’Ubuhindi kijejwe kugenzura ihiganwa ku masoko, (Competition Commission of India, CCI) kivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amategeko amwe amwe mu bubiko bwayo bwa Play Store ategeka abahingura ama Apps “gukoresha gusa” ubuhinga bwayo mu gutanga canke kugurisha ama Apps. Ikinyamakuru Reuters kivugako ico kigo kijejwe ubugenzuzi gisaba Google gufata ingingo umunani zikosora ibi bintu mu mezi atatu, harimwo kutazibira abahingura ama Apps gukoresha ubundi buryo bwo kuriha, haba mu kugura ikibanza muri Apps zisanzwe zirimwo canke kugura ama Apps. CCI  ivuga kandi iti: “Google itegerezwa gukorera mu muco iyo ivugana n’abahingura ama Apps kandi igatanga insiguro ku mafaranga basabwa”. Iyi ni ingingo y’incamugongo ya vuba kuri Google isanzwe ihanzwe n’ibirego bituma itakaza icizere mu Buhindi. Mu ndwi iheze iyi kompanyi yatangishijwe ihadabu ry’imiliyoni 161 z’amadorari y’abanyamerika kubera yakoresheje urubuga rwa Android kugira yiganzire isoko. CCI  ivuga ko Google iriko ikoresha amasezerano y’agahato ku bakoresha ububiko bwayo kugira ngo imbuga zayo – nka Google Chrome, YouTube, Google Maps  n’izindi – zikoreshwe. Itohoza rijanye na Android ryaratangujwe mu 2019, inyuma y’imyidogo y’abakoresha Telefone zo mu buhinga bwa Android.

column2: Burundi: Rusansuma y’abashomeri, bamwe barizeye akazi abandi bati ‘nta gishasha’
column3: Igikorwa catanguye ku wa gatandatu uheze co kwandika urwaruka rwahejeje amashure rudafise akazi kizobandanya kubera ubwinshi bwabo, ni mu gihe vyari vyitezwe ko kirangira kw'isaha zitandatu ejo ku wa mbere. Mu minsi itatu, leta y'u Burundi ivuga ko yashoboye kwandika abashika 245.000, ariko kandi ko gushika ejo ku wa mbere hari hakiri benshi bakirindiriye kwandikwa. Abandikwa bavuga ko babazwa vyinshi harimwo ibijanye n'amashure bize hamwe impamyabushobozi bafise, igihe bayizonkeye, n'ibindi. Ntaco babwirwa uretse ko ari rusansuma rw'abashomeri bariko barakora. Bamwe bavuga ko ibi nyene vyabaye no mu myaka myinshi bandikwa buri mwaka, bakabona ko ata gishasha, ariko ubu bamwe barizigiye ko leta ishobora kubafasha. Igihe arahiza abashikiranganji ba leta yiwe, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yatangaje ko yiyemeje gushigikira urwaruka "cane cane bamwe bafise impapuro z'umutsindo ariko batararonka ico bakora". Umwe mu bavuganye na BBC, hampande y'amashure n'impamyabushozobi, avuga ko yabajijwe ubwoko bw'akazi yipfuza canke umutahe abona yoshobora gukoresha mu gihe yoba afise umugambi wo kurangura. Mu gihe abiyandikisha ari abahejeje amashure bakirondera akazi nk'uko binavugwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, uyu mushomeri avuga ko ataco babwirwa kuri iki. Ati: "Nta wuzi ko bagomba kuduha akazi, canke imitahe, gushika ubu turarindiriye". Uwundi mukenyezi atipfuje kuvugwa amazina yavuganye na BBC, avuga ko ico babwiwe conyene ari uko hariko hakorwa rusansuma y'abashomeri. Ati: "Jewe sinibaza ko ari akazi bashaka kuduha, kuko ivy'akazi baheruka gukoresha ikibazo, abaronse bararonse. Ariko baratubwira ko bibaye ngombwa tuzoja hamwe hanyuma bakaduha imitahe tugakorera hamwe". Uyu afise icizere gito kuko ngo sibwo bwa mbere yandikwa kuva ahejeje amashure. Ati: "Nama mbona batwanditse bigaherera iyo, turamenyereye kwiyandikisha. "Kuva umwaka wa mbere mpejeje amashure mu 2014 nta mwaka urengana batatwanditse. Maze imyaka itandatu nguma nandikwa, ariko nta cahindutse". Hagati aho, aremeza ko iri yandikwa ry'ubu ritandukanye n'iryari risanzwe rihari afatiye kuvyo yabajijwe. Yongerako ati: "Mfise icizere ko nzohava nkaronka umutahe kuko muvyo bambajije barambajije umutahe noba nkeneye kugira nshobore kurangura umugambi wo kwiteza imbere". BBC yashatse kuronka insiguro kuri kino gikorwa kimaze iminsi ine co kwandika abahejeje amashure ariko batigeze baronka akazi, uruhande rwa leta ntaco rwashimye gutangaza bikiriko birakorwa. Hagati aho, mw'ijambo ryiwe arahiza leta nshasha Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze ko mu migambi yiwe itandatu yihutirwa harimwo kuzamura urwaruka, cane cane abahejeje amashure batararonka akazi. Bwana Ndayishimiye yagize ati:"Abo nibo cane cane nshaka ko bazoba intwazangabo zirongora abandi mu rugamba rwo kugwanya ubukene ku rwego rw'intango". "Aho bukera tugira dushware mu makomine yose agize Uburundi, tuje kwegeranya urwo rwaruka mu kibiri, batwereke imigambi bafise, bashaka gukora. "Aho tuzosanga batoye kworora tuzobafasha kworora, aho tuzosanga batoye uwundi mugambi, tuzowubafasha". Ikiriho ni uko biboneka ko abashomeri biyandikisha ari benshi cane mu gihugu, nk'uko vyemezwa n'ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere ku rubuga rwabwo rwa Twitter. Ubu bushikiranganji buvuga ko ku munsi wa mbere gusa batanguye ico gikorwa handitswe abashika 45.000. Mu gihe gushika ku mugoroba w'ejo ku wa mbere, abashika 245.000 ari bo bari bamaze kwandikwa mu gihugu cose, abandi barenga 35,000 bari baraye bategerejwe kwandikwa.

column2: Burundi: CVR yatahuye ibinogo rusangi birenga 4000 vyahambwemwo abantu
column3: Umurwi wo kumenya ukuri n'ukunywanisha Abarundi, CVR, umenyesha ko umaze guharura ibinogo rusangi 4,163 vyahamwembwo abantu bishwe mu magume u Burundi bwagiye bucamwo kuva bwikukira. Ivyo biri mu cegeranyo ca mbere c'umwaka uwo murwi washikirije inama nshingamatekan na nkenguzamateka kuri uyu wa kabiri. Kubwo umurwi CVR, ico gitigiri gishobora no kuzokwiyongera kubera gushika ubu hari "Abarundi benshi bataravuga ibinogo boba bazi n'aho biherereye". Ejo ku wa mbere, uyo murwi washize ahabona  amagufa y'abantu bari hagati ya 250 na 270 yabonywe muri karitiye Kamenge iri mu gisagara ca Bujumbura, bagandaguwe mu 1993. Muri ico cegeranyo, Pierre-Claver Ndayicariye arongoye uwo murwi yabwiye abashingamateka n'abakenguzamateka ko hari ibitaravugwa. Ati: "Ibinogo vyatawemwo abishwe mu gihugu ni vyinshi, hari ivyo Abarundi bataratumenyesha kubera ubwoba canke agahinda bibibutsa. Abarundi benshi bazi vyinshi ntibaravuga ivyo babonye canke bazi". Avuga ko hafi ivyo binogo vyose vyagiye kumenyekana ari uko aho biri "hariko harakorerwa ibikorwa vy'iterambere vy'igihugu, nko kubaka amabarabara, imiserege canke amashure. Icegeranyo cabo cerekana ko mu ntara zose uko ari 18 zirangwamwo ibinogo nk'ivyo, aho intara ya Gitega, ubu ariwo mugwa mukuru mushasha w'u Burundi, yabonywemo ibinogo bishika 640. Intara ya Cankuzo mu buseruko bw'igihugu niyo maze gutorwamwo bike, aho CVR imaze kuronka ibishika 41. Mu gihe ibitigiri vy'abahitanywe n'ayo magume yagiye asinzikaza u Burundi bitazwi neza, Bwana Ndayicariye avuga ko umugwi arongoye  "umaze gutohoza no kumenya ku buryo mfatakibanza igitigiri c'abantu bashika 142,505 bishwe canke bagiye mazi mayongo". Avuga ko ico gitigiri ari ico abantu bafitiye amazina kandi berekana iyo baturuka uhereye ku ntara, ikomine, umutumba canke ikaritiye. Asaba Abarundi bose ko botinyuka bakamenyesha abagize uyo murwi aho bazi hose hari ibinogo vyatawemwo Abarundi n'abanyamahanga muri ayo makuba. Kuva u Burundi bwikukira mu 1962, bwamye burangwamwo ubwicanyi bwa politike bushingiye ku moko, cane cane hagati y'abahutu n'Abatutsi. Ubuzwi cane bukaba ari ubwabaye mu myaka ya 1965, 1969, 1972, 1988, na 1993. Bwana Ndayicariye avuga ko ayo makuba yahitanye abantu benshi n'ibintu vyinshi, asiga mu miryango amaganya, intuntu n'akabonge. Avuga ko kurondera ukuri kuri ayo makuba yose vyofasha Abarundi gushinga inkingi z'ukunywanisha Abarundi ku buryo burama. Avuga ko ibi bizofasha abasaba ikigongwe kwiha  umwanya wo kugisaba, abatanga ikigongwe nabo bakiha umwanya wo kugitanga. Ati: "Ni yo nzira ibereye yo gutegura kazoza keza k'abariho uno musi n'abazovuka. Ivyo tubikora munzira yo kunywanisha atari munzira yo guca imanaza kuko umugwi CVR atari Sentare".

column2: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
column3: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

column2: Menya umushakashatsi wa Kaminuza ya Harvard yahagurukiye indwara zibonwa 'nk'izo abakene'
column3: "Nahereye ubushakashatsi bwanje ku ngwara zisigaye zibonwa nk'iza 'kahise' mu bihugu bitunze, ubu naho ngiye gushira inguvu kuri Coronavirus", Mireille Kamariza, umushakashatsi wo muri Kaminuza ya Harvard yibanda ku ngwara zibangamiye ibihugu bikenye.

column2: Spice Diana ati 'Nsaba Imana ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza'
column3: Igisata c'umuziki muri Uganda kiriko kiratera imbere, kandi kirimwo abacuraranzi batari bake b'abagore bamaze gutera imbere. Spice Diana afise indirimbo zitari nke amaze gusohora ubu akaba ariko aritegurira urukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere. Aherutse kandi no gushirwa ku rutonde rw'abahiganira agashimwe kitiriwe MTV Africa Music Awards  (MAMA). "Iri genwa ryantumye mbona ko nkwiye gukora ntagoheka kubera vyanyeretse ko umuziki wanje ushimwa ku mbuga mpuzamakungu hamwe no muri Afrika". "Numva umengo bambwiye bati: 'Hey, Spicey. Usanzwe ukora ibikomeye, rero utegerezwa kwihata gusumba'." Spice Diana avuga ko ibihe bigoye Uganda yari imazemwo iminsi vyagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki, akipfuza ko ibintu vyosubira mu buryo kugira ngo ibikorwa vyabo bibandanya ukuri kwamye. Spice Diana yabwiye ikiganiro This Is Africa (Iyi Ni Afrika)  ko umurwi w'abana batamba wiyise Triplets Ghetto Kids ari wo watumye ashobora gushika aho ageze. Yarabakunda cane, bimutuma abona ko akwiye kuza arabandikira indirimbo, ariko bobo bamubonyemwo ubushobozi: Ati: "Muri jewe nibwira nti: 'Oya, kuririmba ntavyo nshoboye', ariko bobo muri bo bavuga bati 'Urashobora kuririmba!' Si niyemera, ariko abo bana baranteye intege nyinshi, ku buryo nabona ntobahemukira". Umwaka uheze ntiworoheye abanyamuziki muri Uganda. Mu bitandukanye n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi byo muri Afrika, Uganda yarafashe amategeko yo kubabuza ibikorwa vyabo. Igihe abanyamuziki ba Nijeriya, Omar Ley na Tems bakora igiteramo cabo, birengagije amategeko ya Covid-19, abanyamuziki benshi ba Uganda barashavuye cane. Spice Diana ati: "Twarashavuye cane, ariko mu nyuma twamenye ko ari umunya Uganda yari yateguye ico giteramo, maze twifatanya n'aba banyanijeriya kubera twabonye ko igiporisi cakoze nabi kubahagarika mu gihe atari bo bari bagiteguye". Spice Diana  avuga kandi ko imigumuko yagiye yibonekeza mu gihugu igihe cariko citegurira amatora yagize ingaruka mbi ku banyamuziki ba Uganda. Ati: "Abantu benshi baratakaje ubuzima bwabo, abandi baratakaza ubuzi bwabo, hanyuma igihe cose ivyo bibaye, abakunzi bacu baba biteze ko hagira ico tuvuze". Ati: "Rimwe na rimwe, usanga ata vyinshi uzi muri poritike - ugaca usanga iyo ubuze ico ushikiriza, abantu baraguhevye mbere n'umuziki wawe bakawuheba". "Rero nsaba ko twosubirana Uganda yacu nziza inyuma y'ibi vyose".

column2: DRC: Abantu 25 nibo bagandaguwe buca ari ubunani
column3: Abategetsi bo mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo batangaza ko n'imiburiburi abantu 25 bishwe mu gitero kivugwa ko cakozwe n'umuhari Allied Democratic Forces, ADF. ADF ni umwe mu mirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho iharurwa muri mirongo igisibije mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu. Yagirizwa ko uyu mwaka urangiye yagandaguye abasivize baharurwa mu majana. Aba baguye muri iki gitero cakozwe mu kigwati ca Tingwe kiri mu karere ka Beni mu ntara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko  hafi bose bari abarimyi bari bigiriye mu mirima yabo buca ari ubunani. Abarwanyi ba ADF bavugwa ko babicishije inkoho abandi bakakata imitwe bakoresheje imipanga. Umutegetsi w'akarere avuga ko abasirikare ba Congo batututse ku biziga vy'aba bantu igihe bariko barakurikirana aba barwanyi. Uyu muhari ADF watanguye mu myaka ya 1990 nk'umuhari warwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda ukorera mu buseruko bwa Congo. Nta ntumbero ya politike nyezina uyu muhari wigeze ugira, ariko umaze imyaka itari mike ugisibije muri ako karere. Bimwe mu bitero ukora bisa n'ibifise intumbero yo guhana abanyagihugu yagiriza ko bakorana canke bagatanga amakuru ku gisirikare ca Congo.

column2: SA: Jonas Gwangwa, umunyamuziki wa jazz yahanganye n'intwaro karyanishamiryango, apartheid
column3: Umuziki wa Afria y'Epfo no kw'isi nzima watakaje igihangange inyuma y'urupfu rw'uyu mucuraranzi  Jonas Gwangwa wo mu mudiho wa jazz yakoresha itarumbeta. Uyu mucuraranzi yapfuye ku wa 23 z'uku kwa mbere afise imyaka 83, akaba yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima. N'aho imyaka myinshi y'ubuzima bwiwe yayimaze mu buhungiro, Gwangwa ntiyamenyekanye cane ku muziki wiwe gusa, azwi ko yagize uhurara rudasanzwe mu kurwanya bwa butegetsi karyanishamiryango bw'inkehwa z'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo. Gwangwa yavukiye mu karere ka Soweto mu gisagara ca Johannesburg  ku wa 19 z'ukwa cumi 1937, akaba yamaze imyaka irenga 60 mu muziki watumye amenyekana cane. Muri ico gihe yarumvise akamo yari atewe na Oliver Tambo yari arongoye ANC, kugira ngo arongore umurwi wiswe Amandla. Uyu murwi wari washinzwe mu myaka ya 1980 kugira ngo werekane uruhande rworoshe mu rugamba rwo kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid, ukaba warashigikiwe cane mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi. Reta y'umugambwe w'inkehwa z'abazungu, National Party, yabona ko ibikorwa vy'umuziki n'ukurwanira akaranga vya Gwangwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye cane ku nzego z'umutekano, maze zica zitera ibibombe ku nzu yiwe muri Botswana mu 1985. Imana yose ni uko uyu nyakwigendera hamwe n'abandi bose bari basanzwe baba muri iyo nzu ata n'umwe yari ahari. Ukwitanga kwiwe mu rugamba rwo kwibohoza hamwe n'impano idasanzwe mu bijanye n'umuziki vyatumye Gwangwa ahabwa agashimwe kitwa  Ikhamanga in Gold - agashimwe ko ku krwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aka gashimwe yaronse mu 2010 kibutsa ingene "yabaye rurangiranwa kw'isi yose mu buhinga bwiwe nk'umunyatugenegene. Mu myaka irenga 30, yazungurutse isi yose aterwa amashurwe aho yaca hose". Mw'ijambo ryiwe ryo gusezera Jonas Gwangwa, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa  yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko "yinjiye mu murwi w'abanyamuziki bakomeye muri kahise kacu, baranzwe n'ubuhinga bukomeye hamwe n'ukwitangira uburenganzira bw'abanya Afrika y'Epfo bose - kandi bagahimiriza isi yose kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid". Thabo Mbeki yahoze arongoye igihugu nawe yashimiye uyu mucuraranzi ati: "Kuva mu ntango y'umwuga wiwe, Bra JG, nk'uko yari akunzwe kwitwa mu cubahiro bamuha, yaratahuye akamaro kadasanzwe ko kuvanga akaranga n'utugenegene nk'ikirwanisho nyaco mu rugamba rwo kuhabuza igihugu". "Afadikanije n'abandi bo mu runganwe rwiwe, Gwangwa yarakoresheje inguvu z'umuziki, atari gusa kuryohera abantu, ariko kandi aba icirore c'abanyagihugu yongera aragaragariza isi yose amabi y'ubutegetsi karyanishamiryango bwa apartheid". Akiri muto, Gwangwa yarakunzwe cane n'abakunzi biwe bari barwiriye mu karere ka Sophiatown kari nk'icicaro c'imico y'abirabure mu gisagara ca Johannesburg, gushika aho reta karyanishamiryango ya apartheid  isohoreye itegeko ko kizira ko abirabure bakoranira hamwe, maze ica itangura kubuza ibiteramo vya jazz, hari mu 1960. Ari kumwe n'ibindi bihangange  vya Afrika y'Epfo mu muziki, nka Masekela, Abdullah Ibrahim na Miriam Makeba, Gwangwa yahisemwo guhunga hagupfukamira igikenye ca apartheid. Yatanguye kumenyekana cane kw'isi mu 1965 mu giteramo citiriwe Ijwi rya Afrika (Sound of Africa) i New york ari kumwe n'abandi nka Makeba, Masekela, na Letta Mbulu. Cabaye intango y'igikorwa mpuzamakungu yakoresheje mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ubutegetsi bw'inkehwa z'abazungu rwaguma rutera intambwe uko bukeye uko bwije. Mu 1987, ari kumwe n'umwanditsi w'umuziki w'umwongereza George Fenton, Gwangwa yanditse amajambo y'umuziki w'ireresi yitwa Cry Freedom, ivyatumye ahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Oscar incuro zibiri. Yararonse kandi n'ubushimwe butari buke muri Afrika y'Epfo. Yashinguranywe iteka ejo ku wa gatanu mu birori vyerekanywe ikibiriraho ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'iradiyo y'igihugu, bikaba vyashoboye guhuza abataherukana kubera ingingo za coronavirus zo kwitaramura. Urupfu rwa Gwangwa  rubaye inyuma y'indwi zibiri gusa inyuma y'urwo umugore wiwie Violet, rukaba rufatwa nk' uruhombo runini ku muziki wa Afrika y'Epfo.

column2: DR Congo igiye kwubaka intatemwa ya Lumumba
column3: Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo igiye kwubaka intatemwa y'uwiguze ukwikukira kw'ico gihugu, Patrice Lumumba, nk'uko vyaraye bitangajwe na Perezida Félix Tshisekedi. Perezida Tshisekedi avuga kandi ko Ububirigi buzosubiza ibisigarira vy'iyi ncungu yari umushikiranganji wa mbere igihe Congo yikukira. Vyitezwe ko iyi ntatemwa yubakwa imbere y'uko igi gihugu gihimbaza imyaka 61 y'ukwikukira, mu kwa gatndatu 2021. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, Perezida Tshisekedi yavuze ati: "Mu bikorwa vyo guhimbaza isabukuru y'imyaka 61 tumaze turonse intahe y'ukwikukira, igihugu kizokengurukira Umushikiranganji wa mbere Patrice Emery Lumumba, umwe mu ntwari z'igihugu, ibisigarira vyiwe bikazotahukanwa kugira ngo bishinguranwe iteka ry'uwiguze igihugu". Patrice Lumumba yagandaguwe mu kwezi kwa mbere 1961. Ikiziga ciwe nticigeze kiboneka, ariko umwe mu bamugandaguwe yashoboye kubika iryinyo ryiwe i Buruseri mu Bubirigi. Mu kw'icenda uno mwaka, sentare yo muri ico gihugu camaze imyaka itari mike gikoroniza Congo yategetse ko iryo ryinyo risubizwa umukobwa wa Lumuba, Juliana Lumumba, inyuma y'aho yandikiye ikete umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ububirigi amusaba ko yorisubiza.

column2: WHO 'ibabajwe cane' nuko abakozi bayo bwankiwe kwinjira mu Ubushinwa
column3: Umugwi w'intumwa za WHO/OMS zari gutohoza amamuko ya Covid-19 mu gisagara ca Wuhan wankiwe kwinjira mu Bushinwa. Babiri muri bo bari bamaze gufata urugendo - umwe aza yamaze gusubira inyuma, uwundi aracari aho arindiririye indege mu kindi gihugu. OMS ivuga ko vyatumwe n'ikibazo co kuronka impusha zo kwinjira(visa). Ayo matohoza arindiriwe kuva kera yari yemewe n'abategetsi b'Ubushinwa mu kwezi kwa 12 inyuma y'amezi menshi babivugana na OMS. Uwo mugera watowe ubwa mbere muri Wuhan mu mpera za 2019 ucaduka, bikaba vyibajijwe ko wazananye mw'isoko. Umukuru wa OMS Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ''yababajwe cane'' n'uko Ubushinwa butaheraheje ibijanye no gutanga impusha z'uko abo bantu bashika muri ico gihugu''kandi babiri muri bo bari bamaze gufata urugendo hanyuma abasigaye na bo bakaba basivye ku munota wa nyuma''. Yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru i Geneve  ku wa kabiri ati:''Ubushinwa bwari bwanyemereye ko buriko burakora ibikenewe vyose kugira abo bantu bashikeyo vuba hashoboka'', asigura ko yari yavuganye n'abategetsi bo hejuru b'Ubushinwa abumvisha ko ''ubwo butumwa buza imbere kuri OMS no ku makungu''. OMS yari imaze amezi n'amezi itegura kurungika umugwi w'abantu 10 b'abahinga mpuzamakungu mu Bushinwa kugira baje gutohoza ivy'uko ikiza camutse ku gikoko n'ingene uwo mugera wahejeje ugashikira abantu. Mu kwezi guheze vyari vyatangajwe ko ayo matohoza azotangura mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2021. Babiri mu bagize uwo mugwi mpuzamakungu bari bafashe urugendo bagana Ubushinwa ku wa kabiri nk'uko bimenyeshwa na OMS. Covid-19 yatowe ubwa mbere mu gisagara ca Wuhan co mu ntara ya Hubei yo mu Bushinwa, mu mpera za 2019. Vyatanguye kwibazwa ko uwo mugera wandurutse mw'isoko rigurisha ibikoko vyo mw'ishamba vyo kubaga. Aho ni ho vyibazwa ko uwo mugera ariho wava ku bikoko ukandukira abantu. Ariko hari impari nyinshi ku mamuko y'uwo mugera. Hari abahinga bibaza  ko isoko atari yo mamuko yawo, ko gusa ariho wagwiriraniye. Hari ubushakashatsi buvuga ko imigera ya corona ishobora kwandukira abantu imaze imyaka igendagenda ivuye ku buhungarema atawurayitora. Ariko ntibizwi igikoko yoba  yaraciyeko kugira abantu bandukirwe.

column2: Afghanistan: Aba Taliban bahagaritse imyiyerekano y'abagore basaba uburenganzira bwabo
column3: Abategetsi b'aba Taliban bahagaritse imyiyerekano y'abagore ku mugwa mukuru Kabul basaba uburengazira bwabo inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistani. Aba bagore bavuga ko aba Taliban babateye vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi n'ibindi vy'ipiripiri mu gihe bariko bagerageza kujabuka ikiraro batera baja ku ngoro y'umukuru w'igihugu. Ariko aba Taliban bavuga ko iyo myiyerekano yari yarenze inkombe, nk'uko ikinyamakuru Tolo co muri Afghanistani kibivuga. Niyo myiyerekano y'abagore yaheruka  mu yindi itari mike i Kabul na Herat. Aba bagore bari bateguye iyi myiyerekano basaba uburenganzira bwo gukora, bongere bashirwe muri reta. AbaTaliban bavuga ko mu misi iri imbere bazotangaza reta yabo, bakavuga ko bashobora kuronswa ibibanza, ariko ko badashobora kurongora ubushikiranganji. Abagore benshi baratinya ko bashobora gusubira gufatwa nabi nko  mu bihe vyaheze igihe aba Taliban bari ku butegetsi ubwa mbere, hagati ya 1996 na 2001. Ico gihe, abagore bategerezwa kwipfuka mu maso hose iyo bari hanze yo muhira, kandi bagahabwa ibihano ruhasha no ku dukosa duto. Umunyamakuru Azita Nazimi yabwiye Tolo ati: "Mu myaka 25 iheze, igihe aba Taliban baza, barambujije kuja kw'ishure". "Inyuma y'imyaka itanu y'ubutegetsi bwabo, nize imyaka 25 nongera ndakora cane. Kubwa kazoza keza kacu, ntidushobora kwemera ko ibi bisubira". Uwundi mugore yari mu myiyerekano, Soraya, yabwiye Reuters ati: "Bakubise kandi abagore mu mutwe bakoresheje igikono c'inkoho, abo bagore buzuye amaraso". Hagati aho, intambara zirabandanya mu kiyaya ca Panjshir, kiri mu buraruko bwa Kabul, aho inyeshamba zihanganye n'aba Taliban barondera gufata ako karere. Ariko buri ruhande rugenda rwemeza ko rufise ibintu mu minwe. Aba Taliban bavuga ko bigaruriye utundi turere tubiri kandi ko bariko batera baja ku mugwa mukuru w'iyo ntara. Umuvugizi w'umuhari National Resistance Front of Afghanistan (NRF) avuga ko intambara zikomeye zibandanya kandi ko ibihumbi vy'aba Taliban bazibiwe. Umukuru w'uyu muhari NRF, Ahmad Massoud, yakeje abagore bakoze imyiyerekano muri Herat, anavuga ko Panjshir ibandanya yirwanira. Ibivugwa n'umuhari  NRF canke n'aba Taliban ntibirashobora guhinyuzwa n'uruhande ataho rwegamiye.

column2: Brexit: Boris Johnson arashima amasezerano y'ubudandaji hagati ya UK na EU
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, n'Ubwongereza bashitse ku masezerano azogenga ubudandaji inyuma ya Brexit, aje kurangiza amezi yo kutumvikana ku burenganzira bwo kuroba n'amategeko agenga ubudandaji. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku biro iwe, Boris Johnson yagize ati:"Twasubiranye ubwigenge ku mategeko yaco hamwe na kazoza kacu." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yongeyeko ko, n'aho ibiganiro "vyari bigoye" ari "amasezerano meza ku Buraya bwose" azotanga akazi n'iterambere. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Buraya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko ari amasezerano "ata ho yegamiye". Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru I Bruxelles, umukuru w'akanama k'ubumwe bwa Buraya yavuze ati:"Rwari urugendo rurerure rurimwo ibihuhusi ariko twaronse amasezerano meza twerekana. "Ni nyayo, nta ho yegamiye, kandi n'ikintu ciza cari gikwiriye gukorwa ku mpande zose." Yongeyeko ko ubu ari "igihe co kwibagira kahise tukaraba muri kazoza" kandi ko Ubwongereza "buguma ari ncuti nyakuri".
