Yavuze ko hazoba ikiringo mfatakibanza c'imyaka itanu n'igice mu bakora mu gisata c'uburovyi. Hanyuma imigenderanire izobandanya ku bibazo bijanye n'ihindukagurika ry'ibihe, amasoko ntanganguvu, umutekano hamwe no mu gutwara abantu n'ibintu. Mw'itangazo, ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere mu Bwongereza bigira biti:"Turagarukanye amahera yacu, imbibe, amategeko, ubudandaji hamwe n'amazi turobamwo," Risubiramwo icivugo ca Johnson co kwiyamamaza mu matora, ryongeyeko  "Brexit iragiye mu bikorwa". Johnson yashize kuri Twitter ifoto yiwe ariko aramwenyura, yashize intoke z'ibikumu hejuru. Mu kiganiro yatanze, yavuze:"Turarangije amasezerano akomeye aciye imiriyaridi 668 y'amapawundi ku mwaka. "Amasezerano yumvikana ameze nk'aya Canada hagati y'Ubwongereza na EU. Amasezerano azokingira ubuzi muri iki  gihugu cose, azotuma ibidandazwa vyo mu Bwongereza bigurishwa ata makori, ata n'ibice bitanzwe kw'isoko rya Buraya. "Amasezerano azoha uburenganzira amakompanyi gukorana n'ibihugu vy'incuti vy'i Buraya."

column2: Olaf Scholz: Chancelier mushasha w'Ubudagi ni nde?
column3: Yatsinze amatora rusangi, none uwo yari amaze imyaka itatu ari icegera ca Chancelier [Umushikiranganji wa mbere] Angela  Merkel ubu aramusubiriye muri ico kibanza. Olaf Scholz yigeze guhabwa agatazirano ka "Scholzomat" (Scholzomaton) - ariko ubu yarashoboye gushira ku ruhande ivyo abantu bamuziko vyo gukora nk'imashini, arumvikana  n'imigambwe y'aba-Greens (Verts) na Free-Democrats (Liberaux Democrates). Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 63 yahoze ari umukuru w'igisagara ca Hamburg yemereye abatora kubandanya uko ibintu vyahora inyuma y'imyaka itandatu iheze Ubudagi butwarwa na Angela Merkel w'umu conservateur (Conservative), n'ubwo yari ahagarariye umugambwe bahiganwa wa Parti Social Democrate (SPD). Uburyo yifashe neza mu gutunganya ikibazo ca Covid bwamutumye  gushimagizwa no kuduza amajwi y'abamushima. Abatamwemera bafatira ku vyo yaranguye nk'umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta, bakamwagiriza kuba yarananiwe cane  mu kibazo c'incuro zibiri z'akamaramaza kajanye n'amafaranga. Nk'umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta,  Olaf Scholz ni we yari ajejwe uburyo bungana na miriyaridi 884 z'amadorari zegeranijwe na reta y'Ubudagi kugira zifashe  abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu guhangana n'ingaruka z'ikiza. "Iyi ni yo bazooka [ubwoko bw'inkoho] ikenewe kugira akazi gakorwe." Ni we yakoresha amanama y'abashikiranganji igihe Chanceliere Merkel atava i muhira   mu kwiyubara kwandura. N'ubwo wari umuruho guhangana n'ikibazo ca Covid, kuri  Scholz kabaye akaryo ko gutunganya uburyo bunini cane bw'ineza y'igihugu no kurwanira itekane ry'ihihugu, bijanye cane n'imizi yiwe y'ivyiyumviro vy'aba socialiste. Imbere y'uko bitangazwa ko ashaka kwitoza kw'izina ry'umugambwe wiwe  SPD mu kibanza ca chancelier yarakunda kuvuga, iyo abajijwe niba azokwitoza, ati "dukeneye gukora aho kuja mu vyo kwirata". Hamwe n'Ubufaransa, Scholz  yabaye kirumara mu gushika ku mwumvikano wo gusohora amafaranga angana na miriyaridi 750 z'amafaranga y'amanyaburaya Euros yo kwivyukiranya ikiza ca Covid. Hanyuma  inyuma y'imyaka ya Merkel yaranzwe n'imigenderanire ya hafi cane n'Ubufaransa, ivyo Scholz yakoze mu gukomeza ugushigikirana hagati y'Ubufaransa n'Ubudagi na we bigiye kumugirira akamaro. Umushikiranganji w'Ubufaransa ajejwe ikigega Bruno Le Maire, uretse kumukeza ku gushigikirana n'Ubufaransa, yanamukeje kandi kuba uwo bavukana,  muganga Jens Scholz, yarafashije kujana mu bitaro vya Kiel n'indege abafaransa batandatu bari baremvye cane kubera Covid -19. Ni igikorwa co gukiza ubuzima cari  kizimvye cane, carishwe na reta y'Ubudagi. "None warakoze cane, Olaf, ku vyo umaze gukora vyose. Ariko kandi n'uwo muvukana yarakoze. Vy'ukuri n'umuryango nyawo w'Abadagi, umuryango w'aba Scholz", uko niko Le Maire yabivuze. Mu  mugambwe wa SPD, yamara, Olaf Scholz abonwa nk'umu-conservateur. Uwo mugambwe afatanije kuwurongora na  Saskia Esken na  Norbert Walter-Borjans, bo basanganywe umurongo w'aba-socialiste ukaze gusumba. Scholz, afise umugore na we w'umunyaporitike w'umu-SPD  Britta Ernst, yakuriye i Hamburg aca yinjira muri poritike nk'indongozi y'urwaruka rw'aba-socialiste, inyuma yo kwiga amategeko ajanye n'akazi. Yabaye umukuru w'igisagara ca Hamburg kuva mu 2011 gushika mu 2018,  ico gihe akaba ari ho ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyagabanuka ubukari bwa gi-socialiste. Yatowe ubwa mbere kuba umushingamateka mu 1998.

column2: Africa-Urudandazwa ku buryo bwa none: Abagore bahevye iduka bakaja kuri terefone zigezweho
column3: BBC yibanze ku bagore batatu b'abanya-Afrika - uwahora afise iduka, umwigisha n'umushoferi wa taxi - bongereje amafaranga binjiza kuva batanguye gukora urundadazwa ku buryo bwa terefone zigezweho (smartphones na digital platforms). Ikiza ca coronavirus catumye benshi basubira kwiyumvira ingene boronka ikibabeshaho. Ikigo cigenga gikora ubushakashatsi  Caribou Digital catoye ko abagore muri Kenya, Nigeria na Ghana bariko baravyaza umusaruro uburyo bwo gukora urudandazwa uciye ku buhinga bwa none bwo gutumatumanako (smartphones na digital platforms) kuko bwo bworoshe gushikira  no gukora ibitandukanye -gutyo bagashobora kwinjiza amafaranga kandi bakabandanya n'amabanga yo kwitaho abana babo. Madame Tarit  (mubona kw'ifoto aho hejuru) ntiyibaza ko yoshoboye  kugwiza na kabiri amafaranga yinjiza mu kiringo c'amezi icenda. Ikiza ca Covid cari catumye yugara iduka ryiwe ry'impuzu z'abana muri Eldoret mu burengero bwa Kenya, none gukotesha ibibanza aciye ku bigo bikorera kuri internet nka Airbnb bisa n'ibiriko birazibira igihengeri cari catewe no kwugara urudandazwa rwiwe. Ariko, Madame Tarit w'imyaka 29, ari mu bandi bagore benshi bariko baratera imbere mu gukoresha imbuga nka Facebook, Whatsapp, Instagram na apps z'ama taxi nka Uber na Bolt. Yatanguye urundadazwa rwiwe n'ikibanza kimwe haraheze amezi icenda none ubu afise indwi -ubu akaba akotesha ku gihe kirekire hanyuma nawe agapangisha aciye kuri Airbnb. "Ubu ninjiza amafaranga menshi kurusha ayo nakura mu rudandazwa imbere y'ikiza [ca Covid]," niko yabwiye BBC Daily. Abakoresha urwo rudandazwa ahanini n'abakerarugendo babikisha aho bazorara hamwe n'abagwizatunga bashima kurara muri  Airbnb aho kurara mw'ihoteri. "Mu gihe ca Covid benshi mu  bagenzi banje baratakaje ubuzi baca batangura gukorera ku materefone kugira binjize amafaranga. Ubu bagurisha ivyo kurya baciye kuri internet hanyuma bagakora nk'abashoferi bo kubishira abakiriya", nk'uko Madame  Tarit avuga. Umunsi usanzwe kuri Madame  Adzogble w'imyaka 32, utangurwa no gushira ubutumwa bwo kwamamaza ivyo acuruza kuri Whatsapp no kuri Facebook yibereye i muhira i Acra, umurwa mukuru wa Ghana. Ari mu bariko baravyaza umusaruro zimwe mu mpinduka zikomeye cane mu butunzi muri Afrika -ukwiyongera kw'ibibanza vyo gukoreramwo ubucuruzi kw'isoko ryo kuri internet. Agurisha amaterefone ngendanwa, ivyuma vyo kuzana akayaga mu nzu hamwe n'ama-television, ivyo vyose akavyamamaza aciye ku migwi yashinze kuri Whatsapp na Facebook, hamwe no mu yo asanzwemwo, nk'uwo ahuriramwo n'abo basenga hamwe. Madame Adzogble  yahevye akazi ko kwigisha igifaransa kugira aronke umwanya ukwiye wo gukora urudandazwa rwiwe kuri internet. "Bivamwo amafaranga menshi kurusha kwigisha. Ndashobora kugurisha ikintu kimwe nkinjiza ayaruta ayo mara ukwezi nkorera mu kwigisha. Mfise abana. Nkeneye guha abana banje indero nziza ishoboka,  akaba aribo bampa umwete wo kurondera kwigenga mu bijanye n'amafaranga", niko avuga. Ku bwa Madame Adzogble, kwubaka imigenderanire myiza n'abakiriya n'ikintu nyamukuru ushaka guca amafaranga uciye kuri internet. "Aho baraheza bakakugurira hanyuma bakakuvuga neza." Madame Lawal, w'imyaka 34, akorera  ibigo vy'amataxi uhamagara uciye ku buhinga bwa none Uber na Bolt mu gisagara ca mbere kinini muri Nigeria, Lagos. Ariko, ntibimworohera - uyo mugore areze abana bane wenyene avuga ko hari abagabo banka gutwarwa n'umugore. Lawa avuga ati: "Igihe natangura gutwara taxi muri Lagos, abagabo bose baca bafuta urugendo maze gushika kubajana." "Lagos haragoye , bisaba kuba ukomeye cane kugira ushobore  gutwara imodoka mu gisagara. Abagabo bibaza ko izo nguvu atazo mfise, mbanza kubajijura kugira bemere kwinjira mu modoka." Icigwa ca  Caribou Digital cerekana kandi ko abagore benshi barondera ikibabeshaho baciye ku buhinga bwa digital bafise impungene ku mutekano wabo. Umukuru w'abakoze ubwo bushakashatsi Grace Natabaalo yabwiye BBC ati: "Abagore benshi twavuganye bavuze ko baburagijwe bishingiye ku gitsina iyo bitavye ababa  bafatishije ingendo." Ati: "Mu gihe reta ihimiriza abagore bakiri bato gufata bene aka kazi bakeneye no kumenya urundi ruhande rwako - ko hari ingeramizi kandi zitegerezwa gufatwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye n'inzego z'igiporisi na reta." Ariko Lawal avuga ko ivyiza birimwo biruta cane ibibi. Ati: "Ni vyiza cane kuba ushobora kwironkera ikikubeshaho ariko kandi nshaka no kugira ico ntereye mu butunzi muri rusangi mu gutanga amakori (imisoro). Nsaka ko ubwanje ntera imbere, na Nigeria igatera imbere."

column2: India: Umukoresha yanebaguwe ku ciyumviro co gukora amasaha 18 ku musi
column3: Umukuru w'ikompanyi imwe mu Buhindi yanebaguwe inyuma yo kuvuga ko abakozi bashasha mu kazi akari ko kose bategerezwa gukora amasaha 18 mu myaka yabo ya mbere ine canke itanu bakironka akazi. Shantanu Deshpande, yatanguje kompanyi yo kumwa ya Bombay Shaving Company, asaba abakozi bakiri bato "gukunda akazi" no kutaguma bidoga nk'uko yavyanditse ku mbuga hwaniro. Abantu bashavuye banditse ku mbuga hwaniro bamwagiriza gukokeza "umuco w'akazi k'uburozi". Ubuhindi bufise amategeko genga akazi akaze cane, ariko abaharanira agateka k'abakozi bavuga ko abategetsi bakeneye gushiramwo inguvu nyinshi kugira ashirwe mu ngiro. Mu 2020, umwe mu batanguje ikompanyi ya Infosys yaranebaguwe cane aho yavuga ko abahindi bategerezwa bakora amasaha 64 buri ndwi mu myaka ibiri canke itatu mu ntumbero yo kuzibira igihengeri c'ubutunzi catewe n'iyugaranwa rivuye kuri coronavirus. Urugero rw'icizere c'abakozi rwa LinkedIn mu 2020 ruvuga ko abakozi babigize umwuga babiri  kuri batanu mu Buhindi baramaze kugira ikibazo co kugira umutima uhagaze n'umwitwarariko. Ku rubuga rwa LinkedIn ku musi wa kabiri, Deshpande   yavuze ko "hakiri kare" ku bakiri bato kumenya ingene bokwifata hagati y'akazi n'ubuzima igihe ari ho bagitangura akazi. Umwe mubakoresha urubuga rwa Twitter yavuze ko Deshpande yariko arashigikira "umuco w'akazi k'uburozi" igihe  "vyari vyabaye ibisanzwe ko amakompany menhsi agitangura yirukana abantu benshi." Uwundi wo kuri Twitter nyene yavuze ko Deshpande atigeze avuga ko "yoriha amahera y'agasunuzo" abantu bakoze amasaha menshi. Yagize ati:"Amakompanyi afise intumbero yo kurya imitsi abantu bakora amasaha menshi. Kenshi na kenshi bigatuma baruha kare bakiri bato, bigatuma bashira mu kaga akazi kabo." Kubera inebagurwa ryakwiye hose kubera ivyo yanditse, Deshpande yongeyeko ati:" Urwo rwanko rwose ruvuye ku masaha 18 y'akazi?" Yongeyeko ko abo biyumvira ku muco wo gukora muri kompanyi yiwe bahawe ikaze kubiyaga n'abakozi biwe. Ivyo Deshpande yavuze vyakurikiye igihe ijambo "Hagarika mu mutekano" ryakwiragira ku mbuga hwaniro. Iryo jambo risigura gukora ivyo ujejwe gusa ata kindi urengejeko. Ryatangujwe muri video y'umunyamerika ari ku rubuga rwa TikTok ahanura "akazi si ubuzima bwawe". Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Perisha Kudhail yanditse ko iryo sekeza rishobora kuba ryatanguriye mu Bushinwa , aho ijambo ubu ryabujijwe gukoreshwa #tangping risigura "ryama urampije" ryakoreshejwe mu kwiyamiriza umuco wo gukoreshwa amasaha menshi.

column2: Ibibazo vyanyu kuri Covid-19 birishurwa na Muganga
column3: Turasubira kubatumikira nk'uko twabibemereye ku minsi ya mbere no kuwa gatatu, mu kubaronderera inyishu ku bibazo vyanyu vyerekeye  ingwara ya Covid-19. Uno munsi abitwa Klemento Ndayisenga, Jean Pierre Ndayishimiye na Juvel Mbazumutima bahuriye ku kibazo co kumenya nimba umuntu ashobora gusubira gufatwa n'umugera wa corona yarigeze kuwandura. Umva inyishu aho hejuru na Muganga Leonard Nduwayo, yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera.

column2: East Africa: Miriyoni 28 bashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikabije - Oxfam
column3: Abantu bashika miriyoni 28 muri Afrika y'ubuseruko barashobora kugeramirwa n'inzara ikomeye cane kubera iduga ry'ibiciro bitumwe n'intambara yo muri Ukraine hamwe n'ikena ry'imvura muri uku kwezi kwa gatatu, nk'uko ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza Oxfam rigabisha. Kenya, Somalia na Ethiopia vyugarijwe n'ikena ry'imvura rya mbere rikaze mu myaka 40, aho ni mu gihe Sudan y'Epfo yo ihanzwe n'imyuzure, nk'uko Oxfam ibandanya ivuga. Iryo shirahamwe ryerekana kandi ico ryita ugusamazwa kw'amakungu n'ingwano yo muri Ukraine, ituma hatitabwaho ikibazo c'ikena  ry'ivyo kurya mu karere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko. Itangazo rigenewe ibinyamakuru rivuga ko utwigoro mpuzamakungu two guhangana n'ico kibazo dufise uburyo budahagije na gato kuko ku miriyaridi 6 z'ama dorari ONU ikeneye mu 2022 kugira igarukire ku bari mu kaga muri Ethiopia,  Somalia na Sudan y'Epfo, 3% yonyene niyo amaze kuboneka. Madame Gabriela Bucher, umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa mpuzamakungu wa Oxfam yagabishije avuga ati: "Ibice vya Ethiopia, Kenya, Somalia, Sudan y'Epfo n'ahandi vyimirije guhura n'akaga. N'aho imvura yogwa muri uku kwezi, kwivyukiranya bizoba nk'ibidashoboka kiretse hari igikozwe  ubu nyene." Abandanya ati: "Ingaruka z'ingwano yo muri Ukraine kw'ihererekanywa ry'indya kw'isi zizoshika mu bice vyose vy'isi, ariko abasanzwe bari bakenye n'abafise intege  nke nibo zizosesereza cane kuruta abandi kandi  vyihuse kuruta." Ibihugu vya Afrika y'ubuseruko bivana  90% y'ingano bikenera muri Ukraine n'Uburusiya, nk'uko itangazo ribandanya rivuga. "Kubera uruzuba,  indogobwa zacu zarapfuye, izo dusigaranye nazo ziragoyagoya ku buryo zidashobora gukwega intunduguru  z'imizigo", ivyo bivugwa na Ahmed Mohamud Omar, umurimyi  wo muri county ya Wajiir muri Kenya. "Nguma nibaza ico umuryango wanje uzorya, aho ico bazorya ejo kizova,  niba ejo nzoronka indobo canke ibido y'amazi."

column2: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
column3: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

column2: Burundi: Impano zinyegeje za Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye
column3: Abakoresha imbuga hwaniro benshi batamariwe babonye umukuru w'u Burundi, Evariste Ndayishimiye, mu mwambaro w'abatimbo, atera imvyino yongera avuza umurisho. Ku mafoto na za video vyahanahanywe ku mbuga hwaniro, Prezida Ndayishimiye aboneka ari ku nkiranya (ingoma ija imbere hagati) yambaye umwambaro ukwiye w'abatimbo (abakarazi mu kinyarwanda). Yambaye kandi n'ibisharizo bijana birimwo n'ikirezi, afise n'imirisho hanyuma agatera abandi batimbo nabo bakitabira. Umurisho uraheza ugatangura, Prezida Ndayishimiye, biboneka ko akanyamuneza kari kose, agatamba atarika agacishamwo akanasimba. Ku rubuga twitter rw'ikirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu, Ntare Rushatsi House, basiguye yuko Prezida Ndayishimiye yariko "arasozera akaruhuko ka leta". Ubwo butumwa bugira buti "mu gusozera akaruhuko ka leta, Prezida wa Republika aherekejwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe yagendeye ikibanza ca Gishora kugira ashike mu kibanza cubashwe c'Ingomba z'u Burundi zashizwe mu murage w'isi." Iyo nyandiko ibandanya igira iti "nk'umuvuzi w'ingoma abikunda kuva akiri muto, Prezida Ndayishimiye ntiyingingiwe kwifatanya n'abavuzi b'ingoma ba Gishora mu kuvuza umurisho kama w'akataraboneka." Ikibanza c'iteka ku ngoma z'u Burundi ca Gishora nico kibitswemo ingoma za Ruciteme na Murimirwa zimaze imyaka 119. Ico kibanza kandi carakoreshejwe nk'ingoro y'Umwami hakaba ari naho Umwami Mwezi Gisabo yashinze ibirindiro ariko arategura kwivuna igitero c'Abadage. Ingoma za Gishora kandi ziri muri bimwe biratirwa ijisho mu bukerarugendo mu Burundi. Muri urwo rwego nyene, Prezida Ndayishimiye yaheruka kugaragara kandi ku mbuga hwaniro, ari kumwe n'umuryango wiwe, agendera ibibanza bitandukanye vy'ubukerarugendo vyo mu Burundi, harimwo n'ibiyaga vyo mu buraruko bw'igihugu.

column2: DRC: umutegetsi mukuru wa Isilamu yaraye yishwe arashwe i Beni
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakuru b'idini rya Isilamu yaraye agandaguwe, arashwe n'abantu bataramenyekana mu buseruko bwa Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo (DRC). Sheikh Ali Amini yarashwe amasasu menshi mu gihe yari arongoye amasengesho y'ejo ku mugoroba mu musigiti mukuru w'igisagara ca Beni mu ntara ya Kivu ya Ruguru. Ubu bwicanyi bwabaye haciye amasaha make Perezida Félix Tshisekedi w'ico gihugu atangaje ko intara zibiri zigoswe kuva ku wa gatanu. Iki gitero cakozwe mu gihe c'Ukwezi Kweranda kwa Isilamu, Ramadan, cateye ubwoba bwinshi mu bantu. Nta murwi n'umwe uriyitirira ubu bwicanyi, ariko vyinshi mu bitero nk'ibi bimenyerewe bikorwa n'inyeshamba z'umurwi ADF zirwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda. Umurwi Etat Islamique (IS) nawo wariyitiriye bimwe mu bitero vyayo, ariko gushika ubu ntibiratomoreka neza imigenderanire ufitaniye na ADF. Imbere y'uko iki gitero kiba, ibigwati bibiri vyo muri ako karere vyari vyatewe n'abikekwa ko ari izo nyeshamba za ADF, umurwi umaze igihe ukiririmbira muri ako karere, kuva mu myaka ya 1990. Ibi bibaye mu gihe abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bafise impungenge ku ngingo ya Perezida Tshisekedi yo gutangaza ko intara zibiri - Kivu ya Ruguru na Ituri - zigoswe n'ingabo z'igihugu. Bafise ubwoba ko igisirikare kigiye kwongererezwa ububasha mu gihe kivugwa ko gifise amateka mabi cane y'ihohotera.

column2: Burundi : 17 bapfunzwe bikekwa gushaka kunyaga abanyagihugu mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga
column3: Abantu 17 bo mw'ishirahamwe Crowd1 ricuruza amafaranga ku buhinga ngurukanabumenyi bari mu minwe y'igipolisi bagirizwa gukora inama y'ishirahamwe ritazwi n'amategeko. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'umutekano yabwiye Radio Isanganiro ko abo barobowe mu bandi barenga 300 bari bafashwe bari muri iyo nama ejo ku wa kabiri ku mugoroba n'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Pierre Nkurikiye avugira ubwo bushikiranganji avuga y'uko abo bantu bafashwe n'igipolisi bari mu nama muri zone Rohero mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Avuga ko abari mu minwe y'igipolisi ari abariko bakorwako amatohoza kubijanye n'uko  ishirahamwe Crowd1 ryoba rifise intumbero yo kwiba abanyagihugu. Haciye amezi make ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, igabishije Abarundi kwirinda urudandazwa rw'amafaranga rukorwa biciye mu mihora ngurukanabumenyi bita 'monnaies virtuelles' canke crypto-monnaies. Mw'itangazo yasohoye mu kw'umunani umwaka uheze, BRB yavuze ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga yo kuri iyo mihora nka Bitcoin, Ether, Litecoin, Onecoin,  Fahari Cash Coin, Ello Cash Coin rutemewe. Jean Ciza, umukuru w'iyo banki, yavuze ko ayo mafaranga akoreshwa mu buryo butagira amategeko bwisunga ahantu na hamwe kw'isi, kuko ngo nta banki n'imwe y'igihugu kw'isi yose irayemera. Ati: "Ivyo bituma ibikorwa muri ayo mafaranga bisa n'ivyo ubusuma…" Abatari bacye muri iki gihe barinjira mu rudandazwa rw'amafaranga mu buryo butandukanye leta z'ibihugu zimwe zivuga ko rutemewe.

column2: Vincent Kompany ariko arondera abakinyi muri TP Mazembe ya Kongo
column3: Umumenyereza mushasha w'umurwi wa Anderlecht, Vincent Kompany, ariko arondera abakinyi muri Kongo mu twigoro two gusubira gukomeza uwo murwi wo mu Bubirigi. Anderlecht ntiyashoboye kuronka uburenganzira bw'uguhiganirwa ibikombe ku rwego rw'umugabane wa Bulaya mu mwaka uza w'inkino. Uyu murwi witeguye kugura abakinyi Meschak Elia na Arsene Zola basanzwe bakina muri TP Mazembe muri Kongo. TP Mazembe iremeza igurishwa ry'abo bakinyi, ariko nta nsiguro itanga. Eka n'umurwi Anderlecht ntaco uratangaza. Umukinyi Elia w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina ku ruhande, yaheruka kuja kwimenyereza mu murwi Standard Liege, yaranageragejwe mu murwi Bursaspor wo muri Turukiya, ariko bikaba bitagenze neza. Asanzwe ari i Cairo mu Misiri mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Kongo uri mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika (CAN 2019), witeze gukina na Madagascar mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma. Bitegekanijwe ko azova i Cairo agenda i Buruseli mu Bubirigi, ivya Kongo muri iryo higanwa birangiye. Arsene Zola wewe yitezwe i Buruseli ejo ku munsi wa gatandatu nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ububirigi. Zola yavutse ku wa 23 z'ukwa kabiri 1996 nk'uko vyerekanwa ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'umurwi TP Mazembe. Haciye imyaka itatu atanguye gukina, akaba yarerekanye ubuhinga bukomeye igihe umurwi TP Mazembe watsindira igikombe c'imirwi yabaye iya mbere muri Afrika mu mwaka wa 2017. Sibwo bwa mbere umurwi TP Mazembe ugurisha abakinyi mu gihugu c'Ububirigi. Mu kwa mbere kwa 2017, waragurishije abakinyi Merveille Bokadi, Jonathan Bolingi na Christian Luyinduma mu murwi Standard Liege. Hari haciye imyaka indwi umurwi Anderlecht uguze abakinyi Patou Kabangu na Bedi Mbenza bompi ibakuye muri TP Mazembe nyene, ariko bikaba bitabagendeye neza.

column2: Prince Philip: Ivyaranze ubuzima bwiwe n'icubahiro yagize hose
column3: Umuganwa  Philip, Duc wa Edinburgh, yabashije kugira icubahiro hose kubera gushigikira cane Umwamikazi kandi igihe cose. Rwari uruhara rutoroshe ku w'ariwe wese, ubaye urareka umugabo yari amenyereye ivya gisirkare kandi yari afise aho ashingiye bikomeye ku bibazo bitari bike. Ariko n'izo nguvu nyene z'inyifato yiwe zamufashije kurangura neza ivyo yari  ajejwe maze akabona gushigikira atiziganije umugore wiwe mu mabanga yiwe y'Umwamikazi. Yari umugabo w'Umwamikazi ari ku ngoma ariko Philip nta ruhare  rw'ibwirizwa nshingiro yari afise. Ariko nta n'umwe yari hafi y'Umwamikazi kurusha we canke ngo abe akomeye kuri we kurusha uko we. Umuganwa Philip w'Ubugiriki yari yavutse itariki 10 ukwezi kwa 6 mu  1921 kw'izinga rya Corfu. Urupapuro  rwiwe rw'amavuko rwerekana ko yavutse itariki 28/5/1921 kuko Ubugiriki butari bwatangure gukoresha ikirangamisi ca Gregoire (calendrier Gregorien). Inyuma y'itembagazwa  ry'ubutegetsi mu 1922, se yaciye acibwa na sentare y'impinduka. Ubwato bw'intambara bw'Ubwongereza  bwarungitswe na  muvyarawe wa kabiri, Umwami George V, bwaciye bujana umuryango mu Bufaransa. Umwana  Philip ahanini yamaze urwo rugendo rwo mu mazi mu gatebe gakozwe mu dusandugu twari twavuyemwo imicungwe. Philip yatanguriye ishure mu Bufaransa ariko ku myaka 11, yaciye aja kubandanya n'incuti ziwe mu Bwongereza aho yize ishure  nteguza i Surrey. Philip yari yavutse nk'umuganwa w'umugiriki ariko yamuka ku banye Danemark n'Abarusiya. Ico gihe nyina yari yatowe indwara ya schizophrenie aca ajanwa aho bene abo bantu barwarira. Umwana Philip yabonana gake cane nawe gushika akure. Mu 1933 yarungitswe kwiga kuri Schule Schloss Salem mu Budagi bw'ubumanuko , ishure ryari rirongowe n'umuntu yari imbere mu barondera guteze imbere amashure Kurt Hahn. Ariko mu mezi make, Hahn, yari Umuyahudi,yaciye yomoka ahunga ihigwa n'aba Nazi. Hahn yaciye aja muri Ecosse aho yaciye ashinga ishure rya Gordonstoun, ari naryo Philip yaciye yimukiramwo amaze ibice bibiri mu Budagi. Ingendo nk'iya Sparte yaranga ishure rya Gordonstoun, yari ishingiye ku kwibako, niyo yari ijanye n'umwana w'umuyabaga yari yatandukanye n'abavyeyi biwe akaba nka nyamwigendako. Mu ntambara Intanbara ya kabiri y'isi iriko iregereza, Philip yaciye ahitamwo kuja mu gisirikare. Yashaka kuja mu ngabo zikoresha indege ariko umuryango wa nyina wari usanzwe ufise kahise mu vy'imirimo yo mu mazi uca umuhanura kwinjira mw'ishure ry'ingabo zo mu mazi  rya Royal Naval College i Dartmouth. Aho niho yashingwa guherekeza Abaganwakazi bari bakiri bato Elizabeth na Margaret, mu gihe Umwami George VI n'Umwamikazi Elizabeth  bariko barazunguruka iryo shure. Ku bw'ababibonye, Philip yariyerekanye cane. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth yari afise imyaka 13 yahavuye agenda aramutangarira. Philip ntiyatevye kuba inkerebutsi kuri iryo shure rya Gordonstoun. Yavyerekanye mu kuba uwa mbere mw'ishure ryiwe, mu 1940 aca atangura kuja ubwa mbere mu bikorwa vya gisirikare ahereye  mw'ibahari Indiano. Yaciye arungikwa ku bwato bw'intambara HMS Valiant muri Mediterranee aho yavuzwe ku ruhara mu ntambara ya Cape  Matapan mu 1941. Nk'intwazangabo yari ajejwe amatara yo kurondeza y'ubwo bwato, yagize uruhara runini  muri ico gikorwa gikomeye co mw'ijoro. Hashitse mu kwezi kw'icumi mu 1942 ariwe mu lieutenant yari akiri muto kurusha abandi mu ngabo zo mu mazi yakora ku bwato  bw'intambara HMS Wallace. Gutangaza ivy'umubano Muri ico gihe we n'Umuganwakazi Elizabeth baraja bararungikirana amakete, akaba yaratumiwe kuza kumara iminsi mu muryango w'i bwami akatari gake. Rimwe yaje kubaramutsa, mu gihe ca Noel yo mu 1943, niho Elizabeth yashira ifoto ya Philip mu mwambaro wa uniforme z'ingabo zo mu mazi ku meza yategurirako impuzu ziwe. Imigenderanire yabo yarabandanije mu gihe c'amahoro, n'ubwo hari abatabishaka mu batoni b'i bwami-muri bo hari umwe yavuze ngo Philip "arahuruduka kandi ntafise  inyifato nziza''. Ariko Umuganwakazi yari yamukunze cane hanyuma muci ryo mu 1946, Philip aca asaba Umwami kumuha umukobwa wiwe ngo bubakane. Ariko imbere y'uko hatangazwa ko vyemewe, Umuganwa Philip yategerezwa kuronka ubwenegihugu bushasha hamwe n'izina ry'umuryango. Aca aheba izina ryiwe ry'Ubugiriki, aba umwenegihugu w'Umwongereza, aca afata izina rya nyina rivuzwe mu congereza, Mountbatten. Umunsi umwe imbere y'uko ubukwe buba, Umwami George VI yaciye aha Philip  icubahiro  c'abo mu nda y'ubwami, bukeye mu gitondo c'ubukwe, aba yagizwe Duc wa Edimburgh, Earl wa Merioneth hamwe na Baron wa Greenwich. Ubukwe bwabereye Westminster Abbey ku wa 20/11/1947. Vyari ibirori, nk'uko Winston Churchill yabivuze, vy'umwakaka w'amabara' mu Bwongereza bwari bucijiriwe inyuma y'intambara. Umuganwa Philip yarasubiye mu kazi kiwe ko mu ngabo zo mu mazi aca arungikwa gukora muri Malte, aho ubwa mbere nibura, we n'umugore, bashoboye kubaho nk'uwundi muryango wose wari mu butumwa  bw'akazi. Umuhungu wabo, Umuganwa Charles, yavukiye ku kirimba Buckingham mu 1948 mu gihe Umuganwakazi Anne yabonetse  mu 1950. Mu 1952, bafashe urugendo rwo kuzunguruka Commonwealth, basezewe n'umwami Geaorge VI we, atazwi n'umwuzukuru wiwe w'umukobwa, yari afise indwara ya cancer. Umuganwa Philip yabaye uwa mbere yakeje Umwamikazi igihe yimikwa. Abari bahari ico gihe bavuga ko yari gushobora guca ashikira, iyo abishaka, icubahiro ca First Sea Lord. Ahubwo yaciye yironderera ico yokora na cane cane, aho Elizabeth abareye umwamikazi. Yari afise ivyiyumviro vyinshi vyo kugira ivyo ahinduye mu ntwaro ya cami ariko abanyamabanga b'ikirimba ntibabimwemereye. Umuganwa Philip ntiyari  umugabo aha ikibanza ivyo kwicuza, ariko mu nyuma yaravuze ko yababajwe n'uko atashoboye kubandanya igisirikare. Kuvugurura intwaro y'ubwami. Igihe bari bacumbitse mu nzu  iri mu kibira c'ibikoko  muri Kenya mu kwezi kwa kabiri niho hatangura kuvugwa ko umwami yapfuye. Yari yafashwe n'indwara yo kuvura amaraso yo mu mutima idatevya kwica. Vyaguye kuri Philip kuba ariwe amenyesha ubwa mbere umugore wiwe ko yabaye Umwamikazi. Umwe mu bagenzi babo yavuze ko ico gihe Philip yaciye asa n'uko "igice c'isi" kimuguyeko. Aho yagumanye ububasha bwiwe bwose  mu guha indero abana biwe. Niwe yarungitse umuhungu wiwe w'imfura Charles mw'ishure nawe yari yarizemwo rya Gordonstoun, ariko ntiryamuguye neza namba, mbere yahavuye ariheba. Inkino Umuganwa Philip yarakunda inkino. Yasoza ubwato, agakina cricket na polo, yari azi cane kugendesha ibitwazi bikwegwa n'amafarasi akaba yaranabaye imyaka myinshi umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'isiganwa ku mafarasi. Kuba yari umuntu yavuga atarya umunwa rimwe na rimwe vyaramutera ibibazo. Yahavuye afatwa nk'umuntu atari azi kuraba aho avugira na cane cane iyo yaba ari mu mahanga. Ari mu Bushinwa mu 1986 mu rugendo hamwe n'Umwamikazi, yabwiye abanyeshure b'Abongereza ati ''nimwamara igihe kinini ngaha amaso yanyu azomera nk'ayabashinwa''. Muri Australia naho mu 2002 abaza umugwizatunga w'umu Aborigene niba ''mugiterana amacumu.'' Ukutumvikana n'umuhungu w'imfura wiwe vyagiye gusubira kuja ahabona hasohotse igitabo ku buzima bwiwe canditswe n'umunyamakuru Jonathan Dimbleby. Vyavuzwe ko Philip ariwe yatumye Prince Charles arongora atabishaka Diana Spencer. Ibihe bikomeye N'ubwo Philip yababajwe cane n'ukubona ingo z'abana biwe batatu kuri bane zisambuka, yagumye yanka kugira ico avuze ku bibazo bimuraba ubwiwe aho yabwiye ikinyamakmuru mu 1994 ati ntiyari bwabikore gushika ico gihe kandi ntagiye kubitangura. Gushigikira ubwami Yigeze kubwira BBC ati : ''Nakoze gushika aho nibaza ko ariho nashobora kugeza. Sinshobora guhindura ingene nkora. Niko meze''. Ministre wa mbere David Cameron yarabimushimiye buca ahimbaza isabukukuru yiwe y'imyaka 90. Yavuze ati ''yamye ari umuntu akora ibintu mu buryo bwiwe ata wundi yomwigana, afatiye ku buzima busanzwe mu buryo nibaza ko Abongereza bakunze''. Umuganwa Philip yarashoboye gukoresha ikibanza ciwe kugira hagire ico afashije mu buzima bw'Ubwongereza, hanyuma aragira uruhara mu gufasha intwaro y'ubwami kwisunga ivyagenda birahinduka mu buryo abantu babona ibintu uko imyaka yagenda irahera. Ariko kimwe mu bintu bikomeye yashitseko, kwabaye ugushigikira adahesha Umwamikazi mu myaka myinshi y'ingoma yiwe. Igihe bahimbaza imyaka 50 bari bamaze bubakanye, umwamikazi yarakeje umugabo wiwe, yabaye umugabo w'umwamikazi wa mbere yaramvye ku ngoma muri kahise k'Ubwongereza. ''N'umuntu adakunda cane gushimagizwa, ariko  yabaye inkomezi zanje, kandi akiriko muri iyi myaka yose. Hanyuma jewe n'umuryango wiwe wose tumufitiye  umwenda uruta uwo ashobora kutwishuza canke tutazokwigera tumenya uko ungana.'' Kurwanira ibidukikije Umugamwa Philip yaritanze cane mu  gukingira ibidukikije na cane cane amashamba hamwe n'ibikoko. Niwe yatanguje ikigega World Wildlife Fund cahavuye gihinduka World Wide Fund, gifasha mu gukingira ibidukikije. ''Nibaza ko twebwe abantu niba dufise ububasha bwo kwica no gukiza, dutegerezwa kubukoresha tubanje kwibaza ico dukora. Kuki twohonya ikintu bidakenewe?''. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC, yavuze ati: "Nibaza ko biteye igomwe kubona abantu, kuri iyi si, tuba mu buzima butandukanye kandi budasa, mugabo hakaba ugufashanya". "Nibwira kandi ko, twebwe abantu, nimba dufise ingabirano zo kuvyara, tugashobora gukiza canke kwica - kubaho canke guhona-, tubwirizwa kubigendera dukoresheje amabanga y'ubuntu twahezagijwe. Kubera iki twokwica kandi tutabwirizwa kwigenza uko?" Abagendera imico n'imigenzo y'abongereza ba kera ntibashimye ingene yashigikiye ko inyoni z'inkware ziraswa. "Iyo uzi ko hari inkino zifasha abantu kuramba, dufate nk'uguhiga, ntaho bitandukaniye n'abarima, bakorora. Ni nka kurya twamura ingemwe ku biterwa. Ntituba turiko turabihonya". Imvugakuri Umuganwa Philip yarashimiwe cane ku ngendo n'ibikorwa vyiwe vyo gukingira amashamba mw'isi, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyiwe vyo kurwanya ukuroba kurenze urugero, mu mabahari. Umuganwa Philip yaranzwe no gushigikira iterambere ry'amahinguriro. Yaratemberera cane inganda zitandukanye. Ni uko yiswe umuvunyi w'amahinguriro, ubu tuzi nk'ikigo kidaharanira inyungu zitandukanye, gifasha mu migambi canke ibikorwa vy'ubushakashatsi vy'abakozi, mu Bwongereza -"Work Foundation"-. Mu 1961, yabwiye umurwi w'abarongoye amahinguriro ati: "Bagenzi, harageze ko duhagarika guta umwanya. Twerekane ivyo dushoboye". Iyi ngendo yo kutarya umunwa, yatumye bamwe bamufata nk'umuntu atubaha abandi, ivyanamuteye ingorane, rimwe na rimwe. Hari abamufashe nk'umuntu w'akagaye, cane cane ibihe yaba ari mu ngendo mu mahanga. Mu gihugu c'Ubushinwa, niho yavugiye ijambo rimwe mu yatazokwibagirwa. Hari mu mwaka w'1986, igihe yari mu rugendo, yaherekeje Umwamikazi. We yavuze ko yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo, afatiye ku maso mato mato y'ubwoko bw'abanye Asia, cane cane Abashinwa. Naho bagerageje gusukamwo mabisi, imvugo yiwe yarababaje abantu mu Bushinwa. Mu mwaka wa 2002, ari mu rundi rugendo mu gihugu ca Australiya, yabajije umwe mu bagwizatunga w'umusangwabutaka  ati "Muracabandanya guterana amacumu"? Naho abatari bake, mu mice itandukanye bamunebagura, hari abandi ahubwo bamubona nk'umunyakuri, yanse guhindura ico ari ngo afate ingeso n'imvugo vy'abakinyi ba politike. Nkako, hari abasigura ko ivyo bita "amakosa" ata kabi karimwo, uretse inyifato yiwe yo gushaka kugabanya imitwaro y'abantu, mu kubatwenza. Mu buzima bwiwe, umuganwa Philip  yamanye urukundo rw'inkino. Yarakina inkino zo kugendesha ubwato buto buto, agakina inkino za cricket na polo. Yari umuhinga mugutwara imodoka zikwegwa n'indogobwe. Ndetse yaranarongoye, imyaka myinshi, ihuriro mpuzamakungu ry'amashirahamwe y'abakina inkino zikoreshwamwo indogobwe. Ukutumvikana n'umuhungu wiwe mukuru, kwagiye kwigaragaza kuva aho umumenyeshamakuru Jonathan Dimbleby ashiriye ahabona inyandiko ku vyaranze ubuzima bw'umuganwa Charles. Umuganwa Philip , ari na Duc wa  Edinburgh, vyavugwa ko yoba yagize uruhara mu bukwe  bw'umuhungu wiwe mukuru Charles , mu kwubakana na  Lady Diana Spencer. Urengeye uko abamunebagura bavuga, umuganwa Philip  yarazwi nk'umuntu yahagaritswe umutima n'ibiringo bigoye abana biwe baciyemwo, mu ngo zabo. Yarashize imbere y'ibindi vyose ugutahura izo ngorane, kumbure afatiye ku vyamushikiye n'ivyo yibuka bigoye, mu muryango w'i bwami. Umuganwa Philip yaratewe agahinda n'ingene abana biwe batatu bose ivy'ingo  vyabananiye, kuva ku muganwakazi Anne  gushika ku baganwa Andrew na Charles. Ico atigeze akora, ni ukuvuga ibijanye n'ubuzima bwiwe bwite. Mu 1994, yabwiye ikinyamakuru ko atariko yarezwe, kandi ko atibona agiye guhindura imibereho yiwe. No mu gihe yariko arasaza, imibereho yiwe ntiyahindutse. Yabandanije agendera amakungu. Yaba agiye mu bikorwa vyiwe bijanye no gushigikira ikigega mpuzamakungu co gukingira ibinyabuzima, canke aherekeje umwamikazi mu ngendo zijanye n'imirimo yiwe. Mu 1994, yaragize urugendo rurerure, aca no mu bibanza vyeranda, aranashika n'ahari imva y'umuvyeyi yamwibarutse. Mama wiwe yari yaripfuje guhambwa I Yerusalemu, nk'uko vyagenze. Uwundi munsi wari uhambaye mu buzima bwiwe, ni igihe amakungu yibuka itsindwa ry'Ubuyapani mu ntambara  ya kabiri y'isi yose -"VJ Day"-. Uyo mwaka wa 1945, umuganwa Philip  yakorera igisirikare co mu mazi. Yari no mu bwato bw'Ubwongereza, bumwe mu bwatera kandi bwari hafi ya Tokyo, umurwa mukuru w'igihugu c'Ubuyapani. Mu kwibuka uwo munsi, ibirori biba uko umwaka utashe. Mu 1995, yari akwije imyaka 50 y'amavuka. Yifadikanije n'abandi bakukuruke mu gisirikare bagiye kurwanira mu bihugu vya Asia  y'ubuseruko. Umwamikazi yarateye iteka ivyo birori vyabereye mu kibanza cagutse gikunze gukoraniramwo abantu, kiri hafi y'ikirimba - Buckingham Palace-. Imvugo ihumuriza Umuganwa Philip yararemesheje, aranakeza abari baragizwe imbohe. Abenshi muri bo barahahamuwe n'ivyo baciyemwo, ndetse hari n'abatashoboye guharira Abayapani babagize imbohe. . Ubukari bw'amajambo yiwe bwagiye buragabanuka mu myaka yakurikiye, bitumwe n'uko igihugu kitakiriye neza iyo nyifato yo ku kirimba, na cane cane inyuma y'isanganya ryahitanye umuganwakazi Diana. Mu mwaka w'i 2007, hari amakete umuganwa Philip  yandikiraniye n'umuganwakazi Diana yashizwe ahabona. Intumbero ikaba yari ukubeshuza amakuru yavugwa ko umuganwa Philip  atumvikana n'uwo mukazana wiwe. Amajambo Diana yakoresha mukwandikira sebukwe, umuganwa Philip, yemeje ko yamubereye nk'umuvyeyi mu kumushigikira mu bihe bitandukanye. Mu matohoza ku rupfu rw'umuganwakazi Diana, Mohamed Al Fayed, se wa Dodi, umugabo yagendanye n'umuganwakazi Diana mu minsi ya nyuma, wewe yari yavuze ko umuganwa Philip ariwe ari inyuma y'urwo rupfu, ivyemezo vyatewe ivyatsi n'uwari ajejwe kwemeza ko Diana yacikanye. Umuganwa Philip  akaba na Duc wa Edinburgh, yari umuntu w'ishaka. Kandi mu nyifato y'ubwigenge bwiwe, vyamugize umuntu w'icubahiro gikomeye mu Bongereza. Inyifato ifise ifatiro n'ihangiro Umuganwa Philip yari umuyobozi kamere, kandi ibikorwa vyiwe vyamuhaye ikibanza ca kabiri mu buyobozi bw'Ubwongereza. Yari umurwanashaka atarazi kuruhuka, kandi atitaho cane ivy'ikibanza ciwe. Umunsi umwe yabwiye BBC ati: "Narakoze ivyo numva nabwirizwa gukora kandi uko nashoboye". Yongeye ati:  "Sinshobora guhindura rimwe na rimwe uko mbona canke nkora ibintu, canke ngo mpindure uko ndemye, canke ibindaje ishinga". Ibi yavuze vyanemejwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere David Cameron mu mwaka wa 2011, mu birori vyo gukeza umuganwa Philip , aho yahimbaza imyaka 90 y'amavuka. Yavuze ati: "Yamye arangura imigambi n'ivyiyumviro vyiwe mu buryo yisangije kandi busanzwe, nk'umuntu wo kuri iyi si. Ndemera ko ari kimwe muvyo abongereza bamukundira". Akaruhuko ko mu za bukuru Mu bikorwa vy'igihugu, umuganwa Philip yagiye mu karuhuko k'izabukuru mu kwezi kw'umunani mu  2017. Yari amaze imyaka ashigikira umwamikazi, yongera akorera canke aserukira amashirahamwe atandukanye yari arongoye, canke yashinze. Ikirimba ca  Buckingham giharura ko umuganwa Philip yaranguye, canke yaterereye mu migambi 22.219  ku gatwe kiwe, kuva mu mwaka wa 1952. Umushikiranganji  wa mbere Theresa May yaramushimiye cane, ati: "Ni ibikorwa biboneka mu buzima bw'igihugu". Philip  yarashoboye gukoresha ububasha n'ikibanza igihugu kimuha, mu guterera agacumu k'ubumwe mw'iterambere ry'Ubwongereza. Yaranafasha uburongozi bwo ku kirimba guhindura ibitari bike mu mibereho yari imaze imyaka. Ariko igikorwa nyamukuru kwabaye ugukoresha inguvu ziwe mu gushigikira Umwamikazi mu kiringo ciwe kirekire, yari amaze arongoye ubwami bw'Ubwongereza. Nk'uko yabiganiriye umwanditsi w'ivyaranze ubuzima bwiwe, Umuganwa Philip yaremeza ko umurimo wiwe mukuru kwari "Ugufasha Umwamikazi kurongora ubwami". Mu birori vyo guhimbaza imyaka 50 bamaze bubakanye, Umwamikazi yarashimye , anakeza umuganwa Philip, nk'uwabaye uwa mbere yamaze imyaka myinshi ari umufasha w'Umwamikazi, muri kahise k'ubwami bw'Ubwongereza. Umwamikazi yavuze ijambo ryabaye rurangiranwa ati, "N'umuntu adakunda cane gushimirwa no gukezwa, ariko yarambereye inguvu, ambera intahemuka iyi myaka yose. Kandi ahanje, umuryango wiwe wose, Ubwongereza hamwe n'ibindi bihugu vyinshi, tumufitiye ideni rinini, rikomeye ku buryo adashobora kuryishuza canke ngo tunamenye n'ibirigize". Amafoto yose yatangiwe uburenganzira.

column2: Abarundi barenga 200 bari i Dubai babuze epfo na ruguru kubera coronavirus
column3: Abarundi barenga 200 baheze mu gisagara ca Dubai kuva mu kwa gatatu kw'uno mwaka kubera vyanse ko batahuka iwabo inyuma y'aho uruja n'uruza ruhagarikiwe bivuye ku kiza ca coronavirus. Bavuga ko bari mu mazi abira, bakabona ko bashobora kwisanga mu mabohero kuko ikiringo bahawe na leta y'igihugu ca Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu kizorangira ku wa 12/08. Bavuga ko barishe amatike  mw'ikompanyi y'indege Kenya Airways, ariko ko mu nyuma iyo kompanyi yababwiye ko idashobora kuja mu Burundi kuko ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura kicugaye. Ubuserukizi bw'u Burundi i Dubai burabahumuriza ko ikibazo cabo kiriko kirigwa kandi ko vuba kizotorerwa umuti. Banga Rigumye, umwe muri abo Barundi yagiye arondera akazi, yabwiye BBC ko ibibazo barimwo vyatanguye kuva mu kwagatatu kw'uno mwaka, igihe u Burundi bwugara ikibuga c'indege. "Twari twateguye gutaha ku wa 22 z'ukwa gatatu, iyo tariki nyene leta y'u Burundi ica itangaza ko ikibuga c'indege cugaye mu gihe aha i Dubai naho hari hasohotse itangazo rivuga ko ikibuga cari kwugarwa itariki 25 z'ukwa gatatu". "Twebwe rero twari twateguye kwurira indege kuri iyo tariki kugira ngo ino ntibahave batwugarirako". Avuga ko bahavuye bitura ubuserukizi kugira bubavugire batahe, ariko bikaba bitakunze. Bangarigumye avuga ko leta ya Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu yari yabemereye ko impusha zo kuba muri ico gihugu zari kubandanya gushika mu kwa cumi na kabiri, ariko mu nyuma ivamwo irisubirako. "Twatangarijwe ko kugera kw'igenekerezo rya 12/08 twese twoba twasohotse, atari uko naho uwubishoboye arihe amadolari 700 kugira ngo aronswe visa nshasha. Rero ingorane twebwe Abarundi dufise, kubera coronavirus nta buzi dufise ngo turonke ayo mahera". Avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko bagumayo ataco bariko barakora, gushika aho bene amazu babirukana, ubu bamwe bakaba barara bakirirwa hanze, "ivyo gufungura vyovyo bikaba ari umugani". Asaba ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi y'uko bwobacishirizamwo bagatahuka amarembe badateje iceyi igihugu. Eddy Kevin Gahire aserukira abarundi baba muri ico gihugu avuga ko ico kibazo bagishikirijwe, nabo bakagishikiriza ubuserukizi bw'u Burundi i Dubai. Uwuserukira u Burundi muri Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu aremeza ko abo bantu abazi kuko bamwituye kandi ko ariko arakora uko ashoboye kugira ngo ikibazo cabo gitorerwe umuti. Bapfinda Epimeni yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko mu bisanzwe iyi ngorane iri n'ahandi, ariko ko ikibazo c'abo bari i Dubai gitandukanye kubera abenshi muri bo ari imisore n'inkumi bagiye barondera ubuzi butobuto. Ati: "Barafise ingorane kandi zikomeye cane kuko abenshi ntibafise aho baryama, abenshi ntibafise ingene bashobora no gufungura". "Icabateye ubwoba gusumba ni uko leta y'iki gihugu iherutse gutangaza ko uwo hazogera itariki 12 z'uku kw'umunani azoca atangura gufatwa nk'uwuri mu gihugu bitemewe n'amategeko (overstay)" "Ico gihe bazoca batangura gutozwa ama Durham 100 ku munsi (hafi 525  amafaranga y'amarundi), mu gihe batanaronka n'ayo gufungura". Avuga ko ico bakoze kwabaye ukwandikira ababatwara mu Burundi, kandi ko babishuye bakabasaba  ko botegura urutonde rw'abo bantu. Afise icizere ko mu minsi ikibazo bazogitorera umuti. Abasaba kubandanya barindiriye mu kwihangana gushika ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura cuguruwe bagashobora gutahuka kuko basanzwe bararishe amatike y'indege. Arabahumuriza ko ni hagera y'uko ikiringo bahawe kirangira ku wa 12/08 ikibuga c'indege ca Bujumbura kitarugururwa ngo bashobore gutaha ko azobasabira imbabazi mu bushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire ya Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abarabu kugira ngo ntibarihishwe amande.

column2: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
column3: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

column2: Umumenyereza wa Maroc ati ‘Africa izotsindira igikombe c’isi mu myaka 15-20’
column3: Afrika izotsindira igikombe c’isi yose “mu myaka 15-20”, niko umumenyereza w’umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Maroc Walid Regragui avuga, akaba ari na we mumenyereza wa mbere wa Afrika ahatswe gushika kuri iyo ntumbero. Barongowe na Regragui, Les Lions de l'Atlas, babaye umurwi wa mbere wo ku mugabane wa Afrika ushitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi, aho bagiye gukurwamwo n’Ubufaransa buhejeje ihiganwa muri mu kibanza ca kabiri. Uyu mumenyereza w’imyaka 47 yizeye ko Afrika izoronka akarusho mu myaka iri imbere, aho izoba iserukirwa n’ibihugu birenga bitanu ku ncuro ya mbere kuva mu 2026 no kubandanya. Regragui ati: "Mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi kiri imbere, tuzoba dufise ibibanza icenda, ibi bikazodufasha kwiga gusumba. "Mu myaka 15-20, ndazi neza ko umurwi wa Afrika uzotsindira igikombe. Kuko igihe cose tuzokwama tuhigira vyinshi, rero urwaruka rwacu ruzoba rufise mu maraso igikombe c’isi”. Kuva mu 1994, Afrika iserukirwa n’ibihugu bitanu – ibibanza bike cane ugereranije na 13 vya Bulaya, ikaba isumvya ikibanza kimwe Amerika y’ubumanuko isanzwe ifise ibihugu bike cane rwose, ikanganya na Aziya (iyo itaramutse yakira igikombe). Nyamara iki giharuro kuri Afrika kizokwiyongera hafi incuro zibiri  mbere gishobore gushika no kw’icumi mu gihe hogira igihugu cayo corengana inkino mpuzamigabane za play-off /barrage zo guhiganira ibibanza vy’abazokwitaba ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi. Uyu mugabane ntiworoherwa gushika muri ca gice co gukuranamwo, aho mu 2018 ata murwi n’umwe washoboye gushikayo,  igihe cose ikama iserukirwa n’umwe gusa urengana inkino z’amatsinda kuva mu 1994 wongererejwe igitigiri, kiretse mu 2014 na 2022, aho imirwi ibiri ari yo yashoboye kurengana. Uyo yahoze akinira umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Maroc avuga ati: "Ingorane zacu nk’imirwi ya Afrika, ntarinze kunegura cane, ni uko dufise ibibanza bitanu gusa, rero ibi bigasigura ko muri kino gihe Misiri itari kubamwo, canke Nigeria, Afrika y’Epfo, Mali, n’ibindi. "Rero, igihe cose, kubera twama duhanganye (mu kurondera itike), ntivyoroshe na gato (gushobora kwigira ku gikombe c’isi)”. Inyuma y’aho itsindiwe na Croatia mu rukino rwo kurondera ikibanza ca gatatu ku wa gatandatu, yama iheza iri mu bibanza vya mbere mu mahiganwa atandatu y’igikombe c’isi imaze gukina, Regragui avuga ko bari kuri urwo rugero kubera bobo bama baja muri aya mahiganwa. Uyu mugabo yatsindiye ihiganwa ry’imirwi yabaye iya mbere ku mugabane wa Afrika mu ntango z’uno mwaka agira ati: "(Jose) Mourinho – igihe yari muri Manchester United – yaravuze ivyerekeye ADN/DNA y’uyo murwi, ariko ndibaza ko ikintu nk’iki kibaho no mu mirwi nserukirabihugu”. "Kubera iki igihe cose imirwi ya Bulaya (yama ishika mu nkino za nyuma z’igikombe c’isi)? Croatia – kubera iki badutsinze bakarangiza ihiganwa bari mu kibanza ca gatatu? Ni uko bamenyereye cane izi nkino, igihe cose bama baronka itike yo kuja mu gikombe c’isi yose. "Iyo wama witabira buri higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi, ukama ukina izi nkino igihe cose, zirakwigisha, abakinyi bakiri bato barahigira vyinshi. Ibi bituma mw’ihiganwa rikurikira aba bakinyi bakiri bato bazosubirayo bakomeye cane”. Inyuma y’imyaka 20, Maroc yagarutse mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi mu 2018, isubira uno mwaka, ibitari bwigere bibaho ko yikurikiranya uku kuva aho iherukira mu 1994-1998. Muri Qatar, Maroc yateye intambwe zidasanzwe n’aho yahuye n’imirwi y’ibihangange kw’isi: Ububirigi (2), Espagne (7), Portugal (9), ikongera kandi, mu nkino zo mu matsinda, igaca imbere Croatia yari yahejeje ari iya kabiri mu 2018. Umumeyereza wa Maroc yongerako ati: "Twaharonkeye inyigisho z’imyaka myinshi iyo uronse akaryo ko guhura na Croatia incuro zibiri mw’ihiganwa rimwe, igihugu kiza mu kibanza ca gatatu kw’isi”. "Gukina na Espagne, Portugal, Ubufaransa, Ububirigi, na Canada, ni ibintu bidasanzwe – inkino zose zikomeye”. Inyuma yo kwinjizwa igitsindo kimwe gusa mu nkino zitanu za mbere muri Qatar, mu nyuma vyahavuye vyanka kuri Maroc igihe itsinzwe n’Ubufaransa 2-0 mu nkino z’igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma ku wa gatatu, imbere y’uko itsindwa na Croatia 2-1 ku wa gatandatu. N’aho Regragui yababaye cane kubona Maroc itashoboye kuba umurwi wa mbere wa Afrika wari kuba ushitse mu rukino rwa nyuma canke ngo uhereze mu kibanza ca gatatu, ariteze ko intambwe idasanzwe umurwi wiwe washitseko igiye kwibonekeza ubu bwa vuba. Ati: "Turababaye, ariko ni twikangura tuzomenya neza igikorwa kidasanzwe twashitseko. "Inyuma y’uru rukino rwa nyuma, tuzokwihweza ngene ibintu vyagenze, ndazi ko tuzosanga Maroc yakoze ibintu bikomye cane. Ubu rero, ndazi ko dufise igikorwa kidasanzwe imbere yacu”. Uyu mumenyereza yiteze neza ko n’iyindi mirwi ikomakomeye y’umugabane nayo nyene igiye gukurikiranirwa hagufi muri kazoza. "Ubu hagiye kuba vyinshi vyitezwe ku yindi mirwi ya Afrika irondera gushika ku vyo twashitseko. "Maroc irerekanye ko (imirwi ya Afrika) ishoboye kandi itari kure cane (y’imirwi y’ibihangange), rero itandukaniro hagati y’imirwi ya Bulaya n’iya Afrika ni rito cane gusumba uko vyahoze, kandi ni utuntu duto cane. “Ibi bigiye gutera intege umupira w‘amaguru muri Afrika”.

column2: Burundi-CAN: Intamba z'abagore muri CAN 'tugiye guhura n'ibihugu bikomeye'
column3: Umukuru w'igisata c'abagore mu rwego rujejwe umupira w'amaguru mu Burundi avuga ko bagiye gutumako abakinyi bari mu bihugu vyo hanze kugira baze gufasha mu mwiteguro wo kuja mu gice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Africa, CAN. Eugenie Kabura avuga ko hari abakinyi baziga mu Amerika, Ubufaransa na Swede. Madame Kabura yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko intsinzi ya 11-1 mu nkino zibiri na Djibouti yabahaye ''icigwa co kugira twitegure cane [...] kuko tugiye guhura n'ibihangange." Kuri Stade Urukundo i Ngozi kuri uyu wa mbere, urukino rwa kabiri na Djibouti rwarangiye ari 5-0 vy'Uburundi. Mu rwa mbere, Uburundi bwari bwatahukanye intsinzi ya 6-1. Ni ubwa mbere umugwi nserukira-gihugu w'Uburundi mu  gisata c'abagore mu mupira w'amaguru ushika mu gice ca nyuma c'ihiganwa rya  CAN; bagenzi babo b'abagabo bagishitsemwo mu 2019. Ico gikombe kizokinirwa uyu mwaka mu gihugu ca Maroc mu kwezi kw'indwi, ariko ingene imigwi izohura ntibiramenyekana. Eugenie Kabura avuga ko ati: "Umunezero... intsinzi ku gihugu cacu c'Uburundi, intsinzi ku bakenyezi n'abigeme b'igihugu c'Uburundi." Mu mugwi Uburundi bwarimwo, Intamba zarangije mu kibanza ca gatatu inyuma ya Maroc na Uganda inyuma y'aho Kenya yikuriyemwo imbere y'uko batana mu mitwe. Ibihugu 12 nivyo bizohiganirwa ico gikombe ca Afrika hagati y'itariki 2 na 23 z'ukwezi kwa Mukakaro/Nyakanga(ukwa 7). Imigwi ine izoshika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma ikazoca ironka amahirwe yo kuzoserukira Afrika mu gikombe c'isi kizobera muri Australia na Nouvelle Zelande mu mwaka uza. Eugenie Kabura avuga ko mu kwitegurira iryo higanwa rikomeye Intamba z'abagore zishitsemwo ubwa mbere, bagiye gutumako abakinyi bose bazi b'abarundikazi bakina mu bindi bihugu kugira baze kubafasha. Avuga ko no muri iyo ntsinzi ibashikanye ngaho, abakina mu migwi yo mu bindi bihugu bagize uruhara rukomeye. Harimwo batandatu bakina mu Rwanda, Ubwongereza na Tanzania. Mu rukino rwo ku wa mbere, Aniella Uwimana akina muri Tanzania yinjije ibitsindo bitatu. Ahandi baziga abikinyi ngo ni muri Amerika, Ubufaransa na Swede. Eugenie Kabura ati: "Kuja muri CAN si ikintu coroshe. Tugiye guhura n'ibihugu bikomakomeye. "Hariho aho tubona hadakinwa neza, tugiye kurondera abamenyereza babizi cane, kurondera ubumenyi [...] kugira umugwi uzohaguruke uja mu gihugu ca Maroc ari umugwi ukomeye kandi wizeza kugira vyiza." Inkino za kabiri zo gukuranamwo mu kurondera itike yo kuja muri CAN mu rwego rw'abagore: Izimaze gukinwa n'izitegekanijwe Ku wa mbere, 21/02 Ku wa kabiri, 22/02 Ku wa gatatu, 23/02

column2: India: Umupatiri n’umubikira bakatiwe guherayo bagirizwa kugandagura uwundi mubikira
column3: Umupatiri w'umugatorika n'umubikira bo mu Buhindi baciriwe umunyororo w'ubuzima bwose bagiriwe n'icaha co kugandagura uwundi mubikira, haraciye  imyaka irenga 28. Patiri Thomas Kottoorna hamwe n'Umubikira Sephy baciriwe urubanza ku wa kabiri bagiriwe kwica uwundi mubikira yari afise imyaka 21, Umubikira Abhaya mu 1992, maze baca bazimanganya ivyemezo vy'ubu bwicanyi. Aba bantu babiri bagandaguye uyu mubikira mu gihe yari abafashe bari mu busambanyi. Mu ntango, igiporisi cari cibajije ko uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yoba yariyahuye. Ariko haciye hatangura amatohoza yimbitse inyuma y'aho umuryango wiwe n'abaharanira agateka ka muntu berekaniye amakenga ku rupfu rwiwe. Sephy w'imyaka  55 ntaco aravuga kuri uru rubanza, ariko Patiri Kottoor ubu afise imyaka 69 ashimangira ko ari umwere. Ejo k uwa gatatu asomewe urwo rubanza, yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ici o gihugu ati: "Jewe nta caha nakoze. Imana iri kumwe nanje". Hari uwundi mupatiri agira gatatu, Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, na we yagirijwe n'abashikirizamanza ko yasambanije Umubikira Sephy. Yarahagaitswe mu 2008 kuri ubu bwicanyi ariko mu nyuma ararekurwa kubera habuze ivyemezo. Ikiziga c'uyu mubikira Abhaya catowe mu kinogo hafi y'uburaro bw'ababikira bwitiriwe umweranda Piyo mu gisagara ca Kottayam kiri mu bumanuko bw'Ubuhindi. Sentare yavuze ko imbere y'uko yicwa, Abhaya yaravyutse mu gaturuturu ku wa 27 z'ukwa gatatu 1992, aja mu gikoni c'ubwo buraro bw'ababikira agiye gutora amazi yari muri firigo. Mu gihe yashika mu gikoni, yafashe mpiri Kottoor na Sephy. Sentare ivuga ko ku gutinya ko yohava abamenera ibanga, baciye bamwica hanyuma banyegeza ikiziga. Amatohoza ku rupfu rw'uyu mubikira yari akiri muto yarabaye ikibazo ngorabahizi mu Buhindi. Mu ntango, igiporisi c'akarere n'ic'igihugu vyari vyavuze ko yari yariyahuye. Ariko, mu 1993, ikigo c'Ubuhindi kijejwe igendereza (Central Bureau of Investigation, CBI) caciye gifata mu minwe iki kibazo, maze gisanga yarishwe, ariko nticashoka gitora abamugandaguye. Kw'itegeko rya sentare nkuru y'igihugu mu 2008, CBI yaciye isubira kwugurura amatohoza, irahagarika yongera iragiriza Kottoor, Sephy na Patiri Jose Poothrikkayil, ariko mu nyuma bararekuwe batanze ingwati. Niho haca hakurikira urubanza rwamaze igihe kirekire. Jomon Puthenpurackal aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba ari mu baharaniye ko uwakoze aka kabi kabishe akubitwa intahe mu gahanga avuga ati: "Ubutungane burarenganuye Umubikira Abhaya. Agiye kwiruhukira mu mahoro".

column2: Ronaldo na Messi babaye abagenzi inyuma y'aho Van Dijk abakubitiye hasi
column3: Rimwe na rimwe amatombora mu mupira w'amaguru canke iminsi mikuru y'ugutanga ubushimwe birashobora kutaryoha kubera amajambo menshi y'umwanya muremure, ugasanga abariko babikurikira bararambiwe. Ariko iyo ubonye babiri mu bihangange kw'isi - Lionel Messi na Cristiano Ronaldo - bemeye ubwa mbere gusangirira umukate hamwe, ni ibintu bidasanzwe. Kari akamwemwe gusa hagati y'umusatirizi wa Juventus Ronaldo na mugenziwe wa Barcelona Messi igihe bari bicaranye batebura eka banatwenga. Hari igihe batangaza ko Virgil van Dijk ari we atahukanye agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza i Bulaya mu 2018/2019. Vyari ibintu bigoye kwiyumvira ko abo bantu babiri bigeze kuba ari abakeba mu kiringo c'imyaka icenda Ronaldo yamaze mu murwi Real Madrid, banarwanira umupira w'inzahabu, ubu bariko batebura. Ronaldo ati: "Twari tumaze imyaka 15 yose duhurira hano. Sinzi ko ivyo vyari bwigere bibabo mu myaka iri inyuma - abantu babiri bakama bahurira ng'aha igihe cose". "Nivyo ko dufise ubucuti bwiza. Ntiturigera dusangirira hamwe, ariko ndibaza ko bizotinda bigashika muri kazoza". "Twarahanganye cane muri Espanye. Naramuhenuye, nawe arampenura. Nico gituma biryoshe kuba mu bagize amateka y'umupira w'amaguru". Uravye ingene bari bakundanye muri ako kanya, ni nde yokwiyumvira ko hari ukutumvikana hagati y'abo? Igihe c'abo bakeba babiri c'ukwiganzira umupira w'amaguru gitera kirangira, aho muri iri joro ryakeye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Uefa, ryatangaje umwami mushasha w'umupira w'amaguru ku mugabane wa Bulaya Uyo nawe si uwundi ni Virgil van Dijk, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Liverpool. Uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Buholande yahawe agashimwe k'umukinyi mwiza gusumba abandi i Bulaya mu mwaka w'inkino wa 2018/2019. Van Dijk yafashije Liverpool gutahukana igikombe c'igihanwa ry'umupira w'amaguru i Bulaya, Liverpool yatsinze Tottenham ibitsindo 2-0 mu rukino rwa nyuma rwabereye i Madrid mu kwa gatandatu guheze. Van Dijk abaye umukinyi agize kabiri atsinze ivyo bihangange inyuma y'aho mu mwaka uheze, Luka Modric wa Real Madrid atahukaniye ako gashimwe ashize hasi Ronaldo na Messi. Van Dijk kandi niwe mukinyi w'inyuma wa mbere atsindiye ako gashimwe, katanguye guhiganirwa mu mwaka wa 2010/2011. Ati: "Si noreka gushimira bagenzanje dukinana, kuko iyo ataba bo sinari gushika ku ntambwe ngezeko. Rwabaye urugendo rurerure".

column2: Umupfakazi wa TB Joshua mu rugamba rwo kurongora ishengero yasize muri Nigeria
column3: Evelyn Joshua yabaye umurongozi w'imwe mu mashengero akomeye y'abarokore muri Afrika, ariko uwo mupfasoni w'imyaka 52 ahanganye n'ikibazo co kubungabunga iragi ry'umugabo wiwe. Urupfu rwa Joshua rwabaye giturumbuka mu kwezi kwa gatandatu afise imyaka 57 rwatumye hatangura intambara yo kumusubirira yamaze amezi n'amezi kugira ironke inyishu. Ariko imiryango y'iryo shengero ryiwe rya Synagogue Church of All Nations (SCOAN), iri mu gisagara kinini cane muri Nigeria, yasubiriye kwugurugwa kugira yakire abayoboke baryo ubwa mbere mu mezi atanu. Yari rurangiranwa kubera imburi ziwe n'inyigisho, vyatumye ahurumbirwa n'ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abayoboke bavuye hirya no hino kw'isi baja Lagos, harimwo n'abanyepolitike bakomeye bo muri Afrika na Amerika y'epfo. Ni gake haba ibiganiro vy'isubirizwa mu mashengero y'abarokore muri Nigeria mbere kenshi uburongozi buca buhabwa umupfakazi w'uwuba yarashinze ishengero. Ariko muri SCOAN, umupfasoni wa Joshua, yari umupasitori yatiwe, ahanganye n'abandi kubera atari mu rwego rukuru rurongoye iryo shengero. Ibi bifatwa n'abo bahanganye ko ari ikimenyetso c'uko umugabo wiwe atigeze amufata nk'uwushobora kumusubirira. Bitandukanye n'abandi bagore b'abapasitori  bo muri Nigeria, ntiyiyerekana cane mu myaka irenga mirongo itatu bari bamaze bubakanye. TB Joshua afatwa n'abayoboke ba SCOAN nk'"intumwa", yakorana n'umugwi  umwegereye cane yita "inararibonye" - umwe muri bo bikaba vyari vyitezwe ko ari we azomusubirira. Ariko inyuma y'urupfu rwiwe, abari begereye umupfasoni wa Joshua barahawe uburenganzira na sentare bwo kumugira umwe mu bagize urwego nshingwantwaro, bica vyorosha kugera ku ntambwe yo gushika kuri ayo mabanga. Iryo shengero ryaciye rimenyesha ko umupfasoni wa Joshua  abaye umurongozi mushasha "Arongowe n'Imana", ivyababaje ayandi mashami ari muri iryo shengero ku kungene bitabaye mu muco. Cane cane umugwi uzwi kw'izina rya Global Congress of SCOAN Members (GCSM), vyitwa ko ushigikiwe n'abayoboke bo mu rwego rwo hejuru, warerekanye amakenga kuri iyo ngingo. Ariko nta madidane yabaye ku mukuru yari kurongora amasengesho ubwa mbere ya SCOAN itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa cumi na rimwe kuva umugabo wiwe apfuye. Bivugwa ko atahemye kugira yerekane ubutegetsi bwiwe muri iryo shengero, mu gukoresha amezi make ya nyuma mu gusukura iryo shengero. Hari ama Video yagiye ahabona y'abayoboke, benshi b'abanyamahanga, bamaze imyaka baba  muri urwo rupangu runini, bariko baravayo bariko barabazomera. Umwe mu bayoboke yakoresheje imvugo ngereranyo ko "cari icigwa". Abakuwe muri ico kibanza vyavuzwe ko bari abadashigikiye ubutegetsi bw'umupfasoni wa Joshua. Patrick Iwelunmor, yahoze ajejwe kumenyeshamakuru ku muhisi Joshua, yabwiye BBC ati:"Inyuma y'urupfu rw'intumwa, bamwe mu bamugendanira ntibavugisha Evelyn mu rupfasoni." Hari n'inkuru kandi yerekeye igiturire, mbere igisata ca Nigeria kijejwe kugwanya igiturire, EFCC, cemereye BBC ko kiriko kiragira amatohoza ku bivuga ko habaye ubusuma muri iryo shengero. Ntibiramenyekana nimba ibi ari vyo biriko biragirwako amatohoza, kuko ikinyamakuru co muri Nigeria The Punch cari canditse ko iki ari co gituma bamwe mu bayoboke b'iryo shingiro boba banyegeye. Ubu ikigiye kugora cane umupfasoni Joshua n'ugukora ku buryo abayoboke ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bakunda umugabo wiwe biyumvamwo ukwemera kwiwe. Baje kubera igihagararo ciwe n'ubwitonzi hakaba ata co biteze ku mutegetsi mushasha. Gbenga Osinaike, arongoye uruganda rw'abamenyeshamakuru mu kinyamakuru Church Times Nigeria, aremeza ko igenwa ryiwe ryaje giturumbuka. Yabwiye BBC ati:"Yahora asengesha rimwe na rimwe arik TB ntiyigeze amuha icizere." Ariko nk'umuntu atigeze yitabwaho  na benshi, "harimwo n'umugabo wiwe", umupfasoni Joshua yarerekanye " inguvu n'ubushobozi afise mu gutwara iryo shengero." Yaranse ko ahabwa icubahiro c'umugabo wiwe ca " uwujejwe gucungera vyose", avuga ko ari we akibarongoye, ko gusa "atanguriye urugendo aho data yashikanye inkino". Kandi TB Joshua aracafise ikibanza gikomeye muri iryo shengero, amafoto yiwe amanitse hose mu nzu, inyigisho ziwe na zo ziguma zica ku mbuga hwaniro ziwe. Bisa kandi n'uko umupfasoni Joshua yasigaranye iragi ry'ingene umugabo wiwe yigisha - aho yaguma acishamwo indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana - aho n'umudiho usa n'uwo umugabo wiwe aho yariko arahereza inkuka ari wenyene. Ko ari babiri bahuye ubwa mbere mu 1990 aho yamutangaza mu kumubwira ivyerekeye ubuzima bwiwe, yandika n'izina ryiwe ku rupapuro ata jambo na rimwe amubwiye. Bamaranye iminota 45 incuro ya mbere babonana, aho inyuma y'aho yaciye amusaba ko bokwubakana. 'Impano yo kunywanisha' Ni ihasa akaba n'imfura mu muryango w'abana indwi, yakuriye i Okala Okpuno mu ntara ya Delta mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nigeria. N'aho atatanguye ari umupasitori, yaramenyerejwe hanyuma arabuhabwa n'umugabo wiwe. Mu 2009, yavuze ko ari umuntu afise impano zidasanzwe mu kunywanisha - "imigenderanire y'abavyeyi n'abana, abubakanye n'ibindi bintu nk'ivyo." Abasitori bakuru muri Nigeria kenshi bavuga ko baronse umuhamagaro uva muri bibiriya - nk'abahanuzi Samuel na Paul - kugira bakorere Imana. Nk'uko bivugwa na Joshua, umuhamagaro wiwe waje igiye yerekwa mu kiringo c'imisi itatu aho yumva ijwi rigira riti:"Ndi Imana yawe. Ndaguhaye ubutumwa bweranda bwo kugenda gukora igikorwa ceranda c'Imana." Umupfasoni Joshua ntaravuga ko yaronse umuhamagaro nk'uwo, ariko kuri bamwe, kuba bakorana n'umugabo wiwe birakwiye. Iwelunmo agira ati:"TB Joshua yari intumwa kuva avuka, ariko umugore wiwe yamubaye kubera we. Umugabo n'umugore babaye umwe, kubera ubwo bumwe yaciye na we asigwa amavuta." N'aho bamwe mu bapfakazi b'abakuru b'amashengero muri Nigeria, nka Janet Onaolapo wa Abundant Life Gospel Mission na Margaret Idahosa wa Church of God Mission International , barongoye neza amashengero yabo, s'ibintu bisanzwe. Amashengero y'abapantekoti muri Nigeria yubakiye ku gihagararo c'abayashinze, akaba asambuka bamaze gupfa. Osinaike avuga ko ivyo bishobora gushikira na SCOAN. Avuga ati:"Iyo hageze ku bibazo vy'ishengero, abantu baza kurondera inyishu, kurondera ibitangaro, kuraba uwoba yareretswe ibiberekeye. "Icuka gitegerezwa kuzosubira hasi."

column2: Chris Brown yagirijwe ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca amusambanya ku nguvu mu bwato
column3: Chris Brown yagirizwa ko yahaye ibiyayuramutwe umugore aca aramusambanya ku nguvu, ubu akaba ariko mu rubanza rushobora kumutwara imiriyoni 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. Iki caha co gufata ku nguvu kivugwa ko cabereye mu bwato (yacht) ku wa 30 kigarama (ukwa cumi na kabiri) 2020 i Miami mu ntara ya Florida. Ikiganiro Newsbeat ca Radio 1 cagerageje kuvugana n'abaserukira Chris Brown kugira ngo bagire ico bavuze ariko gushika ubu ntaco barishura. Chris Brown asa n'uwishuye aciye ku rubuga rwa Instagram, aho avuga ko ariko arakurikiranwa kubera ariko ategura gusohora umuziki. Yanditse ati: "NDIBAZA KO ARI IVYO MUBONA MWESE....ni igihe cose ngiye gusohora umuziki canke mfise imigambi kanaka". Uru rubanza rwugurujwe n'umunyamuziki atashatse kumenyekana, azwi gusa kw'izina rya 'Jane Doe' mu nzandiko z'amategeko. Izi nyandiko zerekana ibirego bitanu bitandukanye kuri uyu munyamuziki - gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina, guturubika n'ibigirankana, guturubika umuntu kubera urwangara hamwe no gupfunga umuntu atabifitiye uburenganzira kandi amuturubitse. Uyu mugore avuga ko afise "ubwoba ko ashobora kwicwa canke gutakaza akazi" . Avuga ko yahawe ubutumire muri ubwo bwato bwegukira umunyamuziki wo mu mudiho wa rap (rapper) akongera kaba n'umu 'producer',  Diddy, ari naho habereye iki caha kivugwa. Nk'uko uru rwandiko Newsbeat yashoboye kubona rubivuga, uyu mugore avuga ko amaze gushika, Brown  yamuhaye ikinyobwa mu nyuma aca yumva "umubiri urahindutse giturumbuka mu buryo atashobora gusigura". Uru rwandiko ruvuga ko "yataye umutwe, inguvu ziramuherana, aca afatwa n'itiro", imbere y'uko atwarwa mu gitanda ariho bivugwa ko Brown yaciye amwambura impuzu amusambanya ku nguvu. Brown avugwa ko ku musi wakurikiye yahamagaye uyo mugore, amubwira ko yofata imiti kugira ntasame imbanyi. Newsbeat kandi yagerageje no kuvugana n'abaserukizi ba Diddy, ariko nta nyishu baratanga.

column2: U Burundi bugiye guhura na Nigeria muri CAN2019, abakinyi ngo baratekanye
column3: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ikipe nserukiragihugu y'u Burundi, Intamba Mu Rugamba, ejo kuwa gatandatu izokina na Nigeria mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere rw'igikombe ca Afrika 2019, abayigize bavuga nta bwoba bafitiye ico gihangange mu mupira w'amaguru. Mu zuba rimena imbwa agahanga kuri Alexandria Stadium mu muji wa Alexandria mu Misiri, umumenyereza w'Intamba ahejeje kugenzura ikibuga zizokinirako na Nigeria, yemeza ko ata bwoba bafise. Olivier Niyungeko yabwiye BBC ko ica nkenerwa ari uko Abarundi benewabo babafata mu mugongo aho bari hose, naho batoshika i Alexandria. Yagize ati: "Nka kurya bamenyereye gushigikira umurwi wabo w'Intamba Mu Rugamba, twobasaba ko babandanya badushigikira aho bari hose, kuko iyo umuntu ashigikiwe aravyiyumvamwo agakora cane. "Twaje ngaha kuduza ibendera ry'igihugu cacu kandi abakinyi baravyumva, hasigaye ko umuntu wese yumva ko ari Umurundi avuga ati 'ndashigikiye Intamba Mu Rugamba'". Abajijwe niba ikibazo c'ubushuhe bose bikugura ata ngorane kibateye, bwana Niyungeko yavuze ko abona ivyo gukina mu ma saa kumi bobireka bagakina ku kagoroba izuba ritanguye kurenga,  kanatsinda ngo amatara arahari ku bibuga ngo rero ntabona igituma batobigenza uko. Kizigenza w'Intamba Mu Rugamba, Saido Berahino, yatanguye gukinira iyi kipe igaca inaronka itike yayo ya mbere yo kuja muri iri higanwa, ari mu bakinyi bazeweko vyinshi. Kiretse ko ari muri bake bamaze gukina mu mahiganwa akomeye, nk'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza Premier League, ni nawe azwi cane ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Yavuze ko ari amahirwe adasanzwe kuba akinira ikipe y'igihugu ciwe, ibintu yamye yipfuza kuva kera. Agira ati: "Naragize amahirwe yo gukina mu Bwongereza kandi vyarahinduye ubuzima bwanje. Ariko nk'uko namye ndabivuga, u Burundi niko gataka kanje, namye nshaka gukinira u Burundi. "Kuba noneho ndi  na kapitene w'u Burundi mw'ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri ni iteka rihambaye kuri jewe." Naho icizere ari cose, u Burundi ntibworohewe na gato kuko Nigeria atari ikipe yo gupfa guta mu ndasa. Imaze kuja muri iri higanwa inshuro nyinshi mbere iranaritwara, eka mbere ikaba imaze no guserukira Afrika mu gikombe c'isi. Ariko naho biri uko, umumenyereza wa Nigeria, Gernot Rohr, avuga ko adashobora gufata minenerwe ikipe y'u Burundi naho ari ubwa mbere igiye mw'ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri. Bwana Rohr yagize ati: "Twiteguriye u Burundi nk'uko twitegurira ikipe iyo ari yo yose. Twitegurana ukwicisha bugufi, ata gukengera uwo tuza gukina nawe. "U Burundi ni ikipe itigeze itsindwa mu nkino zose zo guhiganirwa itike yo kuza muri iki gikombe. Yaba Gabon, yaba Mali, nta n'imwe yigeze ishobora gutsinda iyi kipe y'u Burundi. "Twarabaravye kuri za video, turabaraba kandi mu rukino rwa nyuma rwo kwitegura, aho bari banganije na Tuniziya ikaza gutsinda mu minota yanyuma." U Burundi buri mu mugwi B kumwe n'amakipe ya Nigeria, Madagascar na Guinea. Urukino rwa mbere ni kuwa gatandatu itariki 22/06/2019 igihe c'isaha 19h00. Ushaka kumenye imigwi amakipe arimwo, amanota aronka hame n'uko atsindana ushobra kuja ngaha

column2: DR Congo: Umuririmvyikazi rurangiranwa Tshiala Muana  yasandavye ku myaka 64
column3: Umuririmvyi akongera akaba n'umutamvyi rurangiranwa wa Congo Tshala Muana yasandavye ku myaka 64, nk'uko bivugwa n’uwumufasha akongera akaba n’umugenzi wiwe, Claude Mashala. Inkuru y’urupfu rwiwe yasohorewe ku rubuga rwa Facebook rwa Claude Mashala, aho yanditse avuga ati: «Mu gatondo ka kare, Imana rugira vyose yafashe ingingo yo guhamagara Tshala Muana. "Imana ihabwe icubahiro ku bihe vyiza Tshala Muana yaduhaye kuri ino si. Igire n’amahoro Mamu». Mu kwa gatandatu 2020, haradutse igihuha cavuga ngo yapfuye, ariko ntivyari vyo, yari arajwe mu bitaro kubera indwara y’imitsi ifatira mu bwonko. Élisabeth Tshala Muana Muidikay (yavutse ku wa 13 Rusama [5] 1958), asanzwe azwi kw’izina rya Tshala Muana yari umunyamuziki azwi cane muri Repubulika y’intwaro Rusangi ya Congo, yandika indirimbo akongera agatamba. Afatwa nk’ “Umwamikazi wa Mutuashi", umudiho w’umuziki n’intambo vyo mu ntara ya Kasai asanzwe avukamwo, iri hagati mu gihugu. Akunzwe kwitwa "Mamu National”, ni ukuvuga nyina w’igihugu. Azwi cane ku ndirimbo zitari nke nka "Karibu Yangu", « Malu », «  Tshianza », « Tshibola »  n’izindi nyinshi. Yarazungurutse mu bihugu bitari bike, atsindira ubushimwe butari buke haba mu gihugu, ku rwego rw’umugabane canke ku rwego mpuzamakungu, akaba yashoboye gusohora inkurikirane (albums) zirenga 20. Umuziki wiwe urumvikana mw’ireresi y’umuziki izwi cane yo mu 1987 muri Congo  La Vie est Belle na Aya of Yop City. Yari azwi ko ashigikiye uwahoze ari umukuru w’ico gihugu Joseph Kabila n’umugambwe wiwe - Parti du peuple pour la reconstruction et la démocratie (PPRD). Mu 2020 yarahagaritswe na reta ya Perezida Félix Tshisekedi bikavugwa ko hari kubera indirimbo yiwe "Ingratitude" yavugwa ko yanegura umutegetsi atavuzwemwo izina.

column2: BBC Gahuzamiryango yabateguriye amwe mu makuru makuru makuru yavuzwe cane mu Rwanda
column3: Mu Rwanda haravuzwe cane umubano mubi n’igihugu c’u Rwanda, inyuma y’aho impande zompi zibandanije ziterana amajambo, u Rwanda rwagiriza Uganda ko ibandanya ifasha imirwi ishaka guhungabanya umutekano w’igihugu, kandi ko ihohotera abanyarwanda bari ku butaka bwayo. Uganda nayo yagiriza u Rwanda gukorera ibikorwa vy’igendereza ku butaka bwayo. Imigenderanire hagati y'u Rwanda na Uganda yagiye kuba nabi gusumba kuva mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa kabiri uno mwaka, aho u Rwanda rufatiye ingingo yo kwugara umupaka wa Gatuna hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri, rukabuza amakamyo guca kuri uwo mupaka kubera ibikorwa vy'urwubako. Haravuzwe kandi vyinshi mu biraba umutekano muri ico gihugu, aho Perezida Kagame atarya umunwa mu kuvuga ko uwuzohirahira akarondera guhungabanya umutekano bazomuhigisha uruhindu. Bimwe ni nk’ ibitero bibiri vy’inyeshamba vyakozwe mu kibira ca Nyungwe hafi y’umupaka n’u Burundi, ivyatumye u Burundi bushirwa mu majwi n’u Rwanda ko bufasha abashaka guhungabanya u Rwanda. Umuhari FLN niwo watangaje ko ariwo wakoze ivyo bitero, uciye ku wari umuvugizi wawo majoro Callixte Nsabimana "SANKARA". Mu nyuma niho uyo majoro Sankara yahavuye afatwa, amakuru akavuga ko yafatiwe mu birwa vya Comores. Haravuzwe umuhari RNC uyobowe na Jenerali Kayumba Nyamwasa, aho abarwanyi bawo 15 bashikanywe muri sentare ya gisirikare bagirizwa ivyaha bitari bike harimwo gukorana n’igihugu c’amahanga mu ntumbero yo guhungabanya umutekano. Ibihugu vya Uganda n’u Burundi vyaravuzwe ko vyariko bifasha uwu murwi. Haravuzwe kandi ifatwa ry’abahoze ari abategetsi b’umuhari w’inyeshamba FDLR, aribo koroneri Jean Pierre Nsekanabo alias Abega yari ashinzwe igendereza muri uyo muhari, hamwe na Ignace Nkaka alias La Forge Fils Bazeye yari umuvugizi. Bafashwe n’gisirikare ca DR Congo ku mupaka wa Bunagana bavuye muri Uganda mu kwezi kwa 12 umwaka uheze bavuye mu gihugu ca Uganda, bakaba barengukishijwe mu bucamanza ubwa mbere. Muri politike, haravuzwe ivyerekeye Victoire Ingabire yahoze ayoboye umugambwe (Ishyaka) FDU – Inkingi, akaba yarasezeye uwo mugambwe atanguza uwundi yise (Development and Liberty For All), DALFA - Umurinzi. Iyo ngingo yatangaje benshi, aho bamwe bavuze ko agurishije bagenziwe bahoze basangiye kuyobora umugmbwe FDU, abandi nabo bati yaguzwe n’umugambwe uri ku butegetsi, ivyo ahakana. Mu biraba inkino, haravuzwe ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’umupira w’amaguru ca Afrika, aho ibihugu vy’akarere, Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, Uburundi na Repubulika y’Itwaro Rusangi ya Congo vyashoboye kuronka uburenganzira bw’ukwitabira izo nkino, ariko u Rwanda rukaba rutashobore kuronka ayo mahirwe. Hagati aho, rurishimira ko rwashoboye kwubaka inyubakwa y’agatangaza, Kigali Arena, mu ntumbero yo guteza imbere  umupira w’amaboko (Basketball). Perezida Kagamwe ati: “Ntabwo iyi nyubako twayikoreye kubera ko isa neza gusa canke kuza kuyiraba gusa (…) tukishima, twayikoze kugira ngo ibihangange vy’u Rwanda, vya Afrika muri uyu mukino bishobore kuhitoreza, kuhakinira, kuhatsindira…”. BBC Gahuzamiryango yarabashikirije kandi ibiganiro vyinshi bivuga ku bikorwa n’ubuzima bw’abagore. Umviriza amakuru aramvuye aho hejuru.

column2: Igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi: Neymar, De Ligt, Ronaldo, De Jong, Raphinha,  Sterling, Dembele
column3: Mu masezerano yo kurondera umukinyi w'inyuma wa Juventus umunya-Hollande Matthijs de Ligt w'imyaka 22,  Chelsea iriteguye kwongerako umudagi wayo akina imbere  Timo Werner, w'imyaka 26 (Sky Sports) Manchester United ifise icizere cinshi ko izoruhira gutahukana umukinyi wa mbere irondera cane  Frenkie de Jong, ikaba yiteze kwumvikana na Barcelona ku masezerano y'imiriyoni 69 z'amapawundi kuri uno mukinyi wo hagati w'umunya-Hollande w'imyaka 295.  (Goal) Umusatirizi wa Manchester United na Portugal  Cristiano Ronaldo w'imyaka 37 yabaye ku rutonde rw’ibiganiro igihe nyen'umurwi wa  Chelsea Todd Boehly yavugana n'umuserukizi w'uyu mukinyi Jorge Mendes, mu ndwi iheze.  (The Athletic ) Roma iripfuza kugura Ronaldo ikamushira hamwe n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza wiwe muri Real Madrid, Jose Mourinho. (Retesport) Hagati aho, Manchester United ishobora kwisanga yinjiye mw'ideni ry'umuriyaridi w'amapawundi mu gihe yobandanya n'imigambi yayo yo gukomeza Old Trafford. (Mirror) Porto yiteze ko Liverpool yongereza akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umunya-Portugal akina ku ruhande Otavio w'imyaka 27, muri ino ndwi, inyuma y'aho yankiye imiriyoni 26 z'amapawundi yatanzwe na  Leeds United. (Mirror) Arsenal yiteze kwongereza akariro mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa  Leeds na Brezili  Raphinha w'imyaka 25, mu gihe uyu murwi w'i Londres uboneka ko uhabwa amahirwe yo gushika ku masezerano kuri uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 25.  (The Athletic) Juventus na Paris St-Germain zatanguye ibiganiro ku musatirizi wa Brezili Neymar w'imyaka 30, asanzwe kandi ariko araronderwa na  Chelsea. (AS) Umumenyereza wa Chelsea Thomas Tuchel yatanguye kuvugana n'umusatirizi wa  Manchester City umwongereza  Raheem Sterling w'imyaka 27, uyu murwi w'i Londres ukaba wipfuza uyu mukinyi. (Telegraph) Chelsea irarondera Sterling hamwe n'umufaransa akina ku ruhande Ousmane Dembele w'imyaka  25 muri  Barcelona, ubu akaba yidegemvya, mu gihe uyu murwi witeze gusohora imiriyoni zirenga 150 z'amapawundi mu kugura abakinyi muri rino ci. (Mail) Nottingham Forest iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano na  Liverpool ku mukinyi w'inyuma ku ruhande rw'i buryo umunya-Pays de Galles Neco Williams w'imyaka 21, ari ku giciro cimiriyoni 15 z'amapawundi, hamwe kandi na Morgan Gibbs-White w'imyaka 22, umwongereza akina hagati muri  Wolves, uyu mukinyi akaba ari ku giciro c'imiriyoni 20 z'amapawundi. (Sun) Everton na Tottenham irabandanya ibiganiro kugira ngo irabe ko yoronka umukinyi wo hagati w'aba Spurs, umwongereza  Harry Winks w'imyaka 26. (Sky Sports) Umwongereza akina ku ruhande  Malcolm Ebiowei w'imyaka 18 yanse amahirwe yo kwinjira muri  Manchester United akaba yahisemwo kuja muri Crystal Palace inyuma y'aho amasezerano yari afitaniye na  Derby arangiriye. (Sun) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Middlesbrough Djed Spence yasavye ko ava muri uno murwi n'aho ata masezerano na  Tottenham arashikwako  kuri uno mukinyi w'inyuma w'umwongereza w'imyaka 21.  (Football.London) Leeds United iriko irategura imiriyoni 26 z'amapawundi yo guha Club Bruges kugira irabe ko uyu murwi wo mu Bubirigi woyiha umubirigi Charles de Ketelaere w'imyaka  21. (Mail) Bayern Munich iriko iranka akamo iterwa n'umurwi Barcelona uyibwira ko wipfuza umusatirizi wa umunya Pologne  Robert Lewandowski w'imyaka 33, mu ntumbero yo gushaka kumugumana. (Sport) Umunya-Colombia James Rodriguez w'imyaka 30 yahoze akina hagati muri  Everton aripfuza gusubira gukina i Bulaya igihe azoba avuye muri Al-Rayyan yo muri Qatar. (Fabrizio Romano) Umukinyi w'inyuma  Samuel Umtiti w'imyaka  28 agiye gusezera muri Barcelona muri rino ci, Girona n'iyindi mirwi yo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A ikaba yipfuza uyu mufaransa.  (Ekrem Konur) Umusatirizi Marco Asensio w'imyaka 26 be n'umukinyi wo hagati Dani Ceballos w'imyaka 25, bompi bavugwa ko bashobora kuva muri Real Madrid muri rino ci.   (Marca )

column2: Thérèse Miburo, umwe mu Barundikazi bake bakora ivyo gutwenza aba muri Australia
column3: Aho  igiteramo co gutwenza yariko araremesha muri Australia caboneka ku rubuga rwa Youtube, benshi ntibashobora kwemera ko ari umurundikazi ariko arakora ivyo bariko bararaba. Muri ico giteramo Thérèse Miburo agaragara ariko aratwenza abantu benshi bagizwe ahanini n'abazungu, abatera inkuru zimwerekeye we nyene canke zo mu buzima busanzwe. Avuga mu congereza cumvikana ko atari ic'uwavukiye muri Australia, ariko biboneka ko abo abwira ataco bibabwiye ahubwo bahimbawe. Mu nkuru ababwira zitwenza hari nk'aho agira ati: "... ndi uwo mu Burundi mu buseruko bwa Afrika. Mu Burundi usanga kenshi twishura ikibaza n'ikindi kibazo. Nk'akarorero ushobora kumbaza uti 'urashonje?' Nanje ngaca ngusubiza  nti 'ushaka kumpa ivyo kurya?'..." Abantu bagaca batwenga cane! Mu karere haba mu Rwanda canke mu Burundi, abakora umwuga wo gutwenza, bita stand up comedy mu congereza, baramaze kuba benshi. Nta nkeka ko no mu yandi makungu Abarundi n'Abanyarwanda bakora ivyo gutwenza bariyo, ariko ata gukekeranya abagore muri bo ni bake cane. Nico gituma BBC yashatse kumenya neza Therese Miburo uwo ariwe n'icatumye akunda ivyo gutwenza, tuvugana nawe tugirana ikiganiro gikurikira mu nyandiko: BBC Gahuza: Twibwire uwo uri we? Therese Miburo: NitwaThérèse Miburo, mfise imyaka 33, ndi Umurundikazi nkaba mba muri Australia. Amazina y'ubuhizi na yo ni Mukundabantu na Mutimukeye. Ndi umumararungu n'umuremesha kiyago.
