Nkunda abantu n'ubuntu mu bantu. BG: Washitse muri Australia ryari/gute? TM: Nashitse muri Australia muri 2007. Naje nk'impuzi mvuye mw'ikambi y'impunzi muri Tanzania. BG: Ufise umuryango? TM: Egome. Ndubatse mfise n'abana bane bakiri bato. BG: Ukora iki? TM: Mu buzima busanzwe ndi umwigisha w'ubuhinga bwa none (Information Technology) mu mashule yisumbuye ya hano muri Queensland, Australia aho nsanzwe mba. Ndi kandi umusiguzi w'indimi (Ikirundi, Igiswahili n'Icongereza). BG: Gutwenza abantu wabitanguye ryari? TM: Namye ntwenza ariko nkabikora mu muryango, sinari bwabishire ahabona. Mu 2019 ni ho natanguye kubishira ahabona; ntangura gusetsa abantu benshi no kubishira kuri Youtube na Facebook. BG: Ni iki catumye utangura kugira ivyo gutwenza ? TM: Ndakunda iyo mbona abantu banezerewe. Ndabikora kubera binezereza kubona nokora ibintu bigatuma abandi banezerwa. BG: Ubifata nk'umwuga canke ni uburyo bwo kwinezereza? TM: Muri uyu mwanya biracari ivyo kwinezereza ariko bishobora kuzoba n'umwuga muri kazoza ka hafi. BG: Ni abahe bakora umwuga wo gutwenza ufatariko urugero, yaba abo mu Burundi canke ayandi mahanga? TM: Buri muntu wese ndafise ico ndamwigirako ariko novuga nka Kigingi mu Burundi na Trevor Noah muri Afrika y'Epfo hari vyinshi ndabafatirako urugero, kimwe muri vyo ni uko atakidashoboka mu gihe ukora ivyo ukunda. BG: Muri iki gihe ca Covid-19 birakworohera kugira ivyo gutwenza? TM: Oya ntivyoroshe kuko abantu ntibemerewe gukoranira hamwe ari benshi. Ariko umwanya nokoresheje mu gutwenza abantu ndawukoresha mu kwandika ivyese nkabisangiza abandi kuri Youtube (Tereza Mukundabantu). BG: Ni iki wipfuza muri kazoza? TM: Muri kazoza ndipfuza kubandanya ibi vyo gutwenza abantu nshimikira cane cane mu ntumbero yo gukeburana. Ndipfuza kuzokoresha ibiteramo abantu bakaza bakanezerwa. Ndipfuza kandi no kuzofasha abakenyezi haba mu buryo no mu kubahimiriza gukoresha ingabirano zabo izo ari zo zose. Kanda ngaha urabe kimwe mu biteramo vya Tereza Mukundabantu kuri Youtube

column2: Zinedine Zidane avuga ko rutahizamu Gareth Bale yimirije kugenda
column3: Rutahizamu wa Real Madrid na Wales, Gareth Bale, ntakiri mu bakinyi bashimwa n'umumenyereza Zinedine Zidane kandi bisa nk'aho agire ave mw'iyo kipe. Uwo mukinyi wa Wales w'imyaka 30 ntiyashizwe mu kibuga mu rukino rwo kwitegurira amahiganwa aza, aho Real yatsindwa 3-1 na Bayern Munich muri Amerika. Aho yavuga nyuma y'urukino, Zidane yagize ati: "Turizera ko azogenda vuba. Vyoba ari vyiza kuri twese. Turiko turaraba ko yoronka ikipe nshasha. "Ntaco mpfa nawe ku buryo bwihariye, ariko haragera igihe ibintu bigakorwa nk'uko biba bikeneye gukorwa." Bale asigaje imyaka itatu mu masezerano yagiranye na Real, yatsindiye Champions League inshuro zine kuva aho aguriwe imiriyoni 85 z'amahera y'Ubwongereza avuye muri Tottenham mu 2013, igiciro caruta ibindi vyose ico gihe. Biravugwa ko aronderwa n'amakipe ya Manchester United na Spurs yo muri Premier League mu Bwongereza, Bayern yatwaye igikombe mu Budage co kimwe n'ikipe zo mu Bushinwa. Asubiza ku vyavuzwe na Zidane, uwuhagarariye inyungu za Bale, Jonathan Barnett, yabwiye AFP ati: "Zidane ateye isoni - nta cubahiro na kimwe aha umukinyi yakoreye vyinshi cane ikipe ya Real Madrid." Ingorane z'imvune zatumye uwo mugabo yamuka muri Wales akina gusa inkino 79 muri La Liga mu myaka ine iheze. Yakinye inkino 42 za Real mu mwaha uheze, igice cazo azikina asimbura.

column2: Prince Philip yari samurarwa wa Edinburgh, umugabo w’umwamikazi Elizabeth II w’Ubwongereza, yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo
column3: Prince Philip, samurarwa w’I Edinburgh akaba n’umugabo w’umwamikazi Elizabeth II w’Ubwongereza, yasandavye afise imyaka 99. Umuganwa n’umwamikazi bari bamaze imyaka 70 bubatse. Baraganye k’uwa 20 z’ukwa cumi na rimwe 1947, i Westminster Abbey, mu gisagara ca London. Kurikirana vyinshi muri iyi video ku buzima bw'uyu muhisi...

column2: Ubwato bubiri bw'intambara bwa Amerika bwaciye mu micungararo ya Taiwan
column3: Igisirikare kigwanira mu mazi ca Amerika camenyesheje ko ubwato bubiri bw'intambara bwaco buriko buraca mu micungararo ya Taiwan. Ni ubwa mbere igikorwa nk'ico kibaye kuva habaye imishamirano hagati ya Taiwan n'Ubushinwa bivuye ku rugendo umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ya Reta zunze Ubumbwe za Amerika yagize muri Taiwan mu ntango z'uku kwezi. Mu kwishura, Ubushinwa bwaciye bukoresha imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare muri ako karere. Muri iyi myaka ya vuba, igisirikare ca Amerika n'ica Buraya bigwanira mu mazi vyagumye bifata iyo nzira ica mu micungararo ya Taiwan. Amerika ivuga ko ayo mato abiri yose atera misile zeretswe inzira - USS Antietam na USS Chancellorsville - ariko arerekana uburenganzira bwo guca mu mazi mpuzamakungu. Ubushinwa bufata ibikorwa nk'ivyo nk'agasotoro kandi bukabandanya bwemeza ko iryo zinga rya Taiwan ari igice c'ico gihugu. Ku musi w'Imana, igisirikare c'Ubushinwa cavuze ko kiriko kirakurikiranira hagufi ingendo z'ayo mato, ko kigavye kandi ko citeguriye kwivuna igihe cosotorwa, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru rya Reuters. Mw'itangazo, igisirikare kigwanira mu mazi ca Amerika  cavuze ko guca mu micungararo ya Taiwain vyerekana ko " Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika" zishigikiye ukwishira n'ukwizana no kwisanzura mw'ibahari Pacifique. Iryo tangazo ryongerako riti:"Aya mato yaciye mu muhora uca kure yahagenzurwa n'igihugu ico ari co cose." Umushikiranganji wa Taiwan ajejwe wivuna abansi yavuze ko ayo mato yariko aragenda yerekeza mu bumanuko kandi ko ingabo z'ico gihugu ziriko zirayakurikirana, ariko ko "ibintu vyifashe neza". Taiwan n'igihugu gifise intwaro yaco, ariko Ubushinwa bukibona nk'intara yabwo ishobora kuzosubira kwiyunga na bwo, binakenewe ku nguvu. Taiwan yabaye iyindi ngorane ikomeye hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa muri iyi myaka iheze, aho Amerika igenda yinengesereye kuri ico kibazo. Amerika irubaha politike "y'Ubushinwa bumwe" - umushinge wa diplomasi hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri, aho yemera reta imwe y'Ubushinwa - ikaba ifitaniye n'imigenderaniye ku mugaragaro n'Ubushinwa hamwe na Taiwan. Ariko kandi irafitaniye ubucuti "butari ku mugaragaro" n'iryo zinga. Ivyo bikaba birimwo kugurisha ibigwanisho kuri Taiwan kugira ishobore kwivuna.

column2: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’ Ubuyapani aragabisha Afrika ku madeni y’umurengera
column3: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani aragabisha abategetsi ba Afrika ku ngaruka z'ugufata amadeni menshi, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'itororokaniriza ry'amakuru AFP. Ayo majambo ya Shinzo Abe afatwa nk'igabisha ku ruhara rw'Ubushinwa muri Afrika mu gihe buvugwa ko bushira imbere amakompanyi yabwo mu migambi ikomeye kuri uwo mugabane. Yabwiye abategetsi bari mu nama i Yokohama muri ico gihugu yerekeye iterambere rya Afrika ko Ubuyapani bwipfuza guteza imbere imitahe "ngirakamaro" yoshigikirwa n'amashirahamwe y'Ubuyapani. AFP ivuga ko ico gihugu gitegekanya kwigisha abahinga 30 bava mu bihugu vya Afrika  mu myaka itatu iri imbere ku buryo bwo guhangana n'ibiza n'amadeni ku gihugu. Avuga ko abakora imigambi y'iterambere boterwa intege kugira ngo bashobore guteza imbere ubutunzi ku mugabane wa Afrika. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani yasubiwemwo amajambo avuga ati: " Mu gihe ibihugu bigenzi vyugarijwe n'amadeni y'umurengera, bica biba inzitizi kuri uyo wese yari afise imigambi y'ukuzana imitahe yabo". Bwana Abe ari mu barongoye inama mpuzamakungu ya Tokyo kw'iterambere rya Afrika (Ticad), ikaba yateguwe mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bushinga imizi muri Afrika. Ubuyapani buvuga ko intumbero bufise kuri Afrika ari ukuyifata mu mugongo mu buryo bw'amafaranga n'ikoreshwa ryayo, intumbero itandukanye n'iyo Ubushinwa.

column2: Izinga rya Man ryahaye u Burundi imiriyoni £1.3 nk'imfashayo yo kurwanya ihindagukira ry'ibihe
column3: Reta y'izinga rya Man yahaye ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza imfashanyo  ingana n' imiriyoni 1.3 z'amapawundi ( yababa imiriyaridi 3 .5 mu mafaranga y'amarundi) mu ntumbero yo gufasha kurwanya "ingaruka z'ihindagurika ry'ibihe". Iri shirahamwe International Development Partnership (IDP) ryacishije iyi mfashanyo mu rindi shirahamwe Send a Cow risanzwe rirangurira imigambi mu Burundi. Richard Granville ajejwe ibijanye n'imfashanyo muri iryo shirahamwe, avuga ko aya mafaranga yatanzwe agiye gufasha "umugambi w'imyaka ibiri" mu "ntara ya Mwaro". Reta y'iryo zinga ryo ku mugabane w'Uburayi isanzwe yarategekanijwe amafaranga y'ama pawundi agera ku miriyoni 2.5 y'imfashanyo mpuzamakungu. Igisata c'ihindagurika ry'ibirere ni kimwe mu bisata bibiri iri shirahamwe  IDP ryahisemwo gufasha mu kiringo ca 2021-2023. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Howard Quayle avuga ati: "Ikiza karanda ca coronavirus carerekanye ingene twese dukeneraniye kw'isi yose kandi ndanezerewe kubona iri zinga rya Man rishobora gufasha muri iki gikorwa kidasanzwe". Granville avuga ko Uburundi bwama "buhura n'ingaruka zikomeye z'ihindagurika ry'ikirere" mu gihe ibice 94% vy'abanyagihugu "babeshejweho n'uburimyi bwo ku rugero ruto kandi bushingiye ku mvura". Domothile Niyonzima w'imyaka 43 asanzwe aba i Mwaro, avuga ati: "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni uko ata mfungurwa zikwiye turonka, kubera tudafise intabire yo gutabira isi yacu". Unicef ivuga ko abantu barenga 114.000 mu Burundi bataye izabo kubera ibiza bishingiye kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Send a Cow mu Burundi Gloria Nimpundu avuga ko iri shirahamwe rifasha abarimyi mu  "kubaha amazi n'isi ndimwa nziza" kandi ko "akarusho kariko karibonekeza". Avuga ko "ikibazo c'imvura igwa nabi nabi kandi itizewe kigenda ciyongera" gituma bigorana "kwitegurira irima n'iyimbura". "Muri iyi myaka iheze, izuba ryaratikije ibiterwa mu nyuma naho imyuzure iratikiza imirima". Yongerako y'uko uwu mugambi uriko urarangurirwa i Mwaro uzofasha imiryango ishika 5250 "kwikenura mu buryo bw'amafaranga mu guhangana n'ihindagurika ry'ikirere, biciye mu kurima n'ukworora kijambere".

column2: Burundi: Bunyoni na Bazombanza, aba mbere bemejwe muri leta ya Ndayishimiye
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'u Burundi ihejeje kwemezwa Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni mu kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere hamwe na Prosper Bazombanza mu kibanza c'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu. Abo bategetsi bompi bemejwe mu matora yabaye mu mwiherero mu nama idasanzwe y'inama nshingamateka, yo kuri uyu wa kabiri inyuma y'amakete Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye yaraye yandikiye inama nshingamateka ayisaba kwemeza abo bategetsi kuri ivyo bibanza. Abashingamateka bakomoka mu rurani Amizero y'Abarundi ubu bahurikiye mu mugambwe CNL ntibitabiriye ico gikorwa, bakavuga ko canyegejwe kandi ko bakimenyeshejwe ku munota wa nyuma mu gihe ngo ari igikorwa gihambaye cane. Eka na Agathon Rwasa, icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'Inama nshingamateka akaba ari nawe arongoye umugambwe CNL, ntiyitabiriye ico gikorwa. Prosper Bazombanza yemejwe ku bashingamateka  91 kuri 94 bari bitavye ivyo bikorwa, babiri bakaba batamwemeje nayo umwe akaba ataco yabivuzeko. Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni nawe akaba yemejwe nk'umushikiranganji wa mbere n'abashingamateka 92 kuri 94. Inyuma y'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu n'umushikiranganji wa mbere hategekanyijwe kuzoca hatangazwa abazaba bagize guverinoma bose. Ico kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere caheruka mu Burundi mu 1998, Pascal Ndimira Firmin akaba ari we mushikiranganji wa mbere yaheruka, ku butegetsi bugira kabiri bwa Petero Buyoya yari yashikiriye ahejeje gutembagaza ubwa Sylvetsre Ntibantunganya ku wa 25/07/1996. Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni w'imyaka 48, yari asanzwe ari umushikiranganji w'umutekano kuva mu 2015. Yavukiye muri komine Kanyosha y'igisagara ca Bujumbura. Yize ishure kaminuza y'u Burundi mu 1994 ariko akaba atayibandanije kuko yaciye yinjira mu barwanyi ba FDD mu 1994 mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye gushika umuhari CNDD-FDD ushitse ku masezerano yo guhagarika intambara mu 2003. Bwana Bunyoni yarajejwe amabanga atandukanye CNDD-FDD imaze kwinjira muri leta, mu nyuma igatsinda amatora yo mu 2005. 2004-2005, yahawe amabanga y'umugenzuzi w'ibiro bikuru vy'igipolisi gishasha cari gihejejwe gushingwa gisubiriye urwego rw'ikijandarume. Kuva mu 2005 gushika 2007 yagenywe kuba umukuru w'igipolisi c'u Burundi. Kuva 2011 gushika 2014, Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni yagenywe kuba umukuru w'ibiro bijejwe ibibazo vya gisivire (cabinet civil) mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu. Hampande y'ivyo bikorwa, Bwana Bunyoni yajejwe amabanga atandukanye mu vy'umutekano ku rwego mpuzamakungu, mu 2007 yari mu ntumwa za leta mw'ishirahamwe ONU zari zijejwe gutsimbataza amahoro n'umutekano. Muri ico gihe nyene yari arongoye komite y'abakuru b'inzego z'igipolisi muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko (OCCPAE) muri rwa rwego rw'igipolisi mpuzamakungu ( Interpol). Yabaye umushikiranganji w'umutekano incuro zibiri, ubwa mbere kuva mu 2007 gushika 2011, hanyuma kuva mu 2015 gushika ubu. Bwana Bunyoni, umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye muri CNDD-FDD, yagirizwa uruhara mu bikorwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu mu ndyane za politike zadutse mu 2015. Ari mu bafatiwe ibihano na Amerika bijanye n'ivyo ubutegetsi bwa Pierre Nkurunziza bwagirizwa vyo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu. Mu 2017 leta y'u Burundi yarikuye muri sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha inyuma y'uko iyi sentare itanguje amatohoza ku vyaha vyakorewe kiremwa muntu mu Burundi kuva mu 2015. Ni umunywanyi w'umugambwe UPRONA, akaba avuka muri komine Rusaka y'intara ya Mwaro. Yahejeje amashure yiwe ya kaminuza mu gisata kijejwe ubufundi bw'ivyuma bikoresha umuyagankuba (Génie Electromécanique) kw'ishure kaminuza y'u Burundi. Mu mabanga yakoze, Bwana Bazombanza w'imyaka 60 yarabaye umwigisha w'ibiharuro, arakora mw'itonorero ry'ikawa SOGESTAL Kirimiro kuva mu 1990 gushika 1992. Yarabaye buramatari w'intara ya Mwaro kuva 2002 gushika 2005, aho yaca agenwa mu gisata kijejwe ubugenduzi bw'amashure y'imyuga mu ntara ya Mwaro kuva 2005 gushika 2010. Kuva 2010 gushika 2014, yakora mu murwi ujejwe ibibazo vy'amatongo gusubiza mu vyabo ababiteshejwe n'intambara (CNTB), imbere y'uko agenwa kuba icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu kuva mu kwa kabiri 2014 gushika 2015 asubiriye Bernard Busokoza yari aherutse kubogozwa n'umukuru w'igihugu w'ico gihe, Petero Nkurunziza. Yahora ari umunyamabanga mukuru w'ikigo kijejwe kugenzura ihuriro ry'amashirahamwe yo gutegekaniriza kazoza (ARCA) amabanga yashinzwe kuva mu kwa cumi na kabiri 2017. Imbere y'aho, yari  arongoye ishirahamwe rijejwe gutekaniriza kazoza abakozi, INSS, amabanga yahawe kuva 2016 gushika 2017. Aje ubwa kabiri muri ico kibanza, ariko mu gihe vyari bimenyerewe ko umukuru w'igihugu agira ivyegera bibiri mw'ibwirizwa rya 2005, ryasubiriwe n'irya 2018, ni we wenyene ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu.

column2: Akazi: Woshika gute ku bintu vyinshi ukoresheje umwanya muto?
column3: Ukivyumva, bishobora kuba ata nsiguro bifise. Wokora gute umwanya muto kugira uronke umwimbu mwinshi? Aha turabasigurira ingene ivyo bishoboka n'ingene bishobora kubafasha mu migambi imwe imwe. Cal Newport, ikigo c'ubuhinga mu kugwiza umwimbu, kiratanga impanuro ku kungene ushobora akazi ku rwenge. Izo mpanuro harimwo ikintu citwa "gukora udakebaguzwa". Mu gutahura ico ari co gukora udakebaguzwa, birakenewe kumenya ico ari co akazi kadashemeye. Kusoma ubutumwa bwa mail, kuraba imbuga hwaniro, gukoresha amanama ku bintu bitihuta cane, ivyo vyose bishobora gufatwa nk'akazi kadashemeye. Ushobora kutavyirengagiza gose, ariko ushobora kubikura ku rutonde rw'ibintu vyo gukora mu mwanya umwe, kugira wihatire ku kandi kazi udakebaguzwa. N'ukwihatira cane ku bikorwa bikenewe cane no kuvyitondera cane. Ushobora no kwiherera kugira ntusamare. Ni vyo umwanditsi Maya Angelou yakunda gukora, mu gihe umugwizatunga Bill Gates azwi nk'umuntu yakunda kwiyugarana ahantu hiherereye kugira akore. Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo gushika ku ntumbero mu buzima. Umugwizatunga Warren Buffet ahanura kugira urutonde rw'ibintu 20 nkenerwa vyo gukora mu buzima, hanyuma ugaca akarongo musi y'ikigira gatanu. Hanyuma, ibindi 15 biri kuri urwo rutonde ivyihoze, gushika ubonye uhejeje ivyo bitanu vya mbere. Umwarimu wa kaminuza Angela Duckworth n'umuhinga muvyo inyifato yateguye indinganizoy'intumbero umuntu yipfuza gushikako. N'ukubigaburamwo ibice vyinshi, ikija hejuru kikaba ari co gekenewe cane (nko kuba umuganga canke gutwara umudari wa olempike). Intera ikurikira irimwo intumbero zito zito zikenewe kugira ushike ku ntumbero nyamukuru. Nk'akarorero, ubushakashatsi bukenewe kugira ukore ibibazo vyotuma uba umunyeshure wa kaminuza muvyo amagara y'abantu, canke imyimenyerezo ikenewe kugira wirukw imetero 100 kugira uronke umudari w'inzahabu. Intera yo hasi irimwo ibikorwa bishigikira ibiri mu ntera yo hejuru, gutyo gutyo gutyo. Mu gihe akazi kamwe katagushikana ku ntumbero nyamukuru, intera iyo ari yo yose kariko, ntugakore. Gukora umusi wose akazi ku muvuduko wa 100km/h si ikintu ciza. Akaruhuko karakenewe, kandi nawe karashobora kugufasha. Francesco Cirillo, umuhinga mu gukoresha neza umwanya, yaratoye igipimo c'akaruhuko ku cuma giharura iminota gifise iforoma y'urutomati yasanze mu gikoni ciwe. Ubwo buhinga buzwi kw'izina rya pomodoro (kivuye mw'izina urutomati mu gitaliyano), bukora mu kugabura akazi kawe mi bice vy'iminota 25. Ugakurikizako iminota 5 y'akaruhuko ifasha mu mwimbu. Sohoka hanze gutembera gato hakuguma uraba imbuga hwaniro - ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko utwo turuhuko dushobora umererwa neza gusumba mu kwitegurira iyindi minota 25 y'akazi. Cal Newport arafise uko afata akazi umuntu adakebaguzwa, ariko arazi kandi kugahagarika no kugira umwanya wiwe. Kugira aheraheze umusi w'akazi, yari afise akamenyero ko guhagarika. N'ukuvuga kumenya ko umusi uheze, kwihweza akazi katashoboye kurangira, gutegura ibizokorwa bukeye, no kugara inyabwonko ngendanwa canke ikaye y'imyimenyerezo no kuvuga ijambo nka "ndaheje kugara burundu". Uko wobivuga kose bikuvako, ariko ayo majambo ategerezwa kwerekana ko uhejeje akazi k'uyo musi n'intango y'akaruhuko, ko widegemvya ushobora kwinezereza. Ako kanya utegerezwa kukaronka! Inkuru yo kuri  BBC Bitesize

column2: Tanzania: Ekleziya Katorika iragabisha ko Covid-19 iriko iriyongera ku rugero ruteye ubwoba
column3: Ekleziya Katorika muri Tanzania yaraye isohoye itangazo aho igabisha ko ibitigiri  vy'abandura coronavirus n'abicwa na Covid-19 bigenda vyiyongera, ihamagarira abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zose zo kwikingira. Iri tangazo ryo kugabisha ryasohowe n'umukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi Katorika muri Tanzania  (TEC), Musenyeri Gervas Nyaisonga ku wa kabiri. Ariko , ntirivuga nimba no muri Tanzania hariho abariko barandura bwa bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus, rigasaba abantu kuba maso bafatiye ku bivugwa mu zindi mpande z'isi. Iri tangazo rya Ekleziya Katorika rivuga riti: "Mu mwaka uheze igihugu cacu carashoboye kurwanya uwu mugera. Abandura baragabanutse  mu nyuma turizera ko twatsinze". "Ubu hari iyongerekana rishasha ry'abandura. Ibihugu bitari bike biremeza ko biri mu bihe bitoroshe aho corona iriko iriyongera abantu bagapfa. Igihugu cacu si izinga, ni ngombwa ko twikingira, tukaba maso, tugatakambira cane Imana kugira ngo iturinde". Ekleziya Katorika muri ico gihugu yagiye ifata ingingo zitandukanye kuva mu 2020 igihe iki kiza gitangazwa ko cinjiye muri Tanzania, iri tangazo rigasaba ko izo ngingo zibandanya zikurikizwa. Rishimangira riti: "Duhimirize intambara yo kurwanya umugera wa coronavirus mu gukoresha ibirwanisho vyose vy'umutima, umubiri, ubuhinga no mu kibano. Ntiturambirwe no guhimiriza igisabisho, kwirinda gukorakorana, gukaraba n'amazi n'isabuni igihe cose, gufata ingingo igihe cose twiketse ibimenyetso vyayo, tukirinda kandi no kwegerana". Umunyamabanga mukuru w'Inama y'Abepiskopi, Patiri Charles Kitima, yabwiye BBC igisata c'igiswahili ko vyabaye ngombwa ko Ekleziya isohora iri tangazo ryo kugabisha mu gihe bakirindiriye insiguro z'abahinga zizotangwa na reta ku bijanye n'iki kiza karanda. Ati: "Duherutse kubona impfu ziyongera. Mu bisagara, twari tumenyereye kugira imisa imwe canke zibiri mu ndwi zo gusabira abapfuye, ariko ubu ni imisi yose. Hategerezwa kuba hari ikintu kitagenda neza". Abategetsi ba Tanzania babandanya bemeza y'uko ata mugera wa coronavirus uri mu gihugu. Inyuma y'iri tangazo, icegera c'umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu, Dr Goodluck Mollel, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Mwananchi co muri ico gihugu ko abanyagihugu bobandanya batekanye mu kurindira amabwirizwa bahabwa na reta. Dr. Mollel ati: "Ibi bintu reka tubirekere abahinga. Mu gihe hoba ingorane, reta izobisigura. Abantu bobandanya n'ibikorwa vy'ukugwiza umwimbu". Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, ibinyamakuru vyo muri Danmark vyatangaje ko ingenzi zibiri zari zivuye muri Tanzania zatowe umugera mushasha wa coronavirus wadutse muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu ndwi iheze nyene, reta y'Ubwongereza yarafashe ingingo yo kubuza ingenzi zivuye nuri  Tanzania na Repubulika ya Demokrasi ya  Congo kwinjira muri ico gihugu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry'ubwoko bushasha bw'umugera wa Covid-19 bwatowe ubwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ibihugu bindi 12 nivyo bimaze guhagarikirwa ingendo muri ico gihugu hagati y'ukwa cumi na kabiri n'intango y'ukwa mbere.

column2: Caster Semenya yise abarongozi ba 'athletisme' muri Africa ba 'niryo' ku ngingo ya sentare ya siporo.
column3: Uwigeze gutwara umudari wa olempike incuro zibiri n'uwo ihiganwa ry'isi yose incuro zitatu, Caster Semenya, yise abategetsi ba Afrika muvyo kwinonora imitsi, ba "niryo" kuba barananiwe guhagarara bakagwanira abanonotsi b'abapfasoni bahanganye n'ikibazo co gukurwa mu mahiganwa. Uwo munonotsi w'imyaka 31  yarakuwe ku rutonde rw'abahiganwa ku metero akunda gusiganwako 800 hisunzwe amategeko  agenga inkabuzo ya "testostérone" umuntu aba afise mu mubiri, y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi mu 2019. Abanonotsi bafise inkabuzo nyinshi za "testostérone" basabwa gukoresha umuti mu kuzigabanya kugira bashobore guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1500. Semenya yagize ati: "Nibaza ko, kuri uyu musi, dufise abategetsi ba 'niryo'". "Kuri uyu mugabane, abantu baranumye. Sintahura igituma batavuga. Ntibagwanira abanonotsi babo. "Mutegerezwa guseruka mugakora, mukagwanira abanonotsi banyu, gutyo abanonotsi ba Afrika bazoba beza cane. Ubu uko bimeze birababaje." Igihe BBC Sport Africa yabaza Maboum Kalkaba, prezida w'urunani rw'amashirahamwe yo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika (CAA), ivyerekeye ivyo Semanya avuga, n'uko abategetsi barongoye ishirahamwe ryo kwinonora imitsi muri Afrika bakoreye ibikwiye abo barongoye, yishuye ati: "Nimundeke, nta nyishu mfise". Abanonotsi benshi bo muri Afrika barakozweko n'iyo ngingo, harimwo umunonotsi w'umurundikazi yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza mu nkino za olempike, Francine Niyonsaba, hamwe na mugenzi we wo muri Kenya bahiganwa ku metero 800. Mu mwaka uheze, abayabaga babiri bo muri Namibia, Christine Mboma na Beatrice Masilingi, barahatiwe kuva mw'ihiganwa rya metero 400, imbere y'imisi mike ngo habe inkino za olempike za Tokyo inyuma yo kumenyeshwa ko bafise urugero runini rw'inkabuzo za testostérone. Bompi Mboma na Masilingi batinze bahiganwa mu metero 200 mu Buyapani, aho Mboma yatahukanye umudari w'ifeza wa mbere wa olempike w'ico gihugu. Ariko Semenya, ubu ahiganwa ku metero 5000, yaranebaguye ingene abategetsi b'ishirahamwe rya Afrika riraba abanonotsi bitwaye kuri ico kibazo c'abo bayabaga co kimwe n'"agacerere" ku ngingo yafashwe yo kubabuza guhiganwa muri rusangi. Uwo munye Afrika y'epfo yagize ati: "Igihe nari mfise imyaka 18, sinashobora kuvuga. Ubu ndakuze bikwiye, ndashobora kuvuga. "Nimwiyumvire ivyaciye mu mitwe y'iyo miyabaga. Nta co bashobora gukora, ariko abategetsi bariyicariye gusa binezerererwa gusa n'uturusho bafise, mu bibanza biberamwo amanama. Umuyobozi mukuru wa CAA, Lamine Faty yavuze ko Semenya "afise uburenganzira bwo gushikiriza ivyo yiyumvira" kandi ko ibibazo ku ngingo zatumye bakurwa mw'ihiganwa vyashikirijwe n'iryo shirahamwe "kera cane" kandi ko vyaganiriweko mu misi ya vuba mu kanama ka CAA  mu nama yabereye muri Ile Maurice. Impari kw'itorwa ry'abagore bagira uruhara muri siporo zabaye nyinhsi, na cane cane zikaba zashimikiye ku banonotsi bameze nk'abagabo kandi ari abakobwa. Mu ndwi iheze, prezida w'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryo kwinonora imitsi, Seb Coe, yavuze ko iryo shirahamwe rishobora gukurikizako igisata co kwoga, mu kubuza abagore biyumva nk'abagabo kuja mw'ihiganwa, avuga ashimitse ko "kutarenganya bidashobora guharirwako". Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Tubandanya twiga, tugira ubushakashatsi ku bwinshi bw'inkabuzo ya testostérone ko ari kimwe mu bituma umuntu akomera gusumba , tukaba twarategekanije ibiganiro ku mategeko yacu mu kanama kacu mu mpera y'umwaka." Semenya, yatwaye umudari w'inzahabu ku metero 800 mu myaka ya 2012 na 2016 mu nkino za olempike, yari yunguruje ku ngingo zafashwe n'ishirahamwe ry'abanonotsi kw'isi, ariko aratsindwa muri sentare ica imanza z'inkino mu 2019. Yaratsinzwe kandi muri sentare y'iyungururizo no muri sentare ntahinyuzwa y'Ubuswise mu mwaka wakurikiye, imbere yo kwitura sentare ya Buraya ijejwe agateka ka zina muntu aho urwo rubanza rutarumvirizwa. Yagize ati: "Ntituzigera duhagarika uru rugamba." "Ubu ibi ntibiraba jewe gusa, biraba abana bakiri bato ubu bariko baravuka bazohangana n'iki kibazo. "Hari abana benshi bipfuza guhiganwa ku metero 400, 800 na 1500, ariko ntibashobora kubemerera. Bavuga ko siporo ari iya bose, ariko ubu si iya bose."

column2: China: Shanghai yakajije ingingo za guma-muhira kubera Covid
column3: Abategetsi ba Shanghai mu Bushinwa bavuga ko bagiye gukomeza ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ingingo za guma mu rugo, mu gihe abandura ca kiza karanda ca Covid muri uwo mugwa mukuru w'ubutunzi bibandanya vyiyongera ku muvuduko. Mu ngingo nshasha harimwo gushiraho imiryango ifise inkengeri za elektroniki zizobuza abanduye gusohoka, co kimwe no kuvana abantu mu mazu yabo kugira ngo apompwe imiti yica imigera. Mu ntango y'iyi ndwi, amajana n'amajana barakuwe mu mihana yabo kugira ngo amazu yabo apompwe imiti yica imigera. Izi ngingo zigiye gushira Shanghai muri guma mu rugo mu ndwi igira gatanu. Abategetsi b'igisagara ca Shanghai bavuga ko abantu bose banduye, hamwe n'incuti zabo za hafi, bazoshirwa mu kibanza reta yateguye co kubugaraniramwo. Hampande y'ivyo, ingingo zo gupompa imiti yica imigera zizokomezwa mu bibanza bimwe bimwe vy'ico gisagara bisinzikaye. Ibi bisigura ko bishoboka ko bamwe mu bahaba bazotegerezwa kuhava mu kiringo gito - harimwo n'abazoba bapimwe bagasanga ntibanduye. Iyi ngingo ije inyuma y'imisi mike abanyagihugu bo mu yindi mirwi ibiri y'i Shanghai  - Beicai na Pingwang - bategetswe kuva mu mihana yabo mu kiringo gito bakimukira mu bibanza vyateguwe. I Beicai, urwandiko rw'ubutegetsi rwahawe abanyagihugu rwabategeka gutekera ibintu vyabo kandi bagasiga ububati bwabo bwuguruye. Basabwa kandi gusiga umuryango w'imbere wuguruye, Amasanamu yo ku mbuga hwaniro y'abantu batonze imirongo n'amasakoshi yabo mw'ijoro yerekana ko ibintu bitari vyoroshe. Izi ngingo ni ikimenyetso c'uko abategetsi b'Ubushinwa bafise ishaka ryo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya Covid i Shanghai - igisagara gifatwa n'ikigega c'ubutunzi bw'igihugu. Uturere tumwe tw'igisagara mu twugawe dufise ikibazo co kuronka imfungurwa, bikaba ngombwa ko abanyagihugu barindira imfashanyo ya reta igizwe n'imboga, inyama n'amagi. Abategetsi baracagerageza poritike yo kurwanya Covid bagashira imbere gutuza burundu uwu mugera aho guhitamwo kubana nawo nk'uko mu bindi bihugu bahisemwo uko. Iki kiza karanda i Shanghai, catanguye kwibonekeza mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, kimaze kwandurwa n'abantu barenga 400.000 bamenyekanye gushika ubu hamwe na 36 bapfuye. Hafi bose ni abantu bafise imyaka yitereye, abatacandazwe bafise ibibazo vy'amagara, nk'uko abategetsi b'Ubushinwa babivuga. Ibi vyatumye imiriyoni 25 z'ababa muri  iki gisagara bategekwa kuguma muhira.

column2: Acat-Burundi: Germain Rukuki yasohotse ibohero inyuma y'imyaka irenga ine
column3: Germain Rukuki kuva ku mugoroba wo ku wa gatatu araye yidegemvya inyuma yo gusohoka ibohero rya Ngozi aho yari apfungiwe kuva agifatwa mu 2017, nk'ukwo vyemezwa n'umwe mu bashingwamanza biwe Maitre Ildephonse Congera. Germain Rukuki yari umukozi w'ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu ACAT Burundi, yari yakatiwe gupfungwa imyaka 32 mu 2018 ku vyaha vyo guhungabanya umutekano w'igihugu no kugarariza. Germain Rukuki yagumye ahakana ivyo yagirizwa kuva agifatwa. Yarekuwe hashizwe mu ngiro ingingo ya sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Ntahangwa yavanye igihano yari yaraciriwe c'imyaka 32 mu 2018 na sentare nkuru ya Ntahangwa ikagishira ku mwaka umwe gusa. Hari haheze iminsi icenda sentare iciye urwo rubanza, amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka zina muntu akaba yari amaze gutangura gushikriza amakenga yo kuba atarekurwa ngo asohoke ibohero kandi sentare yamurekuye. Inyuma y'impari n'intureka vyakurikiye ingingo y'umuhisi prezida Pierre Nkurunziza yo kwitoza ubugira gatatu kurongora Uburundi mu 2015, amashirahamwe menshi adaharanira inyungu za poritike harimwo ayo agateka ka zina muntu yarahagaritswe canke arafutwa. Muri izo harimwo Acat-Burundi, Aprodh, Ligue Iteka, Focode, Forsc, Olucome, na Parcem. Iryo rya nyuma ariko ubu riherutse kwemererwa gusubira gukora. N'ibiro vya ONU bikurikirana agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi vyarugawe burundu. Kuva ku myaka 32 gushika ku mwaka umwe Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu mwaka uheze urubanza rwiwe sentare gasamburamaza yararusambuye ica irusubiza mw'iburanishwa. Yari yasanze hari amategeko ajanye n'iburanishwa ry'imanza atari yubahirijwe igihe rwacibwa. Sentare isubiramwo imanza ya Bujumbura yaciye isubira kuruburanisha, irushira mu mwiherero mu kwezi  kwa gatatu. Yaciye urubanza rwo kugabanya igihano ciwe kuva ku myaka 32 gushika ku mwaka umwe gusa muri uku kwezi kwa gatantatu.

column2: Tanzania: Sentare ivuga ko inyandiko zo kuraga itunga ryose Jackline Ntuyabaliwe zitakurikije amategeko
column3: Umupfakazi wa nyakwigendera Reginald Mengi, Jackline Ntuyabaliwe, yerekanye akababaro kiwe ku ngingo ya sentare nkuru ya Tanzania yerekeye uwohagarikira itunga ryasizwe n'umugabo wiwe. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Kirakwiye... icegeranyo co kwa muganga ca Dr Reginald Mengi cerekanywe nk'icemezo. Ukuri ku bantu bakunda ukuri. Umugabo wanje yamaze ubuzima bwiwe yubashwe, akerebutse kandi yafashije ibihumbi n'ibihumbi vy'abatanzania." Ntiyari umukehabwenge! Ushobora kuvuga ivyo ushatse vyose, ufate ivyo ushatse, ariko kuri ivyo, nzomuvugira gushika mpfe. Jackline yanditse kuri urwo rubuga hwaniro ashirako n'icegeranyo ca muganga wiwe, yanditse ivyerekeye amagara yiwe, ko ingwara yamufashe ya AVC itatumye atakaza ubwenge. Mu misi iheze, mu gusoma urubanza rw'impapuro 72, umucamanza Mlyambina yavuze ko inyandiko zo kuraga za nyuma za nyakwigendera Dr Mengi zanditswe itariki 17 z'ukwezi kw'umunani mu 2017 zitakurikije amategeko agenga kuraga. Muri urwo rubanza, abana ba Dr Mengi bariko bariyamiriza izo nyandiko zo kuraga bivugwa ko zasizwe na nyakwigendera se wabo, n'umukono wari kuri izo nyandiko nta ho bisa bisana n'izindi ziwe, kandi muri ico gihe se wiwe nta nguvu yari afise zo kwandika kubera ingwara yari afise kuva mu 2016. Abana bakuze ba nyakwigendera bavuga ko izo nyandiko zo kuraga zabirengagije, iragi ryose rihabwa Jackline Ntuyabaliwe n'abana biwe b'amahasa, rero ko izo nyandiko zitakurikije amategeko  kubera zashize ku ruhande abandi bana ata mpamvu. Jackline Ntuyabaliwe azwi kw'izina ry'ubuhizi rya K-Lynn muri BongoFleva yamenyekanye cane mu ndirimbo Nalia Kwa Furaha. Bahuriye n'umugwizatunga w'umutanzania Reginald Mengi mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza mu 2010. Mu 2014 ikinyamakuru candika ku butunzi ca Forbes canditse ko uwo mugabo yari afise imitahe mu bimenyeshamakuru no mu mashirahamwe yimba ubutare, yari afise ubutunzi bungana na miliyoni 560 z'amadolari. Bari bubakanye mu 2015 mu bugeni bwabereye mw'izinga rya Maurice, Dr Reginal Mengi akaba yarusha umupfasoni wiwe imyaka 36. Yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo ari i Dubai afise imyaka 75  itariki 2 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 2019, mu gihe Jackline Ntuyabaliwe yari afise imyaka 39.

column2: Kardinali Burke anegura Papa Francis ku vyo aherutse gushikiriza ku bubakana basangiye ibitsina
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye ba Ekleziya Gatolika aranegura amajambo Papa Francis aherutse gushikiriza ku vyerekeye abakundanye basangiye igitsina, akavuga ko ari ivyiyumviro vyiwe bwite bidashobora gukurikizwa n'Abagatolika. Kardinali Raymond Burke abonwa na benshi ko atava kw'izima ku mico ya Ekleziya Gatolika yavuze ibi mw'ijambo yashikirije haciye umunsi umwe Papa yerekanywe ariko ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa n'amategeko. Yari amajambo atari bwaje ku mugaragaro. Ku wa gatatu w'ino ndwi, niho Papa Francis yumvikanye ashikiriza ayo majambo. Bivanye n'aho umuntu ahagaze muri Ekleziya, Kardinali Burke ni ihwa kuri Papa, canke naho umwe muri bake bazovugisha ukuri ku butegetsi. Kurwanya Papa ku bijanye no gushigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bemerwa imbere y'amategeko ni ibintu bidatangaje, ariko amajambo yabivuzemwo niyo kumbure yotangaza. Mu gihe Raymond Burke avuga ko amajambo ya Papa Francis ari "iciyumviro ciwe bwite", yongera ko y'uko abagatolika badategetswe kwumvira uyu mukuru wa Ekleziya kuri iki kibazo, ariko ko abayobozi ba Ekleziya basanzwe bafise igikorwa co gukora ico yise 'gutanga umuco ukenewe'. Arongera agashimangira y'uko ibikorwa vy'abahuje ibitsina babisangiye 'biteye kubiri n'imico' ishingiye ku kwemera kwa Gatolika, akavuga ko amajambo yavuzwe na Papa adahuye n'inyigisho za Ekleziya kandi ko ziteye umubabaro. Mw'ireresi ivuga ku buzima n'ibikorwa vyiwe, Papa Francis yumvikanye ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakwiye kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko. Ati: "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Mu nyigisho za Gatolika, imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ifatwa 'nk'ukugoka'. Aya majambo yavuzwe na Papa yateye impari, aho hari bamwe bashigikiye ivyo yavuze, abandi nabo babirwanya cane. Gusa impungenge zibandanya zibonekeza ni ingaruka aya majambo ashobora kugira ufatiye aho Ekleziya Gatolika ihagaze kuri iki kibazo. Massimo Faggioli, umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye n'ivy'Imana akaba n'umwanditsi w'igitabo Pope Francis: Tradition, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta gushidikanya ko ivyo Francis yavuze ari ikintu gishasha muri Ekleziya. Hagati aho, ni ikibazo yagiye agarukako cane kuva muri ino myaka mike iheze".

column2: Ubufaransa bwemeje amakori ataguye neza Amerika
column3: Inama nshingamateka y'Ubufaransa yemeje integuro y'itegeko rigena amakori acibwa ibigo bikomakomeye nka Google, Facebook na Apple. Guca 3% nk'ikori ku bikorwa vy'ibigo bikoresha itumatumanako bigera ku 30 birwiriyemwo ivyo muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bishobora kuzanira leta y'Ubufaransa miliyoni 400 z'ama euros muri uyu mwaka wonyene. Abashingamateka birengagije akamo ka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuga ko ari akarenganyo, kandi ko zigiye kwihora mu kuzoshiraho amakori nk'ayo. Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca Leta w'Ubufaransa Bruno Le Maire yiyamirije impungenge za Amerika, avuga ko ibintu nk'ibi bikwiye gutoregwa umuti mu biganiro. Ubufaransa buvuga ko bikwiye ko ibigo vyifashisha itumatumanako, bitanga amakori aho bikorera aho kuyatanga aho bifise icicaro gikuru, ivyinshi bikaba bibarizwa muri Amerika. Ubufaransa bwananiwe kwumvisha ibindi bihugu gufatira hamwe iyo ngingo mw'ishirahamwe rya Bulaya, bari kwita 'GAFAs' mu majambo avunaguye, n'ukuvuga Google, Apple, Facebook na Amazon. Ubu rero bwahisemwo gutangura bwo nyene guca ayo makori, ariko bukizera ko iyi ngingo yabwo izoba iy'igihe gito. Hari ibiganiro hagati y'ibihugu bitunze kuruta ibindi bigize umugwi G7 hamwe n'ikigo kijejwe kuraba  imigenderanire mu butunzi n'iterambere mu kugabangana amakori avanwa mw'ikoreshwa ry'itumatumanako muri kino gihe rifise ikibanza gikomeye. Gutyo rero hakaboneka umwumvikano uvuye mu nama ugasubirira ingingo nka bene iyi y'Ubufaransa. Ubwongereza bwatangaje umugambi wo gushiraho amakori asa n'aya y'Ubufaransa, ico cemezo kikazoshobora kuja mu bikorwa mu mwaka uza. Espagne yo yakoze umushinge w'itegeko muri uyu mwaka. Umunyamakuru Dave Lee akorera muri Amerika ya ruguru ati 'Ubufaransa burikumiriye'. Ubutegetsi bwa Washington bwamaze kuvuga ko bugiye kwugurura ingingo yitwa 'Section 301', mu nzira yo gutohoza nimba hari aho burenganywa. Ni ingingo yakoreshejwe mbere, nk'inzira yo gushiraho ibiciro bishasha ku bihugu ubutegetsi bwa Trump bwibaza ko biriko biburiramwo mbege. Nimba Ubufaransa bugiye gukura miliyoni amajana z'ama euros mu mifuko y'ibi bihangange vyo muri Amerika, Amerika nayo ishobora kuvuga iti :'kuki tweho tutokura amafranga mu vyo Ubufaransa bukorera iwacu?' Uko niko vyagenze ku Bushinwa,  bigahamba Amerika mu ntambara y'ubudandaji ishobora no gukomera muri kazoza. Amakori ku bikorwa vy'itumatumanako, ni ikibazo giteye impungenge ku Bufaransa, kuko bwikumiriye. Ibiganiro vyigeze gutangura hagati y'ibihugu kuri ayo makori vyahavuye biburizwamwo kuko bamwe muri bo batari bashigikiye ayo makori. Aha umuntu yovuga nka Irland yavyungukiyemwo mu guhamagara abashoramitahe bashaka isoko ku mugabane wa Bulaya. Ibindi bihugu nk'Ubwongereza, Espagne na Autriche biracagonanwa gufata iyo nzira. Ico impande zompi zihuriyeko n'uko igihe carenze co kwiyumvira ingene ibigo vyungukira mw'itumatumanako bitozwa amakori. Ubufaransa bushobora kwitega ibintu bibiri. N'uko ibihugu bitera ikirenge mu cabwo bishiraho amategeko yavyo, bigatuma Ubufaransa butaba nyamwigendako. Ikindi n'uko iyo ntambwe Ubufaransa bwateye ishobora gutuma n'ibindi bihugu bibona ko hageze kwumvikana uko bitoza ayo makori biri hamwe. Ivyo vyotuma amafranga ivyo bigo vyahora vyikwegerako ataha mu bigega vy'ibihugu.

column2: Burundi -Kenya: Jules Ndayishimiye yakora ijoro n'umutaga mu kurondera umutahe wiwe
column3: Umusore Jules Ndayishimiye adandaza amandazi, ibiyoba n'ikawa muri Kenya, umutahe akaba yawukuye mu kazi ko kudandaza ifi ku murango n'ubuzamu mw'ijoro. Yavuye mu Burundi arangije kaminuza mu gisata c'uburunzi. Avuga ko yatahuye kare ko ata kazi reta igifise itanga, afata ingingo hakiri kare kukironderera. Agira ati:"Kuva ndi muri kaminuza, nari namaze gutahura ko akazi ari jewe ntegerezwa kukironderera. "Narabona abahejeje imbere yanje ko ata kazi baronka." Jules Ndayishimiye avuga kandi ko kuva aheza amashure yisumbuye yari yaciye atangura kurondera ico akora. Avuga ati:"Nahejeje amashure yisumbuye nca ntangura gukorera abantu. Narabadandariza. "Mu nyuma naramanutse i Bujumbura nsaba akazi ko gukora ijoro nkaca niga kaminuza ku murango. "Vyari bigoye, kuko nataha nk'isaha icenda z'ijoro, isaha zibiri nkaba ntonze kw'ishure." Uwo musore avuga ko yagerageje no kworora inkoko biranga, araonka umutahe wo kudandaza ntivyagenda neza ariko ko atacitse intege. Jules Ndayishimye avuga ko umugenzi wiwe asanzwe aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, ari we yamuriye akara ko ashobora kuronka akazi kotuma aronka umutahe kuko amahera yo muri ico gihugu ari hejuru gusumba amarundi. Avuga ati:"Naraje uwo mugenzi aranyakira. Nca ndonka akazi ko gukora mw'ishirahamwe rihingura amafi. "Kubera iwacu twakuze batigisha ibintu vy'imyuga, narafasha gusa ababizi bakabikora, ku mugoroba bagaca bampemba. "Sinaca ntaha, ahubwo naca ntonda ku kandi kazi k'izamu iwacu bita akazi k''ubu city'." "Inyuma y'amezi atatu, naciye mfata ingingo yo kwikorera ivyanje ndi kumwe n'uwundi mugenzi wanje. "Tudandaza ibintu bitandukanye harimwo ikawa, amandazi n'ibiyoba. Kandi bigenda neza turashima." Jules Ndayishimiye ahanura urundi rwaruka gukura amaboko mu mpuzu bagakora akazi kose kabonetse, kuko kuri we, ngo n'aho wobura, uba warondeye ntuheza ngo witeko umwikomo. Urwaruka rwinshi ruturuka mu Burundi rwaje muri kenya kurondera ubuzi, benshi bakora muvyo kwubaka, abandi mu kudandaza amandazi n'ibiyoba mu mabarabara. Hari n'abakora akazi k'izamu kazwi nk''igi city'. "

column2: Umugambwe CNL mu Burundi urongowe na Agathon Rwasa usaba ko amabi uvuga ko ukorerwa ahagarara
column3: Umugambwe CNL uriyamiriza ingendo y'ukutihanganiranira mu vya politike uvuga ko ikorwa na "bamwe bamwe mu bategetsi bo mu ntwaro n'umutekano" mu Burundi. Ivyo nivyo biri mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'uwo mugambwe ejo ku wa gatanu i Bujumbura, ni mu gihe havugwa ko abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe baburabuzwa irya n'ino mu gihugu. Muri iryo tangazo ryatewe ko igikumu n'umushingamateka Simon Bizimungu, umunyamabanga mukuru w'uwo mugambwe ari nawe yarisomye, umugambwe CNL urashikiriza ivyo uvuga ko ari intambamyi zidasanzwe ugira mu bikorwa vyawo mu gihugu. Bimwe mu bibazo abanywanyi bawo bahanganye navyo ku rubuga harimwo "kwandika ibiranga umunywanyi wese agendeye ingoro y'umugambwe ku rwego rw'igihugu, Bwana Bizimungu akavuga ko ivyo bikorwa n'abajejwe umutekano, kandi ko biteye amakenga. Eka ngo umugambwe ntazi intumbero y'izo ntonde n'iherezo ryayo. CNL ivuga kandi ko abanywanyi bayo "bahohoterwa, baterwa ubwoba, bafatwa bagapfungwa ata mategeko yubahirijwe, bagasinzikarizwa ubuzima, eka bagakorerwa amarementanya". Umushingamateka Bizimungu avugako umugamwe CNL "wama uriko urabuzwa uburenganzira bwo kwugurura ingoro zawo mu ntara zimwe zimwe no mu ma komine". Hampande y'ivyo vyose, CNL iriyamiriza ingendo yo "gusibanganya ingoro zawo", umushingamateka Bizimungu akamenyesha ko iyo ngendo yibonekeje mu ma komine Muhuta mu ntara ya Rumonge, Buganda mu ntara ya Cibitoke, be no muri komine Gashikanwa, ni mu ntara ya Ngozi. Kuri ivyo, iryo tangazo ryongera ko riti: "Uko gusibanganya ingoro z'umugambwe vyarenze urugero aho haturiwe hongera harasamburwa ingoro y'umugambwe ku rwego rw'intara ya Bujumbura iri i Nyabiraba mw'ijoro ryo ku wa 15 rishira 16 ruheshi 2019 buca yugururwa". Ivyo biri uko mu gihe Uburundi bwitegurira amatora ategekanijwe mu mwaka uza wa 2020, amatora azotangura ku wa 20 z'ukwezi kwa gatanu nk'uko vyaraye bishikirijwe n'umukuru w'umurwi ujejwe gutuganya amatora muri ico gihugu. Aha, umugambwe CNL ukabona ko ivyo vyose uriko urakorerwa bifise intumbero yo "kugabanya canke kwugara urubuga rwa politike bifise intumbero yo gutoteza abatavuga rumwe na reta muri rusangi, cane cane CNL". Uwo mugambwe urongowe na Agathon Rwasa, icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'Inama Nshingamateka, usaba reta y'Uburundi kurekura abanywanyi bawo uvuga ko bafashwe bagapfungwa  "bazira ivyiyumviro vyabo vya politike". Abajijwe n'abamenyeshamakuru igitigiri c'abapfunzwe gushika ubu mu kiganiro yagiranye nabo kuri uyu wa gatanu ku ngoro yawo i Bujumbura, umushingamateka Bizumungu avuga ko abanywanyi b'uwo mugambwe barenga 60 ari bo bapfungiwe mu busho butandukanye mu gihugu. Bwana Bizimungu yagiriza bamwe mu batware ko bahungabanya ibikorwa vy'imigambwe yemewe n'amategeko kubera ukudatahura ibwirizwa ryerekeye imyiyerekano iba ku mugaragaro, agasaba reta ko yorikwiragiza hose. Abarongoye umugambwe CNL basaba reta ko yohagarika ico bise "ihohoterwa rikorwa na bamwe mu bagize ama komite y'umutekano ahurikiyemwo bose". Umugambwe CNL kandi usaba amakungu n'akarere gukurikiranira hafi uko ibintu vyifashe mu Burundi muri bino bihe. Leta y'Uburundi ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo bivugwa n'umugambwe CNL uherutse kwemererwa mu kwezi kwa kabiri uno mwaka, ukaba uboneka ko uri mu migambwe ifise igihagararo kini mu gihugu.

column2: Papa Francis yagenye abakardinali bashasha: Harimwo Umunyarwanda Antoine Kambanda
column3: Papa Francis ahejeje gutangaza amazina y'abakardinali bashasha 13 muri bo hakaba harimwo Musenyeri mukuru wa Kigali, Antoine Kambanda. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda ni we Munyarwanda wa mbere agenywe kuba umukardinali. Muri abo 13, icenda bari munsi y'imyaka 80, bafise uburenganzira bwo kuba mu murwi w'abakardinali bashobora gutora umusubirizi wa Papa mu gihe yokwitaba Imana canke agatanga imihoho. Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda afise imyaka 61, yavukiye mu Bugesera, mu 2018 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize Musenyeri mukuru (Arkepiskopi) wa Kigali canke umukuru wa Ekleziya Gatolika mu Rwanda. Kambanda yize amashuri mato n'ayisumbuye mu Burundi, muri Uganda no muri Kenya imbere yo kurangiza  ivyigwa vya Tewolojiya muri Seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda mu Rwanda. Inyandiko za Ekleziya mu Rwanda zivuga ko mu kwezi kwa cenda mu 1990 aribwo Papa Paul II yamugize umupatiri. Kuva mu 1993 yagiye kwiga i Roma aho yavanye impamyabushobozi y'ikirenga muri Tewolojiya. Inyuma y'amashuri yiwe, igihe kinini yari umwigisha muri seminari nkuru ya Nyakibanda, aza no kuyiyobora kugeza mu 2013. Muri uwo mwaka wa 2013 nibwo Papa Francis yamugize musenyeri wa Diyosezi ya Kibungo kugeza mu 2018 ahabwa amabanga yo kuyobora kiliziya mu Rwanda. Kardinali ni rwo rwego rukuru rwo mu butegetsi bwa ekleziya umuntu ashobora kugerako imbere yo kuba Papa, umuyobozi wa Ekleziya Gatolika kw'isi. Ekleziya Gatolika yari isanzwe ifise abakardinali 219, muri abo 29 gusa ni bo bo muri Africa, mu gihe igihugu nk'Ubutaliyano conyene gifise abakaldinali 41. Ibihugu vya Africa bisanzwe bifise abakardinali ni: Aba bakardinali bashasha 13 batowe na Papa Francis bazemezwa kuri iyo mirimo kw' igenekerezo 28 z'ukwezi kwa 11 nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru ya Vatican. Muri bo harimwo uwitwa Mauro Gambetti yari asanzwe ari umupatiri. Urwego rw'abakardinali rumeze nka reta ya Papa. Bamwe bakorera i Vatican abandi baguma bakorera mu bihugu vyabo bakajayo igihe batumijwe. Amategeko abagenga avuga ko Abakardinali igikorwa cabo ca mbere ari ugutora umu Papa mushasha iyo uwusanzwe ahari apfuye canke avuye mu mirimo. Gusa muri bose, 120 ni bo baba bagize inama itora Papa mushasha. Bashingwa kandi iyindi mirimo itandukanye harimwo gukurikirana ibikorwa vy'abasenyeri, guhagararira amashuri ya Ekleziya, ivugabutumwa, eka bakagira n'inteko ijejwe sentare zitatu za ekleziya. Abakardinali ariko kandi baba bajejwe guhagararira diyoseze n'imiburiburi zibiri canke zirenga mu bihugu bakomokamwo. Abakardinali bambara ibara ry'umutuku kuvyo amategeko ya katolika asobanura ko baba "biteguye kumena amaraso yabo mu gukorera uwo basubiriye intumwa Petero."

column2: Diego Maradona: Menya ubuhinga bw'uyu mukinyi n'intege nke ziwe
column3: Igitangaza c'umukinyi, agaragara mu kibuga, umuhinga, ntagereranywa, adahuriweko na bose. Diego Maradona. Igihangange mu mupira w'amaguru ateye inkeke. Umwe mu bakinyi b'ibihangange muri uwo mukino, uwo munya Argentine yarishimira uko ahererekanya umupira, ukubona kure n'ubunyarutsi vyashimisha abakunzi biwe. Yaranashavuje abakunzi biwe igihe yinjiza n'ukuboko, mu ciswe 'Hand of God' (ukuboko kw'Imana), aca aja muvyo kunywa ibiyayuramutwe no mu zindi ngorane zimuraba ku giti ciwe atari ku kibuga. Diego Armando Maradona yavukiye mu micungararo  y'igisagara ca Buenos Aires haraciye imyaka 60, akaba yakize ubukene buharangwa mu kuba umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru rurangiranwa bamwe bagereranya mbere ko yasumvya ubuhinga Pele wo muri Brezil. Uwo munye Argentine, yinjije ibitsindo 259 mu nkino 491, yararushije amajwi mugenzi we wo muri Amerika y'epfo mu matora y'umukinyi wa mbere akomeye mu kinjana ca 20, imbere y'uko FIFA ihindura uburyo batoramwo, bose bakaba baciye bagirwa aba mbere. Maradona yerekanye ubushobozi butangaje kuva akiri muto, aho yagejeje umurwi wiwe w'abakiri bato wa Los Cebollitas, ku ntsinzi 136 bikurikiranya, aca agira ugukina umupira w'amaguru umwuga ku myaka 16 n'imisi 120. Mugufi kandi yitsindagiye, ku metero imwe n'igice, si umunonotsi wokwiyumviriye. Ububangutsi bwiwe, ukubona kure, guhagarika umupira, ugucenga no guhereza vyatuma ukutanyaruka cane n'iyongerekana ry'ibiro vyiwe bitagaragara. Ashobora kuba yari umuhinga mu guca mu bakinyi binyuma bahanganye, ariko vyaramugora kwirinda ingorane. Ibitsindo 34 vya Maradona mu nkino 91 za Argentine ni igice kimwe muri kahise kiwe mu gihe yamaze akina. Yarafashije igihugu ciwe gutahukana intsinzi mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 1986 i Mexico, aranagishikana mu rukino rwa nyuma inyuma y'imyaka ine yakurikiye. Mu nkino z'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma zaheruka, hari habayemwo ukutumvikana kwari gushobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima bwiwe. Urukino rwabahuje n'Ubwongereza na rwo rwadutsemwo ikindi cuka kibi, intambara ya Falklands War hagati y'ivyo bihugu bibiri yari yatanguye  imyaka ine imbere y'aho. Ku kibuga ho yaciye ikomera gusumba. Mu gihe hari haheze iminota 51 ata gitsindo kiraboneka, Maradona yarwaniye umupira mu kirere n'umunyegoli Peter Shilton aca yinjiza igitsindo. Mu nyuma yavuze ko ico gitsindo cabonetse "hamwe kivuye ku mutwe wa Maradona, ahandi na ho ku kuboko kw'Imana". Inyuma y'iminota ine, yaciye yinjiza igitsindo  kivugwa ko ari "igitsindo c'ikinjana' - yafashe umupira hagati mu kibuga aca arawirukankana, asiga abandi bakinyi inyuma, imbere yo gucenga Shilton, aca arinjiza. Ku ncuro zibiri zose, Maradona yaraguzwe ku giciro kitari bwigere kibaho ku wundi mukinyi  - ava muri Boca Juniors mu gihugu ciwe agana Barcelone muri Espagne ku miliyoni 3 z'amapawundi, n'igihe yaja mu Butaliyano mu murwi wa Napoli, inyuma y'imyaka ibiri ku  miliyoni 5 z'amapawundi. Hari abakunzi b'uwo mugwi barenga 80.000 ku kibuga ca San Paolo, igihe yashika ari muri kajugujugu. Intwari nshasha. Yarakinye mu murwi ukomeye mu Butaliyano, arakundwa n'abarorerezi mu gihe yafasha gutahukana ibikombe vy'ihiganwa rya Buraya mu 1987 na 1990 hamwe n'igikombe ca UEFA co mu 1989. Yaragiriraniye ubucuti n'imirwi y'abicanyi ya Camorra, aja muvyo kunywa ibiyayuramutwe vya cocaine, aranitwarirwa yagirizwa kutemera umwana yavyaye. Inyuma yo gutsindwa igitsindo 1-0 n'Ubudagi mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi mu 1990 mu Butaliyano, ibipimo vyerekanye ko yanyoye ibiyayuramutwe mu mwaka wakurikiye vyatumye ahagarikwa amezi 15. 1977: Yatanguye mu rukino rwahuza Argentine v Hongrie 1982: Yagiye mu murwi wa Napoli inyuma y'imyaka ibiri yamaze muri Barcelone 1986: Yatahukanye igikombe c'isi akinira Argentine 1990: Yakinye urukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi ubugira kabiri akinira Argentine, maze itahukana ikibanza ca kabiri. Atwara n'igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo akinira Napoli. 1991: Yahagaritswe amezi 15 inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe. 1994: Yakinye mu gikombe c'isi incuro ya kane ariko aca arirukanwa inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe. 1997: Yarasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru inyuma yo gusanga yafashe ibiyayuramutwe ubugira gatatu. 2010: Yahejeje ikiringo ciwe co kumenyereza umurwi wa Argentine inyuma yo gutsindwa mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi. Inyuma y'ibipimo bigira gatatu vyemeza ko yafashe ibiyayuramutwe inyuma y'imyaka itatu, yarasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru afise imyaka 37, ariko abandanya agira n'izindi ngorane. Maradona yaraciriwe urubanza rwo gupfungwa imyaka 2 n'amezi 10 ariko yidegemvya azira kurasa abamenyeshamakuru n'inkoho ikoreshwa mu gukina. Akamenyero kiwe ka cocaine n'akaborerwe vyamuteye ibibazo vy'amagara. Yarongereje ibiro gushika ku 128, agira indwara y'umutima mu 2004, ivyamutumye amara umwanya munini ariko aravurwa. Yarabazwe ku nda kugira bamufashe kugabanya ibiro, araja no kuba muri Cuba mu gihe yariko ararwana no guheba gufata ibiyayuramutwe. N'aho habaye ivyo vyose, nticabujije ko Maradona agenwa kumenyereza umurwi wa Argentine mu 2008 akaba yaranawushikanye mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'isi yose  inyuma y'imyaka ibiri, imbere y'uko batsindwa n'Ubudagi ibitsindo 4-0.

column2: Ukraine-Russia: umuhanuzi wa Zelensky avuga ko intambara imaze kwica abashika 13.000
column3: N﻿a Elsa Maishman na Jaroslav Lukiv B﻿BC News Abasirikare ba Ukraine bashika 13.000 nibo bamaze gupfa kuva igitero c’Uburusiya gitanguye, nk’uko bivugwa n’umutegetsi wo hejuru. Mykhailo Podolyak, umuhanuzi wa Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky wa Ukraine, avuga ko ingabo ziri hagati ya 10.000 na 13.000 zimaze gupfa. Ni ibintu bidakunze gushika aho Ukraine itanga ibitigiri vy’abamaze gupfa, kandi n’ibivugwa na Podolyak ntibiremezwa n’igisirikare c’igihugu. Mu kwa gatandatu yavuze ko abasirikare ba Ukraine bari hagati ya 100 na 200 bapfa buri musi. Mu kwezi guheze, intwazangabo nkuru yo mu gisirikare ca Amerika, Mark Milley,  yatangaje ko abasirikare bababa 100.000 b’Uburusiya hamwe na 100.000 ba Ukraine bari bamaze gupfa canke gukomereka kuva intambara itanguye. Mu butumwa yacishije muri videwo ku wa gatatu, umukuru w’Inama y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko abasirikare 100.000 bamaze kwicwa. Hagati aho, umuvugizi w’Inama y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya yaratanze umuco avuga ko iryo ryari ikosa, ko ibi bitigiri vyari ivyo abamaze gupfa no gukomereka. Umupfasoni von der Leyen kandi yavuze ko abasivire ba Ukraine 20.000 bari bamaze kwicwa. N’aho ico gitigiri kitavugurujwe n’Inama y’Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, carakuwe mu bundi butumwa bwa videwo bwakurikiye, kumwe n’ikindi cavuga ko ingabo 100.000 zimaze kwicwa. Avugana n’imboneshakure yo muri  Ukraine, Channel 24, Podolyak yavuze ko Kyiv "ivugira ku mugaragaro ivyerekeye igitigiri c’abamaze kwicwa”. Ati: "Dufise  ibiharuro bitangwa n’ibiro bikuru vya gisirikare, ibiharuro bitangwa n’umugaba mukuru w’ingabo [Perezida Zelensky], kandi biva kuri 10.000 gushika ku 12.500-13.000 vy’abishwe". Yongerako y’uko igitigiri c’abasivire bamaze kwicwa gishobora kuba ari “kinini”. Gushika hagati mu kwa gatandatu, BBC yari imaze kumenya ko abasivire 3600 bari bamaze gupfa. Iki gitigiri gishobora kuba kimaze kuduga cane. Podolyak avuga kandi ko abasirikare b’Uburusiya bashika 100.000 bamaze kwicwa kuva igitero gitanguye ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), abandi nabo bari hagati ya 100.000 na 150.000 bakomeretse, canke bakaburwa irengero canke bakaba badashobora gusubira ku rugamba. Igisata ca BBC gikoresha ururimi rw’ikirusiya kivuga ko abasirikare b’Uburusiya nibura 9311 ku nzego zose bamaze kwicwa kuva igitero gitanguye ku wa 24 z’ukwa kabiri, mu gihe igiharuro nyezina c’abamaze kwicwa gishobora kuba kirenga 18.600.

column2: Man Utd v Tottenham: Ni iki kirindiriye Jose Mourinho niyasubira Old Trafford uno munsi?
column3: Jose Mournho arasubira ku kibuga ca Old Trafford ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa gatatu nyuma y'umwaka aho yahaheruka, aho yatsinda Fulham 4-1 itariki 8 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri 2018, ikaba yabaye intsinzi ya nyuma yiwe amenyereza United. Mourinho afashe urugendo mu buraruko bw'Ubwongereza ajanye ikipe ya Tottenham yagaruye udutege kuva aho yirukaniye Mauricio Pochettino itariki 19 z'ukwa cumi na rimwe. Iyi kipe ubu ifise intsinzi zitatu mu mikino itatu nyene, intsinzi zayifashije gushika mu kibanza ca gatandatu muri Premier League. Umukinyi akinira Ubwongereza hagati, Dele Ali, niwe asa n'uwahinduwe cane n'umuzo wa Mourinho. Ku buryo buhushanye, ikipe Mourinho yahoze amenyereza yo ihagaze nabi. Niyinjira mu cumba c'abashitsi ca Old Trafford, icumba bivugwa ko yagabaniye ubwaguke, Mourinho araba yiteguriye guhura na United iri mu kibanza ca 10 ku rutonde. Imaze gutsinda gusa inkino zine muri rino higanwa, ibintu bitari bwayishikire kuva mu 1990. None ninde yungukiye mu kuva kwa Mourinho muri United? Hanyuma abakunzi ba Tottenham bokwiyubara iki hihwejwe igihe uyu munye Portugal yamaze Old Trafford? Mourinho aguma yemanga ko ibiriko biraba muri Tottenham muri uno mwanya atari we babikesha. Ariko ni bake bemera ivyo avuga. Uko bimeze kwose, urusaku ruherekeza Mourinho rwama rutuma ari we agaragara cane, naho yoba atari we bivuyeko. Yakeje agahungu gatora imipira kuba karafashije Tottenham gutsinda Olympiakos mu rukino rwa Champions League itariki 26 k'ukwa cumi na rimwe, aca atumira ako gahumba mu cumba abakinyi bihinduriramwo mu rukino rwo ku wa gatandatu batsinze Bournemouth. Ivyo vyose vyaciye vyegekwa kuri Mourinho. Co kimwe no kwivyukiranya kwa Alli agatangura gukina neza, nakwo kwashizwe kuri Mourinho. Amakuru ava muri Tottenham avuga ko Mourinho gushika ubu ari nk'aho ataco arahindura. Rimwe na rimwe arara mu buraro bw'ikibanza co kwimenyerezamwo ca Tottenham, ariko ivyo ntibizovugisha benshi nk'imyaka ibiri n'igice yamaze mw'ihoteli Lowry i Manchester. Ariko, harabaye agakoryo. Mourinho ntakunda guhatira abakinyi ibikorwa nk'uko vyari kuri Pochettino, rero ntihazobamwo igikenye nk'uko vyahora. Ahubwo, bazokwibanda ku guhagarara neza mu kibuga, baba bafise umupira canke batawufise. Ntibiri mu kuri kuvuga ko Mourinho ari umumenyereza yibanda ku kuzibira - ariko aba yitunganije neza cane. Nk'uko United yabibonye nyuma y'iyirukanwa rya Mourinho, amahirwe Tottenham iriko iraronka ni ayo kugira ijwi rishasha, uburyo bushasha hamwe no gutangura gushasha. Mourinho ntavyo yari gukora birusha butsinda imikino yiwe itatu ya mbere y'amahiganwa. Gutsinda bitagoranye West Ham na Bournemouth, hamwe n'urukino rushushe bakinye na Olympiakos. Subiza amaso ku ntango yiwe muri United. Gutsinda vyoroshe muri Premier League Bournemouth na Southampton, bikurikirwa n'igitsindo co ku munota wa nyuma ca Marcus Rashford kuri Hull catanze intsinzi. Urukino rwa kane nirwo rutagenze neza. Gutsindirwa muhira na Manchester City vyakurikiwe no guhitamwo abakinyi kwa Mourinho kwavuzwe cane. Yasimbuye Henrikh Mkhitarya nyuma y'igice ca mbere. Mourinho, ataduduriyeko, avyita "gukina nabi". Mkhitaryan yaciye amara amezi hafi atatu ata rundi rukino atanguye. Amaze kuva muri United, uwo munye Armenia yavuze ko ukwizerana n'umumenyereza wari kwaratosekaye. Ubudasa bw'ukuntu Mourinho yafashe Eric Dier mu minsi indwi iheze ntikwari kwigaragaza kurusha. Nyuma y'urukino na Olympiakos, aho yasubiriza uwo mukinyi w'Ubwongereza ku munota wa 29, Mourinho yamusavye ikigongwe ku mugaragaro. Yaciye amusubiza mw'ikipe mu rukino rwakugirkiye na Bournemouth, aho Dier yakinye iminota yose 90. Ibi vyoba vyerekana ko Mourinho asigaye afise ubuntu, canke kwoba ari ukwisemba kubera ukuntu yafashe umukinyi wo hagati ameze nk'abo yamwe yikorako mu kumenyereza kwiwe? Ubiravye bisa nk'uko yoba koko asigaye afise ubuntu ufatiye ku kuntu uyu mugabo w'imyaka 56 yakoze ku mutima abakozi ba Tottenham. Muri United, hari icuka c'icizere igihe yatangazwa nk'uwuzosubirira Louis Van Gaal, ariko umupira wa Mourinho ntaco wasumbije uw'uwo Muholandi - kandi ugushaka kwagaragara kwari guke. Mourinho ntiyigeze atinya kuvuga amajambo akwega induru. Muri United, batanguye indwi nyuma y'ugusimburwa kare kwa Mkhitaryan mu rukino rukomeye. Nyuma y'ukundi gutsindwa - na Watford - Mourinho yifatiye mu gahanga Luke Saw nk'inkwezi y'akabi, yagiriza uwo mukinyi wo hagati w'Ubwongereza kuba yari ku metero 25 z'uwo yagomba kuzibira, hako zobaye zitanu, kuri ubwo rero akaba atari gushobora guhagarika umupira wavuyemwo intsinzi ya Watford. Shaw yatanguye urukino rumwe gusa rwa Premier League mu mezi atanu yakurikiye. Mourinho aramaze kwemanga ko akoresha amajambo yo guha ingoga Alli, amubaza niba amaze gusa amezi atanu akinira Tottenham canke niba ari mwene wabo. Umwimbu wabaye akarora uhore - ariko, birashoboka, ko kuronka umwimbu nk'uwo kuri Christian Eriksen bishobora kugorana ufatiye ku kuntu amasezerano uwo munye Danemark afitanye na Tottenham, azohera mu mpera z'amahiganwa y'ubu. Kandi, naho yasohoye hafi miriyoni £400 agura abakinyi akiri Old Trafford, Mourinho asa n'uwufise ikipe ihagaze neza atigeze agira muri Manchester. Mu bantu nka Toby Alderweireld, Jan Vertonghen na Davinson Sanchez, afise abakinyi batatu bo hagati bameze neza cane, ico kibanza akaba ataremerewe kugikomeza mu mwaka wiwe wa nyuma Old Trafford. Alli ubu ariko arakina neza cane mu kibanza ca nimero 10 co kimwe nk'uko Frank Lampard yabikoze - naho we yaba ari imbere cane - igihe Mourinho yashika ubwa mbere mu Bwongereza avuye muri Porto mu 2004. Kandi naho Harry Kane atari Didier Drogba mu kuremwa, arinjiza kenshi kurusha uwo ari we wese muri United kuva umwaka wa mbere wa Zlatan Ibrahimovic muri United wiganjemwo kuvunika, nyuma y'aho uwo munye Swede yinjirije ibitsindo 28 mu nkino 45. Dufatiye ku kuntu yakiriwe Old Trafford igihe aherukayo nk'umusesanguzi wa Sky Sport, Mourinho araza kwakirwa neza n'abakunzi ba United. Kanatsinda, yarabahaye ibikombe bibiri anashikana iyo kipe ku kibanza ciza mw'ihiganwa - ica kabiri - kuva Sir Alex Ferguson agiye mu za bukuru mu 2013. United yari iya gatandatu Mourinho agenda, iyo kipe mu mwiherero ikaba ivuga ko ataciyongereye mu buryo bwo gukina canke mu gutsinda igiye yayimenyereza. Ariko ikibazo uwamusubiriye, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, afise ni uko - nyuma yo gutangura neza - United yateye intambwe inyuma cane. Kunganya ku wa Mungu i Old Trafford na Aston Villa vyatumye iyo kipe ija mu kibanza ca 10, ikaba imaze gutsinda kane n'amanota 18 mu nkino 14. Kugira ashikane 26 mu nkino 17 bitatumye Mourinho atirukanwa haraciye amaze 12, Solskjaer akeneye gutsinda inkino zitatu zikurikira, zirimwo uruno rwa derby na Manchester City kuwa gatandatu. Nivyo ko uyu munye Norvege agishigikiwe cane imbere no hanze y'ikipe kandi akaba yariyemeje gukinisha abakinyi bakiri bato - ibintu Mourinho atigeze akozwa, naho kenshi yavuze ko ashaka kubikora. Ariko ikipe ya United biragaraga ko hari ivyo ibuze. Bataguze abakinyi mu kwezi kwa mbere, Solskjaer bizomugora gushika muri batandatu ba mebre, aho ntituvuze kuronka ikibanza ca Champions League. Kandi nta n'umwe, naho yoba akunzwe gute, yorusimba mw'ihiganwa ritababarira rya Premier League, abandanije atsindwa.
