column2: Burundi: Révérien Ndikuriyo yatowe kuba umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNDD-FDD
column3: Umukenguzamateka Reveriyano Ndikuriyo niwe yemejwe n'abanywanyi ba CNDD-FDD nk'umunyamabanga mukuru mushasha w'uyo mugambwe uri ku butegetsi mu Burundi. Ni inyuma y'ikoraniro kaminuza ridasanzwe ryabereye ku mugwa mukuru wa poritike, Gitega, ku wa Mungu 24/01/2021. Umukenguzamateka Ndikuriyo asubiriye Evariste Ndayishimiye yari ajejwe ayo mabanga kuva mu 2016 igihe haba isubirwamwo ry'inzego zirongoye uyo mugambwe. Mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, umushingamateka Ndikuriyo yashimiye Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye bagendanye, hamwe n'abanywanyi b'umugambwe wiwe bamwizeye. Yiyemeje kutazobahemukira. Umukenguzamateka Reveriyano Ndikuriyo yavukiye muri komine Kayogoro y'intara ya Makamba. Reveriyano Ndikuriyo yahoze ari mu banywanyi ba CNDD-FDD igihe wari ukiri umuhari warwanya ubutegetsi mu ntambara yadutse mu Burundi inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye mu 1993. Uyo muhari umaze gutera igikumu ku masezerano yo guhagarika intambara, umukenguzamateka Ndikuriyo yarasubijwe mu buzima busanzwe akaba yararanguye amabanga atandukanye mu gihugu. Kuva mu 2004 yabaye buramatari w'intara ya Makamba asanzwe avukamwo, gushika mu 2007 aho abereye umushingamateka gushika mu 2010. Mu 2010, yatowe kuba umukenguzamateka, amabanga yasubiye gutorerwa mu 2015 mu matora yabayemwo impari nyinshi, maze aca atorwa kuyirongora gushika mu 2020. Muri kino gihe, asanzwe arongoye ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu burundi, FFB kuva mu 2013.

column2: R. Kelly ‘yarahohoteye Aaliyah afise imyaka 13 canke 14’, vyavugiwe muri sentare
column3: R. Kelly yarahohoteye mu bijanye n'igitsina umuhisi yari umuririmvyi wa R&B Aaliyah igihe yari afise imyaka 13 canke 14, nk'uko umwe mu bahora ari abatamvyi biwe yabibwiye sentare. Uwo mugore, yasuye (yatanze ubuhamvya) kw'izina rya Angela, yabwiye intahe y'urubanza rwa Kelly ko yabonye uwo muririmvyi yabaye rurangiranwa akora ibijanye n'igitsina kuri Aaliyah bari muri bisi. Ivyo ngo vyoba vyabaye umwaka umwe imbere y'uko Kelly yubakana mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko n'uwo muririmvyikazi, igihe yari afise imyaka 15. Kelly, w'imyaka 54, arahakana ivyo yagirizwa vyose. Birimwo icaha kimwe c'imirimo iciye mu nzira z'ubukozi bw'ikibi - kimuvuga nk'uwari kw'isonga ry'ibikorwa vyari bifise intumbero igaragara yo  "guta mu mutego abagore bakiri bato n'abakobwa b'imiyabaga" ku mvo z'imibonano mpuzabitsina. Yanagirijwe ivyaha umunani vyo kurenga ku mategeko abuza urudandazwa rushingiye ku gitsina. Uwo muririmvyi, ku mazina yiwe yose ni Robert Kelly, ntiyagirizwa gusambanya ku nguvu canke kuburabuza, ariko abashikirizamanza barafise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana ivyemeza ivyaha bishoboka vy'ukwagirizwa imirimo iciye mu bukozi bw'ikibi, hatarabwe igihe vyabereye. Ivyashikirijwe na Angela bishitse ku munsi ugira 15 w'urubanza ruriko rurabera  Brooklyn i New York. Niwe yari uwagiriza Kelly agira cumi, akaba yavuze ivyari bimaze kuvugwa n'abandi vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina ku muntu agifise imyaka y'umwana. Yavuze ko yatanguye kugira imibonano mpuzabitsina na Kelly mu 1991, igihe yari akiri kw'i shure. Bahuriye mu giteramo mu nzu iwe igihe yari afise imyaka 15. Hari igihe kimwe, nk'uko yabivuze, yamutumiye kwinjira mu cumba c'uburyamo hanyuma amubwira "kwurira ngo ndamuje hejuru". Yaragonanywe, ariko mu nyuma aremera hanyuma bagirana imibonano mpuzabitsina. Kelly mu nyuma yamutumiye ngo aje mu bamuherekeza iyo agiye kuremesha ibiteramo. Yavuze ko uwo muririmvyi hari igihe yashira  igitutu ku bamwegereye kugira ngo bagirane imibonano mpuzabitsinna nawe, kandi agahana abadakurikiza ivyo yababwiye. Ivyashikiye Aaliyah  vyabaye mu 1992 canke mu 1993, igihe Angela n'uwundi mugore akiri muto bafata ingingo yo kuja  gukanga Kelly, nk'uko yabibwiye sentare. Amaze gusunika umwango wiwe w'icumba ukuguruka, yavuze ati: "Nabonye Robert na Aaliyah bari mu bihe vy'imibonano mpuzabitsina." Yongerako ati: ''Naciye nugara umwango buno nyene nca nsunika umukobwa yari inyuma yanje ndamwigiza kure y'umwango." Uwo yahora ari umutamvyi yavuze ko ivyo yabonye atigeze asubira kubivugana na Kelly. Imigenderanire ya Kelly na Aaliyah niyo yabaye ishimikiro ry'urubanza. Abari bamaze gusura bashikirije  ko bahinduye impapuro kugirango abo babiri bagire ubukwe igihe Aaliyah atari bwakwize imyaka. Ariko, Angela, abaye umuntu wa mbere yabwiye  abashashe muri urwo rubanza ko yabonye abo babiri bari mu bikorwa mpuzabitsina. Ivyo yavuze imbere ya sentare bitumye Aaliyah aba ariwe mugore wa mbere akiri muto Kelly yagirizwa kuba yarahohoteye. Uwo rurangiranwa,  yahavuye ava mu kwaha kwa Kelly akaba umuririmvyi akomeye ku giti ciwe, yapfuye mw'isangana ry'indege mu 2001. Ku wa mbere hasuye kandi umugabo agira kabiri mu bagiriza R Kelly. Kw'izina ritari ryo rya Alex, yavuze ingene Kelly yamufashe amajwi ahura n'abagore incuro "zidaharurwa ", rimwe na rimwe na Kelly arimwo. N'ubwo bahura ubwa mbere yari afise imyaka 16, yavuze ko Kelly yamushizeko igitutu co kugirana imibonano mpuzabitsina afise imyaka 20. Alex yavuze ati: "Ndibuka amvugisha, hanyuma akansoma ku  nguvu anamfyeta mu maso". Yavuze ko Kelly yamubwiye ngo "Ba umuntu yugurutse." N'uwahoze ari umwunganizi wa Kelly nawe yasuye ku wa mbere avuga ko atigeze abona iyo nyifato yo guhohotera yagirizwa n'ayandi masura. Ariko, Diana Copeland, yakoranye n'ico camamare imyaka 15, yerekanye ishusho yiwe nk'umuntu yari azi kwigumya, navyo bihurirana n'ivyari bimaze kuvugwa. Urubanza rurabandanya.

column2: Funke Abimbola: ‘Izina ryanje ry’ikinyafrika ryambujije kuronka akazi’
column3: Umunyamategeko akongera akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira bw'inkehwa, Funke Abimbola,  avuga ko "yamye arenganywa" igihe cose yagerageje kurondera akazi. Hafi icagatatu c'ama kompanyi 100 adandaza imitahe (FTSE) nta nkehwa afise mu nzego zifata ingingo, nk'uko icegeranyo kibivuga. Ikigo kijejwe kwihweza ingene ubwoko buserukiwe mu ma kompanyi atandukanye, Parker Review Committee, mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, kimenyesha ko inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo mu makompanyi atari make. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Nahuye n'inzitizi nyinshi  igihe nariko ndondera akazi kubera nari mfise izina ry'ikinyafirika, kandi kubera ndi umwirabure, nta gukekeranya". Yabwiye BBC ko yaterefonye incuro zirenga ijana kugira ngo ashobore guhonyoza ikirenge  mu kazi. Ati: "Baranyinuvye, barankarira cane gusumba abandi  kubera kwitwa umugore w'umwirabure". "Biroroshe kukubona uwo uri we kandi biroroshe cane rwose kukurenganya iyo uri mu nkehwa". Icegeranyo c'ikigo Parker Review Committee  cerekana ko mu makompanyi adandaza imitahe ashika 250 casanze inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, aho 119 kuri 179 amoko adaserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Ico cegeranyo ntikintangaza. Hari inzitizi nyinshi  cane kugira ngo inkehwa zishobore kuronka ikibanza mu nzego zo hejuru". Ico kigo Parker Review Committee cashinzwe kugira ngo gikore ubushakashatsi ku kungene amoko atandukanye aserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo  mu makompanyi atandukanye, casohoye icegeranyo caco kuri ico kibazo mu 2017. Ico gihe, mu makompanyi 51 kw'ijana adandaza imitahe inkehwa ntizari ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, ugereranije n'ubu ari 33%. Ico cegeranyo gisaba ko gushika mu 2021 buri kompanyi mu makompanyi 100 ya FTSE yoba ifise n'imiburiburi indongozi imwe iva mu nkehwa, hanyuma gushika mu 2024 naho mu makompanyi 250 ya FTSE yoba yamaze gukora gutyo. Mu ntumbero yo gufasha kugira ngo inkehwa ziserukirwe, ico cegeranyo gisaba ko buri kompanyi yokwama itanga icegeranyo c'ingene inkehwa ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, n'ingene ubwoko butandukanye buserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola arizeye ko mu gihe hoba integuro yoha ibibanza kanaka inkehwa vyofasha mu gutorera inyishu ico kibazo. Ati: "Hariho amashirahamwe makeya mu Bwongereza aha akazi amoko atandukanye. "Ayo mashirahamwe yama ategura intonde z'abantu bafise ubuhinga butandukanye muy bwoko butandukanye buri mwaka, rero iyo wipfuza kurondera abirabure, abanyaziya hamwe n'inkehwa, biba ngombwa ko uja kuronderera muri izo ntonde". Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, Andrea Leadsom, avuga ko ico cegeranyo cerekana ko "amakompanyi agifise igikorwa kitari gito" kugira ngo ashobore guhimiriza abakozi b'abirabure, Abanya Aziya hamwe n'inkehwa.

column2: U﻿kraine ibandanya gushora intete n'aho Uburusiya bwikuye mu masezerano
column3: Ikigo gihagarariwe na UN/ONU kigenzura ingene intete zishorwa ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura ki vuga ko u﻿bundi bwato butatu bwahagurutse muri Ukraine ku musi wa kabiri, n'aho uburusiya bwafashe ingingo yo kwivana muri ayo amasezerano. I﻿co kigo kivuga ko ubwo bwato 'bwemerewe kugenda na Ukraine, Turkia na Onu, mu gihe uburusiya na bwo "bwabimenyeshejwe". K﻿u musi wa mbere, amato 12 atwaye amatone 354.500 y'ibifungurwa yarahagurutse muri Ukraine. U﻿burusiya bwahagaritse gushigikira ayo masezerano ku musi wa gatandatu, bwagiriza Ukraine gukoresha inzira ubwato bucamwo mu gutera  amato yabwo y'intambara. O﻿nu ivuga ko ata bwato na bumwe bwariko buraca muri iyo nzira muri iryo joro. U﻿kraine ntiyigeze yemanga kugira uruhara muri ico gitero ca Crimme  - izinga rya Ukraine riri mu bumanuko ryigaruriwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya "gukangisha inzara amakungu" - ivyo Uburusiya buhakana. I﻿co kigo gifise icicaro I Istanbul ntikiramenyesha ivyo ubwo bwato butatu bwavuye muri Ukraine ku wa kabiri bwikoreye. U﻿burusiya nta co buravuga kuri ivyo. U﻿muzigo wo kuri uyu wa mbere ni wo wambere munini utwaye ku musi umwe kuva ayo masezerano yo gutwara intete atanguye gushirwa mu bikorwa, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi w'ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Odesa aho yasubiwemwo na Reuters. Ubwo butegetsi bwongeyeko ko bumwe mu bwato butwaye amatoni 40.000 y'intete bwari bugenewe igihugu ca Ethiopia, aho "hashobora gutera amapfa." I﻿nyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine mu kwezi kwa kabiri, amato yabwo yaciye yugariza ibivuko vya Ukraine vyo ku kiyaga cirabura, bwugaranirayo imiliyoni 20 z'intete zigenewe gutwarwa hagati mu gihugu, harimwo n'ibindi bifungurwa nk'ibigori n'amavuta y'ibihoke. A﻿riko mu kwezi kw'indwi harabonetse amasezerano hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine bafashijwe na Turkia na Onu, bituma hashobora gusubira gushorwa intete ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura. A﻿riko ku musi wa mbere, prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yavuze ko ayo masezerano yahagaritswe , avuga ko ari kubera ibitero "vyinshi" vy'indege zitagira umudereva ku mato yabwo ku bivuko vya Sevastopol aho yavuze ko Ukraine ibifisemwo uruhara. Y﻿avuze ko hategerezwa kubanza kubaho umutekano wo mu mazi, ko kwubahiriza amasezerano yo gushora intete bikimeze uko koba ari ukwigerezako. M﻿w'ijambo ryiwe ku mboneshakure, prezida Putin yagize ati:"Ukraine itegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ko ubwato butwara abantu butazogeramigwa." U﻿kraine ntiyemeje ko yagize uruhara muri ivyo bitero, ikavuga ko Uburusiya bwateguye kuva kera kwivana muri ayo masezerano mpuzamakungu, mu kugira icitwazo ivyo bitero. U﻿muvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida w'Uburusiya, Dmitry Peskov yagize ati:"Mu gihe Uburusiya buvuga ko bidashoka kwemanga umutekano wo muri ako karere, ayo masezerano aragoye gushirwa mu bikorwa, yafashe iyindi ntumbero - harimwo ukwigerezako kurengeje. U﻿kwikura muri ayo masezerano kw'Uburusiya kwatewe ivyatsi na Amerika, yavuze ko ico ico gihugu "kiriko kirakoresha imfungurwa nk'ikigwanisho". J﻿oseph Borrell ajejwe imigenderanire y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya EU n'amakungu, yateye akamo Uburusiya kwisubirako, avuga ko kubuza urudandazwa rw'intete n'umwavu bishobora gutera ikibazo c'inzara kw'isi. U﻿wuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika yamiriye kure ivyo vyagiriji ko igihugu ciwe kiriko kiratuma haba inzara kw'isi, yemeza ko ari akarenganyo kunebagura igihugu ciwe. U﻿burusiya bwafashe iyo ngingo mu gihe bwemeza ko bwaguye igikorwa co gukura abantu mu karere bwigaruriye ka Kherson, n'aho bwari bwavuze, mu mpera z'iyinga, bwari bwarangije ico gikorwa.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Haaland, Lukaku, Grealish, Kane, Pogba, Mbappe, Camavinga
column3: Chelsea iriteguye gutanga igifovya c'imiriyoni hafi 179 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ironke umusatirizi w'umurwi Borussia Dortmund umunya Norvège  Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 22, inyuma y'aho mweneyo Roman Abramovich, atangiye uburenganzira bwo kurondera uyu mukinyi ashobora kuba uwa mbere aguzwe amafaranga menshi muri kahise kayo. (Football Insider) Inter Milan iriko irasaba umurwi Chelsea imiriyoni hafi 141 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo iwuhe umusatirizi w'umubirigi Romelu Lukaku w'imyaka 28, mu gihe aba Blues bonanirwa no kugura Haaland. (Metro) Manchester City yashitse ku masezerano na Jack Grealish ikaba yiteze guha umurwi Aston Villa imiriyoni hafi 124 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo uyihe uyu mukinyi wo hagati w'umwongereza w'imyaka 25. (Football Insider) Manchester City ivuga ko amakuru avuga ko yoba yashitse ku masezerano n'umurwi Tottenham y'imiriyoni 220 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira uyihe umusatirizi Harry Kane ari ubuswaganyi. (Manchester Evening News) Tottenham ibandanya ishimangira ko ata mugambi ifise wo kugurisha uyu kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza w'imyaka 27 muri rino ci. (Football London) Ni mugihe Kane abandanya agira icizere ko Tottenham ishobora kumuha uburenganzira bwo kugenda.  (Times) Manchester City yemeranije na Kane  ko ishobora kumuhemba umushahara w'ibihumbi 481 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika ku ndwi kandi ko yiteguye kumutangako imiriyoni zshika 165 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika.  (Star) Manchester United iriteze ko muri rino ci umurwi Paris St-Germain uyisaba umukinyi wo hagati umufaransa  Paul Pogba w'imyaka 28. (Telegraph) Umusatirizi w'umufaransa Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22, yabwiye PSG ko atiteze gutera igikumu ku yandi masezerano yomutuma abandanya ayikinira, mu gihe ayo asanzwe afitaniye nayo azorangira mu 2022, akaba yipfuza kuva muri uwu murwi muri rino ci canke iryo mu mwaka uza.  (AS - in Spanish) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Rennes umufaransa Eduardo Camavinga ashaka ko yokwimukira muri Espagne inyuma y'aho ibiganiro hagati ya Manchester United n'abaserukizi b'uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 18 bibonekeye ko ata cizere biriko biratanga.  (Manchester Evening News) Barcelona ifise icizere ko, mu gihe umusatirizi wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo w'imyaka 36 yova muri  Juventus muri rino ci, ko uwu murwi wo mu Butaliyano ushobora kurondera umusatirizi w'umufaransa Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 30 ku masezerano y'intizo, ashobora kujamwo n'ikigabane co gushobora kumugura. (Sport - in Spanish) Umukuru wa Barca Joan Laporta avuga ko uwu murwi "ukeneye cane Antoine" ariko ko "Griezmann ari kw'isoko" kandi ko uwu murwi wa Espagne witeguye kwumviriza umurwi uwo ari wo wose womurondera.  (Goal) Arsenal nta yandi masezerano izoha umusatirizi w'umufaransa Alexandre Lacazette w'imyaka 30 ikaba iriko imuronderako imiriyoni  zababa 20 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika kugira ngo ziyifashe mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa  Chelsea Tammy Abraham w'imyaka 23.  (Sun) Umumenyereza wa Newcastle United  Steve Bruce arashimangira ko uwu murwi wipfuza cane kugura umukinyi wo hagti wa  Arsenal umwongereza Joe Willock w'imyaka 21, ariko ko aba ba Magpies  barindiriye ko aba Gunners na Willock bafata ingingo kuri kazoza kiwe. (Sky Sports) Umumenyereza wa Rangers Steven Gerrard w'imyaka 41 yahoze ari kizigenza wa Liverpool, avuga ko yatangajwe kandi ko yakubiswe n'inkuba igihe yumva amakuru yavuga ko yari gushobora kuba umumenyereza wa Everton imbere y'igenwa rya Rafael Benitez. akavuga ko ivyo ata biri mu migambi. (ESPN) Liverpool iriko iraraba ingene yoha ayandi masezerano umusatirizi wayo, umunya Misiri Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 29 mu misi mike iri imbere, mu gihe ayo ifitaniye na we azorangira mu ci ryo mu 2023.  (Liverpool Echo) Fulham iri hafi yo kuronka umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Liverpool  umunya Pays de Galles Harry Wilson w'imyaka  24 mu miriyoni hafi 14 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun) Bayer Leverkusen yanse igiciro ca miriyoni 41 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika catanzwe na Aston Villa ku mukinyi wo ku ruhande umunya Jamaica Leon Bailey w'imyaka 23. (Football Insider) Umusatirizi wa Manchester City umunya Brésil Gabriel Jesus w'imyaka 24 ari ku rutonde rw'abaronderwa cane na Juventus muri rino ci. (Calciomercator - in Italian) Juve kandi iriteguye gusubira kugerageza kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Sassuolo umutaliyano Manuel Locatelli w'imyaka 23. (Mail) Umuserukizi w'umusatirizi wa Argentina Paulo Dybala w'imyaka 27 yiteze kuvugana na Juventus ku bijanye n'amasezerano mashasha, m ugihe asigaje umwaka umwe gusa muri uwo murwi wo mw'ihiganwa  Serie A ryo mu Butaliyano. (Calciomercato - in Italian)

column2: US: B﻿iden arashima ivyavuye mu matora yo hagati muri manda
column3: P﻿rezida wa Amerika yiruhukije inyuma y'aho aba demokrate baburije aba republika  kuronka amajwi menshi mu matora yo hagati muri manda. A﻿ba republika babura gato ngo biganze mu nama nshingamateka ariko Biden avuga ko "bataronse intebe nyinshi cane" nk'uko vyari vyitezwe, ku musi wa kabiri ku mugoroba. U﻿mwe muri iyo migambwe ushobora gutsindira kurongora inama nkenguzamateka, intsinzi ikaba ihagaze kubizova mu ntara zitatu aho amajwi gushika ubu yegeranye cane. Mu bisanzwe umugambwe uri ku butegetsi, ubu ukaba ari uw'aba demokrate, ukunze gutsindwa mu matora yo hagati mu kiringo ca mbere ca prezida. A﻿bajejwe imikenyuro mu mugambwe w'aba republika bari bizeye intsinzi itagabanije, bafatiye kw'iduga ry'ibiciro birengeje mu myaka 40 n'ingene abemera politike yiwe bari ku rugero rwo hasi. A﻿riko ibiharuro ngereranywa bivuga ko abitavye amatora boba bahoye aba republika utwigoro twabo two kubuza abantu gukorora imbanyi. A﻿vugira ku kirimba c'umukuru w'igihugu White House, ku musi wa gatatu ku mugoroba, Biden yavuze ko ivyavuye mu matora "vyatumye yiruhutsa". Y﻿avuze ati: "Nibaza ko wari umusi mwiza kuri demokrasi." Y﻿avuze ko icizere ciwe  cagaragaye, aca anebagura abamenyeshamakuru bari bagabishije ko abademokrates bazotsindwa bikomeye. K﻿ubera inguvu ahawe n'amajwi aronse muri iryo joro atari yiteze, Biden yavuze ko ategekanya gusubira kwitoza mu 2024. Biden agiye gukwiza imyaka 80 muri uku kwezi yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ati: "Intumbero yacu n'ugusubira kwitoza, ni yo ntego yacu." H﻿agati aho, aba republika bari begereje kuronka intebe 218 bari bakeneye kugira bakure mu minwe y'aba demokrate inama nshingamateka. M﻿u gihe aba republika botsinda mu nama (shingamateka na nkenguzamateka) iyo ari yo yose muri izo, bazoshobora kuburizamwo imigambi ya prezida. I﻿biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu kandi biriko biritegurira amatohoza y'inama nshingamateka ku butegetsi bwa Biden. B﻿iden yavuze ko yiteguye gukorana n'aba republika kandi ko ashobora gutunganya ibiganiro vy'impande zibiri mu ndwi iza. A﻿riko prezida kandi yavuze ko abanye Amerika bashobora gufata amatohoza yose yoba arongowe n'aba republika "nk'urukino rutwengeje". U﻿mugambwe wose uza gutahukana intsinzi mu ntara zibiri kuri zitatu zikomeye za Arizona, Georgie na Nevada, aca aramutswa inama nkenguzamateka.

column2: Wagner: Kubera iki EU/UE ibabajwe n'uyu murwi w'abacangero ba Russia muri Centrafrique?
column3: Muri ino ndwi, ishirahamwe ryUbumwe bwa Bulaya (UE/EU) ryarafatiye ibihano Wagner, umurwi w'abacangero b'Abarusiya wagirizwa ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu muri Centrafrique n'ahandi. UE ivuga ko itazosubira guha ivyigwa vya gisirikare ingabo za Centrafrique kubera zifitaniye ubucuti na Wagner. Muri Afrika, abarwanyi bayo bafise uruhara muri Libya, Sudan na Mozambique, kandi biragaragara ko no muri Mali basa n'abagiye gukorerayo. Izi nyeshamba ziri muri ico gihugu gufata mu mugongo Perezida Faustin-Archange Touadéra mu kurwanya inyeshamba zisanzwe zigenzura uturere turari duke tw'ico gihugu n'aho mu misi iheze ingabo za reta zateye intambwe. Iki gihugu kiri mu ndyane kuva reta ya Perezida François Bozizé itembagajwe mu 2013. Kuva ashitse ku butegetsi mu matora ya 2016, Perezida Touadéra ahanganye n'inyeshamba n'aho afashwe mu mugongo n'ingabo z'Ubufaransa n'iza ONU. Reta ya Centrafrique yemeza ko abacangero b'Abarusiya ari bo bakora gusumba. Wagner izwi ko yatanguye gukorera muri Centrafrique kuva mu 2017, inyuma y'aho Inama nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano yemereye Uburusiya kuja gutangayo inyigisho za gisirikare, ikongera igakuraho ibihano vyo mu 2013 ku bijanye no kwinjiza ibirwanisho muri ico gihugu. Mu kw'icumi 2017, Perezida Touadéra yaragendeye Uburusiya mu ntumbero yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano atari make na reta y'Uburusiya. Muri aya masezerano harimwo imfashanyo ya gisirikare, maze Centrafrique nayo ikemerera Uburusiya gucukura ubutare bwa diamant/diamond, inzahabu na uranium. ONU kandi yaremereye Uburusiya ko bworungika abigisha ba gisirikare 175 kugira bigishe igisirikare c'ico gihugu. N'aho Uburusiya buhakana, hariho ibirego, harimwo n'ibivugwa n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, ko hari isano hagati ya Wgner na Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu w'Uburusiya). Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko iri sano ryatumye abarwanyi b'uyu murwi wa gisirikare batangura gukorera muri Centrafrique inyuma y'aho amasezerano iki gihugu cagiriraniye n'Uburusiya atereweko igikumu. Kuva ico gihe, uyo murwi waciye winjira ku bwinshi muri ico gihugu gitunze ubutare bwinshi. Reta y'Uburusiya ivuga ko yarungitse abigisha ba gisirikare badafise ibirwanisho muri Centrafrique, kandi ko ata gihe na kimwe bigeze barenga 550. Hagati aho, abahinga ba ONU, bemeza ko Uburusiya bushobora kuba bwarungitse muri Centrafrique abigisha barenga 2000, harimwo n'abavuye muri Syria na Libya, aho Wagner isanzwe ikorera. Ibi biteye impungenge zidasanzwe ONU n'Ubufaransa, vyompi vyagirije uyu murwi gukokeza indyane mu guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu n'ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane ku biketswe ko ari inyeshamba. ONU hamwe n'Ubufaransa bivuga ko abarwanyi ba Wagner, co kimwe n'ingabo za reta, bafata ku nguvu, bakanyaga urukombamazi abasivire badafise ibirwanisho mu turere two mu misozi. Mu cegeranyo co mu kwa munani  ku bijanye n'ihohotera ry'agateka ka zina muntu muri Centrafrique, ishirahamwe ONU ryaharuye ubukozi bw'ikibi burenga 500 bwakozwe mu mwaka umwe, kuva mu kw'indwi 2020. Muri bwo harimwo ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane, iyicarubozo n'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Mu kw'icumi, umurwi w'abahinga ba ONU wavuze ko abahagaritswe n'aba bigisha b'Abarusiya hamwe n'igisirikare c'igihugu akenshi ata burenganzira bahabwa bwo kuburana. Bavuga ko abakorewe ayo mabi batubahuka kwitwara, ibi bigasigura ko aya mabi yabandanije ata camira. Mu ntango z'uko kwezi nyene, umushikiranganji w'ubutungane wa Centrafrique, Arnaud Abazene, yaremeye, ku ncuro ya mbere, ko hari  ihohoterwa ryakozwe "n'abigisha b'Abarusiya". N'aho yavuze ko menshi muri aya mabi yakozwe n'inyeshamba, bwari bwo bwa mbere reta yemeye ko hari amabi yakozwe n'ingabo zayo n'abo bafatanije ibikorwa. Umushikiranganji Abazene yavuze kandi ko abigisha b'Abasuriya barungitswe mu gihugu iwabo kugira ngo barengutswe imbere y'ubutungane. Umuvugizi w'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya Nabila Massrali yabwiye BBC ko iri shirahamwe ribandanya guterwa impungenge n'ibikorwa vy'umurwi Wagner. Hampande ya Centrafrique, ONU iragiriza kandi Wagner ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Libya. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryerekana ko abarwanyi ba Wagner bishe abasivire n'abanyororo muri Libya, bongera batega n'ibisasu bitamenyekana. Massrali  ati: "Amategeko abagenga ntatomoye, co kimwe n'intumbero yabo". "Biragaragara ko bigoye kuzibira no gukurikirana abashobora kuba bakora ihonyangwa ry'agateka ka zina muntu n'amategeko mpuzamakungu ajejwe agateka ka zina muntu mu bihe nk'ibi bidatomoye". Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya bwashaka gushimangira ko budakorana n'abacangero ba Wagner. Ubu ryahagaritse inyigisho za gisirikare muri Centrafrique kubera rifise amakenga ko abo bacangero bakoresha ingabo zigishijwe n'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya. Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ni rimwe mu mashirahamwe atanga imfashanyo nyinshi zo kugarukira ku banyagihugu bari mu ngorane muri Centrafrique, gushika ubu rikaba rimaze gutanga izirenga ku miriyaridi 1.4 kuva mu 2014. Abategetsi bavuga ko ata sano na rimwe rihari n'uyu murwi. Ariko vyikekwa ko hari ubucuti bwa hafi cane. Umwe mu bafatiwe ibihano n'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya ni Valery Zakharov yahoze akorera igisata kijejwe umutekano w'igihugu, yahoze kandi ari umuhanuzi wa Perezida Touadéra mu vyo umutekano. Nk'uko EU ibivuga, Zakharov ni "umutegetsi akomeye mu ntwazangabo z'umurwi Wagner kandi ko abandanya afitaniye ubucuti bwa hafi cane n'abategetsi b'Uburusiya". Wagner yagiye kumenyekana cane mu 2014, igihe yarwana ku ruhande rw'abashaka kwiyonkora bafashwe mu mugongo n'Uburusiya mu ntambara yo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Kuva ico gihe, uyo murwi warakoreye cane mu burasirazuba bwo hagati, co kimwe no muri Centrafrique hamwe no muri Afrika y'Ubumanuko. Uzwi ko uhabwa uburyo na Yevgeny Prigozhin, umurwizatunga afitaniye ubucuti na Perezida Vladimir Putin. Prigozhin abandanya ahakana ko ata bucuti na bumwe afitaniye na Wagner. Reta y'Uburusiya kandi irahakana ko reta yabwo ata ruhara ifise muri uyo murwi kandi ikabandanya ivuga ko amategeko y'igihugu atemera uyu murwi kubera imirwi ya gisirikare y'abikorera ku giti cabo itemewe n'amategeko mu Burusiya. Hampande ya Libya, ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya rivuga kandi ko abacangero ba Wagner bakorera muri Sudan na Mozambique. Muri Sudan, bazwi ko bafise uruhara mu kwigisha no gucungera abategetsi n'ibigo bicukurwamwo ubutare. Muri Mozambique, Wagner irafasha igisirikare kurwanya inyeshamba ziyitirira idini rya Islam mu buraruko bw'iki gihugu. Ubu bwa vuba, Mali, incuti ya kera y'ibihugu vyo mu Burengero bw'isi mu kurwanya abarwanyi biyitirira idini rya Islam mu karere ka Sahel, yaratangaje ko ishaka guha akazi abarwanyi ba Wagner bababa 1000 kugira bayifashe gucungera umutekano. Iyi ni ingingo yaje ikurikira itangazo ry'Ubufaransa bwavuga ko bwari bugiye kuvana igice c'ingabo zabwo muri ico gihugu zababa 5000. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zatangaje ko zitewe "impungenge" n'integuro yo kurungika abarwanyi ba Wagner muri Mali. Zavuze ko aba bacangero bashobora guhungabanya akarere mu gihe boramuka barungitsweyo. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire wa Mali, Abdoulaye Diop ,yavuze ko ingabo mpuzamakungu zarungitswe muri ico gihugu ataco zashitseko, ko rero igihugu categerezwa kuronderera ahandi. Irungikwa ry'ingabo za Wagner muri Mali ryibutsa benshi mu bihweza ibintu n'ibindi ingene uyu murwi watanguye gukorera muri Centrafrique.

column2: Indyane hagati ya Britney Spears na murumunawe zigeze kure, aho baryanira ku mbuga hwaniro
column3: Britney Spears na mushikiwe we Jamie Lynn bamaze imisi baterana amajambo biturutse ku kiganiro giheruka ku mboneshakure hamwe no ku mubano wabo wo muri kahise. Uyu muririmvyi yagiriza murumunawe ko yaciye ku kiganiro co ku wa gatatu mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe "akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga ko Jamie Lynn ata "kintu na kimwe yigeze akora" kandi umuryango "ukunda kunyononera no kumbabaza". Jamie Lynn avuga ko amajambo ya Britney ari "ibinyoma vyeruye" kandi ko igihe cose yamye hafi ya mukuruwe. Uyu mugore w'imyaka 30 avuga ko buri gihe yama ariko agerageza gusigurira abana biwe "igituma umuryango wacu ubandanya uterwa ubwoba bwo kwicwa, nk'ingaruka y'amajambo yandikwa na inasenge wabo yo kuwagiriza ibintu bidafashe, cane cane mu gihe tuzi ko yetegerezwa kuvugisha ukuri". Britney amaze igihe anegura umuryango wiwe ku kungene wamufashe mu myaka 13 wamaze ari wo ujejwe amatungo yiwe, igihe amafaranga n'ubuzima bwiwe vyari mu minwe ya se wa Jamie. Urubanza rwagiye kurangirira muri sentare mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Jamie Lynn Spears avuga iki? Uyu mutoyi wa Britney yatanze ikiganiro ku mboneshakure ABC mu kiganiro Good Morning America (twogereranya na Mwaramutse Amerika) mu ntango z'iyi ndwi turiko turangiza asigura igitabo ciwe Things I Should Have Said (mu kirundi twovuga tuti: Ivyo nategerezwa kuba navuze). Iki gitabo kivugwa ko gisigura ubuzima bwiwe, harimwo n'isanganya umukobwa wiwe yagize rigahakwa kumutwara ubuzima mu 2017, imigenderanire yiwe na Britney hamwe n'ikibanza yari afise mu kubungabunga umutungo w'uyu muririmvyi. Muri ico kiganiro, Jamie Lynn yiyise "umufasha wa mushikanje akomeye cane" hanyuma avuga ko "yafashe ingingo zo gufasha" guhagarika ivyo kumubikira umutungo. Ariko nk'uko bivugwa na ABC, yavuze ko inyifato ya Britney muri kahise "itari itomoye", "irangwa n'ubwoba butagira ishingiro"  kandi ko yari "mahindagu". Yabwiye iki kiganiro ati: "Igihe hafatwa ingingo yo kumubikira amatungo yiwe, jewe nari mfise imyaka 17, nari hafi yo kwibaruka, rero jewe sinatahura ivyariko biraba, kandi sinavyitaho". Jamie Lynn abandanya avuga ko mushikiwe yamwegereye akamusaba nimba "yoshobora kumukurikiranira abahungu biwe bakaronka ivyo bakeneye", ivyo yamwemereye. Abandanya ati: "Ariko, urazi ko maze kumenya ko abikiwe umutungo, numva umengo sinashaka kubigiramwo uruhara gushika kumbure aho azobiviramwo. Rero si jewe namucungira amafaranga yiwe canke ibintu nk'ivyo, rero nimba vyari bimeze uko harabaya ukutumvikana, ariko gusa uko vyoba vyaragenze kwose, nta ngingo nafashe yo kuvyinjiramwo". Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Britney yanditse ati: "Naravye muri terefone nca mbona ko mushikanje yatanze ico kiganiro mu kumenyekanisha igitabo ciwe. "Ibintu bibiri vyambabaje mushikanje yavuze ni ingene avuga ko inyifato yanje yari iy'ubutabanga. "Ntiyigeze aba hafi yanje mu myaka 15 iheze ico gihe... none mbega ni kubera iki twobizana atari uko ashaka kugurisha igitabo ciwe akoresheje izina ryanje". Britney avuga kandi ko akibabajwe n'ingene Jamie Lynn aherutse gusubiramwo indirimbo ziwe zamamaye. Uyu muririmvyi rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa pop w'imyaka 40 yanditse ati: "Ndazi ko abatari bake bashobora kuvyumva nk'ibitagira mvura, ariko nanditse indirimbo zanje nyinshi kandi mushikanje yari akiri uruhinja. Nta kintu na kimwe yari ashoboye gukora. Yama ahabwa ibintu vyose". "Namye ndi umuntu mukuru. Vyose barabikoze barankinisha, nkiyicarira aho hanyuma nkabifata uko". Yongerako ati: "Jamie Lynn, ndibaza ko ibintu ari vyiza n'igitabo cane". Jamie Lynn Spears nawe yahavuye yishura ku nyishu yatanzwe wa Britney, aho abwira abamukurikirana ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "N'ukuri, mvugishije ukuri, ibintu bivugwa nta kuri na gutoya kurimwo". Avuga ko igitabo ciwe kiterekeye Britney gusa, ariko akongerako ati: "Gusa sinohava mpakana ngo mvuge ko ntari mwene Spears, kandi ko bimwe mu vyo nzi mushikanje abifisemwo uruhara". Jamie Lynn, yamenyekanye canke mu rukurikirane rw'ibiganiro All That and Zoey 101 vy'imboneskakure Nickelodeon akaba yaranasohoye indirimbo yiwe, agaruka ku buzima bwiwe avuga ko bwabayemwo ibibazo bikomeye igihe kitari gito. Yandika ati: "Namye nkorana umwete udasanzwe kuva mbere nkiri umuyabaga, kandi narashoboye kwubaka umwuga wanje n'aho nitwa ko ndi mutoya wa mushikanje. "Si ndiko ndiyemera canke nishira hejuru, ariko ndiko mvuga ukuri kwanje kugira ngo nkire ibisebe mfise ku mutima, kugira ngo ibi bintu birangire hanyuma mbandanye nja imbere, kandi nipfuza ko na mushikanje yokora uko".

column2: Itegeko rya Sharia ni iki? Rivuze iki ku bagore bo muri Afghanistan?
column3: Aba Taliban bavuga ko bazotwara Afghanistan hisunzwe ata guhesha ingingo z'amategeko  ya Islam zizwi nk'itegeko rya Sharia. Uwo mugwi washikiriye intsinzi umaze gufata umugwa mukuru Kabul, gutyo urangaza  imyaka hafi 20 y'uruhara rw'ingabo mpuzamakungu zari zirongowe na Amerika uri ico gihugu. Hariko haba iki muri Afghanistan? Mu kiganiro ca mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma yo gufata Kabul, umuvugizi w'aba Taliban yavuze ko ibibazo bimwe bimwe nk'ivyerekeye ibinyamakuru n'uburenganzira bw'abagore bizokwubahirizwa hisunzwe "itegeko rya Islam", ariko uwo mugwi nturasigura ico ivyo bizoba bivuze mu ngiro canke mu bikorwa. Uwatsinzindiye agashimwe k'amahoro ka Nobel Malala Yousafzai - yarashwe n'aba Taliban afise imyaka 15 ahorwa guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakobwa bwo kuja mu mashure muri Pakistan - yagabishije ko ingene aba Taliban batahura itegeko rya Sharia bishbora kuba akaga ku bakobwa n'abagore muri Afganistan. Yabwiye BBC ati: " Nararonse akaryo ko kuvugana na bamwe mu baharanira uburenganzira muri Afghanistan, barimwo abo mu mashirahamwe y'abagore, nabo barafise ayo makenga ko batazi ico ubuzima bwabo bugiye kuba." "Benshi baribuka ivyariko biraba mu 1996-2001, gutyo bakaba bafise amakenga menshi ku mutekano wabo, uburenganzira bwabo, ugukingirwa [no] gusubira kuja mu mashure." Igijhe aba Taliban baheruka ku butegetsi  abagore ntibari bemerewe gukora akazi canke kuja mw'ishure. Kuva ku myaka umunani, abakobwa bategerezwa kwambara burka, abagore nabo bakaba bari barekuriwe kuja ahabona  ari uko baherekejwe n'umuntu w'umugabo wo mu muryango. Abagore babirenzeko barakubitwa abantu barorera. Ministre w'Ubwongereza ajejwe intwaro yo hagati Madame Priti Patel, avuga ku migambi ya reta yo kwakira impunzi 20.000 z'abanya-Afghanistan mu Bwongereza, yavuze ko atizeye ukwizeza kwatanzwe [n'aba Taliban]. Yabwiye BBC ko uwo mugwi ufise kahise ko gukandamiza abagore, kandi ko "ivyo bitagiye guhinduka buno nyene". Itegeko rya Sharia n'indinganzizo y'amategeko ya Islam. Riva muri Koran, inyandiko shingiro ya Islam, hamwe na fatwa - imanza ziba zaciwe n'inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam. Sharia ubundi risigura  "inzira igaragara, icamwo abantu benshi igana ku mazi". Itegeko rya Sharia rikora nk'igitabo c'ingingo zigenga ukubaho aba Islam bose bategerezwa kwisunga, harimwo amasengesho, kwisonzesha no gufasha abakene. Rigamije gufasha aba-Islam gutahura ingene bategerezwa kwigenza mu kintu icarico cose c'ubuzima bwabo hisunzwe ingene Imana ibishaka. Sharia rishobora guha insiguro icarico cose kijanye n'ubuzima bwa minsi yose  bw'umu-Islam. Nk'akarorero, nk'umu-Islam atazi neza ico yokora aronse ubutumire bw'abo bakorana kugira bajane mu kabare inyuma y'akazi  ashobora kuraba inzobere mu vyigwa vya Islam kugira amugire inama maze akore ibijanye n'amategeko y'idini ryabo. Ibindi bice vy'ubuzima bwa minsi yose aho aba-Islam bashobora kubaza inzobere ingene bovyifatamwo n'amategeko agenga umuryango, amafaranga hamwe n'imirimo y'ubugwizatunga. Sharia ishira ivyaha mu migwi mikuru mikuru ibiri: ivyaha vya ''hadd", biba ari ivyaha bikomeye cane bifise n'ibihano bizwi, hamwe n'ivyaja vya ''tazir'' aho igihano gishingwa n'umucamanza. Ivyaha vya ''hadd'' birimwo ukwiba, gushobora guhanishwa guca ikiganza c'uwagiriwe n'ico caha, hamwe n'ubusambanyi bw'abarenze ibigo, bushobora guhanishwa kwicishwa amabuye. Amwe mu mashirahamwe ya Islam avuga ko hari inzitizi  nyisnhi hamwe n'umurundo w'ivyemezo bikenerwa mw'ishirwa mu ngiro ry'ibihano vya hadd. Ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU ryariyamirije kwicisha  amabuye, rivuga ko ari ''iyica rubuzo canke ubundi buryo bwo gufata canke guhana umuntu  bunyamaswa, ata buntu, butesha agaciro ko rero bubujijwe". Si ibihugu vyose vya Islam bishira mu ngiro  ivyo bihano vya hadd  kandi amatohoza amaze kwerekana ko  aba-Islam babona mu buryo butandukanye cane  ibijanye n'ibihano ruhasha. Apostasy, canke uguta ukwemera, n'ikibazo kitavugwako rumwe cane mu ba-Islam kandi abahinga bavuga ko inzobere nyinshi mu vyigwa vya Islam zivuga ko ico caha gihanishwa urupfu. Ariko hari umugwi muto w'incabwenge z'aba Islam cane cane abakorana n'ibihugu vya Buraya, bavuga ko ukuri kw'isi ya none gusigura ko ''igihano'' gikwiye kurekerwa Imana - kandi ko Islam ubwayo itageramiwe n'uguta ukwemera. Na Koroan ubwayo ivuga ko ''ata guhata'' mu bijanye n'idini. Nko ku yandi mategeko yose, Sharia rirazitanye kandi kurishira mu ngiro bihagarara ahanini ku bwiza n'ubumenyi bw'abahinga. Abanyamategeko b'aba-Islam batanga intumbero n'ingingo bashinze. Intumbero ifatwa nk'urubanza rwaciwe yitwa fatwa. Hari amashure atanu  atandukanye y'itegeko rya Sharia. Hari inyigisho zine za Sunni: Hanbali, Maliki, Shafi'i na Hanafi, hamwe rero n'inyigisho imwe ya Shia, yitwa  Shia Jaafari. Izo nyigisho zitanu zitandukanye ku buryo   zisobanura, ijambo ku rindi, inyandiko itegeko rya Sharia rikomokako.

column2: Umunsi wahariwe isi: Umurundi Yves Kami mu bakoze indirimbo iwuhimbaza
column3: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Yves Kami ari mu bandi 200 bo hirya no hino kw'isi bahinyanyuye indirimbo Resolution Song, igamije guhimiriza abatuye isi kuyikingira. Itariki ya 22/04/2022 ni umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe kwita ku si dutuye mu gukingira ibidukikije, ukaba wahuriranye n'ishirwa ahabona icese ry'umugambi Resolution Project. Uwo mugambi ni uw'indirimbo yiswe Resolution Song yerekeye gukingira ibidukikije, yagomba kuririmbwa mu ndimi 200 zo hirya no hino kw'isi. Umugambi Resolution Project watangujwe n'ikigo Tackroom Theatre, gifadiganije n'ibigo bihinyanyura umuziki hamwe n'ivy'imbuga hwaniro birimwo Deccca Records, WWF International, Tik Tok, Acccenture n'abandi baririmvyi batandukanye bo kw'isi yose. Muri abo baririmvyi, harimwo Umurundi Yves Kami, akaba ari we yatowe mu Burundi ngo akore iyo ndirimbo ashizemwo ikirundi akanayiha umudiho w'ikirundi. Ku bw'ukwo gutoranywa, Kami yabwiye BBC ati: "Jewe ndi umu 'artiste' akora umudiho wisunze imidiho yo ngaha iwacu. Nkora afro ndayicanze n'ingoma nzo ngaha mu Burundi. "Burya ivyo umuntu aba ariko arakora barabikurikirana. Nagiye mbona umuntu andondeye, arambarira umugambi nanje numva neza ko ari umugambi mwiza. "... umuziki wacu tuwukoresha kugira [duhimirize] abantu [...] tuwukoresha kugira ngo ushobore gufasha [ikibano] tubayemwo." Umugambi Resolution Project watangujwe mu 2019 ku cicaro ca ONU, ukaba ushigikiwe na ba rurangiranwa ba Hollywood nka Emma Thomson, Naomi Harris, Keira Knightly, Marc Rylance na Bill Bailey. Intumbero yari uko itariki ya 22/04/2022 ishika izo ndirimbo zose 200 hamwe na video zazo vyamaze gushirwa ahabona bishobora kwumvirizwa. Izo ndirimbo zose zifise amajambo amwe hamwe n'injana (melodie) imwe, ariko buri muririmvyi akaza arashiramwo akiwe kajanye n'umuco wiwe. Kami avuga ko bitari vyoroshe guhindura mu kirundi indirimbo isanzwe iriho ngo ariko baroroherejwe. Yagize ati: "Cabaye igikorwa kitoroshe ariko baraduhaye umwidegemvyo wo gukora irya ndirimbo twisunze ama 'realites' yacu yo mu Burundi. "Nico gituma muri irya ndirimbo murumvamwo inanga y'ikirundi, murumvamwo ingoma, murumvamwo akazehe, murumvamwo umudiho w'amayaya." Urashobora kwumva ukanaraba amashusho y'indirimbo Resolution Song ya Yves Kami ngaha.
