column2: Africa-Ukraine: Ingaruka z'intambara ziguma zigaragaza uko bukeye uko bwije
column3: Gaz (umwuka)  yo gutekesha (Liquified Petroleum  Gas, LPG)  yaduze igiciro muri Kenya  gushika kuri 11 kw'ijana mu ndwi imwe gusa, mu gihe intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine iriko iragira ingaruka ku biciro v'ibitoro kw'isi. Ubu igiciro ca gaz yo gutekesha muri Kenya kimaze kuduga gushika kuri 50 kw'ijana mu kiringo c'umwaka, ubu kikaba congeye umuzigo ku banyagihugu bari bahanzwe  n'uburyo bwagabanutse kubera ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ubu igiciro co kwuzuza icupa rya gaz ry'ibiro 13 ciyongeyeko 11 kw'ijana muri iyi ndwi n'ukuvuga ko bica bisaba amafaranga angana n'ama dorari ($) 29.30 (hafi 60.000 mu marundi canke 30.000 mu manyarwanda) rivuye ku ma dorari 26.26 ku ndwi iheze. Ubu icupa ry'ibiro 6 ryuzuzwa kuri $13.68 kare ryari kuri $12.43. Ni  ikimenyetso ko ibihe biri imbere bitagiye kworoha ku bantu b'uburyo bubayabaye basanzwe bari bahanzwe n'ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya vyaduze cane. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bikomoka ku bitoro  nka essence, amazutu na kerosene, muri Kenya ibiciro vya gaz yo gutekesha ntibishingwa na reta, bisigura ko abaguzi baca bahura n'ingaruka uko ibiciro bihindutse kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Kuri uyu wa mbere igiciro c'ibitoro bitayunguruye caduze gushika ku $140 ku kagunguru (barril)  kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biramaze kuduza ibiciro vy'ibitoro. Mu Rwanda havugwa kuduga kw'igiciro c'ibitoro... No mu Rwanda kuva kuri uyu wa mungu hari ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro. Mazutu yavuye kuri 1.140Frw ija kuri 1.201Frw, essence iva kuri 1.225Frw ija kuri 1.256Frw. Itangazo ry'ubuyobozi bubijejwe rivuga ko n'aho ryirinze kuduza igiciro uko vyategerezwa kugenda kugirango ibiciro  muri rusangi ntibice biduga cane ngo vyonone umurindi wo kwivyukiranya ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko  ibintu bishobora kwunyuka hamwe ihererekanywa ry'ivyo bitoro ryohungabana. Rolake  Akingube-Filani wo muri  Africa Energy Chamber avuga ati: "Amaherezo ingaruka zizova i Buraya zishike muri Afrika  aho ibiciro bishobora kuduga kurusha aho bigeze ubu." Yongerako ati: "Dukeneye kurondera uburyo bwo kwikwiza ku bitoro muri Afrika. Aho niho dushobora kwihagararako habaye ihungrana nk'iryo muri kazoza."

column2: Qatar 2022-Brezili Vs Croatia: 'Uzoba umubabaro w’igihe kirekire’
column3: Ntivyategerezwa kurangira uko vyarangiye. Brezili yarakinye, iragenda gushika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma (1/4) muri rino higanwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, ariko rero indoto z’uko yari igiye kwerekana ubuhinga budasanzwe gushika muri finale zaraye zirangiye mu marira mu kibuga Education City Stadium. Croatia yarakweze Brezili buke buke gushika muri wa mwanya w’ama-penalties kugira ngo iyizimirize ibizigizigi vyayo vy’igikombe kigira gatandatu, igihugu co ku mugabane wa Bulaya kikaba caraye gisubiye kuyitembagaza mu kuyikura mw’ihiganwa. Igihe Neymar yinjiza igitsindo muri wa mwanya w’inyogera, igitsindo catumye anganya ibitsindo na ca gihangange Pele mu murwi nserukiragihugu ku ruhande rw’abagabo, vyaboneka ko yagomba abe intwari ariko yagiye kuva mu kibuga arira, muri uru rukino rushobora kuba ari rwo rwa nyuma kuri we mu gikombe c’isi yose. Inyuma y’urukino, vyaremejwe ko umumenyereza Tite agiye gutanga imihoho, uyu mugabo w’imyaka 61 akaba yarananiwe no guha igihugu irindi teka ryokwiyongereye ku ryo yagiteye mu 2019 mu gutsindira Copa Amerika, ihiganwa ry’igikombe ca Amerika y’Epfo, mu gihe Neymar nawe yavuze ko ashobora gukukuruka mu nkino mpuzamakungu. Bamaze gutsindwa, Tite  yavuze ati: "Mu vy’ukuri biragoye cane. Ariko ni iherezo ryanje mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Brezili. Narabivuze haraciye umwaka n’inusu”. Umuhinga mu bijanye n’umupira w’amaguru muri Amerika y’Epfo Tim Vickery yavugiye kw’iradiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Uru ni urupfu mu muryango. "Niko bigiye kugendera abafana ba Brezili mu masaha ari imbere. Croatia irashize mu kigandaro iki gihangange mu mupira w’amaguru. Ni ukuri iki kizotera umubabaro w’igihe kirekire . "Ndizeye ko abantu batazobatako ishavu. Abanyabrezili barashobora kurakara. Ariko ndizeye ko ata ngaruka mbi iza kuba kuko si yo mpembo uyu murwi ukwiriye”. Iminota 90 ya mbere yari iryoheye ijisho, ariko impande zompi vyaranse ko zitsindana, biba ngombwa ko baja muri wa mwanya w’inyongera (prolongation/Extra time). Croatia imaze gushika aho incuro umunani mu nkino icenda yakinye muri ca gice co gukuranamwo mu nkino nkuru nkuru. Neymar yibajije ko yari agarukiye igihugu ciwe mu gihe nyaco cari kimukeneye cane, maze yinjiza igitsindo ku mupira bari bagiye bahererekanya n’ubuhinga bwinshi. Igitsindo yinjije ku munota wa 106 cagize 77 atsindiye igihugu ciwe, gutyo aba anganije n’igihangange Pele nk’uko ibiharuro vya FIFA bivyerekana. Ariko Bruno Petkovic yarakigomboye inyuma y’iminota ine gusa – mbere ukaba ari wo mupira wonyene Croatia yateye mw’igori (ikizwi nka tir cadre/shot on target) – cayigaruriye amahirwe yo kubandanya, iritwara neza ishobora gushika muri wa mwanya w’ama-penalties. Abakeba ni bo batamvye baratarika mu gihe Neymar wewe vyanse ko yigumya mu kibuga, ararira, arihanagura, biranka! Ni we yari gutera iya gatanu ariko ntivyakunze inyuma y’aho Marquinhos atereye iya kane ikagwa ku nkingi y’igori, biba birarangiye. Si ryo herezo rya mbere riteye agahinda kuri we. Mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ryabereye mu gihugu ciwe mu 2014, Neymar yarirangije n’imvune mu mugongo, ubu hakaba haciye imyaka ine bakubiswe n’Ububirigi bageze aho nyene. Mu rukino rwa nijoro, yabaye umwe mu bakinyi bavuye mu kibuga ubwa nyuma, abafana ba Brezili bicaye mu kibuga badatahura ivyari bihejeje kuba, ivyizigiro bari bafise muri Qatar bigeye akagirire. Tite ati: "Neymar yari kuba uwa gatanu kuko iyi niyo ikomeye. "Umutima ntuba uri hamwe na gato, gusa abakinyi baba biteguye iyo bazi ko ari bo batera penalty ya nyuma”. Ariko uwahoze ari umusatirizi w’Ubudagi Jurgen Klinsmann ntavyemera, aho ku mboneshakure BBC One ati: "Iyaba jewe ni we yari gutera penalty ya mbere. Ni co gihe uba umukeneye kugira ngo ahumurize imitima”. Urugendo rwa Brezili mu gikombe c’isi yose rwaraye rusubiriye guhagarikwa n’igihugu c’Ubulaya ku ncuro ya gatandatu yikurikiranya, igihe ca nyuma iheruka gutsinda igihugu co kuri uno mugabane hakaba hari mu 2002 itsinze Ubudagi muri finale. Uwo mwaka kandi ni ho iherukira gutwara igikombe c’isi yose,  ica nyuma muri bitanu ifise, hakaba haciye imyaka 20 kuva igihugu atari ico ku mugabane wa Bulaya gitwaye iki gikombe. Ibi biharuro si vyiza kuri Brezili. Iki gihugu co muri Amerika y’ubumanuko gitangura cikwega, kikaba mbere carananiwe no kwinjiza mu gice ca mbere c’urukino mu nkino zaco indwi ziheze muri iri higanwa. Iyo Vinicius Junior canke Neymar bagakoresha amahirwe bagiye baronka mu gihe ca mbere, vyari kuba ibindi bindi. Uyu murwi wa Tite wabaye kandi umurwi wa mbere muri kahise k’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose ukuriwe mw’ihiganwa mu gice co gukuranamwo mu gihe ari wo watanguye kwinjiza ica mbere muri wa mwanya w’inyongera. Hagati aho, igihe igihugu kiza mu kibanza ca mbere kw’isi giherukira mu nkino z’igice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma ni mu 1998, ikaba yari Brezili nyene. Tite ati: "Si jewe jenyene ntakaje, ni umurwi wose. Twagerageje gukoresha amahirwe yose twaronse ariko biranka. Twayarwijije  - twaronse amahirwe 19 dutera mw’igori 11. Bobo nta na rimwe bari bwaronke akaryo na kamwe ko gutera mw’igori. "Ndatahura ko ari jewe wa mbere vyavuyeko, ariko ugutsindwa kwacu kwatuvuyeko twese. Ni umupira w’amaguru nta kundi. Igihe kimwe uratsinda, ikindi gihe ugatsindwa”. Umukuru w’igihugu wa Brezili aherutse gutorwa, Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Brezili yarakoze cane. Neymar yinjije igitsindo ciza cane kandi abakinyi bategerezwa kubishimirwa. Ndahereza icubahiro canje abakinyi n’umumenyereza. "Reka tubandanye urugendo kuko mu buzima nta gucika intege”. Urubuga ngurukanabumenyi rwo muri Brezili Globo Esporte rwanditse inkuru y’umubabaro “y’irangira ry’indoto”. Inkuru kuri tite, abakinyi biwe n’abafana bose ba Brezili ikaba igarukiye aho.

column2: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ku rutonde rwa Forbes
column3: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ari ku rutonde rw'ikinyamakuru co muri Amerika, gitanga udushimwe, Forbes. Ni urutonde rw'abagore 8 ba mbere muri Afrika, baranzwe n'ibikorwa bihindura ubuzima bw'abandi cane cane abari mu bibazo bakeneye gufashwa. Isabelle Kamariza yashimwe kubera ikigo ciwe 'SolidAfrica', kigemurira abarwayi badashobora kwifungurira mu bitaro bine mu Rwanda. Yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera, atangura amubaza uko yakiriye ako gashimwe (umviriza aho hejuru).

column2: Abaganga b'abanyamahanga 'bavunishwa akazi' bafitiye impungenge abarwayi mu Bwongereza
column3: Paul Kenyon & Anna Meisel File on 4 & Newsnight Abanganga barondewe bava mu bihugu bimwe bimwe bikenye cane kw’isi kugira baje gukora mu bitaro vyo mu Bwongereza  bavuga ko bakoreshwa vy’umurengera – kandi bakemeza ko bakoreshwa amasaha menshi cane ku buryo bafise ubwoba bwo gushira mu kaga amagara y’abarwayi. Amatohoza ya BBC yaronse ivyemeza ko abaganga baturuka muri Nigeria bahabwa akazi na kompanyi y’ubuvuzi yo mu Bwongereza aho baba bitezwe gukora mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu buryo butemewe mu gisata c’igihugu citaho amagara y’abantu, National Health Service, NHS. Ishirahamwe ry’abaganga mu Bwongereza (British Medical Association, BMA) rivuga ko ivyo bintu “bishegeshe” kandi ko ico gisata gitegerezwa gushirwa ku murongo w’ingene akazi gakorwa muri NHS. BBC yavuganye n’abaganga benshi – harimwo umuganga w’umunya-Nigeria akiri muto yakoze mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu bitaro vya  Nuffield Health Leeds mu 2021. Augustine Enekwechi avuga ko amasaha yiwe y’akazi yari menshi birengeje -izamu ry’amasaha 24 ku  munsi indwi yose ata munsi uciyemwo - kandi ko atashobora kuva mu kigo c’ibitaro. Avuga ko gukora aho hantu yumva ari nko kuba ari “mu munyororo”. Uburuhe bwari bwinshi cane, ku buryo avuga ko hari igihe yumva ubwoba ko adashora kurangura imirimo neza. Avuga ati : “Nari nzi ko gukora urushe  bituma abarwayi  bashobora kugira ivyago kandi ko nanje bishobora kunshira mu vyago, bigashobora no gukwega imanza. “Numva ntafise uko nogira …ataco nshoboye, urumva, umwitwarariko wa buri igihe no kuguma nibaza ko hari igishobora kwononekara.” Komanyi Nuffield Health irahakana ivy'ayo masaha y’umurengera, ikavuga ko abaganga bayo buri igihe bahabwa umwanya w’akaruhuko, iminsi yo kuruhuka hagati y’ibiringo vy’akazi, hamwe no gushobora kuguza ibiringo vy’akazi iyo bikenewe. Iyo kompanyi yongerako ko “amagara n’ukubaho neza kw’abarwayi n’abakozi b’ibitaro” arivyo bishirwa imbere. Augustine yarungitswe gukora mu bitaro Nuffield Health Leeds na kompanyi yigenga – NES Healthcare. Iyo kompanyi isanzwe ikoresh abaganga bava mu bindi bihugu, benshi baturuka muri Nigeria, bakabakoresha nk’abaganga bariko barimenyereza akazi ( Resident Medical Officers, RMOs)  – akenshi usanga mu bitaro vy’abigenga. Augustine avuga ko yari ashashaye cane kuronka ako kazi ku buryo atanaravye ibiri mu masezerano yiwe y’akazi. Mu vy’ukuri ayo masezerano yamukura mu mategeko asanzwe akingira abakozi bo mu Bwongereza ku masaha y’akazi y’umurengera -ico bita Working Time Directive – kandi agatuma asanga hari amahera menshi yokatwa ku mushashara nk’igihano. Augustine siwe wenyene, haba na gato. BMA n’ishirahamwe riza imbere mu kubavugira, Doctors’ Association,  yemereye ibiganiro File on 4 na Newsnight vya BBC kuraba ivyavuye mu nyishu zatanzwe n’abaganga b’aba RMOs 188 bakozweko amatohoza. Benshi mu baganga bakoreshwa na NES ariko hari bamwe bamwe bakoreshwa n’ibindi bigo. Vyagaragaye ko 92% muri abo baganga bari barondewe muri Afrika  kandi benshi -81% - bava muri Nigeria. Ubwiganze bwabo bidogera amasaha y’akazi y’umurengera hamwe no gukatwa amafaranga mu buryo babona ko baba barenganijwe. Haheze imyaka myinshi ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw’isi (OMS) rigabishije ku kuronderera cane abaganga n’abaforoma  mu bihugu biri mu nzira y’amajambere aho abakizi bo kwa muganga basanzwe ari bake cane. OMS yakoze urutonde rw’ibihugu nk’ivyo 47- vyinshi muri ivyo bikaba biri muri Afrika. Reta y’Ubwongereza urwo rutonde yarushize mu  gitabo c’ivyo yisunga mu gukora- irwita “urutonde rutukura”. Ubu Nigeria reta y’Ubwongereza yayigize igihugu atari ico kuja kurondereramwo abakozi bo kwa muganga. None ubwa mbere ho abo baganga vyagenze gute ngo baje gukora mu Bwongereza? Twarashitse muri Nigeria turabona urundi ruhande rw’iyo nkuru. Mu  ntangaro nini yo gukoreramwo ibibazo i Lagos, igisagara ca mbere kinini muri ico gihugu, twasanze umurongo w’abanganga amajana batonze ngo bakore ikibazo citwa ico gusuzuma ubumenyi  bw’umwuga n’ururimi (Professional and Linguistic Assessments Board)  canke PLAB 1. Ico kibazo gitegurwa n’inama y’ubuganganga i Londres  (General Medical Council, GMC) kandi akaba ariyo ntambwe ya mbere isabwa n’abategetsi bajejwe ivy’amagara mu Bwongereza kugira umuntu aronke uruhusha rwo gukora akazi mu Bwongereza. Abanganga twavuganye bavuga ko bahurumbira imishahara yisumbuye n’uburyo bwo gukoreramwo bwiza kurusha. Ikoreshwa ry’ico kibazo ryari ricungerewe n’abakozi mu mu buserukizi bw’Ubwongereza (British Council)- bwegukira ubushikiranganji bw’Ubwongereza bujejwe imigenderanire. GMC iratanga ico kibazo kandi mu bindi bihugu vyinshi biri ku rutonde rutukura -Ghana, Sudan, Pakistan na Bangladesh. Yaba GMC yaba n’ubuserukizi bw’Ubwongereza birahakaba kuba bigira uruhara rweruye mw’ironderwa ry’abakozi  bikavuga ko vyo ico bikora ari ugufasha kurondera ibikenewe abaganga bashaka kuja mu Bwongereza ku giti cabo – ivyo navyo bikaba vyemewe n’ingingo ngenderwako. Ku bijanye na Augustine, yariko arigira igice ca kabiri c’ivyo bibazo vya PLAB mu Bwongereza, ari naho NES yamurondera hanyuma ikamwemerera kumufasha kuronka uruhusha rwo kuba mu Bwongereza  n’ugushobora kuronka akazi. Mu gihe ivyo bidasa no kurondera umukozi vyeruye -NES ivuga ko atavyo yakoze, kuko idasanzwe ari ikigo kirondera abakozi kandi,  uko biri, ivugana n’abaganga bava mu bihugu vyo hanze, baba basanzwe bariko barangurira umwuga mu Bwongereza. Ariko igisata c’amagara y’abantu no kwitaho imibereho y’abantu batubwiye ko igitabo cabo c’ingingo ngenderwako gikora no kuri NES, ko rero ico kigo caciye kubiri naco. Twavuganye n’abaganga benshi b’abanya-Afrika barondewe muri iyi nzira  na NES.  Bose bari bafise inkuru zisa ku bijanye n’ico amasezerano yabo y’akazi avuga mu vy’ukuri, iyo bamaze kurungikwa gukorera mu bitaro vy’abigenga mu Bwongereza. .  Muganga Femi Johnson yarungitswe mu bindi bitaro bitari ivyo Augustine yarungitswemwo, ariko nawe nyene avuga ko yategerezwa gukora amasaha ari hagati ya 14 na 16 ku munsi kandi agaca arara izamu. Avuga ati: “Narananirwa cane. Narakenera kuryama. Nta muntu ashobora gukora gutyo iminsi yose indwi yose.” Ariko, akeneye kuruhuka kuko yaba yarushe cane ku buryo adashobora kubandanya akora, NES yari ifise uburenganzira bwo kumukata amafaranga ku mushara wiwe. Iyo kompanyi ivuga ko ayo mafaranga ari ayo kurondera umuganga amusubirira, ariko Femi avuga ko bituma abaganga ba NES babura ayo bacira n’ayo bamira. “Mu bihe nk’ivyo, nama nca nivugana imbere muri jewe – ‘Femi ubwo uriko urigirira neza wewe ubwawe kandi uriko uragirira neza umuryayi?’ “Aho bibabarije, n’uko bitama binshobokera kuronka inyishu kuri ico kibazo.” Bamwe mu baganga ba NES bararonse ubufasha bwa Muganga Jenny Vaughan wo mw’ishirahamwe Doctors’ Association. Aronka imyidogo myinshi y’aba RMO kandi avuga ko urwego rwa reta rw’amagara y’abantu rufise ingingo ngenderwako zibiri zitandukanye -imwe y’abanga ba NHS, n’iyindi y’abavuye mu bindi bihugu bakorera ibigo vyigenga. Abaganga ba NHS bakoreshwa amasaha atarenga 48, canke naho babisavye, amasaha 72 ku ndwi. Dr Vaughan avuga ati: “Nta muganga wo muri NHS akoreshwa amajoro ane akurikirana kuko turazi vy’ukuri ko atari vyiza. “Ivyo  n’akazi kameze nk’ako abaja (abacakara) …amasaha y’umurengera, ibintu twagira ngo bimaze imyaka 30 bitakibaho. “Ntawovyemera ku mutekano w’abarwayi. Ntawovyemera ku baganga.” Ivyo twatoye twarabijanye muri BMA – no  ku cegera c’umukuru wayo, Emma Runswick. Yatubwiye ko ivyo bintu ari akamaramaza ku “buvuzi bw’Ubwongereza”. “Bagenzi bacu bavuye mu bindi bihugu baciye kure kugira bashike ngaha hanyuma basanga uburyo bakoreshwamwo atawokwibaza ko bwobayeho.” NES Healthcare yo yatubwiye ko “ingene  abaganga bavuga”  ku gukorana n’iyo kompanyi “ari vyiza cane”. Ivuga ko ifasha abaganga kuronka “inzira nziza yo kubandanya umwuga baba bahisemwo muri NHS  no mu gisata c’ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza muri rusangi, kandi ko igikorwa cabo ari “ngirakamaro cane ku bantu bo mu Bwongereza.”

column2: Burundi: leta itangaza ko hari abandi 21 banduye Covid-19
column3: Leta y'Uburundi itangaza ko hari abandi barwari 21 bashasha banduye wa mugera karanda wa coronavirus. Mwitangazo ryasohowe nijoro n'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, abo 21 batowe mu bantu 202 biketswe ko banduye bapimwe hagati yo ku wa 27 gushika ku wa 30 z'ukwezi guheze kwa gatandatu. Iryo tangazo rimenyesha ko mu barwayi 54 bari basanzwe bariko baravurwa, batatu muri bo ari bo bapimwe bagasanga nta migera bagisigaranye. Umukuru w'igihugu aherutse gutangaza ko agiye kwitwararika gusumba kurwanya iki kiza, akaba mbere yaranatangaje ingingo zitandukanye mu ntumbero yo guhangana naco. Gushika ubu, ibiharuro vyerekana ko abantu 191 aribo bamaze kwandura uwo mugera; muri abo 118 bakaba bamaze gukira, nayo 72 bakaba ari bo bakirwaye, umwe akaba yaritavye Imana. Ubushikiranganji bubandanya busaba abanyagihugu gukurikiza ingingo zo kuzibira kwandura canke kwandura, izo nazo zikaba zirimwo gukaraba n'amazi meza n'isabuni canke arimwo umuti wica imigera. Ubwo bushikiranganji busaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kuramukanya no guhoberana, kwirinda kwasamurira mu bandi, kwambara udupfukamunwa ku bavuzi, abarwaye covird-19 n'abamaranye umwanya b'abarwaye. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu ata mategeko ruhasha vyafashe agamije kurwanya ikiza coronavirus, bikaba mbere vyaratumye bwiyamirizwa henshi mu makungu. Hagati aho, umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye aherutse kumenyesha ko atanguje urugamba rwo kurwanya ico kiza karanda. Mw'ijambo aherutse gushikiriza inama nshingamateka ku musi wo kuzahiza leta nshasha ku wa 30/06/2020, Perezida Ndayishimiye yatangaje ingingo zitari nke mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ico kiza. Yagize ati: "Turasavye umurundi wese, hamwe n'umunyamahanga ari muri iki gihugu guhaguruka kuko akatavuga ntigahenda akavuga". KLeta y'u Burundi iherutse kwirukana abaserukiye ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS biturutse ku kutabona kumwe ikibazo ca coronavirus. Hari n'abavuga ko leta yoba inyegeza ibitigiri nyavyo vy'abanduye uwo mugera, ivyo abategetsi b'u Burundi bamirira kure.

column2: Ethiopia: Umusigiti wa mbere muri Africa, al-Nejashi, wasambuye n'ibibombe muri Tigray
column3: Reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gusanura umusigiti wa kera cane wasambuwe mu kwezi guheze mu ntambara ya Tigray mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu. Umusigiti wa al-Nejashi uvugwa ko watewe ibibombe, ivyari muri wo biranyagwa, eka mbere n'imva z'abategetsi b'idini rya Isilamu bo muri kahise zirononekara. Reta ivuga ko n'urusengero rwasambuwe muri ico gihe c'intambara na rwo nyene ruzosanurwa. Abanyagihugu baba muri ako karere bazi ko umugisiti wa al-Nejashi wubatswe n'Aba-Isilamu ba mbere bimukiye muri Afrika mu gihe c'Intumwa Muhammad. Bari bahunze amabi bariko barakorerwa i Makka baca bahabwa ubuhungiro mu cahoze ari ubwami bwa Aksum. Aba-Isilamu bo muri ako karere bazi ko abasangirangendo 15 b'Intumwa Muhammad bahambwe muri izova zasambuwe . Bazi kandi  ko uwo musigiti ari wo wa mbere watanguye kwubakwa muri Afrika, n'aho hari abandi bavuga ko uwa mbere wubatswe muri Afrika uri muri Misiri. Uwo musigiti uri mu gisagara ca Wukro kiri ku birometero hafi 800 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa. Urusengero Emanueli Mweranda (Saint Emmanuel) rw'Abakristu b'idini rya Orthodoxe na rwo nyene rwarasambuwe ariko nta nsiguro zatanzwe. Mu mwaka wa 2015 hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Turukiya ryatanguje ibikorwa vyo gusanura uwo musigiti, rivuga ko ryashaka "kubungabunga uwo mutungo wo muri kahise", rigahindura ako karere kugira ngo gashobore kwirukirwa n'ingenzi. Uwu musigiti hamwe n'urusengero rwari hafi yawo vyasambuye mu bitero vya gisirikare vyamaze ukwezi kumwe  bifise intumbero yo kwomora ubutegetsi bw'umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) wari urongoye akarere ka Tigray. Ishirahamwe ryigenga ry'Ububirigi rikorera muri Afrika rivuga ko ku wa 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uwo musigiti wa al-Nejashi "wabanje guterwa ibombe mu nyuma unyagwa urukombamazi n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia na Eritrea". Iryo shirahamwe rivuga kandi ko ibinyamakuru vya Tigray vyatangaje ko abantu batari bake bishwe bariko bagerageza gukingira uwo musigiti. Reta ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo vyegeranyo vy'iryo shirahamwe. Ariko, reta za Ethiopia na Eritrea zompi zirahakana ko hari abasirikare ba  Eritrea bari muri Tigray gufasha mu ntambara yo kurwanya TPLF. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC igisata ca Amharic, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe gukingira umurage wo muri kahise, Abebaw Ayalew, yavuze ko ko komite idasanzwe izoshikanwa muri ako karere kugira ngo yige ingene uwo musigiti n'urwo rusengero vyasambuwe imbere y'uko ibikorwa vyo gusanura bitangura. Ati: "Ubu burere ntibuzwi gusa ku bijanye n'ugusenga, ariko kandi ni umutungo wo muri kahise kuri Ethiopia yose". Mu ntango z'ukw'icumi na rimwe, intambara yaradutse mu karere ka Tigray igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, yagomora ingabo mu ntumbero yo gutuza abarwanyi ba TPLF. Hari haciye amezi atari make hari ukutumvikana hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe wari urongoye Tigray.

column2: "Ndimbati" wo muri "PAPA SAVA" ari gufasha abatishoboye mu bihe bya coronavirus mu Rwanda
column3: Benshi bamuzi kw'izina ryiwe ry'umunyatugenegene mu gutwenza ari ryo Ndimbati, bakamuraba mu gakino gaca kuri YouTube kitwa Papa sava. Uwo ni Uwihoreye Jean Bosco Mustafa. Mustafa rero canke Ndimbati, yatanguje igikorwa co kugarukira ku bakozweko n'ingamba zo kurwanya ikiza ca coronavirus mu Rwanda, zirimwo kubwiriza abantu kuguma muhira mu kwirinda kwanduzanya. Benshi mu bari batunzwe n'ubuzi bw'umunsi ku munsi, kuronka ivyo kurya gisigaye ari ikibazo, kiretse baronse uwubafasha. Robert Patrick Misigaro yavuganye na Uwihoreye Jean Bosco Musfata, azwi kandi nka Ndimbati, amubaza aho yakuye iciyumviro co gufasha muri ubwo buryo (umviriza ico kiganiro aho hejuru).

column2: Abanduye coronavirus muri Afrika y’Epfo barenze igice c’umuliyoni
column3: Abantu barenga igice c'umuliyoni nibo bamaze kumenyekana k banduye wa mugera coronavirus muri Afrika y'Epfo, nk'uko umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'ico gihugu abivuga. Zwelini Mkhize amenyesha ko ejo ku wa gatandatu abantu bashasha10.107 ari banduye, igitigiri cashikanye abantu 503.290 bamaze kwandura, nayo 8.153 bakaba bamaze guhitanwa nawo. Afrika y'Epfo nico gihugu ca mbere gisinzikajwe n'uwu mugera muri Afrika yose, igice c'abamaze kwandura ku mugabane wose bakaba ari abo muri ico gihugu. Kw'isi yose kigira gatanu mu bihugu bifise abarwayi benshi b'iyo ndwara inyuma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Brezili, Uburusiya hamwe n'Ubuhindi. Abihweza ibintu n'ibindi babona ko ibitigiri vy'abahitanywe n'uwu mugera bishobora kuba birengeye kure ibitangazwa. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Afrika y'Epfo bagabisha ko ibitigiri vy'abandura bigenda vyiyongera ku murindi uteye ubbwoba, abenshi muri bo bakaba baba ku mugwa mukuru Pretoria. Ica gatatu c'abamaze kwandura bose hamwe bari mu ntara ya Gauteng, intara bukiriro bw'ubutunzi bwa Afrika y'Epfo, ikaba ari nayo ntara yabaye iyinjiriro ry'uwo mugera mu gihugu cose. Hagati aho, hari icizere ko ibiharuro bishobora kutaduga ku rugero runini mu kwezi kuri imbere. Leta ya Afrika y'Epfo yarafashe ingingo ruhasha za guma mu rugo mu kwa kane n'ukwa gatanu, ivyatumye umurindi w'ikwirakwira ugabanuka. Mu kwa gatandatu, yaciye itangura gutezura izo ngingo, ariko mu kwezi guheze hari izasubiye gushirwa mu ngiro, harimwo niyo kubuza kudandaza inzoga, kubera ibitigiri vyasubiye gufata umurindi udasanzwe. Harafashwe kandi n'ingingo zisa n'izo igihugu kiri mu ntambara, zikazobandanya gushika ku wa 15 z'uku kw'umunani. Ubwinshi bw'abandura bwatumye ibitaro vya Afrika y'Epfo birengerwa. Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa w'ico gihugu mu kwezi guheze yatangaje ko ibitaro vyaronkejwe ibitanda 28.000 kugira bishobore kwakira abandura Covid-19, ariko ico gihugu kikaba kigihanganye n'ikibazo c'ikena ry'abaganga n'abaforoma. Mu ndwi iheze, ishami ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ryaragabishije ko ibiriko biba muri Afrika y'Epfo bishobora kuba biriko vyerekana ibishobora gushika mu bindi bice vy'umugabane wa Afrika.

column2: Umushikiranganji w’ikigega wa Afrika y’Epfo asaba ko urucuruza rw’urumogi rwemerwa n’amategeko
column3: Umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca leta ya Afrika y'Epfo,  Tito Mboweni, asaba leta y'ico gihugu ko urucuruza rw'urumogi rwemerwa n'amategeko kugira ngo amakori yiyongere. Yatangaje ivyo aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, aho yamenyesheje ko ico kibazo azogishikiriza mu nama y'abashikiranganji. Kuri urwo rubuga rwiwe, yashizeko n'isanamu yerekana ingene ico giterwa gitera gikura. Amategeko ya Afrika y'Epfo yari asanzwe avuga ko ukugurisha urumogi, uko rwoba rungana kwose biteye kubiri n'amategeko. Hagati aho, mu mwaka wa 2017, ico gihugu caremereye abantu gukoresha urumogi mu mihana iwabo, ariko nticarekuye kururima canke kurugurisha. Mu bihugu vyinshi vya Afrika, harimwo n'u Burundi n'u Rwanda, kurima, gukoresha canke kudandaza urumogi ntivyemewe n'amategeko kubera rufatwa nk'ikiyayuramutwe. Hagati aho, hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe birukoresha ku rugero runini. Muri ivyo harimwo igihugu ca Lesotho gisanzwe gikikujwe na Afrika y'Epfo, aho urumogi rurimwa ku rugero runini cane, rukaba rwemewe mu vyo ubuvuzi gusa. Mu myaka ya 2000, amakuru yavuga ko ibice 70% vy'urumogi rwagurishwa muri Afrika y'Epfo rwava muri ico gihugu ca Lesotho. Abarimyi bo mu gihugu ca Lesotho basanzwe barima urumogi mu ntumbero yo kurukoresha mu mihana iwabo, hamwe no kurugurisha hanze kubera ubukene basanzwe babamwo. Usanga abanyagihugu bato bato barima urumogi bakarurimana n'ibindi biterwa nk'ibigori kugira ngo barushore muri Afrika y'Epfo. Igihugu ca Zimbabwe naco nyene giherutse kwemera ko urumogi rushobora kurimwa rukimburwa muri ico gihugu, ni inyuma y'aho cemereye ikoreshwa ryarwo muvyo ubuvuzi n'ubushakashatsi mu 2018. Zambia yoyo iherutse gutangaza ko ubu vyemewe n'amategeko gutunganya urumogi no kururungika mu mahanga ku mpamvu z'urudandaza n'ubuvuzi. Leya y'ico gihugu yafashe ico cemezo mu nama yayo yabaye ku wa 04 z'ukwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze nk'uko vyatangajwe na Dora Siliya avugira leta. Ikindi gihugu gikoresha urumogi ku rugero runini cane ni Korea y'Uburaruko, aho mbere n'amashirahamwe ya reta aja kurugurisha mu bindi bihugu kugira baronke amahera y'agaciro. Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bitazwi neza ko hoba hariho amategeko abuza ikoreshwa ry'urumogi, kandi ico gihugu ntikibona ko ikoreshwa ry'urumogi ari ukurenga ku mategeko.

column2: Uganda: Amadini n’abayoboke abangamye kandi abangamiwe
column3: “Hari n’abica ku bwa Christ (Kristu)”, ni bimwe biri muri iri tohoza rya BBC Africa Eye. Peter MacJob agaragaza uturorero muri Uganda, aho n’abakiri bato bakoreshwa n’aba ‘pastors’ (abapasitori) bo mu madini atandukanye, n’abantu bakahasiga ubuzima.

column2: North Korea yagirizwa kwiba ubuhinga bwo gukora urucanco rwa Pfizer rwa Covid-19
column3: Abajejwe igendereza muri Koreya y'Ubumanuko bavuga ko Korea y'Uburaruko yagerageje kwiba ubuhinga bwo gukora urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwakozwe n'ikompanyi ya Amerika ikora imiti Pfizer. Gusa gushika ubu ntibiratomoreka neza urugero yoba yari imaze gushikako mu kwiba ubwo buhinga. Ikinyamakuru Yonhap gitangaza ko igisata kijejwe igendereza ca  Koreya y'Ubumanuko cashikirije ico kibazo abashingamateka. BBC yashatse kumenya ico Pfizer ivuga kuri ubu busuma ariko ntirishura. Koreya y'Uburaruko ivuga ko ata munyagihugu n'umwe wayo arigera yandura coronavirus. Hagati aho, iki gihugu citeze kuronswa incanco zingana na miriyoni zibiri z'urucanco rwa AstraZeneca-Oxford mu ndwi ziri imbere. Kuva umugera wa coronavirus utanguye kwibonekeza mu kwa mbere kw'umwaka uheze mu Bushinwa, Koreya y'Uburaruko yaciye yugara imbibe zayo. Mu kwa cumi na rimwe, ikompanyi Microsoft ihingura inyabwonko yatangaje ko n'imiburiburi amakompanyi icenda ahingura imiti harimwo na Pfizer yinjiriwe n'amashirahamwe yegukira reta z'ibihugu vya Koreya y'Uburaruko n'Uburusiya. Microsoft yavuze ko hari amashirahamwe yo muri Koreya y'Uburaruko azwi nka Zinc na Cerium, hamwe n'irindi ryo mu Burusiya ryitwa Fancy Bear, abifisemwo uruhara. Uburusiya burahakana ko butinjirira ubushakashatsi bw'ibindi bihugu ku vyerekeye incanco. N'aho utwigoro twinshi two kugerageza kwiba ubu buhinga ataco twashitseko, Microsoft yagabishije ico gihe ko hari hamwe hamwe vyashobotse. Kuva iki kiza caduka hari ibihugu vyagumye birungika aba hackers babo mu rwego rwo guhangana na coronavirus. Kimwe muri ibi harimwo kwegeranya amakuru y'igendereza hakaba kandi no kwiba ubuhinga kugira babukorereko. Korea y'Uburaruko yamye iboneka ko ari kimwe mu bihugu bikomeye cane muri iki gisata. Ni igihugu ciyugaye ariko gifise abahinga bakomeye mu busuma bwo mu nyabwonko bamye barondera kwinjirira ibindi bihugu, atari ukwiba amabanga gusa, ariko kandi no kurondera amafaranga. Mu mwaka uheze mu Bwongereza, vyabaye ngombwa ko ikigo kijejwe umutekano w'inyabwonko ( National Cyber Security Centre) gishiraho uburyo bwo gukingira ubushakashatsi ku ncanco. Ntagushidikanya ko kubera ibikorwa bihari bikomeye, inzego zijejwe imiti n'amagara y'abantu zigiye kwitaho gusumba umutekano w'inyabwonko kugira zikingire kazoza.

column2: Intambara ya Russia na Ukraine: Umukuru w'umutumba n'umuryango wiwe wose barishwe n'Abarusiya
column3: Abategetsi ba Ukraine bavuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zagandaguye umukuru w'umutumba, umugabo wiwe n'umuhungu wabo. Ibi - hamwe n'ibindi biziga vyatowe vy'abagabo batanu bari bambaye impuzu zisanzwe - vyiyongereye ku bimenyetso vy'ivyaha vy'agahomerabunwa bibandanya vyibonekeza muri Ukraine. Umunyamakuru wa BBC Yogita Limaye  yarishikiye muri ivyo bibanza bibiri vyabereyemwo ubu bwicanyi. Mu gisagara ca Bucha, hanze gato ya Kyiv, amahano yabaye mu gihe Uburusiya bwari bwigaruriye iki gisagara aratanguye kuja ahabona. Mu nzu yo mu kuzimu y'inyubakwa yahoze ari ikigo c'irerero ry'abana, ibiziga vy'abantu batanu birambaraye hasi - abagabo batanu bambaye impuzu zisanzwe, amaboko aboheye mu mugongo. Bamwe bari barashwe mu mutwe, abandi nabo mu gikiriza. Ntibari bwamenyekane, ariko abategetsi ba Ukraine bavuga ko aba bagabo bari bafashwe bugwati n'ingabo z'Uburusiya zica zirabica. Vlad, umwe mu baduganye ibi biziga babivana muri iyo nzu yo mu kuzimu, avuga ati: "Twarumvise baraswa. Twarumvise ama mines aturika muri ako karere. Aha mu micungararo yacu huzuye ama mines. Ni igihamana kubona tukiri bazima". Vlad avuga ko yumvise umugabo ahamagara umugore wiwe yari yasohotse hanze kurondera amazi, hanyuma yumva amasasu menshi. Mu nyuma yasanze uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfuye. Ati: "Ni ibintu vyinshi nshobora kukubwira ariko reka ndabireke. Ndipfuza kuvyibagira". Hafi yaho gato, ku mutumba wa Motoyzhyn, ibiziga bine bihambwe mu mva ntoya mw'ishamba. Bitatu vyaramenyekanye - Olha Sukhenko w'imyaka 51, umugabo wiwe Igor n'umuhungu wabo Oleksander yari afise imyaka 25. Olha yari umukuru w'umutumba. Bizwi ko we n'umuryango wiwe bishwe bagirizwa ko bafasha abasirikare ba Ukraine, baca batabwa ku nkengera y'ishamba, bahambwe igice, ukuboko kwa Ohla no mu maso h'umuhungu wiwe biboneka mw'ivu. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky  yaragendeye Bucha ejo ku wa mbere. Yagize ati: "Dushaka kwereka amakungu ivyabereye hano, ivyo igisirikare c'Uburusiya cakoze, ivyo Uburusiya bwakoreye Ukraine yari yibereye mu mahoro. Vyari ngombwa ko mubona ko aba bantu bari abasivire". Avuga ko Ukraine yiteguriye kuganira n'Uburusiya. Yabwiye BBC ati:  "Ukraine ikeneye amahoro. Ntidushobora kuba mu ntambara. Imisi yose igisirikare cacu cama kiriko kirarwana, ariko ntidushaka ko ubuzima bw'amamiriyoni y'abantu buzimangana. Nico gituma dutegerezwa kuganira n'Uburusiya". Mu tundi turere twa Bucha, hari amakuru y'ibinogo rusangi vyimbwe kugira bihambwemwo ibiziga vyarengeye ivyumba vy'uburuhukiro. Amasanamu n'amareresi yerekana abasivire bishwe babohewe amaboko mu mugongo. Ibimenyetso vy'ivyaha vy'agahomerabunwa muri kino gisagara cigeze kuba kirangwamwo ituze vyabandanije vyiyongera ejo kuwa mbere. Umukuru w'igisagara, Anatoliy Fedoruk, avuga ko abasivire n'imiburiburi 300 bagandaguwe. Nta bitigiri ntabanduka biramenyekana. Uburusiya burahakana ko ata ruhara bubifisemwo, bukavuga ko ibi bimenyetso vyose vyerekanywe ari irementanya, ariko aya majambo yiyamirijwe n'uburakari bwinshi. Ibimodoka vy'intambara vyabwo vyaturiwe vyuzuye ibarabara rimwe rya Bucha. Ubu turazi bimwe mu vyabereye hano, mu burengero gato bwa Kyiv. Ariko hari ibisagara bitari bike muri Ukraine bikiri mu minwe y'Uburusiya. Hari ubwoba ko ivyabonetse hano bishobora no kuboneka n'ahandi, ko hashobora kwibonekeza ibindi biziga mu vyumba vyo mu kuzimu no mu mva ntoya.

column2: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Israel yarengukishijwe mu butungane
column3: Umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Israyeli, Benjamin Netanyahu, agiye kuburanywa muri sentare, ibitari bwigere bibaho ku mutegetsi nk'uyu asanzwe akiri mu mabanga. Bwana Netanyahu yagirizwa igiturire, magendo hamwe no guhemuka. Ashitse muri sentare i Yerusalemu, uyo mutegetsi w'imyaka 70 yongeye guhakana ivyo yagirizwa,  avuga ko abamurwanya barondera "kumubogoza mu buryo bwose bushoboka". Ivyo bibaye inyuma y'indwi imwe gusa asubiye kwimikwa ngo arongore leta y'ubumwe igiyeho bigoranye. Uwo bahanganye, Benny Gantz, yaremeye gusangira ubutegetsi nawe inyuma y'amatora atatu mu mwaka umwe gusa yahera ataco ashitseko. Bwana Netanyahu ariyamiriza ivyo asabwa n'abo batavuga rumwe bashaka ko atanga imihoho mu gihe akiriko araburana. Bwana Netanyahu afise imanza zitatu zizwi nka 1000, 2000, na 4000. Urubanza 1000- magendo no guhemuka :  yagirizwa ko yahawe igipfukamunwa  n'umurwizatunga akomeye kugira ngo nawe amworohereze. Urubanza 2000 - yagirizwa magendo no guhemuka : yagirizwa ko yemeye gufasha mw'igurishwa ry'ikinyamakuru ca Israyeli, Yediot Ahronot, maze naco kikamwamamaza Urubanza 4000 - igiturire, magendo no guhemuka : Igihe yari umushikiranganji wa mbere hanyuma n'umushikiranganji wo guhanahana amakuru, bwana Netanyahu yagirizwa gushinga amategeko yorohereza uwutwara ikompanyi Bezeq yo gutumatumanako, Shaul Elovitch, maze nawe akaronka akaryo ko kwamamazwa mu kinyamakuru ngurukanabumenyi Walla ca bwana Elovitch. Bwana Netanyahu arajhakana yivuye inyuma ivyo yagirizwa, akavuga ko ariko "atotezwa" n'abo batavuga rumwe muri politike, aba arahira akarengwa ko ategerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo izina ryiwe ntiricafuzwe. Ntivyari bwigere bibaho muri ico gihugu aho umushikiranganji wa mbere akiri mu mabanga arengutswe imbere y'ubutungane. Uwuheruka kurengutswa Ehud Olmert, yabanje gutanga imihoho ku burongozi bw'umugambwe mu gihe yariko akorwako amatohoza ajanye n'ukurya igiturire mu 2008, n'aho asa n'uwagumanye amabanga yiwe gushika habaye amatora mu mwaka wakurikiye - amatora yatumye Benjamin Netanyahu ashika kubutegetsi. Itegeko rya Israyeli rivuga ko umushikiranganji wa mbere akurikiranwa ku vyaha asabwa gutanga imihoho. Abanyagihugu ba Israyeli ntibavuga rumwe ku bijanye n'uko yobandanya ari umushikiranganji wa mbere canke ko akwiye gutanga imihoho. Abamunegura bavuga ko ibiriko biramubako vyo gukurikiranwa n'ubutungane bidashobora kubangikanwa n'amabanga yiwe, mu gihe abamushigikiye bobo - harimwo n'umugambwe wiwe - bavuga ko yatowe n'abanyagihugu, rero ko adashobora guhatwa gutanga imihoho.

column2: US na China bateranye amajambo akarishe mu biganiro barimwo muri Alaska
column3: Intumwa za Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'izo Ubushinwa zateranye amajambo akarishe mu biganiro vya mbere vyo ku rwego rwo hejuru hagati y'ubutegetsi bwa prezida Joe Biden n'Ubushinwa , biriko birabera Alaska. Intumwa z'Ubushinwa zagirije Amerika gukaburira ibihugu "gutera Ubushinwa", Amerika na yo ivuga ko Ubushinwa bushitse aho "kwiyerekana cane". Haheze imyaka imigenderanire hagati y'ivyo bihangange bibiri  imeze nabi cane. Amerika yiyemeje kuvuga ku bibazo biteye umutima uhagaze nk'ingene ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bufata aba Islam b'aba Uighur  muri Xinjiang. Ivyo biganiro  vyatanguriye kw'isemo mbi  mu gisagara ca Anchorage birimwo umunyamabanga wa reta wa Amerika Antony Blinken n'umujenama ajejwe ibibazo vy'umutekano w'igihugu Jake Sullivan ku ruhande rwa Amerika, ku ruhande rw'Ubushinwa na ho hari uwuza imbere mu bategetsi bajejwe poritike yo hanze, Yang Jiechi n'umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire Wang Yi. Ariko, umwe mu ntumwa za Amerika yavuze ko ibiganiro vyabandanije mu mw'ihererero vyari ''bifashe, bikomeye kandi bidaca irya n'ino" kandi bimara amasaha abiri yari ategekanijwe. Mw'ijambo ryeruye ryo kwugurura imbere y'uko ibiganiro bibandaniriza mu mw'iherero, Blinken yavuze ko Amerika ija "kuvuga amakenga dufise ku bikorwa vy'Ubushinwa , harimwo muri Xinjiang, Hong Kong, Taiwan, ubukozi bw'ikibi buciye kuri internet bukorerwa Amerika,  agacinyizo k'ubutunzi ku bihugu dukorana". Yavuze ati:"Kimwe kimwe cose muri ivyo bikorwa kibangamira ingendo ishingiye ku mategeko ituma isi igira amaragamo." Amwishura, Yang yagirije Amerika gukoresha ububasha bwayo bwa gisirikare n'amafaranga mu gucinyiza ibindi bihugu. Yongeyeko ati:"Irikika mu kiza ku citwazo c'umutekano w'igihugu kugira ibangamire urudandazwa rusanzwe, no gukaburira ibihugu bimwe bimwe guhanga Ubushinwa." Wang yavuze ko agateka ka zina muntu kari hasi cane muri Amerika, aho abirabure "bicwa". Sullivan yasubije, avuga ko ubutegetsi bwa Amerika butarondera intambara n'Ubushinwa, ariko yongerako ati: "Tuzokwama duhagararira ingingo tugenderako ku neza y'igihugu cacu, no ku neza y'abagenzi bacu." Uko guterana amajambo kwabaye imbere y'ibinyamakuru vy'isi yose, kwabandanije mu kiringo kirenga isaha. Ni kwo kwuguruye ibikorwa biba mu ncuro  zitatu, bikarangira kuri uyu wa gatanu (mu gitondo mu masaha ya Amerika). Ni vyo bikorwa vya mbere vy'intumwa zo mu rwego rwo hejuru bibaye hagati ya Amerika n'Ubushinwa kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatu guheze - ku ntwaro y'uwahora ari umukuru w'igihugu , Donald Trump. Mu nyuma , intumwa za Amerika zagirije Ubushinwa guca kubiri n'ivyo bari bumvikanye ko amajambo yo kwugurura ibiganiro atorenza iminota ibiri kuri buri ruhande. Umwe mu bategetsi bo mu ntwaro yavuze ati:"Intumwa z'Ubushinwa… umenga zaje zifise intumbero yo kwiyerekana, zishira imbere ikinamico  aho kuja ku bintu bifadika". Uwo mutegetsi yavuze ko Amerika ija kubandanya ibiganiro nk'uko bitegekanijwe, yongerako ati  "gukavya mu gushikiriza amajambo  mu vy'imigenderanire akenshi biba bigenewe abo mu gihugu[c'uwuba ariko aravuga]". Mu nyuma mu kinyamakuru ca reta, intumwa z'ubushinwa zavuze ko ari Amerika, atari Ubushinwa, itubahirije ivyo bumvikanye mu kurenza iminota ibiri yo gushikiriza ijambo ryo kwugurura. Bwagirije abanyamerika "kubuvogera ata shingiro, muri poritike yabwo yo mu gihugu hagati no mumahanga". Mu ruhande rwiza, ico kinyamakuru casubiyemwo amajambo ya Yang avuga ko "ingorane zikomeye hagati y'Ubushinwa na Amerika zo muri kahise zidategerezwa kubandanya". Umunyamakuru wa BBC Barbara Plett Usher avuga ko ivyo biganiro ari akaryo ka mbere kuri prezida Biden ko kwerekana ingene agiye gukemura ikibazo Blinken yise "ikibazo ca mbere gikomeye c'inyungu n'imigenderanire mu kinjana ca 21". Uwo munyamakuru abandanya avuga ko Ubushinwa burondera ko ibintu vyosubira itoto inyuma y'aho imigenderanire ishikiye ku rugero rwa mbere rwo hasi ku ntwaro ya Trump. Wang yavuze ko ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bwiteguriye kwugurura ''ibiganiro vyubaka." Ni vyinshi. Urudandaza nk'akarorero. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa ingendo itariyo, nko mu gufasha amahinguriro, kwiba ubuhinga bwakozwe n'abandi, kugumiza hasi agaciro k'ifaranga ryabwo no gushira inzitizi mu rudandaza. Ubushinwa na bwo bushaka ko ama taxes yashizweho n'intwaro ya Trump ku bidandazwa vy'Ubushinwa avanwaho. Bwagiriza kandi Amerika gucinyiza  ama kompanyi y'Ubushinwa ateye imbere mu buhinga bwa none, nka Huawei. Agateka ka zina muntu na demokrasi. Amerika yagiriza Ubushinwa ihonyabwoko ku ba Uighur mu ntara ya Xinjiang, guhonyanga demokrasi muri Hong Kong biciye ku mategeko mashasha y'umutekano. Ariko Ubushinwa busaba Amerika kureka kwivanga mu co bwita ibibazo vy'imbere mu gihugu, bukagiriza Amerika  ''kugaya" umugambwe w'aba Communiste uri ku butegetsi muri ico gihugu. Ubushinwa bushaka kandi ko ingabo za Amerika zo mu mazi zitabandanya kwinjira mu mazi y'ikiyaga ca  South China Sea , ubutegetsi bw'Ubushinwa bufata nk'igice c'igihugu cabwo.

column2: Gloria Estefan avuga ko yakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina afise imyaka icenda
column3: Umuririmvyi Gloria Estefan yanyeguruye ko yahohotewe bishingiye ku gitsina n'umuntu wo mu muryango igihe yari afise imyaka icenda. Uwo muririmvyi w'amamamuko ya Cuba na Amerika  w'imyaka 64 avuga ko yashurashujwe ari kw'ishure ry'umuziki n'umuntu nyina yizera. Yavuze ko "93% y'abana  bahohoterwa bazi kandi baba bizeye ababibakorera. Kandi ivyo ndabizi kuko nari umwe muri abo." Yavuze kuri iryo hohoterwa ubwa mbere mu kiganiro co kuri Facebook Watch  ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe akuze n'umukobwa w'uwo bavukana. Clare Crawley azwi mu biganiro vyo kuri television nawe nyene yagaragaye mu kiganiro Red Table Talk: The Estefans, nawe avuga ingene yashurashujwe n'umupatiri. Madame Crawley yavuze ko yashurashujwe "n'umujenama'' igihe yiga kw'ishure rya Katolika. Madame Estefan yamubwiye ati: "Nashaka kuvuga iki kibazo kuko birakenewe cane ko cokwirindwa. Kandi sinashaka kwicara ngaha ataco mvuze nawe uriko uratubwira ivyagushikiye kandi mu butwari". Madame Estafan yaririmvye indirimbo zizwi cane nka Conga na Rythm is Gonna Get You, yavugiye muri ico kiganiro ko incuti itari iya hafi yafatiye ku kwizerwa nyina yari ayifitiye kugira imushurashuze. Umukobwa w'uwo bavukana, Lili, w'imyaka 54 yaciye yishura uwo muririmvyi ati: "Waindiriye  uwu mwanya igihe kirekire". Yavuze ati: "Yari incuti, ariko atari iya hafi. Yari afise ububasha kuko mama yari yanshize mw'ishure ryiwe ry'umuziki aca atangura kumubwira buno nyene ingene nari mfise impano nyinshi n'uko nari nkeneye kwitabwaho bidasanzwe, nca ntangura kwumva ingene yari amahirwe kubona anyitaho gutyo." Madame Estafan , yavukiye muri Cuba hanyuma akimukira Miami n'umuryango wiwe akiri umwana w'igitambambuga, yavuze ko iryo hohoterwa ryatanguye  "buke buke hanyuma birihuta". 'Igihe kibangamye' Uwo muririmvyi amaze gutwara agashimwe ka Grammy Award gatatu yavuze ko yabona ko ari "mu gihe "kibangamye" ariko atashobora kwishitura uwo mugabo. "Naramubwiye, 'Ibi ntibibaho, ntushubora gukora ibintu nk'ibi.' Nawe agaca avuga: 'So ari muri Vietnam, nyoko ari wenyene kandi nzoca ndamwica hamwe womubwira." "Nari inzi ko uwo mugabo ari igipfu nico gituma nibaza ko vy'ukuri yashobora kugirira nabi mama." Yavuze ko ayo maganya yatumye atakaza ibice vy'umushatsi , ariko araruha arabwira nyina ivyariko biraba. N'ubwo nyima yabibwiye igiporisi, yagiriwe inama yo kudashingisha urubanza kuko yari "kurushirizaho guhahamurwa no kuja guhagarara  imbere ya sentare kuvuga ivyamushikiye".

column2: Ghana: Igiporisi cabujije ihishurwa ry'Umwaka Mushasha ritera ibibazo
column3: Dickens Olewe BBC News Igiporisi muri Ghana cagabishije abarongoye ukwemera n’amashengero ko batokora ihishurwa basanzwe bakora ku Mwaka Mushasha kuko hari abo ritera ubwoba, abandi umwitwarariko, mbere abandi bagapfa. Uburenganzira bwo gusenga ntibutegerezwa kurengera uburenganzira bw’abandi, nk’uko igiporisi cavuze mw’itangazo. Abanegura iyo ngingo bavuga ko iteye kubiri n’uburenganzira butangwa n’ibwirizwa shingiro mu kwishira no kwizana ku bijanye no kwemera  ko rero iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Aba-Kristu baharurwa muri za miriyoni akenshi barakoranira mu masengero kugira bumve ivyo  abapasitori  babahishurira ku vyo beretswe ku bizobashikira mu mwaka mushasha. Hari abahishurirwa ivyiza bibarindiriye ariko hari n’abagabishwa ko barindiriwe n’ivyago. Iyo ngingo y’igiporisi yatanguye gusohoka mu mwaka uheze igihe abantu bari barengewe n’ukugabishwa kw’impfu n’akaga, nk’uko ikinyamakuru co kuri internet My Joy Online kivyandika. Mw’itangazo, igiporisi casavye amadini atandukanye”gafashanya” na co no “gukoresha uburyo bwemewe n’amategeko um gushurira ivyo beretswe”. Ariko umunyamategeko Sammy Sarko yavuze ko  iyo ngingo y’igiporisi “iteye kubiri n’amategeko.” Yanditse ati: “Ntikeneye no kubanza kwihwezwa na sentare ya mbere nkuru muri Ghana. Nta tegeko muri Ghana riha igiporisi ububasha bwo kugenzura ingene ivyahishuwe bimenyeshwa mu gihugu”. Yongeyeko ati : “Ubwisanzure bw’idini burenze ubwisanzure bwo gusenga muri sinagoga, isengero canke umusigiti. Bisigura ko abantu badategerezwa guca kubiri n’ivyo bemera kugira bisunge umuco canke reta kiretse buteye kubiri n’itegeko  iri canke irindi.” Igiporisi cavuze co cashinze itariki ya 27 Kigarama (12) nk’umunsi wo gutangura kwubahiriza ingingo zijanye no kumenyesha ivyahishuwe. Iryo tangazo ryavuze riti: “Uyu munsi ni uwo kutwibutsa twese, gukora ibikorwa bijanye n’ukwemera hatarenzwe akarimbi k’amategeko kugira hubahirizwe  ituze ridahungabanywa n’umwitwarariko uvuye ku mburi y’ibibi canke urupfu bigiye gushika”.

column2: Argentine irigina igarukanwa rya 'maillot' Maradona yari yambaye mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi
column3: A﻿banye Argentines bariko barigina igarukanwa muri ico gihugu  rya 'maillot' rurangiranwa mu mupira w'amaguru Diego Maradona yakinanye mu rukino rwa nyuma rw'igikombe c'isi. I﻿nyuma y'imyaka 36 Argentine itsinze Ubudagi mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 1986, impuzu Maradona yambaye mu gice ca mbere c'urukino yasubijwe ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Argentine, AFA. U﻿wahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati mu Budagi Lothar  Matthäus, yari yaguranye impuzu na Maradona inyuma y'igice ca mbere, yayigabiye abanye Argentine. A﻿FA yarungitse ubutumwa bwo kumushimira kuri Video. I﻿yindi mpuzu ya Maradona, yari yambaye igihe yatsindisha igitego ukuboko, "Hand of God" mu rukino rwabahuza n'Ubwongereza mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma mu nkino z'igikombe c'isi co mu 1986, yaciye umuhigo mu kugurishwa imiliyoni 7.1 mu ntango z'uyu mwaka. Iyo mpuzu yatejejwe icamunara n'uwahoze ari umukinyi wo hagati w'Ubwongereza Steve Hodge. A﻿riko n'aho iyo mpuzu yagurishijwe amahera menshi nkayo Lothar Matthäus yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Mail ko atigeze yiyumvira gukura amahera muri iyo mpuzu ya Maradona. Matthäus yeretse iyo mpuzu abanye Argentine mu birori vyabereye mu nzu y'ubuserukizi bwa Argentine i Madrid mu kwezi kw'umunani, avuga ko "Diego ari Imana muri Argentine, ari na co gituma ari ikintu kidasanzwe kubashikiriza iyo mpuzu". A﻿vuga kuri Maradona yapfuye mu 2020 azize ingwara y'umutima, Matthäus yagize ati:"Birababaje kuba atari ngaha uyu musi. Diego azoguma mu mitima yacu." I﻿yi mpuzu izoshirwa muri Legends, inzu ndangamico yerekana ivyaranze umupira w'amaguru muri kahise i Madrid, imbere y'uko ijanwa muri Argentine n'uwusanzwe yegeranya ibintu vyo muri kahise Marcelo Ordás ku musi wa gatatu. M﻿u gushima, AFA yarungitse video y'akamwemwe aho ishimira "umugenzi wacu Lothar Matthäus" mw'izina ry'abanye Argentine. "﻿Iyi n'inkuru ya kizigenza w'Ubudagi yari afise nk'umugenzi kizigenza wa Argentine. Hanyuma nk'abandi bagenzi bose, barahanahanye ibintu vyiza bari bafise, kugwana mu nda, impanuro n'impuzu," uko ni ko uwuvugira muri iyo video yavuze igihe ivyo bihangange bibiri bigaragara bigwana mu nda.

column2: US: Impungenge z’uko abakobwa bomubenga ziri mu vyatumye asaba kwongererezwa uburebure
column3: Buri mwaka, abantu amajana n'amajana kw'isi baribagisha amaguru kugira ngo bongererezwe uburebure, igikorwa gifata igihe kitari gito kandi kibabaza. Ariko kubera ari inzira ndende, abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu bavuga ko bigira ingaruka mbi z'igihe kirekire. Sam Becker  yaboneka ko ari we muremure igihe yari akiri mu mashure mato, ariko amaze kurangiza amashure yisumbuye, yagiye kwisanga abo bigana  bamusumba kure. Ati: "Maze kuja kuri kaminuza, nagiye nisanga ndi mugufi gusumba abandi bahungu, mbere n'abakobwa". "Ibi biragira ingaruka ku buzima bwawe. Mvugishije ukuri, abakobwa ntibemera kureshwa n'abahungu basumvya uburebure. Ariko ikintu gikomeye cane kwari ukwama nibaza rimwe na rimwe ko ntazigera ndonka umugore". Sam w'imyaka 30 asanzwe aba mu gisagara ca New York, yibaza ko yari kubandanya aba muremure, n'aho ku mutima yari azi ko yamaze kurenza imyaka yo gukura. Ati: "Naguma nibaza ko kugira ugire aho wishikana mu buzima wategerezwa kuba uri muremure. Nico gituma rero nahavuye nigira inama". Sam yamaze igihe yibaza ingene yobigenza kugira abe muremure, akama abona ko yokwambara ibirato birebire agakora n'imyimenyerezo ngororamubiri, ariko ivyo ntivyamunyuze. Igihe amenyeye ko bashobora kumwongerereza amaguru, yaciye yumva ko ari wo muti nyawo. Amaze kuvugana na nyina wiwe, akanihweza ingaruka zishoboka kumushikira, yaciye afata ingingo ntabanduka ko umuti w'ingorane yiwe ari ukubagwa. Niho rero mu 2015 yabagwa amaguru, maze baramwongerereza uburebure, ava kuri sentimetero 162 (162cm) ashika kuri sentimetero 170 (170cm). Ati: "Igihe mbonana na muganga ubwa mbere, yaransiguriye neza ko iki gikorwa kitoroshe. Icari kimpagaritse umutima kwari ukumenya ubushobozi nzoba mfise bwo gukora ico nshaka ni namara kwongererezwa uburebure. Ubwo nzoshobora gutambuka? Ubwo nzoshobora kwiruka? "Maze gukorwa, nategerezwa kwama nja kwigoroza, nka gatatu canke kane mu ndwi, amasaha makeya buri musi. Ibi nabikoze mu kiringo c'amezi nk'atandatu. Vyari ibintu biteye isoni. Bwari nk'ubusazi...iyumvire amaguru yawe yompi bakamena, hanyuma ugasubira kwiga gutambuka gushasha". Umugirwa wo kubaga amaguru mu kwongerereza abantu uburebure usanzwe ukorwa mu bihugu bitari bike, mbere abantu bamwe bagashobora kwongererezwa uburebure gushika kuri sentimetero 13 (13cm). N'aho bigoye kumenya igitigiri c'abantu babikorerwa buri mwaka, ibigo vy'ubuvuzi bivuga ko ari umugirwa ugenda wirukirwa cane. BBC yavuganye n'ibigo vy'ubuvuzi bitari bike kw'isi ku bijanye n'icuro basanzwe babikorera abantu, ariko ibiharuro bigenda bisumbasumbana. Mu bigo bikomeye vyo muri Amerika, mu Budagi na Koreya y'Ubumanuko, uwu mugirwa ukorwa ku ncuro hagati y'100 na 200 uko umwaka utashe. Ibindi - harimwo Espagne, Ubuhindi, Turukiya n'Ubutaliyano - ni hagati ya 20 na 40 ku mwaka. Mu Bwongereza ibitigiri biracari hasi bukebuke - incuro 15 ku mwaka. Amavuriro hafi nka yose BBC yavuganye nayo yavuze ko uwu mugirwa wiyongera umwaka ku mwaka. Mu Bwongereza, bikorwa mu mavuriro make y'abigenga, ku giciro gishobora gushika ku madorari y'abanyamerika 67.000, mu gihe muri Amerika igiciro kiri hagati y'amadorari 75.000 na 280.000. Ni igikorwa gifata umwanya muremure, kizimvye kandi kibabaza. Ni igikorwa catangujwe na Gavril Ilizarov, umuganga w'umurusiya yavura abasirikare bari bakomerekeye ku rugamba mu ntambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Batobora amagufa y'amaguru - mu nyuma agacikamwo kubiri. Baca bagushiramwo icuma  bakagifatanya n'imisumari (vis/screws). Ico cuma rero kigenda congerezwa bukebuke uburebure gushika kuri mirimetero imwe (1mm) ku munsi, bikabandanya gushika aho nyene kubikorerwa  ashikiriye uburebure yipfuza, hanyuma rero amaguru akagenda asubirana bukebuke. Nyene kubikorerwa akenera amezi atari make akorerwa ibikorwa vyo gusubirana kugira ngo asubire akomere. Uwu mugirwa urimwo ingaruka indiri n'indiri zikomeye cane,  harimwo imitsi ishobora kwononekara, kuva amaraso mbere ugasanga biranashitse bikanka ko amagufa asubira gufatana.

column2: Amatora muri USA: Bernie Sanders yemeye gushigikira umukeba wiwe Joe Biden
column3: Bernie Sanders yariko arondera guserukira umugambwe w'aba Démocrates mu matora yo mu kwa 11uyu mwaka  atangaza ko yemeye gushigikira Joe Biden bariko bahiganirwa gutana mu mitwe na Donald Trump. Mu ndwi iheze, Bwana Sanders yatangaje ko akuyemwo akarenge mu rugamba rwo kurondera guserukira uwo mugambwe, akaryo keza ka Bwana Biden gusigara ari wenyene asigaye muri uyo mugambwe. Mu kiganiro yagiriye ku buhinga bw'ireresi, uwahoze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, Joe Biden, yashimiye uwahoze ari umukeba wiwe kubona yemeye kumushigikira. Umukenguzamateka Sanders yateye akamo Abanyamerika bose kuja hamwe kugira ngo biganzure Perezida Donald Trump. Avuga ko ari "umukuru w'igihugu mubi cane mu bihe vya none mu gihugu". Sanders ati: "Uno munsi, nsavye Abanyamerika bose - aha ndiko nsaba umu Démocrate uwo ari we wese, ndiko nsaba uwigenga uwo ari we wese, ndiko nsaba umu Républicain uwo ari we wese - ko boja hamwe muri rino higanwa bagashigikira umu kandida nshigikiye". "Ni ngombwa ko twese dukorera hamwe". Bwana Biden w'imyaka 77, avuga ko anezerewe cane kubona mugenziwe Sanders yamushigikiye, akavuga ko atamukeneye gusa mu myiyamamazo, ariko mu butegetsi. Ati: "Washize imbere ya vyose inyungu z'iki gihugu be no gutsinda Donald Trump. Nk'uko ukunze kubivuga uti 'si jewe, ni twebwe',". Mw'ijambo yashikirije abanywanyi b'uyo mukenguzamateka, Bwana Biden yavuze ati: "Ndababona, kandi ndabumva, ndatahura ikibaraje ishinga muri kino gihugu, kandi ndizeye ko muzodushigikira". Bwana Biden avuga ko we na Sanders bariko bashinga imirwi yo gukorera hamwe kugira ngo yige ibibazo nkoramutima harimwo ibijanye n'ihindagurika ry'ibihe, amagara y'abantu hamwe n'amafaranga arihwa mu mashure. Ivyo vyabaye inyuma y'aho Biden atsindiye Sanders mu matora y'intangamarara y'aba Démocrates mu ndwi iheze mu ntara ya Wisconsin, amatora yabaye hari ukutumvikana kuvuye ku kiza ca coronavirus. Umukenguzamateka Sanders yahagaritse urugamba rwiwe mu ndwi iheze, aho yabwira abanywanyi biwe ko abona ko adashobora kuronka amajwi akwiye kugira ngo ashobore gutsindira ikibanza co guserukira umugambwe wiwe mu matora. Mu ntango, niwe yari imbere cane, aho cane cane urwaruka rwamubonamwo urukiza, akaba yashira imbere gutorera inyishu ibibazo vy'amagara y'abantu n'ubusumbasumbane bw'imishahara. Hagati aho, mu ndwi nkeya ziheze yagiye atakaza amajwi maze Bwana Biden amuja imbere. Sanders yari amaze kurondera guserukira umugambwe w'aba Démocrates ariko biranka, aho mu 2016 yatsinzwe na Hillary Clinton.

column2: 'Cristiano Ronaldo ntagurishwa' - Erik ten Hag
column3: Umumenyereza wa Manchester United Erik ten Hag avuga ko umukinyi w'imbere wa Portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ari "mu mugambi wabo" mu mwaka ugira utangure ko rero "atagurishwa". Uwo mukinyi w'imyaka 37 ntazokina inkino z'igice ca mbere zibaziriza ihiganwa zizobera muri Thailand kandi yashaka kuva muri uwo mugwi. Yari yagarutse muri United mu mwaka uheze inyuma yo gukinira Real Madrid na Juventus. Uwo yahoze amenyereza Ajax, Ten Hag agira ati:"Ntari kumwe nacu kubera imvo bwite ziwe. Tumufiseko umugambi muri uyu mwaka. Ni ko biri." "Mfise igishika co gukorana na we. Cristiano si uwo kugurisha. Ari mu mugambi wacu. Dushaka amahirwe turi kumwe." Isiba ry'uwo munye Portugal muri urwo rugendo ryatumye haba ibihuha kuri kazoza kiwe, inyuma kandi yo kutagaragara mu myimenyerezo y'uwo mugwi   yo kwitegurira ihiganwa ryimirije i Carrington. Ahubwo Ronaldo yagize imyimenyerezo n'umugwi nserukiragihu wa Portugal aho basanzwe bimenyerereza. Manchester United izotana mu mitwe na Liverpool muri Thailand  ku musi wa kabiri imbere yo kwurira indege baja muri Australia, Ten Hag akavuga ko ataramenya nimba Ronaldo azobasangayo mu nyuma. Uwo mumenyereza w'umudagi yongeyeko ko yavuganye na Ronaldo imbere y'urwo rugendo, asigura:"Twayaze neza. Ivyo biri hagati yanje na Ronaldo, ico nokwemeza n'uko twagiraniye ibiganiro vyiza cane." Ten Hag  yagize kandi ico acuga kuvyerekeye uwoba kizigenza, cabaye ikibazo kuva mu mwaka uheze kubera Harry Maguire adahagaze neza. Yagize ati: "Harry Maguire azoba kizigenza. Amaze umwaka urenga ari kizigenza. Amaze gushika kuri vyinshi. Nta nkeka mfise kuri ivyo." Umukinyi wenyene United imaze kuzana muri iri ci n'umukinyi w'inyuma Tyrell Malacia yakuye mu mugwi wa Feyenoord. Biteze kunaza umukinyi w'inyuma Christian Eriksen ata n'urumeya bamutanzeko, bakaba kandi begereje kugiriranira amasezerano na Barcelone ku mukinyi Frenkie de Jong. Ten Hag yacishijemwo avuga ko United izozana abakinyi mu gihe ibonye ko bahuje uko bakina. Yongeyeko ati:"Dushaka kwongeramwo abakinyi babikwiye. Dufise umugwi mwiza cane, turiko turakora mu guteza imbere uburyo dukina, kandi akaryo karahari tuzotsinda."

column2: Burundi - UK: Hashobora kwifashishwa itegeko ry'ingere ku yindi ku kibazo ca Covid
column3: Uburundi buragabisha ko bushobora gusubiriza mu ndumane Ubwongereza mu gihe ico gihugu kitokwisubirako ku ngingo cafashe yo kubuza abantu bava mu Burundi kuja mu Bwongereza kubera Covid. Ivyo biri ku rubuga rwa Twitter rw'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire y'Uburundi n'amakungu. Ubwo bushikiranganji bwandika ko Uburundi ari kimwe mu bihugu biriko biritwara neza mu kugwanya Covid -19 kw'isi, ko butumva rero ico bashingiyeko mu gufatirwa ibihano. Itariki 29 z'ukwezi kwa mbere, umushikiranganji ashinzwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu mu Bwongereza, Grant Shapps, yatangaje kuri Twitter ko abafise ubwenegihugu bw'Ubwongereza ari bo bonyene bemerewe kwinjira muri ico gihugu bafise urupapuro rwerekana ko batanduye, kandi bagaca bugaranwa mu kiringo c'imisi icumi. Uburundi, Urwanda na Reta zunze ubumwe z'Abarabu vyashizwe ku rutonde "rutukura" rw'ibihugu, ingenzi zibivuyemwo canke zabiciyemwo, zitemerewe kuja mu Bwongereza. Iyo ngingo ifise intumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwizwa ry'ubwoko bwa coronavirus bwa mbere muri Afrika y'Epfo, yashizwe mu ngiro ku musi wa gatanu isaha icenda ku masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda. Ubwongereza ntibwasiguye nimba muri ivyo bihugu bitatu hamaze kugera ubwo bwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus. Mu karere ubwo bwoko bwa coronavirus bukaba bumaze kuboneka mu gihugu ca Kenya gusa.
