column2: Mu Burundi malaria yoba yabaye ikiza?
column3: Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri Leta y'Uburundi bafadikanije n'abaserukira ishami ry'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe amagara y'abantu OMS, bariko barihweza icatumye ingwara ya malaria ifata abantu benshi muri uyu mwaka kuruta uko vyahora. Ibiro vya ONU bijejwe gutunganya ibikorwa vy'ubutabazi OCHA, bimenyesha ko ibitigiri vya malaria yabonetse ku barwayi kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka, bigeze kuri 5 700 000, nayo abo yahitanye bagera ku 1800. Nimwumvirize uwuserukira  OMS mu Burundi, Kazadi Mulombo. Avuga ko bariko bafashanya na leta gukora ibishoboka ngo iyo ngwara igabanuke, ariko yirinze kuvuga ko igeze ku rugero rwo kwitwa ikiza canke kwemeza ibiharuro bivugwa, kuko leta ari yo ibishinzwe.

column2: Menya abakinyi 5 bashobora guhindura imigwi ku musi wa nyuma w'igura n'igurishwa 01.09.2022
column3: Arsenal iriteguye guheraheza umwumvikano wo kuzana umukinyi wo hagati wa Aston Villa Douglas Luiz yari muri Aston Villa. Douglas yipfuza kuva muri uwo mugwi ariko Villa iri mu madidane yo kumurekura batabanje kuronka uwusubira mu kibanza ciwe.  (The sunFootball) Muri iri joro Pierre Aubameyang arafata urugendo rumushikana i Londres guheraheza ibiganiro vyo kwimukira mu mugwi wa Chelsea avuye mu mugwi wa Barcelone, mu gihe Marcos Alonso nawe agiye iyo avuye.  (Romano) A﻿rsenal yarekuye umukinyi wayo w'inyuma mu buryo Hector Bellerin kwimukira muri Barcelone. Uwo mukinyi w'inyuma wo muri Espagne ntaronka umwanya wo gukina muri uwo mugwi akaba yariko aragerageza kwimukira muri Barca Umukinyi wo hagati wa Juventus Arthur Melo  ari mu Bwongereza guheraheza ibiganiro vyo kwimukira mu mugwi wa Liverpool. Azoshira umukono ku masezerano yo gutizwa umwaka umwe gushika mu 2023.

column2: Ingene twumva ico dukozeko n'ubushuhe vyaronse agashimwe ka Nobel
column3: Abahinga batoye ingene imibiri yacu yumva ubushuhe canke uguhoberwa n'uwo ukunda batsindiye agashimwe ka Nobel. David Julius na Ardem Patapoutian bo muri reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, basangiye ako gashimwe ko mu gisata c'ubuvuzi n'ico kwiga ingene ingingo z'umubiri zikora (physiologie) kubera igikorwa cabo ku kwumva ico ukozeko canke kigukozeko  hamwe n'ubushuhe. Batoye ingene bigenda kugira imibiri yacu ihindure ico umubiri wumva hari ikiwukozeko mu butumwa bw'umuyagankuba (amashanyarari) buca buja mu nzira z'ubwonko. Ivyo batoye bishobora gushika ku nzira nshasha z'ingene hagwanywa ububabare. Ubushuhe, imbeho (ubukonje) bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu kwumva ibiri iruhande yacu kugira dushobore  kubaho. Ariko ingene umubiri wacu ubikora canke ubigenza vyari bikiri  amayobera mu cigwa c'ubuzima (biologie). Abavumbuye Hepatite C bahawe igihembo cya Nobel Igihembo cy'amahoro cya Nobel cyahawe PAM Thomas Perlman, wo mu mugwi w'abatanga agashimwe ka Nobel, yavuze ati: "Ivyatowe ni ibintu bikomeye kandi vyimbitse cane." Yongerako ati: "Ibi vy'ukuri vyuguruye bimwe mu vyari bikiri ibinyegezwa ku bibaho". Ivyo Professeur David Julius yashitseko kuri kaminuza ya California, San Fransisco, vyavuye mu bushakashatsi ku bubare twumva iyo turiye ipiripiri ibaba, ico umuntu yovuga nk'ubumara (chemical ) bwitwa capsaicin. Yakoze ku nkomoko canke isoko ry'ukubaba mw'ipiripiri. Yatoye igice cihariye cakira/cumva  (recepteur) (nk'ikigize  uturemangingo  twacu twumva ibintu biri iruhande yacu)   ari naco giheza kigatanga ubutumwa ko  cumvise capsaicin. Ibindi bipimo vyerekanye ko iyo recepteur itanga ubutumwa ko yumvise ubushuhe kandi bubaye bwinshi ikabimenyesha. Ibi nivyo bishika , nk'akarorero, iyo intoke zituriwe n'igikombe c'icayi. Ivyo yatoye vyamushikanye ku  gutora utundi duce twinshi twakira canke twumva ubushuhe. Iyo uriko uraca ku musenyi ukawumva munsi y'ibirenge vyawe - izo 'recepteurs' nizo ziba zirungitse ubutumwa mu bwonko. Umugwi utanga agashimwe ka Nobel wavuze ko "Ubwo bumenyi buriko burakoreshwa mu kurondera ingene hovurwa ibiva ku ndwara zitandukanye harimwo ububabare buguma bugaruka." Abo babiri bazogabura ako gashimwe gaciye miriyoni cumi z'amafaranga ya Suede ( arenga umuriyoni w'ama dorari). Agashimwe ka Nobel gahabwa umuntu yagize igikorwa gifasha abantu mu kubaho kwabo. Ako gashimwe kitiriwe Alfred Nobel, umunya-Suede yatoye dynamite (bakoresha nko  mu guturitsa ibibuye binini binini nk'iyo bariko baraca/barubaka  amabarabara.

column2: Kerala: Menya uyu muhindikazi atereka ubwanwa
column3: Ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mugore wo mu Buhindi atereka ubwana bwiwe arashimirwa ariko kandi akanegurwa n’abantu. Ariko wewe avuga ko adahungabanywa n’ibivugwa vyose ku bwanwa bwiwe. "Ndakunda ubwanwa bwanje," Shyja w’imyaka 35 niko yanditse kuri WhatsApp, musi y’ifoto yiwe. Yama abazwa – n’abantu babona amafoto yiwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook canke bahura nawe amaso mu yandi – igituma atereka ubwanwa. Avuga ati: “Ikintu conyene novuga ni uko gusa ndabukunda. Cane”. Shyja, izina ryonyene akoresha, aba mu karere ka Kannur  mu ntara yo Kerala iri mu bumanuko bw’Ubuhindi. Nk’uko bimeze ku bagore batari bake, yaramaze imyaka itari mike atsiba ubwana bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu gihe yama amwa ingohe ziwe, Shyja avuga ko atigeze yumva ko akeneye kumwa ubwanwa bwiwe bwo hejuru. Mu myaka itanu iheze, bwatanguye kuba bwinshi buboneka neza kandi Shyja arabureka abinezererewe cane. Ati: "Ubu si mbona ko noshobora kubaho ntabufise. Igihe ikiza ca Covid gitangura, naranka kwambara agapfukamunwa igihe cose kubera kanzibira isura”. Abantu benshi bamubona bamusaba ko yokwikurako ubu bwanwa bwo hejuru ariko Shyja ntavyumva. "Sinigeze numva ko ndi mubi kubera ndabufise canke ko ari ikintu ntategerezwa kuba mfise”. Abagore bama babwirwa ko imishatsi yo kw’isura atari myiza kuri bo, ko rero botanga amafaranga kugira ngo bayibakure – canke bakayigabanya – igihe cose. Amahinguriro akora imiti yo kubuza imishatsi kumera aregeranya amamiriyaridi n’amamiriyaridi y’amadorari mu gukora amavuta, inzembe n’ibindi bishobora kurandurana n’imizi imishatsi, bigurwa n’abagore bashoboye kubigura. Ariko muri ino myaka ya vuba, abagore benshi bahisemwo kwemera mbere no kwishimira ubu bwanwa. Mu 2016, Harnaam Kaur aharanira ukwiyemera kw’umuntu uko aba ameze kwose (Body positive body positivity) yabaye umugore wa mbere akiri muto kw’isi yose yameze ubwanwa ku munwa wose no kw’itama nk’umugabo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo Guinness World Records. Mu biganiro yagiye atanga, yamye avuga ukungene ukwemera ubwanwa bwiwe kwabaye igihe gikomeye co kwiyemera imbere y’abamuzomera. Ku bwa Shyja, gutereka ubwanwa si ikintu umuntu afatira, ni kimwe mu bigize ubuzima bwiwe. Ati: "Jewe nkora ico nshatse. Iyaba nari mfise ubuzima bubiri, kumbure bumwe nari kububamwo uko abandi bashaka”. Kimwe mu vyatumye afata iyi ngendo ni ibibazo vy’amagara yahanganye navyo mu myaka itari mike. Shyja baramubaze  incuro zitandatu mu myaka cumi – rimwe kwari ukugira bamukure ikivyimba mw’ibere, irindi naryo kwari ukumukura utuvyimba mu gasaho k’imbuto. Aho aherukira kubagwa, kwari ukumukuramwo igitereko, haraciye imyaka itanu. Ati: "Igihe cose baheza kumbaga, naguma nizeye ko ntari gusubira muri ico cumba c’ibagiro”. Kubona yashoboye kurengana ibi bibazo vyose vy’amagara vyakomeje ivyiyumviro vya Shyja  ko ari ngombwa ko abaho mu buzima bwiwe bumuha umunezero. Shyja avuga ko akiri umwana yari afise isoni. Ni gake abagore mu kigwati ciwe bashobora kuboneka hanze inyuma y’isaha cumi na zibiri z’umugoroba. N’aho Kerala ari imwe mu ntara z’Ubuhindi zigenda zibaho ubuzima bwa none, kandi zifise ibimenyetso bikomeye vy’iterambere, mu turere twinshi umugabo ni we afise ijambo rya nyuma, kandi abagore bama babuzwa gufata ingendo canke kwibana. Igihe arongorwa akimukira mu ntara ya Tamil Nadu ihana urubibe n’iyo yavukiyemwo, Shyja avuga ko yaryohewe no kubona ubundi bwisanzure bushasha. Avuga ati: "Umugabo wanje yarashobora kuja ku kazi akagaruka atevye. Rero narashobora kwicara hanze ku mugoroba, rimwe na rimwe nkaja no kw’iduka ndi umwe mw’ijoro iyo hari ico nkeneye. Nta n’umwe yavyitaho. Igihe niga gukora ibintu jenyene, vyankomereje ukwiyemera”. Avuga kandi ko ariko aragerageza kuvyigisha umukobwa wiwe w’umuyabaga. Umuryango wa Shyja n’incuti ziwe bamye bamushigikira kuri buno bwanwa bwiwe. Umukobwa wiwe amubwira ko bumubereye. Ariko Shyja avuga ko yabwiwe amajambo y’ubwoko bwose avugwa n’abantu iyo bamubonye kw’ibarabara. Ati: "Abantu barantwenga bavuga ngo ‘abagabo bonyene nibo bamera ubwanwa, kubera iki umugore yobumera’?” Mu myaka itari mike, ni kenshi yagiye avugwa mu binyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Mu misi iheze, nk’uko abivuga, yarabonye amajambo y’agahemo yanditswe ku nkuru yamuvuga yari yacishijwe ku rubuga rwa Facebook n’ikinyamakuru co muri ico gihugu. Umuntu umwe yabajije igituma atari gufata urwembwe akamwa ubwanwa bwiwe bimaze kuboneka ko ingohe ziwe yari yazimoye. Ati:"Ariko si ikibazo kijanye n’ivyo nshaka – none ngumye iki hanyuma nikureko iki?” Abagenzi ba Shyja akenshi bishurana agashavu kuri ano majambo yandikwa kuri Facebook, ariko avuga ko ivyo ataco bimubwiye na gato. "Mu bisanzwe, kenshi ndabaraba nkabatwenga”.

column2: USA: Ibiciro vy’igitoro vyakorotse ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka yaho
column3: Igiciro c'ibitoro muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cakorotse cane ku buryo butari bwaboneke mu mateka y'ico gihugu. Ivyo bituma abahingura ico gitoro biba ngombwa ko babanza kuriha abakirangura kugira ngo bakibakureko, ku gutinya ko mu kwa gatanu bashobora kubura n'aho bagishira. Abagura igitoro baragabanutse rwose mu gihe ingingo zo kuguma  murugo ahatandukanye kw'isi yose zatumye abantu baguma biyugaranye. Vyatumye amahinguriro y'igitoro akodesha amatanki kugira ngo bashobore kubika ibitoro vy'umurengera, ibiciro mu gihugu cose bikoroka. Igiciro c'akagunguru muri West Texas Intermediate (WTI), ishingiro ry'igitoro ca Amerika, caramanutse kija musi y'amadorari 37.63 ku kagunguru. Stewart Glickman, umushakashatsi wo mu kigo ca Amerika Center for Financial Research and Analysis (CEFRA) kijejwe kwihweza ibijanye n'amafaranga avuga ati: "Ibiriko biraba birarengeye ubwenge. Igabanuka ry'abakiriya ryararengeye ivyo abantu bashobora kuba bari biteze". Avuga ko mu gihe izi ngingo za Guma murugo zobandanya uko ziri bishobora gutuma ibiciro vy'igitoro no mu kwa gatandatu bibandanya bikoroka. Ati: "Ni ukuri nta cizere mfise ko ibintu bishobora kworoha ku makompanyi adandaza igitoro canke ku biciro vyaco". Igisata c'igitoro kiri mu ngorane z'uko abagishaka bagabanutse kubera coronavirus hamwe n'ukutumvikana hagati y'ibihugu bisanzwe bicimbura. Mu ntango za kuno kwezi, ishirahamwe OPEP/ OPEC rihuza ibihugu vyimbura igitoro hamwe n'ibihugu bicuditse vyarahavuye birashika ku masezerano yo kugabanya urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa gushika hafi 10%. Muri ayo masezerano bumvikanye ko urugero rw'igitoro cimburwa rugabanywa ku buryo butari bwigere bubaho. Hagati aho, abahinga babona ko iryo gabanywa ata kintu kinini rizohindura. Stephen Innes ajejwe ubudandaji mu kigo Axicorp avuga ati: "Ntivyafashe umwanya muremure kugira ngo abadandaza igitoro babone ko amasezerano yashitsweko na OPEP/ OPEC - uravye ingene ameze ubu - atazoshobora gutuma  isoko y'igitoro isubira ku murongo". Ku bashoferi ba Amerika, ikoroka ry'ibiciro vy'igitoro - vyamanutse hafi ku bice 2/3  kuva mu ntango z'uyu mwaka - ryaragize ingaruka ku giciro co kw'ipompo, n'aho ejo ku wa mbere  bitakorotse uko vyari vyitezwe. Glickman ati: "Ikiriho ni uko, n'aho woba ukeneye kuja mw'ibarabara kubera imvo iyi canke iriya, ukenera igitoro gike cane gusumba uko vyari bimeze mu mezi ane aheze". "Ingorane nyamukuru kuri benshi muri twebwe ni uko n'aho wocuzuza, uzoja he?". Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko leta ishobora kugura igitoro gihingurwa muri ico gihugu. Ariko amakenga ahari ni uko ububiko bwaco bushobora kurengerwa, mu gihe ububiko bw'ikompanyi Cushing, ikompanyi nkuru itanga igitoro muri Amerika, bwarengewe gushika ku bice 50% kuva mu kwa gatatu, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibanki ANZ.

column2: Stella Tushabe, umwe mu bakobwa bake bavuze saxophone mu Rwanda
column3: Stella Tushabe, umwe mu bakobwa bake bavuze saxophone mu Rwanda. Mwumve mu kiganiro na Yvette Kabatesi, aho atubwira uko yatangiye kwiga kuvuza iki gicurarangisho.

column2: Umuntu ashaje gusumba abandi i Buraya yarokotse Covid imbere y'isabukuru y'imyaka 117
column3: Umubikira w'umufaransa, umunyabulaya ashaje gusumba abandi bose kuri uwo mugabane, yarokotse Covid-19, mu gihe hasigaye imisi mike ngo ahimbaze isabukuru y'imyaka 117 amaze avutse. Lucile Randon, yiswe izina ry'ikibikira rya Mama Andre mu 1944, yamenyekanye ko yanduye coronavirus ku wa 16 z'ukwa mbere ariko nta bimenyetso na bimwe yagaragaje. Yabwiye ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ko ata n'uko yari azi ko yayanduye. Yaciye yitaramura mu nzu y'abakukuruke iri ahitwa Toulon mu bumanuko bw'Ubufaransa, ariko ubu aboneka ko yakize neza. Mama Andre, ubu akaba atabona kandi agendera kw'igare y'abamugaye, ariko yitegurira guhimbaza ivuka ryiwe ejo ku wa kane - n'aho azohimbaza uwo musi ari kumwe n'abantu bake cane, gusumba uko vyahora. Umuvugizi w'ikigo c'abakukuruke ca Sainte Catherine Labouré, David Tavella, avuga ati: "Yaragiriwe amahirwe menshi". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Var Matin ati: "Ntiyambajije ibijanye n'amagara yiwe, ahubwo yambajije ibijanye n'imibereho yiwe. Nk'akarorero, yaripfuje kumenya nimba amasaha yo gufungura no kuryama bigiye guhinduka". "Ntiyigeze yerekana ko atinya iyi ndwara. Ahubwo yari afitiye impungenge abandi basanzwe babana muri ico kigo". Mamar Andre yavutse ku wa 11 z'ukwa kabiri mu 1904. Mu gihe azwi ko ari we muntu wa mbere ashaje ku mugabane wa Buraya, azwi kandi nk'umuntu agira kabiri ashaje kw'isi yose, nk'uko biri ku rutonde rw'ikigo Gerontology Research Group's (GRG) gisanzwe gikora ubushakashatsi bwo kurondera abantu bashaje kw'isi. Abajijwe n'ikinyamakuru co mu Bufaransa BFM nimba yari afise ubwoba bwo kuba yaranduye Covid, Mama Andre yishuye ati: "Oya, nta bwoba nari mfise, kubera ntatinya gupfa". "Ndanezerewe no kuba kumwe na mwe, ariko nipfuza ko mba ndi ahandi hantu - kumwe na mukuru wanje, sokuru wanje na nyokuru wanje".

column2: Covid-19 mu 2021: Ivyo tumaze kumenya gushika ubu kuri uwo mugera
column3: Mu kiringo c'umwaka uheze ishami rya ONU ryitaho amagara kw'isi ritangaje ikiza ca Covid-19, twarabonye inguvu zidasanzwe z'abahinga zo kugerageza gutahura/gusobanukirwa ibijanye n'uwo mugera. Abashakashatsi kw'isi nzima barakoranye uko bitari bwigere biba ku buryo ibintu ubundi vyari kumara imyaka n'iyindi kugira bimenyekane - mu bumenyi, ubushakashatsi n'ugukora incanco - vyakozwe mu kiringo c'amezi gusa. Ibi ni bimwe mu vyo twamenye muri ayo mezi 12 aheze. Ibimenyetso vy'iyo ndwara vyamenyekanye ubwa mbere vyari ubushuhe n'agakorora. Bidatevye, abantu benshi bafise iyo ndwara batanguye kwumva batakimoterwa canke/kandi batumva ico bariye ingene kimeze ivyo bica vyongerwa ku rutonde rwa OMS rw'ibimenyetso bikunda kugaragara. Uko ico kiza cagiye kirakomera, ibindi bimenyetso bitagaragara kuri benshi vyarabonetse, harimwo: OMS igira inama abantu barwaye cane kwihuta kuja kwa muganga. Ibimenyetso bikomeye bishobora kubamwo ingorane zo guhema, kunanirwa kuvuga canke kwiyunguruza, kutamenya neza ibiriko biraba, canke kwumva ububabare mu gikiriza. Turazi ko umuntu asanganywe izindi ngorane z'amagara bishobora gutuma asinzikazwa na Covid -19 ari naco gituma OMS ihanura abantu basanganywe ibibazo vy'amahaha, diabete, indwara z'umutima canke cancer gufata ingingo zo kwirinda kwandura uwo mugera. N'ubwo benshi mu banduye iyo ndwara bakira vuba, ivyigwa vyerekana ko kuri bamwe Covid -19 ishobora gutera ingaruka z'igihe kirekire ku bice bimwe bimwe vy'umubiri harimwo umutima n'amahaha. Mu mezi ya mbere y'ico kiza, OMS yashimika ivuga ko Covid -19 yandukira iyo abantu bakoroye canke basamuye, utuma/udutonyanga tugakorokera ku  kintu aho kuguma mu kirere. Nico gituma gukaraba vyafashwe nk'imwe mu ngingo zikomeye zo kwirinda - kugira abafise iyo ndwara ntibanduze aho bakoze, ariho hokwanduruka gukwirakwiza umugera. Ariko icigwa ca vuba casohotse mu kinyamakuru British Medical Journal cerekana ko ukwandukirwa na SARS-CoV-2 imaze kuja ku kintu ubu bifatwa ko bikara buke ugereranije n'uguca mu buhumekero. Ibiherutse gutorwa vyerekana ko Covid -19 ahanini yandukira hagati y'abantu begeranye biciye mu tuma/udutonyanga tuba turi mu kirere. Ibi bishobora gushika imbere mu nzu, ahantu hari abantu benshi kandi hadahita akayaga neza, aho umuntu umwe canke benshi baba bafise umugera bamarana umwanya mununi n'abandi, nk'uko bivugwa na OMS. Ari naco gituma vyinshi mu vyahagaritswe mu buzima bwa minsi yose kwari kubuza abantu guhura ari benshi ahantu hapfunze. Incanco za Covid -19 zisa n'iziriko ziragira ico zihinduye Gucandaga biriko biragira ico bihinduye gikomeye ku gitigiri c'abantu baja mu bitaro kubera Covid -19 mu Bwongereza, ubu ibiharuro bikaba vyerekana ko incanco ziriko ziragabanya abantu baja mu bitaro n'abapfa, co kimwe n'ukwandukizanya. Umwigisha wa kaminuza Calum Semple, umuhinga ari mu bajenama ba reta y'Ubwongereza avuga ati: "Biranezereye cane kuboba ibiharuro bifatiye ku buzima bwa minsi yose vyerekana ko urucanco rukora neza". Mu bisanzwe bishobora gufata imyaka 10 kugira urucanco rukorwe - ariko nk'iza Pfizer, Moderna na AstraZeneca za Covid -19 zakozwe mu mwanya muto cane ugereranije n'uwo, bivuye mu  ruhande rumwe kubera ubuhinga bwa none, ukwongereza uburyo hamwe no kugabanya uruhererakane rwo mu biro. Ariko n'ubwo gukora incanco vyafashe amezi, abantu benshi bazorindira imyaka kugira baruterwe. Hari ubusumbane bunini cane kw'isi iyo hageze gusabikanya incanco hagati y'ibihugu bikize n'ibikenye. Kandi mu gihe urucanco ata nkeka ko ruzogwanya uwo mugera, rushobora kudatanga ubudahangarwa buhoraho kuko abasirikare b'umubiri haragera igihe bagasaza. Haheze amezi barwaye iyo ndwara, hari abantu benshi babandanya kugaragaza ibimenyetso bitari bike, bizwi nka Covid ndende. OMS ivuga ko abantu bashika umwe kuri 10 bibashikira kandi bakagira uburuhe bwinshi, kumeneka umutwe, kubabara mu gikiriza n'akabonge. Ikiza kigitera, abantu baragira ikibazo c'uko bitabwaho muri izo ngaruka z'igihe kirekire, n'ubu abahinga ntibaramenya igituma bamwe bazigira abandi ntibazigire. Abahinga baraciga ingaruka z'igihe kirekire za Covid b-19, icigwa giherutse gusohoka kikaba cerekana ko abantu bigeze kurwara uwo mugera, naho boba batababaye cane, baba bafise ivyago vyinshi vyo gupfa canke kurwara bakaremba mu mezi atandatu akurikira ukurwara. Ziyad Al-Aly, umwigisha w'umwunganizi mu vy'ubuvuzi kuri kaminuza ya Washington muri Saint Louis, avuga ati: "Kubera ibibazo biterwa na Covid-19 bishobora  kuba bikomeye, ingaruka z'iyo ndwara zishobora kuguma zisubiriza ku myaka myinshi". "Abaganga bategerezwa kuhagabira ku gusuzuma abantu baba bararwaye Covid -19. Bene abo bantu bakenera kwitabwaho mu buryo bufatiye ku ngero nyinshi." Hari ubwoko butandukanye ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bwa Covid butembera. Ivyo ni ukuvyitega, kuko imigera irihindura kugira ikwiragire, ikagenda irafata iyindi sura. Akenshi ubwo budasa ntaco buba buvuze, ariko hari igihe butuma umugera ubangama canke wandukira gusumba. Ubwoko bwo mu Bwongereza, Afrika y'Epfo, Brezil, n'Ubuhindi bwose bwarahindutse agace kabwo kamata ku turemangingo tw'umuntu. Guhinduka umugera ukaba N501Y nk'akarorero, bisa n'ibituma umugera winjira mu turemangingo kandi ukwirakwira neza gusumba. Aho ni mu gihe ubwoko bwo mu Bwomgereza, B.1.1.7, hari ubushakashatsi bwerekana ko bushobora kuba bufitaniye isano n'urugero rwo gushobora gupfa rushika ku 30%. Ariko icigwa ntikiraba kanuni. Abana bafise urugero ruto cane rwo kurwara Abana barashobora kwandura Covid -19 ariko ivyemezo bihari vyerekena ko bafise urugero ruri hasi cane rwo gushobora kurwara cane ugereranije n'abakuze, gushika ubu, kandi  bisa n'uko n'urugero rw'uko bashobora kwanduza ari ruto. Abahinga bariko bariga ngo barabe niba ubwoko bushasha burimwo ubushobora kuba bwandukira abakiri bato gusumba. Mu kwezi guheza, vyavuzwe ko hagati y'ukwezi kwa kabiri mu 2020 n'itariki 15 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2021, Covid -19 yahitanye abana b'abanya-Brezil 852 bo gushika ku myaka icenda, harimwo inzoya 518 zifise munsi y'umwaka, hisunzwe ibitigiri bitangwa n'ubushikiranaganji bwa Brezil bujejwe amagara. Abahinga bavuga ko ibitigiri vy'abanduye Covid muri ico gihugu -  igitigiri ca kabiri kini kw'isi, vyatumye ivyago vy'uko abana bo muri Brezil bandura vyongerekana. Ibindi bibazo biri muri ico gihugu birimwo kudakora ibipimo, abana bafise ibindi bimenyetso nko gucibwamwo canke kubabara mu nda, canke kubura amikoro yo kwivuza. Ingaruka ziziguye z'uwo mugera nazo zirakora cane ku bana, mu gihe ukunanirwa kw'inzego z'ubuvuzi biturutse kuri Covid-19 bisobora gutuma haba impfu 239.000 z'abavyeyi n'abana muri Asia y'Epfo, hakurikijwe icegeranyo ca ONU casohotse mu ntango z'uwu mwaka. . Igihe ikinyamakuuru Nature cabaza abantu 100 b'abahinga, abashakashatsi, abakurikirana indwara z'imigera n'izandukira bakora kuri Covid -19, hafi 90% bavuze ko bibaza ko izohinduka indwara yama iri ngaho. Bibaza ko uwo mugera uzobandanya "kuguma utembera mu duce tumwe tumwe tw'abantu kw'isi mu myaka iri imbere". Ariko n'ubwo twotegerezwa kwiga kubana na Covid-19, ivyo ntibisigura ko tuzoguma tubona urugero rwo gupfa no kwandura twabonye muri uyu mwaka urangiye. Akamangu (influenza) karacahitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihubi buri mwaka ariko abantu ubu baramenyereye kutagira ico ibagize cane. Covid nayo ishobora guhinduka indwara nk'iyo; imwe usanga hari gihe ivumbuka, kandi abantu bashobora kurwara akarenga rimwe. Mu ntango z'iki kiza, impanuro zo gukwirakwiza Covid -19 ntizari zimwe, mu gihe hari ama reta mu bihugu bitandukanye yatanga inama zitandukanye nyene ku banyagihugu bayo. Ariko ubu OMS ifise intumbero itomoye y'ibikeneye gukurikizwa mu kwirinda. Kutegerana cane mu gusiga nibura imetero hagati y'umuntu n'uwundi, kwambara agafukamunwa gafuka amazuru n'umunwa, no gukaraba, nivyo nyamukuru. Wogerageza kandi mu vyumba hakaguma haca akayaga, hanyuma ukurinda ahantu harundanye abantu benshi. Ukeneye gukorora, kororera mu mfuruka y'inkokora canke mu gatambara. Hanyuma wemerewe urucanco, rufate vyihuta, kuko OMS ihanura ko "incanco zemewe za Covid -19, zitanga urugero runini rwo gukingira umuntu gusinzikazwa no kwicwa n'iyo ndwara". Haracari vyinshi tutaramenya kuri Covid-19 N'ubwo hari ibintu vyinshi ubushakashatsi bumaze gutora kuri Covid -19, hari vyinshi n'ubu tutaramenya kuri uwo mugera - na cane cane iyo hageze ikibazo co kumenya ryari tuzoshika ku budahangarwa bw'ikivunga, kubera iki abantu basinzikara kurusha abandi, canke ubwa mbere ho ingene uwo mugera winjiye mu muntu. Haracari kare kuvuga igihe ubudahangarwa bushobora kumara, canke niba hari ubudasa hagati y'ugukingirwa bitangwa n'urucanco, canke ukuje inyuma yo kurwara. Ntituzi kandi incuro umuntu ashobora gusubira kwandura uwo mugera wa Covid -19, canke niba iyo ndwara iza idakaze iyo ije ubugira kabiri. Abashakatsi barabandanya kwiga ivyo bintu vyose, no kwiga ingene umugera ugenda urihindugura mu bice bitandukanye vy'isi. Icizere n'uko ivyo bariko barakora bizotuma twisuganye kigira duhangane n'uwo mugera n'ubwoko bwayo bushasha, muri kazoza.

column2: Tanzania: Perezida Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyama abamunegura ku madeni yo hanze
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania Samia Suluhu Hassan ariyamiriza akarwi k'abategetsi bo hejuru b'ico gihugu banegura reta yiwe ku madeni yasavye mu mashirahamwe yo hanze mu ntumbero yo kurangura imigambi y'iterambere. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ari mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu rigacishwa ku mboneshakure, Perezida Samia Hassan arasigura akamaro k'amadeni mu kurangura imigambi y'iterambere ya reta. Yariko arakira icegeranyo kivuye mu bushikiranganji butandukanye c'ukungene amafaranga agenewe kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19 igihugu cahawe n'abatanga imfashanyo y'iterambere ariko arakoreshwa. Perezida Samia avuga ko mu gihe ibindi bihugu bikoresha ayo mafaranga mu kugura ibikoresho vyo kwikingira nk'udupfukantoke n'udupfukamunwa, Tanzania yoyo yakoresheje mu bwitonzi ayo mafaranga mu gukomeza igisata c'amagara y'abantu no mu kwubaka amavuriro mashasha. Aya mafaranga yafashije kandi kwubaka amasomero mashasha y'amashure n'ibigo vy'ukwigiramwo mu turere dutandukanye tw'igihugu. Avuga ko yumva ko yahemukiwe n'abanegura reta yiwe kubona yakiriye aya madeni mvamahanga. Ati: "Birababaje kubona umuntu wari wizigiye afise amabanga nk'ayo akomeye muri reta agukorera ivyo". Ashikirije aya majambo inyuma y'umusi umwe umukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Job Ndugai, asavye imbabazi ku mugaragaro ku majambo yari aherutse gushikiriza, yafashwe ko yayabwiye reta ya Samia Hassan ku bijanye n'amadeni yo hanze. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza iri jambo, Perezida Samia Hassan yavuze ko amwe mu majambo yo kumunegura afitaniye isano n'amatora yo mu 2025, abatari bake bakaba babona ko azorondera kwitoreza ikindi kiringo. Samia Hassan yashitse ku butegetsi mu ntango z'umwaka uheze inyuma y'urupfu rwa Perezida John Pombe Magufuli yari atanguye ikiringo ciwe kigira kabiri kikaba n'ica nyuma gitegekanywa n'ibwirizwashingiro.

column2: Ingaruka y’ibitero vy’abitwaje ibirwanisho kuri Ebola muri Kongo
column3: Imirwi y'abaganga bariko barafasha guhangana n'ikiza ca Ebola muri Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo bavuga ko utwigoro twabo tuburizwamwo n'ibitero bikorwa ku bakozi babo. Umugera w'iyo ndwara uriziziye intara zo mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu za Kivu y'Uburaruko hamwe na Ituri, uturere twiganjemwo imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho. Ishirahamwe Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) rivuga riti: "Nta cizere ko ukutizerwa be n'ibitero bikorwa ku bigo bijejwe kurwanya Ebola biriko birahagarara". Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, rirakurikirana ibitero bikorwa ku bajejwe amagara y'abantu n'ibigo vy'ubuvuzi. Uno mwaka wa 2019, muri ico gihugu ca Kongo niho habaye ibitero vyinshi gusumba, aho bimaze gushika ku 174, mu gihe mu gihugu ca Afghanistani ivyo bitero vyabaye 41, nayo muri Syria haba 35. Muri ivyo bitero, hariho ibikorwa ku bigo vy'ubuvuzi/amavuriro, ku bakozi, ku barwaye hamwe no ku miduga ikoreshwa muri ico gikorwa. OMS ivuga ko abantu batanu bamaze kwicwa uno mwaka, abandi 51 barakomeretswa. Muri ivyo bikorwa vy'iterabwoba n'ivyo bitero, abakozi baterwa amabuye, mu gihe ibigo vy'ubuvuzi navyo biterwa n'abitwaje ibirwanisho bakongera bakanabiturira. Biribonekeza ko abanyagihugu batizeye abakozi b'abanyamahanga hamwe n'ivyo babwirwa ku vyerekeye iki kiza ca Ebola. Icigwa casohotse mu mwaka wa 2018 mu kinyamakuru c'ubuvuzi, Lancet, cerekana ko "amakuru atari yo yakwiragijwe" ku vyerekeye ikiza ca Ebola mu ntara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko. Ica kane c'ababajijwe muri ico cigwa bavuga ko Ebola itabaho, abenshi muri bo bakavuga ko ikiza ca Ebola cakozwe ku nyungu z'amahera canke kugira ngo bahungabanye ako karere. Mu ntara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko, umurwi witwaje ibirwanisho witwa Mai-Mai, niwo wakoze ibitero ku bigo n'abakozi bajejwe ubuvuzi. Hari uwundi murwi urwanya ubutegetsi bwa Uganda usanzwe ukorera mu gihugu ca Kongo, Allied Defence Forces (ADF), nawo nyene ukaba wagirizwa gutera ibigo bijejwe ubuvuzi. Hampande y'iyo mirwi, hariho n'iyindi itazwi ikora ibitero ku bigo bijejwe ubuvuzi. Hari ikindi kintu kidasanzwe giherutse gushika mu kwezi guheze ka gatanu, aho abo mu muryango wari wapfishije umuntu basimbiye ku baganga bari baherekeje uwo muryango mu bikorwa vyo gushingura uwabo yari yasandavye. Amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu ajejwe ubutabazi avuga ko abanyagihugu banse kuyizera. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe MSF, Meinie Nicolai , avuga ati: "Ico tuzi ni uko abariko bafasha kurwanya Ebola - MSF  irimwo - batizewe n'abanyagihugu batari bake". MSF ivuga ko mu gihe ibihuha n'ibinyoma arivyo bikwiragizwa, abantu bafise kugira amakenga ku twigoro two kurwanya uwo mugera.

column2: Jus za pomme zikorwa na Ceres zisabwa kuvanwa mw'icuruzwa
column3: Umutobe (jus/juice)  wa pomme (apple) ukorwa na kompanyi yo muri Africa y'Epfo Ceres vyasabwe ko uvanwa mw'icuruzwa  mu bihugu indwi vyo muri Afrika vyawuranguye kubera ufise urugero runini rwa patulin  ishobora gutera kudahwa no gusesemwa. Patulin n'ubumara buterwa n'ifira ry'ubwoko butandukanye  usanga mu ma pommes canke mu bikozwe mu ma pommes. Ibipimo vyo muri laboratoire  vyerekanye ko imitobe ya Ceres irimwo patulin ku rugero ruri hejuru cane y'urwemewe rwa microgrammes 50 kuri ritiro imwe. Iyo mitobe igurishwa muri Kenya, RDC (Congo Kinshasa), Zambia, Zimbabwe, Uganda, Seychelles n'izinga rya Maurice. Ariko no mu bihugu bibanyi vy'ivyo vyaranguye  iyo mitobe ishobora kuba ishikayo. Urwego rw'isoko rusangi rw'ibihugu vyo muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko n'iy'ubumanuko (Comesa)  rwahimirije abaguzi gusubiza imitekero yose ifise amatariki yo hagati ya 14 na 30 ukwezi kwa gatandatu 2021.

column2: Mu mafoto: Umwami Charles ku musi wa mbere atanguye amabanga
column3: Ku wa gatanu mu gatondo, niho Umwami mushasha w'Ubwongereza Charles III yava i Balmoral akaja i Londres /London, inyuma y'urupfu rwa nyina wiwe, Umwamikazi. Muri urwo rugendo ari kumwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe, Camilla Umwami yafashe indege yamuvanye i Aberdeen imujana ku kibuga c'indege ca RAF Northolt imbere y'uko aja gushikiriza ijambo igihugu aciye ku mboneshakure. Ashitse ku kirimba ca Buckingham, yasanganiwe n'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bamwipfuriza kuroranirwa muri  bino bihe bishasha. Ejo ku wa gatanu nyene, abahungu biwe, Abaganwa William na Harry, niho bava i Balmoral. Umwami Charles III yururutse imodoka ku kirimba ca  Buckingham nk'Umwami ku ncuro ya mbere

column2: South Korea: Kompanyi y'amata yasavye imbazi kubera yerekanye abagore nk'inka
column3: Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'amata muri Korea y'Epfo vyabaye ngombwa ko isaba imbabazi kubera video yo kwamamaza (publicité, advert) yerekana abagore nk'inka. Iyo video ya Seoul Milk yerekana umugabo ariko afata rwihishwa amashusho y'abagore bari mu murima, mu nyuma baca bahinduka inka. Imaze kunegurwa cane, iyo kompanyi yaciye ivana iyo publicité kuri YouTube, ariko kuva ico gihe imaze guhererekanywa cane inyuma yo gusubizwa  ku mbuga n'abakoresha internet. Bamwe bagereranije kandi inyifato y'uwo mugabo na "molka", ingeso itemewe yo gufata amashusho abantu rwihishwa. Ishami rya Seoul Milk, Seoul Dairy Cooperative ryavuze mu mbabazi ryashize kuri internet riti: "Turasavye imbabazi bivuye ku mutima ku muntu wese yababajwe n'iyo publicité y'amata yasohotse itariki 29 mu kwezi guheze". "Twemera ko iki kibazo gikomeye kandi tozokwisuzuma, hanyuma turushirizeho kwiyubara kugira ibintu nk'ibi ntibisubire gushika muri kazoza. Turicishije bugufi mu gusaba imbabazi". Iyo video itangura yerekana umugabo afise camera ariko yitembereza mu gahinga. Ijwi ry'umugabo ryumvikana rivuga ngo: "Amaherezo twashoboye kubafata amashusho na camera mu kibanza ciza cane". Aho haca hakurikira uwo mugabo yinyegeje mu bisaka, ariko afata amashusho rwihishwa umugwi w'abagore bariko baranywa amazi mu mugezi bongera bagira yoga. Hagera aho uwo mugabo ahonyora atabishaka kw'ishami ry'igiti, abo bagore bagaca bikanga buno nyene bagaca bahinduka inka. Iyo publicité irangizwa n'aya majambo: "Amazi meza, indya nziza, amata ya Seoul Milk ni  100%. Amata atagira akanenge, avuye mw'iraro ritagira akanenge mu murima uteye igomwe wa Cheongyang." Iyo publicité/advert yatumye haba impari zikomeye mu gihugu ku bijanye n'ivangura n'ibindi bibazo bishingiye ku bitsina ariko ibineguro ntivyagarukiye ku kwerekana abagore nk'inka gusa. Bamwe barerekanye amakenga yo kuba umugabo afata rwishishwa amashusho y'abagore, mu gihe ivyaha vyo gufata amashusho rwishishwa vyagwiriye cane muri Korea y'Epfo muri iyi myaka. Molka, bisigura "camera yinyegeje", ubu yabaye ikibazo kidasanzwe ku bagore muri Korea y'Epfo. Si ubwa mbere Seoul Milk ivugwa mu binyamakuru kubera imvo zitari nziza. Mu 2003, iyo kompanyi yatunganije agakino aho abanyamideri bari gusa basukanako ikivuguto   (yoghurt). Umukuru w'igisata co kwamamaza muri Seoul Milk hamwe n'abagize uruhara muri ako gakino baratangishijwe ihadabu kubera kwerekana ibiterasoni.

column2: Kenya: Reta yahevye amakori yari yatumye ikena ry'imiti yo gupfupfahaza Sida
column3: Kenya yahevye amakori ku mfashanyo y'imiti yo gupfupfahaza Sida yari imaze amezi atatu iri mu mpari zatumye iyo miti ikena mu gihugu. Umushikiranganji ajejwe ikigega ca reta yavuze ko uko guheba  amakori kuri iyo mfashanyo ya USAID (Urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe iterambere mpuzamakungu) kubaye inyuma y'aho umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu avugiye ko miriyoni z'abanya Kenya bari ku miti yo gupfupfahaza Sida (ARV) bariko barayibura. Ibitaro vyinshi ubu vyari bisigaye bitanga iyo miti ku rushi, kugira birabe ko iyo bifise mu bubiko imara igihe kirekire gishoboka. Kare abarwayi ba Sida bahora bahabwa imiti ibamaza amezi atandatu icarimwe,  ariko ubu bari basigaye habwa iyimara indwi imwe gusa. Iryo kena bivugwa ryatanguriye aho USAID yankiye kwinjiza imiti ibicisihije mu rwego rwa Kenya rujejwe imiti , KEMSA,  ivuga ko ari ku mpamvu z'ibiturire n'ikoreshwa nabi ry'iyo miti. USAID yahisemwo gucisha iyo miti mw'ikompanyi yigenga mu kuyinjiza no kuyikwiza mu gihugu. Imiti ibiri nkenerwa cane,  Nevirapine na Zidovudine banywa, yo ntihari hagisigaye namba. Umwe ufasha kurwanya ubwiyongere bw'umugera , uwundi na wo ufasha kubuza ko umuvyeyi yanduza umwana ari munda n'iyo amaze kumuvyara. Ku bw'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu, mu mwaka uheze abana bashika 6.800 baravukanye umugera wa Sida kuko abavyeyi babo batafashe imiti neza  igihe bari bafise inda no mu nyuma yo kwibaruka. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu baja batanguye gusemerera bavuga ko ibitigiri vy'abavyeyi banduza abana vyaduze. Ubu abavyeyi bagiriwe inama yo kudasubira kwonsa abana babo kuko  abo bana batariko bararonka imiti nk'uko itegerezwa kubangikana.

column2: Ukraine: 'ntihagire ikindi mugurira muri Russia kiretse umwavu n’ingano' - niko US igabisha Africa
column3: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw’ishirahamwe ONU  yaragendeye ibihugu vya Afrika, kimwe mu vya mugenza, kwari ukugabisha ko bitohirahira ngo bigurire ikintu kindi mu Burusiya kiretse intete n’umwavu, anagabisha ko bishobora gufatirwa ibihano. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru i Kampala muri Uganda, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ati:  “Uburusiya bwama buvuga ngo ibihano bwafatiwe ku mfungurwa no ku bindi bifitaniye isano n’uburimyi vyatumye ibiciro biduga mu bihugu bitari bike. [...] Nagomba kumenyesha ko ata bihano twafatiwe ibintu ivyo ari vyo vyose vy’uburimyi biva mu Burusiya. “Uburusiya burashobora gushora hanze ibidandazwa vyabwo vyo mu gisata c’uburimyi, harimwo umwavu n’ingano, kandi n’ibindi bihugu birashobora kubigura”. “Nayo ku bihano vyafatiwe Uburusiya”, niko Linda Thomas-Greenfield abandanya avuga, “nk’akarorero ku bitoro, mu gihe igihugu cofata ingingo yo gukorana n’Uburusiya mu bisata bwafatiwemwo ibihano, aho coba gihonyanze ibi bihano[…].  Aha rero tugabisha ibihugu ko bitohirahira ngo birenge kuri ibi bihano”. Ibihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika bishima kutegamira kuri Ukraine muri ino ntambara yayo n’Uburusiya. Ibi mu bisanzwe bisigurwa n’ukutagirira icizere Uburengero, imyaka vyamaze mu bukoloni, be n’impuhwe z’incabwenge mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika zize mu Burusiya. Aho nyene, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika ni abakiriya bakomeye b’intete za Ukraine, bakaba bahanzwe n’ikibazo c’ubukene bw’imfungurwa kigenda ciyongera. Ni mu gihe ku rubuga, intambara zibandanya ziha inkumbi muri Ukraine. Mu turere tw’intara ya Donetsk tugenzurwa na Ukraine, abasivire batanu baraye bishwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya, nk’uko bivugwa n’umukuru wa gisirikare muri Donetsk Pavel Kirilenko. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Telegram ati: "Kw’igenekerezo rya 5 Myandagaro (5), Abarusiya bishe abasivire batanu ba Donbass. Abandi 14 barakomeretse”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko hari igice kigira kabiri c’imfashanyo Amerika iha Ukraine gifise agaciro k’umuriyaridi umwe cimirije gutangwa. Isoko ryabwiye Reuters ko ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Amerika mu ndwi iza - ari nko ku wa mbere – bizotangaza iyindi mfashanyo ingana n’umuriyaridi w’amadorari y’abanyamerika izorungikirwa Ukraine. Muri ino mfashanyo harimwo ibisasu vya za muzinga zitera ibisasu vyinshi, zizwi nka HIMARS, ibirwanisho vyo gukorora indege vyo mu bwoko bwa NASAMS, hamwe n’ibimodoka ntamenwa vyo m ugisata c’ubuvuzi, bizwi nka 50 M113. Perezida Joe Biden ntaratera igikumu kuri uru rupapuro, bikaba bishoboka ko ibigize iyi mfashanyo, ibi navyo bikaba ari ibitigiri hamwe n’ubwoko bw’ibirwanisho, bishobora guhinduka. Mu gihe Biden yoterako igikumu, iyi yoba ari yo mfashanyo nini cane itangiwe icarimwe ihabwa Ukraine kuva intambara itanguye. Amerika imaze kurungikira Ukraine imfashanyo y’agaciro k’imiriyaridi 8.8 igizwe n’ibirwanisho n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. Maison Blanche/White House yanse kugira ico ishikirije ku vyerekeye iyi mfashanyo yimirije.

column2: Anthony Martial: Yatyojwe kuri Instagram kubera ibara ry'urukoba rwiwe
column3: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Anthony Martial yatyojwe ku rubuga rwa Instagram mu butumwa bw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yarungikiwe inyuma y'urukino rwahuje umurwi wiwe na West Brom ku wa Mungu rukarangira iyo mirwi yompi inganya 1-1. Bugize kabiri mu ndwi zitatu gusa Martial atyojwe, inyuma ya bagenzi we Marcus Rashford na Axel Tuanzebe nabo nyene baherutse guhura n'iki kibazo c'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Mu ndwi iheze, Facebook, ari yo mwene Instagram, yatangaje ko itazohagarika umwe mu bakoresha uru rubuga yatyoje umukinyi wa Swansea Yan Dhanda kubera ari umwirabure. Troy Townsend wo mw'ishirahamwe Kick It Out rirwanya ivangura ati: "Raba birasubiriye kandi". "Ubu ni ibintu vyibonekeza cane". "Ndiko ndibaza nimba iyi konte bazoyihagarika mu kiringo c'ukwezi kumwe gusa, tuze twumva gusa bwa bujambojambo ngo 'ntusubire gukora ivyo' dusanzwe tumenyereye". Uyu musatirizi Martial w'imyaka 25 akomoka mu Bufaransa yakinye iminota 66 muri uru rukino rwarangiye Man U inganya na West Brom igitsindo kimwe kuri kimwe. Aya majambo yo gutyoza Martial yaherekejwe n'ubundi butumwa bwinshi bwahamagarira urubuga rwa Instagram kugira ico rukoze kuri kino kibazo. Manchester United ivuga ko igihagaze mu biri mw'itangazo yasohoye mu mpera z'ukwa mbere, aho yatangaza ko "ibabajwe cane" n'iri hohotera, ikanasaba imbuga hwaniro hamwe n'abajejwe kuzigenzura "gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo bahagarike iyi ngeso". Igiporisi camaze kumenyesha ibijanye n'ubu butumwa bw'ivangura. Ku wa 7 z'uku kwa kabiri, umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea Antonio Rudiger yavuze ko yatutswe "bikomeye" mu butumwa bw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yarungikiwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Umukinyi Dhanda wa Swansea avuga ko kubona imbuga hwaniro ata ngingo zifata kuri iri tyozwa rishingiye ku rukoba biha ingoga  abantu "kubandanya bakora aka kabi". Uyu mwongereza Dhanda w'imyaka 22 akomoka muri Aziya yaratyojwe kuri Instagram inyuma y'aho umurwi wiwe utsindiwe na Manchester City mu nkino z'igikombe ca FA. Ico gihe, Facebook yatangaje ko yahagaritse uwabikoze gusubira kurungika ubutumwa kuri Instagram. Iyi kompanyi ivuga ko abantu bakeneye kuronswa akaryo ko kwigira ku makosa bakora. Umuvugizi wa Facebook ati: "Ntidushaka amacakubiri n'urwanko bishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga zacu". Facebook na Twitter zompi zivuga ko ziyemeje kurwanya ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga zazo. Mu ndwi iheze, Facebook yatangaje ko konte zizobandanya zicishwako amajambo yo gutyoza kuri Instagram zitazohagarikwa mu mwanya kanaka, ko ahubwo zizohagarikwa burundu kubera kubandanya ico caha. Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, abakinyi ba Premier League batari bake  - harimwo Romaine Sawyers wa West Brom,  Reece James akina muri Chelsea inyuma hamwe na mushikiwe, umusatirizi Lauren James wa Manchester United  - bararungikiwe ubutumwa bw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba bucishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza Football Association (FA) risaba reta gufata ingingo, mu gihe iherutse gutangaza ko amakompanyi y'imbuga hwaniro ashobora gutozwa "amahadabu manini" ashobora guharurwa muri za "miriyoni z'amapawundi" mu gihe yoyanirwa no gutorera umuti iki kibazo c'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ku mbuga zayo.

column2: FAO ivuga ko DR Congo ari co gihugu 'ca mbere cugarijwe n'ibura ry'ibifungurwa kw'isi'
column3: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe uburimyi n'imfungurwa kw'isi (FAO) riragabisha ko abantu bashika hafi imiliyoni 22 muri Republika ya Demokarasi ya Congo bahanzwe n'ibura ry'ibifungurwa, ico gitigiri kikaba kibandanya kwiyongera kuva mu mwaka uheze. Mu cegeranyo, iryo shirahamwe rigira riti: "Igitigiri c'abantu bahanganye n'ibura ry'ibifungurwa rikomeye canke bageramiwe cane gusumba, cariyongereye birenze urugero - kuva ku miliyoni 15.6 mu 2019 gushika ku miliyoni 21.8." Iryo shirahamawe rivuga ko intambara hamwe n'ikiza coronavirus, vyagize ingaruka ku biciro vy'ibifungurwa hamwe no ku bundi buryo bwo kubaho, vyatumye ibintu biba bibi gusumba. Ico cegeranyo kivuga kiti: "Ivyo bintu vyatumye hakenerwa imfashanyo nyinshi kandi ubu ico gihugu ni co ca mbere gifise ikibazo c'ibifungurwa kw'isi." FAO iradoma urutoke kw'"igabanuka ry'ubutunzi rifitaniye isano n'ita ry'agaciro k'ifaranga  rya Congo, igabanuka ry'umwimbu w'amahera igihugu cinjiza buri mwaka hamwe n'ibiza", nk'umwuzure, nk'ibintu bigira uruhara muri izo ngorane. Benshi mu bantu bagizweko ingaruka n'ico kibazo, bari mu ntara za Kivu ya ruguru n'iyo epfo, Ituri hamwe na Kasai yo hagati, nk'uko bimenyeshwa na FAO. Iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko ibintu bigoye cane vy'umwihariko ku bahungiye hagati mu gihugu hamwe n'abasubijwe mu zabo "kenshi basubira iyo baje bava bagasanga ata kintu na kimwe gihari cobafasha gusubira mu buzima bwa misi yose". FAO iragabisha ko, kubera ico kigoyi, uwohirahira agatera ingorane zotuma imfashanyo zidashikira abo zigenewe, azoba atumye abantu bamererwa nabi gusumba no kuburizamwo utwigoro two gutorera inyishu ico kibazo.

column2: Rwanda: Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi basaba leta guhagarika ingingo y'ugukata umushahara w'abakozi
column3: Amashyaka (imigambwe) abiri atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda, ariyamiriza ingingo ya leta y'ico gihugu yo gukata umushahara w'abakozi, ibice bingana na 0.5% buri kwezi aja mu kigega c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi muri ico gihugu kizwi nka RSSB. Victoire Ingabire, umukuru w'umugambwe DALFA-Umurinzi,  hamwe na Bernard  Ntaganda w'umugambwe PS-Imberakuri, bakorera mu Rwanda, bagiriza umugambwe FPR uri ku butegetsi mu Rwanda ko ugomba kunyaga abakozi ku nyungu zawo. Leta yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gushigikira umusanzu w'ubwisungane mu kwivuza, ikanavuga ko yafashwe habanje kuba ibiganiro bitandukanye. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC Gahuzamiryango, Victoire Ingabire avuga ko iyo ngingo ya leta yafashwe hahonyanzwe ibwirizwashingiro ry'ico gihugu hamwe n'itegeko rigenga akazi "kuko umushahara w'umuntu ni umutungo wiwe bwite, ni ntavogerwa, ntabwo umuntu apfa kuwufataho uko yishakiye". Yagiriza ikigega  RSSB c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi ko cabaye igikoresho c'umugambwe FPR/RPF uri ku butegetsi. Ati: "Kiriya kigo gishirwamwo amafaranga y'ubwishingizi n'ayo gutegekaniriza abakozi RSSB, ni ikigo cabaye nk'inka y'imvyeyi ririya shyaka rivomamo". Umupfasoni Ingabire avuga ko atarwanya uwo mugambi wa leta wo kwunganira umusanzu w'ukwivuza, akabona ko ahubwo leta  ikwiye kuronderera mu bindi bisata maze amafaranga agashobora kuboneka. Avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari ingene ayo mafaranga yegeranywa akoreshwa, akabona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: "Ntabwo ari ikibazo c'ibura ry'amafaranga, ikibazo ni uburyo amafaranga yo mu bwisungane bwo kwivuza acungwa. Imbere y'uko baja kurondera amafaranga ni babanze bacunge neza n'ayahari". "Iyaba ayahari bayacunga neza, ntabwo uyu munsi baba bariko baja gusonga abakozi bababwira ngo barabakata amafaranga". Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe ku nyungu z'umunyagihugu muri rusangi. Gaspard Musonera,  umunyamabanga uhoraho (ntayegayezwa mu Kirundi) mu bushikiranganji bw'abakozi n'akazi mu Rwanda, avuga ko amafaranga asanzwe atangwa n'umukozi hamwe n'ayo umukoresha amutangira ari ayo kwivuza be n'umuryango wiwe gusa. Avuga ko hakenewe ubundi buryo kugira ngo abanyagihugu bandi nabo bashobore kuvurwa, ari co ayo mafaranga bazokatwa azokora. Ati: "Ayo 0.5 % ku mushahara wabo bwite batahana ku kwezi ni inkunga yabo ku kigega c'ubwishingizi mu kwivuza kuko ayo abaturage basanzwe batanga ni make cane ugereranije n'ayakenewe kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza mu buryo bukwiriye". "Rero ni ngombwa ko hashakwa izindi nzira zo kwunganira ico kikega kugira ngo abaturage bashobore guhabwa serivisi z'ubuzima zikwiriye, inzego z'ubuzima nazo zishobore kugira ubushobozi bwo kubafasha neza". Avuga ko ibivugwa n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi y'uko ikigo RSSB gikora gihomba kandi ko iyo ntererano isanzwe ikoreshwa nabi, bidafise ishingiro "kuko nta bindi bari kuvuga". Ati: "Ikigo c'ubwisungane RSSB nta kibazo gifise, aho ikibazo kiri, ni uko abaturage basabwa amafaranga makeya ugereranyije n'ayo bategerezwa gutanga kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza". Bwana Musonera avuga ko imbere y'uko iyo ngingo ifatwa habaye ibiganiro bitandukanye vyari bifise intumbero yo kurondera inzira zo kwegeranya ubwo buryo harimwo n'abakozi, akabonako ata mpamvu y'uko yojamwo impari. Ati: "Ivyo ari vyo vyose jewe ico numva abantu bashira imbere ni ukumva akamaro bifitiye buri Munyarwanda wese ndetse n'uyo mukozi". Ku wa 26 z'ukwezi guheze, ni ho umushikiranganji w'abakozi ba leta n'umurimo mu Rwanda yasohora itangazo risaba abakoresha bo mu nzego za leta n'abikorera utwabo gukata 0.5% ku mushahara wa buri kwezi ku bakozi babo  maze bakawushikiriza ikigo c'Ubwisungane mu Rwanda (RSSB). Ni ingingo ishingiye kw'itegeko ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere c'ico gihugu ryo ku wa 13 z'ukwa mbere uno mwaka nyene, ryerekeye ubwisungane mu kwivuza, rikanerekana inzira zitandukanye uburyo bushobora kuvamwo.

column2: Burundi: Umukandida Dieudonné Nahimana asaba CENI kwemera ko amatora yabayemwo utunenge
column3: Uwitoje nk'uwigenga mu kibanza c'umukuru w'igihugu mu matora aheruka mu Burundi, Dieudonné Nahimana, asaba umurwi ujejwe gutegura no guhagarikira amatora kwemera ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge. Ivyo yabivuze mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru kuri uyu wa gatanu aho yari aramutse ashikiriza ingene abona ku kungene amatora yagenze. Dieudonné Nahimana yaronse amajwi adashika 1%, ariko akamenyesha ko n'aho hari ibitagenze neza, abona ko atavyinshi afise vyotuma yitura sentare ijejwe kwubahirizwa ibwirizwashingiro. Umurwi CENI wowo uvuga ko amatora yagenze neza. Muri ico kiganiro, Bwana Nahimana, avuga ko bashoboye kurungika ababahagararira muri ayo matora barenga ibihumbi bitandatu, akaba yari afise babiri babiri muri buri komine. Mu tunenge avuga twibonekeje, hariho ko bamwe mu babaserukira bankirwa abandi bakabatevya kwinjira mu biro vy'amatora kandi bari bafise amakete abemerera kumuserukira yatanzwe n'umurwi CENI. Avuga ko we nyene ubwiwe yihahamagariye abajejwe amatora, bakamwishura ko batari bazi ko abigenga bafise uburenganzira bwo kurungika abaserukira ku biro vy'amatora. Ati: "Vyari bitangaje kuko mu bintu CENI yamye yigisha, baramenyesha y'uko uwitoza wese afise uburenganzira bwo kuronka uwumuserukira kandi yaba afise urupapuro ruvyerekana rwatanzwe na CENI". Avuga kandi ko hari ahandi wasanga bamwe mu ntwaro biha ububasha nk'ubwo abakozi ba CENI mu gihe amatora yariko araba, akavuga ko wasanga harimwo cane cane abacamanza, abasitanteri, eka mbere na ba buramatari. Akandi kanenge Bwana Nahimana yerekana avuga ko hariho abandi wasanga bagenda batera ubwoba abantu bagiye gutora bakabategeka gutora uyu canke uwundi. Abandi nabo banaherekeza abagiye gutora mu bwiherero kugira ngo babategeke gutora uwo bobo bashaka babeshe ko bagiye kubereka ingene bazinga ikarata y'amatora. Hari kandi ibice bimwe bimwe mu gihugu aho abajejwe intwaro batoye mu kibanza c'abanyeshure nk'uko abivuga. Aravuga kandi ko hari abantu wasanga hari abatoreye abandi ariko ugasanga ni benshi canke ugasanga batwaye amakarata yo gutora menshi arengeye ayo bafitiye impapuro zibaya uburenganzira. Mu gihe avuga ko utunenge twababayeko tudashobora kumutuma yitura sentare yubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro, Dieudonné Nahimana asaba ko twozokosorwa muri kazoza kugira ngo ntihazohave haba abahakana ibizoba vyavuyemwo bisunze utwo tunenge. Ati: "Twashaka gusaba CENI ko yokwemera ko hariho bimwe bitagenze neza mu matora aheruka kandi bakagerageza kubikosora". Asaba abatangajwe na CENI ko batsinze amatora abandi nabo ko batsinzwe, ko botahura ko ikintu nyamukuru ku gihugu ari umutekano hagati y'Abarundi, rero ko ata murundi yopfa canke yogirirwa nabi azira ico ari canke azira ico yiyumvira. Evariste Ndayishimiye yaserukiye umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD niwe yatangajwe n'umurwi CENI ko yatahukanye intsinzi muri ayo matora ku bice 68%, akurikirwa na Agathon Rwasa wo mu mugambwe CNL utavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi wabonye 22%. Umugambwe CNL umenyesha ko ayo matora yabayemwo utunenge twinshi n'ubusuma, mbere ukemeza ko ari wo watahukanye intsinzi ku bice birenga 58%. Ejo ku wa kane Agathon Rwasa yashikiriza ibirego muri sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro, iyi nayo ikaba itegerezwa gushikiriza ibiharuro ntabanduka ku wa 04 z'ukwezi kwa gatandatu, ni ukuvuga ku wa kane w'indwi iza.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Sterling, Vlahovic, Zidane, Pochettino, Rangnick, Perisic
column3: Manchester City igiye kwongereza inguvu kugira ngo ishobore kugumana umukinyi wayo wo ku ruhande, umwongereza Raheem Sterling, 26, mu masezerano ashobora kumara igihe kirekire, ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko ariko araronderwa na Barcelona. (Telegraph - subscription required) Paris St-Germain yagiriraniye ibiganiro na Zinedine Zidane mu gihe yitegurira igenda ry'umumenyereza wayo Mauricio Pochettino ariko araronderwa na Manchester United. (Le Parisien, via Metro) Ralf Rangnick ashobora kuba agiye kumenyereza vy'agateganyo Manchester United, ariko akaba yari yabanje kwanka amasezerano Old Trafford yashaka kumuha, imbere y'uko bumvikana ku yandi mashasha.  (Manchester Evening News) Manchester United yahambije iyindi mirwi itari mike, harimwo na Tottenham hamwe na Newcastle United, mu rugamba rwo kurondera umusatirizi wa Fiorentina umunya Serbia Dusan Vlahovic w'imyaka 21. (Mail) Manchester United iracipfuza ko Pochettino ayibera umumenyereza kuva mu ci riza, n'aho yiteze umuzo wa Rangnick. (90 Min) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Lazio Sergej Milinkovic-Savic, 26, ariko araronderwa na Manchester United nk'uwushobora gusubirira umufaransa akina hagati Paul Pogba, 28, kuko amasezerano afitaniye na Old Trafford azorangira mu ci riza. (Fichajes - in Spanish) Barcelona iriko iraraba ko yogura umusatirizi wa Basel umunya Bresil Arthur Cabral, 23, ariko bikazoba ngombwa ko ibanza kugurisha bamwe mu bakinyi kugira ngo ishobore kumugura.  (Goal) Amasezerano umukinyi wo ku ruhande umunya-Croatia Ivan Perisic, 32, afitaniye na Inter Milan arangira mu kwa gatandatu 2022, uyu mukinyi akavuga ati "vyose birashoboka, tuzobiraba mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere", aho yari abajijwe ku bijanye na kazoza kiwe.  (Mediaset Infinity, via Football Italia) Inter Milan irafise ivyizigiro ko umuninyi wayo wo hagati, umunya-Croatia Marcelo Brozovic, 29, azotera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha, ni mu gihe ayahari azorangira mu ci riza. (90 Min) Kuri uyu wa gatanu, vyitezwe ko umumenyereza wa AC Milan Stefano Pioli, 56, atera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha y'imyaka ibiri iri imbere ari kumwe n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano, Serie A. (Calciomercato, via Football Italia)

column2: Imvo n'imvano ku Barundi baba mu karere ka Kwale muri Kenya bamaze imyaka irenga 60
column3: Mu kiganiro c’imvo n’imvano c’uyu musi, tuja mu karere ka Kwale, mu bumanuko bwa Kenya, aho tuza kuganira n’abarundi bahaba haraciye imyaka irenga 60. Abo barundi bashitse muri Kenya mu myaka ya za 1950 bagiye gukora mu mirima ya makonge, y’ingatane mu rurimi rw’ikirundi, ibiterwa bakuramwo ubugwegwe. Benshi mubaje ico gihe baramaze gushengera, abana babo bari mu myaka 70. Na bo barashaje. Ikirundi kirabagora ariko barakivuga. Hari n’abacibuka iyo baje bava, abavukanyi eka mbere n’imico hamwe n’imigenzo vy’abarundi.  Bavuga ko ababamukako bose barenga igihumbi, ufatiye kubamaze kwiyandikisha baba muri ako karere ka Kwale gusa. Bose ntibagira ibibaranga. Ico kikaba ari co kibazo nyamukuru kibahanze kuko nta burenganzira na bumwe basa n’uko bafise. Ivyo batunze vyose bavyandika ku bo bubakanye b’abanye Kenya, ntibavuzwa, ntibashobora kudandaza, kwiga n’ikibazo mbere rimwe na rimwe baribwa ivyabo harimwo n’uruvyaro. Haraheze imyaka indwi bashikirije ico kibazo prezida wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyata, mu rugendo bagize bari kumwe n’abamakonde bamuka mu gihugu ca Mozambike, bobo bakaba bamaze kuronka ubwenegihugu, bava Kwale gushika ku kirimba ciwe i Nairobi, mu 2015. Kuva ico gihe bari mu muhango. Ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu muri Kenya, Haki Center, riri mu yafashije kugira ikibazo c’abo barundi kije ahabona, rivuga ko ikibazo cabo kizwi kuva hasi gushika hejuru mu butegetsi bwa kenya kandi ko ryizeye ko vuba kizotorerwa inyishu. Muri iki kiganiro rero mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo
