column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Ornella Uwimana yize ivyo kuvura kuri kaminuza ariko akora intebe mu mapine
column3: Umwigeme Ornella Uwimana yahejeje ivyigwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza mu 2020 ubu akaba akora akazi ko gukora intebe mu mapine. Intebe za mbere yazikoze mu 2016 akiri ku ntebe y'ishure, umuvyeyi wiwe aca arazimugurira kugira amutere intege. Agira ati:"Naguze amapine umunani ku bihumbi mirongo ine, hanyuma nca ndayakoramwo intebe. "Mu kuntera intege, umuvyeyi wanje arazishima aca arazingurira azishira kw'ibaraza" Ornella avuga ko akunda kwiyigisha gukora ibintu bitandukanye kuri YouTube. Ahejeje kaminuza mu gisata c'ivy'amagara y'abantu "Sante Publique" mu 2020, ivyo gukora intebe mu mapine yaciye abigira umwuga. Avuga ko abona ko amaze gutera imbere ugereranije n'aho yatanguriye. Agira ati: "Natanguye nkorera muhira ariko ubu narakotesheje ikibanza nkoreramwo ndiha ku kwezi. "Nkoresha abakozi batatu baza buri musi, n'abandi bane baza igihe mba ndabakeneye." Gushika ubu avuga ko yoba ageze ku mutahe wa miliyoni zine z'amarundi. Ornella Uwimana ahanura urwaruka kwubahuka gukora ico ari co cose rubona gishobora kuruteza imbere. Avuga ko hari benshi bagaya akazi canke ntibashiruke umwete wo kugakora. Ati: "Hari abambona ndiko ndahiga amapine bagatangara. Bakanayanyima nkarinda guca ku bafundi b'imodoka "Hari n'abantwenga bambonye ndiko ndatobora amapine kandi baheruka nari nagiye gusigisha inzara. "Ubu ariko batanguye gutahura kuko babona ntanguye gutera imbere. Uburundi buherutse gushinga umugambi wa PAEEJ (Programme d'Autonomisation Economique et d'Emploi des Jeunes Diplômés), werekeye urwaruka ruhejeje amashure kugira rwishingire imigambi yo gukora. Uwo mugambi reta yawuhaye imiriyaridi 48 z'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ariko n'ubu hari abacibaza uruhara nyarwo rwa PAEEJ, mu gihe abandi bafise amakenga ko bashobora gufasha koko urwaruka kwigenga mu butunzi rukareka kuzera inze.

column2: Burundi: Vyinshi kuri kahise ka Pierre Buyoya yashengeye ku myaka 71
column3: Majoro Petero Buyoya yashengeye ku myaka 71, yari mu basirikare bakuru b'icahoze ari igisirikare c'Uburundi kizwi nka FAB (Forces Armées Burundaises). Yashitse ubwa mbere ku butegetsi mu 1987, atembagaje ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Jean-Baptiste Bagaza na we nyene yari yashitse ku butegetsi abanje gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwa Michel Micombero mu 1976. Mu myaka itandatu ubutegetsi bwiwe bwamaze, bwibukirwa ku bintu bitari bike vyahinduye isura y'igihugu, nk'ubwicanyi bwa Ntega-Marangara mu 1988, amasezerano y'ubumwe bw'abarundi yemejwe mu 1991, umuzo w'intwaro ishingiye ku migambwe myinshi mu 1993, n'ibindi. Yagiye kuva ku butegetsi mu 1993 atsinzwe mu matora ya mbere ashingiye ku migambwe myinshi kuva mu myaka ya 1960. Ico gihe, Prezida Melchior Ndadaye wo mu mugambwe Frodebu ni we yatahukanye intsinzi y'amajwi arenga 65% na yo Pierre Buyoya yari yitoje kw'izina ry'umugambwe Uprona aronka amajwi yababa 33%. Buyoya yasubiye kugaruka ku butegetsi mu kwezi kw'indwi 1996, asubiriye kandi gutembagaza ubutegetsi bwa Prezida mfatakibanza Sylvestre Ntibantunganya, uyu na we akaba yari yasubiriye Cyprien Ntaryamira yaheruka guhitanwa n'isanganya ry'indege i Kigali mu Rwanda ari kumwe na mugenzi we Gen Juvénal Habyarimana. Prezida Ntaryamira yari amaze amezi abiri ashikirijwe ayo mabanga, inyuma y'igandagurwa rya Prezida Ndadaye. Igandagurwa rya Prezida Ndadaye ryatumye igihugu cinjira mu ntambara yari ifise isura y'ubwoko, hagati y'abahutu n'abatutsi. Vyabaye ngombwa ko Perezida Buyoya aganira n'abariko bararwanya reta, mu biganiro vyamaze imyaka ibiri kuva mu 1998 gushika bashike ku masezerano y'amahoro yateweko igikumu mu kwezi kw'umunani 2000. Kuva ico gihe, Prezida Buyoya yaciye yemezwa kurongora igice ca mbere c'intwaro mfatakibanza categekanywa n'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha, maze aza kuva ku butegetsi mu 2003 abishije Prezida Domitien Ndayizeye. Amaze kuva ku butegetsi inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro ya Arusha, Buyoya yari afise ikibanza mu nama nkenguzamateka ubuzima bwiwe bwose nk'uko vyategekanywa n'amasezerano ya Arusha. Mu mwaka wa 2008, yagenwe kurongora umurwi w'intumwa za ONU zari zirungitswe muri Tchad mu ntumbero yo gutorera umuti icuka kibi cari hagati y'ico gihugu n'igihugu kibanyi ca Sudani. Mu kwa mbere 2013, niho Prezida Buyoya yasubira akagenwa n'umuryango w'Ubumwe bwa Afrika kuwuserukira nk'intumwa idasanzwe muri Mali no mu karere ka Sahel. Mu 2014, yashatse kwitoza ngo arongore ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu bivuga ururimi rw'igifaransa, kandi ico gihe reta y'Uburundi yaramushigikiye kuko imigenderanire yari ikiri myiza. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka kuva mu 2015, igihe haduka mu Burundi indyane za politike zishingiye ku ngingo y'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, nyakwigendera Perezida Petero Nkurunziza, yo kwitoreza ikiringo kigira gatatu c'umukuru w'igihugu. Ico gihe, abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bavuga ko giteye kubiri n'amategeko, ariko Perezida Nkurunziza n'umugambwe wiwe CNDD-FDD, bobo bavuga ko ico kiringo cubahirije ibwirizwa shingiro. Kuri ico kiringo Buyoya yari yavuze ko amasezerano ya Arusha atomoye, ko ibiringo ari bibiri gusa. Kuva ico gihe, imigenderanire hagati yiwe n'ubutegetsi yaciye itosekara, akaba atasubiriye guhonyoza ikirenge mu Burundi. Mu mpera z'umwaka wa 2018, Buyoya yashizwe ku rutonde rw'abantu 17 baronderwa n'ubutungane bw'Uburundi bagirizwa kugira uruhara mw'igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye. Buyoya ntavyo yari yiteze kuko yabona ko amasezerano ya Arusha amukingira, aho yamenyesha ko ikibazo c'iyicwa rya Ndadaye gitegerezwa gutorerwa inyishu biciye mu murwi wo kumenya ukuri no kurekuriranira.  Wewe rero yabona ko rwari urubanza rushingiye kuri politike. Mbere yaranagabishije ko rushobora gutuma hasubira kwaduka amacakubiri y'amoko mu gihugu. Ivyo ntivyabujije ubutungane bw'Uburundi kumucira umunyorororo wo guherayo, mu kwezi kw'icumi, we n'abo bagirizwa hamwe urupfu rwa Prezida Melchior Ndadaye. Buyoya n'abo bari kumwe bavuga ko bunguruje urubanza.

column2: Coronavirus: Boris Johnson, Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza, araremvye cane
column3: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yashizwe mu gisata c'abaremvye cane kwa muganga nyuma y'aho ibimenyetso vya coronavirus yari afise vyunyukiye. Umuvugizi yavuze ko yimuriwe muri ico gisata ku mpanuro z'umugwi w'abaganga kandi ko ariko araronka ubuvuzi "bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru". Bwana Johnson yasavye umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire Dominic Raab ngo amusubirire "aho bikenewe", nk'uko uwo muvugizi yabandanije avuga. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Johnson w'imyaka 55, yinjijwe ibitaro i London afise "ibimenyetso vy'urutavanako" ku wa mungu. Urwandiko rwo mu biro vyiwe rwagize ruti: "Kuva kuwa Mungu mw'ijoro, umushikiranganji wa mbere ariko aravurwa n'abaganga ku bitaro vya St Thomas, i London, nyuma yo kwakirwa afise ibimenyetso vy'urutavanako vya coronavirus. "Ku muhingamo wose w'uno munsi, umushikiranganji wa mbere yabandanije kuremba kandi, ku mpanuro y'umugwi w'abaganga, yimuriwe mu gisata c'abaremvye cane muri ibi bitaro." Urwo rwandiko rwabandanije ruti: "Umushikiranganji wa mbere ariko araronka ubuvuzi bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru, kandi agashimira abavuzi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi NHS, ku kazi gakomeye bariko barakora hamwe no kwitanga kwabo." Umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutunzi, Rishi Sunak, yavuze ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vyerekeye umushikiranganji wa mbere hamwe n'umutambukanyi wiwe yibungenze, Carrie Symonds, kandi ko Bwana Johnson "azosimba iyi manga aze akomere gusumvya." Umukuru w'umugambwe mukuru utavuga rumwe na leta, Labour, Sir Keir Stamer yavuze ko ivyashikiye umushikiranganji wa mbere ari "amakuru y'incamugongo." Bwana Johnson yabanje gutwarwa kwa muganga gupimwa bisanzwe nyuma yo gufatwa na coronavirus haraciye iminsi 10. Ibimenyetso yari afise vyarimwo kugira umuriro hamwe no gukorora.

column2: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi Kidum ngo yabwiwe ko atemerewe kuririmbira mu Rwanda
column3: Umuririmvyi w'Umurundi rurangiranwa mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika, Jean Pierre Nimbona azwi cane nka Kidum, yabwiye BBC ko yabujijwe kuremesha ibiteramo mu Rwanda. Kidum yategerezwa kuririmba mu giteramo Kigali Jazz Junction itariki 27/09/2019 ari kumwe n'abandi baririmvyi nka Johnny Drille wo muri Nigeria. Ariko ku buryo atari yiteze ngo yabwiwe ko atacemerewe kuririmba muri ico giteramo. BBC yegereye Kidum tumubaza icatumye abuzwa kuja muri ico giteramo kandi amatangazo yaco hamwe n'amatike vyari bimaze gusohoka. Kidum yagize ati: "Nta mpamvu n'imwe nabwiwe. Abateguye igiteramo bambwiye ko ubuyobozi bwa Kigali bwababwiye ko ntemerewe kuja muri ico giteramo. "Nta ngorane nari bwagire mu Rwanda, itariki zitandatu nariyo, kiretse mu kwezi kwa 12 aho nari mvuye mu Burundi, umuntu aravuga ati sinshobora kuririmba. Ariko nta kindi gihe vyari bwashike." Kidum ari mu baririmvyi rurangiranwa mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika, akaba amaze imyaka irenga 20 aremesha ibiteramo mu bihugu vy'ako karere agendera buri mwaka. Yabandanije agira ati: "Mu Rwanda ndahinjira nk'uwugiye muhira, nta visa, nta ruhusha ikintu kimwe bambaza gusa ni aho nshikira." BBC yashatse kumenya ico abatumiye Kidum bavuga, atubwira ko bobo bakiriko baringinga ubuyobozi bwa Kigali ngo barabe ko bwotanga uruhusha. Abajijwe niba hari iyindi mpamvu yoba ibiri inyuma Kidum yavuze ko ata mpamvu yindi n'imwe we ku bwiye yumva yoba yabiteye ngo ariko hatanguye kuvugwa vyinshi. Yagize ati: "Hari abari kuvuga ko vyoba bitewe n'umubano mubi hagati y'ibihugu vyombi (u Burundi n'u Rwanda), ngo vyoba bifise imvo za politike. "Jewe simba mu Rwanda canke mu Burundi, mba muri Kenya. Nta politike ndimwo. Ku vy'umutekano navyo, nta mutekano w'umuntu n'umwe mbangamiye, nta n'ubushobozi mfise bwo kubangamira umutekano." Kidum yari amaze kuremesha ibiteramo vyinshi mu Rwanda mu myaka 16 iheze, akaba yararirimvye ahantu henshi harimwo n'umuhango wo Kwita Izina. BBC iracakurikirana aya makuru.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Afghanistani buteye ahatemba
column3: Ku musi wa kabiri, itariki 23 Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), hari hakwiye imisi 100 kuva abatalibani bagarutse ku butegetsi muri Afghanistani. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC, Yalda Hakim yaragendeye akarere ka Kabul, kurondera inkuru yerekeye ubutunzi bwagabanutse kuva imfashanyo y’amakungu ihagaritswe, bituma haba akaga ku bantu.

column2: Mason Greenwood: Umusatiziri wa Manchetser United yarekuwe vy’agateganyo
column3: Umusatirizi wa Manchester United Mason Greenwood yarekuwe vy'agateganyo inyuma yo guhagarikwa yagirizwa gufata ku nguvu umugore. Uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 20 yahagaritswe kandi ku wa Mungu yagirizwa ihohotera, inyuma y'uko yagirijwe ku mbuga hwaniro. Mu nyuma yahagaritswe yagirizwa ko yafashe umuntu ku nguvu mbere agatera ubwoba bwo kwica umuntu ku wa kabiri. Manchester United yari yamenyesheje ko uyu musatirizi atari gusubira mu myimenyerezo gushika hafashwe izindi ngingo. Igipolisi ca Greater Manchester cavuze ko Greenwood yahagaritswe inyuma y'aho kimenyeye ko "hari amashusho n'amareresi yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'umugore yavuga ihohotera yakorewe". Iki gipolisi kivuga ko abacamanza bari bategetse ko aguma mu gasho gushika ku wa gatatu ariko ubu yarekuwe vy'agateganyo mu gihe ayandi matohoza akibandanya. Inyuma y'aho uyu musatirizi ahagarikiwe, ikigo EA Sports gikora udukino two kuri videwo cavuze ko Greenwood yakuwe mu dukino twa FIFA. Cavuze ko yari yakuwe mu gakino kitwa FIFA 22 aca akurwa no ku rutonde rw'abo gikoresha mu gakino FIFA Ultimate Team hamwe na Ultimate Draft. Ikompanyi ikora ivyambarwa vy'abanonotsi, Nike, yari yamenyesheje ko ihagaritse imigenderanire n'uyu mukinyi. Umuvugizi wayo yavuze ati: "Turababajwe cane n'ibi birego kandi tuzobandanya dukurikiranira hagufi iki kibazo". Amaze gutangura gukinira Manchester United mu kwa gatatu 2019, Greenwood yarateye igikumu mu kwa kabiri kw'umwaka uheze ku masezerano yo gukinira uyu murwi mu kiringo c'imyaka ine, amaze gutera intambwe nk'umwe mu bigishijwe n'uyu murwi. Ku wa Mungu, uyu murwi wavuze ko "udashobora kwihanganira ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose" kandi ko wari wamenyeshejwe ivyo uyu mukinyi yagirizwa, ariko ko ataco wari kuvuga imbere y'uko "ukuri kumenyekana ku vyabaye". Mu rindi tangazo ryasohowe ejo ku wa kabiri, uyu murwi washimangiye ko wiyamiriza wivuye inyuma ihohotera iryo ari ryo ryose.

column2: Anglican ya UK yabujije umukobwa wa Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo gushingura
column3: Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza ryabujije umukobwa w’umuhisi Desmond Tutu kuyobora ibirori vyo guhamba kubera yubakanye n’umugore nka we. Mpho Tutu van Furth ni umupasitori mw’ishengero Anglican muri diyoseze ya Washington, akaba yari yasabwe kuyobora imisa yo guhamba uwari umuvyeyi wiwe w'ibatisimu, Martin Kenyon, ahitwa Shropshire mu Bwongereza ejo ku wa kane. Tutu van Furth yabwiye BBC ko kumwankira “bisa n’ubugome kandi bibabaje”. Diyoseze ya Hereford ivuga ko vyari "ibintu bitoroshe". Ishengero rya Anglican ishami ry’Ubwongereza (Church of England) ntiryemerera abavugabutumwa baryo ko barongorana n’abo basangiye ibitsina kuko inyigisho ritanga ari uko ukwubakana biba hagati y’umugabo n’umugore. Hagati aho, ishengero rya Anglican rigenzi ryaryo muri Amerika, rizwi nka Église épiscopalienne des États-Unis /The Episcopal Church, riremerera abavugabutumwa baryo kwubakana n’abo basangiye ibitsina. Itangazo rya Diyosezi ya Hanoford rivuga riti: "Hatanzwe impanuro hisunzwe aho inama y’Abepiskopi ihagaze ku bijanye n’abarongorana basangiye ibitsina”. Uwahoze ari musenyeri wa Liverpool, Paul Bayes asanzwe ari mu bahimiriza ko ishengero rihindura aho rihagaze ku bijanye n’igitsina, avuga ko “atari vyiza kuvuga ngo ibintu ntivyoroshe”. "Ni ngombwa ko vuba bwango kami ka muntu, umwitwarariko mu butumwa, hamwe n’urukundo, bihabwa ikibanza”. Umuryango wa Kenyon umaze kubwirwa iyi ngingo y’Urusengero, waciye wimura igisabisho co gusezera ikivana kw’isengero St Michael ikijana kuri All Angels ahitwa Wentnor, hafi y’ikigo ca Musenyeri, ahantu hazwi cane, hafi y’aho uyu muvugabutumwa aba kugira ngo umupfasoni Tutu van Furth ashobore guhagarikira iki gisabisho avuge n’ubutumwa. Tutu van Furth  yabwiye BBC ati: "Birababaje cane. Vyumvikana ko ari ingingo y’abategetsi ba ruburakigongwe." Kenyon yari incuti ya hafi cane n’uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru muri Afrika y’Epfo umuhisi Desmond Tutu. Tutu van Furth yategetswe guhagarika ivyo kuvuga ubutumwa nka pasitori muri Afrika y’Epfo inyuma y’aho yubakaniye n’umugore nkawe, Marceline van Furth, umwigisha wa kaminuza wo mu Buholande, mu 2015. Se wiwe Desmond Tutu - yitavye Imana muri Kigarama (12) 2021 - yaratsindiye agashimwe kitiriwe Nobel mu 1984 kubera  uruhara yagize mu kurwanya ya ntwaro y’ivangura ya apartheid muri Afrika y’Epfo. Nawe nyene yararwaniye uburenganzira bw’abahuza ibitsina babisangiye yongera ashigikira ukurongorana hagati y’abasangiye ibitsina. Mu 2013 yavuze ati: Nopfuma mpeba kuja mw’ijuru ryanka abatinganyi. Oya, novuga nti mbabarira, nshaka kuvuga ko nopfuma nja mu kindi kibanza. “Sinosenga Imana yanka abatinganyi kandi uku niko ndavyumva cane”. Yongeyeko ati: " Muri rino sekeza, mfise ishaka nk’iryo nari mfise mu kurwanya apartheid. Kuri jewe, bimeze co kimwe”.

column2: Reggae: Ivyo kumenya kuri The Wailers ubwo uwanyuma muri bo yashengeye
column3: Bunny Wailer niwe yari aramvye cane mu bo bashinze hamwe umugwi The Wailers, abandi babiri, Bob Marley na Peter Tosh barapfuye, uwa mbere muri 1981 ahitanywe na cancer ku myaka 36, uwa kabiri mu 1987 agandaguwe n'abasuma ku myaka 43. Bunny Wailer w'i Kingston, yakuranye na Bob Marley. Bafatanije bararimvye indirimbo zabaye rurangiranwa mu makungu nka Simmer Down na Stir Up, imbere y'uko Wailer afata inzira yo kuririmba ukwa wenyene mu 1974. Ntiyahagaritse gutera imbere kuko yararonse incuro zitatu zose agashinmwe gakomeye cane mu muziki Grammys aranambikwa ikidari ca Jamaica ca Ordre de Merite mu 2017. Yapfuye ku wa kabiri mu gitondo, ariko icateye urupfu rwiwe nticamenyekanye n'ubwo yari mu bitaro kuva agize AVC mu kwezi kw'indwi mu 2020. Nta nkeka, abashimagiza uwo muririmvyi bashwaye imbuga hwaniro bakimenya urupfu rwiwe, abanyamuziki nkawe nabo bavuga ko yari "harabaye". Umuririmvyi azwi mu gutamba cane aririmba Shaggy yanditse kuri Facebook ati: "Iki ni kimwe mu bihe bibi muri kahise k'akaranga kacu. Waduteye kwishima mwami. Ruhuka neza." "Oh yemwe, Imana ihezagire Bunny Wailer," uwo nawe n'uwo muri Redd Hot Chili Peppers avuza guitare bass, Flea. Andrew Holness ministre wa mbere wa Jamaica ntiyatanzwe mu gushimagiza uwo muririmvyi, yavuze ko urupfu rwiwe ari "agahombo kanini kuri Jamaica na reggae". Bunny Wailer izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ryari Neville O'Riley Livingston. Yari yavutse ku wa 20/4/1947, amara imyaka yiwe ya mbere mu kigwati ca Nine Miles aho yarezwe na se Thaddeus yacuruza imangazini y'ivyo kurya. Aho niho yahuriye ubwa mbere na Bob Marley, ivyo bitambambuga badatevye baca baba abagenzi bakomeye, bakorana umuziki wabo ubwa mbere bari kumwe kw'ishure ry'intango n'iryisumbuye rya Stepney. Se wa Bob Marley amaze gupfa mu 1955, nyina, Cedella, yaciye abana na se wa Livingston. Abo bahungu bakuze barezwe nk'abavukana na cane cane aho cedella na Thaddeus bavyariye umukobwa, Pearl. Bamaze kwimukira Trenchtown muri Kingston, baciye bahura na Peter Tosh baca bashinga umugwi wo kuririmbira hamwe witwa The Wailing Wailers - kuko, nk'uko Bob Marley yabivuze: "Twatanguye dusemerera." Aho baba harangwa n'ubukene n'ubukozi bw'ikibi. Livingston mu nyuma yibutse ingene yakoze igitari ciwe ca mbere akoresheje "imigano, imirya akuye mu ntsinga z'amatara, n'igikopo kinini cavuyemwo sardines". Ariko umuririmvyi Joe Higgs batazira "the Godfather of Reggae" (umuhagarikizi wa reggae), yaba hafi yaciye ashira abo bahungu mu kwaha kwiwe. Abafashije, baciye  banonosora umuziki wabo, bongeramwo ijwi rya Junior Braithwaite n'abaririmvi basasira Beverly Kelso na Cherry Green imbere y'uko bagabanya izina ry'umugwi wabo ugasigara witwa The Wailers. Mu kwa 12 mu 1963, uwo mugwi wagiye muri Studio One ya Coxsone Dodd gufata amajwi y'indirimbo Simmer Down, indirimbo Bob Marley yari yanditse asaba amahoro mu ma quartiers y'abakene ya Kingston. Iyo ndirimbo ntiyatevye gukundwa, iraduga gushika ku nomero ya mbere muri Jamaica. Baciye bayikurikiza Duppy Conqueror, imbere y'uko basohora  urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere (album) The Wailing Wailers, mu 1965. Bidatevye mu nyuma y'aho, hari akaciyemwo mu mugwi, aho Bob Marley amariye kurongora akimukira muri Amerika, nawe Livingston akamara umwaka mu munyororo kubera gufatanwa urumogi. Ariko barashoboye gusohora single (urukurikirane rw'indirimbo zitarenga 3) 28 hagati ya 1966 na 1970 imbere y'uko basohora album yabo ya kabiri, Soul Rebels. Izina rikomeye mu makungu barironse imyaka itatu inyuma y'aho kuri Catch A Fire  -indirimbo ya mbere bakoreye inzu yo gusohora indirimbo ya Chris Blackwell, Island Records. The Wailers bari  bamaze igihe baremesha ibiterambo mu Bwongereza bari kumwe na Johnny Nash, mu nyuma babura amafaranga yo kuriha ama tike yo kubasubiza iwabo. Blackwell aca yemera kubaha contrat ya Island, aca abaha ingurane (avance) yo kugura ama tike n'ayo gukora album muri Jamaica. Ariko ntibanezerejwe n'ingene indirimbo zabo zongeye guhingurwa kugira zihabwe akabirya ku bazumva mu makungu. Ariko iyo album ntiyaguzwe cane haba mu Bowngereza canke muri Amerika naho yahavuye ifatwa nk'imwe muri rurangiranwa. Mbere ikinyamakuru Rolling Stone Magazine ubu vuba cayigize iya 140  ku rutonde rwaco rwa albums 500 zirengeye ibihe (albums of all time) gifatiye ku ndirimbo zayo Concrete Jungle na Slave Driver. Ikibanza ciza kw'isoko caciye gikurikira na Burnin' yo mu 1973 ku ndirimbo nka I shot the Sheriff, Small Axe hamwe na Get Up Stand Up. Ariko niyo yabaye album ya nyuma ya The Wailers isohowe n'abatanguye uwo mugwi bari kumwe bose. Ukutumvikana kwari kwatanguye igihe Island yagurisha indirimbo zabo kw'izina rya Bob Marley and The Waliers, hamwe n'ikirangaminsi co kuzunguruka baririmba catumye Livingston amara igihe atari kumwe n'umuryango wiwe. Yaciye agenda mu 1973, avuga ko ubuzima bwo kuzunguruka budahuye n'ukwemera kwiwe kw'umu Rasta - avuga nko kurya indya zihinguwe hamwe no kuririmba mu bibanza bitabereye. Mu nyuma yavuze ko kumenyekana cane ari umwansi wo kwiyumvira ibishasha. "Umuziki uhagaze ku kugira ico ufatiyeko, iyo rero uri ahantu uri epfo na ruguru, aha na hariya, n'umuziki wawe niko uzokwumvikana," niko Livingston yabwiye The Los Angeles Times mu 1986. "Abantu baratwarwa no kuba rurangiranwa kandi ivyo bitandukanye no kuba umwanditsi, umunyamuziki, uwufasha abandi gutunganya umuziki wabo n'uwushira umuziki mu buhinga mwiza." Amaze kuva muri uwo mugwi, yaciye atangura gukora kuri album ya wenyene , Blackheart Man, yarimwo indirimbo zizwi nka Dreamland na Fighting Against Conviction, yiyumviriye igihe yari mw'ibohero. Yabandanije asohora album zakunzwe cane harimwo Rock 'n' Groove yo mu 1981 na Bunny Wailer Sings The Wailers yo mu 1980, aho yasubiyemwo zimwe mu ndirimbo bari bararirimbanye n'abandi mu mugwi. Mu myaka ya 1990 yaronse Grammy award ya album za reggae za mbere nzinza kurusha izindi incuro zitatu, aho hose akaba yagumye akomeza kandi agumya iragi rya Bob Marley na Wailers: iyo mu 1991, Time Will Tell: A Tribute to Bob Marley; iyo mu 1995, Crucial! Roots Classics; n'iyo mu 1997, A Tribute to Bob Marley's 50th Anniversary (guhimbaza imyaka 50 y'isabukuru ya Bob Marley). "Ndanezerezwa no kumenya ko ndiko ndafasha inzira yo gushikana reggae aho igeze. Ndashimishwa no kubigiramwo uruhara'', ivyo yabibwiye Washinton Post mu 2006.

column2: New York: Urubanza rwa R Kelly kw'ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina rwatanguye
column3: Urubanza rw'uyu muririmvyi wo muri Amerika aririmba umudiho wa R&B rwatanguriye muri sentare yi Brooklyn i New York. Iki camamare cagirizwa amagendu, guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina hamwe no gutanga igiturire; ivyaha amaze guhakana inshuro nyinshi. Bimwe mu vyaha bishinjwa uyu muririmvyi - asanzwe yitwa Robert Sylvester Kelly - ni ivyo kuva mu myaka 20 iheze. Niyahamwa n'ivyaha vyose yagirizwa arashobora gupfungwa imyaka mirongo. Amajambo atanguza urubanza yasomewe amugwi w'abanyagihugu baca urubanza (jury) ugizwe n'abagabo indwi hamwe n'abagore batanu, bakazofata icemezo ku coshikira uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 54. Kelly yagirizwa kuba yari kizigenza mu gikorwa camaze imyaka mirongo ibiri aho haronderwa abagore hamwe n'abakobwa badakwije imyaka bagashorwa mu busambanyi. Icegera c'umushinjacaha Maria Melendez mw'ijambo ritanguza urubanza yavuze yuko "uru rubanza rwerekeye "inyamaswa y'impigi". Yavuze ko R Kelly "ari umuntu yakoresheje ibinyoma, kuryosharyosha, gutera ubwoba hamwe no gukoresha inguvu mu kuganza abo yahohotera kandi abikora yidegemvya mu kiringo c'imyaka myinshi". Kelly yagirizwa kuba yarabwiriza abo yahohotera kwerekana ko "bamwihaye rwose" kandi bakubaha ataguharira amategeko yiwe yose, harimwo yuko bafungura canke bakaja mu bwiherero ari uko abahaye uruhusha, ntibarabe abandi bagabo, kandi bakamwita "Daddy" (Papa). R Kelly yavuze ko ari umwere kuri ivyo vyose yagirizwa kandi ahakana yivuye inyuma ko ata kibi na kimwe yakoze. Uru rubanza, rwasibijwe kenshi kubera ikiza ca covid kandi rukaba rwitezwe kumara nk'ukwezi kumwe, vyitezwe ko ruvugirwamwo ivyagiriji vy'ihohotera ryakozwe na Kelly, harimwo ubuhamya bwa bamwe mu bagore hamwe n'umugabo ashika kuri umwe bamwagiriza. Naho yogirwa umwere, Kelly arindiriwe n'ibidi vyagiriji bifatiye ku gitsina muri Illinois na Minnesota, aho naho akaba yarahakanye ivyo ahagirizwa. Kelly amaze imyaka ibiri mw'ibohero. Yimuriwe i Brooklyn mu kwezi kwa gatandatu akuwe i Chacago ku bw'uru rubanza. Uyu mugabo w'imyaka 54 azwi cane ku ndirimbo ziwe zakunzwe zirimwo Ignition (Remix), I Believe I can Fly, Bump n'Grind na If I Could Turn Back the Hands of Time. Ari mu nzira yerekeza aho urubanza rubera, umuhinguzi w'ibiganiro wa BBC, Monica Miller yagize ati; "Ni umunsi wa gatatu udasanzwe i Brooklyn. Abashigikiye R. Kelly bariko bararengana bavugira hejuru bati "Rekura R Kelly". Kelly hamwe n'abakorana nawe bagirizwa kurondera abagore n'abakobwa batarakwiza imyaka bakabashora mu busambanyi budakurikije amategeko hamwe n'uwo muririmvyi. Ivyo vyagiriji ni ivyo kuva mu myaka y'1990, vyinshi bikibanda ku bifatwa nk'uruhigi rwarondera abakobwa b'imiyabaga. Kuri ubu R Kelly akurikiranywe mu maleta menshi agize Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ivyagiriji bikaba birimwo guhohotera bifatiye ku gitsina, guhohotera uwutarakwiza imyaka, gufata amasanamu y'urukozasoni y'abatarakwiza imyaka, igiturire hamwe no kunaniza ubutungane. Ubushinjacaha bwashingiye urubanza ku bagore batandatu batavuzwe amazina. Ivyagiriji icenda vyashizwe imbere bivuga ku kugirira nabi abantu bo mu ciswe Jane Doe, batatu muri bo bikavugwa ko bari batarakwiza imyaka y'ubukuru igihe bahohoterwa. Abashingwamanza ba Kelly vyitezwe ko bavuga yuko bimwe muri ivyo vyagiriji ari ivy'abagore bari baramukunze ariko ntibaronke ico bashaka, mu gihe mu ntango bari bemeye guhuza ibitsina nawe.

column2: Burundi: Inyuma y'indwi imwe ibitungwa bizosubira kubagwa
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n'umutekano bumenyesha ko ibitungwa bigiye gusubira kubagwa kuva ku musi wa gatatu w'indwi iza. Ivyo vyashikirijwe n'umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa Martin Niteretse mu nama yagiranye n'abarongoye intara, abarongoye uturere mu gipolisi hamwe n'abajejwe uburimyi n'ubworozi mu ntara. Ingingo yo guhagarika kubaga ibitungwa yari yafashwe kubera iyaduka ry'ingwara y'inyonko yo mu kiyaya ca Rift (Fièvre de la vallée du Rift) Kugira ivyo bishoboke ngo ibitungwa vyo kubagwa bitegerezwa kwegeranirizwa hamwe. Agira ati:"Abayangayanga  bakeneye kuzobaga mubatunganirize aho begeraniriza ibitungwa bashaka kuzobaga mu ndwi iza. "Nta nka izobagwa itavuye aho muri ico kibanza. Kuko ntayizova mu muhana ica ija kubagwa ubwo nyene." Ivyo bitungwa kugira bije kubagwa, bitegerezwa kumara imisi indwi biri mu kibanza categekanijwe mu makomine yose, bigenzurwa ko bitagwaye. Martin Niteretse kandi avuga ko ata nyama izova mw'ikomine zija mu yindi. Nta n'inka zirekuriwe kuvanwa mu ntara zija mu yindi, kiretse ngo izijanywe kubagirwa mu gisagara c'ubutunzi ca Bujumbura. Ariko ngo nko mu ntara zitagira inka nyinshi, abayangayanga baho barashobora kuja kuzigura ahandi, ariko abategetsi b'aho baziguze bategerezwa kubaha urupapuro ruziherekeza. Kandi ico gihe zizoca ziherekezwa n'igipolisi kugira ntihagire izururukira mu nzira canke izuririra mu nzira  zitagenzuwe neza. Icipfuzo ngo n'uko mu ndwi iza hatangura kubagwa inka, hamwe n'impene n'intamaba 'bishobotse'. Abadandaza basabwe kandi kudaca bikika mu kiza ngo baduze ibiciro. Ku bijanye n'urucanco, Martin Niteretse yabasavye kuja gutegura abajejwe ako kazi kugira incanco zishitse bace baja ku kivi. Haraheze amezi arenga abiri hatanzwe itegeko ko kizira kikaziririza kubaga inka, impene n'intama, mu ntumbero yo gukumira inyono yo mu kiyaya ca Rift.

column2: Kigali n'uturere umunani birasubira muri guma-muhira kubera ukwiyongera kwa Covid-19
column3: Ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'u Rwanda bivuga ko ibikorwa nka vyose mu muji wa Kigali no muri district umunani bihagaritswe mu ntumbere yo gukumira ikiza ca Covid-19 kibandanya ciyongera mu gihugu n'ahandi mu makungu. Izo district ziyongera ku muji wa Kigali ni Burera, Gicumbi, Kamonyi, Musanze, Nyagatare, Rubavu, Rutsiro na Rwamagana. Iryo tangazo rivuga ko kuva ku tariki ya 01/07/2021 bibujijwe kuva muhira kuva isaha cumi na zibiri z'umugoroba gushika isaha cumi zo mu gitondo. Amashure, amasengero, hamwe na vyinshi mu biro birugawe (abakozi bazokorera muhira) kiretse abatanga serivisi za nkenerwa cane, nayo imanza zibera muhira canke ukundi guhurira hamwe birabujijwe. Mu rwego rw'indero iri tangazo rivuga yuko amashure yose yugawe, hakazofatwa ingingo zihariye kubategerezwa gukora ikiza mu kwezi kw'indwi 2021, aho bazomenyeshwa ikizokorwa n'ubushikiranganji bujejwe indero. Ibibanza vy'uburiro navyo birugaye, abakeneye ivyo kurya bivuye muri ivyo bibanza bakazoshobora kubigura babitahana muhira. Ingenzi zishika canke ziva ku kibuga c'indege ca Kigali zizoja zerekana ibipimo vyo kutandura (negatif) vyafashwe mu masaha 72 imbere y'uko zifata urugendo. Ibindi bibujijwe n'imanza z'ubukwe, zaba izo gukwa canke gusezerana ku kagari co kimwe n'ibikorwa vyo kwinonora imitsi mu mazu yabihariwe azwi nka gym. Ariko kwinonora imitsi umuntu ari ukwiwe hamwe n'inkino zidasaba kwegerana bizobandanya hakurikijwe amategeko yo kwirinda. Kuja ku kiriyo hazoja hemererwa abantu 10 gusa ica rimwe, nayo kuja ku maziko hazoja haremererwa abantu batarenga 30. Izi ngingo zafashwe mu muji wa Kigali no muri zo district umunani, zizosubira kwihwezwa nyuma y'indwi zibiri bivanye n'ukuntu abajejwe ivy'amagara bazoba babona uko ibintu vyifashe. Kwiyunguruza uva muri district uja muyindi birabujijwe, kiretse umuntu agiye kwivuza canke hari ibindi vya nkenerwa cane kandi vyihutirwa agiyemwo. Inama ziremewe, ariko aho abantu bahurira hazokwemererwa kwakira gusa 30% vy'abashobora kuhakwira, kandi abazokwitaba bose bazotegerezwa kwerekana ibipimo vyo kutandura vyafashwe mu masaha 72 imbere y'iyo nama. Guhurira hamwe mu kwinezereza harimwo n'imanza z'ubwoko bwose birabujijwe, yaba mu bibanza bihurwamwo ba benshi canke muhira. Ubukwe n'izindi manza zose navyo birabujijwe. Uburiro n'ubunywero butadandaza inzoga bwemerewe kwakira abantu batarenga 50% vy'abashobora kwakirwa kandi bwugare isaha cumi n'imwe z'umugoroba, nayo ububare bwobwo burabujijwe. Ibibanza biberamwo amasengesho vyubahirije amategeko yo kwirinda biremerewe kwugurura ariko bikakira abantu batarenga 30% vy'abo bishobora kwakira. Izi ngingo zizotegerezwa gukurikizwa ikiringo c'indwi zibiri. Iryo tangazo rihera ryibutsa abanyagihugu yuko bategerezwa kwubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirida arimwo kutegerana, kwambara agafukamunwa hamwe no gukaraba intoke, abatazovyubahiriza bakazofatirwa ibihano. Igihe cose hagiye haraba ingingo zo guma-muhira mu Rwanda, abanyagihugu batari bake baravyidogeye, cane cane abatunzwe n'ubuzi bwa minsi yose, bafungura ari uko bavuye muhira. Bamwe mu batavuga rumwe na leta y'u Rwanda bagiye bariyamiriza izi ngingo bakavuga yuko leta izifata itabanje kuraba ineza y'abantu bato bato batagira uko bifashe, bakavuga ko ibikora yigana ibikorwa n'ibihugu bikize. Ariko abajejwe amagara mu Rwanda bavuga yuko ingingo za guma-muhira bazifata ku neza y'igihugu n'abanyagihugu. Bavuga kandi yuko abakorwako cane na guma-muhira baronswa imfashanyo, kandi ko iyo ngingo iba ikenewe mu gukumira iki kiza kibangamiye isi. Ingingo zikaze zagiye zirafatwa ku batubahirije amategeko y'umukwabu canke yo kwikingira nko kwambara agafukamunwa, zirimwo kubafungira mu bibanza nka za stade hamwe no kubaca amande.

column2: Australia - Djokovic: Abimukira nabo barasaba kurekurwa
column3: Kurekurwa kwa rurangiranwa muri tennis Novac Djokovic nyuma yo gupfungwa kubera kwinjira muri Australia atarikingije Covid, kwatumye abimukira bamaze imyaka bapfunzwe nabo basaba kurekurwa.

column2: Red Flo Bio ya John Chris yamuronkeje ikidari c'inzahabu k'inzoga iryoshe cane ya 2021
column3: Mw'ihiganwa ry'inzoga nziza riba buri mwaka ritegurwa n'ikigo Monde Selection, muri iyi ndwi inzoga yengwa n'umurundi John Chris Kavakure yatahukanye ikidari c'inzahabu c'inzoga ya mbere iryoshe cane muri uyu mwaka. Iyo nzoga yitwa Red Flo Bio yahiganishijwe n'ubundi bwoko bw'inzoga 3,100 zivuye mu bihugu 90 vyo mu mihingo itandukanye y'isi muri iri higanwa ryaba ku ncuro ya 60. Inzoga ziza muri iryo higanwa ziba zifise urugero rwo gukara rwa 7.5 Ihiganwa Monde Selection ni iry'ikompanyi yitwa International Quality Institute yo mu Bubiligi, ivuga ko ifise uburambe mu kuraba no kumva neza ibikorwa bifise akanovera kandi vyiza mu guteka, kwenga, amagara, eka n'ubwiza bw'imico kw'isi. John Chris Kavakure umubiligi kandi w'umurundi ashima ico kidari ngo kuko cerekanye ko abanye Afrika muri rusangi n'abarundi vy'umwihariko bashoboye. Yagize ati:"Kuba ndonse ico kidari ndi umurundi, avuka mu Bwiza, biha inguvu urundi rwaruka ko mu bikorwa bakora, ko ejo hashobora kuboneka umu John Chris mu burimyi, mu gushona, mu kworora." Kavakure amaze gukora ubwoko burenga 20 bw'inzoga mw'ihinguriro ryiwe rya Les Brasseries de Flobecq riri mu Bubiligi, akaba ashobora gukora ama 'hectolitres' 30.000 ku mwaka. John Chris avuga ko umwuga wo kwenga inzoga yawukundishijwe na nakuru wiwe. Ati:"Nyokuru ni we yatumye nkunda kwenga inzoga kuko namubona ariko arenga impeke ngaca nkurikirana ingene abigenza n'ivyo ashiramwo." Ivyo vyatumye agira ishaka ryo kwiga ubuhinga bwo kugana inzoga ziryoshe muri kaminuza aho yaronkeye impapuro z'imitsindo. Avuga ko umwambiro akoresha kugira inzoga iryohe ari ibanga ryiwe, ariko ko hariho iyo akura muri Afrika. John Chris ntakora inzoga gusa, aranubaka amahinguriro y'inzoga, aho hirya no hino kw'isi amaze gufasha kwubaka ayashika umunani harimwo n'ihinguriro ry'inzoga rigira kabiri mu Burundi riri mu ntara ya Ngozi muburaruko ryitwa Burundi Brewery rikora inzoga zitwa Soma Burundi. Ibindi bihugu birimwo amahinguriro yubatse ni nko muri Amerika, Ubuhinde, Ubudagi, Ubutaliyano no mu Bubiligi aho asanzwe aba nk'uko abivuga. Ikindi kidari c'inzahabu yaheruka kukironka mu 2018 ku nzoga yahinguye yitwa Flo58.

column2: Ronald Koeman: Barcelona yirukanye umumenyereza mukuru inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vallecano
column3: Ronald Koeman yirukanywe mu kazi nk'umumenyereza mukuru wa Barcelone inyuma y'amezi 14 i Nou Camp. Barca ifise amanota 15 yonyene mu nkino 10 mw'ihiganwa rya La Liga kandi imaze gutsindwa kabiri mu nkino zo gukuranamwo muri  uyu mwaka w'inkino (saison) wa Champion's League Ku rutonde iri mu kibanza c'icenda,  ikaba irushwa amanota atandatu na zibiri zirongoye urwo rutonde inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vellecano  ku wa gatatu. Ryabaye irya gatatu Barca itsindwa mu nkino  zine za vuba kandi  vyabaye ku  wa mungu naho yari yatsinzwe muri  Clasico na Real Madrid. Mw'itangazo, uwo mugwi wo muri Espagne wavuze uti: "Umukuru w'umugwi,  Joan Laporta, yamumenyesheje [Koeman] iyo ngingo inyuma yo gutsindwa na Rayo Vallecano. "Ronald Koeman aja gusezera abakinyi kuri uyu wa kane." Uwo munya-Hollande w'imyaka 58, yakiniye igihugu, Everton na Southampton, , we na Barca ntibarenze ikibanza ca gatatu muri La Liga muri saison iheruka. Ibibazo  vy'amafaranga muri Barca navyo ntaco vyafashije Koeman, vyatumye  Lionel Messi  ava  muri uwo mugwi  akaja muri Paris St-Germain mu kwezi  kw'umunani. Barcelone  ntiyashoboye kugura umukinyi n'umwe mushasha mu ci riheze,  Memphis Depay, Sergio Aguero na Eric Garcia  bakaba baje bataguzwe nawe rutahizamu Luuk de Jong aza nk'intizo avuye muri  Seville. Bamaze gutsindwa ku wa gatatu, Koeman yavuze ati: "Ibi bivuze ko tudahagaze neza". "Umugwi nta reme ugira mu bakinyi, waratakaje abakinyi bakomeye, biri n'ico vyerekana. Iyindi migwi yagiye iriyubaka gusumba, twebwe si uko vyagenze, n'ivyo biri n'ico vyerekana." Xavi, yabaye rurangiranwa muri uwo mugwi ubu akaba ari umumenyereza wa Al Sadd yo muri Qatar, ari mu bafise amahirwe menshi yo gusubirira Koeman. N'ubwa mbere kuva mu kwezi kw'icenda mu 1987 Barca itsindirwa hanze gatatu yikurikiranya kandi itinjije - igihe vyashika bikaba vyari vyatumye umumenyereza w'umwongereza Terry Venables  yirukanwa. Koeman yaratahukanye igikombe ca Copa del Rey mu mwaka wiwe wa mbere ariko Barca yahejeje ari iya gatatu muri La Liga n'amanota ya mbere make kuva mu 2008. Uwo yahora akinira Hollande mu kibanza c'inyuma hagati yakiniye Barca hagati ya 1989 na 1995, ayifasha gutsindira ibikombe bine vy'ihiganwa ryo muri Espagne hanyuma yinjiza igitsinfo cahaye intsinzi uwo mugwi mu gikombe ca Coupe d'Europe co mu 1992. Yagarukanywe muri uwo mugwi mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020 nk'umumenyereza mukuru n'uwahoze ari umukuru wawo  Josep Maria Bartomeu. Ariko umukuru mushasha  Laporta, yaravuze kenshi ko uwo mugabo atariwe yamushizeho. Abo bagabo ntibabanye neza, gushika aho mu kwezi kw'icenda Koeman asohora itangazo avuga ko yohabwa umwanya wo gusubira kwubaka umugwi inyuma yo gutakaza Messi na mugenzi w'imbere  Antoine Griezmann mu ci. Inyuma yo gutsindwa  na Real Madrid ku wa mungu, imodoka ya Koeman yarakikujwe na bamwe mu bafana ba Barcelone,  Koeman mu nyuma akaba yabise "abantu batarezwe " Ni iki kitagenze neza muri  Barcelona? Kimwe mu bikorwa vya Koeman nk'umumenyereza kwabaye   guhamagara kuri terefone  Luis Suarez bitarengeje ama sekunda 40 aho yabwira uwo mukinyi w'imbere aturuka muri Uruguay ko atagikenewe afise umwidegemvyo wo kuva muri uwo mugwi. Iyo ngingo yari yafashwe n'uburongozi bw'umugwi kandi ubu birazwi ko vyavuye ku bibazo vy'amafaranga vyatumye bikura umukinyi w'imbere yari yatsinze ibitsindo 21 ku ncuro 29 yatanguye mu rukino muri saison yaheruka. Barca yaciye itangura gutakaza inguvu kuva ku mugwi wahora uhiganwa mu ya mbere i Buraya gushika aho bitaworohera kuronka ikibanza muri Champions League. Kuva ku murongo w'imbere ugizwe na Messi, Suarez na  Griezmann ukaja k'uwugizwe na  Depay, De Jong n'uwuriko arasaza Aguero vyerekana muri make akazi katoroshe  Koeman yari afise, kandi n'uwugiye kumusubirira niko kamurindiriye.

column2: Itegeko rya Islam Sharia rirabuza umuziki, kubera iki? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia.

column2: DR Congo: Umukuru w'umugwi ujejwe amatora atanguye akazi mu mpari
column3: Umukuru w'umugwi ujejwe amatora muri Repuburika y'Intwaro ya Demokrasi ya Congo (RDC) yarahiriye amabanga mu mpari nyinshi kw'igenwa ryiwe. Denis Kadima, agiye kuyobora umugwi ujejwe amatora CENI,  afise igikorwa gikomeye co gutunganya amatora yimirije kuba mu 2023. Igenwa ryiwe ntiryahurijweko na bose, imigwi y'amadini - ariyo yitwa ko igena abagize CENI - ntiyumvikanye. Itandatu muri iyo migwi umunani  yaratoye Kadima - ariko ishengero katorika hamwe n'ishengero ry'abaporoti rinini rya ECC (Église du Christ au Congo), aravyanka avuga ko igenrwa ridaciye mu nzira yo. Ibihugu bifashanya na RD Congo birimwo ahanini ibigize ishirahamwe rya Buraya, n'iryo shirahamwe nyene hamwe kandi na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubuyapani, Ubwongereza na Korea y'Epfo, birababazwa no kubona igenwa ry'abagize CENI ritumvikanyweko n'abo biraba kandi ari ''ikintu gikomeye mu gutanga icizere ku matora yimirije". Ivyo ayo mashengero avuga bishigikiwe n'abashingamateka batavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi nabo batemeje Kadima mu nama nshingamateka. Inama nshingamateka ya RDC yemeje igenwa rya Kadima ku wa 16 ukwezi kw'icumi n'ubwo imigwi y'amadini itari yamwumvikanyeko. Mu mpera z'indwi iheze, prezida Félix Tshisekedi yaciye yemeza igenwa rya Kadima n'abandi bantu 12 bagize uwo mugwi n'ubwo hakiri izo mpari. Batatu bategerezwa guserukira uruhande rutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi ntibaragenwa ariko umukuru w'igihugu Tshisekedi yavuze ko yizeye ko bazosanga abandi. Abagize umugwi CENI bategerezwa kuva mu migambwe iri mu nama nshingamateka, nk'uko amategeko abitegekanya. Mw'itangazo vyasohoreye hamwe, Amerika, ibihugu vyinshi bigize ishirahamwe rya Buraya, Ishirahamwe rya Buraya nyene, Ubuyapani, Korea y'Epfo n'Ubwongereza, bisaba abategetsi babijejwe kurondera ko urwo rwego rw'amatora rwitabwa n'abo biraba bose cane cane imigambwe ya poritike n'amashirahamwe adaharanira inyungu za poritike (société civile) no gukomeza ko barugirira icizere. Ivyo bihugu vyibutsa ko biha agaciro cane ugukorera  mu muco, ubwigenge, ukudakumira, ukudahengama n'ugutanga icizere ku matora yimirije. Amatora aheruka muri Congo yabaye mu 2018. Ay'umukuru w'igihugu yatsinzwe na Félix Tshisekedi mu mpari zatumye uwatangajwe ko yatsinzwe, Martin Fayulu, atemera ivyayavuyemwo.

column2: Yoshiro Mori: Umukuru wa Olympic za Tokyo aratanga imihoho kubera kuvuga 'ibitabereye' ku bagore
column3: Umukuru w'umugwi utegura inkino za Olympic zizobera Tokyo agiye gutanga imihoho inyuma yo kunegurwa ko yavuze ibintu "bitabereye" ku bagore. Yoshiro Mori, w'oimyaka 83, vyanditswe ko yavuze ngo abagore bavuga menshi kandi ko inama n'abagore bo mu nama nyobozi ''zitwara umwanya muremmure''. Ayo majambo yaradugije ifurufumbi ry;abavyiyamiriza none Mori yarasavye imbabazi ico gihe ariko avuga ko atazotanga imihoho. Ariko  yagumye yotwa igitutu co gutanga imihoho. Mori, yahoze ari umushikiranganji wa mbere, yitezwe gutanga imihoho  ku mugaragaro mu nama idasanzwe izoba ku wa gatanu inyuma yo  kuvuga ivyo ku ndwi iheze. Ibigo bikomeye bishigikira izo nkino navyo vyari vyashize amajwi hejuru mu kunegura ivyo yavuze harimwo na Toyota, iri mu bakomeye bshigikira cane inkino za Olympic. Umukuru wa Toyota, Akio Toyota yavuze ko iyo kompanyi "yababajwe'' n'ivyashikirijwe. Ku wa kabiri umugwi w'abashingwamanza b'abagore bambaye impunzu zera mu kwiyamiriza ivyavuzwe na Mori, hari n'abagabo bashigikiye mu kwambara uko nyene. Ku bw'ibinyamakuru vyo mu Buyapani, abantu bashika 400 nabo baranditse bavuga ko bahagaritse gusaba gukorera ubushake mu nkino za Olympic, zitegekanijwe mu bihe biri imbere uyu mwaka. Inama y'abarongoye umugwi utegura inkino ubu igizwe n'anbantu 24, batanu muri bo bakaba ari abagore. Mu 2019,inama y'abaronmgoye uwo mugwi-ujejwe guhitamwo abayapani bazokwitaba inkino,yihaye ihangiro ryo kwongereza igitigiri c'abagore bayigize gushika ku 40 kw'ijana. Mori bivugwa ko yagize ati: "Turamutse tudugije igitigiri c'abnagore bagize inama nyobozi, dutegerezwa kubasha kugabanya umwanya bafata mu kuvuga, barafise ingorane yo kurangiza, ivyo navyo bikaba bishavuza." Mori arazwi mu gihugu kuba yakuze kugwa mu rudubi no kuvuga ibitabereye abashitsi igihe yari mu nabanga hagati ya 2000 na 2001. \yabwiye ikinyamakuru co mu Yapani Mainichi ko abagore bo mu muryangoi wiwe nabo bamuryagaguye kubera ivyo yavuze.

column2: Vatican: Kardinali Becciu yategetswe gutanga imihoho, ibitari bimenyerewe
column3: Umukardinali yari mu bari bafise amabanga akomeye i Vaticano kwa Papa, Giovanni Angelo Becciu, yatanze imihoho giturumbuka ariko akavuga ko yategetswe na Papa Francis. Avuga ko yiketswe gukoresha umutungo wa Ekleziya yihera benewabo, agahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Kardinali Becciu yari umwe mu begereye cane Papa, akaba yarigeze kuba ajejwe amabanga mu bunyamabanga bwa leta ya Vaticano. Yagiye kugira uruhara mu masezerano yateye impari yo gushora imitahe mu nyubakwa nziza ya Londres mu mafaranga ya Ekleziya. Iki gikorwa kuva ico gihe kiriko kirakorwako amatohoza. Ntibikunze kuboneka aho abantu bo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Vaticano batanga imihoho, kandi na Vaticano nta vyinshi yabivuzeko mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa kane. Ariko uyu mu kardinali w'imyaka 72 yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Domani co mu Butaliyano ko yategetswe gutanga imihoho kuko yiketswe ko yahaye benewabo amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Avuga ati: "Nta n'urufaranga na rumwe jewe nigeze niba. Nta matohoza ndiko ndakorwako, ariko ari nka hamwe bonshira imbere y'ubutungane, nokwisigura". Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagiye gushikiriza mu nyuma, uyu mukardinali avuga ko ibogozwa ryiwe ryabaye giturumbuka. Avuga ko na Papa "atari agononokewe" igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru. Ati: "Ni ibisigabwenge. Gushika ejo…niyumvira ko nari umugenzi pfa mpfe wa Papa, intumwa yiwe y'umwizigirwa". "Mu nyumn rero niho Papa yambwira ko atakinyizeye kuko yaronse amakuru yahawe n'abacamanza bamubwira ko nakoze icaha co kunyuruza umutungo". Kardinali Becciu ashimangira ko habaye "ukutumvikana", akongera kandi ati: "Nditeguye gusigurira Papa vyose. Nta caha na kimwe nakoze". Uyu mukardinali Giovanni Angelo Becciu ni umutaliyano yamaze imyaka ya mbere akora mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Vaticano. Papa Francis niwe yamugize umukardinali mu 2018, igihe aherewe amabanga mashasha yo kurongora igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'ubweranda. Yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano avuga ati: "Ni uruhombo kuri jewe, umuryango wanje, abanyagihugu b'igihugu canje. Navyemeye ku bugamburutsi n'urukundo mfitiye Ekleziya na Papa". N'aho mu vyo yagirijwe harimwo ibijanye n'amasezerano ajanye n'inyubakwa ya Londres ivugwa ko yaguzwe mu mutungo wa Ekleziya, Kardinali Becciu wewe siko abibona. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, uyu mukardinali yavuze ko Papa yamwagirije ko yakoresheje nabi umutungo wa Ekleziya akawushira mu ma koperative n'urucuruza vya benewabo. Ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano kandi bivuga ko Papa atanezerejwe n'ingene imperezwa yo gufashisha abakene yiswe Peter's Pence yagiye gukoreshwa mu bindi bitari biyigenewe. Kardinali Becciu azobandanya afise iki giti n'aho yatanze imihoho. Hagati aho, nta ruhara azogira mu gutora uwundi mu Papa.

column2: Inama ya G7 yemeje integuro yo gusohora amafaranga kugira ihangane na China
column3: Abategetsi b'ibihugu bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bihurikiye mu citwa G7 bemeje integuro yo gufasha ibihugu bikenye n'ibiri mu nzira y'amajambere mu bikorwa vy'iterambere, ni mu ntumbero yo guhangana n'Ubushinwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuga ko ashaka ko umugambi wo gufasha ibihugu bikenye ushigikiwe na Amerika, wiswe Build Back Better World (B3W), uba uwo ku rwego rwo hejuru ugasubirira umugambi nk'uwo w'Ubushinwa. Umugambi w'Ubushinwa uzwi nka Belt and Road Initiative (BRI), uramaze gufasha ibihugu bitari bike mu kubironsa amagari ya moshi, kwubaka amabarabara n'ibivuko. Ariko ni umugambi unegurwa cane, uvugwa ko winjije ibihugu mu madeni y'umurengera. Mw'itangazo basohoye inyuma y'inama yariko ibera mu karere ka Cornwall mu Bwongereza, abategetsi ba G7 bavuga ko bazoshira imbere ubucuti bushingiye ku "kwubahiriza indangagaciro, bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru hamwe no gukorera mu muco". Hagati aho, ntibatomora iyo amafaranga azova mu gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubudagi Angela Merkel avuga ko batari bwagere ku gihe co gusohora amafaranga. Amerika iranegura cane Ubushinwa ku nteguro yabwo y'ugukomeza igifatwa nk'imigenderanire "ishingiye ku madeni". Abategetsi ba G7, umurwi w'ibihugu indwi bitunze kurusha ibindi kw'isi bivuga ko bishira imbere intwaro rusangi, bavuga kandi ko biyemeje gushiraho iyindi nteguro y'ingingo zo kurwanya ibindi biza bishobora kwiyadukiza muri kazoza. Muri izi ngingo harimwo kugabanya ikiringo co gukora no kwemeza incanco n'imiti yo kurwanya Covid-19 kikaja musi y'imisi ijana. Kuri uyu wa Mungu niho bategekanya gutangaza iyi nteguro, hampande y'itangazo rirangiza iyi nama barimwo. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson niwe arongoye iyi nama y'imisi itatu iriko ibera mu karere ka Carbis Bay. Ni ibiki ibihugu vy'uburengero bw'isi vyoba bimaze gukorera Ubushinwa gushika ubu ? Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, Amerika, Ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Bulaya, Ubwongereza hamwe na Canada vyafatiye ibihano Ubushinwa. Ibi bihano vyafatiwe abategetsi bo hejuru mu ntara ya Xinjiang bagirizwa ihonyanga ry'agateka ka zina muntu bakorera aba Islam  bo mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur, muri vyo hakaba harimwo ukubuza ingendo muri ivyo bihugu hamwe no gufata amatungo yabo. Abantu barenga umuriyoni bo  mu bwoko bw'aba Uyghur z'izindi nkehwa nibo bazwi ko bapfungiwe mu makambi ari muyi iyo ntara yo mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw'Ubushinwa. Reta y'Ubushinwa yagirizwa gutera ubugumba abagore b'aba Uyghur no gusambura imiryango, mu gutandukanya abana n'abavyeyi babo. Itohoza ryakozwe na BBC ryashizwe ahabona mu kwa kabiri ririmwo amakuru yemeza ivyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu, ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina hamwe n'iyicarubozo bikorerwa abapfungiwe muri ayo makambi. Ubushinwa bwaciye bwihora mu gufatira ibihano abategetsi b'aba nya Burayi.

column2: Ihiganwa rya mbere rya Basketball Africa League ryasibijwe muri Senegal kubera coronavirus
column3: Intango y'ihiganwa ku nshuro ya mbere rya Basketball Africa League (BAL) yasibijwe kubera ubwoba bw'ikiza ca coronavirus. Ihiganwa rya mbere rya BAL ryagomba gutangura ku murwa mukuru wa Senegal, Dakar, itariki 13 z'ukwa gatatu, kandi nta tariki nshasha yatanzwe. Iri higanwa rishasha ry'ababigize umwuga, ryavutse ku gufashanya hagati y'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rya basketball, International Basketball Federation, na NBA ryagomba kwitabirwa n'amakipe 12 yo muri Afrika. Umukuru wa BAL, Amadou Gallo Fall yagize ati: "Twisunze impanuro za leta ya Senegal mu bijanye n'umwitwarariko utewe n'ugukwiragira kw'ikiza ca coronavirus, inkino zitanguza ihiganwa BAL zigijwe inyuma. "Birambabaje kuba tudashoboye gutanguza iri higanwa ry'amateka nk'uko twari twabiteguye ariko turindiranye igishika ko BAL itangura ku tariki izoza hanyuma." Abateguye ihiganwa bavuga ko umutekano w'abafana, abakinyi, amakipe hamwe n'abakozi ari kirumara cane kandi ko bazovyihweza neza imbere y'uko batangaza iyindi tariki mu minsi iri imbere. Gushika isaha 08:00 ku masaha mpuzamakungu ya GMT, hari hamaze kwemezwa abantu babiri banduye coronavirus muri Senegal. Inkino hirya no hino kw'isi zarahuye n'ibibazo kubera coronavirus, ariko BAL ibaye ihiganwa rya mbere rikomeye muri Afrika ryigijwe inyuma kubera iki kiza. Ahandi, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Tanzania, TFF, ryabujije abakinyi guhana amaboko imbere y'uko inkino zitangura. TFF ivuga ko iriko irakurikiza impanuro z'ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara zo kwirinda guhana amaboko mu ntumbero yo kubuza iki kiza gukwiragira mu gihugu. Kuwa kabiri, haragaragaye amafoto yerekana umukuru w'igihugu ca Tanzania John Magufuli akozanyako ibirenge mu kuramukanya n'uwundi munyepolisi hako bohanye ibiganza. Ntawanduye coronavirus araboneka muri Tanzania gushika ubu, mu gihe abakekwa bose basanze atayo bafise nyuma yo gupimwa.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru: Mourinho, Ziyech, Damsgaard, Puig, Sarr
column3: Umumenyereza wa Tottenham Hotspur, Jose Mourinho, ntariko arirukanwa n'aho ibintu bitifashe neza kuri uyo murwi hamwe n'ibihuha bivuga ko abakinyi bakuru bakuru muri uyo murwi bafise impungenge . (Mirror) Milan na Juventus bariko bakurikiranira hagufi umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Chelsea, Hakim Ziyech w'imyaka 27 akomoka muri Maroke. (Calciomercato) Leeds United, Southampton na West Ham United zishobora guhangana na Tottenham mu kurondera kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Sampdoria umunya Danemark Mikkel Damsgaard w'imyaka 20. (Star) Imbere y'uko Arsenal itizwa umukinyi wo hagati, umunya Norvege Martin Odegaard wa Real Madrid afise imyaka 22, yari yananiwe no kuronka umunya Esupanye Riqui Puig w'imyaka 21 akina mu murwi Barcelona.(Express) Umuhagarikizi wa Ismaila Sarr avuga ko ibiganiro bigeze kure kugira ngo uyu munya Senegal w'imyaka 22 akina hagati muri Watford no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'igihugu ciwe ashobore kwinjira muri Liverpool mu kw'icenda. (Liverpool Echo) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Zenit St Petersburg, umunya Croatia Dejan Lovren w'imyaka 31 yahoze akina muri Liverpool, avuga ko umunya Misiri Mohamed Salah w'imyaka 28 bahoze bakinana kandi ari abagenzi pfa mpfe, agiye kumara iyindi myaka itari mike i Anfield. (Talksport) Manchester United ntirafata ingingo nimba yokwongereza ikiringo c'umwaka amasezerano ifitaniye n'umusatirizi w'umunya Uruguay Edinson Cavani w'imyaka 34, mu gihe umunya Esupanye akina hagati Juan Mata w'imyaka 32. hamwe n'umunyegori w'umunya Argentina Sergio Romero,w'imyaka 33 bobo bazosezererwa mu ci riza. (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Bayer Leverkusen, Timothy Fosu-Mensah w'imyaka 22 akomoka mu Buholande avuga ko vyabaye ngombwa ko ava muri Manchester United kugira ngo ashobore kubandanya n'umugwa wiwe. (Mail) Tottenham iriko irategurira ikibanza mu murwi w'abakinyi ba mbere bayo umwongereza Oliver Skipp w'imyaka 20 akina hagati mw'ihiganwa ry'umwaka uza inyuma y'ugukora bigashimwa muri  Norwich City aho yari yatijijwe. (Football Insider) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Real Madrid na Croatia Luka Modric w'imyaka 35 yemeye ko ashobora gukatwa umushahara kugira ngo ashobore kuguma akinira uyo murwi.  (Mundo Deportivo - in Spanish) Juventus yari yiyeyeje kugura umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United, umufaransa Paul Pogba mu kwa kane kw'umwaka uheze wa 2020, ikaba yari yemeye gutanga umunya Brezili akina ku ruhande Douglas Costa, umunya Bosnia akina hagati Miralem Pjanic, umunya Pays de Galles akina hagati Aaron Ramsey hamwe n'umufaransa akina hagati Adrien Rabiot kugira ngo ibaguze na Pogba - ariko Man U yarakuriye inkoni ku gishitsi uyu murwi wo mu Butaliyano mu kuwusaba imiliyoni 120 y'amadorari ya Amerika kugira ngo ishobore kubaha uyu mukinyi w'imyaka 27. (Calciomercato) Umuserukiri wa Pogba, Mino Raiola, avuga ko "ategerezwa gukora mu bwitonzi bwinshi" iyo havyutse ikibazo c'uyu mukinyi wa Manchester United mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko Juventus yipfuza kwisubiza uyu mukinyi wo hagati. (Talksport) Manchester United itegerezwa kubanza ikihangana imbere y'ugukinisha umunya Cote d'Ivoire Amad Diallo w'imyaka 18 akina ku ruhande, mu gihe acimenyereza umukino wo mu Bwongereza, ibi bikavugwa n'umumenyereza w'uyu murwi w'abatarenza imyaka 23 Neil Wood. (Goal) Uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester United n'umurwi nserukira gihugu w'Ubwongereza Paul Parker avuga ko amajambo y'umumenyereza Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ko umurwi wiwe utakiri mu yihiganira gutsindira ihiganwa ryUbwongereza ari "amajambo atagira mvura".  (Sun)

column2: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II na Africa: Ibihe bikomeye vy'ingoma yiwe
column3: Umwamikazi Elizabeth II yagendeye ibihugu birenga 20 vyo muri Afrika ku ngoma yiwe, igihe ingoma y'Ubwongereza yariko irarangira, ukwikukira nakwo kuriko kurashwara Afrika. Ubucuti budasanzwe bwarabandanije biciye mw'ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth, umwamikazi yari arongoye. Yari imigenderanire ikomeye - rimwe na rimwe igoye - imigenderanire iri hagati y'ingoma y'Ubwongereza  hamwe n'igihe c'ubukoloni. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth yavugiye ijambo imbere y'inzu ya reta i Cape Town, muri Afrika y'Epfo igihe yashikana imyaka 21, yiyemeza ko ubuzima bwiwe bwose azokorera ishirahamwe rya Commonwealth. "Ahantu hose nagiye muri iki gihugu ciza ca Afrika y'Epfo.... abavyeyi banje, mwenewacu nanje nyene twarakunzwe cane n'abanyagihugu baco, gushika aho twiyumva nk'abantu bari muhira ngaha, nk'uko umenga twabanye na bo ubuzima bwabo bwose. Umuganwakazi Elizabeth agaragara ngaha mw'ihoteli Treetops muri Kenya ari kumwe n'umugabo wiwe, Duke wa Edinburgh. Mu nyuma akiri muri urwo rugendo, yumvise amakuru ko se wiwe, Umwami George VI yatanze kandi ko ategerezwa kuba umwamikazi. Uru ni rumwe mu ngendo zibiri umwamikazi Elizabeth yagize muri Nigeria. Yafashwe ifoto ngaha ari kumwe n'umutegetsi Oba Adenji-Adele II i Lagos. Yaragendeye kandi Calabar, Enugu, Jos, Kaduna, Kano na Port Harcourt. Umwamikazi Elizabeth ariko aratambana na Kwame Nkrumah, prezida wa mbere wa Ghana inyuma yo kwikukira, yaza n'imbere mu muhari w'abashaka kwikukira. Yatamvye umuziki wateguriwe urwo rugendo wiswe Welcome Your Majesty. Umwamikazi Elizabeth n'umuganwa Philip bafashwe ifoto bari kumwe n'igikomangoma Haile Selassie wa Ethiopia i Addis Abeba, mu rugendo rw'akazi. Ico gikomangoma carahungiye mu Bwongereza hagati ya 1936 na 1941 inyuma y'aho Ubutaliyano bwigaruriye igihugu ciwe aza kugaruka ku ngoma mu 1941 igihe Ubwongereza na Commonwealth batsinda Ubutaliyano. Umwamikazi Elizabeth na prezida El Tigani El-Mahi bariko barava ku kibuga c'indege ca Khartoum mu modoka. Urugendo rwiwe muri Sudani harimwo n'umuhingamo w'isiganwa ku ngamiya hamwe n'urugendo rwo kuraba ibikorwa vyo kwubaka urugomero rw'umuyagankuba rwa Roseires kuri Nil Bleu, rwarangiye mu mwaka ukurikira. Umwamikazi ari kumwe na prezida Julius Nyerere atanguye urugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itatu. Imyaka 18 imbere y'aho, Dr Nyerere yari yashikanye Tanganyika yahoze ikoronijwe n'Ubwongereza ku ntahe yo kwikukira, aca aba uwa mbere akibereye umushikiranganji wa mbere hanyuma aba prezida w'ico gihugu wa mbere. Uko imyaka yagenda, yagiye yanka cane Ubwongereza n'Uburaya. Ariko, reta y'Ubwongereza yamubona nk'umuntu afise inguvu zo guhoyahoya mu karere karimwo ibihuhusi vyinshi. Prezida wa Zimbabwe yarahawe ikidari n'umwamikazi mu 1994. Ariko igihe imishamirano yongerekana hagati ya Zimbabwe na reta y'Ubwongereza ku mugambi w'isubirwamwo ry'itangwa ry'amatongo, Zimbabwe yarikuye muri Commonwealth mu 2003 - hanyuma Mugabe aca yakwa ico kidari mu 2008. Umwamikazi Elizabeth yafashwe ifoto ashitse ku kibuga c'indege ca Durban. Yari mu rugendo rw'akazi rw'imisi itandatu muri Afrika y'Epfo, hakaba habaye igihe c'imvura ciza mu myaka 10, aho yaciye atazirwa Motlalepula canke "umwamikazi w'imvura". Umwamikazi ari kumwe n'umukuru w'igihugu wa mbere wa Afrika y'Epfo w'umwirabure, Nelson Mandela, bivugwa ko bakundana cane. Umwamikazi yarandikiye amakete prezida Mandela aho yakoresha "Umugenzi wawe  nyawe, Elizabeth R" kandi bisa n'uko yamuhamagara "Nelson", mu gihe bivugwa ko na we yamuhamagara bisanzwe "Elizabeth" aciye ku ruhande amategeko agenga ubwami. Umwamikazi yaragendeye Nigeria ubugira kabiri mu 2003. Ico gihugu cari carahagaritswe muri Commonwealth kubera kutubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu ku butegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Sani Abacha mu 1995, gisubira kwemererwa kugaruka mu 1999, hagarutse ubutegetsi bwa gisivile. Umwamikazi na prezida Obasanjo bagaragara ngaha mu birori vyo kwugurura inama y'abakuru b'ibihugu bihurikiye mw'ishirahamwe Commonwealth i Abuja. Mu rugendo rwa nyuma ku mugabane wa Afrika, uwo mwamikazi amaze umwanya muremure ku butegetsi yarahuye n'umwe mu baprezida bamaze imyaka myinshi ku butegetsi, Yoweri Museveni, na we ari ku butegetsi kuva mu 1986. Yari yarigeze kugendera Uganda imbere y'aho - mu rugendo rwa mbere rw'akazi muri Afrika nk'umwamikazi mu 1954.

column2: Coronavirus: Ibihugu vyo muri Afrika biriteguriye kurwanya coronavirus?
column3: Afrika ni umwe mu migabane ibiri ata bantu baramenyekana ko banduye ikiza ca koronavirus,  ariko abahinga baragabisha ko hakiri kare  kugira havugwe ko ata muntu n'umwe arafatwa n'ico kiza, umuntu aravye imigenderanire ikomeye hagati y'uyu mugabane n'u Bushinwa. Abantu barenga 900 baramaze gupfa , abantu barenga 40.000 kw'isi, benshi muri bo abashinwa,  baramaze kumenyekana ko banduye ico kiza. Mu ndwi iheze, ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi (OMS) ryaremeje ko coronavirus ari ikiza gihanze - ahanini kubera ubwoba  ku bihugu bikenye bitoshobora kumenya ingene bivyifatamwo ico kiza kirinze kibishikamwo. Umukuru wa OMS Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ati: "Imvo nini y'urwo rwandiko si ibiriko birabera mu Bushinwa,  ariko ni ibindi bibera mu bindi bihugu. Amatohoza yacu akomeye n'uko uyo mugera woshobora gukwiragira mu bindi bihugu bidafise ubushobozi bukomeye bwo kuvura'. Ibisata vy'amagara y'abantu vy'ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika bisanzwe bihanzwe n'umuzigo uremereye, vyoshoboka gute  ko bigwanya ikindi kiza c'ingwara  gifise ubukari nk'ubwo? Michael Yao ajejwe ibikorwa bidasanzwe muri Afrika mw'ishirahamwe OMS, avuga ko hari ibihugu bimwe bimwe, bifise uburyo bubayabaye - ko bitohera ku busa mu kuvura. Ati: "Turazi ingene igisata c'amagara y'abantu ku mugabane wa Afrika gifise ubushobozi buke kandi ibi bisata nyene vyararengewe n'ibindi biza, rero ni nkererwa kuri twebwe kumenya iki kiza hakiri kare kugira dukinge kitarahashika". Ni ubuhe bushobozi buriho muri kino gihe mu kuvura iki kiza ? Mu ntango y'iyi ndwi , hari hamaze kuboneka ibibanza vyo gupimiramwo abantu  2 bita laboratoire ku mugabane wa Afrika.- kimwe muri Senegal ikindi muri Afrika y'epfo- vyose bifise imiti yo gupima iyo ndwara. Ivyo bibanza biriko bikora nk'ivyo kwakira   abagwayi bavuye mu turere dutandukanye tw'uyu mugabane. Bimwe muri ivyo bibanza vyo gupimiramwo,  nka Institut Pasteur de Dakar  muri Senegal,  vyarafashe iya mbere muri Afrika mu guteza imbere mu kurondera uburyo bugezweho mu bujanye n'ubuvuzi, harimwo n'ubushakashatsi ku ndwara y'ubushuhe bita fievre jaune. Ariko muri iyi  ndwi ibihugu nka Ghana, Madagascar, Nigeria na Sierra Leone vyamenyesheje ko bishobora gupima. OMS kandi yarungitse ibikoresho mu bindi bibanza 29 vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika, kugira bigire ubushobozi bwo kurwanya uyo mugera,  vyongere kandi binafashe gupima abo mu bindi bihugu, bibaye nkenerwa. Hari icizere ko mu ntango z'uku kwezi ibihugu bitari munsi ya 36 vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika bizoronka cane cane  ibikoresho vyo gushobora  gupima uyu mugera wa coronavirus. Muganga Yao avuga ko ibihugu vya Afrika  bishobora kugira ubushobozi bwo gupima uyu mugera mu gihe bizoba bimaze kuronswa imiti mishasha yo gupima izoboneka ivuye mu Bushinwa no mu bihugu vya Bulaya. Umuryango Croix Rouge utabara imbabare muri Nigeria wategekanije abakozi bitanga bangana umuliyoni kugira bafashe. Umunyamabanga mukuru wawo Abubakar Ahmed Kende yamenyesheje ko iyo  ngingo igamije gukinga kugira ngo uwo mugera ntukwiragire hose mu gihugu mu gihe woboneka, hamwe kandi no kuzibira ikiza ca ''Lassa fever''. Muri Tanzaniya , umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu  Ummy Mwalimu atangaza ko hamaze gutunganywa ibibanza vyo kwakiriramwo  abantu ukwa bonyene mu buraruko, mu buseruko no mu burengero bw'igihugu. Harategekanijwe ibikoresho vyo gupima ubushuhe hamwe n'abakozi bo kwamuganga ibihumbi 2 bahawe inyigisho. Ibihugu vyinshi harimwo Kenya , Ethiopia, Côte d'Ivoire, Ghana na Botswana vyarasuzumye  abantu  bikekwako boba banduye uwo mugera, mu kubashira mu bibanza vya bonyene. Gushik'ubu bose ntanumwe muribo yabonetse ko yanduye. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu wa Uganda yemeje ko yashize abantu barenga 100 mu kibanza ca bonyene bashitse ku kibuga c'indege mpuzamakungu ca Entebbe. Bamwe muribo bashizwe mu kibanza ca bonyene mu bitaro 2 vyo muri Entebbe na Kampala , mugihe abandi basabwe kuguma mu mazu yabo. Muganga  Yao yagize uruhara mu kurwanya ikiza ca Ebola mu burengero bwa Afrika hagati y'2014 n'2016, n'ubu vuba mu Buseruko bwa  Republika ya Democrasi ya Kongo. avuga ko afise impungenge ko ata buryo bukwiye bwo kuvura abnduye coronavirus bamaze kuremba. Avuga ati: ''Turiko duhanura ibihugu kwigora  gupima uyu mugera hakiri kare kugira ntukwire hose mu gihugu - kuko vyotugora kuwugwanya''. Iciza kiriho ni uko ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biza biriko birapima ingenzi zishika  mu bivuko ikiza ca Ebola cinjiriramwo. Ibihugu vyagwanije  ikiza ca Ebola, biracafise ibibanza vyo gushira abantu ukwa bonyene hamwe n'ubuhinga bwo gucungera  indwara zandukira. Ariko mugihe hageze ibijanye n'ugupima umugera w'ico kiza, usanga bitandukanye na Ebola.  Ebola igera aho yandukira mugihe ibimenyetso biboneka, ariko hari amakuru avuga ko hari abarwayi bandukije abandi imbere y'uko baboneka ko barwaye. Imigenderanire ikomeye ihagaze ku rudandazwa hagati y'u Bushinwa n'ibihugu vya  Afrika ituma impungenge ziba nyinshi ko uwo mugera ushobora gukwiragira hose. Igihugu c'ubushinwa gifise ubucuti bunini cane buhagaze ku rudandazwa mu gihe amakompanyi ashika 10.000 y'abashinwa akorera muri Afrika Hari kandi abanyeshure barenga 80.000 b'abanyafrika, biga mu Bushinwa , nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru The Guardian. Umunyeshure w'imyaka 21 wo muri Kameruni yaravuzwe ko yanduye uwo mugera inyuma y'urugendo rwiwe mu ntara ya  Wuhan akaba ariko aravurirwa mu bitaro. Hari kandi n'abanyeshuri b'abashinwa baja kwiga kuri uwomugabane wa Afrika. Mu gihe imigenderanire ishingiye ku rudandazwa igenda ikomera, n'urugero rw'uruja n'uruza hagati hagati ya Afrika n'Ubushinwa narwo nyene rugenda rwiyongera. Ibitigiri vyinshi vy'ingenzi biteye impungenge. Muganga John Nkengasong, umuyobozi w'ikigo ca Afrika gikurikirana kikongera  kigakinga  ingwara, yanditse mu kinyamakuru citwa Nature,  ko Afrika ikwiye kuraba neza ingene ikiza ca coronavirus cakwiragiye muri Aziya bivuye ku rudandazwa hamwe n'uruja n'uruza rw'abantu. Mu 2002, Imana yarakinze Afrika ntiyashikirwa na ca kiza ca SARS kiretse umuntu umwe gusa yavuzwe muri Afrika y'epfo yijiye ayirwaye, "ariko ingendo zo mu kirere zaraduze gushika ku bice birenga 600 % mu myaka 10  iheze kubera Ubushinwa bwongereje imitahe yabwo muri Afrika''. Indege nyinshi kw'isi zarahagararitse vy'imfatakibanza ingendo ziva  zikongera zikagenda mu Bushinwa. Nico gituma indege zo ku mugabane wa Afrika zimaze imisi zisugerezwa n'abanyagihugu kugira zihagarike ingendo. Amakompanyi y'indege yo mu Misiri, Kenya, Maroc n'u Rwanda yarahagaritse ingendo zayo n'ico gihugu, ikompanyi ya mbere ifise indege nyinshi ku mugabane wa Afrika, Ethiopian Airlines - yoyo ytiyahagaritse. OMS yarasavye ama kompanyi y'indege ko atohagarika ingendo zayo mu Bushinwa, ariko irerekana ibihugu 13 vyo ku mugabane wa Afrika bikwiye kwitondera izo ngendo kubera  bifitaniye imigenderanire ikomeye n'ico gihugu. Itegekanya kurungika abakozi bayo baja gufasha muri ivyo bihugu 13  gushika muri mpera z'iyi ndwi. Muganga Matshidiso Moeti, atwara akerere ka Afrika muri OMS ati: ''Umugera mushasha uwo ari wo wose kubera uba utazwi utera ubwoba''. column2: Intambara ya Ukraine: Ibihugu vya Africa biriko biterwa igitsure ku kutagira aho bihagaze
column3: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw'ishirahamwe ONU avuga ko ibihugu vya Afrika bidashobora kubandanya vyerekana ko ataho bihagaze ku ntambara ya Ukraine. Avugana na BBC, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ko mu matora yo kwiyamiriza igitero ca Ukraine yabereye mu nama ya bose muri ONU iheruka, ibihugu 17 vyose vya Afrika vyanse kugira uruhande vyegamiye, nayo umunani bindi navyo bihitamwo kudatora. Thomas-Greenfield avuga ko ata rubuga rw'abatagira aho begamiye rushobora kubaho, mu gihe iyi atari intambara y'ukwikekana (Guerre froide/Cold War) hagati y'ibihugu vy'Uburengero n'Uburusiya. Umupfanosi Thomas-Greenfield avuga ko Amerika iriko irahiga ahandi ibihugu bisanzwe bigurira mu Burusiya bishobora kuguriramwo ivyo bisanzwe bivana hanze. Uyu aserukira Amerika muri ONU avuga kandi ko Amerika ishigikiye icipfuzo ca Afrika y'Epfo co guhuza Ukraine n'Uburusiya. Mu matora yabereye mu nama rusangi idasanzwe ya ONU yabaye ku wa 02 z'uku kwa gatatu, mu bihugu 193 bigize iri shirahamwe mpuzamakungu ibihugu 141 vyashigikiye iki cemezo, 35 biranka kugira uruhande vyegamira, bitanu biragihakana, mu gihe hari ibindi bitatoye. Uburundi bwashimye kutagira aho buhagaze, mu gihe Urwanda rwemeje iki cemezo. (tugomba kukivuga, ndibaza ko ari icyo gushyira mu kato Uburusiya no kwamagana iyi ntambara) Ibindi bihugu bitashatse kwerekana aho bihagaze ni Afrika y'Epfo, Algeria, Uganda, Senegal, Sudani, Sudani y'Epfo, Mali,  Mozambique, Namibia, Angola, Zimbabwe, Guinée équatoriale, Centrafrique, Madagascar, Tanzania na  Congo. Igihe atangaza ko Afrika y'Epfo yasabwe kugira uruhara muri iyo ntambara, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa yavuze ko igihugu ciwe canse kugira uruhande cegamiye kubera "iki cemezo kitashize imbere ivyokworohereza impande zompi", congera cagiriza Inama Nkuru ya ONU ijejwe umutekano kunanirwa mu mabanga yayo yo kubungabunga amahoro n'umutekano. Uganda yoyo yavuze ko yirinze kugira uruhande yegamira kugira yubahirize kuba hagati na hagati kuko ariyo igiye kurongora ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu bidafise aho vyegamiye, rizwi nka Mouvement des non-alignés/Non-Aligned Movement, NAM, rihurikiyemwo ibihugu 120 bikiri mu nzira y'amajambere.

column2: Rwanda - Coronavirus: Katolika yafashe ingingo zijanye no gukinga ico kiza
column3: Ekleziya Katolika mu Rwanda ihamagarira abakirisu gukurikiza amategeko atangwa n'inzego zijejwe amagara y'abantu mu ntumbero yo kwirinda wa mugera ruhonyabantu coronavirus, yiswe Covid-19. Ivyo biri mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na Antoine Kambanda, Umwepiskopi mukuru wa Diyoseze nkuru ya Kigali akaba n'icegera c'Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, aho amenyesha ingingo zafashwe mu makoraniro zizofasha abakirisu babo kudakoranako ngo bahave bandukizanya. Ibihugu bishika umunani ku mugabane wa Afrika bimaze gutangaza ko uwo mugera wamaze kubishikamwo, leta z'u Burundi n'u Rwanda zikaba ziherutse gutangaza ingingo zafashe mu ntumbero yo kwirinda no gukinga uwo mugera. Mw'iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda isaba abakirisu "guhana amahoro ya Kristu ku mutima gusa ata guhana ibiganza canke guhoberana". Isaba kandi ko "mu gihe co gusangira (guhazwa mu Kinyarwanda) ari ugutega ibiganza, atagutega ururimi". Iyo nama yafashe kandi ingingo yo gukura "amazi y'umugisha" (amazi ahezagiye mu kirundi) mu twombo yashirwamwo mw'isengero, maze abakirisu bakaja barayakoramwo mu kugira urumenyetso rw'umusaraba. Basaba abakirisu kudasubira gukora aho yahora ashirwa kuko atakirimwo "kugeza igihe ikibazo kizoba gikemutse". Muri iryo tangazo, Inama y'Abepisikopi Gatolika mu Rwanda, yemereye abakirisitu ko izobandanya ikurikirana uko bimeze, ikazofata n'izindi ngingo zo kwikingira ni vyaba ngombwa. Gushika ubu, ibihugu birenga 80 biramaze guterwa n'uwo mugera watanguriye mu gisagara ca Wuhan c'intara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa. Ku mugabane wa Afrika, ibihugu vya Togo, Nigeria, Senegal, Misiri, Algeria, Tuniziya, Afrika y'Epfo na Cameroon nivyo bimaze guterwa n'uwo mugera. Mu ntumbero yo kurwanya uwo mugera, ibihugu vy'u Rwanda n'u Burundi biherutse gutangaza ingingo vyafashe mu ntumbero yo gukinga ko ishika muri vyo. U Burundi  bwatangaje ko ingenzi zivuye mu bihugu vy'u Bushinwa, Koreya y'epfo, Iran, Ubutaliyani, Ubudage, Ubufaransa, Ubuyapani na Espanye zizobanza gushirwa mu kibanza categuwe ukwazo nyene mu kiringo c'iminsi 14. Nayo mu Rwanda, leta isaba abanyagihugu "kugabanya ingendo zitari ngombwa" mu bihugu birangwamwo coronavirus, yongera kandi itangaza n'ingingo zitandukanye harimwo n'izo isuku, kugira ngo birinde kwandura.

column2: US yafatiye ibihano abategetsi ba Uganda bagirizwa amabi mu matora
column3: Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zafatiye ibihano vyo kwimwa impusha (visas) zo kwinjira muri iki gihugu abategetsi ba Uganda bagirizwa kugira uruhara mw'ihungabanywa ry'intwaro rusangi. Ibi vyatangajwe n'umunyamabanga wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Antony Blinken inyuma y'ifatwa ry'abanywanyi b'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi muri Uganda. Yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Hariho ingaruka zo kwivanga muri demokarasi". Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bavuga ko abantu barenga 400 baburiwe irengero inyuma yo gufatwa n'inzego zijejwe umutekano imbere y'amatora yo mu kwa mbere. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abahinga ba ONU bakurikirana ibijanye n'uburenganzira bwa muntu zahamagariye abategetsi ba Uganda kuhagarika ingendo yo kuburabuza abo bahanganye muri politike. Ku wa kane, reta ya Uganda yaremeye ko yahagaritse abantu barenga 1.000 bapfunzwe ku mvo z'amatora. Ariko nnta nsobanuro zikwiye yatanze ku mpamvu bapfunzwe n'aho bapfungiwe. Kuri bamwe, iri fatwa rikozwe ku butegetsi bwa Yoweri Museveni ryibutsa iryakorwa ku butegetsi bwa Idi Amin mu myaka yo mu 1970.

column2: Mu mafoto: Umusi mukuru wa Christmas hirya no hino kw'isi
column3: Abantu hirya no hino kw'isi bariko barahimbaza kimwe mu biringo vyeranda ku kirangamisi c'abakristu. Ariko inkuka z'imisa n'imisi mikuru vy'uyu mwaka vyitabwe n'abantu bake cane kubera ikiza ca coronavirus. Ukutegerana no kwambara agapfukamunwa ni vyo bintu bishasha bitegerezwa kwubahirizwa.
