column2: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
column3: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.

column2: Lithuania isaba abanyagihugu guta amaterefone yo muri China
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'ukwivuna abansi bwa Lithuania buragabisha abanyagihugu ko bakwiye guta amaterefone akorerwa mu Bushinwa kandi bakirinda gusubira kugura ayandi mashasha. Ikigo c'iki gihugu kijejwe umutekano nyabwonko (Cyber Security Centre) kivuga ko cakoze amatohoza ku materefone ngendanwa akoresha 5G yahinguwe n'amakompanyi yo mu Bushinwa. Kivuga ko imwe mu materefone y'ikompanyi Xiaomi ifise muri yo ubuhinga bwo gukurikirana ibiyikorerwamwo, mu gihe iyindi na yo y'ikompanyi Huawei ifise utunenge ku mutekano wa nyene kuyikoresha. Huawei ivuga ko ata makuru y'ibanga ya nyene gukoresha terefone aja hanze, hanyuma Xiaomi ikavuga ko ata vyo gukurikirana amabanga ya nyeneyo ikora. Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi, Margiris Abukevicius, avuga ati: "Duhanura abantu kudasubira kugura amaterefone mashasha y'abashinwa, hanyuma bongere bate vuba bwango ayo bamaze kugura". Icegeranyo c'iki kigo kivuga ko casanze terefone Mi 10T 5G y'ikompanyi Xiaomi irimwo logiciel/software ishobora gutora kandi ikagenzura amajambo kanaka harimwo nk'ayavuga ngo “Rekura Tibet”, "Ni harambe ubwigenge bwa Taiwan" canke "urugambwa rwa demokarasi". Iki cegeranyo cerekana amajambo ashika 449 ashobora kunekwa n'ama apps ari muri terefone za Xiaomi, harimwo no kugenzura imbuga ngurukanabumenyi ziyicako. I Bulaya, ubu buhinga bwarugawe ariko iki cegeranyo kivuga ko bushobora kuvyurwa umwanya uwo ari wo wose hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa none. Umupfasoni avugira Xiaomi yabwiye BBC ati: "Amaterefone ya Xiaomi ntakurikirana ibiyago vya ba nyene kuzikoresha. Xiaomi ntiyigeze ibuza kandi ntizokwigera ibuza canke ibangamira ibikorwa vy'abakoresha amaterefone yacu". Avuga kandi ko iyi kompanyi igendera ku mategeko yose agenga gukingira umutekano w'abakoresha amaterefone yayo. Ubu bushakashatsi kandi bwasanze terefone ya Xiaomi yegeranya amakuru yose aca kuri terefone yayo ikayarungika kuri 'serveur' yayo iri muri Singapour. Iki kigo kiti: "Iki ni ikintu gikomeye, si kuri Lithuania ahubwo ku bihugu vyose bikoresha ubuhinga bwa Xiaomi". Iyi kompanyi ihingura amaterefone ngendanwa iramamaye cane mu bantu kubera amaterefone yayo azimbutse, aho ubutunzi bwayo bwadutse gushika ku bice 64% mu gice ca kabiri c'uno mwaka ugereranije n'umwaka uheze. Iki cegeranyo kandi gishira ahabona inenge iri kuri terefone ya P40 5G ya Huawei, ituma amabanga y'abayikoresha yibwa. Itangazo ryasohowe n'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi buri kumwe n'ikigo kijejwe umutekano nyabwonko rivuga riti: “Ububiko nyabwonko bwa Huawei, AppGallery, bujana abakoresha amaterefone yayo mu bundi bubiko nyabwonko busanzwe bufise ama apps amwe amwe yihwejwe na programmes zirwanya imigera zigasanga ari apps maneko canke zamaje kwinjirwa n'imigera". Umuvugizi wa Huawei yabwiye BBC ko isanzwe ikurikiza amategeko n'amabwirizwa y'ibihugu ikoreramwo, kandi ko ishira imbere umutekano n'ukubungabunga amabanga ya ba nyene amaterefone. Avuga ati: “Nta mabanga yigera atangwa hanze ku materefone ya Huawei". "Ikintu conyene ni uko AppGallery yegeranya ikanatunganya amakuru akenewe kugira ngo abakiriya bayo bashobore kurondera, gushira mu materefone yabo no gukoresha apps zivuye ahandi, co kimwe no mu bundi bubiko nyabwonko". Avuga kandi ko Huawei ibanza kwihweza neza kugira ngo abakiriya bayo bashobore gukoresha "apps zidatera ingorane". Iki kigo kandi carihweje iyindi terefone ya 5G y'ikompanyi OnePlus ariko kikaba casanze ata ngorane iteye. Iki cegeranyo gisohotse mu gihe icuka kibi hagati ya Lithuania n'Ubushinwa kigenda ciyongera. Mu kwezi guheze, Ubushinwa bwasavye Lithuania gutahukana uwuyiserukira i Pekin/Beijing bunavuga ko na bwo nyene bwari bugiye gutahukana uwubuserukira i Vilnius (umugwa mukuru wa Lithuania). Iki cuka kibi catanguye igihe Taiwan itangarije ko ubuserukizi bwayo muri Lithuania bugiye kwitwa Ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Taiwan (Taiwanese Representative Office). Ibindi biro vy'ubuserukizi bwa Taiwan i Bulaya hamwe na Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bikoresha izina ry'umugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu, Taipei, kugira ngo vyirinde izina ry'iri zinga ubwaryo Ubushinwa buvuga ko ari intara yabwo.

column2: Coronavirus: Papa asaba ko urucanco n'imiti bishikira bose kw'isi
column3: Papa Francis yateye akamo abategetsi bo kw'isi ngo bafashe kugira abantu bose bashobore kuronka urucanco rwa coronavirus ata nzitizi. Mw'ijambo rya Noheli yashikirije ku rubuga rwa internet ubwa mbere, Papa yagabishije kudashiraho "uruhome" kubakeneye imiti. Ico kiza catumye ubutumwa bwa Urbi na Orbi budatangirwa ku rubaraza rwa Bazelike St Pierre ku bantu benshi, nk'uko vyari bimenyerewe. Ahubwo Papa yatanze ubwo butumwa ari mu cumba i Vatikano. Uko kugabisha kwa papa kuje inyuma y'amakenga y'ingene ibihugu bitunze  bigura incanco zitagira uko zingana gusumba ibihugu bikenye. Yavuze ati:"Ese umwana w'Imana yogarukana mu bategetsi ba politike n'amareta agatima ko gufashanya n'amakungu, bahereye ku magara y'abantu, kugira ngo bose boshobore gushikirwa n'urucanco hamwe n'imiti. "Imbere y'iki kibazo kitagira imbibe, ntidushobora kwiyubakirako uruhome. Twese hamwe turi mu bwato bumwe." Papa yavuze ko ingaruka y'iki kibazo c'amagara y'abantu zerekanye ko ubumwe bw'amakungu bukomeye cane. "Muri iki gihe c'akahise, tugeramiwe n'ibibazo vy'ibidukikije hamwe n'ubusumbasumbane mu butunzi no mu mibano vyagiye kunyurwa n'ikiza coronavirus, birakenewe cane ko twemerana nka benewacu na bashiki bacu." Papa yateye akamo ngo habe umutima wo gufasha no gushigikira abakozweko n'ico kiza, adoma urutoke cane cane ku bapfasoni bahohotewe muri iki gihe abantu bugaranywe. Avuga ku zindi ngorane ziri kw'isi, yahamagariye abantu gukomeza ubumwe no gusubiza hamwe muri Syria, Yemen, Libya, Nagorno-Karabakh, Sudan y'epfo , Nigeria, Cameroun na Irak. Vyitezwe ko azogira urugendo muri Irak mu kwezi kwa gatatu, urugendo rushobora kuba rubaye urwa mbere rwa Papa mu gihugu cazahajwe n'intambara.

column2: Celine Dion yatangaje ko afise ingwara idakira
column3: Uyu muririnvyikazi avanze akabira k’Ubufaransa na Canada, yabwiye abakunzi biwe bagera ku miliyoni 5.2 bamukwirikira ku rubuga rwa Instagram ivy’iyo ngwara yiwe imutuma adashobora kugenzura ikoreshwa ry’imitsi yiwe, aho ishobora kwidadarika canke ikanyiganyiga. Iyi ngwara kandi ituma adashobora gutambuka neza canke kuririrmba, ivyo bikaba vyateye ikibazo c’uko atakigiye mu biteramo yari yarateganije ku mugabane wa Bulaya mu mwaka uza. Celine Dion avuga ko amaze ‘igihe kire kire anigana n’ingwara’. Uyu mugore w’imyaka 54 agira ati: "Kandi bisigaye bigoye kuri jewe guhangana n’ ibibazo mfise canke kuvuga ivyo naciyemwo vyose." Yongeye ko ‘yasuzumwe ingwara ituma imitsi yiwe nsozabwenge idakora nk’uko bisanzwe, ari nayo bita ‘stiff person syndrome’, ifata abantu ku rugero rutari hejuru y’umwe kuri miliyoni  (0.0001%) Avuga ko iyo ngwara yiwe imutera ibibazo igihe ariko aratambuka kandi itamukundira gukoresha imirya y’umuhogo kugirango aririmbe nk’uko yamye. Ati: "Birambabaza kubabwira ko ibi bisobanura ko ntakije mu biteramo nari narateganije kuva mu kwezi kwa kabiri”. Mu 2014, Celine Dion, ari nawe yatahanye agashimwe ka Oscar ku ndirimbo ‘My Heart Will Go On’ yabaye inziza gusumba izindi, yavuze ko agiye kuba arahagaritse umwuga wiwe wo kuririmba mu gihe atamenyesheje iherezo, kugirango yiteho umugabo wiwe Rene Angelil yari afise ingwara ya Cancer N’ubwo yasubiye muri ivyo biteramwo inyuma y’umwaka, yasubiye guhagarika uwo mwuga wiwe wo kuririmba mu 2016, inyuma y’urupfu rwa Angelil hamwe na musazawe Daniel Dion. Yasubiye kuboneka muri studio mu 2019, igihe yakorana na Sia, Sam Smith na David Guetta album bise ‘Courage’. Uyu mu ‘star’ yayishigikije ibiteramo hirya no hino kw’isi igihe yasohoka, vyinshi muri vyo bikaba vyarasivye kubera ikiza ca Covid-19. Vyabaye ngombwa n’uyu mwaka nyene, kwimurira ku yandi masango ivyo biteramo, inyuma yo guhura n’iyo ngwara itera imitsi yiwe kwinyiganyiza, yanatumye adasubira ku gihe muri Las Vegas aho asanzwe aba. Kuri uyu wa kane, Dion yaremesheje abafana biwe ababwira ko afise ‘umugwi mwiza w’abaganga bariko barakorana' kugirango bamufashe gutora mitende, mu gihe  n’abana biwe bariko baramufasha bamutera intege’. Uyu muririnvyikazi avuga ko atari bwumve ko hageze kuvuga ivy’iyi ngwara yiwe kugeza ubu. Yagize ati: “ndiko ndakorana n’umugwi w’abanonotsi uriko uranfasha kugirango ndabe ko noshobora gusubira kuronka utuguvu two kuriririmba, ariko ndababwiye ko bitari vyoroshe”. Avuga ko ikintu conyene azi mu buzima ari ukuririrmba, ko ata wundi murimo yigeze akora kandi ko arivyo akunda gusumba ikintu ico arico cose. Ati: “Ndabakumbuye cane, ndakumbuye kubabona mwese no kubateramisha.” Yongeye ko yama yitanga 100% igihe aba aremesha igiteramo ariko ngo iki gihe ivyo ntashobora kubikora muri kino gihe kubera ingwara yiwe. Ntiyabaye agishobora kumira amosozi igihe yasezera abafana, abashimira ku buryo bamufata mu mugongo, ababwira ko igisigaye ubu ari ukwitaho ubuzima bwiwe, kandi yizeye ko ‘azotera yoroherwa’. SPS ni ingwara idakunze kuboneka, kandi benshi badatahura. Nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo the National Institute for Neurological Disorders, irangwa n’imitsi yidadarika canke ikijugumiza mu buryo umugwayi adashobora kugenzura, haba mu gice c’umutumba canke mu ngingo z’amaguru n’amaboko. Mu bindi bimenyetso umugwayi agira harimwo kutihanganira urwamo, gukorwako, canke ikindi gishobora kuvyura amarangamutima y’umugwayi, ibi vyose bigashobora gutuma imitsi yiwe itangura kunyiganyiga bitavuye ku bushake bwiwe. Iyi ngwara irangwa n’uko umugwayi ahagarara canke yicara adatumbereye mu buryo busanzwe, nk’akarorero atunye igongo, canke imitsi yiwe ikaguma akamera nk’uwatetagaye. Abantu bafise iyo ngwara ya SPS, bashobora kunanirwa gutambuka canke kwiyunguruza ukundi, canke bagatinya kuva mu nzu ngo baje mw’ibarabara ahari urwamo, nk’amahoni y’imidokari, bishobora gutuma umuntu aca afatwa no kunyeganyega agatemba. Abenshi mu bafise SPS bakunda kugwa hasi, kandi kubera badafse ubushobozi bwo kwiramira, barashobora gukomereka cane. N’ubwo SPS ata muti ifise, hariho ibifasha umurwayi - harimwo imiti ipfupfahaza ikibazo co kugabanya umwitwarariko, abantu bakagira imitsi yorohewe – bigatuma iyo ngwara idatera ikara.

column2: Umusunikano muri Israel: Ababibonye baravuga ingene abantu 'batererwa mu kirere'
column3: Abantu bari ahabereye umusunikano waguyemwo abantu benshi mu rugendo rw'idini baravuga ingene ''batwawe n'umukuba w'abantu, abandi nabo batererwa mu kirere". Nibura abantu 44 bapfuye abandi benshi barakomereka mu rugendo rwo guhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Lag B'Omer ku mucamo w'umusozi Meron. Igiporisi cabwiye ikinyamakuru Haaretz ko uwo musunikano wabaye kubera  bamwe mu bari muri urwo rugendo  banyereye ku ngazi, bituma abandi batemba. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari bitavye urwo rugendo rweranda. Umugabo yatanze izina ryiwe nka David yavuze ko yari yinjiye kuraba ingene batsa igicaniro/icoto bunonyene haza ''umupfunda uvuye hanze". Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ynet ati: ''Batumijuye. Abantu banuzwe mu kirere - abandi  barahonyorwa'' ''Hari umwana yagumye yumiye ku kuguru kwanje, agwanira ubuzima. Twarindiriye gutabarwa iminota 15-20 muri uwo musunikano uteye ubwoba". Umwe mu barokotse yajanywe mu bitaro yabwiye television ya reta  Kan ati "Nta n'umwe yari azi ico ari bukore". "Intango n'ukubera abantu benshi cane. Hejuru yanje hari abantu benshi. Nanje nari ndamye hejuru y'uwundi atari agishobora guhema. Hari amaborogo, urudubi. Nabonye abana bari munsi yanje. Icanciye mu mutwe gusa kwari uko umwana wanje atoba impfuvyi". Uwundi yari ahari yavuze ko abantu bazungazunga iburyo n'ibubamfu. ''Inyuma y'iminota 20 nibaza ko abantu bari batanguye kutabasha guhumeka neza gutyo barondera gusohoka, ariko nta n'umwe yashoboye gusohoka. Munsi yanje hari abanrtu batari bagihema. Hari amaborogo menshi y'abavuga ngo "birasanse ko mpema". Uwundi yari ahari, Shlomo Katz,  yavuze ko yari arindiriye abagenzi biwe aca abona abaforoma biruka kandi bongera bagerageza  guhembura abana. Ati: "Ambulance zaguma zinjira zongera zisohoka". Dov Maisel, akora mu rwego rw'abatabara vyihuta rwa United Hatzalah Emergency Services yavuze ko abantu bari ''barundanyeko nk'ipaki y'ikarata''. Avuga ko abakora mu nzego zo gutabara nabo vyabaye ngombwa ko bahabwa inama zo kudahahamuka. Dov Maisel yagize ati: "Abantu benshi bakomeretse., abandi bapfuye ngaha. Abakorerabushake mubona ngaho bakoranijwe bakorerwa inama yo kubafasha kudahahamuka, - kuko babonye ibintu bigoye" Umwe mu bari bahari  yafashije abakomeretse yabwiye Haaretz ati: "Nari nicicaye ngira mfungure nca numva amaborogo. Twaciye twiruka gufasha hanyuma tubona imivyimba. Ubwa mbere bari nka 10, none ubu ni benshi".

column2: Tokyo 2020: CNO- Burundi ivuga ko Francine Niyonsaba adafashwa kuko hari ivyo atakwije
column3: Umunonotsi w'umurundi Francine Niyonsaba aridoga ko komite olempique y'Uburundi (CNO) idafasha abanonotsi kwitegura mu gihe hasigaye indwi zibiri ngo inkino olempique ya Tokyo zitangure. Mu butumwa yashize kuri Facebook, Niyonsaba avuga ati: "Mugabo ntibizontangaza kubona abaherekeza abanonotsi baba benshi kurusha abitanze kugira baserukire igihugu, none bazoba batugiye inyuma gukora iki?" Salvator Bigirimana umunyamabanga mukuru wa CNO wewe avuga ko Niyonsaba adafashwa kubera hari ivyo atujuje imfashanyo yahabwa igahagarikwa, ko abandi bari kwitegura bobo babafasha. Niyonsaba, umurundi wa kabiri mu mateka wahaye igihugu ciwe ikidari olempike mu gusiganwa ku maguru mu bagore, ntiyavuze birambuye ingene we ubwiwe canke abandi banonotsi badafashwa. Bigirimana avuga ko imbere y'amahiganwa olempike hariho imfashanyo abanonotsi baronka ku kwezi ku kwezi mu mezi 18 CNO ikayibaronsa ivuye muri Comité International Olympique, (CIO). Ariko ko iyo mfashanyo idahabwa abagiye mu mahiganwa olempike yabanje canke abamaze kubona minima zo kujayo. Ati: "Ni abandi baba bagikeneye kuja mu mahiganwa kugira ngo barabe ko nabo boshika kuri urwo rwego." Abanonotsi baronswa iyo mfashanyo Bigirimana avuga ko bategerezwa kugenda bakora ivyo basabwa bagatanga na raporo zavyo. Ati: "Mugabo ku rwego rwa Africa naho hari abaronka imfashanyo, kandi na Francine yarimwo, hanyuma kubera atakoze ibisabwa ngo aze aratanga raporo, ngo agende mu mahiganwa basaba, iyo mfashanyo yiwe barayihagaritse, no muri federation yiwe barabizi." Haraheze hafi amezi abiri Francine Niyonsaba abonye minima zo kuja mu nkino olempike. Bigirimana ati "azoheza aronke mubandi ivyo baba bateguye." Bigiramana avuga ko igitigiri c'abaherekeza abanonotsi mu nkino olempike atari igihugu kigishirako. Ati: "Hariho 'logiciel' ushiramwo abanonotsi bari qualifié igaca iguha igitigiri c'ababaherekeza, abo rero kandi si abo muri CNO ni abo muri federation y'iwabo. "Hari umunonotsi yoshika ku rwego urwo arirwo rwose atagira umumenyereza? Atagira president wa federation? Umuntu siwe yigira, umunonotsi agirwa n'urwego arimwo akagirwa n'umumenyereza, n'ubushobozi bwiwe." Francine Niyonsaba agaragaza ko ariko yitegurira izi nkino:

column2: DRC: Van Damme atera akamo ba rurangiranwa gutemberera ico gihugu
column3: Umukinyi rurangiranwa wa filime w'Umubiligi Jean Claude va Damme, batazira 'Mitsi ya Bruxelles' avuga ko anejerejwe no kuba yahawe igitabo c'inzira ca Congo - avuga kandi ko afise intumbero yo guhamagarira abandi bantu bamenyekana cane gutemberera Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo. Ari i Kinshasa ku mugwa mukuru w'ico gihugu, igihe yariko arashikirizwa ico gitabo c'inzira n'akazi ko guserukira ico gihugu mu karanga, urwaruka n'ibidukikije, uwo mugabo w'imyaka 61 yagize ati: "Ngiye kugondoza abandi bantu rurangiranwa kw'isi nka Stallone, Schwarzenegger, Jacky Chan hamwe n'abandi benshi." "Hari kandi n'abaririmvyi nka Jennifer Lopez  hamwe n'abakinyi b'umupira nka Messi, Ronaldinho, Cristiano Ronaldo. Bategerezwa kuza muri iki gihugu kwerekana ko kigendwa, kwerekana ko Congo ishobora gukingira umutekano abantu bari muvyo kuremesha ibiro vyinjiza amahera (Showbiz). Igihugu ca RD Congo kimaze imyaka irenga 30 kiri mu ntambara, aho imigwi myinsi yitwaje ibigwanisho ibica bigacika mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu hagwiriye ubutare, aho yica, ifata ku nguvu ikanasahura. Uwo yigeze kuba rurangiranwa mu buhinga bwo kwivuna umwansi ata kigwanisho (arts martiaux), Van Damme yarakinye mu mafilime y'ingwano i Hollywood y'amafaranga menshi nka Cyborg, Kickboxer na Universal Soldier - ubu vuba na ho akaba aherutse gusubiramwo Master Croc mu mafilime ya Kung Fu Panda. Azwi nk'umuntu akaze cane. Yatangaje abantu mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru aho yavuga ko yavukiye muri RD Congo, avuga ko "avuka i Likasi", igisagara kiri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu. Aho hashobora hari mu mwaka ico gihugu ciganzura intwaro y'Ububiligi. Yanashimitse cane ku kamaro ko kuzana abashora imitahe mu gihugu ca RD Congo. "RD Congo ifise ubutare buciye imiriyaridi ibihumbi 36...akazi kanje n'ukurondera abazana imitahe, bazi neza ko ari ukubanza gutanga imbere yo kuronka, hanyuma no guha icizere prezida Felix Antoine Tshisekedi." Ariko benshi bibajije ikibazo kuri ico gitabo c'inzira gishasha c'uwo mukinyi wa Filime mu gihe ibwirizwa shingiro rya RD Congo  ribuza kugira ubwenegihugu bubiri.

column2: DR Congo: abantu 33 bishwe mu gitero c’inyeshama mu karere ka Beni
column3: Abantu mirongo itatu na batatu abagore n'abana nibo bimaze kumenyekana ko bishwe mu gitero c'inyeshama ku kigo kivura indwara ya Ebola mu karere ka Beni, nk'uko bivugwa n'ababibonye hamwe n'abategetsi. Abategetsi bamenyesheje ko hariho abandi bantu 11 babonetse bishwe bituma igitigiri kigera ku bantu 33 bishwe mu masaha 24 kuva mu gitero co kuwa gatanu. Ico gitero gishasha cabaye ku munsi wa gatanu mw'ijoro mu gihe igisirikare ca Congo congereje ibitero ku mirwi y'inyeshamba iri mu buseruko bwa DR Congo, harimwo n'umuhari Allied Democratic Forces. Abajejwe amagara y'abantu muri DR Congo bavuga ko ibitero vy'imirwi yitwaje ibirwanisho muri ako karere k'intara ya Kivu y'Uburaruko vyatumye ico kiza gikwiragira cane, mu mezi 16 aheze cadutse. Nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru Associated Press, abarwanyi ba ADF nibo bagirizwa ico gitero muri ako karere gasanzwe gasinzikajwe n'ikiza ca Ebola. Omar Kavota arongoye ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka muntu muri ako karere rizwi nka CEPADHO, avuga ko catanguye hafi isaha zibiri n'igice zo mw'ijoro ryo ku wa gatanu. Ni inyuma y'aho kuri uwo munsi Perezida Felix Tshisekedi atangarije ko bagiye gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo bahagarike ibitero vy'uyo muhari be n'iyindi mihari imaze imyaka itari mike irwanira mu buseruko bwa Congo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije abanyagihugu yavuze ati: "Turafise ishaka rikomeye kandi ntituzodohoka tutayihanaguye yose". Ivyo bitero vy'inyeshamba vyiyongereye mu ntara ya Beni vyatumye abanyagihugu biha amabarabara kubera ishavu ry'uko badakingirwa. Mu kwezi guheze, abanyagihugu baturiye ibiro vya komine ya Beni be n'ibiro vy'ingabo za MONUSCO biri ahitwa Boikene. Ivyo bitero vyaratumye kandi utwigoro tw'ukurwanya ikiza ca Ebola imaze guhitana abantu barenga 2200 ataco dushikako. Abajejwe gutanga urucanco rw'ico kiza barananiwe n'ugushika mu turere turangwamwo uruhagarara kubw'umutekano wabo.

column2: Mali: Ama coups d'Etat yoba ariko yiyongera muri Africa?
column3: Kuva Afrika yikukira,  igihe cose hagiye hibonekeza ingendo y'ugutembagaza ubutegetsi (coups d'Etat) vyamye bikorwa n'igisirikare mu bihugu bitandukanye. Ibiherutse kuba muri Mali ni akarorero ka hafi kerekana ingene igisirikare kigenda kigira uruhara mu biba - aho giherutse gutembagaza ubutegetsi ku ncuro ya kabiri mu kiringo kidashika n'umwaka. Mu gihugu kibanyi ca Niger, harabaye itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi ryaburujwemwo mu kwa gatatu hasigaye imisi mike ngo uwatsinze amatora y'umukuru w'igihugu yimikwe. None twohava tuvuga ko ingendo nk'iyi ya gisirikare ari yo yiganje kuri uyu mugabane? Zimwe mu nsiguro zitangwa kw'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi ni uko ari igikorwa kitemewe n'amategeko gikozwe n'igisirikare (canke abandi bategetsi ba gisivire) mu kugerageza gukuraho abategetsi basanzwe bahari. Icigwa cakozwe n'abashakashatsi babiri bo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Jonathan Powell na Clayton Thyne, cerekana ko kuva mumpera z'imyaka ya 1950 muri Afrika hamaze kuba ama coups d'Etat arenga 200. Hafi igice mu aya ma coups d'Etats zarakunze (réussis/successful) - izi nazo zikaba ari izashoboye kurenza imisi indwi. Burkina Faso muri Afrika y'Uburengero, nico gihugu kimaze kubamwo ama coups d'Etat menshi yakunze, aho indwi yose yakunze, imwe nayo ikaba ari yo yapfuvye/yaburijwemwo. Rimwe na rimwe, ababa bakoze ico gikorwa bakunze guca bihutira kuvuga ko atari itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi. Mu 2017 muri Zimbabwe, coup d'Etat ya gisirikare yomoye ku butegetsi Robert Mugabe ihagarika intwaro yiwe yari imaze imyaka 37. Umwe mu bari bayirongoye, Jenerali Majoro Sibusiso Moyo, yashikirije ijambo ku mboneshakure ahakana yivuye inyuma ko atari coup d'Etat ya gisirikare. Mu kwa kane uno mwaka, inyuma y'urupfu rwa Perezida Idriss Deby wa Tchad, igisirikare caciye gishiraho umuhungu wiwe nk'umukuru w'igihugu mfatakibanza arongoya intwaro mfatakibanza ya gisirikare. Abamurwanya bavuga ko ari "itembagazwa ryakozwe hagati y'abanyamuryango" (dynastic coup/coup d'État dynastique). Jonathan Powell avuga ko "Abarongoye iki gikorwa hafi ya bose bahakana ko igikorwa bakoze ari itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi mu ntumbero yo kwerekana ko biri mu mategeko". Mu myaka 40 hagati ya 1960 na 2000, ibitigiri vy'ama coups d'Etats ntivyahindutse aho hagiye haba ayababa ane buri mwaka. Kuva ico gihe, ibi vyaragabanutse aho mu myaka hafi 20 hagiye haboneka nka nk'abiri buri mwaka gushika 2019. Jonathan Powell avuga ko ibi bidatangaje uravye ingene ibihugu vya Afrika vyagiye bihura n'umutekano muke mu myaka yakurikiye ukwikukira. "Ibihugu vya Afrika vyagiye bica mu bihe vyorohereza ama coups d'Etat, nk'ubukene n'ubutunzi bwasubiye inyuma. Iyo mu gihugu habaye coup d'Etat, ni ikimenyetso ko n'izindi ziri inyuma" Ndubuisi Christian Ani wo kw'ishure kaminuza ya KwaZulu-Natal avuga ko imigumuko yo kwiyamiriza abategetsi baba bamaze igihe kirekire ku butegetsi batwaza umukazo yakunze kuba akaryo keza ko gutembagaza ubutegetsi muri Afrika. Ati: "N'aho imyiyerekano y'abanyagihugu yemewe n'amategeko kandi ari bo nyene baba bayirongoye, akenshi usanga kugira ngo ishike ku kintu bivana n'ingingo ifashwe n'igisirikare". Sudan nico ca mbere cabayemwo ama coups d'Etat menshi aho habayemwo 15 - atanu muri yo arakunda. Iyiheruka yabaye mu 2019 yakuye ku butegetsi Omar al-Bashirinyuma y'amezi atari make ico gihugu kirangwamwo imyiyerekano. Bashir we nyene ubwiwe yari yashitse ku butegetsi atembagaje ubwahahora mu 1989. Kuva 2015, mu ma coups d'Etat icenda yaharuwe kw'isi,  yose,  kiretse abiri gusa - Turquie (2016) na Myanmar (2021)-yabaye muri Afrika. Muri rusangi Afrika niyo yabayemwo ama coups d'Etat menshi gusumba iyindi migabane kw'isi. Ikurikirwa ka amerika y'ubumanuko habaye 95, muri yo 40 akaba yarashobotse.

column2: Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri UK arasaba imbabazi ku ruhara rw'Ishengero mu bucakara
column3: Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasavye imbabazi inyuma y’aho amatohoza yerekaniye ko ikigega c’imitahe y’Ishengero rya anglicane mu Bwongereza gifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Aya matohoza yakozwe asabwe n’ishami ry’iri shengero, Church Commissioners, rijejwe amatungo yaryo, yerekana ko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 100 iki kigega cashize amafaranga menshi cane mw’ikompanyi yari ijejwe gutwara abantu mu bucakara. Ico kigega cari kizwi mu kinjana ca 18 kw’izina rya Queen Anne’s Bounty, cahavuye gihinduka ikigo c’imitahe ishika ku miriyaridi 10,1 z’amapawundi. Musenyeri mukuru Justin Welby avuga ko yababaye cane kwumva ishengero arongoye rifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Ikigega Queen Anne's Bounty cashinzwe mu 1704 mu ntumbero yo gufasha abakozi b’Imana bari bakenye. Itohoza ku makonte yaco mu 1739 ryerekana ko umutahe  w’amapawundi 204.000 (ubu yababa imiriyoni 443 y’amapawundi nyene) washowe mw’ikompanyi South Sea Company yagurisha abacakara b'abanye-Afrika. South Sea Company yari ifise amasezerano yihariye yo kuvana abacakara muri Afrika ibatwara mu bihugu vyatwarwa na Espagne muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 kuva mu myaka ya 1710. Yatwaye ibihumbi mirongo vy’abacakara, amatohoza akerekana ko hafi 15% yabo bapfiriye mu nzira. Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza ryabandanije rishora imitahe muri South Sea Company gushika mu kinjana ca 19. Uyu musenyeri mukuru avuga ati: “Uru rudandaza rw’agahomerabunwa rwafashe abagabo, abagore n’abana baremwe mw’ishusho y’Imana rubaka agateka kabo n’ubwigenge bwabo. “Birateye isoni kubona hari bamwe mw’Ishengero bashigikiye bikomeye bakegeranya amatungo muri uru rudandaza. “Inzira yonyene yo gukira koko kunywanisha – ari yo Yezu Kristu/Yesu Kristo aduhamagarira gufata – ni uko duhangana n’uku kuri kubabaje hanyuma tugafata ingingo”. Ku ruhande rumwe, Ishengero ry’Ubwongereza ririshimira uruhara ryagize mu guhagarika ubucakara, rigafatira ku ruhara umuvugabutumwa wa Anglicane, William Wilberforce, yagize. Ku rundi ruhande, ni ngombwa ko ryemera ko ryagiye ryungukira mu bucakara. Mu myaka iheze, Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza riherutse gusaba imbabazi ku bakozi baryo batari bake babonetse ko bari bafise abacakara. Ryasavye imbabazi kubera ishami ryaryo rijejwe ubutumwa, The Society for the Propagation of the Gospel (twogereranya mu kirundi tuti “Umuryango wo gukwiragiza Inkuru nziza”), ryari rifise itongo ahitwa Barbados, maze rishira ikimenyetso ku bacakara ryakoresha mu gikiriza cavuga ngo SOCIETY (twogereranya n’ijambo UMURYANGO). Ubu rero, ku matohoza yaryo ryo nyene, ryemeye ko mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo ikigega caryo cashoye imitahe y’amafaranga hafi yaryo yose – hampande y’ayo ryakoresheje mu kugura amatongo – mw’ikompanyi yari ifise uruhara yiharije rwo gutwara abacakara muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko. Mu gihe abarenga inusu y’abanywanyi b’Ishengero rya Anglicane kw’isi yose bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, iyi nkuru ishobora kutorosha ibintu. Ishengero rya Anglican mu Bwongereza ryatanguje aya matohoza mu ntumbero yo gushira ahabona kahise karyo rikavuga ko hagiye gutumwako umurwi wo kwiga inyishu ikwiriye. Ariko umuvugizi ntazi nimba ibi bisigura ko hagiye kuba ayandi matangazo n’amasengesho, canke nimba hashobora kubamwo n’ibiganiro ku bijanye n’indishi y’akababaro mu buryo bw’amafaranga. Aya matohoza yerekana kandi ko iki kigega cahawe intererano z’abantu bungukiye canke bafitaniye isano n’ubu bucakara bwabaye hagati y’imigabane hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’ubutunzi bwari bushingiye ku burimyi muri uru rudandaza rw’abantu. Uyu musenyeri mukuru yongerako ati: “Ndasabiye abo bose bakozweko n’iyi nkuru kandi nibaza ko dushobora gukorera hamwe tukihweza iyindi nzira twofata”.

column2: Kuba uwahoze ari Prezida wa USA bimera gute?
column3: Kuba uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu wa Amerika bimera gute? Igihe ca Donald Trump muri White House kigira gihere. Ariko ntivyari bikwiye kumubabaza kuko kuva muri Oval Office bijana n'imperekeza nyinshi. Hari amafaranga, abarinzi bafise inkoho, kuronswa amakuru y'ibanga eka mbere n'iposita bwite...

column2: 338 barishwe muri Ethiopia mu ndyane z'amoko kuno kwezi
column3: Leta ya Ethiopia ivuga yuko abantu amajana atatu na mirongo itatu n'umunani bishwe mu ntango za kuno kwezi. Ni bwo bwicanyi bwa mbere bubi bushingiye ku moko butaheruka muri ico gihugu mu kiringo c'imyaka myinshi. Vyari vyavuzwe mbere yuko abantu bashika n'imiburiburi amajana abiri na mirongo itanu, bagizwe ahanini n'abo mu bwoko bw'aba-Amhara, biciwe mu gitero mu ntara ya Oromia. Umuvugizi wo mu biro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere yavuze yuko igipolisi kikiriko kirakora amatohoza. Leta yanse ivyasabwe - na ONU irimwo mu babisaba - vy'uko hakorwa itohoza ryigenga kuri ubwo bwicanyi. Umugwi witwaje ibirwanisho uzwi nka Oromia Liberation Army waragirijwe kugaba ico gitero ariko warabihakanye. Mu myaka ibiri iheze, iyindi ntara ya Tigrinya nayo yarabayemwo imirwano ikomeye hagati y'abarwanyi b'umuhari TPLF wo muri ako karere n'abasirikare ba leta. Naho ubu hasa n'ahari agahengwe, umutekano nturahagaruka neza kandi iyo mirwano yasizemwo ubuzima ibihumbi vy'abantu abandi benshi barahunga.

column2: Papa Francis yemeye ko yananiwe kwihangana akubita urushi umukenyezi yariko amukwega
column3: Papa Francis yasavye imbabazi  inyuma y'aho akubitiye urushi ku kuboko umwe mu bakirisu bari mu rugendo rweranda bakoraniye ku kibanza citiriwe umweranda Petero i Roma. Papa yariko aramutsa abana n'abandi bari bakoraniye muri ico kibanza hanyuma agize ngo aragiye, umukenyezi umwe muri bo amukwega ukuboko n'inguvu nyinshi gushika n'aho ahakwa kumugwisha hasi. Ivyo vyatumye Papa ahindukira agerageza kumwikura vyanka, aca amukubita urushi ku kuboko ashavuye abona kumurekura. Niho mu nyuma Papa yemera ko vyanse ko yihangana aremera ko nawe nyene acumura nk'ikiremwamuntu nk'abandi. Ati: "Kenshi biranka ko twihangana. Naje birashobora kunshikira. Nico gituma nsavye imbabazi ku vyashitse nijoro". Ivyo vyatangaje benshi kuko imbere y'aho, mu gihe yashikiriza ijambo ry'ukwipfuriza umwaka mushasha abakirisu, yariyamirije ihohotera rikorerwa abakenyezi.

column2: Aliko Dangote na Mohammed Dewji bari mu batunzi ba mbere muri Afrika mu 2021
column3: Nk'uko biri mu kinyamakuru ca Forbes co mu 29021, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga 18 bo kuri uyu mugabane bwiyongereye imiriyaridi 4.1 z'amadolari, n'ukuvuga ku bice 12 kw'ijana gusumba mu mwaka uheze. Mu myaka cumi yikurikiranya, Aliko Dangote wo mur Nigeria ni we muntu atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, akaba afise ubutunzi buharurwa ku miriyaridi 12.1 z'amadolari. Ubwo butunzi bwiyongereyeko amadolari imiriyaridi 2, ugereranije no mu mwaka uheze bivuye kw'iduga gushika ku bice 30 kw'ijana vy'igiciro c'isima ya Dangote nk'uko vyandikwa na Forbes. Umuntu agira kabiri mu butunzi muri Afrika ni Nassef Sawiris wo mu Misri, ubutunzi bwiwe  bwinshi ni ibice bitandatu kw'ijana y'umutahe afise muri Addidas. Mu kibanza ca gatatu haza Nicky Oppeheimer wo mu gihugu ca Afrika y'epfo, yarazwe umutahe wo muri kompanyi  ya Debeers, akaba yari anahagarariye iyo kompanyi gushika mu mwaka wa 2012 aho yaca agurisha ibice 40 kw'ijana vy'umutahe w'umuryango wiwe kuri kompanyi yimba ubutare ya AngloAmerican ku miriyaridi 5.1 z'amadolari. Uwundi yatunze cane muri uyu mwaka ni umudandaza wundi w'isima, Abdulsamad Rabiu. Imitahe yiwe muri kompanyi ikora isima ya BUA PLC, yashizwe ku rutonde kw'isoko ry'abagurisha imitahe muri Nigeria mu kwezi kwa mbere, yaduze igiciro biteye ubwoba mu kiringo c'uyu mwaka uheze. Vyatumye ubutunzi bwa Rabiu bwongerekana ku bice 77 kw'ijana, gushika ku miriyaridi 5.5 vy'amadolari. Ikintu gikomeye cane n'uko Rabiu n'umwana wiwe bafise ibice 97 kw'ijana vy'iyo kompanyi bagaca batuma imenyekana cane. Umuvugizi w'isoko ry'imitahe muri Nigeria yabwiye Forbes ko ikompanyi y'isima ya BUA  ishitse ku ntambwe ya kabiri - ko Forbes igabanya agaciro k'imitahe mu gihe iyo mitahe yagurishijwe ku banyagihugu ifise agaciro kari muri y'ibice 5 kw'ijana. Umugwizatunga wenyene ava mu karere k'ubuseruko bwa Afrika ari kuri urwo rutonde rwa Forbes ni umudandaza wo muri Tanzania, Mohammed Dewji, aza mu kibanza ca 13. Dewji afise ubutunzi bufise agaciro k'imiriyaridi 1.6 z'amadolari, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ico kinyamakuru c'ubutunzi ca Forbes. Urutonde rw'abantu batunze cane kw'isi mu mwaka wa 2021: 1. Aliko Dangote     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 12.1 $ 2. Nassef Sawiris     afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8.5  $ 3.  Nicky Openheimer  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 8  $ 4. Johann Rupert  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 7.2  $ 5. Mike Adenuga   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 6.7  $ 6. Abdulsamad Rabiu  afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 5.5  $ 7. Issad Rebrad afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 4.8  $ 8. Naguib Sawiris   afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3.2  $ 9. Patrice afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 3  $ 10. Koos Bekker afise ubutunzi bungana na miriyaridi 2.8  $ Mu gihe bamwe bongereje ubutunzi bwabo ku miriyaridi n'imiriyaridi, ubutunzi bw'abagwizatunga babiri bari ku rutonde rwo mu mwaka wa 2020, bwaragabanutse gushika baje musi y'umuriyaridi umwe. Abapfasoni babiri bonyene ni bo bari ku rutonde rw'abatunzi bakomeye mu mwaka wa 2020, ubu bakorotse ntibakiri kuri urwo rutonde. Nk'uko bivugwa na Forbes, ubutunzi bwa Folonrusho Alakija wo muri Nigeria, afise ikompanyi yo kwimba igitoro bwaramanutse musi y'umuriyaridi umwe kubera igiciro c'ibitoro camanutse. Isabel dos Santos, kuva mu 2013 yari umupfasoni atunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika, ubutunzi bwiwe bwaragabanutse kubera ingingo nyinshi zitandukanye zitumbereye ivyo atunze muri Angola na Portugal. Abo bagwizatunga batunze cane ku mugabane wa Afrika bava mu bihugu indwi bitandukanye. Afrika y'Epfo na Misri bifise abagwizatunga batanu, bigakurikirwa na Nigeria ifise batatu hamwe na Maroc ifise babiri.

column2: Kenya: Abasoromyi b'icayi bajanye urubanza muri sentare ya Scotland
column3: Abakozi indwi bo mu mirima muri Kenya  bitwariye muri sentare yo muri Ecosse (Scotland ) imwe muri kompanyi zikomeye cane kw'isi zimbura icayi  basaba indishi ku mvune batewe n'akazi. Abo basoromyi b'icayi bavuga ko bagize imvune nyinshi  kubera uburyo bakoramwo mu mirima ya James Finlay  Kenya Ltd. Iryo ni ishami rimwe ry'iyo kompanyi ikorera henshi kw'isi ifise amamuko muri Glasgow mu kinjana ca 18. Iyo kompanyi ntiyemera urwo rubanza mu gushigikira ingingo zayo zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano mu kazi. Finlays batanguye bacuruza ipampa muri Ecosse mu 1750 ubu bakaba bafise  ibikorwa mu migabane itanu y'isi, Starbucks ikaba ari umwe mu bakiriya babo. Iyo kompanyi ni nini  cane ku buryo yimbura icayi gikwiye igikenerwa ku mwaka mu Bwongereza bwose. Iyo kompanyi yimuye icicaro cayo gikuru ikivana Glasgow ikijana Londres haraheze imyaka 15 ariko n'ubu yanditswe ko ikorera Aberdeen, ivyo bigatuma imanza irimwo zijanwa muri sentare za Ecosse. Abo bagabo n'abagore indwi bitwaye basaba indishi ingana n'ibihumbi 15 mu mafaranga y'abongereza £15.000, umwe umwe muri sentare ya Sheriff Personal Injury muri Edinburgh. Uwubunganira muri Kenya, Isaac Okero, avuga ko bagize imvune zitandukanye harimwo no mu ruti rw'umugongo. Yabwiye BBC Scotland ati: "Abo bakozi bo mu cayi bavuga ko baravye imyaka bamaze bakorera James Finlay Kenya Ltd, n'uburyo bakoreramwo, bagiye baragira imvune buhoro buhoro gushika aho zigira ingaruka ku buzima bwabo." "Izo mvune zifatiye ku mubiri no mu mutwe." Okero avuga ko bamwe bari bagikora igihe urwo rubanza rwatanguzwa muri ico gisagara kiri ku birometero birenga ibihumbi bitandatu uvuye muri Kenya, ariko ubu umwe wenyene ni we agikora. Abandi barungitswe mu kiruhuko canke naho ntibaba bagishobora gukora. Yibaza ko urwo rubanza ruzogira ingaruko irenze aho. Yavuze ati: "Twizeye ko ruzotuma iyo kompanyi ihindura cane uburyo abakozi bakoreramwo, uru rubanza rero rukazotuma haba akarusho gafadika mu masezerano n'uburyo vy'akazi k'abasoroma icayi, hanyuma harangire ivy'uko hari abakozi b'abanyaKenya bagira invune zibakurikirana ubuzima bwose nk'uko aba bakozi indwi vyabashikiye." Umuhinga mu bijanye n'imvune z'akazi David Short wo mu kigo ca Balfour and Manson co muri Edinburgh ni we  ahagarariye abo basoromyi b'icayi. Yavuze ati: "Mu rubanza rwo muri sentare kimwe mu bintu vya mbere  ubanza kuraba n'aho witura, ni iyihe sentare izotwemerera kwakira urubanza. "Ngaha dufise kompanyi yanditswe muri Ecosse, gutyo rero ikibanza ciza c'urwo rubanza ni muri sentare yo muri Ecosse. "Twitwaye mu rubanza ku bisanzwe  rwobereye muri Kenya. Rwerekana uburyo abakozi babo bakoreramwo n'ubutunzi bwabo." Imyaka ibiri urubanza rumaze gutangura mu 2017, umucamanza yategetse ko Finlays ireka abunganira mu mategeko abo basoromyi bagashika mu mirima yayo muri Kenya, ikabareka bakaraba uburyo abantu bakoreramwo. Finlays yaciye ishingisha urubanza rwo kuvyanka mu masentare yo muri Kenya iranarutsinda ivuga ko ingingo yo muri Ecosse idashobora gushirwa mu ngiro kiretse ibanje kwemerwa na sentare yo muri Kenya. Abasoromyi b'icayi barunguruje kuri iyo ngingo, uruzocibwa rukaba rwitezwe gusohoka mu kwezi kwa gatanu. Short avuga ati: "Bitwaza ngo ntivyemewe mw'ibwirizwanshingiro. "Naho vyoba biri uko, ni kuki batatureka ngo tuje kuraba? Ndakeka ko ari uko badashaka ko tubona uburyo buteye ubwoba abo bantu bakoreramwo." Mu kwezi kwa kabiri, abo basoromyi b'icayi barerekanye uburyo abakozi bo mu yindi kompanyi yo muri Kenya bakoreramwo, abunganizi babo bo mu Bwongereza barabiraba. Gwen Morgan-Evans, wo mw'ishirahamwe ry'abashingwamanza Hugh James, avuga ati: "Twaragiye muri Kenya turi kumwe na babiri mu bahinga bo mu Bwongereza kugira barabe ingene icayi gisoromwa kugira bagire inama sentare yo muri Ecosse y'ingene ubwo buryo bwo gukora buhungabanya amagara. "Ico kibazo gishika kure. Hamwe urwo rubanza borutsinda, abarushingishije bizigiye ko vyozana akarusho ku bakora mu cayi muri Kenya." Ikinyamateka ca vuba ca Finlays 1750 cashimikiye ku bikorwa vyayo muri Kenya. Umukuru w'iyo kompanyi Guy Chambers yakibwiye ati: ''Turemera ko vyose bitera ngo de kandi ko hama hari ivyo gukora neza gusumba. "Ariko abatunegura rimwe na rimwe barirengagiza urugero rw'utwigoro twagize mu gufasha ab'aho dukorera." Mw'itangazo umuvugizi yagize ati: ''James Finlays [Kenya] Ltd  yiyemeje kwiregura ku birego vyose vyashikirijwe haba muri sentare nkuru ya Nairobi canke iya All Sheriff Personal Injury." Iyo kompanyi ivuga ko ibikorwa vyayo vyo kurima no guhingura icayi muri Kericho na Bomet birimwo abakozi ibihumbi 8 n'ubundi buzi bushamikiye ku cayi vyose ''bitanga inyungu ifadika muri ako karere". Iryo tangazo rirabandanya riti: "Twama turondera gushika ku rugero rwo hejuru rwo kwitaho amagara, umutekano n'ineza y'abantu bose dukorana. "Dufise ingingo twashizeho kuva kera zijanye n'amagara n'umutekano aho hose dufise ibikorwa kw'isi, harimwo no muri Kenya." Mu myaka ya 1980, imyiyerekano yarabaye hanze y'ahariko harabera inama rusangi ya buri mwaka ya Finlays i Glasgow ku buryo bwo gukoramwo mu mirima yayo y'icayi mu Buhindi. Umwe mu bari mu myiyerekano mu 1984 yari Roger Jeffery, ubu akaba ari umwigisha muri Kaminuza ya Edinburgh mu gisata c'ivyigwa vya poritike. Yavuze ati: "Uwurongoye iyo kompanyi ico gihe yavuze ko turi abantu bahiga isoko hose, tuja ahantu hose turondera kuronka inyungu ku banyamitahe bacu kandi avuga ata kivyerekana na kimwe ashize ahabona ko ari abakoresha beza kandi ko abantu baronkera akarusho mu bikorwa vyabo." Agira ico avuze ko urwo rubanza rw'ubu, Prof Jeffrey yavuze ati: "Uvyihweje neza muri rusangi, wokwemera ko kurima icayi ari igikorwa kibangamye,  kandi ntibashobora gutangura guha abakozi babo imishahara nk'iyitangwa i Buraya, ariko nemera ko bashobora gusumvya  uko biri ubu."

column2: Greece: Umupatiri i Athens yafashwe inyuma y'uko ateye aside abasenyeri
column3: Umupatiri yahagaritswe ku mugwa mukuru w'Ubugiriki Athens/Athènes inyuma yo gutera aside abasenyeri indwi bo mw'idini ry'aba Orthodox, nk'uko bivugwa n'igiporisi. Ibi vyabaye igihe uyu mupatiri w'imyaka 36 yariko yumvirizwa n'urwego rujejwe indero inyuma y'umutaga w'ejo ku wa gatatu, nk'uko bibandanya bivugwa n'igiporisi. Abasenyeri batatu bariko baravurirwa mu bitaro kubera ubushe batewe n'iyi aside, bakaba bahiye mu maso. Umuporisi yirutse aja gutabara abo basenyeri, na we nyene ari mu bitaro. Uwagirizwa gukora aka kabi - umupatiri ashobora kwirukanwa muri iryo dini - yagirizwa ko afise uruhara mu rudandaza rw'ibiyayuramutwe, nk'uko vyandikwa n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru ANA. Nk'uko ibimenyeshamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu bibitangaza, abo basenyeri bari bakoranye kugira ngo baganire ingene bomwirukana - bakamwambura ubupatiri - inyuma y'aho bivugiwe ko mu kwa gatandatu mu 2018 yafatanywe amagarama 1,8 y'urumogi. Ikinyamakuru Ta Nea kivuga ko uyo mupatiri yinjiye mu kigo c'ababihebeye Imana ca Petraki kiri i Athènes agiye kwumvirizwa, akaba yinjiranye "icupa rinini ririmwo iyo aside". Umuzamu yashoboye gufata uyo mupatiri ageze kw'irembo ry'ico kigo, na we nyene yaraturiwe n'iyo aside, akaba yaciye asimbanwa kwa muganga. Umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubugiriki Katerina Sakellaropoulou ariyamiriza iki gitero, nayo umushikiranganji wa mbere Kyriakos Mitsotakis akaba yavuganye n'uwurongoye iryo dini mu Bugiriki, Musenyeri mukuru wa Athènes, Ieronymos II. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Mitsotakis avuga ko ababajwe cane n'iki gitero, akaba yijeje uyu musenyeri ko "reta izokora uko ishoboye mu kuvura abakomeretse kugira bashobore gukira ningoga".

column2: Lady Gaga n'umufana bituye hasi bavuye hejuru ku butambiro i Las Vegas, batanguza imitwe
column3: Lady Gaga yaraguye atanguza umutwe amaguru aja hejuru agwa mu barorerezi mu giteramo giheruka mu muji wa Las Vegas. Uwo 'musani' yari yahamagaye umufana wiwe azwi nka Jack ngo aze ku butambiro, aca asimbira mu maboko yiwe - ariko uwo mufana abura intege bose baca batembera hasi. Umwe mu bariko bararorera igiteramo yanditse agira ati "n'ukuri twari tuzi yuko apfuye". Ahubwo Gaga yaciye agaruka ku butambiro aririmba indirimbo Million Reasons na Jack amuri impande. Yagize ati "Birahimbaye. Turakundana cane ku buryo twaguye twese tuva ku butambiro." "Twagwanye mu maboko. Turi nka Jack na Rose bo muri Titanic. "Ndibaza ko tuza gusangira icayi nyuma y'aha." Abafana bari bagize ubwoba bibaza ko Gaga yababaye kuko asanzwe afise uburwayi buzwi nka fibromyalgia, uburwayi amaranye igihe butuma ababara umubiri wose. Ubwo burwayi bushobora kandi gutuma ababa birengeje, akaruha, inyama z'umubiri zikagumirwa, kwibuka bikamugora kandi akabura itiro. Mu 2013, yahagaritse ibiteramo vy'urukurikirane Born This Way amaze kuvunika ikiyunguyungu. Ariko uwo muririmvyi kugwa kw'ejo kuwa kane ntaco kwamutwaye, ahumuriza abarorerezi hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano bamufashije guhaguruka. Kanda ngaha urabe ingene Lady Gaga n'umufana baguye Yagize ati: "Vyose ni sawa. Ikintu kimwe kitagenda ni uko dukeneye ingazi kuri ubu butambiro kugira nsubire hejuru." Uwo 'musani' yanahojeje Jack, yari yarenzwe n'umwosori kubera ivyari bihejeje kuba. Gaga yagize ati: "Ntugire ingorane, vyose ni sawa. Si ikosa ryawe. Urashobora kunyemerera ikintu? Urashobora kwibabarira ubu nyene kubera ibihejeje gushika?" Nyuma muri ico giteramo, Gaga yarerekanye yuko ukwo kugwa ata na kimwe kwamutwaye aca akora ikarasisi rikomeye ariko araririmba indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe, Bad Romance.

column2: Ndayishimiye: ‘Karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?’
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko ibibazo Uburundi bwagiye buracamwo vyatumye igihugu gisigara inyuma mu bisata bitandukanye. Akebura  abakozi gukura amaboko mu mpuzu kugira bagwize umwimbu. Mw'ijambo yaraye ashikirije Abarundi buca bahimbaza umusi mpuzamakungu wahariwe abakozi, Perezida Ndayishimiye ahamagarira Abarundi kwemanga ko basamaye hanyuma bafate ingingo yo gukura amaboko mu mpuzu. Mu gihe abakozi ba reta bari biteze ko umusi nk'uwu ari akaryo keza ko kwongerwa imishahara, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko batokwitega ko bahava bongerwa agashirukabute mu gihe "n'umwenda Reta yafashe mu myaka iheze kugira ihembe abakozi utararihwa". Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko gushika ubu hari abakozi bironderera kwongerezwa impembo mu gihe ataco bariko bafasha reta kugira ironke uburyo bukwiye, bakagomba ko reta isaba imfashanyo kugira ngo ibahembe. Ati: "Uno musi urasanga umukozi wa Reta ashaka agashirukabute gakirurutse ariko we nyene abona abanyonora ikigega ca reta akihorera canke akabakingira ikibaba. Mbere hari naho usanga ari we nyene ariko aranyonora agaca asaba impembo irengeye. "Hari abandi bareka ibidandazwa vyari gutanga amakori bigaca ku ruhande ariko ukwezi kwahera agasaba impembo. None yibaza ko iyo mpembo ica iva hehe, ko hari aho nyene?" Perezida Ndayishimiye ntiyumva ivyo gusaba imfashanyo, kuko kubw'iwe, abakeneye imfashanyo ni abatishoboye. Ahamagarira  abarundi gutahura ko ivyo bagiye baracamwo  vyatumye basamara. Ati: "None ko umuntu wo gufashwa ari uwutishoboye, koko karashize ingani, abakozi ba Reta bitwe abatishoboye?  Jewe si uko ndavyumva; sindanavyemera; ni co gituma bintera isoni gusega". Perezida Ndayishimiye abona ko uwutakoze atari akwiye guhembwa ukwezi guheze kuko ku bw'iwe, "ni we ngumba y'ukuri kuko imana yamuhaye ubwenge n'inkomezi hanyuma abipfisha ubusa". Avuga ko muri kino gihe igihugu kirangwamwo amahoro, agasaba Abarundi guhaguruka bakiyishura ivyo bataye, bakarangura imigambi yo kwiteza imbere. Ati: "Twarabuze vyinshi, twarataye umwanya mwinshi kubera ububegito bwa benshi muri twebwe bwatumye tubura amahoro. "Muri uwo mwanya twataye, ibikorwa bitakozwe ni vyinshi kandi biraturindiriye. "Kurima, tukworora kijambere ntavyo twitaho; twarira ikija mu nda gusa, umusesekara ntiwotubajije, tukitwaza imyibutsa yataye igihe ngo ivy'ejo biraba ab'ejo. "Guhingura itunga kama uwo wari umugani kuko biteba kwimbuka ... gutunganya aho abamukerarugendo ... vyari umugani." "Ivyo vyose vyari akazi koduha itunga dukeneye kandi n'ubu karacaturindiriye".Atera akamo abarundi ko bova hasi bagakora kugira ngo bahamvye ibindi bihugu kuko vyovyo vyamaze kugera kure. Ati: "Abandi barakamaze. Barubatse amabarabara, barubaka amashure, barubaka ingomero z'umuyagankuba, barubaka ivyo ba mukerarugendo bakenera, barubaka ibikoresho vy'ubuhinga ngurukanabumenyi, barubatse amahinguriro, ubu ntaco basigaje. "Twebwe, ivyo vyose biracaturindiriye, dukure amaboko mu mpuzu dukore".

column2: Uwahoze ari Pope Benedict ntaco yakoze kw'ihohoterwa, biri mu cegeranyo gishasha
column3: Uwahoze ari Papa Benedicto XVI yarananiwe  no kugira ico akoze ku mabi yo guhohotera abana igihe yari akiri musenyeri mukuru i Munich , nk'uko bivugwa n'amatohoza yo mu Budagi ku bijanye na Ekereziya Katorika. Papa Benedicto, ico gihe yari azwi nka  Josef Ratzinger, yari muri ico kibanza hagati ya 1977 na 1982. Yarahakanye ko ivyo vyabaye. Ariko icegeranyo gishasha ku mabi avugwa ko yakozwe muri kahise cakozwe n'ikigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi kiragiriza uwo yahoze ari umwungere mukuru. Ihohoterwa ryarabandanije igihe yari musenyeri mukuru, nk'uko bivugwa, kandi abapatiri bagirizwa bagumye mu mabanga bari bafise mu masengero bakoramwo. Uwo yahoze ari papa, ubu afise imyaka 94, yabaye indongozi ya mbere ya Ekereziya yatanze imihoho (yeguye)  mu myaka irenga 600 mu 2013, avuga ko arushe. Kuva ico gihe, abayeho mu buzima buhwekereye i Vaticano aho azwi nka papa 'emerite'. Ico cegerenyo gishasha c'ico kigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi citwa Westpfahl Spilker Wastl  casabwe na Ekereziya Katorika. Umunyamategeko Martin Pusch  ashikiriza ico cegeranyo yavuze ati: "Habiri  muri aho vyabaye  vyakozwe  ku gihe ciwe hanyuma birenzwako amaso na reta." "Kuri vyompi, ababikoze bagumye bakora amabanga y'ubupatiri yo kwitaho abantu." Hari hamwe bivugwa ko yari azi umupatiri yagirizwa guhohotera abana b'abahungu yimuriwe muri diyoseze yiwe, ariko abandanya gukora amabanga yo kwitaho abakristu  - aho hakaba harimwo rimwe na rimwe kugendera no gushigikira  abantu mu kibano iwabo. Uwo yahoze ari Papa bivugwa ko yarungitse impapuro nyinshi z'inyishu ku bibazo vy'ico kigo, aho yerekanye ko ashigikiye iryo tohoza ariko agahakana kuba yarigeze amenya canke yanka kugira ico akoze kuri iryo hohoterwa rivugwa. Ico cegeranyo, yamara, kirimwo  inyandiko zisa n'izerekana bikomeye ko yari ari mu nama aho ico kibazo cavuzwe. Vaticano yavuze mw'itangazo ko izokwihweza ido n'ido ry'ico cegeranyo niyo camara gusohoka. Vaticano yongeyeko iti: "Nk'uko twongeye guterwa  isoni n'ukwicuza twatewe n'amabi yakorewe abana bakiri bato n'abapatiri, Icicaro Ceranda kirashikirije ko gishigikiye abahuye n'ayo mabi bose kandi kiremeza inzira yo gukingira abatarakura n'uko haba ibibanza vy'aho ata kibi bashobora gukorerwa". Icegeranyo caheruka ku mabi yakozwe muri kahise mu Budagi cerekanye ko abantu bashika 3.600 mu gihugu cose bari barakorewe amabi n'abantu bo mu mu nzego za ekereziya  hagati ya 1946 na 2014. Benshi mu bayakorewe bari abana bakiri bato kandi bakora nk'abahungu b'abakorezi kuri arutari. Ico cegeranyo gishasha cibanze ku turere twa Munich na Freising  catoye vyihariye ko nibura abantu 497 bakorewe ihohoterwa kuva mu 1945 gushika mu 2019. Uretse uwo yahoze ari papa, ico cegeranyo kiranegura abandi bantu bo muri  ekereziya, harimwo umusenyeri mukuru w'iyo ntara muri iki gihe, Cardinal Reinhard Marx. Abakoze amatohoza basanze nawe hari aho ataco yakoze ku hantu  habiri havugwa ihohoterwa. Uwo mu karidinari aramaze gusaba  Papa François gutanga imihoho mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2011 avuga ko akwiye kwumva nawe hari ico yobazwa ku "kaga" k'ihohoterwa riguma rishirwa ahabona. Papa François ariko yaranse ubusabe bwiwe bwo gutanga imihoho. Imbere yaho, papa yari yahinduye amategeko ya Vaticano ajanye n'ivyaha, aho yakajije cane aho ekereziya ihagaze ku vyerekeye ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.

column2: Kenya: Evariste Ndayishimiye asaba abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe mu Burundi
column3: Prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye atera akamo abagwizatunga ba Kenya kujana imitahe yabo mu Burundi  kuko ngo mu myaka ibiri canke itatu iri imbere bashobora kuzoba bacerewe. Agishika muri Kenya, yaciye aca mu burengero bw'ico gihugu mu gisagara ca Kisumu, aho prezida n'abagize reta ya Kenya bari, bitegurira guhimbaza umusi mukuru wa Madaraka Day kuri uyu wa kabiri. Mu kiganiro bahaye abamenyeshamakuru, abakuru b'ibihugu Uhuru Kenyatta na Evariste Ndayishimiye bashimagije umubano mwiza, gufashanya muri politike, ubutunzi, gutsimbataza amahoro n'ishaka bafise ryo kubitsimbataza. Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko amaze kuza muri Kenya kenshi, ariko ko ari ubwa mbere ashitse mu gisagara ca Kisumu. Yagize ati:"...Ntangajwe n'ubwiza hamwe n'iterambere nsanze muri kino gisagara." Yavuze ko Uburundi bumaze gutera intambwe mu mahoro n'umutekano, ko butakiri ku rutonde rw'ibihugu bitarangwamwo amahoro muri Onu, ashimira prezida Kenyatta ko "we ubwiwe yabigizemwo uruhara." Prezida Ndayishimiye yavuze ko ubu, Uburundi buriko burashira inguvu cane mu guteza imbere ubutunzi, aranashima ko uguhanahana ibidandazwa hagati ya Kenya n'Uburundi bigenda vyiyongera. Yvuze ati:"Ndateye akamo abagwizatunga bo muri Kenya kuza mu Burundi kukoni co gihe ciza, kurindira imyaka ibiri canke itatu, mushobora gusanga mwacerewe." Umukuru w'igihugu c'Uburundi kandi yatumiye mugenzi we wa Kneya Uhuru Kenyatta kugendera Uburundi.

column2: Burundi: Hilaire Manirakiza afasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi'
column3: Hilaire Manirakiza yize bimugoye kubera uburyo aho yagiye arahagarika ubu akaba akora akazi katamenyerewe rwose ko gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro na YouTube kwongereza ababakurikirana (Views). Uwo musore avuga ko yize ivyerekeye ubuhinga bwa none bw'itumatumanako mu mashure yisumbuye, avuga ko yize bimugoye bituma atabandanya kaminuza. Avuga ati:"Nahagaritse imyaka itanu ntiga kubera ubukene, ngaruka kubandanya umwaka w'icenda abo twigana bahejeje. "Narasubiriye ndamara umwaka ntiga banyirukanye kuko nari maze imyaka ibiri ntariha amahera y'ishure." YouTube, iriha abafise 'accounts' bivanye n'igitigiri c'abaraba video bashirako n'igihe bazimarako. Mu Burundi hari benshi bamaze gushinga YouTube channels bashirako videos bafise intumbero yo gukorera ayo mafaranga, vyuzi rero ni wo mukate wabo. Kuri Manirakiza n'abafise ubuhinga nk'ubwiwe n'abo guha vyuzi abo bafise. Ni ubuhinga bushasha bwo kurondera amahera n'aho hari abanebagura uko bukora, hamwe  n'ubwoko bw'amakuru ashirwa kuri izo mbuga mu kurondera vyuzi. Hilaire Manirakiza avuga ko agiheza ishure yaciye aronka akazi ko gufata amasanamu ku mboneshakure yo ku mbuga hwaniro, ariko mu nyuma amasezerano bari bafitaniye aza guhagara. Avuga ko yaciye yigira inama yo kwiga uko yobaho mu gufasha abafise imbuga hwaniro kuduza ama 'vyuzi' (views). Agira ati:"Abafise imbuga hwaniro bampemba hakurikijwe igikorwa bantumye ico ari co. "Uwo mfashije kuronka nk'ama vyuzi 1000 ku musi, ampa ibihumbi 15 vy'amarundi. "Birantunze kuko kuva bampagaritse ku kazi, inzu nguma ndayiriha uko nahora, gufungura canke kwambara ni kwa kundi." Mu kwezi kumwe amaze atanguye ico gikorwa, Manirakiza Hilaire amaze gufasha abantu barenga cumi kuduza ama vyuzi. N'akazi akorera aho ari ho hose, kuri telefone ngendanwa canke ku nyabwonko, ariko akavuga ko afise umugambi wo kwugurura ibiro vyo gukoreramwo. Ahanura urundi rwaruka kwicara rufise ikintu ruzi gukora ku buryo n'aho bokwirukana mu kazi k'ivyo wigiye, ushobora guca wikorera ivyawe.

column2: Coronavirus -Burundi: Bavuze ivyavuye mu gupima abantu benshi
column3: Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi bumenyesha ko mu bantu bashika 670 bafashwe ibipimo ku wa mbere w'iyi ndwi 28 banduye wa mugera ruhonyabantu wa coronavirus. Nibwo bwa mbere mu Burundi hari hafashwe ibipimo vyinshi ku munsi umwe mw'isekeza ryatangujwe ryo kuraba uko iciza Covid-19 gihagaze mu gihugu. Umuvugizi w'ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu mu Burundi, Dr Jean-Bosco Girukwishaka, abicishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, amenyesha ko ivyo bipimo vyafashwe mu bigo bitatu vyo gupimiramwo uyo mugera no mu bitaro bitandukanye, mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Iryo sekeza ryatanguriye i Bujumbura bikaba bitegekanijwe ko kuva mu ndwi iza kizobandaniriza mu zindi ntara zo hagati. Dr Girukwishaka avuga ko ku munsi ugira kabiri w'iryo sekeza, abashika "593  aribo bafashwe ibipimo" , bakaba barindiriye inyishu. Avugana na BBC Gahuzamiryango ejo ku wa kabiri, Bwana Girukwishaka yavuze ko iri sekeza rizomara amezi atatu rizofasha leta kumenya ingene ikiza ca coronavirus cifashe mu gihugu cose. U Burundi buzwi ko buri mu bihugu bitafashe ingingo ruhasha mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ikwirakwira ry'umugera wa coronavirus, harimwo ingingo zo kuguma mu rugo, nk'uko vyagenze mu bindi bihugu vyo mu muryango wa Afrika y'Ubuseruko. Hari amashirahamwe amwe amwe yagiriza leta ko igiharuro vyatangwa na leta ku bijanye n'uwo mugera bitari vyo, ibirego vyiyamirijwe. Umukuru w'igihugu mushasha Evariste Ndayishimiye wewe aherutse gutangaza ko agiye kurwanya bikomeye iki kiza gushika gitujijwe. Mw'ijambo yashikirije igihe abagize leta yiwe barahira, ku wa 30 z'ukwa gatandatu guheze, Perezida Ndayishimiye yatangaje icese ko agiye guhagurukira uwo mugera gushika utujijwe. Mu gihe ico gikorwa kibandanya, ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu busaba abanyagihugu kubandanya bakurikiza ingingo zafashwe mu ntumbero yo kwikingira, izo nazo hakaba harimwo gukaraba igihe cose, kwirinda gukorana mu minwe canke kugwana mu nda, hamwe no kwisiga ya miti yica imicafu. Ubushikiranganji bw'amagara y'abantu kandi busaba ishirahamwe Atrabu ryo kwunguruza abantu kwama bapompa imiduga yabo, abakiriya nabo bagasabwa kwambara udupfukamunwa.

column2: Boeing na Airbus zigabisha US ku ngorane zishobora guterwa na 5G
column3: Abakuru b'ikompanyi zibiri za mbere rutura mu gukora indege basavye reta ya Amerika gutevya gutangura gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bw'ama terefone bwa 5G. Mw'ikete, abategetsi ba Boeing na Airbus bagabisha ko ubwo buhinga bushobora kugira "ingaruka mbi ku bikorwa vy'indege." Amakenga yari amaze gushikirizwa ko ubuhinga bwa 5G bushobora guhungabanya ivyuma vy'ubuhinga bwa electronic vyo mu ndege. Ibihangange vya telecoms (ubuhinga bwo gutumatumanako)  muri Amerika AT&T na Verizon  vyitezwe gutanguza ikoreshwa rya 5G itariki 5 za Nzero (ukwezi kwa  mbere). Abakuru ba Boeing na Airbus Dave Calhoun na Jeffrey Knittel, mw'ikete barungikiye hamwe uwujejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu muri reta ya Amerika Pete Buttigieg, bamubwiye bati: "Uguhungabanya kwa 5G gushobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bw'indege bwo gukora mu mutekano". Iryo kete ryishingiye ku bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umugwi w'ubucuruzi Airlines for Amerika rwatoye ko iyo amategeko y'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe indege (FAA)  aba yagiye mu ngiro mu 2019, hafi ingendo 345.000 z'indege z'ingenzi  na 5.400 zitwara imizigo ziba zaracerewe, zarahinduriwe inzira canke zitabaye zikiba. Igisata c'indege n'urwego rwa Amerika rw'indege (FAA) barashikirije amakenga ko 5G ishobora guhungabanya ivyuma  vyo mu ndege nk'amaradiyo y'ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere. Itangazo rya Airbus rivuga ko "Airbus na Boeing bakoranye n'abandi bafise uruhara mu gisata c'indege muri Amerika kugira batahure ihungabana rishobora guterwa na 5G ku vyuma bifata ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere (altmeters)". "Iinteguro y'ingene ingorane zishoboka zoba nke cane ku ndege yarashikirijwe igisata ca Amerika kijejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu kugira yigwe." Uku kwezi, urwego FAA rwaragabishije ko uguhungabanya ibindi vyuma guturutse kuri 5G gushobora gutuma indege zihushishwa inzira, ruvuga ko ruzotanga amakuru menshi imbere y'uko ubwo buhinga butangura gukoreshwa itariki 5 Nzero. Muri Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), kompanyi za AT&T na Verizon  zarasibije gutanguza urudandazwa rwa 5G ikiringo c'ukwexzi gushika itariki 5 Nzero zica zifata ingingo zo kwiyubara zo kugabanya ko haba ihungabanya. Amakompanyi yo mu gisata c'indege avuga ko izo ngingo zidahagije, Boeing na Airbus zikavuga ko zaciye zitanga integuro yazo yo kugabanya imishwarara iturutse ku bikoresho vyo gutumatumanako imbere no mu micungararo y'ibibuga vy'indege no mu bindi bibanza nkoramutima. Ku ndwi iheze, umukuru wa United Airlines Scott Kirby yavuze ko ingingo za FAA zerekeye 5G zizobuza ikoreshwa z'ibipimo z'aho indege igeze mu kirere ku bibuga bishika 40 mu vya mbere binini muri Amerika. Kompanyi ya Amerika y'ubuhinga budaciye mu ntsinga CTIA ivuga ko 5G ata ngorane n'imwe iteye akagiriza igisata c'indege gutera ubwoba no kwerekana ukutariko uko ibintu  bimeze. Umukuru wa CTIA  Meredith Attwell Baker yavuze mu kwezi guheze ati: "Kuducereza bizogira ingaruka mbi ikomeye. Kurindira uwundi mwaka bizotuma habura miriyaridi 500 z'amadorari mw'izamuka ry'ubutunzi, mu gihe igihugu cacu kiriko kirivyukiranya  congera ciyubaka inyuma y'ingaruka za Covid".

column2: DR Congo-Rutshuru: HCR ivuga ko abantu ibihumbi 11 bahungiye muri Uganda
column3: Umuvugizi w'umukuru w'intara ya Kivu ya ruguru muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Congo aremeza ko umuhari M23 wateye mu turere twa Chanzo na Runyoni muri Rutshuru mw'ijoro ryo ku wa mungu, bituma abantu benshi guhunga, harimwo n'abajabutse muri Uganda. Ishami rya ONU riraba impunzi HCR rivuga ko gushika kuri uyu wa kabiri riharura abantu ibihumbi 11 bajabutse umupaka bagahungira muri Uganda. Ubu babaye baracumbikirwa ahitwa Nyakabande. Ariko umuvugizi w'umukuru w'intara ya Kivu ya ruguru, jenerari Sylvain Ekenge avuga ko bamwe batanguye guhunguka. Avuga ko "umurindi ukiri muto, ariko nibaza ko mu masaha ari imbere baja gutahuka ku bwinshi". Umuvuguzi wa HCR mu karere ka Afrika yo hagati, y'ubuseruko n'ihembe rya Afrika,  Faith Kasima, avuga ko bigoye kumenya ibitigiri bishasha "ariko ico tuzi n'uko abari bajabutse umupaka bose bari ibihumbi 11". Madame Kasina avuga ko ico abo bantu babwira abakozi ba HCR ari uko bakeneye ahantu hatekanye. Ati: "Benshi muri bo ubu nta ngingo ntabanduka bashobora gufata, yo kuguma ngaha canke gusubira inyuma." Ico bashaka muri uyu mwanya ni ahantu hatekanye no kuronka imfashanyo - nk'ivyo kurya, ivyo kwifuka - ivyo nivyo HCR ifatanije n'ubutegetsi bwa Uganda turiko turagerageza kubakorera" Mu kiganiro na BBC, ku wa mbere,  jenerari Ekenge yavuze ati: "Nk'igihe c'isaha zine z'ijoro (ku wa mungu), umuhari w'abagarariji ba M23, canke ibisigarira vyawo, warateye uturere twa Chanzo na Runyoni  ufise umugambi wo guhanganya n'ibindi bice vy'intara". Jenerari Ekenge yavuze ko abateye ari abo mw'ishami ryategekwa na Sultani Makenga. Umuhari M23 wo urabihakana. Avuga ko baje bava "mu karere k'imipaka itatu " kari hagati ya Congo, Uganda n'Urwanda mw'ishamba rya Virunga". Jenerari Ekenge avuga ko abateye bikitse mu kiza c'uko ata ngabo nyinshi za Congo zari zisanzwe muri ako gace kuko hari hatekanye ku buryo  "bitari bikenewe gushira ingabo nyinshi  hafi y'umupaka w'ibihugu mufitaniye umubano mwiza". Mu kiganiro co kuri uyu wa kabiri, jenerari Ekenge yavuze ko ubu ingabo za Congo zagaruje ibirindiro vyose vyari vyatewe. Yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ati: "Kuva ejo mu masaha y'umuhingamo, ingabo zacu zaragaruje ibirindiro vyose. Ubu nizo zigenzura uruhande rwa Congo rw'umupaka bihana na Uganda n'Urwanda". Avuga ko adashobora kwemeza niba abateye baje bava hakurya y'umupaka mu Rwanda canke muri Uganda. Ati "Gusa ico twemeza n'uko ari aba M23. Ntibinyegeza. Barigaragaza, bashize no ku mbuga hwaniro ama video yabo". Ku kibazo co kumenya iyo abari bateye baroye, jenerari Ekenge yasubije ati "hari aho bari bazananye, ni naho basubiye". Hagati aho yavuze ko umukuru wabo mu ngabo yagize ingendo muri Uganda no mu Rwanda, "aho niho bazovugana hakaboneke umuco kuri ico kibazo". M23 irahakana kugaba igitero i Rutshuru Umuhari M23 waheruka kuvugwa mu 2013 ugwanya reta ya Congo uvuga ko itubahiriza amasezerano bari baragiraniye. Uburongozi bw'umugwi M23 buhakana kugira uruhara na rumwe mu gitero cagabwe i Rutshuru ngo kuko bidashobora kwumvikana. Mw'itangazo wasohoye ku mugoroba w'ejo kuwa mbere, umuhari M23 uvuga ko umaze umwaka mu biganiro na leta ya Congo bigamije gutunganiriza abahoze ari abarwanyi bawo. Iryo tangazo ribandanya rivuga yuko mu gihe ivyo biganiro biriko biraba kandi ngo bikaba bigenda neza, ata kuntu M23 yaco ica inyuma ngo yiyononere. Ngo ariko bihora bishika ko ingabo za FARDC zitagenzurwa zija gusotora abarwanyi ba M23 bari i Rutshuru kuva mu 2017, ngo ukwo gusotorwa kukaba kwatanguye mu mwaka wa 2020 ngo ariko baririnze gusubiza. Iryo tangazo rirangiza risaba ko ingabo zitagenzurwa za FARDC zokurwa mu turere twa Rutshuru zirimwo kugira ivyo bikorwa vyo gusotorana bihagarare. Ayobangira Safari, umushingamateka wa Masisi muri Kivu ya ruguru, yabwiye BBC Gahuzamiryango ko  ibikorwa vy'inyeshyamba bimaze iminsi biri mu burasirazuba bwa DR Congo ari "ingaruka za gahunda yo gusubiza abari abarwanyi mu buzima busanzwe canke mu ngabo, idakora neza." Agira ati: "Nta kintu cakozwe mu gufasha abavuye mu mitwe y'inyeshamba, ico tuzi ni uko ubu benshi muri abo bantu bari hafi ya Bunagana ari abahoze muri M23 bagitegereje gusubizwa mu buzima busanzwe. "Turasaba leta gukora ku buryo aba basore bose bakiri mu murongo wo gusubira mu nyeshamba bafashwa gusubira mu buzima bwa gisivile canke bagashirwa mu gisirikare". Intara za Kivu uko ari zibiri zirangwamwo imigwi yitwaje ibigwanisho irenga 100 imaze imyaka mirongo  ihungabanya ako karere k'ubuseruko bwa Repuburika y'intwaro ya demokrasi ya Congo.

column2: Russia - Ukraine: Hatanguye ibiganiro ku ntambara iri hagati y'ivyo bihugu
column3: Amafoto yatanguye guhererekanywa mu gihe abategetsi b'Uburusiya na Ukraine bari mu biganiro ku ntambara iriko irabahuza, ivyo biganiro bikaba biriko birabera  ku rubibe igihugu ca Ukraine gihana na Belarus. Imbere y'uko iyo nama itangura, prezida wa Ukraine yavuze ko igihugu ciwe cipfuza ko intambara zica zihagarara ubwo nyene n'ingabo z'Uburusiya zikava muri ico gihugu. Hagati aho, Uburusiya bwo buvuga ko hoshikwako amasezerano impande zose zifisemwo inyungu. Ku musi ugira gatanu inyuma y'aho ingabo z'Uburusiya zinjiriye muri Ukraine, intumwa z'ivyo bihugu bibiri zatanguye ibiganiro bigamije kurangiza iyo ntambara. Ibiro vya prezida wa Ukraine bivuga ko bishaka ihagarikwa ry'intambara ubwo nyene hamwe n'ivanwa ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya muri ico gihugu. Hagati aho, Vladimir Medinsky arongoye intumwa z'Uburusiya mu biganiro avuga ko bashaka amasezerano afitiye inyungu impande zose. Imbere y'uko iyo nama itangura, prezida Volodymyr Zelensky yahamagariye ingabo z'Uburusiya gushira hasi ibigwanisho, aca atera akamo ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya kwemerera Ukraine kwinjira muri iryo shirahamwe ubwo nyene.

column2: HRW yagiriza abacangero ba Russia amarorerwa muri Central African Republic
column3: Abacangero b'Abarusiya bagirizwa ubwicanyi ndengerabutungane, iyicarubozo, no gukubita abasivire muri Centrafrique (CAR). Ababibonye babwiye ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch (HRW) ko kimwe mu vyabaye mu kw'indwi, abawanyi bavuga ikirusiya barashe n'imiburiburi abantu 12 batari bafise ibirwanisho kuri bariyeri. Bavuga ko abishwe hafi bose batawe mu kinogo gitoya ku nkengera z'ibarabara hafi y'igisagara ca Bossangoa. Reta ya Centrafrique irahakana ko atabacangero b'umurwi Wagner wo mu Burusiya yahaye akazi mu ntambara n'inyeshamba. Muragabe - iyi nkuru irimwo ibintu bishobora gutera ubwoba Abahinga ba ONU nabo nyene baragiriza abacangero b'Abarusiya kugenda bahonyanga bikomeye agateka ka zina muntu muri Centrafrique, kimwe mu bihugu bikenye cane kw'isi ariko gitunze cane ubutare bwa diyama (diamant), inzahabu, na uranium. Umurwi Wagner uravugwa cane ko warungitse ingabo mu tundi turere twa Afrika - muri Mali na Libya - kandi ko wagize uruhara rukomeye cane mu ntambara zo muri Syria na Ukraine. Mu kwezi guheze, abikekwa ko ari abacangero b'abarusiya bari mu bagirizwa kugandagura abanyagihugu bababa 300 muri Mali mu cegeranyo ca HRW. Muri ino ndwi, umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire w'Uburusiya Sergei Lavrov yarashimangiye aho Moscou ihagaze kuri uyu murwi, avuga ko Wagner ataho uhuriye na reta y'Uburusiya. Mu cegeranyo cayo, HRW ivuga ko yegeranije ivyemezo bikomeye ko abarwanyi b'Abarusiya bakoreye abasivire amabi y'agahomerabunwa muri CAR kandi ko ata bihano bafatiwe kuva mu 2019. Hagati ya Ruhuhuma (2) 2019 na Munyonyo (11) 2021, iri shirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu ryavugishije abantu 40, harimwo 10 bakorewe aya mabi hamwe na 15 bavyiboneye, ku bijanye n'amabi yakozwe n'abagabo bavuga ikirusiya. Ababibonye bavuga ko abo bantu bari bafise ibirwanisho bikomeye kandi bambaye impuzu za kaki, ibitambara vyo kunyegeza isura, ibirato vya gisirikare hamwe n'amarori y'izuba. 12 muri abo babajijwe bariboneye ubwo bwicanyi hafi y'igisagara Bossangoa kiri mu burengero ku wa 21 Mukakaro (7) 2021, nk'uko bivugwa na HRW. Aba basore batari banafise n'ibirwanisho bishwe bavuye i Bossangoa bari ku mapikipiki inyuma y'isaha cumi na zibiri (06:00) mu masaha yo muri ico gihugu. Bararenganye ibariyeri bava mu gisagara ariko mu nyuma baza kwicirwa ku yindi yari ku birometero hafi 12 hanze ya Bossangoa, kw'ibarabara abategetsi bavuga ko ryama rigenzurwa n'abarwanyi b'Abarusiya. Bategetswe kuva ku mapikipiki yabo, gushira amaboko hejuru bagashikiriza amaterefone bari bafise. Nk'uko bivugwa na HRW, abagabo bari hagati ya bane na batandatu bavuga ikirusiya baciye babakubita, babasunagura baryamye hasi. Inyuma y'aho, baciye batwarwa umwe umwe, babategeka gupfukama, bagaca babarasa mu mutwe. Bivugwa ko abariko barorera ingene ivyo bintu vyariko biba baciye batangura gusenga bakoma akaruru - ariho muri iyo nduru n'akavuyo babiri muri abo bari bafashwe bashoboye guhunga. HRW yerekana kandi ingene abantu bafashwe bakaborezwa igufa n'abarwanyi b'Abarusiya i Bambari mu 2019. Umudandaza w'iduka yafashwe yiketswe ko ari inyeshamba yavuze ko Abarusiya bamufashe bakamuca urutoke muri Nzero (1) 2019. Avuga ingene yapfunzwe, Mahamat Nour Mamadou agira ati:"Narakubiswe bimwe bibi bakoresheje amaferabeto (Fers à béton) n'imbugita. Bamboshe amaso y'ikirenge. Umwe muri bo yavuze yifashishije umuhinduzi (interprète/translator) ati: 'Turabaca intoke'". "Naraboroga; kuko narababara cane. Hanyuma bafashe umunyororo bawumbohera mw'izosi barakaza cane. Naraguye, ururimi rurasohoka. Umurusiya yafashe itafari arinshira mu kanwa hanyuma arikubita umugere. Amenyo yahatswe kuvayo". Aya mabi yakorewe yayabwiye abanyamakuru mu nyuma, HRW ikavuga ko yahavuye yicwa muri Nyakanga (9) 2019 mu buryo budasobanutse. Ubucuti hagati y'Uburusiya na Centrafrique bwagiye kuja ahabona ubwa mbere mu 2018 aho habereye amasezerano ko abahoze ari intwazangabo z'Uburusiya bari kuza gutanga inyigisho za gisirikare. Ku wa 30 Mukakaro (7) 2018, abanyamakuru batatu b'Abarusiya bariko bakora ireresi y'amatohoza ku ruhara rwa Wagner muri ico gihugu barishwe barashwe - kandi ababikoze ntibigeze babaca n'ikanda. Centrafrique yamye mu ntambara z'urutavanako kuva yikukiye mu 1960. Mu 2013, inyeshamba zigizwe ahanini n'aba-Islam zarigaruriye igihugu kigizwe ahanini n'abakristu. Haciye havuka imirwi yo kwirwanako kugira yivune, ivyatumye haduka ubwicanyi mu gihugu cose bushingiye ku madini. Perezida Faustin-Archange Touadéra aje ku butegetsi mu 2016, igihugu caciye gitangura guha umugongo Ubufaransa bwahoze bukirongoye mu gihe c'ubukoloni, maze ciheka ku Burusiya. HRW ivuga ko ukudahana kwateje indyane nyinshi, igatera akamo reta gukora amatohoza no gushengeza abo bose bagize uruhara mu bwicanyi, ipfungwa riteye kubiri n'amategeko hamwe n'iyicarubozo, harimwo n'ingabo mvamahanga.

column2: Kidum nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus
column3: Umuririmvyi Jean Pierre Nimbona, Kidum, nawe yasohoye indirimbo ihimiriza kwirinda coronavirus. Abajijwe igituma yasohoye  iyi ndirimbo Kidum yagize: "Ni kubera ari ikiza kuri ubu kibangamiye isi yose kandi caduteye umutima uhagaze twese". Umviriza iyo ndirimbo aho hejuru.

column2: Nigeria: Uyu muvugabutumwa arindiriye kwumva ijwi ry’Imana kugira yugurure urusengero
column3: Umuvugabutumwa azwi cane muri Nijeriya, Temitope Balogun Joshua, azwi cane mu mpfunyapfunyo nka TB Joshua, avuga ko akirindiriye "ijwi ry'Imana" imbere y'uko yugurura urusengero rwiwe mu gisagara ca Lagos. Abategetsi ba Lagos bamenyesha ko amasengero ashobora gusubira kwugurura ku wa Mungu, akakira igice c'abo yahora yakira, inyuma y'amezi atari make yari amaze yugawe mu ntumbero yo guhagarika ikwirakwira rya coronavirus. Mw'ireresi yashize ku rubuga rwa Twitter,  TB Joshua avuga ko "inyuma y'aho abategetsi baduhereye uruhusha, uru turindiriye ico Imama itubwira". Yongeyeko ati: "Ndabasavye mwizere ko nitwamara kwumva ijwi ry'Imana, tuzobamenyesha igihe ibikorwa vy'urusengero bizotangurira icese". Uyu muvugabutumwa yigize umuhanuzi yateje impari mu gihugu mu ntango z'uyu mwaka igihe atangaza ko coronavirus yategerezwa kuba yazimanganye imbere y'igenekerezo rya 27/03/2020, hasigaye iminsi itari mike ngo ubutegetsi butangaze ingingo zo guhagarika ibikorwa mu bisagara vya Lagos, Ogun n'umugwa mukuru Abuja. Ico gihe yatangarije ishengero ryiwe ati: "Imbere y'uko uku kwezi guhera, twemera canke tutemera, ata kuraba imiti izoba yahinguwe ngo bariko baravura, iyo ndwara izoba yazimanganye uko yaje". Igihe iryo genekerezo rya 27 rirenganiye, uyo muvugabutumwa yarazomerewe yagirizwa "ubuhanuzi bwiwe bw'ikinyoma". Hagati aho, yarisiguye - kandi mbere abanywanyi biwe bamukomera amashi - mu kuvuga ati: "Ico nashaka kuvuga kwari uko uwo mugera uzozimangana harya watanguriye, kandi i Wuhan (mu Bushinwa) umugera warahagaritswe". Ivyatangajwe n'uyo muvugabutumwa TB Joshua ntawe vyatangaje kuko niko abapasitori batari bake muri ico gihugu bameze. Hari bamwe bibaza ko uyo muvugabutumwa ashobora kuba yaramaze kwumva ijwi ry'Imana rimubwira nimba ashobora kwugururua urusengero kuri uyu wa Mungu, ariko abandi nabo bariyorohereza ko ivyo ata vyabaye.

column2: Uganda: Uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican yahagaritswe yagirijwe kurenga ibigo
column3: Ishengero rya Anglican muri Uganda ryahagaritse uwahoze ari musenyeri mukuru Stanley Ntagali, mu mabanga yo gusoma misa no guserukira iryo shengero gushika ingingo ihindutse, yagirizwa kurenga ibigo. Ntagali yatanze imihoho mu mabanga mu kwa gatatu kw'umwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 43 yari amaze ari umupasitori. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa 13 z'uku kwa mbere ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'ishengero rya Anglican, uwamusubiriye, Dr. Stephen Samuel Kaziimba, yavuze ko Ntagali yarenze ibigo aryamana n'umugore afise umugabo, kandi na we nyene akaba yaravyiyemereye. Dr Kaziimba ati: "Yarahemukiye ibiro vy'abepiskopi, arenga indahiro yiwe yo kwimikwa, hamwe n'ivyo yari yiyemeje mu nyifato yiwe." Dr Kaziimba avuga ko ishengero rya Uganda ryiyemeje gukorera mu muco no kwitwararika abo bose bagizweko ingaruka n'ivyabaye, asaba ko abagore bompi bosengerwa, abihana bakihana, abakizwa bagakizwa. Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri Amerika ya Ruguru, Foley Beach, na we nyene yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko ababajwe n'ivyabaye. Ati: "Stanley ni mwenewacu muri Kristo, kandi ndashima ingene twakoranye mu myaka iheze. Birambabaje cane kwumva ko yatirimutse kw'ibanga". "Ndasaba Imana ko Stanley yobandanya n'inzira yo kwihana, yongere ihe ukwihangana abo bose bakozweko n'icaha ciwe". Uyu yahoze ari umwepiskopi mukuru ntiyabonetse kugira ngo ashobore kugira ico abivugako. Ariko abanya Uganda bazokwama bamwibukira ku majambo yavuze ku vyo yafata nk'ubutabanga mu gihugu. Mu 2019, yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu ariko ahanura abantu ko "bokwigumya mu vyipfuzo vyabo mu bijanye n'uguhuza ibitsina". Ishengero Anglican muri Uganda rifise abanywanyi bashika imiriyoni 13.

column2: FAO: Ata mafaranga abonetse indege zo kurwanya inzige zirahagarara
column3: Ishami rya ONU rikurikirana uburimyi n'ivyo kurya kw'isi FAO riragabisha ko indege zaryo zose zafasha mu kurwanya inzige zongeye gutera muri Afrika y'ubuseruko zishobora kudasubira gukora hamwe ritoronka amafaranga angana na miriyoni 38 z'ama dolari ($38 million). Izo nzige zitema zigatongora imirima zongeye gutera muri Ethiopia, Kenya na Somalia aho zigeramiye imibereho y'abarimyi n'abarozi basanzwe bahanzwe n'ingaruka z'izikiza ca Covid-19 n'imyuzure muri ako karere. Ku mwihwezo wa vuba, FAO isanga izo nzige zimaze gutera mu ntara 11  muri Kenya kandi ko ziriko zitera zija mu ntara zo kw'ibahari z'ico gihugu hamwe no muri Tanzania. Zimaze kwonona kandi imirima muri Ethiopia na Somalia uyu mwaka. Ribaye irya  gatatu  muri aka karere hatera inzige mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe. Inzige zateye: Aho ziva, ibyo zangiza, uko zirwanywa...ibyo ukeneye kumenya Icyorezo cy'inzige cyageze muri Uganda na Tanzania FAO iragabisha ko hagiye kuba ikindi gitero c'inzige Izo nzige nshasha zafashijwe gushwara akarere n'igihuhusi Gati  catumye mu minsi mike hagwa imvura ingana n'iyoguye mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri. Vyatumye inzige zoroherwa mu kugwirirana. Umuhuzabikorwa w'ibikorwa vyihuta muri FAO muri Somalia, Ezana Kassa, avuga ati: "Ingaruka n'uko uburimyi n'ubworozi bihungabana cane mu gihugu kidasanganywe amaragamo mu vyerekeye ivyo kurya'' Iryo shami rya ONU rivuga ko gupompa imiti mu kirere no hasi , vyakozwe kuva izo nzige ziteye ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2020, vyari vyatumye hakizwa ibitegwa n'ibitungwa biciye amafaranga aharugwa muri miriyaridi 1.2 z'ama dolari. "Aho inzige zaheruka gutera ku rugero rusa n'uru rw'ubu, mu karere ka Sahel, vyasavye imyaka ibiri n'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 500 z'ama dolari kugira zishobore gutuzwa. Iki gitero kirakomeye gusumba, ariko ibihugu vy'a Afrika y'ubuseruko bisa n'ibizogitsinda-gusa ni bitange amafaranga y'igitoro kugira indege zigume zikora'',  bivugwa n'icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru wa FAO Laurent Thomas.

column2: El Clasico: Urukino hagati ya Barcelona na Real Madrid rwigijwe inyuma ku gutinya imvururu
column3: Urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru ruzwi nka El Clasico rw'uno mwaka hagati ya Barcelona na Real Madrid rwigijwe inyuma kubera ubwoba bw'uko hokwaduka akaguma. Urwo rukino rwo mu ciciro ca mbere c'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Esipanye, rwagomba kuba itariki 26 z'ukwa cumi, ariko haraciye iminsi hari imyiyerekano i Barcelona. Iyo myiyerekano yatanguye nyuma y'aho abarongozi icenda b'abaharanira ukwiyonkora kw'intara ya Calalonia batariwe muri yombi. Yaba Barcelona canke Real Madrid, zose zaranse ivyasabwa vy'uko urwo rukino rwokwimurirwa i Madrid. Ayo makipe yasavye ko urwo rukino rwokwimurirwa kuwa gatatu itariki 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri. Umumenyereza Ernesto Valverde yavuze ko Barcelona idashaka ko urwo rukino rwimurirwa i Madrid kuko bazoja i Salvia Prague mu rukino rwa Champions League itariki 23 z'ukwa cumi, iminsi itatu imbere y'itariki El Clasico yagomba kuberako. Umumenyereza wa Real Madril, Zinedine Zidane, yabajijwe ivyerekeye kwimura urwo rukino mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru uno munsi, aca avuga ati "tuzoba twiteguye gukina kw'itariki tuzobwirwa n'ababijejwe." Yongeyeko ati "tuzokora ivyo vyose tuzosabwa." Uburongozi bw'ihiganwa La Liga bwigije inyuma urwo rukino nyuma yo kubisabwa kubera "imvo zidasanzwe zirengeye ubushobozi bwabwo" kuko hategekanijwe iyindi myiyerekano  ku munsi urwo rukino rwobereyeko.
